product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Informed Shopper
content: I purchased 2 of the Pan Cams for my husband for Christmas; along with the outdoor wall mounts. We watched the video for setting up the app and getting started. The directions for taking a picture of the QR code was a little confusing, however, after watching the video made it clear. I have the app on my phone and then added the Wyze Skill to the Alexa app for our Echo Show....that was easy. My husband had no problem mounting them in a covered area; one in the back yard and one on the front porch. This was a perfect addition as we already have an ADT security system. Video is very clear on both my phone and on Echo Show. Just would like the sound to be a little louder. Good product for a very reasonable price. My husband loved this Christmas gift and I'm going back to buy the micro SD cards.
title: Very satisfied!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bleeding Edge Guy
content: From their website - "We do not have any plans to release a Windows version of the Wyze app."  This is the kind of thing that makes me wonder who's in charge at these companies.  I, and I suspect many others, use such cameras to track activity in real time.  Doing that on a phone is NOT a good idea whereas running it on a laptop or desktop would make it EXTREMELY useful.  Bottom line is that I need some additional cameras but will replace everything I have with cameras from a company that is smart enough to know folks want to watch activity in real time on a laptop or desktop.  If Wyze doesn't address this then I'll buy replacements from someone who WANTS my business.  PERIOD.
title: Wyze does NOT want your business.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stevie
content: I like everything about camera.. My camera is outside over looking over driveway and whole front yard... I set it on motion detect, and the camera turns towards a noise or it sees something approaching my yard.. Crazy part is the camera will follow that object turning slowly with movement... You can go back and see what it was looking at, and zoom it in ... I also like that you can manually move the camera on your phone left to right or up and down with your fingers..zoom it in and you can hear everything all noises or people talking... Its great for me..i have three cameras now, two small once, and this tall one for outside... These are the best cameras i could afford on my budget, and to me they work just as good as those expensive ones you go buy at best buy.. Next thing i get will be front door lock with the key pad...
title: Perfect camera when on a budget

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MT
content: I read so many reviews on this camera, starting with the worst and i'm surprised there wasn't more mentions about how loud it is. With every turn it sounds like a motor running. If someone broke into my house, they would notice it immediately just by hearing it... that might not be a bad thing however as it might deter them from continuing. I'm returning because it is loud and I can't get used to it but overall quality is really nice. It's solid equipment and looks nice.
title: Noisy Rotation Motor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: rcataldo
content: I have multiple houses in multiple states.  At the price point of these cameras, I can afford to mount 5+ cameras in each house.  In some cases, I have mounted the cameras outdoors with a third party silicone cover.  I realize there is no guarantee the camera will last the test of time outdoors, but who really knows.  Attached are several HD images from the camera indoors and outdoors, day and night.  I also use the cameras to keep an eye on my elderly mother (with her permission) just in case of a fall where she cannot reach a phone.  I also like the Wyze Cam app.  Simple and elegant.  My only wish is to have an option for auto-updates of the fireware.  With 20 cameras, I have to update all of them one at at time.  Fortunately, I can do that remotely but I would prefer that they keep themselves updated.
title: Best product for price/performance in this category

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Dodds
content: I set the camera up in my living room about 2 months ago.  I liked it so much that I bought one for my garage and another one for my basement.  I've set the one in the garage up already.  But, I'll be returning the other one.  The initial one installed in my living room is now unreliable.  It is constantly rotating at random.  I still might get the Wyze cam v2 that doesn't rotate, since this is the problem I'm having.  I tried to find a way to contact Wyze, but, couldn't.  As I mentioned, it's only a couple months old max.  Such a bummer.
title: Good while it worked.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: rwilzb001
content: I'm a little frustrated with this camera...the overall picture quality, etc is great, but the motion detection doesn't work. I also have two of the regular WYZE cams and they works as expected, just can't get this one to work 100%. I've had to resort to loading a microSD card and then reviewing the playback to see if anything took place. The motion tagging box is selected but nothing is being tagged. I did contact customer support and they asked me upload logs, which I did, but they also asked me to do some stuff I'm not entirely comfortable doing (flashing back to an older firmware). Would seem like you should be able to factory reset back to the original firmware the camera came with and then try each release before upgrading to the next one.
title: Would be a GREAT camera if motion detection worked...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Audra Newkirk
content: This is my second Wyze camera purchase, I have been using my initial camera in a child's room to monitor activity for over 2 years now and have been happy with the picture quality both day and night. Also has great motion and sound detection. I have Arlo cameras on the outside of my house and this little camera has as actually better video stream quality. You are able to keep 2 weeks of free stored video to review at no cost, but can pay for a subscription to have more features, but for my use I only need the free option. I have never had any issues with this camera has never dropped from wifi, only during a power outage but connects back perfectly. Highly Recommended
title: Great camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John F.
content: I had high hope for my first Wyze Cam. I was excited to get it and set it up. Right from the start, I had problems with excessive movement while in motion detection mode. This was one of the main reasons I bought this cam, to detect and track motion while recording. Unfortunately, the camera would move excessively while tracking even a slow-moving target. It would often lose the target and end up pointing at a wall or other inanimate object. Then just this past week the motor that Pan's the camera started to get louder when the camera was moving. A couple of days ago it gave up moving. The motor makes a noise but the camera does not move. I understand that this is a budget camera but I expected it to last longer, further I also expected it to perform a task it was advertised to be able to manage. Motion tracking clearly needs work to be even remotely useable. A quick search online reveals other owners with the same problem dating back months with no resolution in sight. Wyze needs to up their game and manufacture a market-ready device rather than selling a beta test platform. Video quality was just OK, not what I'd expect for an HD camera but acceptable. It also recorded sound on the same level. I have submitted a return request and will update this review once that process is complete.
title: Only lasted 4 weeks

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mitzy
content: Most of the time the camera likes to turn 180 degrees to look at the blinds in my window verses my porch. I'll turn the camera with the app but an hour or two later the camera will turn and look at my blinds. There is no movement that would make it look that direction it just does it. I have more video of my blinds than anything. Not worth your money!!
title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chris
content: I purchased an outdoor mounting kit for this camera. The picture/video quality is great however the motion tracking is jumpy. It also locked in on my American flag that blows in the wind. Adjusted motion area and then it would track the flag’s shadow and reflection on the roof of my parked truck. Disabled motion tracking and have it set to pan and scan. Overall for the price it’s good but can be better.
title: It’s good for the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: D S
content: AWESOME!  GREAT PRICE!  EASY TO SET UP!  EASY TO POP IN AND PEEK WITH ANDROID!  Wish they had one for outside.  I bought 2, 1 to watch driveway and 1 to watch all the exterior doors.  The 1 for driveway works great during day, but reflects itself off the window at night.  The 1 watching doors works great during day, but when dark, sometimes a little hard to tell what's setting it off...most likely our cats.  Working on figuring out detection sensitivity that's right for each camera.  Pretty happy with them.  Have recommended to friends.
title: Love the 2 we've bought, plan to get more.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Aish B
content: I have 3 of these, and 6 of the regular ones now, so can talk from experience of using it for more than a year. These are VERY well priced for what they can do - feature wise. Motion tracking, motion detection, and now person detection to distinguish from any random movement have been great. I wish Wyze  would make it learn to disregard shadows of moving tree branches, and other such random movements. That would make it perfect, otherwise the constant notifications will drive you crazy, and deplete your phone’s battery. Yes, you can turn off the notifications, but what is the point of having a camera if you do not get notified. Also, sometimes it tends to ignore movement nearby if sound is not that discernible to go with the movement, and focuses on movement father away if sound is also more audible.
title: Used and utilized these for ultimate camera coverage at a very good price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joshua Haas
content: I was originally very excited about this product. It arrived, I opened the product, and setup went smoothly. Immediately things went downhill. The motion detection capabilities that this product boasts did not work at all. I tried resetting the camera, flashing the firmware, uninstalling/reinstalling the app. Nothing fixed this. I reached out to Wzye via live chat. Wzye confirmed that they were aware of this issue and that it stems from the firmware. They provided two methods to remedy the issue, flash the firmware, manually reset the camera. Again, neither worked. I was originally told that the technician would initiate a replacement. After a couple days I have not received any updates other than that Wyze is "aware of the issue." Any product that requires this much maintenance straight out of the box should be avoided. I do not recommend this product to anyone. You've been warned.
title: Do Not Buy - Non-functioning Motion Detection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Drive On
content: Likes Easy to connect Software has gentle learning curve Works with Alexa and FireTV Dislikes Could have more vertical movement Motion sensing is touchy to set. It identifies reflections of car lights and shadows as motion. Default in software is to send alerts. If family shares cameras, you need to turn off alerts or it will drive you nuts.
title: Wyze works well

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christian Wetnight
content: I was so impressed with the Wyze cameras that I should be on the payroll for making sales from friends in family. Did a little research watching YouTube videos and bought one. I now own a total of 5 cameras. I originally wanted to see what my dogs were doing when I was not around. I was so impressed I bought more and they are really easy to install. Can’t beat the value and quality of the Wyze family.
title: Big Bang little buck!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gadgetman
content: I have been using Wyze cam for a while and i exceeded my expectations! But unfortunately Wyze Cam Pan is completely opposite. It is EXTREMELY UNRELIABLE, loosing connection with the network (tried other vendor cameras in the same location without any issues). Reboots itself every so often, unable to recognize SD card, poor night image etc. DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS MODEL!!!.
title: Extremely poor quality and unreliable!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Vinsurg
content: I was a bit hesitant because of some of the reviews. I now have two cameras and will be getting more.  For $40 or so and a bit more for the card, the camera gives me amazingly easy setup (easy as nest - I have 12 of those) and at a fraction of the price.  The function of the wyze pan camera is amazing.  Easy connection remotely, easy pan/tilt, great usable app, and solid firmware upgrades.  I did NOT have any issues with firmware upgrades that other people are talking about.  My upgrades were in Jan 2019. With the card, it also records locally so it is very effective to look at recording and video vs. the very expensive nest cam.  I am planning to slowly upgrade/replace all my indoor nest cams with this camera. This is by far my favorite security camera system yet.
title: AMAZING CAMERA.  Great picture, easy app, no upgrade issues, and smooth setup.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: mohdasma
content: For the price this is a awesome camera with the features packed in it, the moving capability is great, the connection on the phone is pretty fast, the quality of the speakers is OK but no complains, there is a lag in the sound but guess its more of a software thing overall a great product got this as I was having a baby sitter for the kids so speaker option is really wonderful as i can hear and talk back when needed. The picture quality is not bad at all and worth the buck. one thing i would love to see is support on computer as right now only the phone app can be used to see the live stream.
title: Great for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Maturity
content: The device is easy to set up but the advantages end there. Half the time it does not activate with major motion in the center of its field of vision. Today for example it captured me leaving my backyard. A couple of hours later it did not capture either me or my wife when we returned along the same path. It also fails to pick up people walking by more than half the time. I have tried resetting it many times and always make sure the software is up to date. Often for inexplicable reasons it pans itself into a blank wall even though the pan feature is turned off. Treat it as a toy not a serious device
title: Totally inconsistent and therefore unreliable. It is more a toy than a useful security device

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Guitar Playing Guy
content: The WYZE CAM PAN, itself is a quality product when it decides to work properly. I received it 5 days ago. Set up was easy. Now the glitches. An SD MICRO CHIP is needed to view previous views. Without the chip the camera will not store video to view while u are not watching. THIS BIT OF INFORMATION WAS NEVER INDICATED WHEN THE PURCHASING OPTIONS CAME UP in Amazon! My second issue involves TURNING OFF. It won't. I went on their website AND I had a SUPPORT CHATLINE. BOTH methods FAILED MISERABLY. As a last resort, I tried calling WYZE TECH SUPPORT NUMEROUS TIMES. After each call and waiting 15-20 minutes a computer prompt say, "No one is available to help you. Call back later" and THEY JUST HANG UP. WYZE has NO TECH SUPPORT that works. So, I have no SD MICRO CHIP AND NO TECH SUPPORT. That leaves me with a product that does NOT serve it's purpose. If I can't get it to work then what good is it?!
title: POOR TECH SUPPORT

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Steel Grooves
content: I have 2 x Nest, 1 x Yi, and now 1 x Wyze Pan camera. I mostly rely on my Nest cams to monitor the front of my house and their timeline review is 2nd to none. However the Wyze Cam Pan sits on a window sill looking out of an upstairs window over my back yard and the picture is great quality even though its through the window glass. Even the night vision looks good through the window which I was not expecting. The pan & tilt function is also very smooth. The motion notifications have been wonky. Never got a single alert for months even though it was enabled then one day a firmware update applied and now Im getting alerts every few minutes lol. Regardless, this is a fantastic product for the cost. I will likely by a couple more at some point even though I don't really need them hahahha.
title: Absolute win for the great price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mit
content: Not dependable.  I have two of these, one aimed to monitor the door and the other monitoring the driveway.  They both miss people and vehicles that come and go.  You would think one or the other would record such motion, but VERY OFTEN they both fail to record.  Less than 50% accurate. Night vision is also very poor.  With lights off, when it does choose to record, you cannot make out distinguishing features at all.  With lights on you can distinguish it is a person but would never be able to identify the person unless they walk up to the camera up close and look toward the lens. Scan feature also gets stuck far left or far right and does not return to the center position.  This would cause further missing of recording of events.
title: Undependable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: woody
content: This is my first camera so I don’t have anything to compare it to, but the setup was easy and it works great so far. I like how I can zoom and move around in any direction. This is a great deal for what I paid. Update: My camera started to miss many simple movements like UPS deliveries, kids knocking on my door and people parking in front of my house. My biggest issue is I cannot playback videos anymore. The most important thing for me was to be able to playback recordings of stuff that happens when I am not home. I just recently bought a second unit because my first was great and suddenly my original camera has had a lot of issues. I haven't even opened up the second camera, but I will be returning it along with the weather proof jacket and mounting hardware I ordered.
title: Great value-update below

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PapiRocks415
content: Truthfully the cam pan I though would help me know if people enter my place when I am not there. It says it does everything I would like in a feature but there are faults in it. #1)Like if it happens to capture an image but the device gets unplugged what was recoreded gets automatically erased. #2) all they ever say when contacting customer support is "you need to reset it and reboot it," then it is still just as useless. Once they send a device for free because I said it failed to work properly so it a decent company for that... I don't like being disappointed which it does. #3) There is no feature that allows you to have it on without recording. Once its on it records for a bit then acts funny after... Plus you never know who can hack into it and peep in on you these days. Better ways to feel secure... Just pay comcast
title: Not very efficient.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Katelynn
content: For what you get, this is definitely worth the price point. The camera rotates for very full coverage view, night vision works incredibly well, and the image is fairly clear. I have it set up to record during specific times and when it detects motion/sound. It will record and save 12 second clips if you have an SD card inside. My only complaint is that it detects every motion from my cat, and I wish there was a detection for people. You can adjust the motion and sound sensitivity but it would be easier to have a "pet" setting.
title: Feel super safe!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jason Kittrell
content: Where do I start? These cams were recommended to me by some people in the home automation community for use with my ActionTiles. I was looking for a good camera that would allow me to view my house and my 3D printers all from the tablet I had set up. I ordered one regular and one panning camera and set them up. The set up process was incredibly easy. Just follow the wizard on your phone and in a few seconds you are done. I like super simple setups. I loved these so much I even bought 5 more. I have all my printers monitored, along with one in most every room of the house. The quality of the video is amazing for the price and you just cannot beat it. Highly recommend these to anyone. I even have recommended them to several business partners of mine to put in their businesses.
title: Cannot say enough good things about Wyze cams

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John Shinn III
content: My younger brother introduced me to Wyze cameras in early 2018. I have since purchased 8 units and plan to buy more as my home security needs changes. Setting up the cameras and linking them to my home wi-fi was a breeze. Instructions were simple and quite easy to understand even an idiot can do it. I also like the fact that Wyze is giving FREE cloud storage for each registered Wyze account even for just 7 days before deleting them. I think every household with children should have at least 1 or 2 Wyze cameras because it's packed with features like a "smoke" and "carbon monoxide" detector and alarm. Also, it will send you an e-mail when it detects "sound" or "motion." Its got a two-way speaker and microphone that allows me to speak and listen to anyone outside my front door like a UPS or Fedex drivers or my USPS mailman. There are more features, but I want to keep this review short. By the way, my only complaint about Wyze camerass is that I cannot monitor my cameras from my desktop using Windows 10. I recommend Wyze cameras to those who are still undecided if they should buy a Wyze camera or not. Believe me. I'm speaking from personal experience.
title: $20 WYZE CAMERA: SMALL BUT TERRIBLE—SUPER CHEAP WITH LOADS OF FEATURES TO KEEP YOUR FAMILY SAFE 24/7

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ATTICUScc04
content: I currently have 4 cams and the Wyze lock installed. I love Wyze products. They don't break the bank and they just work. I have this camera installed in the garage aiming towards the street so I can know if my garage is opened or closed. I like the ability to turn the cam with the phone app so I can see around the garage and even see if the back door to the house is open or closed. I've never had an issue with a Wyze product. Once they come out with thermostats and a doorbell (which they have talked about) I will be getting rid of my nest products so that I only have one app to use.
title: Best camn for the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Karen E. Young
content: We bought two pan cams and a still cam and we needed it to record so we bought 3 SD cards.  When we first set it up, things worked fine.  We had them used for 6 months and then we needed to move them.  Once we moved them none of them worked the same.  We called support, spent nearly 2 hrs trying to get this fixed and they end up sending us 2 cameras.  Only one of the ones they sent worked and that was provided we didn't insert the SD card.  Out of all the cameras only one is functional with the SD card!  Huge waste of money. We will be looking at a completely different line of camera.  I even recommended this to a friend and she's had SD card trouble all ready.  So embarrassed and do not recommend this product.  It is entirely too fragile if you can't even move them around!!!  We never were able to view from away from home.  This product was critical for us in recording as one of our family members has Alzheimers and seizures.  We need these to record the rooms so we can keep track of the seizures and potential wandering.
title: Do NOT BUY!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Matt S
content: I have the pan and the stationary cameras. We use this pan cam for my mom who is handicapped and wants to live at home. With her permission, she and we like this a lot so we can talk and look around and see if she gets into trouble and needs some help. It's a nice relief to be able to make sure she's ok without having to go over all the time. The other camera we use for our house and it works very well. The pics a clear and night vision works very well also. I'm glad these work so well for such a low price. I will definitely be buying more of these.
title: Very nice camera. Especially for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: rumblee1
content: Bought one because a friend was telling me how great they are, without a monthly subscription. OMG. HE WAS RIGHT. Not only does it work right with a crystal clear picture, but setup was a breeze. ADDENDUM - AS OF A WEEK AGO, THE CAMERAS WILL NOT HOOK UP TO MY PHONE OUTSIDE OF MY HOME INTERNET YIELDING THE SYSTEM USELESS. CUSTOMER SERVICE NOT RESPONDING. DO NOT BUY TILL ISSUES ARE Fixed. I have an LG V30 and the cameras no longer work with my LG. They work great on my ZTE axon7. The people at wyze cou not figure out the issue even though it started with them. Very great system when working, but worthless on my LG. I'd like to know what they did to make this stop working. I know I'm not the only one having issues.
title: IMPORTANT-DO NOT BUY RIGHT NOW. SEE ADDENDUM

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Review Monster.(☆=?)
content: Hard to find a good camera at a good price. I Purchased this cam for my elderly parents to be able to check in and see if everything was ok, or if the nursing staff arrives on time and for security. Pros/Cons Pros. Connecting cam to app was one of the simplest . The directions were simple and spot on. The app is very simple to use even if you have never used before. Quality is like all the other high end cameras. PTZ works great and can be customized to your needs through app. Cons. Speaker isn't to loud due to the size. Wyze made this camera perfect and still kept it small for the end user to be able to place anywhere in home without it looking out of place. Have 4  PAN CAMS and cant wait to see what they come up with next. "Great company to follow."
title: WYZE PAN CAM (Highly recommended)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rohit
content: It worked ok for a while. After 3 months of use, my review is as follows. The cameras are fine. Good picture quality, average motion tracking. However the Wyze app is really bad. First of all it takes several seconds to just start streaming. Each stage, (connecting to the camera via secured channel, authentication and then getting video data) takes several seconds before I can start seeing the live feed. That is bearable still knowing that this is what you might get for this price range, but the most frustrating part is, it rarely works seamlessly. Most of the times, it just gets stuck on one of those three steps and then times out. I have to force kill the app or worse unplug the camera and plug back in. This kind of defeats the purpose of having cameras at all when you are away. Overall, I would not recommend this camera for the sole reason of bad quality of the app.
title: Ok camera, really bad App.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Scott F.
content: Nice camera and features for the unusually low price point. Well made and works consistently as designed. So far, a solid performer for me. I believe this camera can rival many of the more expensive types with the same quality picture/video and application. MFG appears to be adding features/fixing issues as they may occur and camera now has many useful features. Also, easy to set up through the app. I have had 2 of them in operation for more than 6 months now and no real issues to report. Has only minor motion detection issues and microphone/speaker works sufficiently enough to be useful to the products intent of allowing communication. Hopefully, they can produce a similar, well working, exterior camera soon. I'll be a return customer.
title: Works as advertised and is a consistent performer

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Carrie S.
content: Don’t waste your money... missed half the activity that happens right smack in front of Camara view.  My husband mowed lawn for 10+ minutes in Camara view ...  not once did it capture him on video. 98% of the amazon deliveries not captured on video. Can’t set the area you want Camara to activate ...  tried everything!  Still can’t Camara does opposite of what you set it to do! Frustration is all it gives ya!!
title: Don’t waste your money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Andi
content: Nice camera but once you listen to the audio through the Android app it switches all of your media audio to In-Call Volume. Hence if you leave the app and try to watch a Prime video it only plays through the speaker in the ear piece not the main speakers because it's stuck on the wrong audio output. Only solution is to restart the phone. I've missed text messages because of this as the notification was sent to the headset speaker vs the main speakers that I could hear. It's widely known issues with no fix. In short if they switch the audio out to media out vs In-Call Volume it would be a winner. Not sure how hard it is to switch that in the app. Update 12-8-20 Audio still does not work well at all, I can barley hear a loud tv in the room with the camera or when people are talking directly into the camera.
title: In-call volume issues

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MamaZ
content: I bought this to keep tabs on my child when I'm away. It does the job for the most part but is a bit of a pain to get it to connect and set up. Pros: you can set "rules" to record when it detects something. The picture quality is good. The lag time isnt too slow. Cons: you cant monitor more than one camera at a time. You have to exit out of one and then click on the other to view that one which is a pain because it takes a minute for the camera to connect and load.  I dont like how obvious it is, and how it makes noise when you pan/tilt it. It makes it very noticable.. overall I dont hate it but its also not my favorite.
title: Eh.. its okay

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JStan
content: This thing is amazing. I use it in my living room. I love moving the camera around and seeing that everything is ok at home, especially with my animals. The picture quality is good for the price, sound is good, the speaker quality isn’t great - hard to understand most of the time. I never use the speaker though. It syncs super well with the app. If you ever have issues though, their customer service is fantastic! I am so happy to find this gem! (Either the pan or standard cam are awesome!) I probably wouldn’t use this as an intense saecurity camera for house protection, this is more for just basic “keeping an eye on things” kind of camera. I love the SD card option and continuous recording. The motion detection, sound detection, and night vision are amazing! Use them every day.
title: Best product for the basic household use.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Estrella
content: We got this after getting an indoor Ring camera that disconnected from WiFi while we were away from home and never connected again basically making it useless. This Wyze camera has proven to be better in almost all aspects. But be aware, these cameras are made to get a wide angle of view which means you’re never going to get a great view of the persons face unless they’re right up in front of the camera or you un-warp the video, that’s my biggest gripe with all of these cameras. Quality isn’t bad, motion detection is ok, when I set mine to follow the motion it seems to constantly want to move, especially if there’s more than one person which makes sense. Being able to pan and tilt is great though so you can look around. Overall I think it’s a nice unit and I’d like to get more, better than the indoor Ring cameras in my opinion.
title: Got as a replacement for Ring. Happy I did.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nathan
content: This is what the ideal camera setup should be like! I've bought cheap chinese cameras that were the same price and those had a horrible interface. For this, the app is smooth and the camera is feature rich. I didn't have to mess with the internet settings or IP addresses. I plugged it in, pushed the setup button, and downloaded the app. Once you create an account and log into your own wifi network, you just hold a QR code to the camera and everything is ready to go. I don't know how such a great camera with a great app interface can be had for so cheap. They have so many other great smart products as well. I would definitely place Wyze among the ranks of the big companies like Ring and Nest.
title: Easy setup for my room, it really is as simple and feature packed as it looks

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marie
content: ***UPDATE**** So I got this February 2019 and it already died on my. I decided to take it apart to see why and found the wire looks like it twisted and broke off. Good idea but doesn't last long. -Good idea but some issues -Picture is good until it starts moving around -Settings could be better with more or better options -I prefer the v2 over the pan -Having a issue with sd card reading (happen this morning....updates issues later) -We use it as a driveway camera $- Not bad for the price
title: DOES NOT LAST LONG

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amazonshopaholic
content: UPDATE APRIL 26 2020 WOW, WYZE DELETED ALL THE BLOGS AND THREADS REGARDING THEIR CONNECTIVITY ISSUES FOR THE WYZE BAND AND SOME CAMERAS, deleted!!! How is anyone supposed to get real reviews and assistance when you control what people put out and you only leave up positive reviews?? You should be ashamed of yourselves wyze! update 4/2019, had to once again replace the wyze cameras I bought in oct 2018 as they started to give “Error 90” again and camera stopped working. I had to buy two other cameras to replace the other wyze cameras I  had originally purchased because it sounds like helicopters taking off in the audio sound. I try to contact customer service and never got a reply that part was disappointing. The other cameras are not much better sound quality wise but at least they're not as aggressive.
title: Update4/2019 error 90 is back cameras are worthless once again!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Harvey G. Linkous
content: This has been another good purchase for my home. Very cost-effective and gives great pictures both with light and with night vision no problem there the quality is excellent. Very easy to operate and to install. The sound quality is not bad but I gave it four stars because I do get some feedback in there that’s rather annoying when I try to use it with my Alexa device. But that is a small thing as the cost effectiveness and great quality of the product overall make that a minor nuisance that I was not worth worrying about. Highly recommended
title: Highly recommended

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Pixie Plumes
content: I have had this system for 6 months now.  I am still thrilled with this system.  I also have a more expensive security system which I was also quite happy with.  However, I wanted more cameras and the cost was prohibitive.  Since using this system, I cannot imagine why anyone would want to pay for the more expensive cameras.  The video is quite good, as well as the audio.  It does just about as well as the "more costly brand".  The only real difference I can conceive is that it is wired versus the other brand is wireless.  To me this was not a deal breaker.  The only other difference is the time lap between recordings, however even this can be rectified by using the micro memory card.  Therefore I am completely satisfied and highly recommend to everyone I know!  Go Wyze!
title: Great Camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R & L
content: I am impressed ! Had the Brains of the family ,open ,setup,and start camera in less than 5 minutes. We can monitor our camera at any time ,at or away from home,even laying in bed, phone, tablet,or computer ! That is insane ! Record or just monitor what's going on,My wife startled me,I was just browsing the computer,and this voice from no where says hey you,I thought someone had snuck up on me ,lol.It's a very cool device,and worth every penny we paid.It monitors our living room, kitchen area,has motion detect ! Sends an alarm if motion detected. This little device is very cool ,and now , I feel very safe.Someone breaks in grabs camera,to late your mug is in a place you aren't and can't get to,tell it to the cops ! I will never be without this technology again,and under a hundred bucks,no contract,very,very,impressed !
title: Impressive

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JVII
content: The Wyze pan camera works well, setup is easy, and has a good amount of software features. The only downside is that the video clips are only 12secs and the motion detection has a 5min  “recharge” time, meaning that when the camera detects motion and takes a video, it has to wait 5min before it can do it again. You can overcome this with a 32GB SD card, but you have to set the video for “continuous video”, and you have to access the more extended video via the entire timeline. It would be better if it just took longer video clips. This would make accessing them a lot easier.
title: Good, but video clips are short.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mike Nice
content: Had it hooked up for a couple days now and haven't dug through everything yet but..lol..I've seen enough to make a sound review. Let's start with the cons. HD? Not really! Clearish but pixelated.. Had to remove the camera from my device list on the app and then redo the whole process with the QR code when I unplugged it to move it to a different spot...which means if power goes out then the cam is out till I get home. Not cool..also lagging on voice/sound and the pan feature too..and that's is over wifi..good wifi...I havent tried over mobile away from home yet. Pros... I like the motion tracking feature, it's cool watching it follow the dog as he walks by. And I love the fact I can turn the thing on and off with my google assistant. Over all pretty neat. I got the light bulbs with it.. now those are awsome... I recommend this type of cam over any of the expensive baby monitor ones too..
title: Has some Pros and Cons...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Calvin
content: I have 4 wyze cameras. 2 for the gym, and 2 for my house. i bought 4 memory cards because they were inexpensive and i like reviewing the video footage. The pan is by far the best of the wyze cameras that I have purchased, due to the features. BUT! I'm not sure if i have a defective one, because the memory card doesnt not allow playback. I swapped each one out, thinking it was due to a faulty memory card, but im thinking it is the actual Pan camera because i can rewatch old footage on the other wyze cameras when the memory cards have been switched out.
title: I like the panning feature, but the wyze memory card i put in doesnt work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J Dong
content: You can pan, tilt, or zoom this indoor camera. You can pan 360°. The camera rotates pretty quickly. You can watch live stream, or insert a micro SD card and play back earlier recordings. You can set the camera to record on either motion or sound or both. Picture quality is good. Night vision picture quality is okay, but could be better. One thing I am not happy about with the camera is that it needs to be online in order for you to access it. Even if your network is up, you need internet access to view it on the app while you are at home.
title: Indoor wireless panning camera..

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ashley Avila
content: We dont even use it anymore after about a week of having it plugged in. We had it set up in the living room pointing at the kitchen entryway as we had a cookie thief amongst our pre-teens. The camera will rotate itself toward the wall constantly so we never could see anything or anyone coming. Yes, even when there was no movement in the room. I also emailed customer service and never received a response. Surprise surprise. It was almost as if the motion sensor was broken or stupid and identifying the wall as a person. Other than that the night vision and picture worked well. Extremely sad because I watched videos on how this guy invented the cameras like a small business. Wanted to support him but absolutely no customer service what so ever.
title: Customer Service means a lot

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Karmala
content: I wanted this specifically to be notified if someone entered my apartment while I was away.  After googling the problem, I discovered that it has been a problem for quite some time.  Lots of ideas on "fixits", but not all ideas work in all situations.  Tried all the ones I could find and it is still not working.  Will be returning it.  Really disappointed as I leave on a trip soon.
title: Push notification does not work.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Benson
content: This camera (wyze pan and tilt) has been so highly reviewed by various journals and Amazon that I thought it was going to be a sure thing. I'm am content with the image quality, the app, and features. However at 50% sensitivity it is constantly getting triggered and constantly rebooting. I lowered the sensitivity to 30%, gets triggered not enough for me, missing things I am trying to track and still rebooting. I don't mind a reboot here or there, but this is still at like once every 10 minutes which is insanely annoying. Due to the covid I probably won't return because my health isn't worth it. But won't be buying a wyze camera again.
title: Constantly rebooting, don't purchase

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jazm44
content: Great little camera for monitoring home while away. The video quality is very good, even at night with the IR illuminators.  Camera pan, tilt, and zoom all work with just a swipe on the phone screen. Setup was easy and worked first time.  Motion detection is amazing, and the sensitivity is adjustable. The exposure level is apparently an average, so not ideal for seeing very dim or bright areas in the room.  If wi-fi is interrupted, not able to reset camera remotely.  I put a timer at the plug to power cycle the cam 4 times a day.  This saved me several times during a 2 week trip.  Comforting to be able to see that the cat is alive and the house is not flooded or on fire.
title: Solid Value Webcam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tracy Clayton
content: I think that for most people who are looking for an inexpensive interior camera that they can monitor in real time, this will be hard to beat.  But I found that I could not zoom in as far as I needed to do at times, so the picture quality was below what I was looking for.  But it is entirely likely that I would have run into the same problem regardless of the camera unless I spent $$$$. I give it 3 stars only so you'll CAREFULLY review the specs to see if it meets your needs.  But I again think that for most people, this camera will work very well.  And you certainly can't get any other camera with these features at this price.
title: Didn't meet my needs

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Trump 45
content: It works pretty good I recommend getting this if you live in a Democrat District you can put it in your window it helps keep Democrats from stealing your Amazon packages while you're at work all day we still have a few million on welfare here
title: Great Democrat detector and cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Mora
content: I like the fact that I can view from anywhere, support could improve a bit, like the fact that I can pinch zoom and pans well back and forth while being fairly quiet not completely quit but good. Records events well and easy to look at the events on the app.  The dislikes are: Will not work with Alexa if you have an Amazon Firestick v1. Will only record on SD card with the Wyze app while the app runs only. This doesn't affect cloud recording of events since it will still record events. The SD card recording problem isn't good since your IPad, iPhone or Android device battery will die quickly if on batteries. Video is sometimes a slight bit choppy but not a deal breaker. I did not try audio at all since I will be returning device.  I would recommend this device for indoor use or to aim out a window.
title: Would recommend but read review.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Customer
content: This camera is a great solution for people looking for a way to keep an eye on kids, pets, or ill loved ones who can't always get up and grab their phone. It's amazing how affordable it is for its functionality; you get full 360 degree panning, the app is simple and free of bugs, and there's no extra charges or payment plans to put up with. All you need is a decent internet connection and an SD card if you want to save video, and you can tune in from anywhere to an HD video feed. The compression is pretty good quality and doesn't impact video quality too poorly; I can make out text on the covers of books and magazines, for example, despite being pretty far away from them. This camera also integrates with Alexa and Google Assistant, although we haven't found a need to use that feature. This is a great affordable system for home security or just monitoring in general. If I could improve some things, pretty much the only thing I'd change is the microphone, which sometimes struggles to pick up softer noises in the room and sounds very compressed. The speaker is just loud enough to be heard in a quiet-ish room with TV on low volume, but it could definitely be louder. All in all, you really can't beat something this well-rounded at such an affordable price. It's a simple camera with a great app that's free of bloat and bugs or privacy concerns. Just set an email and password, scan the QR code, and you're done. Not to mention it's a classy design without branding all over it, so it fits in to your decor quite nicely.
title: Great, affordable indoor camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sara
content: Our neighborhood has seen an uptick in "car shoppers" and some tools mysteriously vanished from my driveway a foot away from my bedroom window.  I wanted something that would let me see a particular section of my driveway not captured by my outdoor camera; outdoor cameras are expensive and I thought I'd try this in lieu of another outdoor. My idea was to put it in the house behind a window.....found out quickly that doesn't work with night vision cameras (my mistake).  What I like about this one is that I can turn the night vision OFF and adjust lighting outside so I can keep the camera inside behind the window and still get a decent picture after dark.  The other brand I purchased didn't have the option to shut off the infared, so it didn't work for my use. I also like that I can turn the camera off with one touch on the app when I get home, and back on again before bed.  I don't need the camera recording ME LOL.  It has a great range, I think the pic quality is great (even at night with the night vision turned off and outside lighting), and it picks up EVERYTHING.  I had to adjust the sensitivity settings; the bug by my window was very active yesterday :)  But it STILL picks up movement in my neighbors yard over 100 ft away. It doesn't make much noise when it rotates.  It fits behind a blind,  love the free cloud storage, and the app is easy to use. All in all, a good camera.  I only wish WYZE made an OUTDOOR camera that would withstand cold (in WI) so I could use the same app for all of my cameras.  I'd replace my outdoor with a Wyze immediatley if they did.
title: Nice camera, especially for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: I. Smarius
content: A couple of things about this camera, daytime the quality is amazing. Nighttime is a different story, I feel like it doesn’t deliver much; however for me the primary use is for daytime. So I’ve decided to use it more as a surveillance camera pointing at the front of the house through the main window. However I am a bit annoyed with the camera, because even with motion tracking, motion tagging and pan scan DISABLED - it still moves around! So annoying. It never stays fixed, just randomly out of nowhere it just rotates by itself (tracking ghosts I guess) Picture quality is really great though; It is a bit noisy when it rotates, weird for such a small device. Overall it’s not bad, I’ll live with the random “ghost tracking” feature.
title: Great picture quality, not so crazy about the motion tracking

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: IceHog
content: I use this camera to monitor our front porch and outside animals. The picture resolution is amazing. Adjusting the visible area is a bit jumpy, but it responds acceptably well. Night vision is very good. I haven't used the streaming video or storage features. Sound is pretty sensitive. Color is spectacular. I recommend this camera for security use.
title: This little camera is the bomb!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: GWH3
content: I’ve had this deployed in my home for a week now and I am pleasantly surprised by the value and quality of this product. Picture quality is very satisfactory. Even in low light situations. For my purposes, 12’ to 15’. I have no issues seeing detail and the colors look true. Panning is great and you get what seems like more than 180 degrees rotation. Horizontal (L/R) movement is mechanical and fluid. Vertical pan (up/down) appears is also mechanical. Solid and reliable across the board. Audio is just “OK”. You can hear just fine when monitoring through the app. However, when using the talk function, I find people have a hard time hearing me. Audio comes in broken and digitized. We’re still testing, but for now, I wouldn’t rely on this to communicate with anyone 2way. We have almost 500mb bandwidth and other cameras where I’ve tested similar functionality adequately, in this capacity. I also closely monitor my bandwidth and connectivity. So that’s not the issue here. I suspect his is an audio processing problem and could be fixed with a firmware patch. But for now, it’s too inconsistent for me. Build quality is very solid. I would’ve expected to spend 2 or 3 times what I did, to get a product this sturdy and well built. It’s larger than I expected; (see the measurements in description). It’s designed to sit on a flat surface though it also has a mounting hole under the rotating platform. There is a light in front. There is an option to shut the camera off through the app; and the light goes off. So if your paranoid like me...you have some level of comfort that can be achieved should you so desire. The WYZE App is good,  but I’m not personally a fan of the pan, tilt controls. It’s hard to get the camera in position and it via the pic drag. The digital control stick, makes for bit of a choppy action. Otherwise, the app is clean, intuitive and easy to use. There are even interesting smart functions like movement tracking and motion follow.  I look forward to future updates. Setup, is just easy. I had this hooked up in minutes. I spent more time reading through instructions and looking for online “how to” content, to make sure I didn’t forget anything, than I did actually setting it up. Overall, this is great value. I was worried about spending only $39 for a security cam. Now I can’t imagine getting more bang for the buck anywhere else. I’m a life long tech guy. At the time of writing this review, I run an IT group for a robotics company. And for what ever it’s worth, I am actually impressed with this product and price point. 4 stars from me. Losing a star only as a result of 2way audio consistency and the pan tilt controls on the app. 1 of those which is arguably subjective.
title: Impressive value and functionality and unbeatable price point.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: felterco
content: I bought four of these for around my house. My husband is on hospice and stays in the bedroom. The cameras make it easy to check on him when I'm not in there. I enjoy using the cameras on my Echo Show. I can see all four at the same time. And even though I bought them for the humans in my household, the cameras make it easy to find out which cat got into trouble in the middle of the night. (Yes, they do that!) Wyze has some great products at really good prices. This is just one of their items I have. I enjoy them all!
title: Great little cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John of Jax
content: This camera works great and has very good video quality. I initially bought one to see if the reviews were accurate. I now have seven of these cameras. The setup is very simple and easy. Another outstanding feature is the 2 week event cloud storage for free! I have installed a 32gig SD card in each camera for continuous recording. The app makes viewing the events and SD card recordings very handy. The only things I wish were better is, the motion detection is also triggered by changes in light such as passing vehicle headlights. Also, when trying to view recordings from the SD card, the playback is very difficult to select a specific time. Overall I very satisfied with my purchase of these cameras.
title: Best value for 1080p security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R. Schnapp
content: This is the highest value wireless camera I have encountered. It's truly amazing the amount of functionality it provides for a minimal investment. If you need to keep an eye on an interior space, this is a great solution. You can have it periodically scan up to 4 positions at 1080p. You can remotely pan and tilt to point the camera where you want it. And you don't have to pay any monthly fees for access to your camera or past recordings. On the downside, you are relying on Wyze's servers. If Wyze's business model or viability changes, your service will be affected. While this is also true of the other wireless camera products out there, given the less-than-obvious business model, one has to wonder how sustainable Wyze's service can be without subscription revenues.
title: Best bang for the buck

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brandon Thurlow
content: Let me just say this; The product itself works pretty darn good. The only issues I've had have had to do with opposite ends of the motion detections sensitivity. If the sensitivity is too high, then the lights outside (we leave our porch light on and share a parking lot with other residents) can every once in a while trip up the night vision which then trips up the motion tracking (dont know how that works but ok), and if the sensitivity is too low, the camera will not detect us if we happen to enter or leave too quickly. Having said that, those issues are not very frequent and serve more as minor irritations. The product works very well most of the time, and gives us ease of mind about living in a bit of a not-so-great neighborhood. The biggest reason I give 3 stars instead of 4 or 5 is because I think it's ridiculous to make you pay a monthly fee to unlock your camera recording more than 12 seconds after it detects motion. This is not something I should have to pay for. I understand the company wants to make more money to support the app, but this is just not the way to go about it.
title: Worth the asking price under certain circumstances

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SDNO
content: This is the second one I ordered wish they came out earlier. The picture quality is better than my other IP cameras which I paid a lot more for.  The price is crazy. The first one I purchased I was like hey what do I have to lose it only $37.  The camera is small but it works like it the biggest kid on the block. You cannot got wrong buying this camera. It took me longer to get it out of the box then to set it up. One setup you can unplug it and move it anywhere with out losing connection. The people that designed this knows their stuff. NICE JOB. You won’t go wrong buying one.
title: Best IP Camera on Amazon

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Kougl
content: It's a good camera, it can notify you of motion or sound, it works in those regards. I took off a star because if it "works with Alexa" it should be able to do more than just be shown on Alexa screen devices. I should be able to add this camera as a device for scenes and routines, and to tell Alexa to turn the camera on or off, record, etc.  It would be a 5-star camera to me if it had this functionality.
title: It works, by can't be controlled by Alexa

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ray
content: The Wyze Cam Pan lives up to the hype. It is really easy to set up, download the app, create an account, press add, and scan the QR code. That's it. Once up and running you can connect to the camera for live viewing and it will catch motion alerts based on a schedule or all day and night. You can pan up, down, left, and right but the motor is a bit loud. I can't ask for much more from a camera that is $38. One tip, make sure to change quality to HD as SD is the default and the picture won't be as clear. It does use more data but it works fine even on my 6mbps upload cable connection.
title: Great value for a pretty great indoor camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lawman
content: I do a technology segment on local TV & radio. I have looked at dozens of cameras. I really can't understand why anyone would pay $200 or more for a camera, when the Wyze Cam Pan can do the same things, just as well for $30.00. I've had one inside for a few years and it has performed flawlessly. I just installed one outside using this cover and it has held up through 3 rainstorms https://www.amazon.com/SEEKONE-Protective-Waterproof-Protection-Adjustable/dp/B07TMZ8PJ6/ref=sr_1_5?dchild=1&keywords=wyze+cover&qid=1588776251&sr=8-5
title: Why Pay More ?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: joe luisi
content: Your app and camera interface is trash. I've had more trouble trying make this thing work consistently, than not. then all of a sudden after the most recent update the camera doesn't appear on the device list, nor will it reconnect after a factory reset. I'd ask for my money back, but I bought this thing back in may was able to at least appreciate the video quality, but the microphone was defective out of the box as far I could tell, unless you guys just use trash mics. I've been paying for the cam plus service since I got it, and trying to play back anything is the biggest pain in the a s s. You guys really need to iron out the bugs before you promote this garbage the way you do.
title: Trassssshhhh

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: vardelda
content: Great little camera at this price.  Downsides are you have to use their app (which I would consider carefully if security is high on your list) and *no IR illumination*.  I use these for secondary spaces (garage, side of house, hallways, etc.) so I don't care about any security concerns of someone in China viewing my feeds.  But the lack of IR illumination means you won't see much without lighting.  For most of my cameras I pay 2.5x this price to get IR illumination included.  But if you've got areas where its not a problem (or if you don't mind buying a cheap IR illuminator and setting it up in the space), then these are a great little camera.
title: Not sure what more you want for this price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sam M
content: Despite all the security issues Wyze experienced last month or so. I am still happy with the product at this price point. They are a smaller company growing fast. Stuff like this happens and they all about improvment. You can spent few hundred dollar on a camera system and you will not gain much as far as features and quality goes. Yes you made get a better security. However I got this camera to watch my apartment when I am away on business trips. It works as expected. When I’m home I unplug it. I am not worried about security/privacy as much. For this price you cant beat it.
title: Works great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dragonflii
content: This camera is awful. The clarity of the picture is okay, but the connectivity is terrible. Every time you move the camera, either via the pan function (through the app) or manually, it freezes the feed and the app has to be closed and restarted to reset the connection. In addition, it just randomly freezes on its own without being moved. We have a strong WiFi network so that isn’t the issue. We have a Nest cam also, no issues with that one. I purchased this to save money but as the saying goes, you get what you pay for!
title: Nope. Buy a different camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CW
content: BUYER BEWARE!! Does not work as a baby monitor once you leave your network! We bought this to bring along when we travel with our baby. It won’t work with any hotel or other network that takes you to a login portal asking for username and password. There is no workaround and Wyze’s guidance is to ‘buy an inexpensive travel router’. I bought this to make life more convenient, not to add more gimmicks to our household. There really should be a warning in the description that it won’t work in any unsecured network! Of course I’m past the return window now and stuck with this useless camera!!!!
title: BUYER BEWARE! Won’t work for traveling/hotels/unsecured networks!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PJ Finster
content: You get what you pay for, these cameras just really aren't all that great. For 1080p they sure are blurry and can't zoom in at all. Lots of little issues with them. They are always disconnecting even though I have solid internet connections, it never fails when I click on one that it doesn't load. I have memory cards and all of my cameras and they were all recording, but some of them just randomly stopped recording, so when I go back to investigate and event the camera wasn't recording. The pan cams are always resetting their position without being controlled.
title: Cheap cameras, you get what you pay for.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Andy Goldberg
content: I have tried several of the top brands and still have them but dollar for dollar Wyze cameras both of them are for me. far superior then Arlo or Logi Circle & Circle Two as well as D-Link and these are just from 2018-present.  Don't get me wrong as they all have their merits.  But as the headline says....  The vids I have watched will definitely make you want to own these two and from someone who is a huge pain in the #$% when it comes to tech.  Trust me when I say I never put my name on anything.  But these two little ones and the people that are the Wyze family are definitely worth looking into.  Thanks Sorry for any typos now go buy these two and no, I don't even know these peeps
title: Best Bang For Your Buck

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Just Asking
content: The 14-days of cloud storage are only for motion detected snippets. Price went up.  Does NOT work with Synology (and most other?) NAS. But you can store continuous recordings if you buy a micro-SD card for it, officially 32GB though many report that 64 and 128GB work, and thus cover a longer time period. Though a talented thief would steal the SD along with the camera (its inside the camera). Overall though, install process was fast and smooth, Android app seems to work well.
title: Doesn't work with Synology NAS

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cruzer1200
content: No matter what mode you have it in it won't track correctly. After it detects motion it then turns completely around and faces the wall. Once it faces the wall it can no longer detect or track. I have done every update and upgrade and follow the directions carefully and still does the same thing. Unfortunately the camera is pretty much useless. The only way to view is by going on the app and manually turn it back from the wall. Once finished it goes right back to the wall. Frustrating. This however is the wyze product I've had issues with. Everything else I have purchased works great
title: Not good. After it pan it turns and faces the wall

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RCPra
content: The first couple of days I experienced no problems with the camera, but after that it would intermittently not connect to my WiFi. Starting doing it more and more as time passed. I ended up returning and will see what else I can find to meet my needs. When it worked the picture was great and motion detection worked great.
title: Had WiFi connection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Antonia Stamos
content: Camera works like it should, but you should be careful of nearby objects (especially in regards to objects near it on the shelf), as the camera tends to focus on them rather than everything else. Same issue with the night vision in that if there is an object close by, it whites out the image and everything else is too dark to see clearly. One downside I've noticed, and I don't know if it is my wifi connection or not, is that one of the 2 cameras I bought seems to only have a clear image along the left and right edges, with the center being out of focus. It doesn't matter whether it is day or night, the center of the image is always blurry. The 2nd camera has only a slight distortion in the center so not as noticeable, maybe because the objects/furniture in the image are further away? The second thing is that when I zoom in, it only zooms into one area, I can't get the image to zoom into the specific area I want to see. Is there a way around that? Overall I am happy with my purchase but I would've liked the image to be clearer in the center as well since that is where I am looking most of the time.
title: Picture not as clear as expected

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jay M.
content: This camera is unbeatable for the price; the best value. Set up is super easy and the app sync works perfectly, I got a couple cameras and they pair perfectly and work with multiple phones. Picture quality and sound are great in HD when not in Night Vision mode, NV gets a little blurry past maybe 10 ft. The cons: the picture range is not great; if you want to zoom in it gets completely pixelated to the extent you can’t distinguish a thing. I don’t recommend it as a baby monitor, which is what we wanted it for, however for a toddler is perfect if you just need to know when they leave their bed. Motion detection is decent, but the “cool down” 5-minute period between recordings is not great. Overall definitely recommend it and worth it for the price; but many things that can be improved.
title: Great camera at unbeatable price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Vickie Johnson
content: This camera is great for basic use (I say that because I am not using an SD card or using any other features besides just as a camera)! I did a lot of research to find the best one and this one is working out well. We needed a camera for Grandma's house for the couple times a week our baby is there for her naps. We didn't need all the features of an expensive baby monitor so just a less expensive camera was all we needed. The picture quality is great on my MIL's iPhone and the camera has a nice sleek design. Highly recommend!
title: Great baby monitor for Grandma's house

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Will
content: Works well for indoor panning camera when the light is good.  Night vision is just a blurry stream, entertaining but lacks sufficient detail to see the subject and identify a person. Needs reboot after every software update. App is good and easy to use.  Support was excellent when I had no motion detection. Friendly and fast.
title: decent price performance for well light areas, poor night vision

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C R
content: I bought it to replace my broken Amcrest camera. I bought two Amcrest: one broke recently after one year of use. One is still functioning. After I got the WyzeCam, I really like it. Here is the side-by-side where WyzeCam beat my Amcrest: 1) Price! The $ I paid for Amcrest can buy me two more WyzeCam! 2) WyzeCam is so easy to use!
