It is easy to setup and the smartphone app is great; 3) I never got the Dropbox function of Amcrest working - so old-school arcade user-interface and just won't work! WyzeCam is seamless! Will buy another WyzeCam - I hope they make a out-door version... 2/24/19: "View Playback" feature stopped working. Instead of giving me rewinding video. I got error saying "No micro SD installed on camera". Disappointed! Deducted one star.
title: Easy to setup. Easy to use. Cloud storage is seamless. App is great.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R. Alexander
content: Setup was pretty easy, and the night vision works very well.  The quality of the picture is quite good, and zooms well.  Unfortunately (and this was a deal breaker for us) the motion detection is terrible.  It goes nuts!  It rotates, as if the air itself sets it off. Having said that, Wyze told us to keep the camera - free.  They refunded the full price.  So, next time we want a camera, they will be the first place we'll look, but we'll go for a higher quality (and probably higher priced) version.  That kind of support is what really matters.
title: Great quality, horrible motion detection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RJ
content: I purchased 2 Wyze Cam Pans for monitoring a Florida home while summering in MA.  Setup was a breeze!  The live feed has been working great with excellent video.  I am not using the motion tracking or panning features.  The sound event alert works awesome.  There is only about a 10 sec delay from when the noise is detected to when I receive the alert on my iPhone and iPad.  The event video clips are super.  There is one MAIN problem. The motion alerts do not work with the latest firmware as of 5/1/19.  This is a common issue based on a Google search and is software related.  There is a fix if you have an SD card installed.  Otherwise you will need to wait for the firmware to be updated which will hopefully be soon. I did send an email to the company asking how to change my account email address.  They responded within 24 hours and let me know that it cannot be done. A new account would need to be opened. Not a big deal but this needs to be addressed.  Based on the quick response, I gave Tech Support 5 stars.  If the motion detection worked, I would have rated the Wyze Cam Pan 5 stars.
title: Great value for the features with some glitches.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Isaac Dixon
content: I own 5 Wyze cams and bridge/contact sensor pack. So far I have been very happy with all things Wyze. I finally decided to give the Pan a try! After mounting it in my livingroom and playing around for a week, I don't think's it's quite there yet. Camera works great as long as it's stationary, but that defeats the point. Half the time the camera is not following me, and when it does the video is blurry, as it spazes left and right. Mind you I have it on the highest video quality with slowest motor speed. Sometimes it will get confused and spin towards the wall and stare into the corner. I also have a wyze bridge connected to it which lost connectivity to my door sensors for no apparent reason. I was able to finally fix this by completely unplugging the camera, since a restart wouldn't fix it. I also wished it had a user programmable home position for the camera. Often the camera will follow something to be stuck at an awkward angle, never to catch movment again without user intervention. Regardless, I'm sure with a few tweaks, Wyze can make this into a winner like the rest of their product lines.
title: A nice effort, but not fully realized

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: mike
content: This review is about the tilt/pan camera.  I absolutely love Wyze cams for their easy set up and use.  I have 4 cameras running, and this one is the only pan cam I purchased.  My issue costing the product a star is the volume on the 2 way communications.  All the other regular sized Wyze cams have loud volume and 2 way communication is easy (albeit a slight delay).  This pan cam has very, very low volume and it's not possible to communicate.  This was a problem since I wanted to use the camera in a Ring doorbell way at my front door.  Amazon swapped out what I thought was a defective volume issue, but the replacement is the same way.  No real problem, as I will change to a regular camera at the front door and use the quiet pan camera where communication is not necessary.  These cameras are awesome and I will continue to purchase regular Wyze cams when needed.
title: Awesome camera, 1 issue

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cyndie
content: We bought this camera to see our dog when he's at home alone.  I love that I can talk to him and hear him.  I wish the volume of the microphone was louder though.  The picture is very clear during the day.  I was amazed at the quality of night vision as well.  I love that it pans around allowing me to see outside and in other rooms.  I wish we had bought this a long time ago.  Highly recommend this!  Setup was very quick and easy although I'm still trying to figure out how to make Alexa do more with it for me.  It does 10-second recording if there is motion or sound.  You will notice the camera moving with motion as well.  Best and most valuable purchase we've made in a long time!
title: Great camera for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: alyson wish
content: The various aspects of this camera only work sporadically! Sometimes you can't even get into your feed! I've had multiple email conversations with tech support for one issue or another. The latest issue is that it won't record events or send me notifications of any kind! Everything is turned on. I've watched multiple you tube videos about how to operate it all. Reformatted discs. Support just keeps sending me instructions that are long and convoluted! Then something else stops acting properly. Want to send it back!
title: Weekly issues!! New week, new issue!😡

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shawn Sabia
content: This is my second Wyze pan cam and I really like it. Live stream works great as does the pan and tilt. I have one in my family room facing the pool and backyard and one inside a window sill facing the front porch. This thing hands down beats my ring camera as far as pictures and motion detection! It Does work through glass and even at night! As far as the speaker it’s fine for. 2,way audio. Actually came in handy when my wife wasn’t answering her phone due to headphones on, so I saw she was on the couch and i started talking and the dog heard me and started barking lol! She then picked up the phone. Highly recommend wyze.
title: It works like it should!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: shyvoyeur
content: Have 2 cam pan and 4 of the stationary cameras.  Not sure what the review saying that manual reboot or unplugging cameras is about as I sometimes have to reset router and have not had to do anything with the cameras to get them to connect back up to the WiFi.  These cameras are amazing for the price.  I have a nite owl system from Costco that had nowhere near the image quality of these for 3 times the price.  I love being able to check on the dogs and the house at any time of day and for $30 you cannot beat the Wyze cam pan.  Stationary are great as well.  Do yourself a favor and get these.  They just work.
title: Best on the market for 1/3 of the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Peter Morris
content: Love this camera! It was so cheap but it does so much. I've had cameras that are twice the cost and half the functionality. The app is great and the settings can be customized easily. The motion tracking is pretty good but not the best at longer distances. I would recommend turning down the speed setting at which it rotates when motion tracking tho (easily done thru the app). Mine would rotate back and forth to follow people walking across the room, but it's own force would cause the whole device travel a few inches from its spot on the bookshelf, often resulting in it staring at a wall by the end of the day. Lowering the speed and affixing the base to my shelf fixed this. Reducing its motion speed also improved the image quality when it was moving too.
title: Great camera, can't be beat for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Turbo911
content: This brand, and their cameras, has a huge national security concern. They send all the data to Chinese servers. Once there the CCP has every right to spy on you. I’m returning my cameras immediately.
title: Sends all data to CCP China!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joselyn
content: When I 1st got the product I was excited. They worked exactly how it was supposed to. But I have since been noticing the camera Pans while it is in off mode. That's a little creepy because it's not activated.  Also when I purchased it I was living at a different location but since I have moved an area where they use the spectrum community and the cameras do not Find the Wi-Fi network. I've contacted Tech Support and no one can get on the phone with me they just send me trouble shooting emails reiterating the same thing. I've had a go to youtube to find people to give me alternatives.
title: It's ok but does weird things

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SGS
content: This is an excellent piece of hardware.  It gives you a tremendous range of viewing and is easily controlled from your phone.  Where I believe it comes up short is the software.  It activates every time you walk by.  I really want this to be be a security camera and as such I am looking for something that I can have on when I want - the software really needs to support geo-fencing -so it turns off when I am home or that supports operating only at certain hours - so it works to detect motion when I am sleeping, etc.  It also could use more control on the nature of the notifications it sends.
title: Great Hardware - Software Could use some more features.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joley27
content: I bought this based on the great reviews for v. 2.0. I thought the version with Pan and Tilt would be the same quality, with more features. I wanted it to keep an eye on a relative in a nursing home, especially after the nursing home entered lockdown due to COVID-19.  I got it installed there yesterday and the picture is great. But, the 2-way audio is a complete and total FAIL! I went online to look for a solution online last night and found a thread on the WYZE site where people have been reporting this problem for OVER a year! Apparently, the audio problem started with a firmware update from over a year ago. Some people have had success reverting to old firmware. But WYZE seems to have deleted the option to revert to the prior firmware now.  Since the camera is in my relative's room in a nursing home and the nursing home is still on indefinite lockdown, I can't enter and try adjustments. I can only ask/plead/beg with nursing home admins and maintenance techs to install the camera. I'm thinking about cutting my losses right now, and asking nursing home staff to remove camera so I can return it  and replace it with something else. If 2-way audio is important to you, DO NOT buy this model until you can find that this problem has been fixed!  I am so disappointed right now that I could scream!!!!
title: The 2-way audio does NOT work!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Thomas W Andrews
content: After reading several reviews we decided to use this camera as our baby monitor. It works EXCELLENT, and was easily MUCH cheaper than anything branded as a baby camera. The night vision works great, and you can hear and see whats going on from your phone wherever you are. The application is password protected, and the programming is such so that it can only be set-up to one network at a time. (Making it much more difficult to hack, unless you have an unsecured network.) We added a small roof and perch which made it look like a birdhouse in our woodland nursery. The only downside is sometimes the sound will lag by 2-3 seconds. If you're worried your kid will die within those precious seconds this is NOT the camera for you. However if you're a normal person, or you've had half a dozen kids I can't recommend this camera enough.
title: Great Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sendone
content: I bought this for couple of reason and it has gone above what I expected.  I originally bought this so I could watch my dog while I was at work.  I didnt want to lock her in her kennel any but I didn't want her to destroy my house.  This camera is great, when she is moving around the livi g room it follows her and sends me notification to my phone so I can see 12 sec clips.  I also start the app and leave phone in a holder on my desk and watch her the entire time.  Having the ability for 2 way communication is a big bonus. I am going to buy at least a couple more and probably other product like there light bulbs.
title: Above my expectations

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Pamela J Drennan
content: We have been using this for about a month.  We Have had no problems at all.  First time I bought a product like this that really works! Crystal clear video, even the black and white night vision video is clear.  The motion detection works well in daylight and in darkness with the infrared lights, they light up things quite a distance away, at least 15 feet. Good Sound, good motion tracking, the live view doesn't have hardly any lag, and the app lets me control the camera easily and responsively.  Easily records everything to the cloud. We put a 32Gb SD card in the camera. Records very well to the card for saving permanently. I rate this product a Great Buy!
title: Works as described!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Blue Mango Cafe
content: I ordered two of the Wyze PT to give myself some peace of mind when it comes to my home. I ordered them after they officially supported RTSP streaming so that I can link them to MotionEye within Home Assistant. I didn't want to be restricted to just saving to the 32GB SD cards, RTSP allows me to store the camera footage on my NAS. But even as a standalone camera setup these are great for the price. Using the app to live view the cameras is easy and straightforward. The controls work really well to be able to see all around. I really appreciate the 1/4-20 mounting option on the bottom of the camera, that made mounting to the wall simple and minimal. You can't beat this quality for the price point.
title: Best bang for the buck

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dimetime
content: Motion tracking: follows the moving object. Motion tagging puts a outline box or grids on moving object as it moves through footage. If can also pan all the way around. I’m using my iPhone without Memory card inside the camera. It only keep 12 seconds of moving footage if it detects anything. One day I’ll get memory to record 24/7 but I got this only for Amazon packages. U can also listen pick up feedback from camera. U got kids like me u can talk through the camera and it’s pretty loud. There is more but for $40 u can’t bet this. I will purchase more camera for basement for kids that come over and one for backyard. This is not for outside but if u have windows there shouldn’t be problem. Clean windows for sure and outlet near too.
title: Awesome 🎥 for the value!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chicky
content: I love this camera so much I bought 2! I use it to spy on my dogs during the day or whenever I’m out of the house. I love that I can listen in to see if they’re barking or if they’re having a party of something. The pan is my favorite because I can move the camera around until I find one of my 5, it becomes a game when I switch from camera to camera. The night vision is good and the picture quality is good. The motion detection isn’t always 100% but I don’t really care. I haven’t had to go to the cloud to find anything since I’m just a dog stalker. If you want some home security or just want to stalk your dogs then this is a great option. You can’t beat the value for the price, I would recommend to friends and family. I love it.
title: Dog Stalking

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Clement A. Gollier
content: I got a couple of cameras to help keep the home health person honest. So, while the intent was not for the camera to see the nurse, but for the nurse to see the camera, it's still an amazing piece of kit for the price. Everything works as advertised, and the free cloud storage (rolling 14 days) is really nice to have. It's also useful to be able to remote in and tell the dogs to quit barking. I feel like Big Brother. One gripe: you apparently cannot exclude an area from motion detection, so if your camera location catches the TV as mine does, you'll be recording all day. I ran an IFTTT applet to turn off the cameras when I get home, and turn them on when I leave to minimize that issue, though.
title: Blown away by this thing

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: N. Solomon
content: I love these Wyze cameras, both the Pan and the fixed one, however, in the Pan Cam i have not luck with the motion detection, and the SD card is positioned on the bottom of the camera, I have lost already 2 Micro SD cards, because it fells form your hands, and having the PanCam outside, this little thing flies who knows where. So that is why I do nto give a 5 star review. I also find the night vision a little difficult, specially if you are near a highway. However, I think the value for your money trumps those little difficulties.
title: difficult to change SD card

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Judge
content: Would have given 5 stars if not for three issues. The cameras reflect off the windows when dark outside. If you turn off nighttime really can’t see anything. The plug into the wall is extremely long. Can’t push the furniture back where it should be. Horrible design Don’t upgrade software if you’re out of town  because the camera spins on the base and can’t be reset until you get home. Camera will be backwards from what you need. In the daytime cameras are perfect. Great resolution Setup was extremely easy. Three simple steps. Have to decide if I want to keep them. With the downsides probably 2.5 stars. Without the three issues would be 5 stars. One really nice thing is the notifications are free on the cloud
title: Works great in daylight

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kliedave
content: I have 8 Arlo cameras but had to try this one because of all the positive reviews.  It has many more features than the Arlo's and much better picture quality.  Of course, the Arlo cameras are wireless and can be used outside.  I'm a caregiver and have to monitor constantly.  I've only implemented a few of the features with the camera but I'm very impressed.  At first I thought it had a mind of it's own.  It kept rotating 360 stopping at 90.  Really frustrating.  Like R2D2 had taken over.  I finally figured out that I had pressed "Pan Scan" by accident.  I think Wyze has online instructions that I haven't had time to pursue but it's fun learning the hard way too.
title: Fun little camera for the cost

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SusiQ
content: I bought two of these when I saw the CNET YouTube review and was very impressed with the insane amount of things you can do to adjust it to make it perfectly what you want,it  to be. It can pan 180° go up and down tilt or not you can stop it you can start it you can set timers and it’s motion detector and  actually will follow said motion like your dogs if it sees your dogs it’ll zoom in on them and follow them wherever they go it’s kind of crazy! . We bought one to actually take with us in ouR suitcases when we travel to keep an eye on hotel rooms in case someone comes in our room while we’re not there and I think that does happen so we’ll find out and if it does I will post the video. 🤣🤣 Oh and there’s no fee involved monthly or otherwise and extremely easy to set up it’s a lot of fun!
title: BEST LITTLE CAMERA OUT THERE! 👍👍

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ronnie Barboza
content: Camera not reliable, got it as a dog cam and it has major connection issues. It’s not my connection I know that (checked WiFi and everything). I replaced the camera with a new one thinking the first camera was just broke and nope the same thing happened! Eventually I got it to connect but did the upgrade and boom now everyday I try to connect, it doesn’t work! DONT DO THE UPGRADE! If it connects, its a decent camera but once you unplug it or do the update, you have to reinstall the camera again every time and sometimes it just doesn’t connect. Also the HD card I ordered from the company didnt work. If you need a reliable camera, this IS NOT IT... they have technology issues to work on.
title: Don’t Recommend NOT reliable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jesse
content: Just so you all know, the motion sensor only works for 12 seconds for free with the app, otherwise you have to sign up for an additional service and pay after a trial. This isn't long enough to use the camera reliably for security, so without shelling out more money for this "upgrade," as a previous reviewer said, it's a gimmick for watching your cat. Put your trust in it and you'll have 12 seconds of someone walking up to your camera to show the police.
title: Buyer beware on motion sensing limitation

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ann C. Gauntlett
content: Very disappointed with the Wyze cam and can not recommend.  The only thing that seems to work is the live feed.  So if you just want to watch it live, that works.  Everything else doesn't work worth a darn.  It does not come with instructions except how to connect it.  The motion detection does detect motion but it does NOT track it.  The camera will move a bit and actually move away from the motion.  Doesn't follow the motion at all!  It only records for 12 seconds...so you'll see a few seconds of motion.  You're supposed to be able to download the videos from the "cloud" but the attachment never comes through!  There is no support except for the "user community" so if you want to waste your time searching the web for answers to questions they could have put in a little  manual...You will still be disappointed in the lack of a real answer.
title: Only good for live feed viewing...nothing else!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Evan
content: I bought this to place in a 2nd story bedroom window overlooking my parking lot. It's nice to use the app to check the parking lot before pulling in and going outside. It's placed in my roommate's bedroom so I created a box to surround it. This disables the ability to rotate the camera for privacy reasons. This camera mostly does the job I need it to do. The app alerts me to motion in my parking lot. You can change the motion sensitivity levels and set the zone that will trigger event recordings.  The device records 10-second "events" when it detects motion or sound (I have sound disabled). Wish I was able to lengthen the 10-second event setting because sometimes the motion isn't strong enough to keep the device in record mode (ex: people walking and then standing still in my parking lot). Also, the app allows for you to customize many settings so that's nice. From the distance I'm using it though, the video quality isn't strong enough to show clear facial features. That's the only drawback for me. I see this being the PERFECT device to be used indoors. It's less effective when used through windows but mostly does the job for me.
title: Perfect camera for an indoor setting

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C
content: I got 4 of these to use as baby monitors for my home daycare and they are 95% perfect. My only small issues are that since they are on WiFi, what you are seeing is not always 100% live. For a while we were having huge issues with it being 30seconds-1minute behind but I realized that I forgot to put my WiFi back to 5g on my phone after setting the cameras up. That solved the problem and now at most they are 1-2 seconds behind. The other small issue is that sometimes it takes a few seconds to load. But again, that’s just because it’s a WiFi camera. Overall we are very pleased and we saved a ton of money by choosing Wyze!
title: Great products, great value, minor inconveniences every now and then. Would 100% recommend!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KC
content: Great camera for the price and features.  Really good video, motion detection, allows you to insert MicroSD card for local storage, decent SW for your Smart Phone to view live video streams as well as stored video local or in the cloud.  Wyze Team appears to have good statements on video stream security, but I didn't validate the streams.  Only downside has been that you can only access camera on the Wyze app on your smart phone with no access via an Internet browser.  Other than that inconvenience the cameras are great especially for the price.
title: Very good inexpensive camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Adam Davis
content: I have had issues with my first camera, but after talking to manufacture support, and getting a replacement camera it seems to be working great.  Cant really beat the features/quality for the money. I have noticed some issues with audio not seeming synced with the video but as of right now that is not an issue. I mainly use it for a dog camera anyway. I love the fact it has sound notifications. I can set it low so it only goes off when my dog barks.  which allows me to also get a time stamp to check my other security cameras if needed.
title: I love this product.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jacob
content: This is perfect! I got it so I can keep an eye on my dog while I'm gone and check in on here through out the day to calm her down if she's barking or stop her from getting into stuff. I am very impressed with it! The set up was alittle tricky. It had a hard time finding the WiFi network at first but after a few tries it finally connected, that could of been something to do with my WiFi though. The motion detector isn't the best, it does loose track of you sometimes if you move to fast or something but that's not the biggest deal expasially since I'm just using it for a live stream so if I need to I can move the camera while I watch. The night vision is very clear witch is impressive for the price.  10/10 would recommend!
title: Perfect!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Art B
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Garbage camera... Just like the v2, all it does is buffer. Internet speed is 90-100 down, 80-90 up, sitting 3 feet away from router in same room. Will not hold a stream over 5 seconds before buffering for 5 seconds. Buy something else... Using it with Echo Show 10
title: Garbage camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: The Truth 101
content: A great price for a starting level security product. The pan works great and there is tracking and other digital settings in the app that further advance its operation. It's swivel is audible, so if pan and tracking is set "on", then anyone in the room knows they are being recorded. We use ours without the pan feature, but if we get a notification that movement is detected, then from our phone we can turn the pan on as well as all other features and functions. Easy to set-up. All you need is a smart phone and able to follow the prompts during set up. The faster the Internet connection you have the better it'll work. We have 20mbps and I'd say that should be the minimum speed for a reasonable operation.
title: Works like a champ! Easy to set-up. Internet speed is a consideration.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MG in AZ
content: This camera is a great deal.  Picture quality is good, it rotates almost 360 degrees, can do motion sensing and following a moving person, and the software is free and easy to download.  I mounted mine in the garage so I can see what is in front of my house, but can also be rotated to see inside the garage.  It works on my iPhone and wait time is very short (just a few seconds) from opening the app to seeing real images.  If you add a memory chip (cheap to buy) it will record video continuously,
title: Great security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bandhu Steerling
content: Real life useless product, cameras are not viewable from any computer, any browser just from portable devices. It is useless for seeing what is going on in the backyard while working on computer or being ninth kitchen.We need a picture running in the background not something on my phone to stare at exclusively. For that I can be right there and watch it live with that portable in my pocket and will not need a camera.
title: Cameras are not viewable from a computer, only from handheld devices

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alexander Monta
content: I was living at an apartment where people were getting shot or beat up pretty regularly. We kept to ourselves and were ok but still had a few issues. This allowed us to keep an eye on the main part of our apartment from the safety of the locked bedroom. Has both a live feed to your phone that works anywhere with WiFi and recordings to a SD card. I could keep an eye on my house while at work. You can easily move the camera with your phone so that you can see other areas around it. It also has motion tracking and will record after sensing motion. Don't forget to turn off fans though. It will continuously follow fan blades and record for hours on end.
title: Makes me feel safe!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alias
content: I learned about these while listening to the Clark Howard show. When he endorsed a $30 camera I had to do some research on it. The camera's video quality is excellent, and I especially like that you have the option of storing video on a miniSD card as well as having 2 weeks of video saved on the cloud. I liked this so much I purchased a second camera. I mounted this outside, just under the eve. Even in hard rains, this area stays dry. Although not recommended for outdoor use, so far this camera has been working and recording fine. For the price, I felt it worth the risk to see how it would do outdoors. As a worst case scenario, if the camera fails because of weather I'll simply purchase another and find another spot to install it. The app is easy to use and gives you many options, to include sensitivity (movement and sound), and how you get notifications.
title: A great buy!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christian Otero
content: The camera is good, night vision is decent. But when it records a 12 second clip, it’s like the camera takes a 5 minute break before recording the next clip , I have a Wyze Sd card in the pam, sometimes it says there isn’t a chip in there so I need to disconnect and re-connect the device for it to work, one thing I don’t like is if you want to pay for the full service (wyze plus) you need to pay for the individual camera, if this company cared about people and their home security they would charge for their service per account not per device, it’s $12 a year per device or $2 a month per device, I have 5 devices and it just isn’t worth paying that much for something that should already be included. If you want a decent camera with decent night vision this is it.
title: Could be better

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Connie P Flanagan
content: I love the camera, sharp picture,much clearer than my Ring doorbell. Works great on my Smartphone, but has lots of problems connecting to Alexa. Both of my Alexa shows gen1 and 2 have problems connecting. I have to ask several times, with repeated answers of camera is not responding. before they connect. I wanted cameras so I could check on grand kids when they are in another room.  By the time it connects the kids are no longer there. Hopefully someone will issue an update to fix problem. I have no problem connecting Alexa shows to Ring. Update 1/29/19  Problem seems to be fixed. I'm not sure what changed, but the camera is now connecting to my Alexa shows on my 1st request almost every time. Love this camera when it works properly. Great value. Definitely recommend.
title: Nice camera, Alexa connection needs work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Emkelley
content: I bought this camera to monitor my mare prior to foaling. I am not tech savvy and this was very easy to install with clear step by step instructions. My problem with the camera is that it does not stream to my phone once I leave the barn property. This could easily be a problem that I have with my internet or phone as our WiFi is not strong in our barn. This did work nicely to check on the mare from inside the house which is close to the barn. You can turn the camera, talk through the camera, record and take screen shots. The night vision is very clear as well. I had to buy a WiFi extender to have it work in our barn but overall I am very satisfied with the purchase. If I had the patience I’m sure I could have gotten it to stream to my phone.
title: Perfect Foaling Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: esmith
content: Overall I'm very happy with these little cameras. They are responsive over internet/cell, are quick to set up, easy to use, and so far seem reliable. I especially like the push notifications with video clips. I do note that the motion detection can get a little wonky. The green motion detection boxes in the video sometimes accelerate off the screen, drawing the camera's pan over to a wall or corner where there's simply no motion. But they recover quickly and get back on task. Also, some features like restricting pan/search parameters are buried deep in menus when really that's one of the initial setup tasks you'd want. That aside - great little cameras. Someone's got to make a Dr. Who Dalek skin for them. The low servo noise and tracking motion is uncannily similar.
title: Quick Setup, Easy to conenct

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DNC
content: The video is clear and sharp. Audio is clear. I blame the software that tells the camera what to do. Wyze software. Fail. I have done all the steps listed in Help. Some multiple times a day. I have to save an event. How? Where is the recording? I keep returning the settings to local storage. Returning. How are the settings changed without my knowledge? I'm the only one with access. I tried too hard to fix it. Too late to return it. I'm questioning the validity of positive reviews
title: WYZE software FAILS

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tester
content: This is a great little camera and with a little bit of geeky knowledge it can be setup to do some amazing things using iFTTT. The Camera's IOS App is also straight forward and has tons of useful settings. The camera absolutely can not be beaten for nowhere near this price level. The pan motor is a little noisy but that's not a big problem, might even scare an intruder out if they heard something making a odd sound while it was tracking them. lol! As for the motion detection; it works great. It can get thrown off a bit if to much is going on in the room and confuses it. Picture quality is great in light or dark with it's night vision. It's a breeze to set this camera up using the QR code method provided. Buy it!. You want believe what you can still get for your money.
title: Product was as described or better.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C. Pettie
content: I was very disappointed in this buy the microphone on the camera is terrible and if I knew the camera only records for 12 secs at a time even with a mircoSD card, I wouldn't even bother buying it. Not only do you just get 12 secs of playback but it has a 5 minute cooldown before it records again. Now I have to look for another form of security cams hopefully I dont get fooled again with the lack of information provided.
title: Very disappointed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: timthinks
content: Pros: - only $30 - motion detecting & following - night video better than I expected - easy to setup - able to store about 1 month of video on 32GB SD Card (due to low image quality/size & low frame rate) Cons: - Video quality is not 1080p, IMO. Would not be able to identify persons or vehicles from recorded video: if over 15ft away. - Frame rate too low to be very useful as surveillance: I believe is less than 15fps, maybe 10fps. - Kept glitching out (losing power) several times per day, after most recent firmware update. I finally gave up on the camera, and donated to thrift store, after a few months of use.
title: Meh. OK as an experiment.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Peggy C
content: I used the first Wyze Pan Camera about two years ago. Over the years, I added more. As of yesterday, I have a total of four camera around the house. I also recommend this security camera to my friends and family. It is very easy to set up. My family members are allowed access to view my house. I particularly like it when I'm away from home. I can see everything goes on where I position the lens. The night vision is fine, not outstanding but not bad either. It did a decent job. The price point is right. I don't have to spend monthly fee for some agency to monitor my home. A perfect choice for me and my family.
title: Sense of safety

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TooMuchSauce
content: This is an amazing deal for what you get. I also have a full 6 camera set of Arlo Pro cameras and I prefer my 2 Wyze Cam Pan cameras hands down, not even close. You will be shocked at the durability, picture quality, and the number of things you can do with it such as motion tracking and cloud event storage. To give you an idea how durable it is I'll say this, I have hanging under an overhang outside overlooking my driveway for 6 months now and have had no trouble. That is exceptional because these are indoor cameras and not  supposed to be outside. Mine is mostly out of the weather  but not entirely. Highly recommend, these things are only going to go up in price as they become more popular.
title: An Absolute Steal

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Doug W
content: This is our third Wyze camera.  The other two are stationary V1 models, they worked flawlessly, so I figured I would get one of these to add to the garage to capture movement in there after one of our neighbors had their garage broken into during the night while they slept in the house. Same to set up like the originals.  The only reason I cut a star was that they still only support 2.4 wireless.  Seriously, why? The camera picks up all movement and the alerts are a nice addition to the ones I get from the garage doors when they are opened. It does track to where the movement is, and picture quality is pretty good, I need to pull up the video's on a computer to see if I could ID myself in the video's.
title: Added another Wyze to the house

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: David Laws
content: Good picture quality, easy setup, but the pan and tilt delay is very spotty. I highly recommend tapping the up, down, left, right controls once and then wait for the video to adjust. Do not hold down or by the time your delay fully adjusts, your camera will more than likely overshoot your desired location.
title: Day one review

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kory Ingole
content: Absolute trash. I’m a gamer and a tech geek, so naturally I have high speed Internet and a great modem/router setup, but apparently that’s not enough to support this camera. The connection speed frequently shifts between extreme highs and extreme lows, spend about 30% of its time at 0.0 despite being well within range of my router. The lag is horrible because of this, typically resulting in impossible panning. Literally one tap of the panning directional button sends the camera all the way to one side until it maxes out its rotation capability. I suppose it’s possible I just got a bad unit? I mean Amazon did decide to mail this piece of sensitive electronic equipment to me in a padded envelope..... What a joke. I was hoping to be one of the lucky majority who seem to love this thing, but it’s practically unusable. Luckily it was as cheap as it performs, so not a huge loss.
title: You Get What You Pay For...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ML
content: After using the Wyze Cam Pan for a couple months, there is an annoying issue which I could not stand and it prevents me from buying more. The device works fine and I have no complaint. However, there were a couple times when I thought I hear strange noises from downstairs where the cam was placed. I quickly opened the Wyze app on my phone to find out what’s going on. Instead of showing the Live Stream screen directly, the Wyze app screen popped up notifications asking me if I want to do a firmware update (and the other time was promotion of their new headphone). In a moment like this, you began to question if the possible intrusion was more important, or the firmware update (or the Wyze new headphone) is more important. Are you serious, Wyze?
title: Possible Intrusion vs Firmware Update/Wyze Ad

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Norm
content: I really liked this camera because of the picture quality and easy pan and zoom. I carried this with me and connected it through my phone hotspot so that I could record classes for review later. At first, it connected no problem and worked like a charm. After a month, it would not connect when I first plugged it in, but finally would after I rebooted my phone. A pain, but usable. Then another month passes by and it prompts me to upgrade the firmware. After that, it would not connect at all unless I added it as a new device from scratch. Now, it does not connect at all. For a network based device, their ability to do networking is really pathetic. Networks have been around for decades and a network chip is cheap and easy to use, but not for Wyze. Searching the internet, I have found a Ton of network issues customers have with their devices and the company begging for network logs or whatever to help find out what the problem is. The problem is your product, it does not work. I gave it 2 stars since the camera is quite good, but after it stops connecting to the internet, you can’t use the camera and it is nothing more than a paper weight. I rarely review, but this product really disappointed. By the way, my background is in computer technology, so not user error just a bad product. You know the saying, you get what you pay for. Don’t buy cheap products like this, spend a couple hundred and get a real security camera...I am now.
title: Forget about it connecting to your network after reboots

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lew Wilkie
content: Returning, despite my best efforts to set up this camera they were all in vain. Set my cell phone to 2.4 Ghz and forgot my 5.0 setting. Ensured my wireless router used the correct security protocol. Installed the Wyze app, created an account. Followed the screen prompts to install. When I got to the part to scan the QR code got the message can not connect, over and over again even when disconnecting the power to the camera and starting fresh. Several attempts after shutting down my cell phone and restarting met with the same results. If setting up a security camera is this much aggravation I don’t want one.
title: Endless aggravation.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tweety
content: Highly recommend if you are looking for an reliable camera to monitor real time or record with internal storage. Playback feature allows to know when someone was there so that I can go back just to that time to view the recording.  Simple to operate and beat is that it does not time out like other app.  Not to mention great price.  Going to get two more to cover the backyard and basement.  We like it better than the more expensive Blink.
title: Best value real time monitor camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Matthew Bradford
content: First I would like to say I really like this camera, the app, and movement. The picture quality is overall good and impressive for a camera at this price point. Even the night time picture is good. I use this as a baby monitor in the evenings as the baby naps and it works but there is a huge delay. I also have a baby monitor and I find that the camera is roughly 15-20 seconds behind. I can go into the room walk in front of the camera and walk back into my living room and I will see myself on the camera after I have already gone and sat down. Now I understand it's wireless and going to the app, but the delay is a little excessive. Still really like having this camera but wish the delay was less.
title: Great camera, works great, but large delay

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anonymous
content: These cameras a SO frustrating. They are constantly resetting and recording the blank wall behind them.  I have fixed the detection zone, adjust the pan more times than i can count, turned on and off motion detection. Nothing makes the setting stay, its like they do a reset every 10 min.... if i wanted a motionless camera i would have gone with another model.
title: Pan settings reset ALL THE TIME

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Fetze
content: Excellent camera system, cheap and good image I installed it outside my home and used for the connection a poi adapter and created an outlet outside with the adapter ($20) . So I had an excellent wifi outside. I record on 64gb card, you have to format it again on your standard laptop/pc, first NTFS and then the standard and ready. You can record twice as much as 32gb card. When the card is full it start automatically over recording over the old recordings...
title: Excellent cheap security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: GW
content: The Wyze Cam Pan is a great security camera. The picture is high resolution and the panning is a very useful feature. I get a 360 degree view around the camera where I previously needed 2 or three cameras to cover the space. This camera easily beats my four times more expensive Nest Cam. Update: in the meantime I own 5 Wyze Cam Pans installed in two homes and I am very satisfied and impressed with the quality. The new App feature of combining multiple cameras in one view is very helpful. I combined camera views of each home, which allows me to get a quick all around view of home 1 and with a click I can switch to home 2 and see all my cameras there on one screen. Love it!
title: Wyze Cam Pan delivers great picture and features for a great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sydney F
content: I LOVE this product! I would 100% recommend. I wanted to get the Ring doorbell so bad but just didn’t have the money to spend on it so I figured I’d give this a try since I wanted some security. I initially only bought it for viewing of the inside of the house but soon figured out that I could set it behind my blinds to look out the window to my front porch/door. The picture/video quality is amazing. I definitely plan to get more. The only reason I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 is because the app could use some work. It’s a very simplified, well programmed app. However, my live feed is sometimes delayed or has to be reloaded serveral times to get a picture. Also, sometimes when an event is recorded, multiple clips will play the same video. It’s a bug that definitely needs to be fixed. Bottom line, I would recommend. I’ve been telling everyone I know about these things. They are so, so worth it!
title: Get it! You won’t regret it.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Pk
content: I’ve been looking for a fun dog camera for a while... and this product is amazing.  Some of the auto tracking modes aren’t super smooth and gets confused when more than one object is in motion... and sometimes glares on windows/wood cause the motion tracking to hiccup, but the manual motion and overall picture and connectivity work perfect.  The microphone and sound microphone also work but it’s a little harder to evaluate that function.  Also, it allows friends or family to spy on your pets by gaining access with the app...  I haven’t used it with the SD car installed but this product gives you the and image of a $200 camera for around $36.  It really is an amazing device and would make a great Christmas gift/stocking stuffer.
title: This little device is AMAZING!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tom Nguyen
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Had this Wyze camera pan and tilt for about two months now.  Camera quality is pretty good, pan n tilt work ok but will spin right outta sight if you’re not careful. Motion detection work but super sensitive. It will pick up the sun light from your window and trigger motion sensor. It’s sensitive but can b adjusted.  It was working fine until a power outage cause this darn thing to lose its connection. I have three other Wyze Cam v2 (the cube ones) and those are unaffected by the outage. This Wyze pan camera however, It have trouble connecting back to the WiFi. I have tried resetting the app, reset the routers, hard reset the camera it self, restart my phone etc but nothing seem to work. I also Email Wyze support but no reply.  As you can see on my video(sorry for being shaky, recording with one hand suck), I did everything according to the manual from plugging in the device, connect it to the 2.4Ghz WiFi network. Everything leading up to QR code scan please wait message. The cycle is 150 seconds long for the camera to connect, however, the camera it self will flicker on/off as if it’s resetting it self and it will spin, tilt up and down then ultimately fail at connecting resulting in “connection timeout”. After troubleshooting this darn thing for the better half of my day imma go with a replacement via amazon CS. If the replacement suck just like this one I’ll post an update.  Contacted Amazon CS and they were willing to work with me on a replacement and that’s pretty cool of them. Pretty sure I’m not the only one either but we will see how this go.
title: Spin machine, connection timeout

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ERICKA BETANCUR
content: We decided to change our baby monitors to have a better view of our toddlers room and playroom and let me tell you.. I wished I knew about these cameras before. The picture quality is excellent. The motion sensors work incredibly and the sound is right on! We have a sight of the whole room and with perfect nightlight vision. It was very easy to install and we can view from our phones and we’ve connected thru Alexa as well.
title: Couldn’t be happier with our cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Haley D
content: We got this product to spy on our elderly dog while we’re at work. I absolutely love it! Incredible quality for the price. Set-up was very easy, and it has worked perfectly every time. The zoom is impressive, and I’m able to zoom in far enough to see my dog’s chest moving while she breathes. There’s a bit of a video lag or lapse, as with all security cameras like this, but as long as it’s on a strong wifi network it should be bearable. The pan, both side to side and up and down, is awesome. It does sometimes stall when you’re trying to position the camera from the phone app, but never for too long. Just be slow and patient when panning. The night vision is creepy, but gives a very clear picture. The audio is pretty good, and the speaker is loud enough that I can speak to my partner through the camera and the app on my phone. Easy to use, easy to set up. For the price, I’m very very happy. It does need to be plugged into an outlet at all times, though, so keep that in mind while positioning . (Photo is a screen shot from the phone app so you can get an idea of clarity and scope!)
title: Easy to use and amazing for the money!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stephanie
content: I have two cameras pointed at my front door.  The Belkin (which, of course, is stopping service) and this one.  This one picks up motion about 25% of the time and its usually just rustling leaves.  The only reason I know there was someone at the front door is because i get a notification from Belkin.  Really, buy any other camera.
title: Do NOT waste your money on this camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SJ
content: The cam is awesome, works well, there is however one issue with it and while it does not effect performance it certainly does effect security. Whenever you turn on motion tracking even when all light and sounds are turned off in the settings the Cam emits a loud beep each time it moves. This certainly effects the security aspect as it lets anyone know that they are being watched. A bad thing if ur intentions were to have a cam that is used for household security. Silence is golden or should be for a security cam if that is how a person wants there individual systems to work.  Wyze needs to have a switch in the settings to be able to turn this sound off if desired.  I would have otherwise rated this as a 5 star.
title: Camera is great. Except....

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Carol O.
content: Wow!  This in-home camera outperforms my expectations by leaps and bounds!  Very easy to set up, with foolproof instructions.  It took maybe 15 minutes to set up a free WYZE account online, then enter the info online to add the camera to my account, then connect the camera wirelessly to my encrypted WiFi network.  Now I can get into the WYZE app from anywhere, using my phone or tablet, and see what the camera sees.  I can remotely pan and zoom the camera, and—remarkably—see, speak to, and hear my pets from miles away.  There are options for storing video, some of which are free.  The price of the camera is unbelievably low, and there is no monthly fee.  What’s not to love?  Granted, if I were trying to surveil a multi-million dollar art collection, protect a corporate mogul’s private office, or remotely monitor something else of huge monetary value, I’d invest in more robust security than this camera.  But for monitoring my priceless pets, this camera is perfect.
title: Perfect for monitoring pets remotely!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ed
content: I have my Wyze Pan camera installed on a covered porch with this housing. It stopped working, and I called Wyze they said it was outside and the camera can't handle hot or cold., and since it was outside the warranty wouldn't cover it. I'm like. It's on a covered porch, Arpil-June 7th....it's been mild. But no...I'm stuck with a brick and plastic goes into the landfill.  I told them, that seems deceptive because nowhere does it say when buying...indoor only....they didn't care. If you are gonna buy an outdoor camera, buy one. This is like throwing your money away.
title: All but indoors, stopped working right after return window.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Angelique
content: I was a bit skeptical before placing my order. I had never owned any form of camera or security type gear. These cameras work wonderfully. They also come with sound. I can check in on my children, or even my dog when I’m away from home, and I’m able to speak to them also. The cameras look nice,  not an eye sore. I’m way more impressed with the ease of the app and setup than I thought I would be as well. I traveled a lot this year and wasn’t able to install them until just this week and I am so happy that I have this system in place - I wish I had found time to do it sooner. I’m considering more cameras for other spaces in the home now!
title: The app and install process is super easy!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: speedyalice
content: This camera out-performed by expectations. For less than $40, I wasn't expecting all the features offered (flexibility in motion and sound detection sensitivity, remote panning ability, free storage of video), and so, so easy to set up and use. The night vision is clear, the ability to choose whether recording is continuous or only when triggered by motion/sound, the ability to set the sensitivity level of the motion or sound that triggers the recording, choices in choosing when notification of sound/motion are sent, the ability to pan and adjust remotely from the phone, two-way audio/speaking capability - all of these make for a very effective cam for watching your pets, kids, home, etc. Set up was very easy; changing the camera view/angle remotely is very easy - love this camera and highly recommend it. Kudos to the geniuses who thought it up and made it happen!
title: WOW! Great product, incredible price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: YouMaybeRightIMaybeCrzy
content: First, the camera is a bit bigger than I thought based on the picture.  About 4 inces tall by 2 inches square, roughly.  It's made mostly of plastic, but seams reasonable sturdy.  Installation is super simple.  Download the app and just follow it step by step.  Picture quality is pretty good. Not great, but very good.  Night vision is also very good.  Pan and tilt is a bit slow but otherwise works well.  The camera's pan function works differently than most other cameras.  It rotates on it's base.  The reason I bring this up is because the entire camera rotates, causing potential for bumping into adjaction things, and possibly falling over. Overal the camera delivers decent build quality, trule pan and tilt, and good image quality for $37!  It's a screaming deal.
title: Incredible value.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Crys Sal
content: Couldn't have asked for a better security camera especially at the price AND no need to sign up for a cloud service. Great quality image (you can choose between higher quality images or faster speed motion tracking) and easy to set up. You can also choose how sensitive you want motion detection to be. If you dont want to be notified with every slight movement in the house, set it to a lower sensitivity. My camera likes to watch TV (because there is motion on the TV, it thinks it has to track it 🤣) so we usually adjust sensitivity depending on what we're doing. I feel much safer with my Wyze camera!
title: Love my Wyze camera!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Arabind
content: Was going out of town for 6 days and decided to purchase it just in time.  Camera quality is awesome, night vision is good and there is 2 way communication.  There are 2 things that need a little improvement. 1. Motion detection --  If we travel too fast, the camera captures the video but is unable  to follow us all the way. 2. Notifications -- The PUSH notification doesn't work all the time.  When we setup the first time, it works and then for the captured events there is no notification.  We can go to the events and see all the events for the past 14 days. I think these issues can be fixed easily with software upgrades.  Overall, an amazing quality product for the price.
title: Amazing camera with Pan scan, night vision and motion detection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Keith O
content: We bought this camera before an international trip to keep an eye on our puppy while we used in-home boarding services.  For the price, the ability to share and control access by multiple accounts is huge (you do need the Wyze app, not a big deal though). Motion tracking is a bit "eager", but night vision works well and the image quality is sufficient to see what's going on from your phone's screen, just don't expect super fine detail. I do wish that shared accounts could have access to file playback as an option. Right now only the "parent" account can take advantage of the SD card storage, would be nice to share/rescind this option for shared accounts. All in all, amazing product considering the price. Setup is straightforward enough, and Thai camera saved us when it seemed a more expensive option we purchased wasn't going to work in time for the trip. And yes, I'm an actual paying customer, wasn't reimbursed or compensated to get me to write this review. I know it can be hard to trust some reviews on Amazon these days, but value for money, I would recommend this 100% of the time
title: Easy to use, setup, share. Great value for money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ava Tutza
content: TL;DR: This camera is good. Great picture quality day and night. Cons is that sensitivity is either very sensitive or not sensitive enough, I’m still trying to find the perfect balance. I got this camera to watch the living room and more specifically my pet rabbits. The picture is very clear both day and night and the night vision works very well. You can set the motion detection sensitivity in the settings of the camera through the app that you download to operate the system. My only complaint is that the camera sometimes doesn’t pick up a lot of movement like one of them jumping out of the cage but will notify me when my rabbit scratches her ear. I turned the sensitivity down because the constant notifications were driving me insane.
title: Clear Lens, Any Light, Can’t Lose

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: multially
content: So disappointed. I have everything it says one should require. Comcast 2.4 ghz wifi. I wasted my time and money because it will not connect. I've tried everything. Other than that theres no one but an email contact to help w the issue. Hopefully, I will get an email response...says their open till 4 PM so my security issue will just have to wait on their crew to get it together tomorrow. Trouble shooting mentioned additional wifi LAN tech weird necessities that you should additionally have .... wish I would've known that before they wasted my time.
title: It doesn't work with Comcast apparently

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gee man
content: It definitely needs use instructions. After figuring out,  mostly, how it works, I mostly like it. After a few weeks of use, i know this camera does what I want it to do. But figuring out how to do it is another thing. I use it as a security system in my apartment, and it does this well, but I think it has a few software issues as well as my needing a computer science degree to get it to fully function. UPDATE!!! THIS DOES NOT WORK WITH ALEXA!!!!!!
title: It works pretty good, but it doesn't work with Alexa

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DC
content: Very pleased with this WYZE camera. Love that you can set "pan" areas and view different areas automatically.  Easy to set up with the app, works with Alexa, even though that say that it only works with 32gb microSD cards, I have 64gb cards in all my WYZE cameras and never had any issues. The only thing I can fault the WYZE cameras on is the speaker, but I don't talk through my camera so that doesn't bother me. Also would love if they changed the 12 second video clip to say 30 seconds. Definitely need to add a microSD card for continuous capture. Overall, recommend.
title: Another WYZE hit! Great camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bill
content: 1. Its not weather proof so the night vision is pointless since it can’t see through glass. 2. The sensitivity settings are for distance not for how small an object is so birds and bugs constantly set it off. 3. The time for it to reset and record after an event seems a bit long and many things can happen in that time frame. 4. It wont record time lapse into its cloud, only events, so get the biggest SD card you can or it will fill up fast. 5. If using a SD card. Deleting a recording won’t actually delete it off of the SD card so you have to format it every time it fills up.
title: Almost worthless

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: G.Love
content: I love this camera but it keeps losing connection and we have great WIFI. We use it as a baby monitor, great picture, great night vision but all of that is for naught if you have to constantly restart the app. And if you use pan scan or motion tracking the camera will randomly spin for no reason! The camera has great potential but I’m going to have to return it until they fix all the kinks mainly the connection issue.
title: Could be a great product, not quite there yet.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: spartanmama
content: Has the same 1080 HD as my previous Foscam but the image was not the same. Not nearly as clear - doesn’t even look HD. And every time I set it or zoom where I need to see, if my phone goes to sleep or I go to another app or I tilt from landscape to portrait it reverts back. I appreciate the affordability and set up was super easy. This is likely best if you just need to “set it and forget it” and you don’t need high def for details. I sooooo wanted to love this camera, especially at the price point and what it claimed.
title: Solid, but some inconveniences

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tori
content: Using this for our sons nursery camera and it works great! We pair it with an audio monitor for constant audio. In the app, you can turn on audio, talk through the camera, take screenshots and zoom in/out very easily. You can see very well in the dark rooms, even with zooming in to make sure my son is still breathing :) I originally wanted a marketed baby monitor but glad we went with this. I check it often but don’t feel the need to watch it constantly. Plus it was much cheaper to get this camera and the audio monitor. Very easy to set up as well!
title: Great to use for baby monitor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kim C.
content: Wasn’t able to connect either one.  I’ve had other brand cameras that were so easy to set up and use.  I didn’t try to set them up until now, so I’m missed the return date.  Worst cameras ever!!  BUYERS BEWARE!
title: Worst set up ever!  DON’T BUY!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Y Mappat
content: Wyze cameras as absolutely fabulous. They sell these cameras @ 1/6th of the price of Arlo and nest cameras without compromising on the video quality or features. They do not have an inbuilt battery needing a hard wired USB cable for powering it up, but other than that it is just awesome, works beautiful, there app is excellent for live viewing, notifications, timeline and it also comes with free 14 day cloud storage which is an additional fee for most security cameras (Another camera I can recommend is Reolink that has free 7 day cloud storage. I use it as my outdoor security camera). I hope Wyze can come up with an outdoor weather proof camera as well. That would be a killer if they stick to this price point maintaining the same quality. You guys at Wyze rock!
title: Value for money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TK
content: Got this primarily to watch my cats.  I put it by their food and water bowls.  It's fun to see them throughout the day and night while I'm away.  Not sure if I'd use this as a security measure.  It will only record in 12 second intervals.  Then it takes it several minutes to start recording again.  Not what I would call great for security. UPDATE:  With recent firmware updates, this company is really trying to get you to buy more options.  Options that were once available for everyone, are now gone and you have to pay for them.  Would not recommend this for home security use.
title: It's Okay for Watching Your Pets...Not Home Security

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: T.O..
content: -Takes ten minutes to connect to my wifi and my smart phone. -The programmed "pan" to 4 different positions takes 10 minutes on a good day. -After programming 4 different pan positions, it prioritizes the 1st two pan positions. So basically - 2 pan positions. an occasionally 3rd and a very rare 4th. - Refuses to record to Micro SD card CONTINUOUSLY. It just records 1 minute clips from arbitary "motion detection" even when motion detection is turned of. POS worked for a week, and then I did not need it for 2 months. Now it is basically useless.
title: Potential but failure.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: HeathCliff
content: While initially excited at superior image quality and capabilities, especially for the low price, the morning after the first night of use, I awoke to camera disconnected, needed to eventually uninstall and reinstall, and since, will not set up properly, including setting parameters for pan and scan and so on.
