My nest camera has worked without problem for years.  I understand the appeal of the low price and visual quality, but there are trade-offs.  This camera is not ready for prime time.  Going back.
title: Not ready for prime time:  Worked fine 1st day, then offline, after reconnection, was unprogrammable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mati
content: Purchased three as nanny-cams for elderly parents. Well-pleased with quality and simple set-up. The app works well on iPads of three different generations and two iPhones of different generations. The app allows sharing to multiple users, so my sister and I can check in remotely.  The mic and speaker are less than stellar, but totally acceptable for the price point. Occasional lagging response to commands has occurred; likely attributable to weak wifi. Surprised how happy I was with this purchase/these products. Would buy again.
title: Solid choice.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Heather Alli
content: I purchased this camera to play around with, but to my surprise it is a decent camera.  I use it to keep an eye on the dogs when I'm not home.  I have also caught my teenager trying to sneak out.  It is very simple to set up and you get free cloud storage for motion events.  I highly recommend using a micro SD card to save constant video.  The motion events only record 12 seconds at a time, so it's important to be able to review the rest of the video when you receive a motion event alert.
title: Simple and effective.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KimJean13
content: In theory, I love this camera.  I love the fact that you can turn it and see other areas of your room, the picture quality is great, the sound is great... However, after having a YI camera for a couple of years where I could look back at the day and the hours I wasn't staring at the screen, I begin to wonder why I couldn't do that with the Wyze camera?  After some research, I realized I needed a MicroSD card.  No prob.  Got one of those.  Tried and tried and tried and it didn't work.  More research told me I needed to format it in a computer or something to get it to work.  What?!?!  I don't even know what that means!  So I shelled out the $15 to get the Wyze specific MicroSD card and my camera STILL won't recognize it!  IT'S YOUR BRAND SD CARD!!! What is the point of having a camera if I can't go back and look at what happened during the day?  The 12 second clips it does record are practically useless so I would like to see the whole day.  If this MicroSD card is the only way to do that then I'm going to have to give up on this camera and purchase a few more YI's to have in other locations to cover the entire room.  This shouldn't be this hard!!  I've reached out to Wyze and have yet to get a response!
title: This Shouldn't be this Hard!!!  MicroSD card is a hassle!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Greg
content: This camera is amazingly simple to set up. All you do is download the app, plug in the camera, select the wifi network you would like the camera on, and then hold your phone screen in-front of the camera for it to read the QR code to sync up. Took maybe 2 minutes. Setup after that is fun. You can choose if you would like it to auto pan vs stay stationary. Both of those options also have the ability to track movement. I was surprised to see that the movement tracking also works in pan mode where if the camera senses movement it will break from its panning to follow the motion, then returns to the panning after 15 seconds. You can also choose the spots you would like the camera to pan to and from (up to 4).  Sound quality is pretty bad but it is understandable if you talk to someone through it. The most frustrating part of my camera is that when the sun set and the night-vision went on I got a weird white defect in my picture (see attached photo). Which ended up being from IR reflection off the case I had it in incase you run into the same issue. I will continue to update this review over time to comment on how the camera holds up over time in pan mode.
title: Issue with nightvision, easy to set up, amazing features

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: S.H.H. Nosenbook
content: It came in quickly and well packaged. I was able to configure it and get it up and running with no problems. It was user friendly. This is from someone who has already gone through 2 different sets of cameras and not been able to figure out how to use them or set them up (or they didn't work?). We had to send them back. So for this to be a good out-of-box experience says a lot. I'm very happy with the picture/video quality. The only complaint is that there are a few seconds lag time between the camera and Alexa and the audio. As this is my first camera, I don't know if that is normal.  But, for the price, I'm very happy! UPDATE: No push alerts and this seems to be a long time problem according to other users.
title: Great picture quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anthony & Michelle Colberg
content: There are so many home cameras out there when doing research I couldn't decide so I asked my friend of mine that does automated home security systems and he recommended this camera to me.  You would think the most expensive are the best but I am here to tell you that is not true!  They may be good, but for the price of this camera, you can't lose. The sound is good, not great, just good, because it isn't very loud, but I can still interact with my dogs and listen in on them.  I can hear them clearly, my voice doesn't seem to come across loud and clear to them. It is attractive enough that it looks good sitting out. (see pic) This camera rotates 360 degrees. And it is super duper easy to install. If you are interested in a home camera for watching your babies or your fur-babies this is the one!!!! If you don't like it at least you aren't out a lot of money, BUT you will like this camera.
title: Awesome camera for quality and price!!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brandon
content: Setup is super easy, the app is great! Being able to view multiple cameras live is awesome for our kids rooms. The viewing field is very wide - we see much more of the rooms vs our old cameras. The only con I have right now is that the audio pickup is pretty bad. It come through very intermittently. You get a second of audio and nothing and it just goes that way. Perhaps standing closer would help but if being able to hear the far side clearly is important for you then you may want to look elsewhere.
title: Good but not perfect...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marc K Marsceill
content: Very easy to use which is what I was looking for. I didn't need anything super high tech or complicated. The app on the phone works well and didn't take me long to figure out how to set it up. I watched the video and I was able to figure it out myself, I don't consider myself a super techy person. It's no frills and that's fine for what I needed this for. The only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because it constantly spins around, even when I have it on no motion detector setting. I'm not sure how to fix that. This is just a bit annoying as it makes a noise as it keeps spinning. When I turn on the app to view the camera, I always have to spin the camera around first. Just a slight annoyance that it doesn't just stay put to where it should be. Overall for the price you can't beat it. I like that you can have the sound and take photos as well. I haven't tried using the voice option yet.
title: Easy to use

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MurrDog
content: For the price the cam is a good buy - BUT there is a serious design flaw that Wyze can NOT or will NOT address.  Whenever the cam detects motion it will Jerk left or right to center the detection, over shooting and making the detected thing no longer in the frame.  So you will have a video of nothing.  This JERKY movement is all over the Wyze forums with only the reply from Wyze that it is being looked into (over a year with zero fixes).  If you buy this Pan cam you will be wasting your time & money - a bad product with zero support.
title: Do NOT Buy - Serious Design Flaw

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: caerus
content: After months of fiddling with settings and placement, no matter what I do it constantly turns around and stares at the wall. I've set detection settings, zones, tried to lock it in place, and it continues to look at the wall. It misses about 75% of the times I walk in front of it due to this, which is making it useless as a security camera.
title: Camera will not stop staring at the wall

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JM
content: After researching I chose to go with the wyze cam pan. I was very happy with it. But something happened after I had it off for a week I couldn’t get it up and running no matter what I did. I contacted support here on amazon after they tried everything they got a wyze support person on the line. This person went through all the trouble shooting with me. Then decided that I needed a new unit. She never made me feel like I did anything to cause the problem. She explained the next steps very well. This all happened yesterday. And today my new camera is on its way to me. With another 12 months warranty. This camera was the least expensive I saw. Both my kids have the more expensive brands. And mine is just as good if not better. The customer service was above and beyond anything I expected. Thank you amazon and wyze for all your help.
title: Best decision ever.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John B
content: Nice camera, purchased it after a friend suggested it and after trying another camera (Wansview) which was a piece of garbage and returned.  I use it mainly to watch my dog in my living room while I'm out and am very happy with this camera given the low price of it. The software works well, it was easy to set up and I have yet to have any connection issues with it.  The software is mostly intuitive and the only minor gripe I have is that it seems to take a fairly long time to connect to the camera, I'm not sure why the "authentication" step takes as long as it does, but i's a little annoying. Overall if you're looking for a good and inexpensive wifi cam this is a great option.
title: great little camera at a low price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KT
content: There are so many good features on the camera. The motion detection, night vision, and scanning with movement. Being able to watch playback is good too. Ability to watch from a computer would be great, but doesn't affect the usability of it. The only downside I've found so far is that when I manually record and save to my phone it says it's shareable, but never actually sends the clip. Doesn't matter how short or long the clip is. I'm not sure if this is a software issue, or my phone, but it doesn't work on my husband's phone either. That issue aside, it functions like it's supposed to and has pretty decent quality recording.
title: Works well

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Val
content: There is a zone settings in the camera yet the camera reacts like it is scared out of its mind. When detecting a motion the camera goes out side the zone setting that was set for a reason, like there is a wall there so do not go there. The camera has a AI mind of it's own and goes into the wall. So why have the motion tracking? When courtesy information sent to the manufacturer they respond as if I had asked them for a response to flip the issue back on the user. Not a good business model to work too.  They since have continued to send customer advice how I should solve the problem that is in their programming parameters.  They treat the customer like a ignorant door stop.  Personally I could care less about their resolution of this problem one way or another. I do however find that the contact back over this issue was insulting to the customers and user intelligence. I can turn off some of the tracking settings and resolve the jumping out of the zone issue but why does the camera not say in zone parameter setting is a programming issue. I have used and had different products from different makes and models I did not how ever get a chip on the shoulders attitude from any of the other customer service representatives like Wyze does. The camera's are cheap enough if I am totally dissatisfied with the camera I would just trash them rather than in good faith try to help the company and alert to a problem with their system.  I remember reading another individual's reviews that he too was a programmer and attempted to do a courtesy feedback to get the very same type of attitude and treatment. If you are a beginner in security camera use and installation than they will be no doubt helpful to your needs. Their product is nothing to write home about.
title: Arogant customer service in Responce to programming issues.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Keylin
content: It's done a good job, we have activated the notifications and it can get a little overwhelming because at night it detects even light change so whenever a car passes by with lights ON it detects that as a motion. The camera itself is not very good looking, it is bulky and I have it installed right above my front door, but as it performs very good I try to ignore the fact that I don't like how it looks there. I do recommend it.
title: Nice

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ak85
content: From the price, being user friendly, and the quality of performance, this camera has it all! The night vision is so much clearer than any high dollar system I've tried yet. The motion detection and tracking is accurate and customizable. The motion of the camera is quiet and discreet. The pan is broad and leaves barely any blind spots. We bought this as a baby monitor and after it's no longer needed for a baby monitor it's going to be a fantastic home security cam. I plan on getting other products from this company as I am super pleased. If it wasnt for Claire Crosby being on Ellen  I would never have learned her dad, Dave, had helped develop this! Love Wyze and love the Crosby's! Thank you for such an amazing product we can all afford! Also I might add, my hubby loves being able to check on his little girl while at work.
title: All you will ever need! Baby Monitor and home security!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: robolaw
content: Wish I would have just bought two more Wyze Cams. I've installed this camera under an eave above a door and tried to set it to scan my yard from side to side, and lock on to moving people or animals, but it seldom catches anyone or anything, it has never followed anything moving in the yard. I often find it looking at the house behind it, or locked on to leaves in the wind, or traffic about 100 yards away. I have contacted Wyze Cam, but their suggestions have not helped. I had high hopes after buying three of their v2's.
title: Looks at the house.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ed C.
content: Great cam in all aspect but when trying to connect with Google Assistant as advertised, it claimed it wasn't ready yet.  I could not view it on Alexa as well, but I didn't spend enough time to actually get it to show up on my Echo Show as I do easily with my Ring.  I added the skill in Alexa but it was unreachable.  This is a good stand alone system tethered to their app and their app only.  Although it supports RTSP with their beta firmware, I could have best of both worlds with their human detection AND rtsp access.
title: Excellent cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: d-sign
content: I did a lot of research before purchasing this home camera and I'm relatively confident you can't find one as feature rich at this price point. I wanted a home security camera that I did not have to pay a monthly fee for that offered things like detections zones, motion detection, pan and scan, motion tracking, night mode, with a good app and support and this camera has it all and more. It offers features that only the higher end cameras offer with subscription based services. It takes about a minute to set up and I have had no issues with the cameras for over a year. If you're looking for the best "budget" camera the packs in the most premium features, look no further.
title: Best Camera for the Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tim
content: Do your self a favor and don’t buy this pan camera.  The wyze cams are decent for the money. This pan cam however isn’t worth the extra money.  The main problem I have with this camera is it keeps moving to a position that just looks at a wall no matter what I do. I’m to the point of building a box around it so it doesn’t have the option of moving.  When it does happen to capture movement it tends to pan away from the movement to where you can’t see what’s going on anyways
title: Pan sounds cool but it’s not at all

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JKK
content: Installed as a nursery monitor. Easily booted and connected to ap. Picture quality is very good as is sound quality. It paired with Alexis without any problems. The motion detector works great. This is a really good product. You can control the camera movement from your ap on screen as well as view, listen and speak via the ap. There was very little time lapse, if at all noticed. Only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is the the movement of the lense buzzes some anytime it’s moved. It really should have no sound when moving.
title: Bit Noisy but good product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Beth
content: Love this camera and the company. One of the 2 I got the sound didnt work they were very nice and friendly and got me a new one sent out asap..... both work great and the picture and sound is so clean
title: Great nanny cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mohamed
content: Great cam quality. very nice design. the app looks good too.........BUT 1. The company customer service is non-existent. I was kept on hold for 21 minutes listening to annoying music, then simply told via recording to call back. 2. The reason I called was the app bugs.: A. The motion detection does not work. only noise detection works. B. When noise is detected, it records only 12 seconds after the noise is gone. for example, I can get into the room, make noise, leave the room, it starts to record 12 seconds of an empty room!!!!  delayed recording!!!! why? and no option to change the duration of the recording. A BIG DISAPPOINTMENT. i WILL RETURN.
title: disappointed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bay Sailor
content: When I was home powering off then on corrected my 4 cameras error code 90. Now I'm away for 5 months 1150 miles away from home and I get the same messages on all 4 cameras. I paid to keep my internet active so I could view the cameras. That was a waste of money. At least the Ring door camera works. Sorry I recommended them to friends.
title: 1150 Miles Away

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Breanna Smith
content: I bought 2 of the Wyze Pan Cam, one for my daughters room and one for our living area, due to the fact that shes Autistic and we need to be able to keep an eye on her at all times. I had them less than 3 weeks and one started to malfunction. It would randomly do this LOUD buzzing like the motor was jammed!! I immediately contacted customer service and they walked me through the trouble shooting (which did absolutely nothing) and ultimately sent me a replacement. I got that one set up as soon as it arrived. Less than a week later, the BRAND NEW unit started doing the exact same thing. It was random so I just dealt with it. The major issue came when the one in my daughters room started doing the EXACT SAME BUZZING. It happened in the middle of the night and absolutely traumatized my child. She is scared to death of her room and going to bed because shes scared it will make the noise again. At that point, I was done with the cameras, I just wanted my money back seeing as Ive had them LESS THAN 2 MONTH total!! I contacted Wyze yet again and told them what was happening, where the tech, Neil, told me that because they had already replaced on of them, and the fact that it has scared my Autistic child, he was going to forward my ticket to upper management and someone would contact me ASAP.....that was 3 days ago and I haven't heard a word from them. So in the meantime, I ordered the Wyze V2 cameras (2 of them) because I needed cameras and trusted the reviews. The V2 is stationary so I wouldn't have to worry about the motors failing like with the Pan cams. They shipped quick and I had them the next day. Immediately set them up and got them going. Here's where it just gets stupid....2 cameras, ordered the exact same day, set up immediately and ONE DOESN'T WORK! It would keep signal for all of 5 seconds then totally drop signal and wouldn't reconnect. I did a factory reset, reset my router, everything customer service said to do! NOTHING WORKED! I put in for a return less than 6 hours after receiving them. I'm done with this company and their joke of a product! I now have to deal with trying to get my special needs child to feel safe in her own bed again! UPDATE 4/20/2020: My support ticket never got sent to upper management! They are refusing to do ANYTHING other than replace the cameras AGAIN! I dont want replacements. I want the issue corrected especially after their first replacement failed the first day! Screw this company and its products.
title: NEVER AGAIN

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Krishna
content: Bought this camera for another baby monitor. I fell in love with this camera. It works so much better than my $100 baby camera. The sound is so much better and I can actually position it so I can actually SEE MY BABY !! LOL. I love that when I goto the grocery store and my dad watches the baby I can see everything that is going home and I know if its time to head home if he gets fussy. I can talk to my baby or my dad through the camera too. I bought it thinking its only 30 bucks so if its crap I'll take the loss. I can't get over how crappy the other camera was that I bought compared to this one. I wish I would have gotten this one first. Also if you have an Alexa device one with a screen or even a fire stick you can watch your baby on there. I have seen the posts about privacy but from what I see there is nothing to worry about. Also the cord on my other camera broke after a month and my dad had to cut another cord a rewire it due to not being able to charge the monitor. Well with this camera if the charger breaks its just a universal micro charger!! Couldn't ask for anything better. The only thing I can say I wish it had was a thermometer.
title: Absolutely the best camera I've ever had! Works so much better than my baby monitor.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JD
content: I know two people who absolutely love these Wyze cameras and the price is great so I purchased a couple. However for me the experience has been subpar. I found the setup to be confusing and I'm having intermittent SD card problems with one camera while the other camera won't recognize the SD card at all. The notifications aren't working for me either. I'm honestly to lazy to return them. They still work as far as being able to monitor your area just no "video evidence" being recorded. I'm sure it's normally a great product. It seems I got a bum pair or I'm not smart enough to work these
title: Honestly Disappointed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: L. Ficks
content: I love this camera. It works well for my baby monitor with a nice clear picture and even pretty clear when zoomed in.  Great night vision. The problem is the initial setup and connecting new devices.  It kept giving us an error that the limited instructions did not tell even bring up as a possibility.  We kept trying and trying the same small sequence we could and magically it connected.  Now we're having the same problem trying to connect a new phone to it.... We've also encountered some problems with the app being able to turn the camera on and off.  Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't.  Since it's not consistent, we've resorted to just leaving the camera always on so that I don't have to worry about my phone not being able to turn it on.
title: Works great if you can get it connected

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jon
content: I've had this camera for a while but a major problem I see is that it misses some motion either because it doesn't have a strong connection to the wi-fi or it has bad software. I'm not sure. Another major issue is that it doesn't notify you if disconnected so someone could potentially disconnect the camera and you would never know. The night vision works okay but if objects are near you won't be able to see off into the distance very well beyond 15-20 feet. One plus is that the the picture quality is pretty good at 1080p.
title: Works but has issues

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Hanging in there
content: This is our third Wyze Cam Pan and it continues to exceed expectations.  Set-up is super simple, the camera does everything it promises to do: excellent picture quality, easy pan, easy zoom and on top of it all - unbelievable customer service from Wyze.  We had a problem with the SD slot, I contacted customer service online, the response was surprisingly quick (no "forever hold" for a representative) and the person I dealt with was polite, professional and could not have been more pleasant and helpful in resolving the issue. We use one of these as a "doggie cam", one at a front window for front door security and now this third one will face the back yard.  I don't think you can beat the Wyze Cam Pan for what it does for the price.  Highly recommend!
title: Excellent product, terrific value for the money, superb customer service!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: NikNak
content: At first it was good. As I used it more often as my primary camera, it would only function in static mode, meaning any attempt to add Pan or Motion Track or Motion Tag would result in camera hung facing the wrong way. Again, without these features, the camera is fine. I did contact support but their replies are pretty much replace cable and adapter and SD card, then once all that is done... give them call/email back. And of course that’s followed by a “how did we do” support message.  Sigh.
title: Too many issues with Pan and Tag features.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RR
content: It didn't keep up with its little twin, which I ordered together on Jan 31, 2019. Mysteriously quit working with no connectivity with my iPhone. After multiple tries with different iPhones, still no luck!  Just have it 20 days, it has since passed the returning deadline. Unhappy with the particular product and Amazon's returning policy on this item (only).
title: Quit working in 20 days! No Connectivity!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MrShade
content: Seemed to set-up easily and update the firmware. Picture a bit small but HD is nice. I have only used a week and find while gone it does pick up noise and movement as advertised. Pan movement works with a slight delay but all in all does as advertised. Only had a week or so and armed it only 3 times. I will continue to post updates after learning more over time. I lso have Logitech 2 920 Pro units set for motin detection upon leaving. WAZE seems a bit simpler to arm and less time.
title: Feels quality built

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christina S
content: I had high hopes for this camera, but alas ended up returning it. The price is hard to beat. Especially when you compare it to some other big name brand cameras. The camera was fast and easy to install. And I loved the pan and tilt feature. Why don't ALL home cameras have this? I chose to return the camera because of the extremely slow app and poor camera quality. The app took several minutes to load and the tilt/pan lag resulted in me missing the moments. The camera promises 1080p quality, however it was very grainy and pixelated, and colors were highly saturated. Camera is also very noisy when rotating.
title: Cheap - and it shows

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jt
content: I've had this Camera for 6 months now and have been absolutely pleased with it. This camera has all of the features you could want without all the price markup you get from other manufactures like Nest. The phone app is functional and I have not complaints, the motion detection and night vision both work as expected. You also get temporary cloud storage at no cost! These are great cameras and easy to use.  Edit: The one negative I have is the response time between command the camera to change position on the app and the amount of time it takes for the camera to respond
title: Best Deal Around!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RVC Consumer Ted
content: This camera offers features that only much moe expensive units provide. It tilts and pans and stores video. It has HD and night vision. The unit does all it says it does and does not go down. I now have three and at these prices I can afford to have some just for fun.... like watching the bird feeder. Tech support was VERY slow in getting back to me... indeed I am still waiting 13 days later. BUT I solved the issue myself in the meantime. With internal chip there is no need for expensive monthly monitoring service. That alon sold me. But the crisp HD video, clear audio and ability to change the shots make this a winner.
title: Works PERFECTLY!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: gracedone
content: This product seems great at the price but you count the hours of trying to reconnect camera to wifi its worthless.  Had this camera working then new firmware broke it and since then it only works with reboot & new setup and then only intermittently.  Had many tech support correspondences with company and told to reboot which maybe fixes for short time.  Very unstable product. Update 7/31/2018, Something has been changed in software and product connects now on regular basis.  You sometimes have to close down app and open again to get connected.
title: Connection issues but seems ok now

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Laura
content: The absolute best camera to use for watching your pets. I love the night vision so I can check up on them when I’m away or working at night. It has great range of motion and is one of the best priced products on the market currently. I have used it for some security as the camera has motion detection. The app often needs updating and it does disconnect from the Internet sometimes but I still love it and always will recommend it. You can even talk to your pets or listen in
title: Best product for the job

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jack D. Diem
content: This is not your typical camera, this one not only tilts up and down but can pan aall the way around.  You can even zoom (with app).  The video is high quality and responds well to commands from the App.  The only drawback I have is that the motion detection picks up the bushes blowing in the wind and the night vision light reflects off the window where I have the camera placed.  That's my problem, not a problem with the camera.  This camera exceeds my expectations and comes highly recommended.
title: Works way better than expected

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cherie
content: I cannot say enough about how happy I was to find the Wyze Cam line of products. The quality is far better than I expected for a camera that costs WAY below the cost of its competitors. I haven't been this excited about a tech company in ages! Great product. Reliable, easy to set up, versatile. Great app for remotely controlling the cameras. Just fantastic!
title: Amazing value and quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: LUISPHOTO
content: I'm blown away by the quality of this $30 camera, I gave it a shot and don't regret, it actually beats my Arlo's it has better quality and connects a lot faster than one of my Arlo Q's that cost me 4-5 times more! I'm ordering more. The only one issue I did find, or maybe not an issue, I just didn't like that when you have it on motion tracking it just keeps moving constantly and doesn't focus in one. Anyway it costs $30 bucks! So I can buy more!
title: Beats my Arlo's

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BellaTracy
content: Absolutely loving this camera!! We were gone on holiday to Maui and were able to get alerts and see at all times. Very impressed and have been recommending to others. Considering purchasing for my salon and more inside our home! Don’t let the price fool you. We have The Ring throughout our home and purchased this for the inside of our garage as we have large fish tanks we need to keep an eye on since we have coral and exotic fish. I have no issues with this camera and can view the entire garage, move it around and communicate with it when we have someone taking care of our tanks while gone.
title: This is a winner!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sandra Tran
content: Overall good budget camera with loaded of features (normally found in more expensive cameras). However, the quality control need to be improved. I had to exchange 3 camera and all 3 having issues. 1-All 3 having vary bad night vision. You won't see anything more than 3 feet away. I did troubleshoot and verified the the IR led are on but very weak. 2-One out of the three has a bad picture quality. Its white background is having a red tint all over it 3-But here is the very bad issue that happened on all 3 of them, they lost the SD card after about 24hrs/48hrs.  The playback will suddenly show "no videos at the selected time" and need to restart the cam to recognize the SD cards again but it will wipe out all videos. I was using Samsung micro SD 32GB, changing to different cards did not help. I finally bought a Wyze sd card thinking it will be more compatible, but still same issue. I called support, they had me flash the FW to an older 2017 FW and upgrade again but did not help. They finally told me to return the cam and buy another one! I actually love this feature rich camera, but I was so disappointed quality control especially the SD and playback issue, so I took off one star for the Night vision/ red tint picture quality and another star for the SD card/playback issue. So the final rating of three stars would be fair!
title: Good budget camera with good features but need quality control

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: grand of four
content: We have used this to monitor a sick pet from work.  It gave such peace of mind. It has been used to monitor a husband sick from Covid. We so appreciate being able to rely on alerts to our phone to inform us of what is happening in our house.  We are very pleased with this cam.
title: Alerts with motion

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: js0
content: Very good DIY solution for home security & awareness. Installation was very well guided and instructions were extremely user-friendly. With a solid WiFi connection, this is a fantastic alternative to anything requiring a monthly payment in any way App has an impressive amount of features and personalisation for notifications is top-notch in my experience with camera settings. Video quality could be a little better since seeing licence plates for vehicles on the street (30-50ft away) isn't really possible, but I understand that higher resolution would probably increase the price considerably. Would also be nice to be able to set multiple detection zones since the tree that dominates its field of vision can often trigger false alerts when the wind picks up a bit
title: Solid DIY solution, nice not to pay for service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: impieisland
content: Really wanted to give this startup a chance but, I've been dealing with their products for about a year now and I shouldn't be "dealing" with them. Summary of issues: Constant updates, often working worse than previous for me Phone customer service takes very long Email customer service no longer responds to me They were hacked and I got the notification after I found out from the news The had me revert firmware multiple times because newer ones wouldn't work Current update made turned it into just a recording device It seems the infra red relies on reflective surfaces because it doesn't do well outdoors. Detection is no longer working, let alone person detection.
title: "You get what you pay for" still stands

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: bubba
content: For the money this is the best camera on the market, it has a ton of operating features that more expensive cameras don't even have. I did add an extra IR light for my outside space And now night vision is fantastic, the built in IR lights work on my inside wyze cam pan  but it's not near as big of space, like I said awesome camera for under 40 dollars.
title: wyze cam pan best camera on the market under 40 dollars

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: G. L. Dobbins
content: This product has far exceeded my expectations. For the price, I feel it is a great choice. Some have dismissed it as not of the same quality as needed for a professional security system. That may be true, but a professional security camera isn't what I wanted or expected. What it does, it does quite well. Very well thought-out. It even includes a tripod mounting hole so it can be made stable on a high mount. The software works well, and very predictably. I use it to check on my pet while away from the house, and will also use it to check the house during vacations. For that use it is excellent. I am recommending this to everyone who wants something for those and similar purposes. My only request: If the tilt could go downward just a little bit further...
title: Great value, works well

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jennifer De La Rosa
content: We love these and now have 3. We have them pointed outside on 3 sides of the house. Great night picture and does great on notifications. They can be sensitive and pick up any wind movement. Down side they are not weather proof and have to be plugged in but we have them pointed through a window and work fabulous. There is no monthly storage fee to pay. Just link to your WiFi and download the app and it works great.love the pan feature when we are out of town we can pan inside and talk to the pets.
title: Great security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Karen
content: I was worried about the inexpensive camera working well.  We have evidence that someone has been on our property at night and we'd like to see who and what they're up to.  The camera is very easy to set up and the image is just great!  It has motion detection - which seems to work well; and person detection - which is only so-so.  But there is an AI feature and you can share when YOU see a person, so it can learn.  I have hopes that this can become a fantastic feature!  That said, it didn't seem to pick up several times when I walked in front of and even waved to the camera.  It was around this time that we discovered our power cord had gone bad.  Wyze admits issues with this on their support site and did not have any trouble whatsoever getting a replacement one for free.  Overall at this point, I think it is good value for the money and their customer service is fair and responsive!
title: good little camera for the cost

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amazon name
content: rotates, is programmable, great picture quality once you put in a memory chip easy to program from your phone, can modify camera angle from phone does NOT send you a bunch of notifications unless you want it to (can change settings) I initially thought the motion/sound detection was poor. Then, I changed the settings to increase sensitivity and now it works perfectly. It creates a little recording every time someone walks by and saves the clip. works great with this memory chip: SanDisk 32GB Ultra microSDXC UHS-I Memory Card can talk out of it for fun great value for the price! I see no need to buy a much more expensive camera given how well this product works.
title: as good as advertised

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: dmally
content: It was a little larger than I imagined it would be (2.5 inches square, stands 5 inches high).  It has a rotating base so that you can move it back and forth, and you can look up and down (called panning).  I love being able to check in on my pets while I am away.  The app is easy to set up and use which allows you to set up sound and motion notifications, you can talk through it, and more.  It wouldn't work using my 5G wi-fi connection.  That was easy to fix, I simply selected my non 5G wi-fi setting (which most, if not all, wi-fi routers have).  The picture quality is better then some reviews stated.  The only problem with the sound is the slight delay.  I highly recommend this camera.  :)
title: Love this camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: EngineNo9
content: Picture quality isn’t good. Definitely nowhere close to the quality of my Ring cameras. Night vision IR is basically useless unless in complete darkness. If there are any lights in the area you get a strange white-washed ghosting effect that prevents you from seeing anything. Oh and there’s the problem where it alerts me to the detection of a person and when I go to see the recording it’s staring at its own shadow looking directly at the side of my house. It’s $35. You get what you pay for.
title: Slightly less than mediocre. Thinks it’s shadow is a person.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C. Bishop
content: I wanted a new camera since my other wansview was THE WORST camera to start with. The picture is crystal clear. Very easy to set up and works amazing. I ended up buying 2 (one for living room and one for my bedroom) in my 1 bedroom apt. I bought them to check on my apt when I'm away from it and to make sure my cats were ok (I suffer from horrible separation anxiety from them) and it's been a life saver for my anxiety since I live alone and I'm always worried about my stuff and cats even tho I'm only away for a few hours at a time. Worth the money.
title: Hands down the best camera I've owned so far

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gbata111
content: Absolutely awful. Had a lot of potential but is seriously lacking in the software department. Boasts that it can have multiple way points but you cannot individually adjust the detection zone for each. You only get one and are forced to make it work. Motion detection is awful. Even a shadow from headlights in a window triggers it and it follows and fixates on them potentially missing other true motion alerts. It is set off by dogs no matter how small. Has detection sensitivity setting but it will not make a difference. Overall, great idea, but horrid execution. Product was clearly not ready to be released. The standard Wyze cam works sIGNIFICANTLY better than this one. This camera has a hard time recording events or true motion but will send you alerts every time a simple light enters its field of vision. You get what you pay for folks. That’s the hard truth.
title: TONS of Wasted potential, Great idea, poorly executed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christopher Majano
content: Great security cam that makes keeping things secure and safe as easy as 1, 2, 3. The camera is very aesthetically pleasing and easy to install. Took me less then ten minutes to finish the setup and make an account for remote viewing. The camera comes with wifi support, meaning it is always watching and the feed can be viewed from the app which is available for Android and apple phones. The camera can also can be controlled through the app allowing you to adjust the view and even zoom.
title: Great security for you and your family does not need to break the bank

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TucsonM
content: Good value, easy to use, good customer support (email in my case). Had some trouble with setup but that may have been on my end. Picture remarkably clear on phone. Would like to have remote access (need to be on wi-fi), but that's a more expensive unit and I don't need it. I just want to look out on the cameras from wherever I happen to be am at home, so this fits my needs. I've put two up, both outside, but back from exposure to rain. I set them to swivel among 4 horizontal positions and like the vertical adjustment I was able to make for each horizontal position. Night vision  works well within close range which makes sense. Have not looked into the motion detection.
title: Using this primarily for daytime; can't speak to motion detection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Curious Kash
content: I LOVE this camera. For me, its exactly what I need. I actually received this camera as a gift! and ended up rebuy a 2nd one for my living room. I have tried many camera to be able to check on my pets when I am gone, and always had issues with being able to view the footage with just the data on my phone. This one is perfect! The camera moves! so many different angles left, right, up, down. And you can hear your animals, and you can talk to them. And I have no issues with viewing it whenever I want with data and not wifi :) Thanks!
title: Love this camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: alicia
content: Ok look, if I can install this, ANYONE can. It’s legit plug it in and download an app on your phone. Adjust the settings on the app (like area to set for motion detection, sensitivity, etc). The quality of the video is awesome & the night vision works perfect. I got it to keep an eye on my teenager when I have to work late. I can also talk to her through it and vice verse. For the price, ease of use, and quality, you can’t beat this. PS This is not a fake or paid review.
title: Get it!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Beto
content: I bought this after all the positive reviews and price and glad I did. I have two pan cams (front/back yard) and they have worked great so far. It's pretty clear for 1080p/15 fps although the motion detection is a little glitchy. It gets distracted by street traffic and won't pan til the cars pass by at night due to headlights. I will be getting the fixed $25 camera just for the driveway and use the pan cam for front lawn/door. The software is great and easy to use with so many features. The notifications are quick and the alerted can be managed in the settings. You can also switch to live view at anytime.
title: Excellent $37 1080p camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stephanie T.
content: Night vision isn't perfect but it is for the price point. Same thing with the picture quality. They are super easy to set up and I rarely have any issues with them.  It caught someone hitting our car and then driving off. My only complaint is that it sometimes doesn't record when there is a person which is what I got it for. Thankfully I have an SD card in it so I have continuous recording. Going back through the recording can be tedious and time consuming because there is no fast forward/rewind. I have 2 of these cameras and would 100% recommend them and purchase more if we had the need for them.
title: Great value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: David Beard
content: I purchased two other stationary Wyze cams that work great. This Wyze Pan and Zoom Cam says it needs a firmware update but fails every time. the other two cams updated fine. Without the firmware update, this pan and zoom camera is pretty much useless. I know it's not an expensive camera, but from what I've been finding online, apparently this is an issue for a lot of these units. Very disappointing.
title: Will not install firmware update, will not capture motion or send notifications

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A. Singer
content: This was a nice product while it lasted, but the panning motors seized up after 6 months of little use and now it only rotates about 45 degrees instead of 360, making it a far less useful device.
title: Pan motors broke after 6 months. now it's basically a low-resolution webcam.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chad spurlock
content: It does not work. "File not found" after multiples tries at troubleshooting. As a still photo and video camera for the price it is okay. Resolution isn't great, but it gets the job done and the panning is nice. Big thing is NOT to but this for the time lapse feature which I was really looking forward to.
title: Do NOT buy it for the time lapse feature.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Maria Balata
content: I do not recommend this product. When it first came in it worked really well and we were very happy with the image quality and the ability to scan the room. The audio however is absolutely horrible we decided we could live with that drawback. Recently the camera started panning on its own and the lights are flashing blue and yellow indicating that it consistently is trying to reconnect. We tried to reinstall it several times and were unsuccessful in doing so until one day we noticed a burning smell coming from the power plug. It seems that the device overheated and burned from the inside. We considered taking photos but ultimately decided it was too late to try and return the product anyway. So disappointed.
title: Dangerous device overheated and doesn’t work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: tristan h
content: Updated Review: I live in UAE and bought 6 of these (2 pan and 4 regular), nice price and good shipping from Amazon.  Within 1 month 1xpan infrared not working so no good at night.  Amazon were awesome and replaced. 3 months later and now 1 pan (replacement) dead and 2 standard cams also dead...yellow light not flashing cannot factory reset - they're totally useless. Amazon returns no longer eligible.  Wyze contacted to discuss their warranty...their response, not offering warranty outside of USA!!! Conclusion - great products, great price, 50% survival rate and awful customer service. ********************************************************************** Original Review: Superb quality and affordable price.  Simple setup.  Can work using their app and see home from anywhere I have internet connection. Missing things like web access, LAN, waterproof option, outdoors option (needs stronger IR). Thumbs up.
title: review updated, stars reduced from 5 to 2 due to 50% of the cameras dying on me

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dan M.
content: I've owned my Wyze Cam Pan camera for a few weeks now. The picture quality, responsiveness and features are all fantastic- especially when talking about a $30 camera. However, I have had to quit setting the way points because it woulds slightly shift the way points throughout the day- next thing you know it's just looking at top part of a wall. Same thing happens if I set it on motion tracking- the camera will follow my dog until it lays down and instead of going back to a way point, it will eventually make it's way to the top of a wall.
title: Great Affordable Camera, but has it's issues.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Guy Chemla
content: One should read the reviews of the wyse app before deciding wether to buy or not. There are quite a lot of one star. I had all king of problem: from 'sory wyze has stopped' followed by obligation to reboot the phone to completely erratic motor pan spin through led not lighting. I decided to stop wasting time with this cam. In short, its a bit expensive for a dummy camera but i could not use it as real one. Also, if it happens to work, as is it's not suitable for surveillance unless you pay a subscription - for each and every camera otherwise *only part* of the events will be recorded on their cloud. One reply I had from their support (by Weldrick ): "However, as they say, there is no such technology that is perfect and we expect things like this to happen but should not be frequently."  so if they expect their cam to fail at times one should not expect any better :) An important point - If you do decide to buy this cam (or other wyze products(?)  I recommend that you test it thoroughly right away as they'll only accept returns within 30 days
title: Unreliable, many complaints, rather plug & pray

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gary Smith
content: Love these.  I put one in every room of my house that did not have someone staying in it.  for the purpose of knowing what is going on, and for listening in on buys of the house.  Yea that's right, I knew what they were willing to do and what they thought.  It gave me an in site to what was going on and what i needed to do, if anything.  Worked very well, has zoom, two way speakers and it can be moved up, down and side to side from your phone.  records to SD card and your phone.
title: indoor camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael &Tulay C
content: I want to say Thank you for the people that answered my questions on this camera . I received the Wyze pan camera and took it out of the beautiful packaging and started my install. It is so easy , it made my head spin. During the install it updated the system and I proceeded to install. The whole process took less than 10 minutes (no kidding). I paged through the operation menu that is really self explanatory and not confusing. After playing with the camera for a bit, I went to the Alexa app and set the camera up to Alexa.. easy too. Then tested on the show.. Works perfectly..I dont think you can go wrong on this well engineered camera.
title: This Camera is the easiest I have ever installed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wendy541
content: I have this in my chicken run and wouldn't be without it! I love that it records any movement along the fenceline at night. Plus zoom in to see/identify any wildlife after my chickens!! I can keep an eye on the entire run and chickens during the  day from anywhere I have Wi-Fi on my phone. Compatible with Alexa Echo in my bedroom for the last check before I go to sleep. I have several of these around the farmyard and I had a problem with one: tech was amazing and after doing checks decided to send me a new one... Fast! Shame it won't download my video. It's crystal clear and shows it panning the run.
title: Great camera. Highly recommend for outdoors providing you buy weatherproof cover.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sunshine4
content: As many others stated, this camera is good for checking on your baby or puppy and maybe seeing who came to your door but unless you watch it live, you have no clue what happened.  I wish I would've paid attention to those details because it does no good to get a detection that a car pulled in the drive and stops almost as soon as the person gets out of the car. I see them for 12 seconds and unless they stick around for over 5 minutes I have no idea what they did or who they were in most cases.  Definitely *not* a good security camera! I sure wish Wyze could somehow make these options available for current camera owners.
title: Agree, not a security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Aryan Dami
content: Its superb and worth every penny spent, so long price stays the same. Its a cheap alternative to costly products and service options yet does not compromise as it delivers excellent video quality in both day and night vision, along with audio and motion sensing + motion detection. What I truly dislike and not happy is on the notification I received this week about their partner who provides AI services for the product, that  xnor.ai is will no longer support  as they are withdrawing AI features on Wyze cam. Wyze claims they are developing their own AI and should be able to introduce it in Jan 2020. I would treat that as bad, cause I purchased this product based on its claim on features (incl AI) and xnor is noteworthy on this front. A consumer buys a product based on its claim in honesty. These sort of things happen and are common in today's technology driven World, but when its being sold in volumes, why wouldn't a company make a conscious effort to deliver what it assures consumers? Have to wait and see how Wyze's own AI on face recognition or object detection pans out.
title: Great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M. Seebeck
content: Bought the package with 2 stationary cameras and one panning/tilting camera.  Wanted to get cameras to work with my Ring doorbell.  These are much more affordable than the Ring cameras.  No internal battery.  They must be connected to power supply via USB and require a memory card in each to store video.  Very nice and flexible design.  The stationary cameras have a magnet in the base so they can cling to metal surfaces.  Also come with sticky pads and metal discs to use in various mounting situations.  Great high quality picture.
title: Great picture and value.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Scott
content: Great price, all functions that are included have worked flawlessly. Easy to install, configure, and adjust to your individual needs. If you lose power or WI-FI the cameras automatically re-connect with no annoying glitchy issues. I also purchased the Wyse V2 cameras and they also work flawlessly. Hooked up, configured, and "running" in less than an hour for 4 cameras. They do require AC power but that was not an issue for my configuration. App is easy to use and very intuitive. That's a plus!! No charges for any storage, unlike more expensive cameras that charge you cloud storage fees. Really nice all around quality system! Would recommend without hesitation!!
title: How much? What a price for a great security camera!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jenos
content: Item works great itself BUT BUYER BEWARE that if you place this camera in the garage AND you have an older garage door opener ( might even happen with a new garage door opener—- I cannot attest), it might activate your garage door opener if you set it to track motion. I have a double door garage with two (2) completely different openers from different manufacturers and it activated both openers at the same time. This seems to only occur when the camera repositions itself back to center after not detecting motion for a couple of minutes. It happened multiple times and have video proof. Not good when you have a new puppy you are trying to train and the door opens! I installed a kill switch ( the kind you use to turn on/off your Christmas lights with a remote) .... And took it off track motion to make sure my doors don’t open again unintentionally.
title: Watch your garage door openers!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Aphrodite
content: No instruction packet - I guess that only goes to the people who WYZE send a free camera to. (refer to the YouTube videos) Even though I am not I.T. - logic/common sense makes this easy to set up. I had sent several messages to WYZE.COM on an eBay listing for this and the original WYZE camera and whoever it was who replied, was respectful and honest and THE reason why I actually purchased their camera. The only reason I purchased it on Amazon was because I would get it a week quicker than eBay.  Received 3/8/2019 My reason for purchasing a security camera is because the downstairs neighbors have had gunfights in and outside of their apartment, and this camera is an extra set of eyes to protect my car. I am not using the night vision (Infrared) lights because of the reflection from my window but so far so good. 03/15/2019 i thought WYZE customer service was good - but now that i purchased this P.Z.T. cam, they have not responded to my after purchase message. do not expect much from them - they do not care about you once they get your money. sadly, i will keep this camera but only because i do not want to deal with WYZE to return it - and i did change the rating from four to two stars, because of WYZE customer service. if they respond to my message, i will edit this review - again 05/10/2020 this one was the first wyze ptz i purchased - turned out to be pretty great. BUYER BEWARE mid April 2020 i purchased my second wyze ptz - absolutely sucks. it will not stay one - it resets and pans several times an hour. i have deleted, and restarted it many, many times.  i have tried to email wyze support with no avail. i am not happy that it will not stay on - and record any events - except one - of me trying to restart it.  just so disappointed in wyze. i should have never purchased the second one. BUYER BEWARE
title: WYZE P.T.Z. Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Miller
content: Have alot of the futures my $300 security cameras have such as Piper. Good picture Easy ability to set rules Person and motion Loud sound detection Cloud storage And free cloud storage Live feed Two way audio Where it lacks No temp monitor (might increase price) Only records 12 second clips unless you pay a monthly fee. What it does better Can set rules to turn off the camera when not in use For the price it's well worth it.
title: Great camera and even better price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tony
content: Easy setup with great video quality. Able to choose image quality based on cell coverage. Meaning areas where you have bad service, you can choose 360p quality so it doesn’t lag much. I disliked the sound it makes when panning the camera. It defeats the purpose of being discreet. Also the sound is terrible. It’s choppy and unclear at times. My Nest cam is much faster in connection and sounds a lot clearer but of course you get what you pay for. I just wanted an additional cam for coverage and I didn’t want to spend so much on a Nest. Wyze is decent for a new startup. Hope it will improve connectivity and sound. I haven’t tried other features yet.
title: Decent but could be better

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: HohMoh Erectis
content: Great product to monitor a room from literally anywhere in the world via the Wyze app. Will record from start of motion or sound detected. The only thing that didn't work: internal format by the unit of the Wyze-branded SD card I received as a freebie with purchase. After seeing numerous comments from others with the same problem, I did the format on my laptop, et voila, it worked! This is a great--and cheap-- way to start a home security system, but I'd like to see one of those front door cameras from them too. Will be adding more things to augment this soon. I love it!
title: Inexpensive, Versatile Way to Add Indoor Monitoring

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: HarpritSingh.us
content: Its a good product but with few shortcoming. Some way to zoom, The audio quality should be a bit louder. The picture quality needs to be more better. What the point of a camera when you cant see the face of the person clearly. Forget about night mode. If picture quality is better I would think of buying again. Otherwise, its a good toy at this price.
title: iTS OK. I need better picture quality.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jeffery
content: I had/have 5 Nest cameras and nothing bad to say about them as far as working really great.  However, Google has received my last payment for cloud recording.  Like $225 a year or close.  I tried one these little wonders about 3 years ago and now have 3 that pan and 3 regular cameras.  They work like a charm and NO $ for cloud storage.  Plus their app is very simple to use.  Most everyone has already covered how great a "value" they are so all I can really do is concur with the herd and recommend these cameras without hesitation.  Peace Out
title: Best "value" in a very crowded market...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Patrick
content: I’m surprised Wyze hasn’t taken over the world.  This is a great camera when not considering the cost, fantastic camera and value considering the cost.  It set up easy, works very consistently, and out performs nearly every camera on the market including the high-dollar baby monitors that cost nearly 10 times more (my specific chosen application).  I highly recommend this camera.
title: Money well spent.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R. Garlough
content: I bought two of these, only to discover that there was no way to connect them without a smartphone app. And then, after loading the smartphone app, I discovered that I needed an account. And then, I discovered that the terms require forced arbitration and loss of rights to my content. Did I mention that these cameras are in my house? Isn't it a bit eerie that the manufacturer demands sole rights to everything that goes on there? If you are looking for security cameras (how these are advertised), these are anything but. Maybe they work; maybe they don't, but after trying to set them up, I think I need a shower to clean off the slime.
title: Misleading description - beware

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Darkside
content: After buying the static cam and loving it I get this one.  This cam is just $13 more than the starting cam. This one can pan 360 degrees. So you can remotely turn the cam. App is intuitive and constantly improving.  App and features take some time to learn so you have to be a bit patient with learning the kinks of the software.  Online forum is really helpful.  This cam will follow motioning it's line if site.  I think it can be set to pan automatically but I haven't played with that feature yet.  This cam works well and has such a reasonable entry price
title: Great little cam and software

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lor
content: I read a number of the reviews for this camera and had no issues with network setup (Norton Core router).  I was prompted to update the firmware after initial setup and that went off without a hitch.  Initially, the video quality was poor and response time was terrible; after I closed the app and started it back up it was MUCH better so I think I needed a fresh connection after the firmware update.  I love how small and light this camera is, and the speed of response when I pan.  The wide view is also impressive, and the image quality may actually surpass my Nest Cam.  I bought a few 32GB microSD cards to record video locally and am still working on getting IFTTT integration set up, but for just shy of $40 you can't go wrong with this camera.
title: Small, speedy, quality image

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JLH
content: I purchased this camera so I could check in on my dogs while out of town. After tons of research, I landed on the Wyze Cam Pan due to the overwhelmingly positive reviews and price compared to cameras like Nest and Blink. The camera was packaged very well. It felt like the kind of touch a company would give to a premium product. The camera itself feels like it should cost a lot more than it did. Setup was incredibly easy as it only took about 3 minutes total. After setting up the camera and app, I was met with the option to use their cloud service to record a 7 day continuous loop, but I opted to use an SD card (not included) to avoid paying for cloud service. (2 week trial included for cloud service). I like the 2-way audio feature, having the ability to pester my dogs from miles away is awesome. The pan/tilt on the camera works great and offers a large viewing area. Motion tracking was a little laggy, but I suspect that is more of a software problem. Overall, I’m really happy with this purchase and I plan on adding a few more around the house.
title: Affordable with a premium feel, every feature you’d need in a home camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John Brandt
content: I have to say that this impressed me so much that its hard to believe that it works as well as it does.  Very simple to set up, just follow the directions through the app.  Once up and going its amazing how you can pan around and this is true panning not virtually using a very wide eye camera.  The motors seem to work pretty good and you can adjust just about everything for sensitivity.  You can even speak back and forth through it like a video chat, well on one side anyway.  You can set motion tracking, you can see event files and it has internal storage once you add in a micro sd.  Highly recommended.
title: Works so good you wont believe it
