product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: bishops wife
content: I have a two story house. My parent is downstairs and I can see her and hear her call. It’s been a great help during difficult times.
title: Sweet dreams with knowing I can check in on my elderly mom

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: William W. Weikel Jr.
content: Not a bad little indoor camera for home use. I wanted to put in in our bay window viewing front of the house but reflection when lights on in the house ruins the video, but lights out inside and I get a pretty decent picture. Still playing with a lot of it's  features, but this camera does a lot more than the average person may use. I use the SD card rather than cloud aspect and sti) trying to figure out notification settings. Overall I'd buy their product again.
title: Decent camera for the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Patrick Hester
content: The good: The camera quality is great. The convenience of having it is great. The price is great. The bad: The app and software driving the camera need some serious work. The motion zone does not work. When I set the camera up, everything looked great, worked great - until I turned on a ceiling fan. That sent the camera into a fit. It sent out notifications constantly and was moving back and forth on its base trying to track the fan. Went into the app and found the motion zone settings. Changed the zone to well under the ceiling fan. Nope. Camera continued to freak out and track the ceiling fan even though it wasn't within the motion zone. Tried many different configurations of that zone and no matter what, it always found and tracked the ceiling fan. At one point, it spun around and faced the wall and would not budge until I reset it. The scheduling options in the app also don't work well. I tried setting it to turn off notifications at 9 pm, and turn them back on again at 8 am. It gave an error that the on again time has to be after the off time. I flipped them. Same error. Can't get that to work at all, so I manually turn notifications off at night, and manually turn them back on again in the morning. If you aren't relying on motion zones or notifications, and don't have ceiling fans going, this is perfect for you.
title: Good camera with software/app that needs work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Art D
content: I have 6 of these, three in Costa Rica and three in Canada. Out of the six only two are still working. The other 4 were bricked by the wyze software upgrades at various times The latest upgrade bricked two the ones that were still working. When you contact support you are out through a series of routines that never fix the issue. That's not to mention random behavior issues where some of  the cams started jumping around and couldn't be controlled Totally unreliable product. Obviously wyze needs some better programmers
title: Unreliable product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kara
content: This camera is wonderful. Exactly what I need to check in on my teenage son while I'm not at home. He has Type 1 Diabetes and sometimes I just need to be able to get a visual of how he is doing sometimes. My husband's co-worker suggested it because he uses it to check in on his dogs during the day and loves it. No monthly subscription to deal with is a huge benefit to me. It was easy to set up and download app on my iPhone. Camera is a little noisy when panning, so I turned off the motion tracker so it doesn't make noise all the time. Still works great as I can still pan the camera if needed. Night vision is VERY clear. I am amazed at how much it picks up.  There is a bit of a delay when talking back and forth, but I think that may be do to my internet provider. We are leaving it plugged in, so I am not sure how the battery function works. Still nice to have that battery function option available if I want to use it at another time.
title: This camera is wonderful. Exactly what I need to check in on ...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ernesto Juan Sanchez
content: saw this on a tech news special.  I've been considering an indoor camera but didn't want to pay the outrageous price for a nest camera or other similar ones.  And it pans and zooms so that you can remotely see around the room.  I highly recommend this product.  It's inexpensive, easy to setup and works great.  The only thing some people might find irritating is the motor whiring when you pan and zoom.  But it isn't that bad.  I really love this camera
title: Well worth it, if you want a quality indoor surveillance camera for less

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rex
content: Motion detection seems not reliable. I have two of these cameras installed recently. I just got a chance to review the events recorded and realized some motions were definitely missed by comparing the events generated and the playback recorded on SD card. Motions in the exact same area were not being detected consistently. This makes this camera pretty useless as a security camera. I have two Wyze Cam. Not sure they have the same issue or not yet. Downgrade to one star...to confirm the problem I suspected, I tried walking in front of the camera today and the camera indeed could not detect the motion consistently.  Very disappointing... To be fair, this PTZ camera is very cheap for its hardware functionality (not sure about the durability since only have them for a few months). But for a good security camera, motion detection, which is done mostly in software I think, is upmost important. So if you need a PTZ camera for a critical application, look elsewhere.
title: Missing motion events

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CConti
content: Have an Amazon Cloud Cam, wanted something to pan a room to detect and record motion. This detects motion and sound and swivels to the source. Daylight images are clear and crisp. Night images with IR are useful. Event storage is 14 days online and can add an SD card for longer periods. Only feature request is to have the app on the phone automatically start / stop recording detection when the phone is on the same wi-fi as the camera. The Amazon cloud cam has this and it is a VERY useful benefit. This camera requires you to manually enable or disable recording.  Whirring noise as camera pans is quite distracting when reviewing video events.
title: Great Pictures. Stores events online free for 14 days.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amanda Schmitt
content: I bought 2 of these cameras after trying 2 other brands and returning them. These are great and were easy to install, which was my big issue with the other brands. Both cameras failed to connect on the first try, but each time I just rebooted the camera and then it connected with no problem. I also appreciate how response customer service is; while it's an email and not a phone contact, they did respond reasonably quickly to my inquiries. The only challenge I'm facing is that I use these as baby monitors, and there's a glitch in the app where if you want to leave the app open with the sound on, it will auto-shut itself in the middle of the night. Thankfully after many back-and-forths with customer service, one of their team eventually acknowledged that this was a known issue and pointed me to a forum where I learned the issue is with the sound. If you mute the camera/app, the picture will stay open all night long with no problem, so as long as I remember to do that before bed (when I can hear my babies without needing the app), it works fine for me. Overall I like these cameras and would buy them again.
title: Works great overall with one minor hitch if using as a baby monitor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: GRW
content: Updated 2020/09 I love this product but cannot recommend it anymore since there is a wired Blink alternative available. The Issue with Wyze is that it is suddenly losing connection, is unavailable or streaming on Alexa Show is just buffering. I sadly will remove all Wyze products by now. -------------------------------------------- I am using this as an ad-on for BLINK in order to get 24/7 life recording. The WYZE alarm is unreliable and there are too many false alerts due to missing PIR sensor. Unfortunately the cam is loosing internet connection far to often despite 97% signal strength (could be seen in the app). Pan functionality is working great as well as HD videos. For the security aspect I have BLINK cams installed wich are working highly reliable, are weather sealed, battery powered but lacking of life video. BLINK and WYZE combination is a perfect, affordable DYS Security System. Currently I am testing the WYZE Motion and Door Sensor which gives WYZE the missing PIR functionality. If this works the only remaining issue will be the unreliable internet connection. I connected WYZE, BLINK and others through IFTTT, this gives me a lot of more options with this setup.
title: Update: I love this product but cannot recommend it anymore

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Texas 2000
content: I purchased this camera for my garage and with enough light, the video quality is OK. Night vision is the problem: simply too dark! Also uploaded videos are simply too short and mostly useless. For instance the camera will records the opening of the garage door and before it is completely open, the video will end; no further video will be recorded making it impossible to know if some intruders made it into the garage or not. I have not found a way to change the video length; I assume there is no way to change it. I have not yet installed a memory card, not sure if this will allow longer recording time or not, but as of now, I can say videos uploaded to the cloud are of very limited use for what I bought it for.
title: Looks good for the price but usefulness is questionable...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A
content: I received order for the Wyze pan tilt cam. It came as expected. the pan functioned worked but the tilt up did not work and the tilt down only occasionally worked. contacted amazon and Wyze customer service. it was during the christmas and new years holidays. but Wyze customer service did not respond to my email for over a week. They had me do a motor calibration to try and resolve the issue. that didnt work. I sent them another email right away, but a week went by with no response. In mean time i contacted Amazon to return for a replacement. I received the replacement and the pan AND the tilt work as i expected. Today I received an email from Wyze offering to replace the defective unit. I am not happy with how long it took Wyze to respond back to me to help me resolve this issue. I am happy that Amazon did offer to replace the defective unit right away. Sadly, I could not be sure the unit was defective, since I was unfamiliar with this product. Waiting for Wyze to get back to me caused about 2 weeks of delay for me to be able to enjoy the product. I am now considering adding the service plan for this product as it seems the motors may be potentially volnerable to failures? I have the non motorized wyze cam for 6 plus months and loving it and loving the free 14 day cloud storage. I now have had the working wyze cam for about a week and it is still working great. I am considering getting 1 or 2 more wyze pan tilt cams and one or 2 more regular wyze cams. I am hoping they come up with a door peep hole attachement for the wyze cam. and perhaps a wyze door bell cam. :)
title: tilt not working. received replacement from amazon and it is working great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Fuzzy
content: I am amazed at how good this camera is. For the price and it's capabilities it is absolutely unbelievable. After I set it up and worked out the initial configuration kinks I have it all set up now for use and I am very happy with the results. The only issue I have is the short duration time of the activity alerts recording which. Activity alerts trigger the camera to record a brief 12 seconds video. Best part if you can keep 14 days of these alert videos online for 14 days FREE. However this is not an issue if you insert an SD card into the camera and keep recording all the time. A 32GB card holds about 2 days of HD and 7 days of SD resolution audio and video. Video and audio quality is excellent. Tracking and motion detection is great. You can set the sensitivity of motion detection to suit your conditions inside or outside or completely turn it off. Only thing I am afraid of is the motor giving out after too much movement back and forth tracking objects in it's field of view. I would recommend this camera in a heartbeat. Especially for people who are away from home and need to keep an eye on things while they are gone.
title: Does everything I needed from a security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sta Ima
content: I needed a camera for the outside of my house and these work great outside! I can see everything going on right on my iPhone. When someone rings my doorbell I don't have to answer to see who it is I just see who it is on my phone and I can use voice control to respond to them. The night vision is so crystal clear I can see everything going on outside my house even at night! I like how I can see who pulls up on my driveway due to the 360-degree panning feature. These are just convenient and make me feel even safer.
title: These make me feel safe

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DeMetria
content: I have purchased three of these and only one seem to stay online. I am constanly deleteing and having to add back only to delete and add again. I loved the price but thinking now that it is not worth the hassle, so I am going to go ahead and buy more of the Ring cameras, yes they are a little higher but they stay online all the time. I would love for someone to call or email me from the company to inform me on what I could be doing wrong, but as of now the only one that has not gone online is the one I have in my kitche with the bridge in it, which was the first one I bought.
title: Not good.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KS
content: Cameras require constant attention to resolve issues. Customer support is downright frustrating. If you're gonna go with Wyze, lower your expectations before you buy into this ecosysyem. I would not recommend person detection at all. 95%+ of vehicles that drive by are identified as a person. Cam pan consistently overshoots and cannot track motion.
title: Buyer Beware

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mr. Wonderful
content: This camera operates flawlessly and is so simple to install.  The phone app makes customizing settings (event recording times etc) very simple.  Also having the ability to use a micro-sd card and not having to pay a subscription is wonderful...This company hit a home run.  I will be ordering 3 more and purchasing the weatherproof case as well.  If Wyze is able to maintain this quality and this price point they will very quickly own home camera market...also..it works seamlessly with my echo show....5 stars...
title: This is a FANTASTIC camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: isaac villarreal
content: Product, video and sound work great! The app works great with it to view everything. I would give it more stars if it would work with Alexa like it originally said. Doesn't connect and won't work. I bought it so I can see through my Alexa app, but doesn't work. The product is great but not to use with Alexa.
title: Doesn't work with Alexa like it states

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anthony V.
content: The alerts do not differentiate between humans and other things moving. I've also had to restart the camera ( unplug it and plug it in again) several times through the course of one week. You can only view and operate the camera from Android or iOS -- they have no website that you can log into from a normal computer for this purpose. Update: Adding one star. A recent firmware update fixed the camera, and it has stopped crashing. 2nd update: Taking that one star back. The device was working well for a few months. Ever since the 4.10.3.40 firmware update in March 2019, the device becomes unresponsive all the time. It can't seem to run for more than 24 hours without needing to be restarted. 3rd update: The past several firmware updates have managed to fix the problems. The camera works reliably now. Updating to four stars.
title: Excellent camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael M.
content: If you are questioning if wyze is decent quality, then quit thinking and just buy it. Best value in the industry and solid customer service if you have issues. Exactly as described and great product. I have several of these, bought several for family members last Christmas and recommended for anyone
title: Quit reading reviews and just buy it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ray Maramara
content: This is a replacement for the first one I got which I could not get to work; even after an hour on line with tech support. They offered to replace it with a new one but since I got it on Amazon Prime, I just used Amazon's return/replacement feature. Excellent features and good performance. I just can't tur off the beeping that it does when panning. I've turned all other sounds on the app but can' seem to get that annoying beep to go. I'm just taping over the speaker.
title: Good buy and good support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Erica Molina
content: I brought this to use as a dog camera, although it works pretty good for that use the speaker in it is terrible. When I speak through the speaker it just sounds like static. When you go to play it back on the ap you can hear the words but it makes it impossible to talk to anyone or my dog through the speaker. My second concern was that there wasn’t any encryption on the camera so I would assume it’s easier to hack. I found my camera turned in the opposite direction that I left it multiple times which is pretty creepy and it wasn’t it just resetting. I tested that theory and it ended up in a different  position.
title: Good but has it’s cons- security isn’t great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: William Evans
content: I bought one Wyze cam and was so impressed I ordered three more, including the pan model, two days later.  Very easy set up including flawlessly updating the firmware.  For the price cameras are excellent.  Sound recording is very good but the speakers in the cameras are mediocre at best.  I installed the 32gb cards to get continuous local recording and ensure coverage if the wifi goes down.  All totaled I have less tha $150.00 for a four camera security system that more than meets my needs and is comparable to systems costing hundreds more and require a monthly subscription fee.
title: Great value proposition

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Corey
content: Bought this product for my husband to be able to interact with our newborn baby and to keep an eye on us while he is OTR. (I'M UBER PARANOID AT NIGHT WITHOUT HIM!) Picture quality is great, zoom fantastic, pan amazing. Haven't tried night vision yet. I did A LOT of research before I found something that was great priced AND efficient and WYZE cam is exactly that. DONT BUY AN EXPENSIVE MONITOR, DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!! THIS CAMERA IS THE BEES KNEES!!!. It has good 2 way audio. Excellent reception and camera quality. Motion sensors are banging. A SD slot for recordings AND!!!!.... A 14 day revolving CLOUD recording is automatically included with your purchase no expensive cloud subscriptions. Wyze cam isnt screwing anyone, they WANT to to keep buying their products so they do it right!!! GREAT STUFF AFFORADABLE PRICE! Do your due diligence..  wyze cam is great. The set up is bit of a pain in the ass but once it's set up you're good to go bro!!. Some people question security. I dont worry about it. So for no glitches in the matrix no issues with the app. ANY APP based product can be hacked, if that's a concern hire a security guard dont rely on cameras for anything. Will be purchasing a couple more for more of the house.
title: Best decision ever

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brian Mak
content: Did a ton of research on what is an affordable indoor camera. I gave the Wyze Cam Pan a try and works great. I have two in separate locations linked to some Smartthings senors so when I'm not home the camera wills start recording and be able to receive push notifications. In the daytime, the picture quality is clear and high quality. However, the thing I will say is, the night vision is not that great. I have the camera on my island and the camera could see maybe 3 feet away clearly, but after that the vision gets a little blurry. Also, the camera has a build in microSD slot for recording events. The app also is able to record events, but when I don't have the microSD card in the camera, the camera does not always record on the app. I'm not sure if my camera is faulty or that's just how it's made. Never the less, it's a great camera all around for the price you pay.
title: Affordable high picture quality cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: My Comment
content: It's a nice camera. Picture quality is good. The pan and tracking features need work. They aren't accurate and are too abrupt. I disabled all motion and use this device as a static camera. Another super annoying feature is that cloud saving is 12-second clips in intervals of 5 minutes. This means that if a robber comes in, his entrance is saved and if he gets out in less than 5 minutes (with the camera), there won't be any additional footage saved to the cloud. Very disappointing.
title: Needs work...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: hollyann
content: This is our 6th Wyze cam.  We are fans of this company and the affordability of their products.  While sometimes the software can have some issues and we’ve had issues connecting to the cameras, the quality has certainly improved as the company grows.  This is our first Pan/Tilt Wyze cam and we like the flexibility it provides to get a 360 degree view of the room vs. our other Wyze fixed cameras.  The app is very responsive and moving/tilting the camera works great.  The feature that detects motion and moves the camera automatically to track the object in motion is also really nice.
title: Great affordable camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BethDog
content: I bought one of these cameras and liked it so much I bought two more. I liked that I could pan and the two way communication. I also liked that I can see the camera feed on my echo show. After purchasing the other two cameras, I started noticing issues. The notifications are so delayed, they are worthless. I clocked it, 6 minutes from the activity to the notification on my phone.  I am also no longer able to open the app on my phone ( moto x pure). I receive a notification of activity, but can't open the app to see it. If I just click on the notification, I eventually get a message that the file doesn't exist. If you want the camera to just check in on your home, they work great. I haven't had any problems with them dropping off the network.  If you want it for security, I would look elsewhere.
title: Good picture, delayed notifications

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: B-man
content: This camera was easy to setup, it just took about 10 mins for the camera to do it. This camera has a better picture, more features than my Canary cameras.  Canary charges $15/mo for 2-way audio and cloud where this is free. The pan scanning is amazing.  The motion alerts work great night or day.  The sound alerts needs tweaking to work efficiently. Definitely will order more to replace my other cameras. Just wish they had one that could be used outside. i also wish i could send the video directly to my NAS instead of the cloud.  However, no other cloud cameras have that feature either. Great Camera! Con: I have noticed that its motion detection isn't very good for settle changes.  Espcially at night.  I can move around a little and it doesn't detect it.  Have to move across frame.
title: Great Camera, will replace my Nest Cam and Canary Cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael E.
content: The issue with this camera is the live stream delay. When I was using this camera it had a 30 to 40 second delay in the live stream. The motion sensor worked find it would pick me up when I entered the room. The problem it when I walked thru the room and went to my office to see the feedback it would not show me in the picture. Then I would appear and could be seen entering and leaving the room. The problem in that was approx. 30 to 40 seconds earlier. For me that did not work well for what I wanted to use it for, like when working in my office and wanted to watch what my dog was doing upstairs. For instance, she would leave my office go upstairs, do whatever and be back in my office before I even saw her appear on the camera. Live stream lag too loooooong.
title: Live Stream Feedback big delay

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Buddy
content: It arrived today and I was excited to receive it but it’s being returned ASAP.  My wi-fi requires a user name and a password and the WYZE can’t handle that...so disappointing...it would have been nice to know this limitation  before hand...so be warned... There is a work around that requires additional hardware that costs as much or more than the camera... Some of my family members are happy with their WYZE cameras so I thought I would be too...Not today...now looking for another option,..
title: Know the connection limitations of this before you purchase it!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marcus Fresco
content: The camera works great but I cannot get the 2 way audio to work, I had a Samsung Note 8 and I downloaded the app. The audio didn't work. Then last week I bought the new Samsung S10 + it didn't work with that either so perhaps it's not compatible or I got a faulty camera? I did download the latest firmware that didn't fix the problem.  Maybe it's not compatible with Samsung phones? I have no idea.
title: Very good camera but I cannot get the Audio to work!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: James Barfield
content: I put this in an outbuilding that's behind my house. I have a decent Wifi signal in the outbuilding so it was simple to set this camera up and get it working out there. I can monitor the live feed on my Wyze app on my Android phone or view recording triggered by the motion sensing function. I can control the panning of the camera from the app as well. Wyze has set the standard for inexpensive security cams that don't require the expense of an ongoing subscription.
title: Great for monitoring my outbuilding

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Frugal Procrastinator
content: I've had this model sitting out in the garage for over a year. One of the pets knocked the camera over. When I went to set it upright, one of my fingers came in contact with the lens. The lens was almost too hot to touch! I unplugged it for the night. Plugged it in again the next day for 30 minutes and checked the camera again. Extremely hot to the touch. I'm thinking this camera could lead to a FIRE. It wasn't just warm- it was HOT! Anyone else had this problem?
title: FIRE HAZARD???

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jennifer C.
content: I've got several of the basic cameras and two of the pancams. The app is intuitive and well-designed, and I've had no issues with the basic cameras. The pan cam, however, has bricked two SD cards and counting. This is clearly a known issue based on the forums, but it continues to happen. The worst part is that there's no indication on the app that the SD card is no longer functioning - it's not much fun to look for footage and find out there isn't any. The least Wyze could do (if they can't figure out how to stop the bricking) is put a visible flag on any cameras that are live-view only.
title: Good cams/app, but unreliable as anything but a live-view camera bc it destroys microSD cards.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: USMC Avionics Ret
content: As with other reviewers, I’d like to confirm that this is the one of easiest cameras to set up. I’ve purchased many brand names from department stores that were very difficult to set up and access from my phone, this one is a breeze. The picture quality is not 4K but it surpasses many of those over the counter cameras that cost over $100. There is a few thing I'd like to see, like an app that I can use on my computer (MacBook). Additionally, I'd like to be able to turn off the IR lites because it interferes when viewing through a window at night. Furthermore the camera should adjust for white balance, incandescent lighting is slightly too warm.
title: Excellent buy!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SS1981
content: Bought this camera to monitor a home we bought in NC until he can actually move down there, but the motion and sound detection did not work and I don’t get notifications due to the issue with firmware version: 4.10.3.50. Wyze corrected the issue with a firmware update and it’s working well now. I reported the issue to them and their communication with me was topnotch. Overall the camera works well for a $35 camera, but there are a few issues. The night vision isn’t the best without other lights on in the room and while viewing video from the app, the motor is kinda loud. Other than that, it’s a good little camera that does it’s job.
title: Good camera for the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nicole H.
content: I have been looking for a camera for my home for awhile & it felt like everything required you to have a monthly subscription fee! I just wanted something that would give me a video feed that I can check on my phone whenever I wanted. This does exactly that! This camera works really great and is really cheap to boot! Don't think that the low price means low quality though! The camera image i get in my phone is nice & clear & the night vision mode works wonderfully! I am definitely getting the doorbell version when they release it in January!
title: Best choice!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Desiree
content: I’ve got the motion sensor and sound detector on 8’ when I walk through the front door it will still be facing the other way. The sound detection is great. But the motion not so well. I’ve even set the pan scan perimeters, some how it still ends up turning around facing the wall. Lately I’ve had issues with this one, and the little cam connecting to the ap. I love it when it’s working right, but when it’s not it’s pretty annoying.
title: Not horrible

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: tanabelle
content: I purchased this item after reading other reviews of indoor cameras, some of the most high end cameras had the same resolution but cost 10x more.  I wasn't really worried about great image quality ( keep reading), just something to use so I can peek in on my pup during the day.  It's very easy to set up, just plug into the wall, download the app and connect to your home wifi. The camera spins 360, and you can choose SD or HD image quality. You can store the images in a microSD card if you want to, and you can listen in with the sound options and also speak through it using the mic.  It's simple and effective, and doesn't cost $300.  Give it a try if you're in the market.
title: Why buy a FURBO?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ruger
content: This is a great camera but be aware, the outlet on the Camera where the wire plugs in is very weak. The slightest movement will detach the internal wires and render the camera useless
title: Weak wiring

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Addie
content: We bought this and use it in our sons nursery. This thing is awesome! The graphics are clear, the night vision is awesome and we love that you can go back and watch the small recordings from when there was movement. We have it set on his crib so it will record if there was a certain amount of movement. We had originally bough a Safety 1st baby camera/monitor and it was awful compared to this. We have recommended this to so many people!  I had a co-worker get it after I recommended and she used it to keep an eye on her cats when she was away for a weekend.
title: Best Camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: campbellsoup
content: For the price, this is pretty great. The motion detection isn’t so great and sometimes it pans all the way the the left and stays there. The biggest flaw is the two way speaker. This feature is the reason I purchased- I am trying to keep my dog off the furniture when I’m out and I wanted to be able to give commands remotely. The volume isn’t loud enough and doesn’t hear it. Also very spotty sound- it goes in and out. I would love to attach an auxiliary speaker but there is no way to do this.  Hopefully they continue to develop improvements for this product.
title: Doesn’t do everything it says it does.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: EricM
content: Hung this camera up in our Rec facility to monitor activity during training programs . Day video is clear and I like the audio settings . Once we turn off the lights and shut down for the day the cameras night vision is terrible . I can’t see anything as seen in the pics provided . I am going to try to contact the manufacturer for a replacement. *Update * adding another star for customer serivice ! I contacted the manufacturer, they sent me through troubleshooting steps for the problem that I’m having with infrared . After the steps proved unsuccessful they shipped out a replacement camera free of charge . Great customer service . My hope are that this cameras infrared will work . Will update later
title: Descent camera , Terrible night vision, Great customer service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: zoomzoom870
content: This is a fantastic little camera that I've had for a while now. You won't find anything anywhere near the price range of this that has even close to the same features and the app is fantastic. I did have an issue with one of my cameras dying but customer service was great and overnighted me a new one. This is a fantastic camera for a great price the free cloud service has worked without issue the entire time I've owned it and they have almost doubled features since I bought it.
title: Fantastic for the price and constantly adding new features.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John Austin
content: Pros: Great price for a 1080p camera. Fairly easy setup. Free (limited) cloud storage through their software. Cons: Included software doesn't have a lot of options. The video quality also glitches a bit when something moves quickly across its field of view or during quick panning. I use TinyCam Pro in addition to the included software (only an additional $3.99 USD), as TinyCam doesn't currently have a way to control the camera. There is no battery option plus you may need to buy a longer USB cord and extra mounting hardware depending on where you plan to install it.
title: Good 1080p camera for a very good price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: User 48D-X21A
content: Subscribed me automatically to a higher tier subscription plan without my consent or any forewarning. Blamed a bug on my SD Card. Told me to follow steps to fix the bug, which didn't do anything as it wasn't actually a fix, and by doing so ended chat so they did not have to continue providing support. App functionality has decreased. I'm gonna nope out of this ecosystem and be glad I don't have 10 devices getting the 50 cent per device, per month increase automatically added to my account.
title: Nope

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: rfgf1
content: We bought 8 of the Wyze cameras (2 Wyze Cam Pans and 6 Wyze Cam v2) to replace some aging cameras we had at our house and condo. Since that time two of the cameras have gone bad with the picture turning very solarized and grainy. Wyze claimed they were aware of the issue and that it was affecting enough cameras that they were looking to make "some changes", but also that since the one year warranty was up I was not going to get these replaced at no charge. This is a 25% failure rate, and is unacceptable. The cameras are cheap, there is no annual fee, and when they work they work well. The question now is whether to replace these with more Wyze Cams, or to try a different vendor's product--one with a more generous warranty.
title: Cameras die after about 18 months

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Boyan Ivanov Bonev
content: The camera works fine, the app works fine, and the services work fine. It's a good value for your money. However, when a motion event occurs, only the first few seconds are recorded. Example: someone enters through the door, they're still far from the camera, the camera starts recording. It records the first seconds, and then nothing. You don't get to see that person's face as they move around the room. The camera won't even wait for the person's face to be a little closer so you can identify them. It'll just stop recording after 12 seconds (I think that's the limit). Another limitation that makes it inadequate for security purposes is that when someone enters your home and sees the camera, they can go to the camera and disconnect it. If they don't spend more than 10 seconds doing that, the camera will not send any recording to the servers, and you won't get an event notification. In fact, every time I return to my place, I walk to the camera with no hurry, I disconnect it, and I never get a recording or notification of that. My recommendation is to buy it if you want to check on your puppy or your baby, but don't buy it for security use cases. It's too bad because other than these limitation, it is a great piece of equipment and very inexpensive.
title: Motion-based event recording is inadequate for security use cases

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: srf22204
content: Wanted a camera for indoors when I was away on work travel.  This is great.  I set it up in the living room with views of the front door and rear doors.  just plug in. I downloaded the app and set up on my phone.  Now when I am away I can open the camera on my phone.  The rotate feature works great and can pan around the room.  Nice solution for some piece of mind.
title: Used indoors

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: thefox311
content: Ok so I have had these cameras for a while now, and the one thing that bugs me the most is the horrible motion tracking feature these cameras have.  It’s super herky jerky and is really not useful at all. The camera overshoots the target and ends up with the target out of view. Just google it.  But overall you get what you pay for.  The ptz is great. Picture quality is great night vision is great! Overall though instead of 5 stars I’d rate 3 for false advertisement on the motion tracking feature since that’s reason I wanted to buy these.
title: Great camera with ptz... but....

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A. A. Zaiken
content: Would’ve paid three times the price. Works great for watching your pets while you’re out. Pop a 128gb SD card in for $20 and you have continuous recording (so I can see when the dog walker comes or leaves). Live streaming works great on your smart phone.
title: I’d pay three times as much

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: texasute
content: I want to love this thing.  Slick packaging and easy setup.  From there, it seems to have a mind of its own.  Its job is to detect motion and sound and then notify me.  That's it.  Statistically speaking, your phone always works, as does your computer, your car and the airplane you travel on.  This thing?  There's no rhyme or reason to when it does or doesn't work.  I continue to experiment with it but half the time I want to package it up and return it.  We'll see.
title: Works sometimes - when it's in the mood

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Thank you all
content: I bought 4 of these just for motion alerts purposes. Now they want me to subscribe? I want a refund!!! Why would I pay for what was free? I added memory cards to store footage and now can’t access the footage from the cameras? What a waste of $400!!!
title: The camera now don’t work because Wyze changed the terms.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: spot
content: UPDATE: My review still stands, BUT at this price point there really is nothing comparable. So I have bought from them again. I have bought 4 of these. They are awesome while they work. Literally just over a year in they get a steady yellow light and stop responding. I have had this issue with 2 and the company will do nothing about it. It is a shame I really liked the product and company until I needed support. This is a common issue just google it before you buy.
title: was awesome while it worked

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Maricela Ortega
content: I purchased this for my kids room to be able to monitor them specially at night. The camera is supposed to send you notifications and it doesn't, even though all notifications are turn on. You are supposed to be able to speak thru the camera and hear when they are speaking back and 90% of the time that doesn't happen. The camera is constantly turning even when there is no motion and it stop by a wall, door or something totally random except where it should. I am very annoyed by this camera. I wished I would have saved the delivery slip to return it.
title: regret buying it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Platte River Girl
content: Attached are photos of night vision ON (porch light off), night vision OFF (porch light on), and night vision ON (porch light on).  NOTE poor quality of night vision. It wasn't good for only 2 weeks, then started going "foggy" for lack of better word. I'm using Pan Cam 1080p in protected porch area to monitor front entry and yard.  I had a package stolen pre-Christmas off my front porch, so ordered camera to monitor porch traffic. Night vision worked well 2 weeks, but now night vision is very poor.  It's fine if I turn night vision off and switch porch light on. Camera works fine during day. I have to leave the porch light on at night for camera to be effective.
title: Night vision didn't last

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: S Preissler
content: Inexpensive, easy set up. My only issues are the clips when it catches something aren’t very long so I can’t see what’s going on just kind of stops in mid motion. Would preferred to keep following the person etc. so I can see what they’re up to. I have it facing my front door in my apartment, or when maintenance comes and I’m not home. The problem is I see the person come in my door but it doesn’t follow them like it should and then stop so I have no idea what they been doing well they’ve been in my apartment just came in thanks to that very short little clip. Otherwise great product.
title: Works ok

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ross F.
content: The pam cam is not worth all the issues it has. That said I believe if you use apple you may be fine. But for android you will only have issues. First the mic does work at all so no 2 way talking, just listening. This has been an ongoing issues as you can clearly see that has not been fixed on the wyze forums. Also for the past 2 weeks it quit sending notifications to my phone, nothing was changed it just stopped. Also today it started only to display black and white images. This is in addition to the motion tracking bouncing a around from every little change in light if someone is in the room (ex : will track the person, go to the window light back to the person then to kitchen light, and continuously do that. All of the said, the v2 regular camera has been great with 0 issue. Conclusion: pan cam is garbage, and serves as a novelty security camera, v2 cam is great. Wyze is more concerned with launching new products then fixing current ones.
title: Get v2 not pan cam. Then thank me!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: tyler
content: Absolutely awesome camera. Works much better than more expensive cameras I have owned. The app is great and a lot of little quirks that many cameras have are not a problem with this one. Everything seems well thought out. Thr alarm notifications come much quicker than other cameras. It even does a great job detecting when motion is a person and i was surprised at how well it was able to detect smoke alarms across the house. I will move exclusively to the Wyze security system. Excellent value.
title: Awesome Camera, ignore negative reviews

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M Dougan
content: This is an amazing camera, especially for the price. Excellent video, though I dropped the res to get smooth motion (even lower res is great video). Installation was easy, just plug it in. Press a button on the bottom and it guides you through setup (after you download and install the app, and click on new device). Really easy. Once connected to your wiFi the app is really easy to use. Watch a live feed, watch motion alerts, automatic nite mode (B&W). Everything the Big Boys offer at a fraction of the price. And did I mention on demand pan, tilt and zoom? Only downside is you need to plug it in, which is not hard for an indoor camera, and the batteries never run out.
title: Best Value on the Market

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sylvia Allen
content: I purchased one camera to keep an eye on my aged golden retriever.  It worked great except for when he was out of the viewing range (which is huge) so I bought another and can peek in on him several times a day.  I know when his dog walker is coming as I hear his excited barks.  The camera is great day or night; the speaker is great for listening and only as good as your internet when talking; if you have a good high speed connection you shouldn't have an issue.  Great product for the price.
title: Good pet monitor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gatorman
content: This camera is absolutely phenomenal - even if it had cost double the price of $40 we paid for it. The picture quality on my iPhone is so good it’s hard to believe. We bought two. Front porch for monitoring guests and living room to check on pets when not home. Both perform exactly as advertised. The two installs were flawless. Not too difficult for first timers. The sound is certainly good for a unit of this size and cost but only gave four stars because although satisfactory, the picture quality is so good it wouldn’t be fair to rate the sound on an equal basis. You’re going to love this camera. We’ve been using it for about a week completely problem free.
title: Just as advertised and more

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ken
content: OK.  Tech Geek here.  I currently have installed a couple Ring devices (doorbell and spotlight cam) and 6 Arlo Ultra's all but 1 outside as well. Now I have 2 of these a 2 of the smaller cube Wyze Cams.  All inside. Granted not 4k like the Arlo and not quite as advanced, but for literally 10 times less the cost and no fee for online storage?  I would say that they are 80% of the big boys at 10-30% the cost. I will say.. Absolutely perfect combo with Arlo (and Ring) now just need Apple Home Kit integration with all these different cam's I have .... LOL.
title: Seriously?  What is not to love?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dr. G
content: Loved this camera SO MUCH until it started constantly disconnecting, changing angles, and then randomly turning back and forth for hours, so much that it would tip over constantly, tried factory resets, tried everything, I went through every troubleshoot avail and nothing worked. I think investing in a more expensive camera Is the way to go
title: Loved it until it glitched constantly

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: LovetoreadDF
content: There’s a lot I love about this product. Sound and motion detection options for event recording, great night vision, solid motion detection, and most of all the price. Some areas of slight improvement: they had a quick start instructions in the box, but nothing more detailed explaining what features there were or how to use them. We’ve also had issues with it being set to record events, but then not recording them. Major issues: Free two week cloud storage is great! However, the camera will only record a ten second clip, after which there is a five minute cool down before it can record again. This only applies to the cloud, you can still record as long as you want to an SD card. However, let’s be real, an intruder WOULD 100% of the time steal the camera, or destroy it. A subscription service for longer cloud clips or maybe a one time optional purchase would potentially solve this? Hopeful, because I do like the product.
title: Amazing for price, but 12 second clips too short.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: reds
content: This is my 4th Wyze Cam. I have two home so I have two at one home and now two at another. These camera's are the best! I bought a "bird cage" for one of my Pan Cam's and has worked wonderful in the elements. You can not beat the price of these cams. For a few more dollars I would suggest the Cam Pan. It can easily be in all directions from you android phone. If I had one suggestion though it would be for a Wyze App compatable for my Amazon Fire. Would love to beable to get these cams on my tablet instead of my phone. Buy these cams, you won't be disappointed. They are sooooooo  incredible easy to set up. Takes maybe five minutes at the most!  LOVE THEM
title: Bang for the Buck!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Donald Glasser
content: THIS IS REALLY ONE BEAUTIFUL PEACE OF EQUIPMENT THAT REALLY WORKS GREAT. I HAVE BOUGHT TWO OF THEM AND ONLY BECAUSE SOMEONE ELSE HAS TOLD ME ABOUT THEM AND HE WAS IN MY HOME AND SHOWED ME LIVE PICTURES FROM HIS HOME AND THEY WERE REALLY NICE,I HAVE SEEN MANY OTHERS CAMS LIKE THIS , BUT THEY DIDN'T COMPARE TO THE WYZE THE TWO THAT I BOUGHT ARE WORKING GREAT,THE ONLY ONE PROBLEM I DO HAVE WITH THEM, IS THAT THE SPEAKERS ON THEM ARE NOT THE GREATEST, BUT I CAN LIVE WITH THAT. FOR THE CHEAP PRIZE THAT YOU PAY FOR THESE WYZE CAMS, THEY SURE DO MAKE THE ONES THAT SELL FOR HUNDREDS OF DOLLARS MORE LOOK LIKE REAL CRAP!!!!! IF YOU DO NEED A CAM, BUY A  WYZE!!!!!!!
title: THIS IS ABOUT THE BEST CAM THAT ONE CAN BUY, ITS GOT ALL OTHERS BEAT BY A MILE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mike C.
content: I purchased this camera to use in my garage. In a lit room it worked only so-so. The night vision was completely useless. Picture was almost black and would serve no purpose whatsoever in identifying the source of movement.. I contacted Wyze customer service through chat and after spending almost an hour checking things I had already checked and providing screen shots of the dark garage, the technician told me he was moving the issue to an upper tier technician who would contact me. After several days I got an email presumably from the upper tier technician, who asked that I again provide screen shots of the dark garage. I pointed out that I had already sent screen shots to the first technician and to get them from him. I never heard back from anyone. It was too late to send it back so I have an expensive paperweight.  Fortunately, the unit as a camera was not that expensive so I won’t lose any sleep over it, but it’s still a shame that a company selling a shoddy product and very poor customer service can continue to fleece unsuspecting new customers.
title: Night vision was useless on my unit

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kbean
content: Motion detection is spot-on.  The video Clip that is captured shows the motion and also displays the still picture on the ‘events’.  Software to adjust motion detection is flexible.  Easy to install.  Notification is reliable.  The pan cam will follow motion most of the time (not perfect) but still great!  I noticed this company is constantly improving their software and adding features that are useful like person detection when motion is detected.  I have this pan cam as well as their non-pan camera.  Both are great!
title: Great product!  Great value!  Highly recommended.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Melanie C
content: I used this for 1st time when I left my (kids) "dogs" with a new dog sitter, to make sure they were stopping by when requested.  It worked pretty well until it somehow disconnected from the internet.  It cannot be reconnected remotely, which meant I was unable to utilize it.  It did cycle itself back on 24 hours later.  So I was only "blind" for 1 day of vacation, thankfully.  It did not work that well at night.  Also it is inside of a glass cabinet, so quite alot of glare at night.
title: Great Camara, but cant reconnect it remotely.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cookie Monster
content: Sound is barely okay over local network but not so good over the web.  Video is awesome, day or night, especially in landscape view.  I keep mine in SD video mode.  Can't see appreciable difference and uses much less video card storage.  Customer service is awesome too.  Sent a note via Amazon and got quick response with far better than expected problem resolution.  Will be ordering a couple of the smaller V2 units.  Drawback:  Needs paid 3rd party app to access via PC.
title: Great day/night video.  Exceeded expections!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: YoungDiamonds
content: By Far The Absolute Best Home Security Camera Ever. It's Amazing how the Camera will follow you around. My cat tends to slap it because he just sees an object moving from left to right. The Night Vision is Very Clear, the motion detection is Amazing, it literally caught a fly and started filming. The APP is Free, so all you pay for is the Camera. I just purchased my 3rd WYZE Cam Pan, I can't wait for the New WYZE items to come out. The Greatest Security System Ever!!
title: YOU WILL THANK ME AFTER PURCHASING THE WYZE CAM PAN😍

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: twinkiltoes
content: We are pleased with this for the price.  It works off WiFi and has to be plugged in.  You have to buy a micro SD card also.  Our WiFi went down and I had to redo setup to get it to work again.  We mainly use it to check in on our dogs when away, it’s perfect for that. Wouldn’t work for robbers, they could easily snatch it or unplug it.  It’s noisy so hiding it would not work.  The night vision is black and white.  Great daytime picture.  Some negatives.  Having to be plugged in, noisy when turning.  I am unable to get it to record.  I have it set to come on at midnight and off at 9 AM  it turns on not off.
title: Great for pet watching

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Allen C. Huffman
content: I have three of these pan models, and four of the normal ones. They work great for the money. The biggest flaw with this unit is how motion sensing works. Since it can rotate all the way around, it tends to notice shadows and point to the wall. It's not great to use against a wall - but works great in the center of the room (like in the middle of a basement, hanging from the roof). You can invert the video for mounting upside down. It uses standard mounts, which are cheap to find elsewhere on Amazon. App recently got updated with more features. it's a GREAT system for the price.
title: Have three now. Great for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: viswanath ijanagiri
content: The camera is charged through the connector in the very thin base of the camera and the port ALMOST touches the ground.  Even a small spill of water can contact the charging power port and cause a security hazard and render camera useless. I use this cam in kitchen and my camera died today due to contact with water. The whole charging port contact burnt. Do not buy this camera until they revise the base design and keep the charging port elevated from the ground.
title: Charging Port Design Flaw - Security Hazard

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MissFranswa
content: I got this yesterday and so far very good!!! Set up was a breeze. Download app, follow instructions. Easy. Only thing I'm not keen on is how noisy the camera is when it moves. If I was catching someone in the act, they would know because of the noise from the camera. UPDATE: Camera is not registering all motion. Had workers come in to do work and it never picked up their entrance. That is worrisome to me, so have to rethink this. Also turns on randomly. Super creepy.
title: Updated: Not Bad, noisy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Priscilla
content: Good for the price but it has some lacking features. Pros: I love the pan, tilt, and zoom functions. I use this camera for my chihuahua yorkie. I can track her anywhere in the room with the live function. She is low maintience so I have no need to record events. There is no cloud subscription which is why I initially purchased this device. If you wanted to record there is the option of using a micro SD card. The cool thing is that you can still take photos without one. I bought the wyze pan outlet mount stand and it keeps from knocking it over on the floor. Also no need to worry about wires! It looks like you can also attach it to a small tripod if you wanted to. Cons: When I first set up the device the speaker was ample but after the update it was non existent. When using the app you can barely hear what's going on in the background. When using the speaking function in the app the volume from the wyze camera is indistinguishable. Again I believe it's a software issue but truly dissatisfied with the lack of tech support. I sent in an ticket a week ago and have yet to receive even a confirmation of the issue. The panning functions could be better. I wish it was a little smoother or more in sync with the app.
title: Good cam for the price, Poor 2-way audio

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Big Bob
content: I purchased these cameras for a second home and they have been VERY disappointing!  I have used Arlo in the past and get notifications whenever they notice movement etc.  These cameras notice nothing!  I set them up and double checked the settings to be sure notifications were turned on and they have never been triggered. Even when I had relatives go into my home to pick things up or set the heat etc.  I have never received a notification of movement or had anything events recorded.  I am several states away from the home but have been back several times since the initial set up and double checked everything they seem to notice movement and I can see when I am in the house they track movement etc. but again no matter how I configure they do NOT record events or send notification of movements.
title: No Notifications are being sent!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brad DeSando
content: I love the Wyze system and have multiple small cams throughout the house. The app is great and very easy to use. It is also free which is a huge bonus. My only gripe on this camera is the audio. It is very hard to hear what is happening in a room while listening on your phone through the app. This is my first pan tilt cam so I'm not sure if I have a faulty product or if this is consistent with this model. I would definitely recommend and purchase systems in the future with the hope let this small glitch is fixed.
title: Easy to use and very reliable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tahir J. Naim
content: What's the point of a webcam if you can't get clear pictures from it? 1080p resolution will generally give you clear pictures. We've had this in use for several months now. Used indoors through the window on our front door and outside to check on the possum going for our nectarines. You can set the zone in which you want motion to trigger filming which is vital if you're not to get images of leaves moving in the wind or the lights of passing cars. Even at 1080p there are still some poor images, but generally excellent.
title: Get at least 1080p

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Woolie
content: The app works well but doesn't work any more with Google home hub, which is what we really wanted. Used to work but a few months ago it stopped. Tried removing it and setting up again with same results. Disappointed. The app will force close on an iPad of running for too long as well.
title: All features don't work.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Philly Reader
content: The camera is compact, with high quality and simple attachments.  What Wyze does not tell you is that it cannot be connected if you are running a VPN program on your phone or tablet.  When I contacted their tech support because I could not get a connection, they provided no good solution.  It was only after trying every other possibility that I hit on the fact that the VPN was preventing the connection.  If you have a similar problem, stop the VPN, connect the camera, and then use the VPN software to exclude the camera connection.  Then it works like a charm.  One difficulty is that due to the panning action, you can only set it in a location, it cannot be secured or hang from a wall or ceiling.
title: Great camera, but check your VPN if it won't connect!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sid L.
content: I needed to keep track of my cats while on vacation. Started with Kamtron pan cameras. The night vision was horrible and they kept disconnecting from the wifi. Also, they don't motion track. I will use these as backups with a wifi plug so I can reset them when needed. Then I bought a Movelli pan. This one motion tracked but would not return to it's starting position and again the night vision was horrible. Then I stumbled across these beauties. I don't think I could ask for anything more for the price. Tons more features than the other two. Fast connections - hasn't dropped wifi yet - wide angle lens to view corners - motion tracking with return to starting position - great night vision - you can set it up to scan areas automatically -detection sensitivity adjustments - alerts for co2 or fire alarms if they go off - alerts just for sounds - people specific alerts (instead of all motions) - set detection area (I only wish it could be set up for multiple detection areas) - camera position auto-return (I had an issue with this that was a little complicated. I set up a detection area but after I place the cam I wanted to view it a little lower so I adjusted the angle from the app. However, after 15 secs it returned back to it's starting position. Turns out I could either turn off the detection zone or when you are setting it you can move the cam angle where you want it to return using the touch pad below the zone screen. There's tiny print below all that which somewhat explains it that I missed). Also, they produce 12 second clips then won't record for 5 minutes so if you need to see more of what's going on I recommend getting a micro SD card and turning on Continuous Recording. The option here is either only your events will be saved or it will continuously record (obviously). Then you'll have to find the time of the 12 sec event from your app then go and try to find it on the timeline of your SD card. It would be easier if they could have those events tagged somehow on that looooong movie but now I'm just nitpicking!) I ended up buying five stationary and five pan cameras (it's good to know where the cats are at any given moment and that they are all safe and sound when we are away). They have everything that was missing on my first purchases and things I didn't even know I needed!
title: Extensive Features and Great Night Vision Not Found On Other Cams

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Frank
content: We previously had a more generic camera which worked very well until it didn't - had to send back and get another.  the second one worked until a few months ago and we suspect it stopped responding after a thunderstorm.  I read the reviews for this Wyze camera and was willing to take a chance.  Setup was extremely easy and after setting up a Wyze account and following all the other simple instructions, the camera was working like a champ.  accessing the camera from the app is easy and it responds quickly and all the time.  Still getting used to navigating through the app on setting up notifications and seeing what other features there are.  The only negative feedback I can provide is the following.  picture has a fisheye effect around the sides of what is displaying.  Not the end of the world, but wasn't expecting that since the previous camera didn't have that.  Also, while the picture is sharp (there are 3 modes and I have it set to HD), when zooming in, the picture is no longer crisp and sharp.  I tried today using the voice feature and I was told that the voice was loud but breaking up - so I will try that again another time to see what may have happened.
title: So far so good

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Aaron K.
content: One month in and I'm liking my Wyze camera more and more every day. I own the more expensive Arlo camera and thought it was really great -- until I used my first Wyze camera. My Wyze camera has a sub one-second latent video stream, so when I'm watching the live stream through the app it appears nearly instantaneous. I imagine this may vary depending on the network, but it beats the multi-second latency of my Arlo camera. My Arlo camera feels more premium and still offer a few features that my Wyze camera is lacking (such as geofencing), but for the price Wyze is 5 stars every day for me. The Wyze community is pretty active and it appears that Wyze is adding the missing features that the community is asking for. The Wyze app just got a major overhaul and now feels way more functional than that the Arlo app (which kind-of just feels ugly now). For features, my Arlo camera is still leading by a hair, but I imagine this will lead will disappear this year. For the price, Wyze just makes cents ;)
title: Better than my Arlo cameras?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Matt
content: Price is good.  Picture is OK.  I have 2 cameras.  I wanted to like them, but they have a fatal flaw.  The cameras restart on their own often and this requires them to run through its full motion calibration.  After it's done it is always pointed to the right.  Where I have my cameras located I need to point them down and in a specific direction.  I'm sure when I need them they will not record anything since they will be pointed at the wall.  There needs to be a way to set a default orientation or keep them from restarting on their own.
title: Constantly have to reset where they are pointing.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CGDot
content: I just wanted a simple camera that I could use to check on pets when away from home. This certainly fits the need with some extra features at a very reasonable price. Arrived quickly & setup was fairly easy. Once an acct was created, I was able to get it up & running in just a few steps. In HD mode, the picture quality is quite good. I also purchased a micro SD card so I could record real time vs their cloud which only snaps a 12 sec video every 5 mins though for free 14 day storage. The pan/zoom functions work well & allow for full room viewing. Still playing with the features but for my purpose, it's a great camera & price point.
title: Really good camera for a good price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Haven Pierce
content: ADORE THESE!!!! I wanted something affordable but reliable to check on my cats when I’m at work. These are just perfect! I can set the notifications to sound and or motion as well as fire alarms. It makes me feel so much better to leave my babies at home. So so happy with this purchase.
title: Keeping an eye on the kitties!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Thomas B.
content: I can not rate this camera highly enough... I have been blown away by all of the technology and features packed into this camera.
