I’ve had family members spend upwards of $100 (not counting monthly fees for cloud video storage) for each camera in their home surveillance setup, and the Wyze Pan outperforms them in just about every category when you compare them. It pans, it tilts, it records in HD, and it has an IR night vision feature. You can even set up push notifications directly to your phone, and it has detection zones that you can use to limit areas that will activate the camera’s motion detector. The app is user-friendly and the cloud storage is free. I’m incredibly happy with my Wyze Pan.
title: Best Camera Dollar-for-Dollar

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jill
content: It was ok till it died. Lost my wifi during a storm, and have not been able to get the unit working since. Have tried every reset method I could. Since I'm past my 30 day return window, I've sent in a support ticket to see if they will honor the warranty. This rating may change should they be able to resolve my issue. I'm very sad looking at what looks like a good camera and I can't do a thing with it.
title: Doesn't like cable outages

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Read
content: I have had 4 different makes through the years and after reading different reviews on Wyze Cameras and with the price very inviting I bought both the Wyze Cam and the pan and tilt. So far they out perform my other cameras with an amazing picture with great details. I plan on buying several more to use in our house for surveillance  when we aren't there. I know you can somewhat use them outside but I really wish they had a true outdoor camera.  Thanks again Wyze.
title: High Quality Picture

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael Early
content: Customer support is horrible!  Camera works ok.  Have had several software issues and Occurrences where I have had to completely delete the whole system & start over to get my cameras to work.  Best feature was the person detection and now they are going to make you start paying for that service. Latest problem, spent hours on the phone “chatting” with customers service because you can’t get anyone on the phone.  Problem didn’t get solved by customer service and eventually got told basically “sorry, we don’t know how to fix it, good luck”. Currently looking for another system even if it means spending more $$.
title: Horrible customer service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Allen Ker
content: This cam is a solid camera that works well overall. That said, the main advantage of this cam over the v1/v2 is the pan function, but there is not an easy way to add preset position button so that you can easily jump from one preset position to the next. You'd have to manually rotate It to the desired position every time through the app, which can be painful and inconsistent because you always over or under shoot the desired position and require many micro adjustments. It is such an intuitive feature that's missing for a panning cam. It does have a feature called Waypoint position that lets you cycle through preset positions, but it's nested deep within settings and its intended use is for continuous surveillance that cycle through the desired positions every 10 minutes, so this is not a practical workaround. They have this feature requested on their official forum for over a year now. It is still just an overlooked post on the wishlist at the time of this writing. I hope Wyze devs can see this review and add this important and intuitive QoL feature, at which point I will gladly change to 5 stars.
title: Missing "preset position buttons" feature. Wyze team please see this!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: vdub
content: Very poor product. The setup was very easy, probably the easiest I've ever encountered.  The picture was so-so. Commands from the cellphone software lagged by so many seconds that I thought it hadn't been received and I would give a 2nd command.  When I put it on 'track a specific' object, it hunted around for the object and easily got confused. Panning instructions lagged by 10 or more seconds and it was easy to give multiple commands, thinking the first few hadn't been rx'ed only to have the camera go wild a few seconds later catching up on the all commands.  The software locked up several times and I had to close all my cell phone apps and restart. I had high hopes for this product and my expectations were dashed to hell.
title: You get what you pay for....

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John
content: I have several Wyze cams in the household and got the Pan with high hopes.  Picture is good, as expected.  Set up is pretty easy, as expected. Unfortunately, the camera is basically useless as it seems to be overly shy and spends a lot of time staring at the wall.  Wyze knows about this issue (see their forums).  Until they can remedy this problem, I don't recommend it. An additional issue is the jerky and over-correcting motion detection.  However, since the camera stares at the wall so frequently I haven't gotten the chance to appreciate how annoying that is just yet.
title: The "Cam" part is great, the "Pan" part?  Not so much.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Samantha McCabe
content: Pros: the app and notifications are great; the ability to record with a micro sd card; decent picture quality. Cons: noisy when it moves (not discrete); spazzes and moves away from motion.. I would be super happy with this camera for the cost, except that it is super spazzy after catching motion. The camera can't stay focused on the motion, it starts flailing back and forth, trying to land on the motion but ends up moving away from it.. Since it's motor makes noise when it moves, that makes it very noisy when trying to follow the motion, so it's not discrete. Because of that, it makes it terrible if you're trying to use it for security, since the camera can't stay focused on the motion to get a clear video.. Would be fine if you're just using it to occasionally check-in at home and look around with the controls on the app.
title: Spazzy and can't stay focused

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kim Hill
content: I have really mixed feelings about this camera. I bought it to watch my dog while I went out of town. The camera turns itself around and faces the wall instead of forward so it cant detect motion. The picture quality is very hazy. I couldnt depend on this camera to pick up someone's facial features. If you're within a few feet, the quality is ok until you zoom in. It's cheap but a camera that cant capture images with decent quality is worthless.
title: Malfunctions & Low Quality Pic

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kourtney loves Reviews
content: I love Claire Crosby and saw this camera on one of her videos as her dad is one of four founders. I decided to give it a try for such a small price and curiosity for tech. I am blown away by how great this is even after viewing the online videos. It feels like a nice product and is well packaged. The setup was easy and I bought a wall mount for it. We hung it in my one year old's room and I can see him so well compared to my $100 plus baby video monitor. I love being able to zoom to the blindspot in his crib that we had before and being able to talk to him is an added bonus. I'd definitely suggest Wyze cam's to others and I'm excited to see what else this company comes out with.
title: Amazing Quality for Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M M Sullivan
content: Please read the update! This product worked great for three months. Now it won’t turn on when I plug it in and customer support is unresponsive. It’s been a month of sending emails with no response. And no customer forums and articles have helped. I’m starting to question if people work at this place. Update: Customer service has reached me out, we tried to troubleshoot the device, it didn’t work, they are sending a new one. Although they were not responsive for a quiet while, they handled and compensated the situation very well.
title: Works great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joseph & Vicki Fajdich
content: i bought this camera for my daughter to watch her dog while at work. i have the smaller non pan non zoom one and thought it was great. i wanted to get her this one so she can "look" for the dog through the camera. i am jealous and will be ordering one of these for myself.
title: i need more

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Whitney
content: I have 3 Wyze cameras and I love them. They are reliable, clear and easy to use and set up. The app that is required to use them is simple to use and it keeps getting better. If you’re on the fence about this camera I’d encourage you to get it. The price is perfect and the performance is too notch. I don’t have any crazy stories about catching someone stealing something from my front porch but I do spend a lot of time looking at my dogs when I’m at work wishing I was home.
title: Great Camera, Great Price, Great Performance.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kathy
content: I absolutely love this camera. I bought five of them. There isn’t anything this camera really doesn’t do! The picture quality I would say could be a little bit better but I don’t even care because it’s good enough and it shows everything I need it to show. I actually have my cameras on the windowsill looking out and it’s see’s-through the glass just fine. It has many many great features... I guess the only thing I wish is the camera Wouldn’t wait five minutes Between scans Because I can actually miss some thing so that’s why you have to have an SD card in so you can go back and look if you want to and then everything is there. If you’re looking for a great all-around camera with a lot of features at a great price this camera is perfect!
title: Love this camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: thumbworn
content: The cameras worked well enough for the first couple weeks, but now when they’re turned off I still get notifications; they turn themselves completely off at random; and once turned off from the app cannot be accessed again without power cycling them. The night vision on one of the cams continuously enables itself when it should not be on. I would love to recommend them based on the cost and features and the fact that they did seem to work for the first couple weeks, but at this point I do not recommend them and may return them if the issues don’t get sorted.
title: Results May Vary

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Capt. Hindsight
content: Bought this camera to replace a 720p dome cam "China special". Interface is fast and easy to use. Resolution is great. My only complaint (aside from lack of in app storage) is the limited amount of vertical tilt. You can get maybe 10 degrees tilt up and 10 degrees down, bit that's it. The fish eye lens helps a little with this but not enough if you desire true two axis flexibility. A shame since this does not meet my particular application.
title: Great field of view, very little tilt

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cara Reel
content: Ive had cheap security cams before... Like 4 different brands and these blow them out of the water! I love the quality of the picture. The night vision is awesome and they are easy to install and attach to the app to get them up and running. The only downside is the company doesn't offer waterproof casings which is fine if the camera is under an awning that's where we have ours but I would love to be able to put one in the backyard too.
title: So insanely good for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Billy Heft
content: I bought this camera on a whim, and its really great. I have an SD card that it records to and I've not had an issues with it. Occasionally it looses connection, but if you close and reopen the app its usually ok. Similar cameras require a monthly subscription this one does not, which the main reason I purchased it. The only negatives that I've experienced is the audio isn't great from both the mic and speaker, it's good enough though. Another minor thing I've noticed is that it doesn't record the your voice when speaking through the phone app, it only records audio from the cameras mic. Overall I'm very happy with this camera. For the price of Wyze camera people would be crazy not get one or two of these.
title: Amazing Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael Jung
content: I  was very  excited when I first  received this, overall a decent  value for  the price.  But within a month, it simply stopped recording events.  Nothing can fix the issue, it is not a problem with the storage card, it is not a problem with the firmware, everything is up to date. All settings set correctly.  If you search the web, you will find this is a very common problem, not operator error or an anomalous bad unit - it is systemic.
title: Don't waste your money, dies  quickly.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robbie Vu
content: This is an awesome can, got it for $30 shipped with a coupon that was targeted. Would I pay $40 shipped? Yes! It’s a great device and everything works as advertised. You cannot beat the price for this product. The only issue I had was that when the WiFi goes out, you may need to restart the camera by unplugging and replugging. I Have Intermittent WiFi connectivity with my router and so sometimes it’s a hassle to have to do that’s manually. I’m sure they’ll fix it eventually in a firmware update. It’s not too complicated to run a auto restart script if no WiFi data after x amount of time. It has 12 seconds of cloud footage if the sensors are triggered to record. It’s free and it’s awesome. Once triggered, you’ll be notified and you could review the footage or go straight to live feed to see what the deal is. Would recommend as this product is truly amazing for the price! Blows competitors out the water!
title: Awesome webcam, awesome 12 second cloud footagez

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Aimee
content: This is by far the best camera I ever bought. It follows you around room . Two way talking. No charges like other cameras . I bought several different security products for home and offices and this is by far the best. I bought five more after trying out the first one. They make covers pretty cheap so you can use outside as well.
title: Best security camera out on market. Five stars hands down!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Casey Gregory
content: Edit: 2 weeks in and im returning for the V2...the whirring noisr.tipped me over the edge.Very good little camera for the price. Easy to use, great picture imo ( I DO have a small apt tho) nice simple UI. What i DONT LIKE: Its rather large. 5" or so high, plus the  3-4" bracket i bought,  and its impossible to hide or make inconspicuous.  It makes a whirring noise when it pans and tilts. Annoying as crap and another indicator that its there. Ive only had it two days and are weighing pros n cons of returning for another V2 which I love.
title: Pros and cons

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: sancti-spiritus
content: Way too cumbersome, this "pan" camera will tip over a small tripod, because of it's weight. The "pan" feature has a mind of it's own, sometimes you can't stop it. 180 degree pan is a gimmick. You can imagine that thing will rotate toward facing a wall in most applications. This camera simply would NOT DETECT MOTION, NOR PEOPLE. I returned two of them with the cases. I then purchased the "regular" Wyze camera, which works as advertised.
title: Does not detect motion nor people most of the time

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MikeyintheD
content: Was surprised to find a camera packed with features, free app and multi day recording for such. great price!  Reviews were above average and I didn't feel like buying another $180+ camera to match my other in my house.  The setup was easy, motion tracking is nice, app works great.  The downside is the picture quality is awful given it claims 1080p.  Night vision is equally as bad but somewhat understandable since there is limited-to-no light at night.  I'll keep it since it isn't an essential part of my home security but would not want to rely on this for any detailed photos/videos.
title: Great price - subpar performance

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Q. T.
content: The 12 sec motion is delayed and often misses the event. Same goes w/ sound detection. Perhaps multiple mics would have been better. The speaker and mic such.. u will not be able to hear the conversation unless u are yelling into speaker while holding to your mouth... The cam is great tho despite the above, has time delay and u can add a sd card so that it records w/o internet. The auto panning can be noticeably audible. The camera allow you to zoom into pictures & videos it records. It has a person filter recently added allowing you to skip thru the needle motion detected videos of a leaf blowing to something more important. Maybe they will add animals next.. I love this brand and will order more
title: Keeps improving. All for free

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Reviews2
content: The Pan feature creates a situation where the camera gets stuck looking at the wall all. the. time. I have tried it from every angle in every room and it turns itself around and fixates on the wall. Save yourself the money and stick with the simple Wyze cam 2 The night vision works but does not help when the camera pans to a wall and stays there . Really disappointed in this Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom
title: Not worth it and not as good at as the simple Wyze Cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shabrick
content: Wyze cams are some of the best cams for their price point. You won’t be dissatisfied...completely. One problem, regardless of which model you choose, is the lag time between motion detection and the time it takes before you actually receive the notification. A burglar could have already made off with your flat screen tv before you get the notification. It’s approx 45 seconds to a minute or longer before your phone gets notified. That’s a huge problem. And when setting up the cam, it’s usually pretty difficult to get the QR code to scan for set up. Once it’s up however, it’s hard not to be amazed at the quality and features Wyze packs inside these tiny cameras and at the price point they are offered. Buying more to have one in each room.
title: Great Product.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Just Saying
content: Great value for the price. Picture quality is good. Nice features. Mobile app is good. I installed an SD card in mine to get continuous recording. Without the SD card, recorded video clips are 10 seconds in length which really isn’t that useful. Knocks are on the camera aesthetics, night vision, and motion tracking. Camera is not the best looking camera but for the price and value, that’s easily overlooked. The night vision works reasonably well, but I have problems with it switching from night vision back to normal vision correctly. Lastly the motion tracking doesn’t work well. The camera moves to quickly and often for the video to be useful, this I’ve disabled that feature. Overall though, this is a great camera with lots of value for the price.
title: Low price, High value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Phillip
content: Amazing security camera and I just the motion detection and fast notification. Dude it sends you a video as soon if something happens for really cheap monthly fee and there is a 12 section for free if you don't want spend for premium wich is enough for most. Stong quality bill and if very good customer service. The only downside is the blue night vision light that is a bit bright for me as im blue light sensitive. I highly recommend this camera
title: Too good bought few more after test

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Elisabeth Matteo
content: Nice camera, works great, has pan and tilt function, good night vision, good motion detection, good Mic. The app on iOS works great too. I don't particularly like having a chinese company having access to my feed through their Wyze server, but if they want to see what's going on in my garage they must be pretty bored. I have had a bit of fun with it and scared my kids by whispering their name thru the speaker while monitoring. Ha!
title: Great camera for a great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: D. Proctor
content: We have six pan cams and one stationary one and I have to say we have been very pleased. It helps give peace of mind when my older mom is home alone. We haven’t had any security concerns, but we also have them on a separate router. We purchased silicone sleeves and they work perfectly outside our home also.
title: Very Pleased

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alan O.
content: These little cameras do so much for the money it's hard to believe. They just work and work and the company continually has firmware upgrade and has amazingly wonderful relationships with their customer base. They appear to be satisfied with making a reasonable profit and therefore sell a very high-quality product for less money than other companies want. We have several in our home and our business now and recommend this camera and there are others highly and without reservation.
title: Great product and amazing customer support at a very fair price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sherly Parra
content: Just a week ago I returned the regular Wyze cam because in over three weeks I never received a push up notification of motion and bought some other camera for $30 which I hated and after one day I ended up returning.  I wanted to love the regular Wyze cam. It had a really good image quality and a convenient design(really small) and the best part was that it costed only $25 but the deal breaker was the whole no notifications thing + it didn’t rotate. However, this more expensive version of the regular Wyze cam is amazing! It’s only $12 more expensive and two times the cam’s size. It rotates, the image quality is absolutely amazing plus it does send notifications!!! I love it!!!
title: Don’t buy the Wyze cam, instead buy the Wyze Cam Pan. Only $12 difference.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Giovanni M.
content: I purchased this as an inexpensive video baby monitor. The video quality in HD mode is great and it even picks up audio. Setup was super simple as was adding it to Alexa. I named the camera after my baby so, on my Fire tablet or my FireTV 4K I can simply say "Alexa, show baby name" and it shows the baby. I can use the app as well, but having Alexa integration is awesome. It can pan, zoom and adjusts when the room goes dark. All it needs is a plug and its ready to go. I can take it with me room to room and plug it in and point it at the baby and have a bit of a leash to cook or do chores and be able to see and hear the baby. Great product with great use cases.
title: Great little cam, very affordable and works with Alexa!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: L. J.
content: I wish all my cameras were as easy as this one to set up.  And then I can simply share the feed with someone else by adding their email address, rather than them having to access the camera and scan codes, etc. One tip from an embarrassing start:  You will get a scan code during the process of set-up.  Let the camera see the scan code on your phone - DON'T try to get your phone to scan the little code sticker on the camera!  Oof. Camera quality is very good.  Night vision is very good.  I've not tried any motion detection or alerts, or saving any video.
title: Great quality and EASY SETUP

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: S. Dragoo
content: I bought two of these cameras, one wouldn't connect to wifi and didn't want to work at all, the other was verrrryyyy interested in my wall- despite being directly in front of a window with dogs and birds outside it, etc. It could be forced to turn toward the window and would rotate itself back toward the wall. We named it Doris. Doris was a bit daft, very fascinated with the blank white wall. Both were sent back to the mothership.
title: Bought two, neither worked

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KGB1973
content: I have no idea how it got such good ratings.  This is an absolute piece of garbage!  In fact, it literally now resides AT THE BOTTOM OF MY GARBAGE CAN! Make sure to set aside about 2 hours to set it up.  It prompts you to scan a QR code, at which point it just sits there and says, "Ready to connect."  No matter what you do, it won't connect.  Maybe after an hour or two you'll finally get lucky. Once I was lucky enough to get it set up, it worked fine for about a month.  Then just started randomly disconnecting from the wifi network.  I was re-setting it up once every couple of weeks.  Done!!  Total waste of money.
title: Garbage!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dee Cee
content: This little camera and the software app is just ok for the price. I was ready to go all in and cover my place with this Wyze cam 2 pan but currently NO Apple HomeKit support or any on the horizon will leave me with just the one I bought for curiosity after hear great things about it. None of their products are HomeKit comparable and the company clearly  doesn’t care to make them so. These app gets a little glitchy sometimes when trying to press buttons or enter text. The pan cam is great but is a little noisy when panning. For now I leave it still and stationary. Best bet is just get the non pan model. I’m looking for other home security and monitoring cameras but one main criteria is HomeKit support and integration.
title: It is an ok webcam but NO HomeKit = hard pass

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joe Brown
content: VERY, VERY, VERY,VERY, VERY slow to respond to movement commands even with a great WIFI connection. Night vision is deplorable and useless. I can almost make out my motorcycle that I know is there in the dark about 6 feet away but beside that it's all completely unrecognizable. Daytime SD quality is OK though. Still VERY, VERY,VERY,VERY slow to react to commands but decent picture quality when it finally lands on desired set point..
title: For the price just OK I guess. VERY,VERY,VERY, VERY slow to react to commands.....

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kau9
content: Bought this to use it primarily live streaming my backyard coop.  After a week of use, I realized that it used my cell data as opposed to my home wifi.  It used 2.2GB data!  There's no config I could tell to change it.  I'm not sure if that's because of my Google Fi plan or the Wyze Cam.  I'm curious to hear if other people experience this. I ended up returning it, and gotten the Yi Home cam.  It doesn't have that cell data usage issue with my home wifi.  So, something is not right with the Wyze Cam...
title: Wyze Pan Cam uses a lot of Google Fi cell data

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: gbjensen
content: Their security cameras are a tremendous value and a fantastic product. Easy to set up.  You will not.be disappointed with the security cameras from Wyze.  I recommend them to all of my friends looking for home camera systems.
title: Wyze products are excellent

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DJ Hobbs
content: I have had these for a couple years and I have recommended them to everyone who needs a security cam but now the cameras no longer detect motion or send notifications.  Without this feature they are only good for remote checking of premises.
title: No more motion detection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Maureen Crawford
content: We have 4 of these cameras.  I wanted my cameras separate from our alarm system in case it was on the fritz, and these are amazing.  I get notifications on my phone when a camera if triggered and can play back the video.  I also VERY impressed with their customer service.  The last camera we ordered seemed to have a software issue; customer service person answered immediately (on a weekend), tried to resolve the problem quickly.  The solution work, the representative was empowered to replace it, and they sent us out a new one.  The whole process was seamless and so quick.  Great customer service and a great product.
title: Repeat customer

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ralph T
title: Why is this Camera constantly hitting google, AMZ, and other overseas server sites ?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: lgkahn
content: Don't bother with the newer pan scan. I got two that work and two that will nit sense movement or record anything.
title: Hit and miss

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: IZ
content: I honestly can't believe the value of this camera. I've been through a lot of these types of cameras, either for myself or helping others, and I've never seen something in the thirty-buck range that comes even close to this. The app is clean and modern and easy, the setup process was a breeze. I was up and going within minutes and it just worked exactly as it says it does. I have an Eero mesh network and it's amazing so I can't speak to any reception issues other people may have. If you have a stable, well-spread wi-fi network I can't imagine you'd have any problems. I'm going to get more, because at this price, why not?
title: Incredible Value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jelena k
content: Nice camera. I use it to monitor my birds. Camera is very quiet and has nice visibility. Sometimes the app takes a little longer to refresh or load, but once it is going, great response from the camera. Will probably get few more for around the house. I turned off motion tracking on mine as it was going crazy qatching the birds 😆 , but I am sure it is a nice feature. I would like if the app would have notifications , for when the camera restarts or needs an update - when the camera automatically restarts, i am not sire if someone has hacked into it,or it has had a software update.
title: Nice camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Yuni
content: Vacation time was here. For the first time in a long while, my husband and I along with family decided to go on a cruise. We needed a watch guard at home, I researched for cameras and the Nest and Arlo both appealed to me. But this guy is dirt cheap but the quality and app is amazing! It is truly a competitor. 14 days of cloud storage for free, the Arlo does 7 for free. It is incredible and I was shocked when it sensed motion when no one was home, but it turned out to be a moth. Amazing.
title: Moth Burglar

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TikiTime
content: Don’t make the same mistake I made and read the description to the bottom. If they sell outdoors covers for this, it must be able to be use outdoors. Wrong. Almost burnt the house down.
title: Absolutely Not For Outdoors

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Zoe Mckee
content: I can’t say enough about how much I love this purchase! I bought the camera because we had workers coming in and out of our home for a couple of months to work on our bathroom. I always get notifications when someone would enter the cameras view. Just today I got a notification that a worker entered our home while my husband and I were 45 minutes away....I was watching the camera because I saw them instigating my cat, then one guy pulled out a broom out of nowhere and started shoving my cat with it! ALL CAUGHT ON CAMERA! I have absolutely ZERO regrets purchasing this camera!!! Do it!!! Easy set up, good quality picture and easy app to use! I advise you purchase an SD card for it as well, not a big deal if you don’t though.
title: You won’t regret buying this!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jacob Kloepper
content: I am a big fan of this system. The camera is cheap and high quality, it doesn’t have a necessary subscription, although they do offer one. The down side is that it’s motion sensing only records for 12 seconds and then doesn’t record again for 5 minutes, but if you buy an SD card you can record continuously and view the playback. I also have a lot of respect for the company, as it has been very honest and clearly focused on providing the best product for its customers, while keeping them safe.
title: Big fan of the Wyze cam!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Biggs Gordon
content: I love this camera. Still working out the detection settings; threw a surprise birthday party for my girl and it detects the slight movement from balloon strings while the AC is on. I love the motion tracking but have since turned it off since the recorded area isn’t that big. Just use motion tagging. Pan scan works well but again kinda useless in a small space. There’s beta for person detection but I haven’t gotten any results from that. 2 way audio could be improved but I don’t really have any complaints on this device
title: Amazing camera. Recommend for all

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tim B
content: I just received this yesterday and took a few try's to set up. Kept timing out on the setup, after about 4 try's of getting out of the program and starting over it finally connected. Its been working great ever since. I put it on motion detection and it follows the dog everywhere so we can see what they are doing when we are not home. The sound isn't that clear when you speak but that's ok, we have it turned off because its below the TV and we usually leave the TV on all day when gone. . I love the fact that it can pan 360 to almost let you see the whole room.  let you see the whole house. For the price and functions I would definately recommend.
title: Great Camera for the Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: 🍕  izza
content: Was working good up until about a week ago when the new update was installed now the camera doesn't work at all. *******UPDATE****** I emailed the company and they sent me out another camera which is working fine must have been the camera because I just updated this camera with the same update and all is well. Great customer service Wyze***** would give 5 stars but first camera wasn't right still amazing customer service!
title: Camera stopped working after last update?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tiffany Dao
content: So I’ve owned two wyze cams (one v2 and one pan) and both have worked pretty well. The only thing I’m a little bit iffy about is that the micro sd for the wyze pan cam sometimes becomes disconnected. While the micro sd is in the cam, it sometimes say “no micro sd”, even though there was an sd card (and the space of the sd card isn’t even full 32 gbs). This only occurs for the wyze pan cam, and it gets pretty annoying. Otherwise, great product for its price!
title: Micro-SD card sometimes gets disconnected.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kanoo
content: Worked ok for a while but there are so many bugs due to buggy software updates etc. The cam will not reliably record and actual app is terrible in terms of usability if I had not already invested in this camera setup I would have deleted the app long ago. Not reliable. Not acceptable as a home security cam. The time investment you’ll also have to make trying to fix issues or realising there is no playback when you want to check the footage negates its ‘affordable’ price. It’s just not worth it. The problems seem to have accelerated over the past few months. Why don’t you QA your releases properly Wyze?
title: Won’t reliably record, buggy software - avoid

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: pbulls
content: I can’t comment as to the quality of the camera’s video or night vision because I can’t set it up. It appears you need a specific level of security over your wireless router for this camera to connect.  It’s a security feature for the manufacturer.  They don’t tell you this in any of the info when you order.  Their tech support is not very responsive at all so I can’t get the information I need to have my internet service provider open a new secured port to connect the camera.  So I’ve paid for a camera and memory card I currently can’t use.  I would not have bought this camera had I known any of this.  I have now emailed them three times and called once where I was left on  hold for 20 minutes only to have a recording tell me no one was available and they hang up!  I would not buy this camera nor any product from this company every again.
title: Horrible customer service! Camera won't connect!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marc Davies
content: Great picture and motion detection works well.  Only problems are there is absolutely no 2-way communication.  Using my mobile device I can clearly hear what the camera picks up but the cameras built in speaker is absolute junk.  No matter what I do the person in front of the camera can't hear anything you say.  I have checked all the settings and am very tech savvy so I know what I'm doing.  I returned my 1st camera and tried another and still nothing.  Also,  can't get it to recognize any 32g micro sd I use.  I've put 2 brand new ones in and formatted them with the app and then nothing.
title: Good for watching and listening only

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TheGadgetMan
content: Summary Affordably wireless camera solution that has features such panning, both SD & cloud storage, voice,  you normally would find on a cam priced much higher. The Good Easy set up, IFTTT, Quality HD recording, Clear Night Vision. The Bad If your goal is to use as a security cam then you to go through 3 steps just to arm it, plus you have to do this with each cam also!  No desktop software. Final Thoughts This product needs a simple arm button in the the main menu.
title: Strong Hardware but weak software

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Doroth Stinchcomb
content: I love it and now my Father has passed the camera still will be in use for watching outside my home where my other cameras can't see, but it watched my Daddy real good even when I had to leave him with someone else it was comforting to know that I can just take out my cell phone and check in and it recorded sounds and being able to move it well let's just say I was surprise the big power this little cam has and he easy hookup nice.  Very good product.
title: Watching without being there.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anatolian
content: I have now bought 4 of these cameras, and for the price and the features, it's very hard to beat. The quality is great at this  very low price point. I really can't find anything to complain about, especially when I compare this to other Pan/Tilt cameras that I have spent about 4~6 times more, for the same features. In fact, there is really two things that I wish this had which is POE and maybe a IP-67 rating.  I have mounted these upside down under eaves of my house, with just enough space for the lens to get a clear view across the street.  It tracks everything very well and seems to be holding up to the high heat in Sacramento. It is NOT in direct sunlight. I also have a 256 GB card installed. So far so good.
title: Best bang for the buck...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: McNicholls Boodram
content: Okay first if all let me start off by saying the wyze cam v2 is astoundingly and very impressive. However, this cam pan is a complete and utter headache. I have had it for roughly a week mounted with a weatherproof silicone housing and wall mount designed specifically for it and it seems to be rebooting ever so often during the day. Secondly the power cable is slightly touching the panning part every time it swings and I constantly have to slide the end inside a little bit because it loses power. It is freaking annoying. It's starting to piss me off.
title: Power loss and Multiple reboots daily

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jorge
content: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom does not work.  I have had it for about 5 months and it really does not work.  I have moved it 5 times from the original place.  I bought a SD to record and once the SD is full it does not work  I have turn it off and re-program it and remove the SD each time it is a pain to have to do that each time.  I have no Issues with the other small camera.  I regret buying it, I should have stuck to the small one.  If I could return it I would.  I should have return it once I saw the problem, but because of the Covid-19, I have not been out of my house for 3 months now.  Now i'm stuck with it and wasted money on it.
title: Does not work with the SD card

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Douglas R. Coates
content: I purchased three of these cameras to check on our pets evoke we were traveling outside the country.  I could not have been more pleased.  Setup was a breeze and the daytime picture quality is excellent.  The night vision is ok and one camera is worse than the other two.  I have bought cameras much more expensive that did not written as well.  Overall we are very pleased with how these performed.
title: If using for security, night vision is not the best

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: adrian achong
content: Worked perfectly fine for about a little less than a month. All of a sudden I get the offline message after the camera light turned from blue to yellow. I tried everything to set it up again to no avail. After pressing the reset button under the camera you’re supposed to hear a voice prompt to take you to the next step. It just would not go into reset mode. I pressed on the button for about 30 seconds and nothing. I am returning. Home security is a big deal. Cameras cannot be failing with no way of being fixed and after trying to reach out all I got was an email. No phone and I do not like companies that only do customer service, especially on electronics, via email. They should have a phone number!!! The reply was that I’d get a reply after 48 to 72 hours. I do not want to wait that long for a maybe resolution. I’m returning this product and I will be looking for a more reliable replacement. They need to make sure there units are in proper working order. When it comes to security cameras especially in the world we live in today, it’s the difference between life or death.
title: Just stopped working!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Hog Nation
content: What!? I stumbled across this product on Amazon when I was in search of an in-home security video camera. How incredibly lucky was I? This video camera is perfect! Easy to setup! Full featured! Alexa enabled! Free 14 day cloud video storage! Local micro SD storage capabilities! Easy to use mobile app interface! Everything someone looks for in a home security camera and then some! Wow! This item shouldn't be a "stumble upon item". When people search for in-home security cameras on Amazon, this should be the first one on the list! Highly recommended!
title: Awesome Product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A M
content: This product must be what living in the future is like. At $35 bucks, why go for a Ring or any other of those overpriced pieces of junk. With some mounts, and a wired electricity connection, you can get this camera mounted outside, inside, or wherever else you need to, and you get free cloud storage for a rolling 30 days for any motion or sound detected and the thirty second period after that. That alone is worth the price of admission. I've been impressed with this product and the abuse I've put it through -- I routinely just disconnect it without turning it off from within the app, and it's still going strong. And the updates! The firmware updates have made a huge difference, and the app works perfectly. A great device. Even just as a toy to play around with.
title: At $35 bucks, exceptional. This is the future. Underrated

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tricky Ricky
content: Total piece of s#&t. I have battled these 2 cameras of and on since I installed then. Recurring problems with Loss of Connection and Can't Read Memory Card or No Card Inserted. I have replaced my Xfinity modem/ router and bought a new high end 2nd router. I have replaced memory cards twice. Complete waste of my time and effort.
title: Don't waste your money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Decco
content: You really can't beat these Wyze Cams.  Image quality is not noticeably better or worse than higher priced cameras I've seen and the price is a fraction of those.  Can't say 1080 is very good regardless of the camera.  I really like the ability to pan and there are no subscription fees.  Motion detection is sensitive.  With pets, I can't leave the camera on without getting notifications all day long.  And the camera is well built.  For the cost, can't afford to not have some of these.
title: Best value for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AZCharlie01
content: I was amazed at ow much solid tech I found in this inexpensive camera. My cell is an LG K7 running Android 5.1.1, and the Wyze software didn't fit it very well. The various controls for panning, motion tacking, etc. showed only icons with the labels obscured. The rotation circle was only 1/2' across and almost impossible to manipulate.  The beta software had much better settings but the same problems of not fitting on my phone's screen. Many of its features and ability to detect were good, but the options were not explained clearly. This may develop into something great but it isn't there for all users.
title: Great Technology but Flawed Software

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C. Moore
content: I love it.. works great with my echo show, picture clarity is really good, I’ve said nothing but good things about these cameras and for the price you can’t beat it.. I will update more later I’m gonna test it outside, I’m a protective case... if it breaks I’ll just buy another... sound is good also, I just don’t use my sound inside, the playback is great too, I’ve bought an sd card for more storage, so if you’re looking for security this is worth every penny
title: Best product for the buck!!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Steve k
content: These cameras are better than cameras costing up to 10x the price. I set up a network of these for a fraction of the cost of a security cam system. The sd card storage allows for plenty of playback time and the app has many great features. These were extremely easy to set up and use and many people can join the network. The two way communications are just good in a quiet environment as the speaker level is low. One of the best things is that because these have plenty of local storage capability ( add 32gb mini sd card) and you don't have to pay for a cloud storage fee if you wish to have playback features.
title: WOW!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MacKensye
content: The one thing it didn't ask me to star was internet connection quality. I was able to use this product just fine for three months. After that, it quit connecting to my network. I made no changes to my network, so I contacted customer service and it was very round about in a sense that they would ask if the problem was fixed, I'd say no, then they would send another email asking if it was fixed? I unplugged it, re hooked it up, restarted it multiple times, deleted app, set it up, and it wouldn't work. No internet connection. Doesn't connect to this day.
title: Quit connecting to WiFi after three months

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Don
content: The camera was easy to set up and operated. The picture quality is okay as long as it stays in one place. I don't know if my Internet is the issue or camera is slow on refreshing the image whenever I use the pan feature. Also,  the quality of the sound is poor. It sounds like using a walkie talkie from the built-in speaker of the camera. It seems right from the mobile device via the app. This may be the speaker on the camera instead of the Internet speed. I do have 1G of Internet bandwidth.
title: It's usable if you don't. You can ignore the nuances.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wonbo
content: Even at this incredibly low price, I am not satisfied with the product. Night vision is bad past 8 feet. When I leave home to run errands, I do not receive notifications on moving objects (like my dog), even though detection zone is properly set, and sensitivity is set to high. Lastly, Wyze advertises this product to be compatible with Google hub (now Nest hub), but I simply get a black screen with the text "Sorry it looks like that stream isn't available right now".
title: Unreliable, not compatible with Nest hub

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: luisanna urbina
content: Works great for the price. You can download the app for the phone but it really only works great with the main app. I used the second app my husband has the main app. My labs and sometimes doesnt load right but the person who has the main login works great. You can also talk threw it and the recording is great. I would buy it again for sure.
title: Great!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Deb
content: Set up was simple and the apps not bad, but getting it to stay connected to the network and access it from my phone or iPad through the app is insane. It works for a a few minutes, disconnects, tries to connect, spins around and returns error 27. I've check by router signal strength and speed and they are fine. I've tried it day and night. I have absolutely no issues with my Amazon cloud camera or my NEST thermostat which are both connected to the same router. I try to access the Wyze camera through the phone app and it randomly connects. I immediately try my NEST and Amazon camera and they both come on line in a snap. They are very reliable. I guess that's why this camera costs $40 and the Amazon camera is over $100. I'm sending it back tomorrow any buying another Amazon Cloud camera.
title: Camera continuously connects and disconnects from the network.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Just Emily
content: This product could not be easier to use or less expensive. Set up is a breeze and I have recommended this camera to at least ten people. After they see how easy it is to view their loved one from their phone and move around the app. Perfect for that aging family member that craves independence. If I call and she doesn’t answer her phone, I can hop on and call out for her. Or see her sleeping in the chair. This is a great asset.
title: The best camera & piece of mind!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mine Your Own
content: Today November 16th, just over a year of usage the item, I am sad to report, has just died. No connection what so ever. Of course, it's too late to return the item.  Until today she as functioned as expected and I was very pleased. But to last only 13 months? Some would say, for the price what should I expect. Well, for the price I expect it to last otherwise the manufacturer should state that it only lasts one year.  She was only used while out of the house. Turned off upon return.  So sad.
title: Great until it died.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Samu
content: I really wanted to like this little affordable camera but try as I may, I can’t. The only think great about it is the picture quality. It cannot be used as a babycam or security cam or cam for anything that requires immediate response. It disconnects and try to reconnect just when you are trying to view it. Never stays connected and takes a long time to reconnect thereby rendering whatever you were trying to look st useless as that event has moved on.
title: You get what you pay for: a toy. Not for serious use.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: roko kero
content: Not that great. At first I liked it but after buying another one for I think 5 bucks less on sale. I realized the quality difference. The one from littlelf is much better. Easier connection. Less issues with reboots. And most importantly was the 2 way audio. On the Wyze you’d an barely hear what I’m saying so the kids have trouble and the dog just hears scratchy voices. The other one I bought for around the same price but the functionality is much better and seems more durable
title: There are better for the same price range

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Demetria
content: Bought this as an alternative for a baby monitor. Great quality picture. Can pan 360° and zoom-picture does blur when zooming in though. Night vision aspect is great and clear as well. Mic also functions properly. I’ve had for about 3 weeks now and the camera sometimes freezes or lags when on. Not sure yet if it’s a WiFi, camera, or app problem—other than that would buy again. Does what it’s supposed to and for the price can’t really complain.
title: Does its job

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Georgia C
content: We were using a different camera Swann  to watch our dogs.  The other camera didn't tilt down enough for us to view them on the floor.  After searching found this camera with the tilt we were looking for still not a great tilt but was good enough.  Mainly using this camera to watch our dogs when we are out it is horrible.  Takes forever to authenticate then its staggered, blurry, panning is blurry, it's slow to pan and tilt thinking of returning it going to try again next time we are out but sure doesn't work as great as our Swann may just buy another  Swann and deal with the restricted tilt has to be better than waiting for authentication and trying to use the camera to see our dogs.
title: Not the greatest

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: dj
content: Love this camera. Like the way I can pan and view the whole room when I am not at home. The phone app works great and there is no noticeable lag time in live view. I purchased more expensive camera in the past but so wish I had of brought these first. Now I have more expensive camera in my closet because the Wyze out perform them. With any security camera the software is the key to a good one. Most camera 1080 are going to perform about the same no matter how much you pay but the software set it apart. Wyze has proven you can make a good camera with great software at a decent price. Highly recommend this camera.
title: Great Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: z4q5
content: 9/10/20 Updating to one star. Purchased a second camera for our office and it wouldn't get past the initial setup steps. Received a replacement and exact same issue happened. Total waste of money. ---- original review below ---- Perfect for our purposes. Just use it sometimes when we need to leave our dog home alone. Can't get much better for the price. You can pan and zoom, it also has night mode, and you can speak through it if you like. The app is great. Easy to set up with the camera and easy to use.
title: Garbage

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DLG
content: I didn't think this would be any big deal, as I bought it early enough in advance to make sure it worked for a vacation we were going on. Everything was fine until the first few days of the vacation when it refused to load a live picture. Software says to cycle the camera. Really? How is that supposed to happen from a thousand miles away? Then I get a notice company is having some sort of problem and will update. A few days later I try to download updates and it fails. So, in summery, it will be weeks before I can get there to unplug it and plug it back in to see if it works. This is not a camera you can depend upon, more of a kid's toy. I will be crushing it so it can't cause anybody else any grief. I should have known better than to buy it in the first place, should have spent more to begin with.
title: Not worth postage to send back!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Matthew
content: The camera itself seems to be of high quality. Easy set up and excellent features. However, connectivity is an issue. After initial trouble with setup, I learned the camera does not support 5GHz (most modern modems use 5 GHz). That was my fault for not reading the description closer, so be aware. I switched my connection to 2.4 GHz (luckily I have modems that offer that feature) and it seemed to work perfectly..... until I left the house. Being less than a mile away, I found that connectivity would drop after 5 seconds precisely and I would have to restart the Wyze app. This is not a modem/internet issue as I connected to a separate modem in my home. Same issue. My cell phone also had 5/5 bars during the live stream. You will be able to watch a live stream, as long as you manually restart the Wyze app every 5-8 seconds. The entire point of this is to be able to flawlessly check in on your household from a distance, without interruption. In summary, great product, sketchy connection issues.
title: Quality camera, horrible connectivity

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SceneOne4teen
content: Again, this is another product from Wyze that i have purchased, and so far they are working great. i cant speak on the long term use as this is my first week with two Wyze Cams the features on the Wyze cam Pan is awesome i love that you can zoom and pan with a swipe of your finger on the screen and it is very responsive. Furthermore set up is easy and size is perfect. cant wait to see more Wyze products in the future , at first i was Skeptical but now im a fan.. Please come out with a We Mo smart plug equivalent .
title: Awesome design and interface., Please come out with a We Mo smart plug equivalent

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C. Boon
content: STOP LOOKING... THIS IS THE ONE YOU WANT!!!! I’m on my 3rd camera system in 3 years and finally found this amazing product. This Pan Cam system (I bought 4) is outstanding. I never give anything 5/5 stars because I always imagine that there could be something better, but this Pan Cam deserves a full 5 stars! From the tech/product aspect (both hardware and software are top notch), to the super easy, user-friendly interface that even my 75yr old father could use, to the ease of setup (3mins per camera), to the “smart home” extended capabilities (ie. “Hey Pan Cam, if no motion is detected then turn off the lights in the kitchen”) , to the SUPER LOW PRICE (these could be 50-75% more expensive in my opinion)... Kudos to the Wyze team as they have done an incredible job!!! I’m about to buy more for my 2nd home now. I thank you.
title: STOP LOOKING... THIS IS THE ONE YOU WANT!!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Edmachi
content: If you have any issues expect terrible support from Wyze and be ready to go around and around only to be told after 4 months the device is our of warranty. Buy it cause is cheap and if any issues toss it in the trash and buy another or spend some money for a quality product
title: When it works is good for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Patti Jo Anwiler
content: These are great cameras!!!! They are easy to use and have so many options. I was trying to get a security system from a big company that the company monitors. I live in a rural area where they don’t offer it. The employee told me his friend had these cameras and it might be a good option. I thought I would give them a try and I absolutely love them. Customer support needs a little improvement in that when you call you have to leave a message and the live chat seems to work best. Emailing you seem to wait at least a day for a response. Bit the camera themselves are great and so is the price.
title: Great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Flip
content: Nice lil camera.... awesome quality, i would recommend you purchase a SD Card for long recording time.. one thing that bothered me was that you are only able to record -record when you are in the app but once you exit out the recording stops... But I does record motions if you set up that feature and it will definitely notify you via phone, whenever motion is detected.. overall i would recommend it to others, My cousin recommended it to me, after seeing he had one and how it worked... I will be ordering more for sure,🙂🙂🙂
title: Get’er done !!! Lol

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: VIN
content: So far just testing for watching pets and never failed me yet in a month or so. Every time I logged in outside of LAN it worked. Reading all the bad reviews I’m waiting for some kind of failure but nothing yet : Update after approximately a year. Stability is dropping having and issues keeping it connected to my LAN. Also support dropped and their forum software doesn’t work on my iPhone. This decrease is quality usually happens when companies get bigger! Maybe it has to do with relying on China to much :/ Getting worse and worse as time goes on! Support is garbage too!
title: Decrease in stability and support (updated)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Aliah Sweere
content: This is one of the best purchases I think I've ever made on Amazon. The quality for the price cannot be beat. We use it as a baby monitor and its perfect. You can hear, zoom in on, talk to, and record/take pics of the baby. The night vision is amazing and the quality of the picture is great. I can't recommend this camera enough. For 1/3 of the price to normal cameras, this is a great option that will surprise you.
title: Best purchases ever

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: June
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. no issues with my first one i bought three more constantly lose wifi connection and they keep turning head every 5 minutes like they are possessed the gesturing loving camera point sissy work and then out of no where one started making this very loud noise i couldn’t stop it unless i unplugged it see video attached no customer service no number to call that is alarming right there
title: none existing customer service camera keeps losing wifi and keeps making noises

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Q. Wang
content: My cameras were doing OK. Today, February 3 2019, The software prompted me to install a new update and now none of my cameras work anymore. I emailed the company. Stay tuned. ***UPDATE*** The company replied (on the next day!) and sent me some simple instructions. I followed the instructions and it didn’t work. I emailed them to say that their instructions didn’t work.  Stay tuned.
title: You get what you pay for :-( cameras died after company's  software update

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: sdw
content: Friends tried a couple home camera systems that were quite expensive and were not happy with the picture quality.  The Wyze Cam Pan was impressive for a far lower cost.  I bought three.  Delivered the next day and in use within an hour of delivery.  I am smart phone ignorant and watched the recommended you tube video.  Set up was quick and painless.  The picture is great.  I am still playing with the sound but no complaints.  I really like the motion detection and tracking functions.  My use is mostly personal interest watching my dogs but the system is good for home security as well.
title: Easy Set Up, Quality Picture

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael Tichvon
content: I have been very happy with my unit. Recently I recommended to a buddy and he bought 3, one indoors and the other two mounted exterior under covered patio and front entrance. All 3 of his units had defective night vision. Never worked. He contacted WYZE and they said no warranty as 2 were outside. THATS BS!!!!! Seriously, what’s going on? It’s clear there is a problem at WYZE with quality as all 3 had same defect, night vision inop. And they wouldn’t even do an exchange for new units. Again, mine works great indoors and night vision darn good. So beware.
title: NOT FOR OUTDOOR USE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bob C
content: The Wyze family of security cameras are some of the easiest to set up and use. They provide a lot of features, with easy to use software for a very low cost. The configuration process has been made extremely easy, and so is the free monitoring software for your phone and tablet. You can even view the cameras video through your TV with a Amazon FireTV Cube connected.  You can have monitoring for your smoke alarm through the camera's microphone. No service contract to pay for. It's no wonder that Wyze has sold over a million of these.  -BC
title: Nice camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mr Nanay
content: Order one (4th Wyze camera ordered) and within one day the SD recording failed.  Had to restart and reformat several times.  Switched SD cards with other Wyze cameras without any trouble, but the camera still failed after around one day.  had it replaced with an identical camera.  The new camera has the same issue. will work for about a day and then fail. Says there is no SD card.  have to reset it for it to be recognized. Tired of having to reset it every day.  Would love to return it, but Amazon only allows a 30 day window for return.  Guess I'm stuck with a broken camera.
title: SD recording is crap as is the 30 day return window.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Emanuel
content: Overall for the price this camera has a lot of features and works pretty well, and hook up was a breeze... but i have noticed over the past month that the camera pans on its own when it is not set to do that... so i have to move the camera back into position. It has done that to me 5 times now in the last 30 days and it's making me mad. I don't know if it is a glitch in the system or did i get a faulty camera, but if it wasn't for that problem of it moving on me and getting out of it's set position i would have given it a 5 star rating, so i can only give 3 stars because of this problem
title: Camera moves when it is not suppose to

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stephen S.
content: You can't go wrong for the price. My only gripe is that when motion is detected it will only record for 12 seconds if you don't have a memory card in it.  I would prefer for it to record for 30 and give 7 days to view it for free vs the 14 days you get for free.  Other then that this camera is very cool. If you were to have an intruder the camera will follow them all around the house on its own.  You can also adjust the viewing angle yourself through the app.  You can listen and talk through the app as well.  It's crazy that this camera is sold for $30ish dollars. Worth every penny.
title: Great bang for buck!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: NS
content: If you’re cheap. These are good. They won’t work as security cameras. It only records about 12 seconds at a time I think, then it stops recording and doesn’t start again for another minute or so, even if there’s motion.
