I returned them because I needed actual security cameras. I don’t understand the 12 second record... for what purpose would you need such a short time frame? I did like the live view and that it tilts and zooms. That’s probably the best feature. This is an indoor pet or baby monitor live view cam and not much else.
title: Not a security camera but live view cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robert Robert
content: I bought these along with two Reolink cameras, and I the picture quality is probably a little superior. All in all, they are as good as advertised. However, I do use the Reolink. I don't use these. They are sitting in a box. Why? Because as much as I tried to get around it, the fact of the matter is that the power cord is a big hassle. I would LOVE to use these outside (you can get a weatherproof cover for it), but it needs to be near a power outlet. And I'm sure I could find a way to use them inside by hiding the cord, but whatever. I haven't done it yet and I bought them months ago.
title: As good as advertised, but they really need a battery option.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TmnA
content: We really had high hopes for this camera but after using it for a few months it just isn’t reliable. It constantly freezes when we try to check the camera on our phones and randomly flashes an obnoxious blue light that wakes up our baby.
title: Not reliable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Elswiki
content: This is a replacement for the broken one that lasted like 1 year and 1 month, which was a little outside the warrantied timeframe. I bought this once again hoping this one lasts longer as the other cams are much more expensive. Wyze.com seems to update the system fairly often but as the other reviewers have mentioned, the security of this cam is very low, so I wouldn't use this for a private area.
title: Okay for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jay C.
content: Video Quality: Grainy and its ok at best. Not what I expected when it boats HD quality Audio: Hearing works fine but when trying to speak via app, it doesn't work. (many other users have claimed the same issue) Operation: Wonky at best, Not a smooth movement and it jumps. No way to do small movements to pan the room. For something super cheap, it works, just don't expect much out of it. (I think my 10 year old webcam has better quality than this)
title: It works for what it is (You get what you pay for) but audio doesn't work.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JoanD
content: I like that it has motion tracking. We use it to randomly monitor my 94-yr old mom who sometimes falls on her patio deck. We can also turn the camera to focus on her medicine counter and check that she is on track for the day. She would not wear a fall-alert monitor around her neck. Also, saves on those monthly fees. We added a memory card so we can review the previous 24-hr activities if needed.
title: affordable & effective senior monitoring

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: aar5130
content: It worked for 1 day, and the next day it stopped working(turned on and shut down in seconds), i contacted their support who asked me where i got it from and basically told me to return and replace the camera without offering much help. Horrible product and even worse customer service.
title: Dont buy this

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jessica
content: I bought this camera so I could watch my cats while I was away on a long trip. It has a great panning feature so I could scan around the room and then zoom in when I spotted them. I only "talked" through the camera once and they could clearly hear me from the other end of my apartment. If you're looking for a detailed image, this may not be the camera for you, but just being able to see my kitties having a nap or playing for the other side of the world was awesome. I can't really comment on the night vision since my apartment is by a streetlamp and it never gets fully dark, but I was pleased with the quality overall. I had a little trouble getting it set up, but nothing unplugging it and plugging it back in didn't immediately fix.
title: Excellent quality for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jimmy
content: This is a fantastic purchase for anyone needing a straightforward Wi-Fi camera to monitor their pets to make sure they don’t destroy your home. Easy to set up through the app, the only advice would be that you would need to connect to a 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi network. Manually moving the camera with the app is fantastic and the two way audio is amazing! Night mode also works great as well. This is fantastic for what you pay for. Will buy another one and recommend to others to buy one as well!
title: Awesome Wi-Fi camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dianna
content: I love this camera!!  It’s my doggy cam, I named Skoshi after my awesome dog. I leave her home alone and now I can watch her and talk to her.  But best of all, this camera and its app will detect your fire alarm and CO2 alarms.  Now when I’m gone, I’ll get alerts if I’m away and these alarms go off.  Also since I’m a single woman, I can set the camera to the front door and will know (while in my bedroom) if someone is at my door.  The night vision is very clear and the face recognition is amazing.  I have already recommended thus to all my friends. Thinking about another one for outside.
title: Best thing I’ve bought for my new home

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: yenalsekim
content: Nowhere near as good as they say it is. Will not record events unless connected to the internet?!?! WTF is that? That is not secure at all. why on Earth should a camera need to connect to an external server to put data on its own SD card? That is not secure. Image quality is pretty good. Software could be better. Mechanically it's alright. Did I mention that unsecure security camera issue where it needs the internet to work? Who is this camera communicating with? What info is it sending out? Please provevyour answers.
title: Needs the internet to record on SD???!!!?!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jnap132
content: I can sum this up by saying pay heed to the negative reviews!!  Thought I would give it a try, and have no idea how this gets positive reviews unless the product quality is that hit and miss or if all the positive reviews are sponsored. I was told at work that you always start a review with a positive,  - the video quality is very good and sharp. The color of the camera is pictured white and it did arrive white. That's all I got. SD cards - believe the negative. First off, it takes about 25 times pushing one in before it locks or it just keeps popping up like bread that's been in the toaster 20 minutes. I never chose for it to format it. Going to the app, says no SD card. WTF. After removing it and 75 depressions getting it locked in, same thing. Put the SD in my laptop, and what do you know. It's bricked worthless junk now. Don't do what I did and try another or like me you will have 2 bricked SD cards. Tried 1 new one and 1 known good one. Now have 2 that are destroyed and not recoverable as they are not recognized in anything. The audio - I can hear the person near the camera, they could hear me if they were to pick it up and hold it to their ear. Pretty much sums up how great that is. motion detection seems to be on it's own. With all motion settings turned off, the camera would just start whirring away, moving back and forth. Night vision, if there is anything resembling even a dim bright spot, the bloom effect is overpowering and you can't make out anything. This cam is like a piece of gum - it's sweet at first, then after you chew it a little...… it's time to spit it out. I would've included pictures but it is on it's way back. Too bad SD cards weren't heavier...…… at least I would have paperweights.
title: strongly do not recommend

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jett
content: I dont know how wyze can put out such a cheap camera that works this well. Pan and tilt work flawlessly. Picture quality is way above the standard at this price. Night mode is very clear. I will only buy wyze cameras for my home
title: very much recommended

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tyler Worthington
content: I was so excited about this camera and really wanted to like it.... it has so many features... and unfortunately, it doesn’t do ANYTHING well! The app is a disaster, riddled with freezes and bugs requiring many force quits. The camera wouldn’t firmware update... failed multiple times until my friend, whom had the same issue, walked me thru the procedure to force reset the cam manually and update it. Overall the feature set is great but the IR sucks and the picture quality absolutely blows from an iPhone. There’s no chance this thing is truly 1080p.
title: Garbage! Spend the extra money and get a nest cam!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wayne Cassineri
content: There’s not much I can say about this camera except for wow what an amazing device for the price. Easy to use a decent app. I would say they need to come up with some type of desktop app so you can monitor the cameras all the time from your house. But for $39 shipped to you it beats $300 camera and som there’s not much I can say about this camera except for wow what an amazing device for the price. Easy to use a decent app. I would say they need to come up with some type of desktop app so you can monitor the cameras all the time from your house. But for $39 shipped to you it beats $300 camersd
title: Wow !!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Seth
content: I'm so glad I found the Wyze cameras. I was about to spend a few hundred bucks on the Arlo, and I just did a last-minute Google search on wifi security cameras. I've now purchased 2 of these, and they work well for the price. (Considering the amazing price compared to its competitors) Cons: They're not wireless. This limits where I put them (would have to re-wire for the porch, for example). The video quality at night isn't out of this world, but it still gets the job done. All in all, if you're looking for a security/baby camera, and you're price-conscious, DEFINITELY give this a try. I should also mention that my first camera didn't work, and both Wyze and Amazon offered a replacement instantly.
title: Great camera at a remarkable price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: David Wood
content: I have been using the Wyze Pan indoor camera for nearly a week now.  I am very happy with the product and believe it to be a great value.  Setup was very easy, the mobile app is intuitive and a breeze to use the basic functions.  The picture quality in color, black & white, and night vision are good.  Zero issues accessing the camera from my home WiFi or from miles away using my LTE mobile network.  Pan, tilt, and power on/off worked flawlessly so far from the mobile app. I rate this product a 4.5 star and will update to a 5 star once Google Assistant and/or Google Home Hub are supported. Based on the support forums (which have active participation), I anticipate these feature to be available in the near future - possibly by the end of this month!
title: Great value, easy setup

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Leslie
content: While the camera is working, it’s perfect. But it doesn’t always connect to the app, and customer support is TERRIBLE! My camera hasn’t been able to connect for a month, even after troubleshooting it on my own, I finally decided to contact Wyze customer support thinking it would be an easy fix. Going on 2 weeks now and my case has been handed down to 3 different people so far, and none have given me a solution. They leave me hanging, I respond to what they need to know and I don’t get a response back. At this point I’ve asked for them to just replace my camera since it’s not even a year old, I don’t seem to be getting any luck with them, and because I NEED one. Yet, still nothing. I’m frustrated with them and now know I will NOT be purchasing any more Wyze products.
title: Terrible Customer support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ventura
content: These Cameras are sweet. fantastic easy WiFi. Must purchase a 32Gb Memory card to go with. fully viewable from phone app. not required to remove the Memory card to view content. This is a no brainer. !!!!!!!!!!
title: Simple answer, Your a Fool if you dont purchase at least one to play with

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Donaldson
content: We already had a Wyze camera. Cheap and good at the same time. We think we had a squirrel in our attic so I bought the Pan model, put it up in the crawl space, and I can now view the trap I set without having to get a ladder to climb up there. There was already an AC outlet up there to power the camera. It's on 24/7 and will send me a notification if any critters trip the camera. Nice that I can pan to see all around. The night light isn't as bright with the Pan as it is with the V2 though. I wish they would improve that.
title: Nice addition

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J.S. Lohr
content: Just about everything is okay with the camera except for the fact that the camera rotates on its own... A LOT. I have three of the cameras set up in various spots around my apartment and, while they are supposed to be pointing towards specific spots, I *frequently* find them pointing in the wrong direction. For example, the two I have set up to point out windows are frequently found turned completely the wrong way, pointing towards the blinds instead of outside the window. (Please note that I keep the firmware updated on all three cameras.) Per this, I would very strongly advise getting the cheaper version of the camera that doesn't rotate. Or, to the team at Wyze: maybe find some way of locking or disabling the rotation...? Don't have much use for a security camera that can't stay turned in the right direction.
title: I would suggest buying the version that doesn't rotate

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: X
content: The cam is perfect!  I should have bought this before buying a Ring cam which is four times the price.  It pans/tilt to follow moving subjects and super easy to set up.  What's even better is that you don't have to subscribe to a monthly service and save to a micro SD card (32 GB max but wish it could be more).  I will most certainly buy more indoor cams and can't wait when the outdoor is available.
title: Wyze cam...WOW for the function and price point no one else can compare.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jonathan Baker
content: Overall, based off of features, build, price, etc, I give it a 5 star.  But this is NOT a 5 star camera.  This is NOT Ring quality software.  It has issues, it bugs every now and then, and live feeds tends to digimosh.  But all the issues I have are strictly on the web/app end.  It occassionally disconnects, which can be an issue.  As of now I haven't been able to get the app to recognize that my camera has an SD card.  But, unless you are looking for top quality and willing to spend big money, I'd recomend this for people who even have money to blow on big names.  The issues can be overlooked, and I'm sure will be fixed in the future.
title: Great for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Timothy Taft
content: I sure do like Wyze products, but saying that here is what I think of the pan cam. It is just okay the night vision is great and the picture is good. The software that drives it needs work, I have eight cameras on there own dedicated network and the pan cam is the only one that gives me any issues. The movement is very erratic when manually panning over the internet often freezes and disconnects. It does work great just don't move it with the software.
title: I good but needs work software wise.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jfinny
content: Unbelievable, I cannot understand how all the buyers of these cameras are not indignant and outraged about a Chinese company that insists you grant them permission to access all of your files and photos on all devices using their software! I am further agast, that Amazon allows the sale of these products on their site !! Is everyone really allright with this, or have you all ignored that part of the software setup! I We all need to post this privacy intrusion on all of our facebook sites and retail sites where Wyze are sold. In addition we need to ask our Federal representatives aware of this and insist on investigation or at the very list, ban them from selling units in the U.S.
title: Cameras are NOT USABLE, until you give Wyze permission to look/access ALL your files !!!!!!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: E. Paige Burks
content: I got this camera because my son is now in a toddler bed and our old camera's night vision is garbage. This camera is great. The night vision is good, it tracks motion so if he gets out of bed it will alert me, and it has a 360-pan so I can see the whole room. And for the price... I should have gotten this camera two years ago instead of the garbage Motorola camera I've been limping along with.
title: I should have gotten this a long time ago.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robert Philp
content: The camera works well, but it is only viewable with the app.  You cannot use this to share video to a web-page without reflashing the ROM, which is not a task most people are up to. The security provided by the app seems good, but it also means you can only view it on your phone.  You cannot view it on a computer, which is a bit limiting.  If you give someone access to the camera, they have ALL access, video, audio, pan tilt, everything.
title: Good picture, but locked into their app.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Fuyi Lo
content: Cons 1. Take long time to turn it on or off on app, always failed on the first try (even under the same wifi). - I guess this could be solved by app update. 2. Can only record for 14 days no matter how big your microSD card is. Based on the product description it sounds like notification can be saved for 14 days on the cloud but didn't mention that the local storage can only save the record for 14 days as well. Why not let it keep recording until it capped the max capacity? (Correct me if there's a way to change the set-up to keep the history more than 14 days. I select "continuous recording" in the local storage and see only 0.5G/30GB used but can only see past 14 days record.) 3. You can set up for motion tracking so that the camera will rotate to track motion, which is good but only if the object move very very slow. Which means it won't capture the moving people from one side to another if the person was moving in the regular speed. Pro: I really like the 360 rotating camera feature so that you can control the angel on your phone, which is really helpful for pet owner.
title: Could be improved

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DC Houston
content: OMG, these cameras are simply amazing for the cost. I had bought a different camera brand for much much more money and had to return them because I couldn’t get them to re-sync with its base unit - And I won’t even go into how my alarm company sold me $300 cameras that are not usable once I canceled  their service. These Wyze cameras are just plug them into a wall outlet, connect to the Internet and wow. They even catch every sound and if you have a SIM card you can go back and review all the activity the camera got.  Just wish there was an outdoor version available.
title: Wyze cameras are awesome- They get all the activity and sound with no fuss

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dionesio
content: I was disappointed in this camera.  It makes too much noise when turning and doesn't follow the object very smoothly.  The camera seems to have a hard time finding the object and moves back and forth while the object is still.  The video and sound are not clear and it lives up to it price.  This is not a security camera because the intruder would pick it out time they entered the space due to it loudness.  I have another pan/tilt camera from a different manufacturer that is much quieter and unnoticeable, but it cost a lot more.
title: Makes to much noise when turning

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stoked-On-Spokes
content: The night vision is worthless. I've tried the instructed fixes and it still only works a foot or two in the dark. I use this in my garage and can only make out silloutes with low light. Pretty worthless when using this unit for security. Daytime with lots of light, this camera works well. Panning isn't super smooth but does work. This camera is going back. I'll spend more money to see in the dark. My ring pro works great in low light so I know it can be done.
title: Night Vision a Joke

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: E. Richmond
content: I initially ordered a different camera brand but had trouble with the cameras disconnecting and freezing which required constant rebooting.  Since we are using these in our kids rooms for monitors, it's vital they work when we open the app to check on them.  We have 2 of these now installed for a about 4 weeks and happy to report not one single issue, the app is great and we are very happy with the picture quality.  Highly recommended.
title: Great Camera for Baby Monitor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SweetKisses
content: No matter which setting I use, the night vision is barely visible (SD, HD, 360). The camera always gets stuck looking at the wall and does not return to its home settings/perimeter. And the motion detector either moves too fast or not at all and when it moves the noise of the motor is way to loud to be stealth! This camera needs more work to be as good as the others in its family!
title: This camera needs more work!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Aggiekrystal
content: This camera is exactly what I was looking for. I needed something that was easy to set up and use, and am beyond happy with my purchase. I had it out of the box and set up in less than 5 minutes. This camera is an amazing value for the price you pay... many other cameras cost 3-5 times more than wyze. I especially appreciate the free cloud storage when it captures video clips. I needed something simple to monitor my driveway at night and this does the job perfectly. Even when looking through a window, the night vision works great. I love that you can set the detection area to minimize unnecessary alerts. Completely satisfied with my purchase and will probably buy more!
title: This camera is a dream!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Oliver Trevino
content: Llevo aproximadamente 1 mes usando la cámara con una funda para exterior y va bien, hubo al principio un detalle, la conecté en serie con otra cámara Wyze y no funciona, no le llega suficiente voltaje, tuve que usar un cable independiente con su adaptador de usb y listo.  En general funciona bien, no le doy 5 estrellas porque no puedo ver todas las cámaras juntas, es una por una, además su conexión con Alexa es muy pobre.
title: Buena cámara con pequeños detalles

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wilfredo Torres Jr.
content: After a month of reading reviews on different cameras. I settled for this cheaper version. TRUST ME when I tell you, don't spend too much money on those more expensive top of the line cameras. Save your money and purchase this one. Buy multiple ones!!!! I love it, easy to use and more importantly, I had to call their customer service and those individuals on the other line were of the most professional attitudes I have ever had to the privilege to deal with!!!
title: BEST INDOOR CAMERA ON THE MARKET

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Peter J. Santoro
content: Pros  -fraction of the cost of its competition, easy to setup, can do a full 360 pan / swivel. Cons - te app interface is not as good as nest, and it gets allot of false alerts for motion detection (this sensitivity is adjustable, need to play with that to filter out tree movement and people movement. Image quality is not as good as others in my experience, they claims 1080p but I dont see that even with a gigabit home internet connection and solid upload speeds. Ive only had it for a week and avent had a chance to tweek the settings just yet, but satisfied overall for now.
title: Crazy bargain

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: outlawzur
content: this is just a piece of crap item that you will be happier without buying this thing and keeping yourself from a headache, manufacturer will never ever reach out to you to solve your problems, or concerns that you have about it, stay away from this item. this item will not connect to a 5g connection only 2.4g, item will not follow movement but will follow any shadow that it sees. just a complete messed up item
title: piece of crap

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shaun King
content: We've been using the Wyze cam for over a year now, and it's fantastic.  We use it as a baby monitor, and it brings such peace of mind over just the audio monitors.  Both me and my fiancee have the app, we can both check it at the same time, the camera has pan and scan, night vision, and a intercom function.  The Wyze cam pairs with your Wifi, so you need a decent internet connection. The only thing that's not so great is the intercom function is a bit spotty.  That said, compared to dedicated video baby monitors, this does everything they do at the fraction of the price.  Ours is still going strong after well over  a year of use.
title: We use this as a baby monitor and it is amazing!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JJ
content: Setting up the camera with Wyze app was easy but then I had to watch multiple Youtube videos to figure out what nearly a dozen of different features in Wyze app actually do. There is absolutely no info available about the features on Wyze app and the camera did not come with a manual. I spent almost 2 hours figuring out things and I am still not 100% sure if I understand all the features of this camera.
title: NO MANUAL FOR THE FEATURES IN THE CAMERA

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DIBLEY2200
content: THIS CAMERA STOPPED WORKING ..TRIED TO RE BOOT OR RE START..NO DICE..AND THEY DO NOT HAVE A CUSTOMER SERVICE PHONE NUMBER ..PLUS ONE OTHER WORRISOME ASPECT OF THIS DEVICE..IT SEEMS TO HAVE A MIND OF ITS OWN.. AT TIME IT WILL PAN THE ROOM ON ITS OWN..WELL THATS WHEN ITS WORKING ANYWAY..JUST A HEADS UP ..SPEND THE EXTRA BUCKS AND BUY DROP CAM OR WHATEVER THE NAME HAS BEEN CHANGED NOW.
title: NO CUSTOMER SERVICE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Michaud
content: We've only had 'em about a week.  They work well, so far.  During setup, a QR code appears in the app which you hold up to the cam to scan.  It can be finnicky and might take a couple tries, but it'll work.  Two-way sound is nice.  It does pick up background noise which, combined with network lag, can cause the person on the other end to sound choppy. The most important thing to note is they are only $30 apiece directly from the Wyze website, so buy 'em there.  I asked Amazon and they would not refund the difference.
title: Good product, better price directly from Wyze

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RJT
content: I'm losing faith in Wyze Cams. The Wyze Cam V2's drop offline  constantly. They're worse after installing the RTSP firmware. Not ready for primetime. I have one PAN cam that won't take the RTSP or any other flash update via Micro SD card. I just received a second PAN that bricked after attempting to update from the app.  Dead as a doornail and will not power on or show any life. If Wyze can send me working cams, I may revise my review. There is no support outside M-F business hours.
title: You get what you pay for. Wyze PAN Bricked during update. Another will not update from SD card

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DR
content: I love wyze cam. I own 5 of them. One is wyze pan cam. I bought 4 wyze cam first, loved them then decided to get wyze cam pan. I am very disappointed with this wyze cam pan. It crashes too many times in a day. It keeps saying “connecting to camera” Especially when I try to use HD. I have micro sd inserted and I am using xfinity extreme wifi 600mbps. I don’t know what am I doing wrong, for couple times in a day when i check my camera it’s just saying “connecting to camera 1/3” for a long time. I had to close the app and restart it again.
title: Keep crashing when tracking motion on.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lydia Grant
content: Very VERY disappointed. I received the camera and was super excited to see how well it worked and then I noticed audio issues. I couldn’t hear anything nor could I speak over the speaker. It fixed itself somehow without me doing anything and now (for the past two months) I have great audio but no functionality of the speaker. It says it’s recording but I don’t hear my voice. I went through all the troubleshoot options and no success. I even reached out to the customer service through the app and no one got back to me. So disappointed.
title: Disappointed Unfortunately.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Aveesh Kumar
content: Other reviewers have said it better. Setup using the app was easy - just a word of caution - at the point it asks you to scan a QR code, point eh QR code shown in the Phone Wyze APP to the camera you are setting up - dont be an idiot like me to try to scan a mini QR code at the camera's back using my phone camera (at thispoint I almost dont want to mention that I am a techchie, a programmer, a server manager) :-) Never thought that the camera being setup would want to scan QR - oh well....all good - getting another dozen of these for everyone and everything...
title: Amazing lil guy - this is the best

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stacy Jean Bernard
content: I am a single mom with two boys who are 13 months apart so I needed a peace of mind knowing that they weren’t beating the ever loving hell out of each other while I was at work, LOL this device is absolutely amazing it is everything you could ever want in a camera.  It’s extremely user-friendly it’s overall basically amazing !!  The best part about it is that it has speaker so you can actually talk through it, they wanted a puppy but yet they are too busy on their Xbox to take the dog out so I can simply talk through this amazing camera and them gently remind them that they need to take the dog out!!!
title: Best purchase EVER!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jason Valentin
content: Best damn camera for the price, and features. Forget about all the rest, these are a definite buy. Almost forgot to mention, add a fairly inexpensive 128gb memory card for a few weeks worth of video storage. Longer if set to lower resolution.
title: Definitely consider buying.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dennis Miller
content: So i have been having guest at my house when i am at work(footprints in the snow on my deck). So i figured I would try this out due to the reviews. Got everything setup on it with the firmware upgrade set it in the back room looking out over the drive and walkway to the back door, eveything looks great. It showed and tracked everything in my zone with no problems.  I decided to walk out around the area for a test and to my surprise it will not record me outside tried again later and same thing, but it will show stay cats wandering around the car. I guess if i ever had a problem with a cat breaking in it would be good but not so much on people time to return it
title: Great for animals not people

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Edward am
content: Although this is a cheap product,  only about $30, the video quality and android app were nice.  You can record video in 3 levels:  low quality video, SD or HD.  The control on the app was also intuitive.  It was easy to set up and connect to our wifi.  Three camera has a microsd card slot for saving recordings, however,  anything over a 32gb card and there is no recording ... as stated in their instructions.  The sound was just bad.  We have it installed in our dining room.  No matter the video recording level,  the sound was choppy if it even picked up any sound in the first place.  But again... $30.
title: Do not buy if you want to record sound

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Humberto C
content: Wow all I can say is this camera is pure awesomeness for the price. I would even pay 100 bucks for one of these babies. What’s best is you can install a micro SD card up to 32GB. They don’t try and screw you on a monthly cloud membership either. I have two at work and one at home love it I will definitely buy more for around the whole house.
title: Wow

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: justanotherreader
content: A little problem setting up but nothing major. Once it started working it's been great. Used the time lapse for a snow storm the other day and it was a cool feature. No problem connecting to live stream whenever I open up the camera. Clear picture and the zoom works well. Still learning the features, but an awesome amount of them for the price. Not a fan of using my finger to get the camera to pan and tilt, sometimes it seems to work the opposite of what I swipe. Not a huge problem and really the only thing I've been a little bit annoyed about. Emphasis on little, it's really seems like I just need more practice. Still trying to figure out how to get an email for activity, it could just be my settings though. For the price you'd be crazy not to get one of more these cameras. Highly recommend it.
title: Well worth it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robert
content: Love this cam! After having bought the expensive Motorola cam (which I returned it due to serious app issues) and doing intensive research I decided to buy this cam. For a third of the price that other cams are being sold, this little one is definitely a top-notch camera with great improvements. Love it also that is made by a startup company in CA. Flawless motion detection, apps connects on multiple devices instantly, perfect night vision. Super HD clarity during the day. It totally made my life easier being a new mom. I strongly recommend it!!
title: Please buy this cam! For worried moms and pops

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Eyesee
content: Good picture quality, but constantly loses network connection, which affects image updating and app controls. Always slow to respond to app inputs. This is my second attempt at Wyze. I won’t try again.
title: Constantly loses network connection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SurferGirl
content: I needed a security camera, with real-time viewing in my cell phone, and found the Wyze Cam Pan. I love everything about it...including the fact that you do not need to subscribe to a monthly service. I ended up purchasing two more for my home and wish that I had purchased even more as Holiday gifts for my family. Wyze, thank you for keeping them affordable! Best Amazon purchase(s) of 2019!!
title: Best Amazon purchase(s) of 2019!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brandon M.
content: If you can't see it its in the middle of the spices. I baught this for my apartment so I can watch it when I'm away from home in a diffrent state. As our maintenance crew were i live seems to be nosey sometimes I feel like. The night vision is great and the motion detection sensors are great too in my book it records 12 seconds over motion each time it detects anything. I also use it for a baby monitor as well and I can say it works just as good if not better than. Those expensive baby monitors they have out there. So im overall satisfied with it very much!
title: great purchase and family baught it as well!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lindsey G
content: worth every penny if you don't need consistent play back. Sometimes I can play back video, sometimes I can't. I've done all that has been recommended amd it will fix it for a week and then it won't play back again. Still, would rather view when I need to (as thats the purpose we purchased them for) and that has always been consistent. One camera lost all the color, but we can still watch.
title: Live view is great, play back not so kuch

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: gino turco
content: Ones again amazon.com are brilliant they post to the United Kingdom took 3 days for me to receive my Wyze Cam Pan the packaging was spot on like my other reviews I wrote I ordered the wyze cam pan from amazon.com because wyze don’t sell they products in the UK the picture quality is fantastic on the wyze cam pan the design good quality I will be ordering more soon now I have X2 Wyze Cam V2 And Starter Pack theses Cameras do work in the UK it’s a shame amazon.com don’t sell the sensors separately and especially the door  sensors thank you amazon.com making the wyze products to be sold to people like me in the UK
title: Wyze Cam Pan Can’t Go Wrong With They Do Work In The UK

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kelsey Koontz
content: My cam pan no longer recognizes my SD card. I've tried two others. I can't justify wasting any more money on SD cards. Lovely camera otherwise.
title: Worked well - at first

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: LA Man
content: First it just clicked and clicked.  After 10 or 20 reboots it worked.  Then it failed more and more day after day - see the crazy screen print.  No mas! All done.
title: Died completely about a year to the day from brand new

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rice
content: Great cams for the price! However if I were to do it again I'd get 2 of the standard cams instead of 1 of the pan/tilt. There are just issues with keeping them in the right spots and moving as you set them. I've gone to just having them set on one spot all the time because they always have issues.  But they are worth the $ for the picture and app access. Sound quality is bad, but again, it's surprising you can even get it on this price point. I'll but more, but if the standard cams, not the pan cams.
title: Great cams, skip the pan/tilt, get multiple standard

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KPretty-VA
content: I have told sooo many friends about WYZE! The price, the quality, the picture, the connection!! So many features you would think it costs hundreds of dollars! It has night vision, motion tracking, monitor sesnsing, audio and a microphone! You can take still photos the camera rotates 360 degrees!! Full vibrant color!!! I can’t say how proud I am I bought this!! I use the microphone and audio when my cat sitter comes to the house. We can talk to each other through the audio/microphone. I also use it to talk to my cats :) lol  highly recommend this product! Don’t pass it up!!!
title: Amazing! Must Must Must buy!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joseph
content: I have had 3 their Wyze v2 for about a year now and decided I wanted to put another camera somewhere else. Hooked it up when it arrived today and was immediately impressed. Quality is so much better. Audio is better and the movement with the camera through the app is awesome! I immediately came back on amazon to purchase 2 more to replace my others. Spend the extra $10-15 on the pan.
title: Fantastic!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nick G.
content: I purchased after my brother-in-law showed me how much me loved the 3 he had purchased. Once I received mine, however, it's been unable to connect to my WiFi. I searched their website looking for and trying different things to fix it without success. So I emailed them asking for help. That was over a week ago at this point and I still haven't heard anything.
title: No costumer support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: giovanna free
content: These things are amazing for the price.  Great quality of video.  Can't beat them for the price UPDATE: After 6 months of everyday use, i absolutely love these!  I have 4 of them now and going to get more. My family also is now on the bandwagon.  Cloud storage is awesome.  I have no complaints about this product.  I have  had several other camera systems, lorex, samsung etc.  This one is by far the best for the money.  Video quality is amazing.  You wont be disappointed!!
title: Awesome little cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: EMC3PT
content: Setting up the routines wasn’t bad. Could have used better instruction, but who reads instructions? The issue I have is that it’s either not picking up motion or isn’t sensitive enough... or requires a subscription. The routines run well enough, but without motion and notifications, it’s not what I thought I was getting. If I open up the app and peer into the room, it’s fine... just not what I wanted.
title: Better than the one I replaced...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Paul Hanzel
content: Order this cam after reading some great reviews, and it worked wonderfully, especially given the price, during the first 72 hours. However when I logged in today, The image was 100% green. I could not see a thing, just a green screen. I tried unplugging it and plugging it back in, I tried resetting it through the software, I tried powering it down and back up through the software. I tried changing the definition from high to standard to 360, nothing would get rid of the completely green screen. Will be returning.
title: Great for 72 hours, now images completely green

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cliff
content: Very disappointed with the pan cam. It is programmed to return to a specific spot. after a few motion tracking events it starts to float away. Have to reset, sometimes more than once a day. Sometimes while adjusting the view or panning the camera will just keep moving. Can't get the tech Dept to even return an email. I have multiple wyze products and a couple other cameras and you get what you pay for.
title: Very disappointing

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Coca Cola Mank
content: I use this camera for both a baby monitor and to watch our front door.  It works flawlessly as long as I don't update the firmware (bricked my first camera).  HD and night vision are great and two way talk feature is also awesome.  The only way it could be better is if it was battery operated which would make it even more portable.  Other than that you can not go wrong with Wyze cameras.  Looking forward to the door lock from Wyze as well.
title: This camera is awesome!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jess
content: Horrible customer service from WYZE!! The product forced an update on the firmware and the camera cannot connect and no longer functions. I had no issues at all until the app made an update to the firmware. After troubleshooting Myself and following Instructions from contacting Wyze through email And even asked for someone to call me and walk me through how to fix the issue. They just passed my email down from person to person after offering to replace the device another representative reply is “it’s past the warranty” time. Well then why would you falsely lead hope to fixing your product and correcting the issue Before confirming a warranty expiration date!?!? No help what so ever DO NOT GIVE THIS COMPANY YOUR MONEY!! Camera will last one year and then crap out from them “updating” their software 😡
title: DO NOT BUY! FAULTY PRODUCTS TERRIBLE SERVICE FROM WYZE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mickey Dee
content: Great product, only thing I wish it had was capability of monitoring the cameras on a desktop computer.
title: Wish it Could Be Seen on a Desktop Computer!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JEF Consulting Svcs
content: Camera will not reliably connect to my WiFi even though it is only one room away from the router. Cust Svc solution was, “Move it closer!” The whole reason for buying it was to monitor my pets...they don’t live next to the router!
title: Connectivity to WiFi stinks!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kev
content: I bought two of these and have been very happy with using them as a security camera and to watch our dog while we're out of the house.  It tracks movement (cool), alerts you if your smoke/fire/carbon monoxide alarms go off by their noise, and has great picture quality.  I don't see the need to use any microSD card, as the video is stored to a cloud for a few weeks.  One suggestion to the manufacturers is to be able to set a particular time of day the camera is on/off.  If the option is there, I can't figure it out.  Great buy overall.
title: Love the security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Levi C.
content: These cameras can't be beat for the price. With the SD card, I get a few days' worth of video and the notifications are great. The sound - both parts of the 2 way - is okay, but it does the job. The night viewing mode is great, but it doesn't work well if you have it in a window because of the glare. All in all, I've had no issues with these cameras and will buy more in the future! They'll be even better once they have Google Home support!
title: Fantastic camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Daniel Seagull
content: It's hard to complain because the price is so low but I've been having issue mainly, it seems, with software. At first, this was a 5 star product. For the price, I got great picture, could remotely spin the cam, and could hear what was happening. There was an annoying delay, but I could even have a conversation with my kid via the Wyze Cam.  Then the software updated. Via the Android app (Pixel 2) I had to attempt to connect to the camera 3-6 times before success. And even then, I could no longer hear or speak. Software has since updated and now I can connect consistently but sound isn't working still. Sure, for the price it's still pretty darn good but 2-way audio is core advertised functionality and it doesn't work.
title: It's OK

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Southern Contractor
content: Picture quality, even at standard def, is excellent.  You can set your own waypoints for the pan function, limit motion detection to certain areas in the field of view.  Infrared is good.  The app is fairly easy to use and there are online videos that others have posted to help with setup.  You can add a 32GB micro SD card for local storage, rather than relying on the 14 day rotating cloud storage.  Sound is not that great, but for $35, it's an amazing unit.  You have to wonder why so cheap.  (vendor using the video for other purposes?).
title: Great cam for the money.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M. Racine
content: I actually bought this for catching my counter surfing dog in the act (she only goes to work when we all leave the house). But setting this up to test in the living room, I noticed the picture is awesome, the motion detection is great, and I continue to use this for security, as well as piece of mind if we are away, as I can pan and tilt, and zoom, and cover the kitchen, and the back door are as well as the living room from this one camera.  Awesome for the price!
title: Great device for remote video monitoring

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tri Hoang
content: Best security camera and best price, hands down.  It would be nice if the app has a monitoring scheduling calendar for each day and hour (like the "Blink" product).  Wyze should come out with the outdoors version security cam.  I'm looking forward for Wyze to add the suggestion to their product.  Customer for life if Wyze can keep the price point low without sacrificing the quality.  So far Wyze is doing an excellent job compare to many security cameras I owned.
title: Buy it!  You will like it.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kevin mcmorris
content: I was skeptical at first with the reasonable price and the name I never heard of, I have foscam cameras, and Swann system, but the foscam app stinks, and the cameras can be a pain to get working. I'm pleasantly surprised with this camera. The packaging was top-notch, almost felt like opening an Apple product. Set up was very easy, extremely so. It checked and upgraded its firmware. The app connects to the camera quickly, whereas the foscam app takes forever, and sometimes doesn't even connect. Motion tracking feature is good, kind of weird as it follows you around the room, but you can turn it off. I like the "Hal 2000" look of it. Motion-sensing and notifications is good, the only thing I would prefer is email notifications at the foscam does, this one just does it in app. I like it so much I've now ordered a second one.
title: Great product and features for a low price camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ndrwum
content: Pro: For the money, it’s probably one of the best you can get. The monthly plan is pretty cheap too. Con: HD quality? Can barely make out a person’s face. If a burglar came in, you wouldn’t be able to identify him/her. Using with Alexa sucks. I can’t get any of the commands to work. I wish you could change the physical orientation of the camera and then adjust the video orientation it via app.
title: Probably one of the best

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JML
content: We read all the reviews and comparisons on indoor cameras before trying Wyze. Unfortunately, our Wyze cameras have constant connectivity issues. We know this isn’t a WiFi problem as our other WiFi connected cameras work well. The picture and sound quality were great for the 4 minutes they worked. Note, we’ve tried all the Wyze troubleshooting steps and always update the app (there always seems to be an update), but our cameras are basically useless and we will be upgrading to Nest.
title: Don’t waste your money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Todd L. Owens
content: I must say that I am very happy with this camera! I specifically bought this for the sound detection. I tried it with my smoke and CO2 alarms and it will send me a notification within 30 seconds of the alarms sounding. With pets at home I wanted the added protection that this camera offers. It has very good video quality and the IR works very well in low light. I plan on purchasing additional fixed Wyze cameras for the rest of the house. The app is very easy to use. All in all a great buy!
title: Great camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chris B. Hirner
content: I agree with all the positive reviews but i had something to add to that list of praises. Most ir cams use an iluminator like the standard wyze cam it works well but at close range is plainly visable to the eye. This pan cams ir lights are quite invisable at leat to me. There might be some who can see them but not me. I had to look at the cam with my cell phone cam just to make sure they were on
title: best ir iluminators ive seen on a cheap cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: daddy-o
content: This was my second Wyze purchase and while I was happy with my first camera, I wish I had more of this one! Pictures is very clear and offers some versatility with the panoramic views around the room.  If you intend to mount on the wall, you might want to consider a long cord depending, but nothing but enjoyment with this purchase. Like the company and products, and have already pre-ordered my smart bulbs!
title: Word to the Wyze!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kathy Marshall
content: For the price you cannot beat it.  I have had mine for a few months and we used it to watch the puppy when we were at work.  We can even talk to her and she recognized our voice.  It was great!  Now I’m using it as a security camera.  It notifies me when it hears a sound or senses movements.  The company is pretty solid.  They send out regular updates.  I can control the camera from my phone and pan around the room when I want. It even has night vision and it’s not a bad picture even in the pitch black.  I would expect to pay a lot more for this little camera.
title: A bargain-worth a lot  more

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chadladage
content: So I bought one several months ago and stopped working while i am away from home. Mine only works if I am home. (A lot of good that does me) I have reached out to the company and they have been no help. They keep asking me to shut it off and turn it back on or to reload the app. I would not buy another one. I have read several online reviews having the same issue. It is strange that it happened all of a sudden.
title: Stopped Working after a couple months

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lon
content: What's not to love? Motion sensors, person detection, SD card recording? 1080p 360 pan and zoom? I can view this all from my phone. Sold. Recently set this up for a Hungry Howie's pizza. Install went great with (separate order) mounting brackets. Installed upside down( you can flip on advanced settings). Owner very happy! Employees... Not so much :/ All in all 5/5 Pro tip: be close to the router while initially setting up cameras, and make sure to do most of the setup before mounting them somewhere. Order 256GB SD cards for them too.
title: Pizza place owner happy... Employees :/

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Frank Bravo
content: Overall i would have given this camera a 5, but it has one setback. I cannot use it at night for purely just sound when i put my ipad or iphone in what i will can sleep mode. Meaning i cannot lock my screen on these devices and still hear noise from the camera. Its all or nothing from what i can tell. This was an option i had with foscam and foscam apps, but then again those were pitas to configure via IP addresses and when they stopped working it was practically impossible to reconnect. Wyze is easy to setup and all the other features are perfect from what i can tell, it was just that one feature or lack of to be able to lock screen/sleep mode and still be able to hear through the camera.
title: Good camera lacking one feature with the app

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Taylor
content: Such an amazing camera! We bought it to keep an eye on our cat while we are away at work and absolutely love it! The image quality is fantastic for such an inexpensive camera. The range is tremendous, and the night vision is also incredibly clear. We downloaded the app on two phones and are able to use it on both with no problem. We plan on buying more to put in other places of the house. Highly recommend!
title: Amazing Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: d'Vre
content: Quite simply, I like that this works!  It has been highly dependable, which ensures good home security.  When my WiFi goes down, which happens about 2-3 a month (Comcast), my Wyze webcams are able to automatically reconnect when the WiFi is back up.  This has not been the case with other webcam products that I have, which cost 4x the price of the Wyze.  I also like the app interface.  The only improvement, which would warrant a 5 star review, would be if I were able to access the Wyze stream and videos from my laptop.  Perhaps that can be offered in a future release.
title: Dependable and Cost-Effective Web Cam!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lacey
content: Love this little camera. Bought to use as a pet camera and it works pretty well. Night vision is good. The only reason I took a star off is because it doesn't pick up sound really well. Love the app. I'm glad you don't have to pay extra to record or view your camera. Just pop in a 32gb micro SD. I did accidentally buy a 128gb and it did work but is not recommended.
title: Great especially for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M
content: I was contemplating a video monitoring system and a friend happened to mention the Wyze Cam.  Wyze does as much or more at a fraction of the price.  I am running my Cam in SD mode and have extraordinary resolution -- that I can see on my phone from anywhere -- did I mention you can zoom in? The Wyze system will alert you to movement, sounds even smoke or carbon monoxide alarms. Unbelievable value. I'll be buying more cameras...
title: Excellent value -- at minimal cost

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Birdman
content: Great product, does everything it describes. It will track faces and follow the person around the room. It cannot be used as hidden/security camera too well as it is loud when it pans and you can hear it. But the ability to receive alerts on my phone, check the live feed, record the video and talk through the microphone from work all makes up for a little noise. Great product.
title: Preforms as described

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gramppi
content: I already had two of these when I ordered my third one and after Installing it I found the color picture was blurry, and the night vision was real clear. I did all the troubleshooting step Wyze offered on line, and it didn’t help  so I contacted Wyze and they reviewed with me everything I had had and determined I had a bad camera. The had me send a photo of the name tag mounted on the camera and sent me a message telling me they were sending me a free replacement and to also keep the old unit. This is great customer service and I will purchased their products again if the need arises.
title: Great product for the price, and great customer service.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: L Block
content: It took me like 6 tries to get it to connect to my WiFi and then once it did I tried to look at it when I left my house and couldn’t get it to connect. I also tried unplugging it to move it to another location and had to set up the whole thing all over again because it would not connect. Once it’s up and running though it’s alright. Quality is not great but I like that I can pan around to find my dogs.
title: Finicky to connect

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: nathan p.
content: I have some of the older square Wyze cams, and they were fine - just very obnoxious to set up, but quality-wise they were great for the price. So, I opted to get the Wyze pan camera to expand and it had been amazing. Such great quality for a very cheap camera, I like them better than some Ring cameras I have (which seem to lose connection or connect very, very slowly). Set up was also very easy with the pan camera, maybe they've gotten better with it. Overall, I strongly recommend these. Amazing quality for a very inexpensive product.
title: Amazing little camera, so much value for the cost

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Erin
content: The 1st cam was super simple to set up. Everything worked just like it should. The 2nd cam it got stuck after trying to connect to WiFi network. I unplugged and plugged back in the cam, tried again and setup worked fine. Video quality is good in SD and great in HD. I don’t have an SD card installed yet, so I can’t comment on recording to SD card. Motion detection is cool, but beware it’ll fixate on ceiling fans if they get turned on and motion detection is enabled (isn’t by default.) I do wish they came with the mount for wall/ceiling. I’d gladly pay an extra $5-10 to have it in the box, instead of having to buy it separately. The one thing I wish the camera had (using one as a baby monitor) is a temperature sensor. Otherwise is an amazing cam! I’ll probably buy 2-3 more in the next couple weeks.
title: Amazing camera, even if it were much more expensive!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: shopgirl
content: I loved this camera. I went to south america for 2 weeks and left our cat alone and our friend came to feed him. It worked the entire time and we were even able to say hi to our friend when he came to feed the cat! I didn't get alerts on my phone telling me when there was movement, but what I did love was that I could move the camera around remotely to make sure the cat was ok and happy and healthy! I HIGHLY recommend this product. I can't believe it's so inexpensive!
title: Loved it!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: W. Baker
content: I had a Canary camera for a couple of years, but the advanced features cost $100/year. I tossed the Canary and bought this Wyze and will never look back. The functionality (with one exception) is far superior to the Canary at a fraction of the price with no recurring charges. The one area where the Wyze could be better is night vision. It's basically nonexistent. You can't see anything in the dark, whereas the Canary is really quite good. But, in all other aspects, Wyze wins, by a wide margin.
title: A great camera at twice the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gary Thomas
content: Night vision sucks really badly.  Worked great for the first week but now it is completely black screen.  Moved the camera multiple times but no change.  Google searches show this is a very common problem with the 2nd generation of this model.  Now that being said everything else is awesome.  The picture quality is great and the latency is not bad at all.  Wish the app would make direct connections when on the same network as the camera but whatever.  Still is a nice little camera for a little bit of money.
title: Nice cheap camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R. A. Pitera
content: What awesome little cameras.  And they keep getting better with the improvements to the firmware as Wyze adds more features.  I need two more to replace all of my current cams, which I will be buying soon.  Great user community and a solid, caring and attentive company behind them.  I would not hesitate to recommend Wyze and folks should check out their new sensor platform.  Works great with Alexa and now with Google Home Hub as well (I am currently in beta but it should be in wide release in a few weeks).
title: Been replacing all my other cameras with WyzeCams - enough said?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Leathe
content: We have tried several baby monitors and this little dependable camera outperforms them all. No connectivity issues, great picture quality motion tracker. It's all we need and has not had disconnection issues that needed resetting like other cams we tried. Only mild downside is you have to keep objects away from the side because it lights up the object in night mode and the rest of the room goes black.
title: We depend on this and it performs

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DougT
content: I would've given this 5 stars, but the set up wound up to take longer than I thought as I had initial problems getting this to connect to wifi.  If you have a dual band router (2.4/5 gHz), be sure to have the camera at least 12-15 away from the router during set up, otherwise the two bands step on each other and the camera won't connect.  BTW, I contacted support at WYZE twice and they were very patient and informed!
title: Great buy for the money!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: william
content: These cameras are cheap! That being said they constantly have issues and are a hassle to fix. Everyone says they are cheap what do you expect. Well I think from now on I will buy something more expensive and not worry about the issues.
title: Half baked product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kumar309
content: I'm a die hard fan of Arlo Pro security wireless cameras and i bought the Wyze Cam Pan for my basement which can be wired. It has better video quality than my Arlo Pro, and a very good motion sensor. it even detects a surge in the sunlight. The app is good, and it provides a 7 day worth of free cloud storage and can download any video to phone. No charge for 7 day free storage. U can also put a micro sd card to save videos/photos. I definitely recommend this camera for being low cost, same features like arlo pro( except arlo is wireless).
title: Better than my Arlo Pro

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Trailwinder50
content: I have used six different wifi cameras over the years. I read the reviews on this and was looking for better night vision. I also liked all the added features that are listed. PTZ works very nicely.  Set up zones or just swipe finger. I the night vision quality is outstanding. The day time as well.  All the cameras over the years and now I feel confident my needs can be met at a very reasonable price without skipping quality.
title: Best so far

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Allan
content: Resolution is ok, could be a lot better. Software needs some work. It has quick response to activation. Like all of these devises we need cloud storage. Pay or no pay. Point is we all need it. Biggest problem is the recording time of a event is really bad. Way to short for me. We need at least 30-60 sec clip. Most cameras do but not at this price point. I really like these little fellas but better software and a higher resolution say 1440 would be a whole lot better. One other thing, make these or house these in a outdoor environment would be a home run.
title: I see you kind of

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Elizabeth R. Reilly
content: I recently moved and wanted to keep an eye on my senior dog who has a seizure disorder. The features offered will send you alerts for movement or sound, giving you a clip of what’s going on. This camera has allowed me to run home and care for my dog after catching a seizure. Another bonus feature is you can share your camera feed, my mom loves to see/talk to my dog on occasion.
title: Great features, do not hesitate!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nature lover
content: It seems like a good camera bit having persistent problems with it acknowledging the SD card.  It keeps telling me the card is not in the camera. The camera has to be turned on and off almost daily for the SD card to work.  This is something the cameras have a problem with according to other reviews and is a real problem.
title: SD card issues
