product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mihalis in Kansas
content: The camera simply would not maintain a 2G connection at first. I went online and bought a 2G extender and it connected perfectly and has not had connection issues so far. The picture is crisp and the fact that you can adjust the pan and tilt is outstanding for a camera at this price range. Night vision is decent, but don’t plan on seeing much detail unless the object is very, very close.
title: This camera has okay night vision and day picture....

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MadBB
content: The video quality of these units is very poor compared to any of the other 1080P cameras I own.  It seems like they can only really focus on anything near the camera.  When you set it up record video of something far away, the image quality goes downhill fast.
title: Low quality video

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: greg Bryant
content: . It is terrible at tracking, recording and allowing efficient review of video. We bought to help track our son with autism. At least 75 % of the time on our VPN very high speed it lagged. They want you to send them video to help with improvements. These videos are personal and private. As an owner of other security video devices over the years it’s easy to tell that Wyze is very early in development.
title: Horrible

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: B.N.
content: These cameras are of course not as sophisticated as something like Nest, but they are great for the price. One of my cameras was defective but the exchange process was easy, so I now have two working cameras. Setup was pretty easy, and it's nice to be able to adjust the sensitivity of what it will pick up. They bring so much peace of mind that I can check in on my home any time during the day through the app. I haven't noticed any major connectivity issues - they've dropped from my wifi only a couple times and have brought themselves back online quickly.
title: ... cameras are of course not as sophisticated as something like Nest, but they are great for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joshua Bloom
content: I have used many video cameras. But this one for the price is great. Picture quality could be better but you can still see everything clearly night and day. The speaker on it is just ok if your in a house with higher ceilings. But overall I need it to see what is going on and it does that perfectly. Set up was extremely easy. If you are wondering if this camera can withstand the cold, it can. I have this camera in a non insulated cold garage. Temperatures have gone down to -20°F. I haven't seen any problem with motors or feed cutting out. Overall great product.
title: Great for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Richard Rodriguez
content: I wasn't expecting a lot at this price point, but I was super surprised that this was able to function as well as it does. It looks great and the setup is super easy. It can also link to your Google home which is a big bonus for me. It does not come with an SD card but it still does do local recording so if you want to record longer stretches of time, make sure to get an SD card as well.
title: Functional and looks great at an amazing price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mr. Dee
content: I've used several other brands that take hours to set up if not days - I set this up in minutes with little effort. Download the app and it walks you right through it. After the first I added three more & now buying my 5th one. So simple to add on. Great quality, intuitive controls, everything right on my phone as needed. I have a 17,000 sf warehouse and they connect from the back of the place to the front where the WIFI is with no problem. Unbelievably brilliant design for both hardware & software.
title: The easiest install ever + great quality!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: User 47
content: I really think you cannot beat this camera for the $.  We have it outdoors in the freezing temps, but in a protected area from rain and snow.  It works like a charm.  We noticed that sometimes, possibly due to a power drop/surge, the camera would reposition/reset the view.  You just then reposition using the phone app. Wyze needs to get a function to sign in from the web and view/control your cams.  If they do that - they will give Arlo and the rest a real run for their money.  For now you can only use the cams via the phone app.
title: Great camera for the $

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Al in Seattle
content: Great picture, overly sensitive microphone to the point it may not be useful.  The panning is not what I hoped it would be. Very erratic as far as getting it to stop and stay in one place, pretty hit and miss.  Takes up  alot of time trying to get it the cam to aim stay where you want it to.  So far if I cannot get the pan function to come down I will probably change the rating to one. I have confidence at this time there is something I don't understand.  I hope.
title: Impressive except the panning control

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Steve M
content: This camera was so inexpensive I figured if it worked half as advertised I would be satisfied. I was surprised because this is an outstanding little camera and works better than described. I have it inside a window looking out on my porch at my front door.  I have the night vision turned off because  the glass will reflect it back but the motion detection works very well. It has never failed to let me know when someone walks up on my porch. It sends a small video clip of the Fed X guy or, in one case, some guy whose car broke down near my house. The app is easy to navigate and  use. I have found that I have to frequently reset the motion detection area as it frequently will expand from my set small area back to default which is the entire picture view. I like it that you can set the camera to send an alarm for any motion or just when a person is detected. My only false alarms have come from night time lightning when I had it set for any motion. This is an outstanding little camera.
title: You Won't be Disappointed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PAJ
content: The quality is insane! I wish they made an outdoor...or do they?? The features are great...motion detection, take pics while recording, ZOOM in on object/people while recording, speak option, and so much more! I was shocked it zeroed in on someone peaking through a door in the dark. A rectangle showed up on the video and when I looked it was someone’s reflection in the mirror! Like I said, the quality is too good!
title: Insane Quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Salmon
content: Used to work for over a year, now with latest app and firmware will not notify or record events which makes it useless since I don’t need to see myself when home. I need to notify and record when I’m not home. Looking at blogs this is not a resolved issue. Until resolved you would be advised to purchase alternatives. Too bad because it was a great device when it worked.  Can’t imagine what they did or why to make it not work anymore. I even deleted the cam and set it up again. Sad because I used to tell everyone how great this was.
title: Don’t buy until notification issues resolved.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kenji Lum
content: I replaced the Wyze Cam V2 in our living room with the Wyze Cam Pan -- moving the V2 to another room. The Pan is as black as night in the living room with the lights off now. Where as the V2 saw just about everything with the lights off. I had to swap them back and put the pan in the back-up location (where I wanted the V2) and even then it's night vision is still terrible. I would have bought a second V2 if I had known the night vision was this terrible with the pan.
title: Night vision is awful compared to regular (V2) Wyze Cam.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: brittany shelton
content: My boyfriend and I really like it for what we needed it for. We got it to spy on our naughty little cat and dog. The cat likes to get into everything and his sister (our dog) gets convinced to join in. You can move the camera around and speak through it. It was easy enough to add the app and learn its features. We don't use the motion detection but have used it and it was kind of wonky. The night vision is decent. We opted out of getting a sim card for it to record because we have no reason to at this time.
title: Not too shabby for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AmazonCustomer
content: I can't say enough good things about this camera. For $37 I can do pretty much anything high end cameras can do. Setting it up was very easy. There are many accessories on Amazon to customize it, like waterproof covers to use it outdoors, stands to install it on the wall, etc. I basically use it to check on my dogs when I'm not home and together with my ring alarm system let's me keep track of what's going on when a sensor activates inside the house. I am certainly loving how easy this little things make security nowadays.
title: Great camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Patrick hagan
content: Strongly recommend! Got it for my pup while I’m away and it works like a charm. When shopping around and reading reviews, a lot of people claimed that this camera, while away, takes a long time to connect to from the app, not the case for me! Literally takes three seconds and I can see the inside of my house and what my pup is up to. There is absolutely no motion delay whatsoever! The camera itself is very HD (super distinctive) i love that it has night vision - when turned on, i can see everything and him like clear day. The controls are very easy to use, you can go up, down, side to side, ZOOM IN! And even TALK THROUGH THE CAM WHICH IS AN AMAZING FEATURE!! Only thing I would recommend is getting a mount for it, didn’t come with one. This product deserves a 10 star rating due to what you’re getting for the cost of it!
title: Awesome!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: S. Ackman
content: Overall this is a good webcam, or rather NOT a webcam since there is no web page (or PC app) that you can go to and view your cam. Fortunately I have an iPad and iPhone and there is an app that allows viewing the camera. Setup was fairly easy and the quality is good. The only reason I gave it four stars instead of five is the lack of a webpage and PC app to view the cam.
title: Overall a good camera. No webpage nor PC app to view cam though

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: midwestreading
content: I needed an affordable solution that would not tax my home wifi.  This camera is great. Super easy setup and install.  Easy to use interface on my phone....I'm surprised how lightweight the app is on my Android phone - it requires very little memory to run. I'm not an expert, I just know this camera works for me at an amazing price. Update March 2019: With the recent release of the ability to turn off the night vision light so this camera now works from behind glass, the camera is perfect!  Yes!
title: No complaint, it's all good by me

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chris P.
content: All in all this camera does what's advertised.  Unfortunately the devil is in the details and it's problematic on many levels. Set up seemed to be relatively straight forward but the scanning of the QR took many attempts.  After I exhausted every solution tip offered online to link up with the QR code (low lighting, bright lighting, move the code further away, move the code closer, etc) it finally linked up when I haphazardly passed my phone in front of the camera and it finally linked. The range of lens motion isn't as great as I imagined it to be.  It's not true 360 lens or body.  Picture quality is above average. I have 2 wifi networks at my house and would prefer to have the camera on the 5G network but it's not able to function on that one so I had to reconfigure my networks to accommodate moving all my other wifi connected devices to the 5G and dedicate the 2G network for the camera.
title: Difficult to set up and not very intuitive

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Calvin Cole
content: I use this product to view what is in my driveway.  It has problems notifying me about cars pulling up.  And I haven't figured out why it doesn't do recordings after 5:30. The other thing that bothers me is the night vision is poor.  I live in the county, and there are no street lights.  So the picture is dark and blurry at night.  Other than those items, I find it does what I purchased it for, and that is to record activity while I'm not at home.  But I have to check it to see what it has recorded.
title: Pretty neat but not dependable.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: EL
content: When I read the review on the Wyze Cam and seen I could use it on my Amazon fire stick, and I enabled the Wyze cam Skill on my Alexa app and loaded the fire stick TV that was connected to TV, clicked on the mike and said show me Wyze Cam it loaded the the video. Very nice, another cam on the way.
title: Works good with my Amazon Fire stick

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jonathan
content: I have mine set up with an SD card and doing continuous recording. As long as I log into the app regularly and check on the Cam Pan it seems to do okay at maintaining all of the recordings. (About 3.5 days worth at 1080p) But if I ignore it for 'too long' the Cam Pan decides the SD card is no longer inserted. The only way to fix this is to cold reboot (unplug) the Cam Pam. It is only a partial fix since the freshly rebooted Cam Pan will say the SD card is empty and start over. The motion detection is simple XOR so if the shadow from a tree on a wall moves too much it will get triggered.
title: You get what you pay for (cheap)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: krish
content: The product features are priced according to what it delivers and it's almost unhelpful tech support. The overall resolution is good. Night vision is good enough. However, the sound or two way audio for Samsung devices stopped working. They broke this functionality that worked before. Have been talking with support for a couple of months now, they have acknowledged the issue and keeps saying that it will be fixed with NO ETA. If your product doesnt work with Samsung why do you say that it doesnt rather then taking away money and not fixing the product. Good potential and crappy support and developers.
title: Poor Support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gustavo Melendez
content: Camera is still great, good quality, rotates vertically and lense move horizontally The cons about this camera are the night vision could definitely be better you really cannot see much unless you have some kind of light on which is dissapointing, Then the two way audio doesn't always work, it's like if your cutting off when your speaking And lastly which I think is important the camera doesn't always pick up the memory card for example when you want to watch back what was recorded the memory card acts like if there's no memory card inside not showing what was recorded throughout the day camera definitely needs improvement
title: UPDATE AS OF JULY 1ST

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alex P
content: I have a Google Wifi mesh system with 3 wifi routers at home. Whenever I am restarting the network the main router kicks in first, the other two start a seconds later. Because of this delay the Wyze camera connects to the main router which is the furthers one right away and stays connected to it forever, and the connection between them is unreliable, slow and crappy. Although there is another router with the same Network ID and very strong signal a few feet away from the camera it never switches to it until I manually restart the camera itself.
title: Awesome for the price with a caveat

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JS
content: Updated from 5 stars to 1 star, 0 stars if possible. The first two cams I received worked really well, so well, that I ordered two more and they were both DOA because they would NOT scan the QR code and if it won't scan the code, the camera will never work. No help from "help". Both bad cams had to be returned. Very disappointed after several hours trying to resolve got me nothing. I am done with wyze cams.
title: 2 Worked and 2 DOA

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: NAL
content: I purchased 6 of these cameras for our 2 homes. Only one was used outside and we purchased the all weather cover for that camera. Unfortunately it only worked for a couple months. I then purchased another (now totaling 7). This time with outdoor wire and the same cover. That camera didn’t even last a month. I have tried contacting Wyze several times but no response- either by phone or email. Very dissatisfied. On a happier not - the other 5 work fine indoors.
title: Not for outdoor use even with cover.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: g. b.
content: I bought this to keep an eye on my 90 yr old Mother. I mounted it high up on a corner wall between the hallway and living room. It has great panning rotation and tilt. The microphone works well too. It allows me to see many of the areas of her home and I can check in on her as needed, especially see her interactions with caregivers. I highly recommend this camera.
title: Great Camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Blndy625
content: I had a different amazon brand camera that started off great.  Then it started saying offline all the time.  I finally decided to get something different an ran across this brand.  It had great reviews and very little complaints so i thought for the price i would try it out!  I really like it.  It doesn't make a lot of noise when its rotating.  It stays connected to my wifi and i have not had one problem of it going off line.  I have had this unit since July.  I have it up high in a location that allows me to see a large span of my common areas.  The sound quality is really good too. I can hear when my kids are talking / arguing!  I have not tried the play back and I do have the SD card in it but have never pulled it out and used it.  I mainly use it to check on my home while away.  Great value for the pricing and have recommended to others!
title: Great camera for the value!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tara R
content: Amazingly impressive, until my router died while on vacation and it lost connection. Not the camera’s fault... then I reconnected my outdoor cameras (blink cut) and tried to reconnect my indoor camera (wyze pan). The Wyze has been useless and refuses to scan the damn QR code for my new WiFi network!! This stupid thing has been a shelf decoration just taking up space!! I LOVED it, until it will no longer get online. This was a 7 out of 5, until it became worthless. :( I can’t get support other than a stupid “how to” video that tells you how to get a QR code on your app
title: Worth a LOT more... until it’s worthless

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BlessedOne
content: Installation was very easy. Set these up right away. Then it called for a firmware upgrade, which I did. Afterwards, my micro SD card wouldn't work. Apparently the firmware upgrade makes any brand of SD card other than the Wyze impossible to use. Not very happy about that. However, the picture quality is pretty good as long as you don't zoom in too much, in which case the image becomes a bit blurry. Still, I am not sending these back because this is the third set of cameras I've owned and so far they are the best.
title: Both pleased and displeased.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Samantha
content: Excellent value for your money! Gives me view of an entire room where I keep my dog while I’m away at work. Offers motion tracking and night vision at good quality. I can also hear him and talk to him through the app on my phone. Definitely worth purchasing!
title: Excellent investment

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stephanie Rivera
content: I bought this for my cat. So that when I am away on vacation or just out of the house I can watch her. It’s really great quality. I can record, or speak to her, it rotates,  you can see at night, and it’s a really great picture quality for the price. It’s a great purchase. I’m so happy that I have this camera. And they continue to add new features over time and it works great with my iPhone.
title: Great camera love it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: towll
content: well. you get what you pay for.  The picture quality is pretty good. Love that it kinda sorta tracks movement to an extent. BUT the worst part is that the notifications come in slow/late. Like minutes after. Even when i'm in the same room. My other cam, an armcrest, sends practically  instant notifications. and now it won't pair to the app. I've tired 3 different devices to pair and nothing.  it just pans back and forth. customer support, the one time they did get back to me, was a generic troubleshooting email. all in all, i don't think i'd buy another or recommend it after this experience.
title: bought in June and it is already dead. poor customer support.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dugger
content: I originally purchased Blink cameras, but sent them back after 1 month when they stopped working. I’m glad they did, since I wasn’t originally interested in the Wyze cameras since I wanted something wireless. The Wyze cams are significantly better in nearly every way! More specifically, the video quality is better, the software is better, and the fact the night vision is something the Blinks do not have. My only minor gripe is that the audio quality is not good on the Wyze cameras, but for the value, I can overlook that when compared to everything else these do well. I originally only need 2 cameras, but for the price I got 4, and still saved money!
title: Love, love, love these cameras! Excellent value!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JL
content: Of the cameras I've tried for this price, this one is definitely the best. The picture quality in both dark and light environment is excellent. The sound quality is not great, so I record audio with a separate microphone and recorder. It seems to recognize motion quite well, but it doesn't track motion very well. My biggest complaint about this, and almost all devices like it, is that they do not provide a way to ensure data privacy. Yet another spyware opportunity. I cut the power to the device as soon as I get home.
title: Good value but at the cost of privacy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C.L. Jones
content: Bought these to replace our $500+ Arlo system and couldn’t be happier. Just wish it would connect with our Wink Home Hub for custom programmed actions. The problem with our Arlo system was it was reliably unreliable. 9/10 times the two way voice wouldn’t work or it couldn’t pull up a picture - so far these cameras have been quick to connect to from anywhere with little delay.
title: Replaced Our Arlo With These

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: E. Perker
content: I'm only 24 hours into my Wyze Cam Pan so I'll have to update down the road on longevity but, so far I can report that this is the best $36 I've spent. Setup was a breeze. The features and functionality are better than I could have imagined. The iPhone app works very well. Usually these things are very badly designed but they did a surprisingly good job on the app. I've poked around on the Reddit Wyze community. It looks like the company responds quickly to questions and issues. I really wanted a Nest Cam but couldn't justify $300. So for a tenth of that, I'm in business!
title: Best bang for your buck around

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Julia loves Amazon
content: I can't believe the quality on these cameras for the price.  So many features.  You can be alerted anywhere if someone is on your property or in your home.  Check on your pets while you are gone.  So many features.  You can remotely pan around your room or property to check things out. I highly recommend these cameras.  Also you can learn all about them and the features from You Tube videos.
title: So much camera for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CH
content: I looked into this or the Ring for a long time, but ended up trying the "cheap option". But this is not cheap! 1080 is all you really need for an indoor camera, and I place it in my window where it records my front door and walkway. Then I can pan it around from my office and watch my dog on the couch, and talk to her if I want to. This makes a HUGE difference in my day, and significantly hightens my feeling of safety. I can't say thank you enough for making an affordable technology to protect and watch over our homes.
title: Fits my needs better than Ring

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jessica Reppenhagen
content: I couldn’t say anything bad about these cameras at all. I got it to see my kids in their room as a cheaper alternative to a baby monitor. The night vision is amazing, sound quality is superb and I LOVE the two way audio. I had an issue with the SD card reader not working and Wyze tech support was amazing in helping me troubleshoot. If you’re looking for a camera, get this one!!
title: Nothing short of amazing

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chase
content: The motion detection, time lapse, and motion tracking options are my favorite! The camera easily follows the moving person or object in the video frame and it moves so quietly that no one would hear the camera and be made aware they were being filmed.
title: Best camera on the market

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: D. Welchering
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Bought in June, 5 months later it wont stop constantly turning in both directions. I cant stop it or control it. Its is now a paper weight so I gave it 1 star. The night vision is decent, never used the motion detection but the picture quality is surprisingly good. I really liked the zoom feature. But again, these features aren't even relevant if it doesnt work! Super disappointed..
title: Started going crazy after 5 months.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Prof100
content: Bought in 2018 and its reliability is terrible.  If the internet goes down it does not reconnect.  If it will not connect, you have to remove it and reinstall. Worthless as a security camera.  Buy something else.
title: Truly worthless due to lack of reliability.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AW
content: Very impressed with this pan camera for the price. It works well and the picture is mid-grade but great for the price. I will warn, it cannot connect to a 5G network which I found odd but not a dealbreaker. Overall very happy and decided to purchase a second one. In order to record without having the app open, you do need an SD card, I went with the 32GB. I had to look up a tutorial on how to set-up the continuous recording but it wasn’t hard.
title: Good pan camera for the price, needs SD card.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: nanb2969
content: For it's size it has many functions. Plus,being small it fits in any area. Zoom,sounds,motions all work great. Only issue is rain and through a window and screen. Nighttime my street is dark and with a window you can't use night vision due to the reflection. Otherwise night mode 👍. Ordering the kit to go with it 100$ for one outside under the porch as well as the smart plugs. Worth it I believe 👍
title: Great little security camera with quality.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christian in Florida
content: I'm always skeptical when buying stuff like this but this camera has worked out exceptionally well. I was looking at other security cameras that cost three and four times as much but decided on this one. So far it is not disappointed. The app works great and the picture quality couldn't be better. The sound is good enough that when I talk through my smart phone, the dogs can hear me! Very configurable through the app. Now let's see how long this thing lasts!
title: So far it works great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mary Kay Simpson
content: I love this camera !! I can control which parts of my room to scan or I can do motion tracking. Our 7 month old German Shepard likes to grab things off the tables and play with em. While out to dinner, I got an alert, looked in on her and sure enough she had stolen my magazine. I quickly yelled at her to go get in her bed. First, she walked up to the camera and stared at it... then went to her bed. Hahaha And I LOVE the smoke and CO detector notifications I could get if needed. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
title: Keeps tracks of my furbabies

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mauitech
content: My experience with the Wyze Pan was so disappointing. I received it on Christmas eve and was excited to start using it. I needed it to help keep an eye on my dog who just had surgery. At first, everything seemed to go smoothly.....install the Wyse app on my Android phone and follow the instructions to add the device. Unfortunately, it became immediately clear that the camera was having trouble connecting to my WiFi router. Even though it was only one room over from the router, it just could not reliably connect. I get good WiFi coverage throughout my house so I know it is getting a good quality signal. I even set the camera in the same room as the router but had the same issue. After hours of trying to make it work (multiple factory resets, firmware update, etc) I gave up.  I have already gotten return authorization and will be dropping it off at UPS tomorrow.
title: What a disappointment!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ambear
content: Was great while it lasted, but I didn’t use it much and it didn’t last long 🤷🏼‍♀️ After about half a dozen or so uses, it won’t connect to the app which renders it useless as a nanny cam when I’m away...
title: Not worth it :(

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: UKsk8r
content: I probably shouldn't give this camera just 4 stars but I was expecting more. If all you need is a relatively inexpensive security type camera then this is excellent. It's easy to setup, connect to an Android phone, use, zoom and take photos. However, I bought it to view and take photos of birds at  my feeders. As you can see from photos the results don't look "HD". So, buy it for its purpose and you'll be happy, just don't expect high resolution photos.
title: It's great at what it does, but...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Leilani
content: Usually I only buy their regular Wyze cam, I decided to go with this one since it’s a bit more versatile and it pans in different directions. The reason I bought this camera was to replace my old nest cam and have all my cameras be Wyze cams, but this one for some reason compare to my other wize cams and my nest cam it was very foggy like the image quality was not the same as the other cams. It might have been a defective unit and I did not contact the seller regarding this issue I just asked for a refund to order the other Wyze cam instead.
title: I love Wyze cameras, but this one might of been defective

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Juan Uribe
content: Well, I guess you get what you pay for.  It's not the best quality camera, but it does the job. I'd like to think it's my internet service that doesn't let the camera work at it's peak, but I work with a 350Mps dedicated line, so I'm tending to think it's just the way the camera is. Overall image quality is not bad, even though every time I try it in HD, it says that I should lower it to 360... and also there's a huge delay in the 2 way communication which makes it difficult to catch my pet red handed as it takes several seconds for the voice to come out. Overall it's a normal camera with normal quality picture. Serves it's purpose, but if you're looking for high quality, this is not the one.
title: I WORKS...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Steven Brame
content: Purchased and installed one a couple of months ago. I've been so happy with it that I just ordered and installed a 2nd. Pretty soon I'll have my house surrounded! Picture is pretty good. Sometimes the audio is a bit sketchy, but that's probably my internet connection. When it does work, it's really good. I've had entire conversations with my wife via the camera. OK, I've got to mention this - Today I was placing the 2nd unit on a covered deck, and it was sitting in the tool tray of the small stepladder I was using. One of my dogs rocketed past and bumped the ladder, knocking the camera to the deck - easily a 4 ft drop. I figured, $37 camera...no way it would survive a drop from that height. Plugged it in, and it works. I'm impressed.
title: Been using for a couple of months now...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chris N
content: WiFi kept disconnecting even with a strong signal and when tested on multiple WiFi channels. Hope the replacement is functional.
title: Had to return the first one

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ginna Hurtado
content: Got this to monitor my puppy while I’m out and at night from my room. For the price you’re paying it is great picture quality and the compact design goes well with my living room . I’ve accidentally knocked it down several times and it still works perfectly.  If you’re in a similar situation as me, I would recommend ordering the SD memory card (less than $15) so you can find out how your puppy got out of the huge playpen in less than 45mins!
title: Great bargain!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Catherine Conner
content: First thing I disliked was how loud the camera was when moving and tracking motion.  Also the camera would get stuck often just pointing back at he wall behind it or it would just keep scanning the room back and forth when there was zero motion . The only thing that would stop it would be to completely uninstall and reinstall.  I needed to uninstall and reinstall many times in just about a week of use. So much so, that I returned the camera. The video quality and night vision are very good though.
title: Ok for price but needs tweaking

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chodon Kumar BS
content: This Wyze Pan Camera looks beautiful , got sharp video quality but it simply doesn't work most of the time with Alexa Echo 5 devices.  When I try to see live view, it keeps on buffering every few seconds--making this camera completely worthless. Even when I try to use the Wyze App, the buffering continues.  I have another regular Wyze Camera and that works flawlessly both on Wyze App and on Alexa Echo Devices.  I will have no other option but to return the Pan Camera .  There are other reviews about this buffering issue and it is blamed on the manufacturer's faulty software and hardware.  I hope Wyze fixes this issue and replace the faulty cameras for the unfortunate buyers.
title: Live view stalls, keeps on buffering often.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: USP357
content: This camera is very good.  My only issue is the wall plug. It need to be 90 degree offset instead of a straight plug that is about 2 inches long.  And motor for pan and tilt is a bit noisy but the motion tracking is great fast it gives you 2 choices noise or just plain motion detection.  App is pretty fast to connect. Wish it had a live feed for cameras on the home page.
title: Good pan tilt camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: bobbyrne
content: Like the system ,the picture is great .bought 2 more ,but the pan scan camera walked off the table in the middle of the night ,so now it’s dead after 1 fall .think I’m going to stick with them thou . Because I like what there doing .ive tried several cameras over the years ,some were really expensive.cant beat the price on this system .going to see if they last ,will update .
title: Let’s see .

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rebecca J. Matyas
content: like the cameras that I have got I have three of them two of which I got from Amazon which was a good idea and 1/3 I got directly from Wyze which was not a good idea. The cameras do what they say they do and that's fine you can't make real long recordings a less now you pay wyze more money for an option which I don't think is worth it. my dealings with Amazon even with these products have always been excellent but my dealing when I had to go to Wyze for help support on new product which I bought directly from them the support was terrible so keep that in mind.
title: Good reasonable camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KrisQ
content: These cameras work well. I have two of these pan cameras and two of the stationary cameras. I have all of them set on continuous recording using 32gigs sd cards in each camera. I have only had one issue with one camera recognizing the sad card. All you have to do is reformat the sd card it’ll recognize it. The Wyze app is nice and pulls up the cameras live feed quickly. Best part is there’s no subscription.
title: Wyze cameras are worth their affordable price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Big O
content: This little camera is packed with features that you are only going to get with cameras that cost $100 and up. Pan, zoom, auto track by sound, motion or people detection, auto or manually rotate all the way around 360degrees.  Two way audio so that you can listen in or speak to someone. It has an amazing picture in day or night. Sends alerts when it detects sound or motion. Free 15sec video clips of every alert, plus you can upgrade internal micro SD card for continuous recording. I am truly amazed at the quality and hard work the Wyze folks have put into these camera at a bargain price. Give this little camera a try and you will not be disappointed.
title: Wyze cams are hands down the best value you can get!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BasilDill
content: I’ve been looking for months for a “pet cam” this does such a great job. Super easy to setup, price point is incredible too. My wife and I use it everyday. I opted for this instead of the Ring doorbell. I positioned this in my front window so that I could move the camera to see the front porch and also turn it to view the pets. It has a rotating base so the whole camera turns almost 360 degrees. There is 2 way communication with it so I can hear what’s happening inside and tell my dogs to go lay down if they are barking all day which is more common than I thought! The other bonus feature is it can supposedly listen for the loud beeping of a smoke detector or Co2 detector which means this baby can save me $100 on a smart smoke detector, it says it will send a 10 second push notification video to your phone if it picks up any of the detectors. Which is great because I can then go watch the video and then call 911 if needed.
title: Awesome more features than I thought! We use daily!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: P&P15
content: So far this thing seems very buggy. I get an 'update failed' notification every time I respond to its suggestion that I upgrade the software.  Picture is ok, but my camera that cost $15 more (also on Amazon) is demonstrably clearer.  Unit seems loud mechanically as it pans around and responds to commands. There is a very obvious 30 second delay on the image capture during recording, which is jarring. Overall: I am very meh on this one.
title: Not bad, not great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: deepsoul13
content: Overall great camera except if your internet resets while you’re away, this thing won’t reconnect. My internet provider has an outage for a few hours.  Usually devices attempt to reconnect on their own once internet is back up (like all my other devices did). This thing just sat as “disconnected” until I got home and manually reset it. It’s clearly unreliable to leave alone for long periods of time.
title: Unreliable connectivity but good camera quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mark J in FL
content: The idea that you can buy a wifi security camera with active motion detection & panning, zoom capability, night vision, an ability to rotate 360 degrees and integrate with Alexa and through your it’s own software on your smartphone.... for $37 is pretty amazing. The full color image isn’t HD and the night vision isn’t the absolute best available, but bang-for-the-buck is definitely here with this Wyze camera. Completely integrates with my house-wide Alexa set-up.  I’d recommend.
title: Wyze WiFi Cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John V.
content: This is by far the best indoor cam I have used to date.  Blink is horrible, Arlo keeps dropping and the off brand from China with 360 degree pan and tilt works ok but the speaker function is worthless.  The wyze cam connects quickly, moves seamlessly and the audio is what you would expect on a higher end unit with a budget buy expense.  If you use these cameras to keep tabs on your senior citizen, THIS is the one to use.
title: A Game Changer !!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Allyson
content: Purchased this before going out of town for a week so we could keep an eye on our cat, Dexter. The camera does make some noise when you rotate/pan AND you can talk to your pet through the Wyze app. Our cat would come walking over nearly every time! Since we bought it back in March, we have been out of town 3 times. It's nice to check on things at home and most importantly, see your fur baby in real time! 😊 Definitely a great purchase! No issues so far either!
title: 💙 Love our camera! 💙

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: alaa alshahed
content: I really didn't expect to see very good cam with this price and I purchased two model from this brand and after trying it out I was really surprised how good it is. I connected to my Android phone (note 9) and set it to notify me for any motion detected and wow also the speaker on the camera not High enough but can do the job. the night vision is really something. from my side i will recommend this product for everyone. I will add another line here to thank this company for the customer service as they are very helpful and fast to respond for any issue and question :)
title: This camera is the best out there for this price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: George Henry
content: I have Samsung Smartcams and Blink XTs.  Blink and Wyze are great products. Wyze is a super value. Before you spend more for an outside camera, survey your desired area closely to determine if you can place an indoor camera on a small speaker shelf mounted to the glass pane of one of your windows. Inside means you can plug into a handy outlet instead of depending on batteries. I have a couple of Wyze tilt and pan cameras mounted this way and they provide terrific outside views of both the front and back of my house. With the shelf I am out a total of $45/ea.
title: Great performance and value!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Geegee
content: Bought two cameras because we have teens!! We can hear & see them when we leave! Great accountability for teens! Just plug in and connect to the wi-fi! So easy to set up at home. Then I installed the app on my phone, it was so simple. The night vision is really great, as well as the 360 scanning ability of the cameras. Would highly recommend for teens :) or if you have pets at home!
title: Easy to use!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ho Lam
content: Five stars products. I have both fix and pan cameras. Very easy to set up and remote viewing is great with very little lag unlike other products (rhyme with low!). The price is very low for such a high quality product.
title: Exceptionally easy to set up and view

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gabriel M
content: This camera is perfect for me, hands down. I use it to look at my dogs while I am at work, because they are trouble makers and it shows me who is the one destroying everything...LOL. I had bought a dog camera that tosses treats for $140 and it doesn't even move... It caused an issue because I needed more angles to be able to see other parts of the house. Had an indecent where I didn't see my dogs in the camera view and turned out they got into the bedroom somehow and I didn't know it. So, I bought this camera and it is amazing. The fact that it can rotate 360 degrees makes it so easy to move around and see where my dogs are at all times. Love it.
title: Perfect for what I need it for

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BerryP
content: I have purchased other cameras which all cost more and the WYZE cameras have been the best out of all my other cameras!  I love this camera. UPDATE:  This is a great camera but the night vision has stopped working.  My other camera, WYZE Cam, is still working great.  This appears to be a common issue with the Wyze Cam Pan, I have tried all the suggestions offered online to fix the night vision problem with no success. 2nd UPDATE: I have given this a 5 star because the WYZE company has offered me a replacement.  Their support center was great with their replies to my issue.
title: Best camera ever!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alex The Great
content: Wyze is a very nasty company who try and trick people into subscriptions and then make it very hard to cancel. With its price and reviews I thought this camera was too good to be true.  It was too good to be true. Stopped working multiple times (which isnt much good for a security camera). And every time it updated firmware you had to reset the camera and add it back to the app.
title: Horrible company who try to trick you into signing up for a service you have to call to cancel

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Revelation
content: The price is right.  The video quality is good.  Being able to pan and zoom is great.  The app is easy to use.  It stores video without needing to pay for it.  It was easy to set up. I will be purchasing more of these.  It adjusts the video quality in real time for the current wireless throughput availability.  The audio quality is OK, but I don't really care about that much.  There is a slight sound when it pans left-to-right, but not up/down. For this price, it is worth it.
title: Amazing value.  Hard to be disappointed.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jason Vale
content: I returned three cameras because they were making loud alarm sounds they were spinning around At random times throughout the day and night and it turned out it was because of my own defective 32 gig card that I put in it. This camera is the most amazing do everything in every position every angle every option camera out there for the lunatic price of $30. I thought I had defective cameras but I should’ve had more faith in Wyze. It was my own defective card
title: It was my own fault

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: cessna10
content: never thought it would work so well.  purchased due to going on a cruise and wanted to monitor the furnace.  I shared it with my daughter so she could skip the 30 mile drive daily.  it saved her some mileage but no money, she ended up buying two.  I must have sold about 10  while on the cruise, just pull out your cell and display the view, it sells itself, an absolutely outstanding device,  I'm a 70+ guy  and i was able to set it up, first try.  All you need is internet access  to connect to your phone
title: Outstanding works well

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mary
content: We love the two pan cameras that we purchased. We used a mount for each camera. They were easy to set up. I did have a bit of an issue with the camera reading the QSR code off my camera, but I also have a filter on the screen so that may have been the issue. It was easy to set up. We watched some videos online to learn more about the features but overall we are very pleased. The cameras are doing exactly what we needed!
title: Great Cameras!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nick T.
content: I bought a couple of these and one of the Wyse fixed cameras after watching glowing reviews online. I can't believe how easy they were to set up and use after dealing with various other brands including Samsung and Foscam cameras. I'm going to replace all my existing indoor cameras with these and wish they had outdoor ones. I am going to mount one outdoor under a protected porch as several people have done it using a cover. No more $100 cams that frustrate me trying to connect or even view after they get going.
title: Wow, what a great camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Aladin
content: Camera works fine except it keeps asking to Power Cycle the camera, which involves, disconnecting and reconnecting the power. This renders the camera useless to me , as I bought it to monitor my home when I am not there. If I were always there to Power Cycle, I wouldn't need to have bought the camera. This is a massive flaw for a remote camera.
title: Keeps asking to ," Power cycle the camera'.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alicee
content: While not any kind of high tech gadget, this little cam is pretty good! Nice to have peace of mind when you're not home with this camera! You can swivel it 360, pan left or right, and the clarity of speaking through it is fantastic! I'm seriously considering a couple more.....better than spending money for a security system and monitoring fee!
title: handy little cam!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Corinne Kaiser
content: My husband bought me this camera for Christmas so I would stop asking him what our kitten was doing at home while I was at work. I've since recommended it to my dad and a good friend - we all love it! THINGS I LOVE - Picture quality Wide angle lense Vertical movement of camera 360° spin Fire alarm detection (this actually works and it sends you a recording - it happened to us last week) Recording capabilities Sleek look Long cord option Quiet mechanical sound when it pans The one thing that could be improved is the sound quality. There's some lag time between talking into your phone and the sound emitting from the camera. Not a huge deal if you're not using the camera to talk to people. I have noticed that this week the sound got super quiet and there's no way to adjust the volume...we're not sure if that was an app update or something went wrong with the speaker. We don't really use that feature, so it's a bug we'll live wirh. Overall, this product is awesome. We can't wait to buy more/see what Wyze upgrades come out next.
title: Purrfect pet cam!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dustin F.
content: For the price it’s unbeatable. However, there is no motion detection alert for your phone. It’s very noisy when you move the camera with the controls. If someone was to break in, they’d know you were watching with a bright blue LED shining at them and the noise from the camera movement. Also, kinda odd, the camera will start spinning 360 degrees on its own, out of nowhere, like the possessed child in the exorcist. Which is even more odd because on the controls it will not let you go 360 degrees all the way around.
title: Good camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tu
content: I bought this to keep an eye on the house before we were able to move in and to check in on the dog when I'm not there. It did a good job recording videos in response to motion and sounds and alerting me when it does so. There were only a few times when it got fooled by shadows on the wall. Night vision is pretty good also but, as stated in the product description, it's not able to look outside because of the glare from the IR light. I'm considering getting another to look at the back door to let me know when the dog wants back in.
title: Works as described

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mak Builders
content: Best Camera for the price. Good quality. Good Sound Quality also! Good picture. Very Easy to hook up to your phone for viewing. I prefer hardwire systems but this is a very easy install and affordable unit.  You won't be disappointed! As long as the price doesn't start going overboard! Just under $40 for the Pan Cam and just under $30 for the regular. Both have sound and same quality picture / video except you can't Pan with the regular one.
title: Excellent Bang for the Buck!! Sound,Video & EASY set up!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Colonel Kurtz
content: Super easy to set up, great picture, very reliable. Have also purchased/set up additional Wyze products--motion sensors, door/windor sensors and networked together. I'm sure it's great for homeowners, but speaking as an apartment dweller it's nice to be able to set up a system that I can check in on even from out of state without drilling, wires, subscriptions, etc. And considering the price, even more amazing
title: Incredible value, great product, super easy setup

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TD Newsome
content: I love this cam. Super easy to install. Great detail. Tons of functionality. It literally works just as it is supposed to. I wish it was a wireless charger but not a deal breaker. I have an apartment and have maintenance men coming in when I am not there. It detects motion and people and follows them around the room. It then alerts me immediately on my phone. I love it!! Great price as well!
title: Top 5 products I have ever purchased.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Smashie
content: I use this to see what my dogs are doing while no one is home.  I absolutely love this camera! The price point is biggest reason I chose this over others.  I cannot believe the quality.  The only downside is the 2 way audio. I can hear what's going on but when I tried to use the speaker functions there is lots of distortion.  I also have problems with my ring doorbell with the 2way audio so it could be something in my home interfering. Great purchase and I have told many people about this camera!
title: Best little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ronny the Chemist
content: Great for the price. Worth the purchase. However, there are small bugs that can really annoy: 1. Lagging picture even with high speed internet 2. Camera pan is inconsistent, returning to a saved position is always approximate and never to the exact location
title: Great for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jacob C.
content: The camera worked fine for a while but after they came out with a new subscription model that required a firmware upgrade the camera is now useless. It stays connected to WiFi for maybe an hour then disconnects and starts spinning all over the place. I tried talking to Wyze support but their in-app chat is so buggy hat it kept pushing me to the back of the line mid-conversation.
title: Loses WiFi connection constantly, worthless

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nacho Libra
content: Returned it. I'm not stupid when it comes to installing security cameras. I've installed the Arlo, Ring system, and the Canary among others. I was looking for something inexpensive with a sharp image. This connected to my wi-fi fine, but no matter what settings I tried, it would not detect any motion. RETURNED - I probably got a defective camera as now and then there are some in the bunch, but I'm not wasting any more time with this brand.
title: Never worked

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John Online Buyer
content: These work very well and priced nicely.  Easy set up but be aware your WI-FI has to be password protected.  Living in a rural area never found a need for password protection but was able to set up another Wi-Fi on my router that is password protected while leaving the others open.  I have another one of these at a lake house and it works great set inside a window looking out.  Very impressed.
title: Really good value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J Breese
content: The price was so good I had to check it out. Had two nest cams previously and this mostly matched the nest cam step for Step.  The one drawback is that when playing back recorded events you don’t get frame-by-frame fast forward playback.  That makes it difficult to search if you’re looking for a particular moment or just wanting to quickly see what happened on cam for the day. But the fact that you don’t have to pay a subscription to record  makes this a minor inconvenience. Well worth the money as this company continues to improve the product and add features  frequently.
title: Great cameras at a great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A Hinshaw
content: I have this inside, pointed at my front door and it is a great deal for the cost. It picks up when a person is there and sends an alert to my phone. I can see when the mail carrier or dog walker arrives, as well as people who ring my doorbell. It also records a short clip where you can take a screen grab or enlarge. Bonus, it pans around 180 degrees so I can spin it around and see, listen to and talk to my dogs! This is so much less expensive than other options, I'm getting one for other parts of the house.
title: Security camera and fun doggie cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Barb Williams
content: I purchased these to be able to keep an eye on my elderly mom and her in house aides. The picture quality is decent. However, I’m really disappointed with the microphone. I have literally yelled into the microphone to talk to mom and she can’t hear me. We’ve tested it multiple times from different users  trying to talk and our voices are barely a whisper coming thru.  Sadly, the time to return these cameras has passed so we are stuck with them. I will be looking for a different brand to replace these.
title: Poor microphone to talk into

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Slacker
content: I have 6 of the non-panning version and 3 of these pan versions.  Within a few weeks of use, 2 of these pan units had to be returned for various reasons.  One would stop working completely, and the second would power-cycle every 2 minutes.  The third one, however, still works flawlessly.  The non-pan units still work just fine.  Thank goodness for Amazon Prime hassle-free return.  Overall,  great units for the price.
title: Your mileage may vary

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lucinda Parsons
content: I purchased the Wyze Cam Pan to check on my 90 year old mother and my 95 year old father. My only regret is I didn't think of this sooner. It is absolutely perfect for when my mother is at dialysis and my father is home by himself. I only live a half mile away but I have a very busy schedule and can't be there as often as I would like, so the camera is a lifesaver. Also my parents are notorious for not hanging up the phone and I worry about not being able to reach them. Now I can speak to them through the camera and tell them to hang up the phone rather then going over there. The clarity of the video is great. I never imagined such a small inexpensive thing could give me such peace of mind.
title: The Wyze Cam Pan is a Lifesaver

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M.G. Trehern
content: Personally for the money, it’s pretty good. So good, I bought another. I am very happy with my purchase. We are using it for porch security. Unfortunately the night vision is effected by the street lamp pointed at our porch so I can’t give you an honest review on that part, but if it was 100% dark, I might. Can’t wait to get the second one installed. I feel safer already.
title: Happy with my purchase, bought another

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A A
content: I bought two regular Wyze Cams and was impressed on value.  However, this Pan Camera does not work out of the box as the Motion Tracking and the Motion Detection Does not work.  So there is no recordings because the camera only records when it detects tracking.  Big waste of time. A review of the forums for Wyze explains that this is a common issue with the Pam Cam possibly related to firmware issues, and a complaint seen in the Amazon reviews.  Support for Wyze has no way to contact them directly.  Very poor.
title: Pan Cam does not work out of the Box - Unable to reach support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Predator
content: This camera is great. Easy out of the box setup, no port forwarding needed. I have remotely accessed this camera many times no issues. If it does not open just remotely shut camera off and restart. I assume you need good wifi in the remote area to make it work. The clarity and zoom function is smooth. I also use a Kasa smart plug to turn light on in the room remotely for better viewing but the night vision feature is very adequate. I monitor a door to see if it is moved. The camera can be set for motion and it sends you an alert on cell phone. Definitely 5 stars.
title: Reliable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Casey Cook
content: First camera would not detect motion and I had to exchange it.  Replacement camera detects motion, but has a really hard time tracking correctly.  It tends to overshoot the subject  Also, if there are multiple moving subjects the camera will bounce back and forth between them.  Basically motion tracking makes reviewing footage like watching a Michael Bay film he produced while having a tourettes induced seizure. It has potential and for the price maybe you can put up with some "character".  However, you can't rely on it to work when you need it to the most.
title: Motion tracking needs fixing.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sarah Cameron
content: I loved this camera until it just decided to stop working for no reason. Not even a year old. Looked up forums for help and Wyze are very very poor at getting back to customers who all seem to have the same issue. The camera just malfunctions . I have tried everything to reset and it is just broke. There are a lot of customers out there with major issues with this camera.  Customer service is spotty at best.
title: Dont buy it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: be-you-tiful
content: Record time and play back is great. I like that these take an SD card. Sounds quality both ways is terrible. This is the only reason I'm sending it back. I bought a Blink camera and sound is great, however it does not have an SD slot and is so slow to connect at times with its 30 second view duration, so often you miss out on a conversation or argument taking place.
title: Not for me

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mar G.
content: Good definition video, pan/tilt option but unreliable. It always disconnecting and restarts take a while. Sent back for replacement. Hopefully the new unit doesn’t have this issue.
title: Good cam but always disconnects

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tack
content: The camera was great for 2 days. Then it started rebooting a lot. Checked my network all was good. Then went to check the camera yesterday and it was offline. Have now attempted to reconnect it to 3 different 2.4ghz networks and none show even a hint of it attempting to connect in logs. Support ask what you have tried so they don't have to ask you to do things you have already tried. Then proceed to ask you to do the things you listed as tried. Will be returning it.
title: Worked for 2 days

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Z1Z2
content: Should have bought this a long time ago. We've had packages and our recyclables stolen several times in the past. Now everyone who walks by sees the camera which i placed by our window and I hope it deters them enough to leave our stuff alone. Great video, picture and audio quality. Love that it's customizable too. No complaints! Don't doubt the thousands of reviews! This cam is great!
title: Great video,audio,picture quality!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: julie
content: I bought 4 of the PTZ $35 models. Hardware is worth it. SOFTWARE IS JUNK. If you ever have to review your camera footage IT IS WORTHLESS. The FORWARD and REVERSE buttons don't work. If you try to record video while watching the footage it is horrible. Buy something else. Better to spend more dollars and get something that works, than go cheap and find you basically can't go back a day or 2 and review and record from stored footage on the Micro SD card I have on each camera.
title: Software is junk. This is for a child's toy.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: L. Weigand
content: I foster cats and kittens and bought this to check on them while at work. It was a good decision! The camera is VERY  easy to set up and install (along with the necessary app). The pan and zoom functions are great, as is the microphone. The night sight is pretty good as well. It is easy to take photos of the happenings being recorded. I liked this so much I bought two of the stationary cameras as well!
title: Great Value, Easy to Use

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BEE
content: I put 3 of these in my 92 year old mothers house. The app allows me to monitor her from my house in Israel and I could share the connection with my brother who lives close to mom. The app is easy to use and it works excellently. When light levels are low the image is black and white.  In darkness you still see adequately. I am very happy with it.
title: It does what is important

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sandy T
