content: I was skeptical at first when a friend recommended this brand - and had she not showed me the picture she got on her phone at the time, I would not have given it another look. One, I was locked in looking at much BIGGER and PRICEY cameras, which is what I thought I would need to have. After looking at this, I totally reconsidered. Now my application was for viewing my dogs,  several locations and wanted to see them at night. Also wanted an easy way to view, some platform to easily log-on and see my pups. This thing is awesome! It does this AND more! I can pan the camera .... like really rotates almost 360 degrees ( and tilts up and down) - and I can hear them and I can talk to them. The app is super easy to use and set-up was quick. I was prepared to spend $1000 on a multi camera set-up .... but now am so happy I am going to buy more of these and save a bunch of change. Think most anyone would be happy with the results.
title: If you want a great little camera that delivers BIG at a GREAT price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bryan magliazzo
content: WOW!!! For the price, why buy anything els. I totally didnt expect the quality and the functions. It gives you so many functions. From panning 360 and motion and everything you could need. Night vision works great. I work on the road and love using the mic and speaker to talk to my wife and keeps. I thought the video was a little crummy but the. I notice I was only on 360p and switched to HD. My internet can handle this no problem. buying one for each room, now they just need exterior cameras.
title: WOW!! Only camera you need

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rafael
content: The playback feature rarely works when I need it. I've contacted tech support and they replaced it right away because it may have been "defective". However the new unit does the same thing. When going to see playback it states that there is no SD card. I have to reset the unit so it can start to record playback. However you don't know when it stops working u til you try to use that feature. If they can fix this it would be perfect.
title: Playback feature seldom works

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Fenway29
content: After purchasing this camera thinking i could save a little on a Nest, I am now looking to return this if I could. even for $15. it is usable, but is a toy next to the nest cam. so many hicups i just want out. Glad I only purchased one.
title: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision,

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AjLoz
content: I love this camera!!!  You need one of these... everyone needs one of these.  Amazing quality for the price.  Extremely clear picture and pretty darn good speaker/mic quality.  I use this camera on a swivel mount that is sold separately to check in on my fur babies.  The eye itself moves in every direction,  but the camera itself can move completely 360°.  Date and time stamp on screen and if you get a micro sd card you can go back and review,  record and save clips and photos.  Shipped quickly and arrived packaged well.
title: I love this camera!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: bigfoot
content: Don't let the low price dissuade you, this is a terrific camera and comes complete with free cloud storage for motion detection videos. In settings, I recommend you click through to detection and activate "person" detection which will prompt you to update the software.  This update improved all motion detection and you can then deactivate person detection if you like. Lots of YouTube video available if you have any operation questions
title: Fantastic value, great quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: George Steiner
content: They recently announced a monthly subscription for $1.50 per camera. Without this motion detection they only record for 12 seconds and then wait five minutes before they will re-trigger. They catch some stuff but it’s pretty hit or miss. I didn’t used to understand why the motion capture was limited, now I do, they want you to buy a monthly subscription. I think it’s pretty reasonably priced, it was just frustrating for me because I bought this camera thinking I wouldn’t need a monthly subscription. So heads up!
title: Only semi helpful unless you get the monthly subscription

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John N.
content: Really good camera for the money. I have a problem with it losing connectivity. I’m not sure if it’s the device or some other issue, but both of my cameras are in different rooms and they do the same thing. I sometimes lose connectivity with my other devices but not quite as often as with these. Picture quality is fine. Operation remotely is fine. I mostly use it to speak to my dog when I’m not at home!
title: Good value but connectivity may be an issue

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Awkward Arsic
content: I purchased this camera to keep an eye on my pup while crate training her and it's been great! When she's in there for 1-2 hours at time, I'm able to monitor her and see if she is whining. I'm even able to correct her with 2-way audio. The night vision and motion detection also works really well for a device that cost under $50. Definitely a great alternative to the Furbo which is nearly $150.
title: Great for pet owners!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Susan L. Scott
content: Love it. My daughter uses this for monitoring her nanny while she works. When we had some questions about my mother’s care in assisted living, I thought, “This will work there, too.” It has been great. Mom isn’t too happy that I installed it, but she has forgotten that it is there and it gives me peace of mind to see that she is getting her meds on time. Installation is super easy. Don’t even think twice about whether or not to try this device.
title: Your eyes on your loved ones

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Edgardo J Heredia
content: Due to COVID, I have relatives taking care of my kids at home. So I got the camera to keep an eye on my kids. I am extremely happy with the quality of the video. The audio and microphone are a little low however I appreciate the fact that it's included. The App is easy to use and one can customize it easily also the installation was easy. sends a notification to your phone when motion or noise is detected. One can customize alerts or disable this if desired. It also sends a notification for smoke or Co2 alarm if the alarm is heard. I love that one can control the camera 360 degrees and track my family if they are not in the field of view.
title: Awesome

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: fiver45
content: I like that this worked as advertised.  I don't like that there site was hacked.  Fortunately I was so new I don't "think" I was very exposed.  I only "selected" local storage so therefore I think I am OK.  Cloud storage is offered.  The good stuff I bought 3 cameras to replace a  another brand that failed within the warranty period and the manufacturer would not respond to warranty work.  All three have worked as expected.  The APP  is easy and straight forward.  So far I love these cameras's.
title: Operates as advertised

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kathy E. Poole
content: I bought three of these to keep an eye on my Elderly mom after she had a stroke. They have worked beautifully! My sister also downloaded the app and can help me watch her while I’m working to make sure she’s ok. The only think that annoys me is having to flip back and forth from one camera to another when she moves about the house! Not a big deal, but I wish they could be set up to pick up where one leaves off when there’s motion. I don’t have a card in mine, nor do I do the 12 second video captures. I do leave it by my beside at night so I can hear the camera Moving most Of the time when she gets up.  These cameras have certainly Provided peace of mind for my Family.
title: Great to view elderly parents that live alone!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Malone Girl
content: The quality of the picture on this thing is terrible. It's nothing like the regular WYZE cams. Going to relocate it and see if that helps.. but pretty bad/ blurry picture. My house isnt that large so it should show a clear pic of my little living room!
title: Eh..

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Donald
content: I had liked these cameras originally because they were cheap, i dont like these cameras now because they perform like they are cheap. Im tired of all of the cameras having random issues including dropping connection with the router but everything else connects with out errors ever. Over all these cameras are frustrating to use, and just seem like unreliable beta level toys.
title: Not ready for prime time.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: darcy antonson
content: We bought this camera after someone broke in to our apartment. It added a huge level of security and it’s really easy to set up. It will connect to your WiFi and you can download the free Wyze app and view your camera in real time or watch captured videos play back. You can even share it across devices so I have access and my roommate has access. We have it set up to alert us if there is movement or noise. You can also move the camera 360% or set it up to follow movement all the way around when it tracks movement/noise.
title: Great added level of security

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sophie M
content: We have tried camera after camera for our daughter's room. This by FAR is the easiest and best camera we've ever used. The app is SO easy to use, the set up was way easier than any other camera we've used, and it STILL works! A lot of the other cameras we used would crap out after a month or two or the app would suck. This has been amazing so far. We just had a baby 3 months ago and plan on getting another one for his room when he leaves ours!
title: LOVE THIS CAMERA!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SinfulPhantom
content: The camera was a impulse buy because I left my house for two weeks while I was on my honeymoon. You’re able to set different sensors (motion, sound, etc...) that will alert your phone as well as take about a 30 second long clip of what it purports led up. Now I use it to monitor my animals at home and it gives me a piece of mind when I leave my house. The app is decent. I think once they developers polish and give a bit of a performance enhancement, this camera and software would be flawless.
title: Fantastic camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: D.W.H.
content: only a 4 instead of a 5 because it doesn't always recognize that it has a SD card installed. As a result it doesn't always record to local storage. So far shutting down and restarting fixes the problem. It does happen a lot,
title: Almost perfect but

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Allyson D
content: I got this as a baby monitor for my nursery. Its going to work great as one! I just have it sitting in the window currently but I will be mounting it to the wall. The picture is very clear even with the night vision. Its very responsive when rotating it manual, motion tracking works great, and there's no lag. I also love the 2 way talk function.
title: Great baby monitor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kevin R.
content: What an awesome product this is! For the features and build quality you can not beat the price. Love the pan and tilt feature it has, and that I can speak through the app to where the camera is located (works great for yelling at your cat when it's misbehaving!) Setup was very easy, and I like that you can configure a schedule of when you want to receive notifications (if not all the time). I also like the fact that you can record footage directly onto an SD memory card.
title: Awesome camera that has surpassed my expectations!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Miss Ashley
content: Got my little camera to catch myself sleepwalking. I had mystery bruises. This things motion detection, clear pics, night vision, all of it are better than my sons $200 trail camera!! And easy to set up. It’s be great for a non tech savvy person to use. Like my mother. She will be getting one soon too. The app helps you set it up and in 5 minutes you’re up and running. It’s not very large either so you can hide it really well. Love it.
title: Worth every penny!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kel
content: This is a very good camera.  Other than my cons below( which could be fixed with software updates) i'd say this is a camera i'd recommend. Pros: Picture quality is clear and i'm using it at 360p (SD) quality. Sound can be heard  pretty clear useful ability to slow down the rotate speed cons: playback can be spotty, meaning you may not get continuous video, but if you have it on motion detect it won't be needed 2 way communication delay may not catch everything said by both parties.
title: Very good Cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Melissa Torres
content: I just got my camera today and it never turned on while connected to the power outlet. I asked for another camera and will update the review once I get it and hopefully next time it works.
title: Never turned on

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dale
content: Firmware was "upgraded" to increase the fisheye effect. The Horizontal field was increased at the expense of the vertical and now has a really weird field of vision and what is the field of vision is distorted. tech support was evasive about trying to deal with the problem and finally I was told, in essence, I am out of luck Camera died after 14 months of casual use
title: No way, no more

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Forrest C. Misenti
content: Camera won't work after 6 months. Have used it MAYBE 6 times in total during that time. Repeatedly shuts itself off instead of connecting the camera before I can even hit the "set up" button, or it says it is "ready to connect" and it doesn't scan the code to register the camera at all, and then shuts off again. Shame.
title: No Longer Working Under 6 Months

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Vincent F.
content: The camera works great for my purposes. Good video quality with the option to change between HD, SD, and 360p. You can also turn off the IR lights to do night vision through glass. However, I would recommend supplying some light to the surveilled area otherwise it may get too dark to pick up anything. Perhaps a night light of some sort. One bit of useful information for anyone creating their own mount, the base screw hole is 1/4” - 20 size. This can be found in the Wyze app, in the shop, by clicking on the Cam Pan and viewing tech specs. Took me awhile to figure it out, hopefully this saves you sometime. I’ve also used a machine screw #12-32.
title: Mounting hole and night vision tip

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rudy
content: Well not quite what I expected for my use. I have this item in my living room and monitors across the front door thru the dining room into the kitchen. Under normal light it’s ok. The real issue is when you turn on a light in the distance and this is located in a dark room. Example in my case is, this is in living room (light off in living room) and you turn on kitchen light (in the distance) you cannot see anything in the kitchen area as the light from it turns the camera area, in the kitchen, into a blob of white light. So now you cannot make out what is going on or who is even there.
title: Not ready for prime time

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R1
content: Might be nice product if it worked like it is supposed to. The camera I received does not have functioning motion tracking or tagging.  The event notification is also not working, most likely because tracking is not functional.  I did load older versions of software but nothing helped. Most likely will be sending this back for a replacement. If the replacement does the same thing I'll return it and be done with Wyze.
title: No motion tracking or tagging

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ralph Mikulas
content: I have to share that my first purchase of my camera was defective.  I could not get it to connect with my internet.  I got on the phone with several employees, who were very nice.  We trouble shooted all possibilities.  I then sent  back the camera for a replacement in which I received my new one the next day.  The new one works great so far.  No problems connecting, great pictures.
title: First web cam was defective! Replacement cam works great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R. Ellman
content: I just bought this camera last week.  After returning many cameras that did not do as they promised or were impossible to set up bc the instructions were not clear, I bought this one.  I needed a camera that I could pan to keep an eye on my dog when he is outside.  This camera is set up at the window overlooking the dog fenced in area...and I can use my phone to monitor the dog and pan the various areas of the fenced in backyard. Absolutely love this camera!  It was easy to set up and so far has been terrific.
title: This camera was easy to set up and works perfectly!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: questions questions
content: When I first got this product I loved it! After a few months, connectivity via the Wyze Cam app became pretty useless. I'm unable to connect out of home. The only way to fix connectivity issues is to be able to access the camera, which isn't helpful if you're not at home. At first this only happened occasionally and wasn't too big a deal, but it's since become a daily problem. I don't see the point of having a cloud security camera if you can't access it from outside the home. I'm looking at other options.
title: Out of Home Connection Spotty

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jason
content: I enjoyed this little cam for three months until it told me there was no SD card when i tried to view video feedback while away on vacation. Very frustrating... When I returned home. I attempted to reset/reload all that. Long story short, I opened it up and found all four wires were so twisted that they had snapped. Don't waste your money on this. Just get the regular one that doesn't pan unless you want a product that will destroy itself within three months
title: The wires inside will twist until they break. This takes about three months.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Review
content: Picture is great and crisp. Motion tracking is awesome. Aside from the fact that it doesn't always pick up motion...I miss quite a bit. Night vision SUCKS. And if I'm manually moving the camera it moved back on it's own to the front, then it lags and makes me have to move it back all over again...which takes time. Away from home its super slow and lags a ton. Did I mention Night Vision SUCKS?? Now I'm stuck needing a cam ASAP and having to wrap this back up and return it and WAIT for a refund..which does me no good NOW. If you want a cam that has great picture quality but low performance, I recommend this one. It just seems to detect motions randomly and skip most, even on high setting.
title: Night Vision is awful

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Somogji
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Very Great Product it makes your life so simple Once you set it up you can let the camera turn on it’s own to get a better look at what the camera picked up. This is my second camera
title: Very Great Product I recommend getting one this is my second camera from them

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jbgerloff
content: I was hesitant to buy this camera as it appeared to have many nice features at a price point below the mainstream, heavily promoted cameras on the market. Surprise! This camera has good optical features, clear, crisp imaging, and easy to control with the phone app. The fact that is swivels to face the direction of sounds is eerie, but it captures images that may be behind it and then  re-aims itself back to where it was setup to look. I limed this camera so much that I bought a second one and the outdoor mounting kit so I can mount one on my porch ceiling. Great Product!
title: Good image nice motion detection, at  a great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Laura S.
content: I bought this as a replacement for my Furbo dog camera, which was having all sorts of issues/bugs. It has better image, the rotation and tracking work great, and the push notifications are consistent (motion, sound, person). I'm really happy with this camera. My shipment was lost/delayed for a while so they sent a replacement and I ended up keeping both (charged for both since I didn't return one) because they work so well and don't cost much. I'd highly recommend this as a pet camera. (Of course it does not throw treats)
title: Great quality and price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lulu
content: Perfect for watching over our bed puppy while crate training.  I love that I can talk to him to calm him when he’s barking while I’m at work.  Camera swivels nearly 360 degrees, zooms, moves in all directions, and sound quality is great.  It does, however have a very slight delay in feed. Overall, happy I made the purchase!
title: Perfect for Puppy Watching

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brian W.
content: Small compact and easy setup! The motion detection software was great but now just good. The company they wrote motion detection with pulled  a fast one on them and took rights from them to use it.  Also if you have android phone you will get your notifications not as constant as an iphone but all in all a great device to have in your home that you can expand on to build your own home security system.
title: Great Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: meme
content: Really amazing, did not let me down. I suspected someone was going through my stuff at home, and sure enough a neighbor was caught. Consistent reliable video, great motion activation. I tried a product for 3 times the price, and it crapped out literally the next day. Reliability was key for me because you don't know when someone will be showing up at the apartment. So, although it did not bring happy news, it did its job.
title: Proved my suspicions.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Hilary Schneider
content: Good little cameras but super buggy.  Setup is theoretically easy but the app is very inconsistent.  Connecting cameras took many tries of unplugging and restarting devices.  Finally got them all hooked up (2 cam pans and one basic cam) but was not receiving notifications of movement so had to redo everything.  Installing sd cards was the same.  Took many tries on each camera.  Cams turn on and off for no reason.  You'll get notifications for nothing then not get notifications when you should.  But again, for the price point, you can't really complain much.  Just don't expect greatness.
title: OK for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jakob
content: 2 months update - night vision is pretty bad, I have a 3 year old Yi camera that is in the same price range and it is substantially better with both sound it picks up and well as night vision.  (Downgraded from 3 to 2) Google integration sucks. Trying to view it on any display is awful between not showing up at all to extreme latency to working 39 sec than stopping.
title: If you want it to be smart camera go somewhere else

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A.N.
content: This camera worked great for about a month, then consistently only took motion detection pictures of leaves moving and not of people walking by. I changed the sensitivity settings multiple times, but still could not get this thing to capture people walking up my drive way even though it was within the perfect view. Of course this all started after the return date passed. So now I am stuck with a camera that only takes pictures of the “threatening leaves” and not the multiple people walking up to my home.
title: Useless.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RAW Jr
content: This was a no brainer to buy for my lady that is always worried about the cat... She can check on her cat from any mobile device and speak to the cat through the microphone. And when you are out of town overnight, she has zero "How's the cat?" anxiety... And If you gal is happy then chances are increased dramatically that you will be too....
title: Woman Love their Cat!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MO816
content: I purchased this for our toddler's room after graduating from the baby monitor. I chose it because the image quality was fine with the static camera that we already had, but be aware that when it moves it's easily heard and did alert our kiddo awake one time she was on her way to sleep. I'm overall pleased with the company, just note this isn't a quiet motor.
title: Kind of loud when it moves

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rose Cler
content: Love the camera and it works very well with good picture. Only problem I have it’s that it sends alerts for my tree branches moving in the wind.  Tried repositioning but it follows that movement in front of the house.  I had to turn off alerts because of so many.  I do have the sd chip, so it records all movement.  Hasn’t been a problem.  Easy to set up, use, and monitor.
title: Good camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: victory
content: 1 star as 1) it failed when I most needed it. My toddler climbed out the crib and fell, and the camera failed for exactly those few seconds to record. The continuous recording was corrupted for those few seconds and captured a few sec after he landed on the floor which is not helpful, and the events recording is useless as it’s 5 min apart, and the continuous recording failed exactly. 2) I was told a manager from Wyze will contact me within 24 hours upon my first call to customer service. It’s been days and I haven’t heard a thing. Thought this is a great start up that cares about customers. Not at all. Extremely disappointed.
title: Fail exactly when you need it and poor customer service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Todd Sorgatz
content: The camera was great for about 6 months but after that it started having problems that rendered it useless.  After a firmware update notifications stopped in mine and my wife's phone...this is a key feature that must work. At about the same time the camera completely disconnects and shuts down, I could power cycle it and it would connect but it would only stay connected for a hour or so and then disconnect.  I have reached out to support but have heard nothing back.  It's cheap but not worth it if you have to throw in the garbage after a few months
title: Only worked for 6 months

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M. D. Sienzant
content: I've purchased two different Wyze Cameras (this and the Non Pan/Tilt/Zoom version) and neither of them recognize any MicroSD card I have purchased.  They've been formatted multiple different ways, on multiple different machines, and if I'm lucky I'll get one of the two cameras to chime and recognize the card for a split second before losing it. Its unfortunate because the video quality and ease of use is great.  If you plan to use it purely for streaming over IP and checking in at home, its great.  But Timelapse and Event Recording is out the window sadly.
title: Great Camera - Terrible MicroSD Support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sara Lewis
content: My bf and I bought this for the motion detection to be able to be notified if our dog went into the kitchen to snoop the trash. Motion detection is super sensitive, so it works great; good quality picture also.
title: Good quality, excellent motion detection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Home tech user
content: This is just my initial impression and first 24 hours of use. This camera is very impressive for its size and the function it has. I’ve owned and used many different WiFi cameras and so far this one is the best. All the features work well and the price is excellent. Any other camera trying to have these features would be well over $130 and would likely not work as well. *update* Known issues with cloud storage limited to 12 seconds and delay between detection series recording combined with camera destroying SD cards. See Wyze forum for details on known SD error.
title: Initial impressions

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nancy Williams
content: I have the camera in my living room, it’s only in color during the day when all the lights are on, just daylight doesn’t do it. Also, camera randomly starts rotating by itself and then positions itself facing the wall. It’s creepy and I don’t like it, then I have to manually move it back to face the door as I want it to. Picture quality is good. For the price, camera is good, except it moves itself.
title: For the price, it’s a good camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael D. Russcher
content: Wyze has been struggling to get the audio to properly sync with this device for almost two years but is unable to.  Everything else with the camera is fine, but I would never buy another one because they cannot get this feature working despite all of their effort.
title: Cannot sync audio on playback

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TeresaR
content: Somewhat easy set up (the instruction book lacks details, so go to youtube) and although it advertises night vision, it does not. After going to the Wyze cam website I learned that "Wyze Cam v1 is the only model with a light sensor in it. Both the Wyze Cam v2 and Wyze Cam Pan use an algorithm to determine the brightness of the image and change as needed." The algorithm must suck because at night all I see is black and if I walk right in front of the camera it does not see me to record the event.
title: Does not REALLY have night vision

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michelle
content: Works great for the most part during the day.  However, it catches movements like blowing limbs and even grass, doesn't always adhere to the area I have set for monitoring. Doesn't always distinguish between people and cars.  Night time vision is not good at all. It has done the job that I purchased for except for night time vision.
title: Decent camera for the most part.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sonia
content: This works perfectly, the quality is amazing. The Zoom capabilities are so great. Nighttime vision works charms! The ONLY thing that I would say- when the camera was plugged in, camera ON, but my App wasn't open- I was sitting on my bed and the camera started moving on its own. Obviously I unplugged it immediately because CREEPY! However, I turn it back on when I leave the dog in her crate. I don't know if it was a glitch or someone had access into the camera. I now have it unplugged and facing the wall. Don't trust it on anymore! However, I would still recommend this because of the size and the fact that you can't really see it on my shelf.
title: Amazing product!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Calgeek
content: We have four of these installed in our home to watch over the common areas and as a baby monitor.  They're great. Easy to install, easy to use, and very affordable way to get some video coverage in the house.  I wouldn't use these as a security system, but just to check in on the house, etc. they're great.  The app is pretty easy to use though I find that it often needs to be refreshed to show your devices again--loses the device list for some reason.  Not too big of a deal as it's easy to refresh the list, but annoying that it happens so often.  We have 128gb SD cards installed as well to record locally and those work great.
title: Cheap, easy to install and use

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Araceli C.
content: I will say I love how it follows my toddler around and the ability to zoom in. The motion gets stuck a little but it’s not that bad. I was disappointed this was not a wire free camera but that could have been my fault, by missing that information.  The quality could have been better. I have other security cameras that have a better quality but for the price it’s not bad if you don’t  mind it has to be connected.
title: Not bad but not the best picture quality. Not wire free!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: aneal2
content: For some reason, I thought all home cameras were really expensive, and therefore an inexpensive one would be of poor quality.  I was so wrong!  This camera took maybe 5 mins to get completely set up with the app.  The peace of mind it offers to me is priceless- I can check in on my pets while I am away from home to see what they are up to.  The picture quality is excellent!  I have told many friends about this camera.  I'm going to purchase another interior camera and one for my driveway as well.  Don't hesitate- this is such a great value!!
title: Wish I found WYZE cameras a long time ago!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Leanne
content: Love this thing! I use it for my dogs while they’re home alone. I have the sound detection on, and it alerts me to when they’re barking. I can then get their attention by speaking through the camera. I used to use a different camera, that didn’t have that setting, and couldn’t move in the app, and these features have made a huge improvement!
title: Sound detection for barking dogs

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TRothrock
content: Great camera for the price.  At home the cameras are very stable. I also have the camera at another home. I’m not sure if it’s my WiFi or the camera but it is slow to connect if it connects. Most likely WiFi issue. The motion tracking works good. The camera will follow a moth. The only problem I have with the camera is the sound. Compared to my blink cameras the volume is very low. Overall great cameras.
title: Great camera but poor sound

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SMRomy
content: this is the second and third camera I purchased of this brand.  The first one worked perfectly.  The second and third one worked for a couple of days and then disconnected from the network and would not reconnect.  I contacted the company for support.  It takes and day or two between each email (sometimes longer).  I have followed each step that they suggested, after having followed instructions from their web page.  Still not working.  I am returning them and will find another brand with acceptable support.
title: Won't connect to Network

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Catsmeat Potter-Pirbright
content: If you just want this for daytime, it’s a really good camera. I had the small original cam, and it was awesome day and night. I assumed this would be even better. I thought the first one I purchased was broken so I returned and replaced it. The replacement is about to go back, too. The night vision IR lights are on, it’s set to auto detect, and it’s twice as dark as the small cam. There are no big objects close to the camera, as those would usually be illuminated very brightly and cause the background to be dark... it’s in the same spot as my small cam on the wall was placed and you’re lucky to see five feet in front of this thing. Don’t waste your money on this one. Stick with the original cam.
title: Terrible terrible terrible night vision.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: P.
content: I love these. I have 2 as outdoor cams in silicone housings. Night mode is a bit washed out at a distance but this isn't made as an outdoor cam and it's $30! Can't beat this for the price until they release the new outdoor cam next year.
title: Amazing value for money with a ton of features.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: cale m. neighbors
content: I bought this orginally and returned it thinking it was cheap. After waiting a week and getting hyped up for my new 150.00 camara..it was awful. This outweighs almost all cameras out there and I've done some deep research. Don't let the price scare you...packaging is great! Delivery fast! Options I want! 40.00 heck yes! Buy this camara and you won't complain for a simple product. It keeps getting better too!
title: Love it! Can spy on myself now!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Matthew Grillo
content: I’ve read nothing but good reviews from this product and was excited to get my Wyze Cam Pan. In short, I still have not been able to use it. The setup process seems simple and pretty straightforward, making use of a QR code that the Wyze cam scans from your phone. The QR code never scanned. After doing some research, I found that others have had similar issues. The Wyze team even put out a video on “what to do if the QR code won’t scan”, which includes a series of steps to troubleshoot: hold the QR code upside down, tilt it slightly to the left or right, move forward, move backward, turn off the lights (seriously, these were all suggested steps). None of them worked for me and there is no alternative way to setup. Why isn’t there a way to connect via Bluetooth? I’m sure it’s a great cam once it’s working but this was a definite setup fail.
title: Setup Nightmare

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Adnan
content: Excellent camera. Very clear video. Easy install. I have three in my house. Only gripe is that u have to have ur phone connected to a wifi network to view video or it doesnt load. So you cant view just over the phone, unless u r connected to a wifi. Limits it to only being able to see video at work , for example. Why is that ? ? It should still show.some video without a wifi network, even if tekhey r low frame rates or grainy vid. But No picture is shown without being on  a wifi network. Huge weakness in an otherwise excellent product. Also would be nice if it came in different colors like black or off white/cream (to better blend in with ones interior design/room colors.
title: Great cam except for one big flaw

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bill Beam
content: Purchased these two cams to be able to keep track of the girls when everyone was gone. Our younger dog, Ruby, has just started suffering with seizures, so we need to keep track of her when both of us are gone. The cams worked as they should, and the online interface is very easy to work with. Setup had a bump or two, but we made it through. I would highly recommend this wi-fi cam. It does exactly what it is supposed to do.
title: Very glad I purchased

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lashel Mckinney
content: I purchased two of these cameras March 2019 the started off good but over the course of the months glitches here and there, but was maintainable. The motion tracking sucks. The Wyze app would constantly send me notifications when the sunshine’s in my home or when it stopped, but never when someone entered my home. (How convenient) a few weeks ago the camera in my bedroom began to spin like crazy then it stopped working, the other camera I don’t know what happened with it. The second camera sits high, I noticed it wasn’t working after being away and trying to check in on my home but it kept showing offline. When I got home to check on it everything was plugged up but I noticed the blue light was no longer present so I unplugged it and plugged it back up but nothing happened, it normally spins around and the blue light flashes but nothing.
title: Not worth the buy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: gngrsh
content: I bought this as an indoor nanny cam (placed in the open, not as a hidden cam). Setup is extremely simple and straightforward. The video, sound, whether live stream or recorded playback all operate without any glitches on the app (Piper sucks at this). I can insert an SD card  into the camera and it has a rolling two day video recording, so I can look back on what my child and nanny did during the day without having to pay for any Cloud storage subscription. For all its functionality, the camera is almost feather light and has a very small footprint. Only downside is that the pan and tilt feature operates in a very obvious way (It's loud and the whole camera moves, compared to a very discreet pan and tilt feature in Piper). However, the camera has a pretty wide angle, so it can be placed in the corner and have it cover the entire room without any difficulty. This is a great buy for my needs (I wasn't looking for a full fledged home security system although this camera does have some of those capabilities). You can't beat the price.
title: Under 5 min setup and works effortlessly without glitches

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RDubbs
content: Of course the cost/performance ration is amazing.  Once they launch local DVR support (in this case to my NAS) - I'll be using these everywhere.  I just don't want my recordings sent up to a chinese server.
title: Getting better all the time

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: HPOviedo
content: The camera is a good deal and has useful features for the price. It does not have Geofencing built into the Wyze App. You are supposed to use IFTTT which just does not work. I find myself turning the cameras on/off manually. Read the reviews on IFTTT and notice that most of the comments are very negative. Don't understand why Wyze cannot just add Geofencing capabilities to their app.
title: Wyze Pan Camera No Geofencing

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: janice g. lambert
content: I really like this product because it is inexpensive but high-quality… I purchased it so that I could keep an eye on my newest dog and how they were interacting and it provides excellent footage, quality pictures and motion detection… I highly recommend it!
title: Excellent quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JAKE21
content: The Wyze Pan Camera is the sixth different one I’ve purchased, and I’m very impressed by this one. Pros: - Great picture quality - Motion detection works quite well - Setup was extremely easy Cons: - There is no RTSP stream available to use a different app or my own NVR for recording.  I’ve read that they promised this feature in 2019, so I certainly look forward to that being available. - There’s no ability to disable to P2P feature.  I’d really like to not have the camera be available over the Internet; instead I prefer to VPN into my home network and view the camera feeds using this approach. - Night vision is only adequate
title: Great camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Patricia Kerregan
content: WOW! I have been in the market for an alternative to a ring camera, that doesn’t have any subscription fees, and stumbled upon the Wyze Cam Pan. Now the only problem was this camera is rated for indoor use only. I did some more research and found that a lot of people have been putting the regular Wyze cam outdoor, with protective cases found on amazon. So I found one for the Wyze Cam Pan, and mounted it above my front door, covered by an overhang. I mounted it upside down, and flipped the camera 180° in the settings. FEATURES: The motion tracking is alright, especially for a $37 camera! It can follow subjects okay, but tends to over rotate. HD 1080P, yes it is full HD! The picture quality is fantastic! 2 Way Audio is okay, quite on the cameras end when talking through it. I will say the microphone on the camera is exceleant. It picked up kids playing multiple houses away. PTZ is excellent, there is LITTLE to no input delay from the app to the camera. However the zoom feature is only a digital zoom, so the quality is low when zooming. Motion detection is great. You can select one detection zone. I have noticed there seems to be a delay period after the camera detects motion and sends you an alert, before it can send another alert, maybe a few minutes or so. The only other problem would be sometimes it detects motion once the object is close to the camera, but you can put in a Micro SD card to constantly record. I have yet to install an SD card, so have not tried the timelapse feature. The Pan Scan feature can be used to set up to 4 waypoints the camera will automatically rotate between ever 10 seconds. I haven’t had to use it, but it certainly works! Smoke/CO alarm detection is AWESOME. I tested it and was alerted in 10 seconds. This is a feature the Wyze developers never needed to add, and not many other competitors have, it is truly an awesome feature! Finally, FREE 14 DAY CLOUD STORAGE?! You can store as many clips(14 seconds each) in the cloud for 14 days, FREE! That’s unheard of for a camera of this price! Overall I think EVERYONE should own this camera!  The price can be misleading, but so far I am blow away at this little peice of tech!
title: WOW! This camera is extraordinary!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tara Carlesco
content: I’ve had this camera for a few weeks now. At first it worked really well- app always connected, was able to turn it on and off, it rotated around entirely so there’s a good 180 view. It was really easy to set up on my own. But for the past week it has been really buggy, takes several attempts to turn it on and off and sometimes I can’t get it to connect at all. Even when it’s working well it takes 20-30 seconds to switch the camera on or off because it has to connect wirelessly,  and there’s no on/off button on the camera itself so when it won’t turn off I either have to unplug it or just accept that it’s staying on. Overall I wish I had spent a little more money on a better quality camera, since I’ll likely have to buy a new one anyway.
title: Started having issues within a few weeks

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: William Theodore Clemmons
content: I am really impressed by these cameras. Considering how much more expensive other security cams are, this is a real bargain. The quality of the picture is really good. Setup is extremely easy.  I have three of them now and they are all working well. One odd thing: one of the cameras periodically turns 180 degrees on its own. It has happened twice now. I turned off motion tracking, so I hope this will fix the issue. I definitely recommend these cameras.
title: Amazing Camera For The Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Andrew Allen
content: A cheap way to keep an eye out on your house or pets when you are out.  Works well. I would recommend it for the price. Just don't use the motion alarm if you have pets because you will constantly get notifications on your phone every time the cat walks through the room. Lol
title: Works well. Great price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tuch
content: What is the difference between Wyze cameras and Arlo, Ring and/or Nest cameras? PRICE - THAT IS IT. The Wyze cameras actually work BETTER. Plain and simple...these are the best home cameras on the market. I never write reviews, ever, in fact I am at work right now but felt that this company deserved a real solid positive review. I have the Wyze Pan and the standard Wyze camera. Both are awesome and they have more/better features than comparable cameras. I know because I own a Canary, 2 Ring Stick-Up cameras and another Ring camera with a light for above the garage. The Wyze cameras have a few advantages over the other cameras but that being said, the true advantage is they cost SIGNIFICANTLY less. Only things I would request would be to have the notifications shut off based on the location of my phone (I'm home), perhaps a battery/rechargeable option and a line that is made for exterior use. Nice work Wyze.
title: VALUE, EASE OF USE AND QUALITY

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mike Lin
content: Camera was easy to use and set up. Wide angle lens allows clear view of spaces and pan/tilt works as expected. Very good range of motion for such a compact and sleek camera. Several extra features would have been nice to have though, most of the fall on the software side but include; siri integration for iOS, ability to turn off both sound and video detection with one button, ability to store certain camera positions with a quick shortcut, and a more easily controllable way to control camera angle, rotation. The video quality is advertised as 1080p but I personally feel as if it was only 480p at best. Overall assessment: good camera for the price. strong features, solid construction and easy setup/operation. easily definitely suitable for an apartment or small house and the pan/tilt feature is definitely its strong point.
title: Good, Solid Camera. Could Use More Features Though

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C. Ventura
content: It was awesome while it worked . Recently it disconnected from my network and I have not been able to get it to reconnect . Went through the setup many many times and no luck . I have other wize cams that don’t pan and they still work well but this pan version does not last .
title: Worked for less than a year and died .

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R. Darst
content: Great value for an inexpensive option for indoor security. I mostly wanted this for its ability to cover more than 180° space, alerting me of motion of my large dog who tends to search the kitchen counters for leftovers and sometimes small items left on the counter. If I catch him in the act, I can shout at him over the microphone/speaker feature.
title: Pan/Tilt/Zoom is the best feature!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: mrrir
content: We bought one pan cam and liked it enough that we bought another. For comparison, we already had a couple of Ring 2 doorbells for outside, and pointing one out the window near the Ring the pan cam is definitely better video quality even though on HD it is the same specs as the Ring 2. I noticed Wyze said on their site that they are developing an outside cam, looking forward to checking that out. Note there is no Windows app for the pan cam, just iOS and Android. We installed the app on our Droid phones, and I side loaded it on my Fire HD 8 from Google Play with no problems.
title: Video better than my other cams, lots of features despite low cost

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jonathan A.
content: I purchased this along with another one of Wyze's cameras. I took it to South America where my wife lives to setup in the nursery for our little one that will arrive shortly. My wife loves them almost as much as I do. She says she feels safer at the house, we can talk back and forth on these and she likes that she can pull the feeds up on her tablet. I like that I can pull them up while I'm here in America also. I liked then so much I order more for the house here in the states to setup there... Will purchase more most definitely!
title: Absolutely love these.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Helen A.
content: This is a much more improved version of the small square Waze Cam. The image is more crispy, better night vision and better sound quality (if you want to spook your dog or cat remotely, they love it!). Or if your spouse has his/her phone turned off and you want to get their attention through your phone. While traveling, we were able to check on our pets daily and it was super comforting to know the pet sitter took good care of them.
title: Great camera for traveling pet owners!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John L. Welte
content: Overall I like this camera quite a bit. The software takes some getting used to and where to find things in the app but is much most flexible than other indoor cam apps. The ability to set detection zones (and stay out of certain areas) while panning is a HUGE plus.  The only annoyance that I've found is that the camera makes noise tracking objects. This is an annoyance but also would alert thieves that they are being watched. I have 3 of these and would not hesitate to buy again.
title: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kevin perry
content: Easy to configure and and easy to use.  So far the only drawback is that there doesnt seem to be a way to view via a web browser on computer or other smart device. (ie smart tv) There is an open firmware version to allow these to be attached to an existing dvr security system and I am trying that out now but there are some issues with that.  But it works.
title: Pretty decent camera for little cost.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dennis McElroy
content: The product was incredibly easy to set up and get operational.  Always easy to access from my phone or iPad using their app. The night vision took a little bit of tweaking (essentially a restart) to increase it's sensitivity.  Motion detection works great. Camera follows movement effectively. I like this camera so well (especially for the money) that I’ve ordered more devices from this company. I definitely feel more secure with this in place.
title: Great product for a great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Riley♡
content: Happy with this investment. Had issues with my landlord coming to my apartment without me present or having permission. Glad to see this camera works and can capture and time stamp then notify me of any entry! Also I can keep an eye on my pet. When it is really dark it is hard to see anything but the small amounts of light it attracts to it.
title: Good investment

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Danny
content: Friends have comparable cameras they paid 5x more than this... and this is better. Only gave the motion detection 4 stars because it is almost too sensitive, (or I could be missing something).  Even online instructions could break things down a bit more,  I'm not a tech but I can usually do ok. That said it is still GREAT! The price is unbelievable for what you get. Very pleased with this one. If your on the fence Buy it!
title: Wow -- leaves the competition in the dust!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jerry Farinash
content: I purchased to use with Alexa. It simply does not work with Alexa. I have been able to get it to display on my Echo Show one time and have tried at least 100 other times, usually 20-30 times a day. It will not work with my Firestick. The camera is a good little camera especially considering the price. But you will not be able to get it to work with Alexa. I have tried all of their uninstall and reinstall fixes. They also say that you may have try two or three times to get the camera to show on an Alexa device because it might be timing out. Wrong. If you purchase to use with Alexa, get ready to hear, "Hmmmm, the camera is not responding" a lotttttttttt.
title: Don't believe for a minute it will work with Alexa

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Andy H. Greenwald
content: Wyze has an easy to install and setup product that simply works wonderfully.  We have a camera in our front room watching the dog.  The app is easy to use.  The camera quality is excellent and the pan movement is perfect.  I am really impressed with the camera and for under 40 dollars, this is an awesome product.  I have not needed tech support, so I cannot comment, but this product is a great value that is working reliably for us.  Very pleased.
title: Great Value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Raisa Lynn
content: I tried to do my research on the best camera without breaking the bank. I spent the COVID-19 lockdown away from my apartment for 75 days. I had much less anxiety about being away from that long, knowing I could just check-in or get notifications if something happened. I even had to have a friend come to save my house plants and I was able to speak to her through the microphone feature which was a little fun. However, now that I am home, and not planning on leaving for long periods of time any time soon, I have unplugged and turned it to face the wall, in order to feel a little more comfortable.
title: No Issues Here

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RickC From Boston
content: We have used some other cheap camera in the past but nothing like this. This is so easy to setup. Especially the part where you pair the camera and your phone app. Makes it so easy. Other Camera have slow chunky apps that take forever to load. The rotation of the camera is very fast and the picture quality is awesome. We will be buying another one!! FYI This was very easy for us to use with a mobile hot spot when we recently took our dogs on vacation
title: Best Dog Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Draugadrotin
content: The picture quality is not good. . hazy and short sighted. The motion tracking is problematic.  The camera does track you but the video freezes so you don't see what is the camera wants to show you.  I was very disappointed with it. I have an Eufy Pan & Tilt Camera which is way better than Wyze.  Its like $10 more but so worth it.
title: All talk & no substance

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: NCsezheyy'all
content: Fantastic product, great pan action with amazing detail and clear remote voice sound!  Unbelievable quality for the price.  We use this to help keep our pack of Great Pyrenees in line when we are gone in addition to security home monitoring.  The 2 way remote voice feature on these products is Amazing!  (Our pups stopped their bad behavior the moment they were busted and corrected via remote voice / camera, lol.  The stunned look on their sweet mischievous faces- PRICELESS. The playback features of the video capture and the photos are in color and are great quality.  Highly recommend for a monitoring product.
title: Wow, so pleased and amazed!  Low cost, high quality features

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: LinZ
content: Love this camera. I have it in my parrot room so I check on them sometimes, which I even did while I was out of town. I use it to tell my one bird to be quiet when she makes noise at night when she doesn't want to go to sleep. Lol. The only thing is there's an echo in the room when you speak back to the camera and some delay. Overall great product and wonderful price! Setup was easy and the app is easy to use.
title: Love it 😊

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marlos M. Agostini
content: The camera always has problems rotating. I've reset and updated firmware several times, no use, mine always hangs out of nowhere after a few hours of use and makes the biggest noise, waking up and disturbing everyone in the house. At that moment she restarts on her own, after pulling off the energy. Bad product, there are several other reports of the same problem. Do not buy !
title: the camera hangs, makes noise and restarts by itself

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ricky Bobby
content: This is a great two way camera with both video and the ability to communicate through the camera.  This is not a good security camera.  Search "Wyze motion not working" on the web and you should come upon a forum with all sort of complaints.  Although I sometimes receive alerts for the motion there have been numerous times that I have viewed the camera and seen my dog on the couch without an alert to how she got onto the couch.  Unless I have a supernatural dog, the motion detection does not work 100% of the time.  Otherwise, great picture and I like the ability to be able to pan and scan from my computer (I have the android app and I use Bluestacks (free android emulator) on my PC).
title: Cool Camera but definitely not security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bethel O.
content: This is the second one we bought to use more as a toddler camera.  We don’t need the real-time alerts or 24/7 streaming anymore like the baby monitors, so this was an affordable great option that does the trick! Works great. Biggest issue is after only one month with the second camera the power cord no longer works, and there is no way to contact support successfully through website or app to request a new one.  So purchasing a new cord will be almost the same cost as the camera, losing out on how nice it was to purchase something for such a low price.
title: Power cord broken but camera and capabilities are great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: rootie
content: Hey shoppers I bought one of these Wyze pan cams and really liked it. So I bought a 2nd one and it was blurry . Yea I firmed it up ...yea I wiped the lens ...not much else I could do ...no I didn’t call tech support ...blurry motion detection ...blurry night vision ....beware shoppers others have received blurry ones as second purchase ... so the question is ...DO YOU FEEL LUCKY ...wyze probably figure a great percentage won’t go through the hassle of return so they don’t care ...I do wish this had not happened because I initially liked the camera
title: DO YOU FEEL LUCKY ...?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Pilot1709
content: I like being able to view my cam from anywhere with my phone. The pictures are clear and the field of view is wide. When I first set up the cam I received notices when the cam saw motion. Also person detection was suppressed to be free, but now there is a charge. There are virtually no instructions included with the cam. Overall a good deal.
title: Great video poor alerts

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: LP
content: This is by far the best WiFi camera for the price. I’ve been using mine for a few months and have nothing but good things to say about it. Motion detection works well once you dial in the sensitivity. Smoke alarm push notification works well too. The quality is impressive for such a low budget camera. The app is easy to use, and controlling the camera is easy. I love this camera and plan on getting more in the near future. Love that it is open source and compatible with apps like IFTT. You can do a lot with this camera.
title: Best WiFi camera by far. You won’t be disappointed!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Paula
content: this was great for the first few months. Now the camera cycles itself at random and you have to physically reset it and reload the camera to the app every time. Very annoying.
title: I dont think it will last a year

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Edward Francis
content: I bought this camera a few months ago and it functioned just fine until I switched to an Android phone.  Now the notification feature doesn't function properly and on top of that, the company lost their "Person detection" because they literally didn't read the contract that they signed with the company that they outsourced it to.  This isn't conjecture either... they openly admitted to this in a mass email they sent to their customers explaining why person detection was going away January 1st.  Person detection saves a ton of time because instead of having to sift through video every single little motion it picks up, you can skip right to the "person detected" videos.  Overall the whole experience has stunk of rookie mistakes and mismanagement.  Buy your camera with another, more professional outfit.
title: Don't buy from this company.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Becky
content: This camera is great, it has a really clear picture, lots of options and push notifications when movement is detected.  The night vision worked ok, not great, but if there's a light nearby, it helps.  Pans all kinda ways, and is easy to access from my Android.  I can view the outside of the house even if the camera is inside (pointing towards the yard). This also notifies you if it hears a smoke or CO2 alarm which is a bonus.  I wish it was a bit smaller, but overall, it's a great purchase.
title: This Is Great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Firebirdgm2000
content: I always despise companies that push and sell cloud storage while google drive / dropbox is all a free service EASILY can be used for cloud storage.  While Wyze does not offer those they do offer 14 days max cloud storage AT NO COST!!!  Excellent for any of us who are budgeted against those monthly subscriptions.  This was the deal breaker, also excllent cost for a pan / night vision camera.  Plan to buy more of these especially the motion detection devices just released by WYZE.  This is a company the employees are obviously heavily invested in.
title: 14 days cloud storage FREE!  MicroSD local storage

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Club
content: Really satisfied for the price. If I had any gripes, it's that when the night vision is toggled on or off, it makes an audible click. And if you leave night vision on Automatic, when it's sunrise and getting gradually lighter in the room, the camera will flip night vision off and on several times before deciding it's light enough in the room. So the aforementioned clicking happens a lot every sunrise, if I leave night vision as Auto. But this is minor and I'm very satisfied with the product.
title: Just all around good for a cheap price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MC
content: This has been such a lifesaver. We live in a one bedroom but this allowed baby to sleep uninterrupted. Before we would keep going inside the bedroom to check on him. With this we can watch him on our phones before going to sleep ourselves. Con: Turning this on can be annoying. It has never connected on the first try since I purchased it.
title: Works extremely well without the high price tag

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: My
content: I only bought this cam because I read the reviews and trusted them. Now, this cam sucks, and all those good reviews are a scheme. This camera doesn’t record 24/7, if you open the app and press record , it starts recording. But if you leave the app it will stop recording. You can record 12 events. But not recording 24/7. I’m gonna buy a new and more expensive cam . I tried to be cheap and I paid the price for it. Please, don’t buy this cam . It really suck. And I forgot to mention about the internet .
