This cam disconnect every 4 to 5 minutes. Then restart again Wyse , no more . It sucks
title: Cam doesn’t record 24/7 and disconnect from the internet every 2 minutes

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jeffs3g
content: I use this to monitor my driveway (through the window). Previously I was using two Wyze Cam's at different angles. I like the fact Wyze includes free cloud storage for 2 weeks. Each event records for 12-15 seconds every 5 minutes, however if you install a SD card the camera will record constantly for several days before it starts to write over older files. The Wyze app is also very intuitive and easy to use. Setting alerts, times, detection zones, and more is a breeze.  In 1080P the Wyze Cam's use about 1 Mbps of upload, and at the lowest resolution 360P they use less than half that, around .4 Mbps.
title: Replaces Multiple Camera's

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Elsie S.
content: Thats as far as I would go. I have 15 other security IP cameras and this has to be the worst one I have ever had. This is not a good product for folks looking for a serious and reliable camera. The video lags by about 30 seconds which makes it hard when panning. The video pay back in awkward. I would spend an extra 20 or 30 dollars on a better camera since it will last longer and work better. Should have known better. You get what you pay for.
title: (after review wold not recommend at this time)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christine
content: Use these for work to monitor different areas, Office and Warehouse and even my Home. Picture quality is great. Definitely affordable and great value. The setup process was also very easy and user friendly. The app is alright but I do continue to see them making changes. The Motion Following is a really hit or miss, but overall this is an affordable option to have video surveillance and to be able to check on your phone anytime.
title: Affordable Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mica Marie
content: I rarely leave comments but if you’re having ANY issues just call them. I almost returned mine because it wasn’t connecting and the direction pad didn’t work.... I decided to call customer service.. I’m so GLAD, they fixed all my issues and sent me a replacement camera so that I could better use my SD card while they worked to release an update. They didn’t have to do that bc my camera was working. THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE IVE HAD IN A LONG TIME.
title: ABOVE AND BEYOND CUSTOMER SERVICE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: rhonda g.
content: This is the best handsdown and it was so easy to hookup. Plug it in wait for the light to show and press the little set-up button on the bottom of the camera, on your phone download the Wyze app and open, it will find your devise and give you a bar code on your phone to scan with your newly installed camera and YOU ARE DONE!!! On the app name your camera and control it with your phone. I have 2 and now my Sis has ordered 2. Next day delivery!!! Thank you Amazon Prime.
title: Quality, Affordable and Simple Set-up

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kory
content: Only used the product for a few days and am already loving it. The free storage for 14 days is awesome and the option for an SD card and USB for a hard drive is a very nice feature. Picture quality is fantastic and the field of view is great. The app is very easy to use and it has the nice option to turn the camera off and on when you are not by the camera. The sound for the talk back function is pretty good, it's not theatre quality but it gets the  job done. All all this is a good camera if you want to keep an eye on a baby or a puppy or just as a security measure or to see who is stealing the cookie from the cookie jar.
title: Awesome camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Free2BMe
content: I can say I was very impressed with this purchase. I could not believe the quality of picture and sound for such a minimal price. I appreciate this company making home security affordable for me. We use one for a baby monitor and one for a nanny cam. Night vision is great. I think there could be some improvement on the amount of noise that is made when you turn on the tracking. I think it could be a little quieter, but it is not a dealbreaker for me. Highly recommend
title: High quality, fair pricing

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: student de college
content: I've only had this camera for a few days but I have already converted some of my coworkers to looking into buying one for the house! For what it is, it does the job and it is incredibly easy to use.  I'm looking forward to using it more, but for now - I'd recommend buying this product! Hands down, best value for price and features. This product is cheaper if you buy from them directly and that's why I rate it 4/5.
title: Pleasantly Surprised

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: derek
content: I bought this to use as a Babycam for monitoring kids room.  This is way better than a standard camera and less cost.  I really like the pan feature for keeping track of our older child while playing in the rooms.  the mic does have some lag and doesnt pick up softer sounds but overall this is excellent.  Im glad i didnt pay $100+ for a nest or similar camera.  The ability to use the Wyze app on the phone or ipad is great.  I might buy an echo dot in the future so i dont have to keep the video streaming on my phone.
title: Great for monitoring kids

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Edih
content: Spontaneously goes offline couple times a week and requires physical access camera to power cycle to reconnect.  This happens with the 3 Wyze cam I have so a systemic issue with their cams.
title: Systemic issue makes this unsuitable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: E. Carmichael
content: Although I first bought this camera to document a snooping landlord, it’s proven even better as a cat cam. I’ve positioned it where it can pan two rooms, including the cats’ food and water area, so I can easily check up on them when I’m away for a weekend. It’s easy to control and adjust remotely, download video clips, etc.
title: Excellent pet cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brian C
content: First things first. I like the product. But I only gave it two stars, continue reading for the reason. We purchased it to monitor the inside of our home, and the pan and tilt make this camera awesome for open floor plans as we have at home.  The set up was very easy and intuitive.  I thought I would get a memory card to save recordings onto, but it turns out it seems like my card won't be recognized. I followed the instructions, from support FAQ to no avail.  I have the right type of card, flash memory is flash memory so... it should work. Nope.  I emailed support eleven days ago, with no response at all.  Waiting 6 days after my initial email and pinged support again. Still no response.  I'm keeping the camera because it does what I need it to do, but not what I would like it to do.  You can't beat the price for what this does, and this would get a five-star review but no customer support, it's only getting two stars. Pro: great features set for the price. Easy set up Cons: Lack of support
title: Awesome product. Wish it had better customer support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dan Z.
content: Got two of these as a Christmas present to myself. New Years week my wife and I went out of town and left our 19 and 24 year olds at home.  Got home and discovered the cameras were unplugged. Went back and looked at the video and saw that they had friends over while we were gone, which is a BIG no-no in our house. Just ordered 3 more cameras to place strategically in the house. As part of their punishment they will have to pay for these cameras! Question to Wyze:  When are you going to do outdoor cameras?
title: Awesome Camera Got My $ Worth in the first week

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alicianna otero
content: Worked amazing the first two days. Now I can’t get on to it and I’m out of town. My husband is saying the camera is moving around but him nor I can log into the app. This thing is hacked and I’ve had it for three days. I do not recall giving permission to have anyone else looking in to my house from this camera and locking me out from seeing it. Do not buy! Unsafe.
title: Unsafe

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: j lindop
content: I have no idea if this is as great as it appears, because my router has VPN built in, and they will not allow VPN between you and them.  So they trust everyone on the planet who can get between you and them while the video is moving from the airwaves of the wireless connection to your router and out on the wild west backbone of the internet until it hits their "secure" servers. Very disappointing.
title: Apparently can't work if you have a VPN on your router

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: William Cassidy
content: I purchased more expensive smart home cameras. They were very difficult to set up. I even gave up on one and never used it. Then I saw a story about the Wyze camera and gave it a try. It is terrific. It is a breeze to set up and the picture quality was equal to the more expensive units. If you are hesitating because it is so cheap, and you think it can't be any good, think again and buy it. I told several friends about it and they love it too.
title: Amazing Value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Njg
content: The wayze cam was not what I expected. First of all, it could kept saying I insert the SD card yet I had done it. I could remove it and return, works for a day then stops working. Within a month the cam stopped working, it started locking itself once it spins and could not unlock itself not unless I unplug and plug it back in. Really poor gadget
title: Do not recommend

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JagLA
content: For the price nothing will come close to this video quality.  Awesome PTZ functions, and motion tracking.  Motion Alerts are also A nice feature.  I would trust these a a security camera, put one in my office to watch the door.  I did have it working with Alexa on the newer fire stick, but it hasn’t worked with Alexa on the newest 4K firestick.
title: I love these cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: justthefacts
content: Good concept at a shockingly low price but the system has limited uses and you making sacrifices to make it work for your situation.  The very limited record time, 12 seconds without adding an SD card and only able to begin recording again after 5 minutes has to be reconsidered by this manufacturer.  You might catch the thief just entering your foyer but after 12 seconds the theif will have free reign to your stuff for 4 to 5 minutes with out any recording.  Using it to capture any Intruders at night from inside windows with the night vision feature is hopeless.  Very slow and eratic motion detection feature.  App has functioned well on Android device.
title: Very basic web camera and service.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: IV
content: I received the camera and when attempted to turn it on, I could see a yellow light, then you could hear a relay going on/off and then the light went off and the camera wouldn't turn on. What's worse is that the camera right after this started to get warm to the touch. I contacted their customer service chat and they created a ticket for the Management Team to revise my case and contact me, but I haven't heard back anything from them. This is why I am giving them one star. Because I received a defective product and although the personnel through the chat are very responsive, the Management Team are not so much. Definitely returning the camera and giving them a second chance with a replacement.
title: Defective camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dario
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Unfortunately I've had to update my review. This is the second one I own because the first one just stopped working within a few months. This one is about 2 months old and behaves erratic. I've uploaded a video so you can see what I mean. As you can see I am not pressing any buttons to control its movement. I've also had problems with video playback at important points. It spins all the way around past my set points and makes a grinding noise. Not sure I would recommend over a normal wyze cam.
title: Great at first, then not so much.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: George V. Trager
content: Gotta admit I was very happy with this purchase. Picture is clear and works really well. I use it as a "nanny" came to make sure the home health aides don't beat up my dad. The device is surprisingly easy to use and control. I have been able to have clear conversations with the old man from great distances away although you have to have good WIFI which should be obvious to you.
title: Very Impressive.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kate D
content: I purchased this camera when my Wyze 2.0 stopped working. I am very happy with the ability to move the camera angle remotely. I have not had any if the WiFi connection issues that both my Wyze 2.0s have had. It also seems to be quieter than the other models as well. The set up is fairly straightforward but if I were to buy this for my parents, I’d expect to have to help them set it up since it can take some troubleshooting.
title: Great value!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Daniel Wedison
content: I bought it to replace the foscam C1 I installed under the eave considering its higher resolution and PTZ feature. Overall it’s a solid cam if only using in daylight. With current firmware, it doesn’t support rtsp. I have a nvr system which supports onvif but this cam doesn’t support either. I am also surprised it doesn’t have a web interface. The most downside is the night vision. It’s almost pure black at night, way worse than my old C1.
title: Night vision is too bad

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kenji s. aoki
content: this is my second Wyze Cam i've purchased.  i have one outdoors with a silicone outdoor kit and the second positioned in my living room facing the front door.  they pick up motion pretty well and sends alerts to my phone.  the recordings are pretty clear in daylight though their night time range is a little limited out of the box.  i'm going to add an infrared flood light in the backyard to help with that problem.
title: effective, low cost alternative

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: sam termine
content: What a bang for the buck! If I can set it up, anyone can! I love talking to my pets when I’m away from home. Being able to look in on my sitter or my home when I am away just feels good. Though I’m glad the motion detector has NOT gone off, ( for all I know , it may be my fault), I’m glad! With my pets, it would be going off all of the time.
title: Effective and Easy!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dominick Reale
content: If you’re buying this for it’s “night vision” capabilities, don’t. This camera is amazing for the price but only during daytime hours. I currently have the one I bought set up in my garage and I can’t see anything at night with the “night vision”. Motion tracking is a little sporadic as well. The camera has a little bit of a seizure while tracking motion. For the money it’s an awesome camera, but if you’re looking for something super high tech/quality you’ll have to look further. I really wish there was something like an “I’m home” feature that way the camera doesn’t trigger every time I walk in the garage.
title: Great camera for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MV
content: I love this WiFi camera.  Super easy to set up and the picture quality is great.  I haven't tried the night vision as I'm using this to keep track of my dog while we aren't home and I always leave a light on.  This is perfect for my needs - liked it so much I bought a second one for when we can trust the dog in other areas of the house while we're gone.  Highly recommend and can't beat the price.
title: So impressed with this Camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: gb
content: This camera works exactly as advertised.  You can turn nightvision on/off/auto which is great for viewing outside through a window.  Excellent viewing sharpness even for long distances.  Supporting app for iphones is excellent.  Very stable for holding wifi signal, plus strong signal reception.  Best camera in this price range by far.
title: great, sharp picture even when viewing long distances

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J.L
content: This camera is great when it works, it constantly goes offline and will not reconnect to the network unless you physically unplug it from the power source and plug it's back in, which is ok if you home but if you out if you not you are just out of luck. To make Matters worse when it goes offline some times it will also stop recording. I have four wyze v2 and I do not have any of the issues thst I have with wyze cam pan even though one of the v2 is not even attached to the house.
title: Stops recording constantly.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Keith
content: Definitely worth the money. Took a few times to get connected to my phone.. had to reset my modem but finally got it. Pretty good picture quality and the swivel function is great. Overall 10/10 would recommend.  Will definitely be buying more for other parts of the house. I just hope they come up with a battery powered version the Ring stick up cam.
title: 10/10 Worth it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mishi
content: I love this camera! Great picture, great sound, easy to connect! And the price is incredible. And thats a good thing, because when your cat knocks it off the shelf ( it's what cats do ) and it hits the floor, you'll be buying a new one. Again, the price makes this much easier to live through than if it were a Nest or Ring camera, but if you can use the wall mount brackets, for $8 its cheap insurance. And I'm not complaining here. I love that these things are so inexpensive that I can break one and just shrug and order another one.
title: Best thing out there for the price! Just don't drop it...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Keng Xiong
content: This is by far one of the best budget home security camera! Yes, you can set it behind a window and it will detect through the window, just make sure to turn off night vision so the ir light goes off. Picture quality is great and motion detection is super for it’s price! I will be getting another two or so in the future!
title: One of the best home security camera and it does detect behind window!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: gigi48
content: The camera was easy to install and has a nice clear picture. The motion detection definitely works.  I had to move a rotating fan so it wouldn't make the camera activate.  The night vision light is a little bright if you have a light sleeper but it lets you see the room quite well and it's easy to move in different directions with a touch to the screen.
title: Good product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A. Winston
content: I bought this to use as a baby monitor for my nursery. When it works it’s great! But most of the time when I open the app the camera won’t connect and I have to close and reopen the app several times before the camera will connect. Then it only stays connected for about a minute before I lose connection again. Not reliable at all! I also hate that it only records 12 seconds of events and that you can’t set the duration when the motion/sound detection is triggered.
title: Not reliable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JonDal
content: Installed this camera in a cabin we use during the summer months.  Its been working without a problem for about 1 month.  Once the unit is plugged, everything can be  configured and controlled through the cell phone app.  Detection sensitivity needed to be adjusted to reduce false alarms, but this was very easy to do.  I do like this camera and am considering buying a second for home use.
title: Good Camera (and Price) for Security use.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cummings
content: This things is awesome. Gives me peace of mind when I leave the house I can now see what my dogs are up too and if there being naughty I can talk to them and say hey stop that and they look around all confused.  It stops them in there tracks.  And at such a great price.  Worth every penny and the video quality is so clear and vivid.
title: Amazing

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jason Robar
content: I absolutely love this cam. I use it to check on my dog when I’m not home and to keep an eye on my teenage daughters. It’s easy to hookup and use and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a cam for security or just to be able to keep an eye on what’s going on when you are not home. I attached a photo and this is zoomed in so it’s not what the full picture quality is when you are not zoomed in. Just don’t let my daughter know I posted a pic in the review of her and the dog taking a nap 😂
title: This is amazing!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: sunnyda15
content: We previously had a Foscam so these pale in comparison to those. The range of motion is much less. It is really hard to see into the crib (one is mounted as a baby video cam) bc of the little range of motion. Good product for the price point but hard to go to this camera from a higher quality camera. I like the app on this camera though. Very easy to set up.
title: Good but not as good as our foscams

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Duke
content: I like checking in on the house while at work. I can see my wife and kid playing, i can make sure the bump in the night i heard isnt a intruder. Being able to pan around is great, good quality video and sound. My father has one that he has mounted outside and it works great for him too. We/i Both love it, however i wished i could install mine outside, Im in Alaska and the product clearly states it would not stand up to our weather. But, as a indoor camera its great.
title: No Complaints

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Adrian Bino
content: The out of box experience was good, set up was easy, and features tried worked. Within a week of using I can still hear audio in the room, very low, but the person in the room can not hear me. Firmware is to latest version, their site does not show any support number, it is email or chat, chat response was slow and frustrating, but chat provided a support number. Contacted them wait was long, first line support had to check with their support, sent log files and was told I could hear back in a day. If it has to go back it will not be returning, will be trying another product, Specially for caring for my Senior mother...
title: Caution

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: sm_cunning
content: This camera is by far the best baby monitor we have used. It is a million times better than the monitor I was gifted at my baby shower that cost six times as much. The best part is that you can take photos of the screen, and record video, so we’ve been able to record our son doing hilarious things. I can’t recommend this enough!!
title: The best baby monitor!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marsha
content: I have purchased 4 of the WYZE Pan Cams, and I am so impressed with the features and the quality! They work as good, if not better, than cameras costing $100-150 more. For under $40 delivered, you get 1080p quality, night vision, 2-way audio, smoke & CO detector alarm monitoring, zoom, horizontal and vertical pan, motion detection zones, sound and movement notifications, IFTTT automation and more! These cameras are easy to set up and have been working flawlessly for me. I even bought the outdoor kit and placed one in the backyard. Even if the Las Vegas environment proves to be too extreme for this camera, at least it was less than $40! Their customer service department is fast, friendly courteous and professional!  Please, try these before you drop a ton of money on those name-brand cameras! These cameras are great!
title: AMAZING Cameras...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BoBo Chen
content: Bought two of the same product and even though the camera is good, the biggest problem with this product is that after every firmware update, the device stopped functioning properly. Had to reset and wasted a lot of precious time. This last firmware update knocked out the wifi connection and not even their tech support was able to tackle the problem. Stay away from this product. Motion detection is also sluggish and not able to catch smaller movements.
title: Stay away. They can’t do their firmware updates correctly.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sapper253
content: Purchased the Wyze Cam Pan because of what it is capable of doing (as described on Amazon) at a fraction of the cost of other wifi cameras. Overall, I am happy with the camera for its price, except with the two-way voice function. I am able to hear audio from the camera, but can't send voice to the camera via Wyze App. Not as described! Because of this I don't plan on purchasing more of this camera as I intended, had my first purchase functioned as described.
title: Okay Wifi Camera but not perfect.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shadia Barake
content: I really liked how cheap this was and how it performs. I use it for my dog, and it's amazing. Night vision great, motion and sound sensors work really well. Would recommend. Still trying to figure out the mounting / set up as it needs to be on a surface for it to be able to tilt up and down and around... But overall, very satisfied with my purchase
title: Great inexpensive product, great quality, works excellent

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Karaleen
content: I had a set of indoor cameras we were using to keep an eye on the kids when we were upstairs or away for an hour or so.  They were okay, but hard to set up and picture quality was so-so.  I bought one $20 WYZE to try out because I had heard about them on a VLOG I follow.  I got it, but then it sat in the drawer for months.  I finally set it up last week because I needed one more room to be covered.  OMG...so darn easy compared to the others.  App is simple to use, picture quality is great. Connection to my WiFi simple.  I immediately sent off for another one and it came in a day.  I am now replacing all my $75 indoor cameras with these and adding more to the system.  So impressed.  I would recommend them to anyone.
title: Better than the more costly cameras and soooo easy to set up

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Assaf
content: This product has severe connectivity issues. Amazon’s Customer Service was amazing and sent me another unit that also cannot be used if you have an advanced router that uses two SSID, one 2.4 and one 5ghz. Wyze support tried helping and reported that I have too many connections to the router which is a weird thing to say as all of our devices at home work perfectly well, except the cam. So bottom line: this product doesn’t work for me at all.
title: Connectivity issues if you have both 2.4 and 5 GHz or too many connected devices

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Oldwestyguy
content: I wish the power cord was either longer or an extension was available ,otherwise I am happy with the way the device operates. I use one camera for watching hummingbirds at the feeder and it works great. I have even had times when the motion detection is too slow for the hummingbirds but , nobody can outrun a hummingbird .
title: Great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Hoosiermom
content: I purchased this camera after having the smaller version for a few months. I decided I liked it and wanted an additional one that rotates. I was unaware that this product does NOT come with the mounting supplies. It is obvious when you see it that it is designed to screw into a mount, but you have to buy it separately. I probably wouldn’t recommend this version to anyone and I would just suggest to get the smaller version
title: Mounting supplies are sold separately!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christy B
content: I am NO techie by any stretch of the word, but this was SUPER easy to set up. I’m tickled how easy it was, and how amazing it works! The app is user-friendly. I bought two more cameras just like this! I’m seriously considering replacing my home security system with more of this brand of products with how easy it is to set up and monitor.
title: Super easy set-up; app is very user-friendly too!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: roger huynh
content: unfortunately, guardzilla went out of business. i have to buy another indoor security cam. it works well except i can't setup my sound alarm.  motion detect but sound alarm never turn on. there are many options to play around with it but those options are unnecessary. i just need good night vision and easy to turn on/off alarm. i do not need to setup time to turn on alarm. guardzilla 360 night vision is incredible. you can turn on/off alarm anytime. when you leave the house, turn alarm on. when you are home, you turn it off.  i think privacy issued really got them.
title: it works but no sound alarm.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Eileen A. Wallgren
content: We've had this for a while now and it is amazing. We got it in September 2019 after our dog had major surgery. We had to put him in a crate for the first time ever and we really wanted to be able to check on him while at work. This camera is awesome...you can zoom in, move it to scan around the room, you can hear any noises or speaking and you can speak over it as well. It's been just shy of 5 months that we've had it and we are so happy we got. Totally a good investment.
title: Great camera at a great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: bvh763
content: I cannot say enough good things about the Wyze cam pan and tilt, the price is beyond amazing for so many reasons! It also saved the home I live in as the in app smoke alarm notification sent when the Smoke alarm was detected allowed me to make the necessary calls to emergency service providers. (Fire Department and Police) The Pros: Price is great, video quality is crisp and clear, ease of setup <5min, free service that includes Smoke and CO2 alarm notifications that will capture a 12 sec video clip, storage expansion using micro sd card for local recording The Con: Does not work on open unsecured WiFi connections Ultimately I will suggest this to anyone looking for a camera of this high quality and do not have the ability to invest thousands into a home use camera system, but want piece of mind they do have manageable options.
title: Thank you Wyze Cam for offering free smoke alarm detection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Goku
content: It is a cheap camera for a reason. However, the price mostly shows itself in the companion app's quality. The app loads the camera feed about 10% of the time. When it does, it is likely that the video will freeze shortly after or that you will be unable to use the camera controls. No amount of resetting, reinstalling, re-pairing to your phone, solves this. It can be incredibly frustrating and makes the camera completely useless.
title: Get what you pay for

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Randonneur
content: Update: These were incredible cameras but a recent software update has bricked them and they no longer function so they are completely worthless. Until the vendor fixes the problem, do not purchase as they are a waste of money if they don’t function. —- Old #1 - Incredible product for the price. Have google product as well and find these far superior.
title: Used to be a great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: pbpancho
content: The camera works great and the price is entirely reasonable. I've loaded the RTSP firmware so I can stream the video to a local computer, and am still able to use the app no problem. Great peace of mind since this one is in our toddlers room.  I've had great luck with Wyze products so far and this one is no exception.
title: My 2nd Pan and 7th Wyze overall.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: isma jamil
content: We have these set up all around our house to monitor the baby’s nanny. We also have one in her nursery- great motion detection and night vision. When I’m away at work I can speak through this and talk to her. Bette than any baby cam!
title: Better than any baby cam!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BD
content: Easy to setup and very easy to access remotely.  Once you set it up, its easy to relocate from room to room if needed, just unplug, move it and plug it back in, simple as that!  You can even put it in the garage to find out what creatures are stealing your dog food.  I would recommend adding a memory card so you can go back and view past footage.
title: SUPER easy to use

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Steve Spolarich
content: I have to say I'm pretty impressed with the quality and usability of this cam. Probably going to order a 2nd if not 3rd and 4th for the locations I want to have camera coverage. Super easy to setup. First tech product I've seen in a while that setup and literally functions like described and shown in videos. we haven't used the sound much, when we did it was echoy, once I was within 10 feet of the unit and blame me, but that's only reason for not 5 starts on sound quality.
title: Wow!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ernest Ferrel
content: This camera worked for about 3 weeks. I installed it in my RV. On my next trip out I plugged it in and did not power up. I do have the cube and it works great. The idea of being able to move the eye around sounded like a great idea but not with this unit. Cheers
title: Stopped Working after 3 weeks.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jmldowen
content: Wyze Cam Pan-and company--is so awesome that I just purchased a second one for a different room. My primary job these days is caregiving my elderly mom with dementia, and the Wyze Cam Pans help make my responsibilities much easier. Using their super easy mobile app, when I need to see if my mom is still sleeping, check the cam; if I need to see if her patio door is locked, check the cam. The visual camera quality is perfect, night vision is clear, and sound quality is good. I haven't used the motion and sound detection alerts yet, because my mom walks around a lot and I don't want notifications going on constantly, but I know those options will come in handy as her condition worsens. The company is very devoted to their customers, provides great support, and is constantly upgrading and expanding their product base.  I highly recommend this product to anyone wanting a great camera at an unbeatable price, with no subscriptions or contracts!
title: Making my job easier!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dan P
content: The motion tracking on this is flat out broken compared to other cams on the market, but if you want a manual PTZ it's OK. Still, it's main feature doesn't really work. It could likely be fixed with firmware, but don't hold your breath. Wyze still hasn't released it's #1 request feature; the ability to see cameras via web interface. 3 stars, at best.
title: Motion Tracking Sucks

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tim Malone
content: Who doesn’t like the Wyze cams? These things are awesome! I have two of them and recommended them to my brother, who bought one and uses it in his nursery. They work great, are well built, and have an affordable price. I really like that they don’t have to go out to the cloud, so security is good as well. Gets lots of firmware updates as well to keep it safe and in working order. I would highly recommend this anyone thinking about getting a camera/s for their home or anywhere else.
title: Great camera, great price, secure and updated regularly.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BillBob
content: We ordered this to spy on a chihuahua with separation anxiety. The video has really nice resolution for the price. The motion detection mode works well and is reasonably quiet, but humans find it kinda unnerving to have the camera pivot to follow them as they pass through the room. The iphone app is great, though, since you can drag the on-screen view to see any part of the room, including zooming in on a small dog. The two way audio works, but the sound quality on the camera side is sometimes garbled -- this probably freaks the poor dog out more than calming her. Overall, though, a very nice camera and a fantastic deal.
title: Awesome for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Haindel
content: I have problems with mine in that the video has a 10 second delay.  The picture quality is sufficient but not great. The video smears badly in low light conditions.  I contacted Wyze and they tried to help but it took forever to get responses. They were not able to resolve the problems. The app is OK but, again, nothing that great.  I would  not buy it again if I had a choice. 2-1-2019  Wyze took care of my problems.  They really came through!  I am now happy with my purchase.
title: Just OK

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Neuro
content: I use this camera to monitor my Bearded Dragons cage. It does an excellent job, picture quality is amazing and I love that I can pan/tilt with my phone. I have it on a timer so it is only on during the day while I’m at work. It turns on every morning without fail and connects to my WiFi without issue. Would highly recommend this camera!
title: Great camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Vinnie
content: This camera has great picture and night vision quality......when it works though. It constantly says SIM card error, it thinks the card is not inserted. I had even purchased a new card, hoping tha was the problem, but that didn’t fix it. I gave up and unplugged it and tossed it in the closet, maybe I’ll try again sometime. Disappointing for sure.
title: Wouldn’t recommend

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: c clark
content: I’ve 2 Wyze pan inside my home and a wyze cam over my front door. Very easy to setup the camera and your phone will do all the work for you. The zone settings helps so you only get an alert if someone enters that preset zone and the camera will follow and save The alert in the cloud up to 14 day. 1 of the selling points for me works with Alexa another point. It feels and looks to be very well made. Good for keeping and eye on the kids playing on another floor or room , pets and home security.
title: Great for kids,pets and home security

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Pc
content: Careful !  I bought serval of these cameras because they had a great resolution. Now I regret that I bought them. First they took away the person detection and now I cannot use my cameras unless I agree to new terms which I am not allowed to see.  An icon pops up in front of the screen and Won’t allow me to use the cameras unless I agree to the terms and when I try to read the terms the icon pops up in front and won’t let me in. I was Able to get to the new terms by excepting the terms first before I read them.
title: You have to agree to terms  first before you are  allowed to see them.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alexandra l.
content: This little camera is amazing, and an excellent value for the price.  I would even pay much more for it!  It records motion and keeps it in the cloud service for free, which is excellent if you want to use this as a security camera.  It’s also good for spying on my dog while I am at work.  The design is sleek and less bulky than other cameras I have tried.  The app is very nice to use and overall setup is very simple.
title: Love this!! Highly recommend!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: carly
content: I love my new camera! I wanted to get a camera so I could check on my dog while we are out of the house; and this camera is perfect! It sends you notifications if there is motion detected so I can check it out and see if he’s gotten into anything. Also it sends the notifications to my Apple Watch which I like but you can’t open the video. It also has 2 way audio so you can yell at him through the camera if he is into something. Also I love this feature when I’m at the grocery store and my husband is on the phone. I can ask him a question through the camera and he can answer really quick without getting off the phone. Hands down excellent camera that gets every angle and fits right in with my decor! Definitely recommend!
title: Excellent camera for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BeAn
content: I have a toddler and a baby and I am using a motorola baby monitor in my toddler's room.  I bought this for my infant who is room sharing with me and my husband.  I liked this in the beginning since I can move it from any room I want it to be.  But, I don't think it's a good monitor for baby.  It keeps buffering to the point that I just have to go to the room to see if my infant woke up and mostly I just hear her crying at the top of her lungs.  This has become useless.  And you have to have a steady monitor.  I have an extra phone which i use.  You cant do anything on your phone when you're using this camera.  I am using an android phone and you can't really hear anything. So, no I am not recommending this camera if you plan on using it as a baby monitor. You can't watch the baby with this camera and  every single second counts. I am just going to buy a 2nd motorola camera for my infant.
title: Not recommending to use as a baby monitor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BLB
content: I really like that I can pan around the room with this camera and it does that very well. The initial set up was relatively easy, took me less than half an hour. I purchased this camera to keep an eye on my dogs when I'm not  home and it works great for that. The night vision in my opinion is just ok but again, for the price you can't beat it.
title: Good little camera at a great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Danman
content: This product blew my mind for the price. Its not some Chinese garbage like most cameras that you can't trust at all, no software updates, bugs galore, terrible quality. The Wyze cam is fantastic. Easy to setup the first time, and very easy to use. I liked the one I bought so much I bought 2 more. Now I can stalk my cat in every room of the house!
title: Cheap, Great Quality, Easy to Use

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nicholas Panek
content: We recently bought one of these and when it arrived the set up guide was easy to use. I just downloaded the app, plugged in the camera, and followed the steps after hitting the setup button. I did notice that on my ZTE prestige the app is slow to respond and there is a significant delay, but my wife also installed the app and there was nearly no delay and she found the controls very responsive (She has a newer Samsung). So I can only assume that the problem is not with the camera but with my phone. We tested the motion tracking and it worked well. The recording to the cloud works as well as the recording to the sd card. It has a wide field of view and the clarity is surprisingly good. I am including a picture taken from the app. Forgive the messiness, I am a slob. Pictures save in PNG format and video saves in mp4 fprmat, both in 1920x1080.
title: Works and is worth the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jan Ruta
content: This camera has a lot of potential but it's inconsistent.  Sometimes we get a notification and sometimes we get the video. The camera is connected to 2 phones and the notifications and videos don't appear the same of both phones.  I did a live chat with Wyze and the person couldn't help me and was going to send it to the next level of support.  I haven't heard back from anyone. If the camera wasn't so inconsistent I would have given it 5 stars.  I hope Wyze is reading this and will make the necessary changes to make this a GREAT camera instead of an OK one.
title: Very Inconsistent

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lisa Lowe
content: Will update later as I have just installed this and I am currently working on open source software to improve the functionality of the items AI as well as using it with my computer for NVR instead of cloud storage. However my initial thoughts on it are good along with the mounts and covers for it and the regular Wyze v2 cams I have linked to it, along with the bridge and Sense items. Needs improvement in some areas but overall has a good built in software and hardware, with potential for good future updates
title: Good product starting out, works great with the other items from Wyze

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Zyanya Torres
content: Cannot speak more highly of the camera. For the money, this is the BEST indoor camer option. Really, though....that statement sells this little thing short. The options it provides really make this one heck of a camera. Being an airbnb host, this thing is an essential item. I also purchased two of their smaller non-panning cameras of which I love equally so. Pictures are clear enough for my needs and the 2 way audio let's me chat with my dog through the day. :-)  The 14 day cloud storage is suitable for my needs but I have chosen to also purchase additional 32 GB storage The ONLY wish I have is for Wyze to offer a wireless option.
title: A 5 star product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Glad2baMom
content: I’ve had this product for just a few months and at first it was fantastic. I was even a member of a beta testing group. But at this point the product has completely died, which is unfortunate because now I’m living in an area with actual security concerns. I’m looking at different products. My advice is to look for something else.
title: Fantastic-for a couple of months. Then DEAD.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: bp
content: The camera is really cool since you have a full 360 view.  The downside is the motion tracking is no where near instant, it takes a few minutes before notifications are received.  The picture quality during the day is pretty good, however the night vision is absolutely horrible.  In complete darkness (as most rooms are during the night), you can't see anything past maybe 8".
title: Not as Advertised

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tdrew
content: It's outstanding For the price .The app was simple the camera was  The easiest of any I've tried to set up . I can control the cameras movements with my hands from  the cell phone app. Just move my fingers where I want it to go and it pans in. It's in a window sill pointing out it reaches All angles of my yard and even turns far enough to look back on  the inside of the house . It's range is decent the sound quality seems ok . Ive seen worse for more I'd be satisfied if I'd paid  $75 but it's half that. Get one there great
title: Great camera and simple app easy to control from far away .

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SK
content: It was not mentioned anywhere in the features and specifications that YOU CAN NOT keep the live streaming recording going if the application is minimized or answering incoming calls! In order for the recording not to be interrupted the application MUST be up & running on an open screen mode, even the phone shouldn't go to the sleep mode. When spoken to Customer Service they were ignorant about these facts and asked me to add a feature to avoid the interruption and buy an SD card, both more expensive the Camera itself. I am returning the camera and shop for a better one! Sorry...
title: Application is a major FAILURE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mackenzie Robison
content: I attempted to instal a MicroSD card in the first WyzeCam Pan that I ordered and it would not register, regardless of whether or not I followed the instructions on the WyzeCam Support site (which also should be included in basic set up, and they’re not...but that’s another story). I contacted Wyze support and they sent me a new camera...and the SAME PROBLEM IS HAPPENING!! These cameras say they’re compatible with MicroSD cards for recording, but yet when you plug one in the camera WILL NOT recognize it. Frustrated that I spent money on a MicroSD card that will not even be able to be used. Wyze, please make sure that when you advertise a feature that it’s actually functional. I appreciated every other aspect of the camera aside from this.
title: MicroSD Cards DONT WORK

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shockey
content: Very surprised for everything you get for the price. It's one of the best looking cams, it spins almost 360 degrees and does faster than most, tilts up and down, zooms in, it's 1080 hd, has very good night vision, and setting both of them up, connected to our phones took 5 minutes. You can talk through it and ppl/pets can hear, the cam also picks up audio so you can hear whats going on. Oh and don't forget it's one of the cheapest priced ones on Amazon.
title: Easy to use, 1080 hd, easy to set up, Cheap Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joe
content: I normally don’t leave comments, but this cam for the price and the video quality I have to.  Very easy, quick setup.  Sensors work great, the one I have has 1080p and it didn’t disappoint.  I only plan to have this on during the times I’m not home watching my dogs.  Some have noted privacy concerns, but for my purposes it’s not an issue.  Definitely worth considering if you need an affordable method to check up on things when you are away.  You could even place one on your porch, if you have one.  Less than half the price of the ring doorbell :)
title: Great cam at an affordable price!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marie M.
content: We bought this to monitor our older dog who has been having accidents at unknown times. It works wonders, and we were shocked at the number of features available for the price. Only wish is that we could create a more sophisticated monitoring schedule in the app. I can set it for 'all day' or for a certain time window (eg 9am to 6pm). But I would like to set it for only certain days, and for two time periods on the days I select. The people in the house don't really want to be monitored along with the dog ...
title: Inexpensive and full featured.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ryan
content: Well design hardware. App walks through very easy. I did have difficulty getting Wyze to recognize my network, but after about 30min, and a few reboots things were connected. Google Home App does not allow for video preview. So you will have to use the Wyze app. I also use the smaller google home nest. Very laggy and choppy experience. About a 15sec delay. Wis this was smoother and more in sync, but hey. Everything basically works.
title: Nice cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christa L. Cook
content: This is my second purchase of a Wyze camera. The original works great so I figured I’d another. This time i spent a little more so that I could have a model that wasn’t stationary and could pan around the room. Sadly it came without a plug so I couldn’t use it right away. Rather than hassle with returning it, I’ll spend another $10 to buy a plug but it was super annoying.
title: Couldn’t plug it in.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brett
content: The camera is takes quality still images and video. The PTZ functionality is good and the app is easy to navigate. The biggest downfall is the motion detection and tracking. The camera moves too fast when trying to follow a person or moving thing. You can not get accurate and clear video when it is moving at the rate it does. You can adjust the speed of it, but that adjustment only affects the speed of it when manually using the PTZ function.
title: For the price, good purchase.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: elijah james
content: i love the wyze cams. easy to set up they work great!! very happy and will recommend to others to purchase any wyze cam. I have tries others and nothing compares to the wyze cam. the customer service is outstanding and the product is amazing. i will get the wyze cameras over any ring or nest. they are better cameras easier to set up and a quarter of the price. love this comapny.
title: love it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: irene erramouspe
content: Unfortunately it was not successful for me step four would asked me for Wi-Fi password and it was not allowing my password in so it would not connect without my Wi-Fi password I called for assistance or help and they couldn’t help me so I had to return it 😫
title: Not supporting my WiFi connection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Indiana
content: I tried numerous times to contact customer support with 0 luck they make it impossibly difficult with the re captcha. I wanted to just exchange it because the picture does look really good quality. I really like the product and want to give it another chance. But for now. Not a good overall experience.
title: Arrived broken 0 sound. Except fuzzy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: The Best
content: I love this camera. We have 3, one outside, one downstairs, and one upstairs. The picture is clear and the motion detection is accurate. The wifi signal is fantastic, our outside camera is on the wifi and we dont have any connection errors.
title: Great Picture, Motion Detection, & Sound

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Laila A.
content: Great small cameras. I bought the mounting and extra long cables too. My only complaint is that it does have pretty frequent “updates” but they’ve always taken less then 2 minutes to upload. And then you have to reposition the camera. Great night vision. Easy to go back and watch a clip and record with sound.
title: Great value, should be 3x more expensive.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joe Pacific
content: Tried to set it up according to instructions.  Could not get it to link with the app.  Contacted technical support who had me repeat the steps over again.  They determined the unit was non-functional and will send me a new one.  Zero stars for the non-working device but an additional two stars for the good customer support.
title: Didn't work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: B&S
content: This is our second one of these, and it works great! It is the most inexpensive and reliable ways I have found to have a security camera in the home. It’s a bonus to be able to move it around with the app and see every part of the room! It also has free motion detection and recording for up to 12 seconds of video I believe. Awesome deal.
title: Amazing deal for an indoor security camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christina Jones
content: My second Wyze cam and first pan cam. I love how easy these are to setup. The picture quality is unbelievable given the low cost of the cameras, not to mention all of the features (walkie talkie, motion alerts, motion tracking, and more). Startled my landlord when she entered my apartment while I was vacation-had fun while I watched try to find my voice and finally directed her to talk to the camera.
title: Great value camera with super easy setup.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: hike2dtop
content: Either at night or during the day, excellent video. I placed it on a window overlooking the driveway (quite a distance). The camera reacts quickly (motion detection) and if anyone opens the door, it follows the person inside the house. I get messages right away. No issues with camera or app. The value cannot be overstated. Thank you.
title: Wow! The value cannot be overstated?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kut_em_up_kt
content: Love it , love it, love it! I'm able to watch my home from work,talk to my kids,night vision works great and the you can change resolutions and connect to a secure encrypted channel that only you can see. Great price and has a micro sd slot that supports 128gb card for time lapsing, and recording. This is a must have for anyone that needs to watch their home on a budget but wants the quality of high end security cam with 360° viewing,night vision and so much more! I'm #TeamWyze.
title: Overall great security cam with simple interface and connectivity.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Riley&GizmosDad
content: This unit works great and is a fraction of the price of other name brands.  You do not have to sign up for monthly service charge unless you want some of the more advanced features.  Being able to add an SD card to save video/photos is nice touch.  Picture quality, basic functionality, and the iPhone app are all excellent.  Went out and purchased a couple more which are easily added to the app.
title: Great product and value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: spp
content: So far, I love it, and have pre-ordered a set of their “smart plugs” as well.  I did unhook the WiFi, and when it was reconnected, the camera rebooted and was fine.  The 360 degree panning is a terrific feature.  The ability  to control the “field of alerts” is nice.  I think it’s a great camera.  Wish they’d come out with an outdoor version.  Night vision isn’t terrific, but it’s what I expected.
title: Very good economical surveillance camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sydney
content: Was on the fence with this product, as I had seen a couple negative reviews, but for the price I just could not turn it down. I purchased this as a type of monitor for my leopard gecko vivarium, upon unboxing and setting up i found out it has motion and sound detection and motion tracking! You truly get the most for your money with this company! The only downside is a low static noise from the camera rotating will sometimes alarm my gecko. Another plus is the motion recording with option to record only when motion is detected or continuously record. And although I am using this for non-security purposes, I will definitely come back to this company for setting up home security! DEFINITELY WORTH IT
title: Perfect

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: lucy
content: these little camera work great.  I first bought them to watch what my dogs were doing during the day. the picture quality and sound work so great i added the smaller cube ones throughout my house and another  cam pan  window my door front door as a security.  They are so much cheaper than the door bell ones. and work just as well from inside my window. I have tried may other wifi home cameras and returned them either they stopped working after 30 days or the picture was horrible.  BUT these little cameras are the BEST.
title: Best security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Good Bird
content: Works great so far!  I've only had it installed for less than a day, but setup was very easy.  The Pan function is very nice.  I have mine mounted in the window frame using a mounting bracket found elsewhere here on Amazon.  When mounting in the window frame, I disabled the IR, but left the night vision on "Auto".  This allowed for good night vision (I have outdoor IR illumination from other sources) without having reflection from the built-in IR from the cam.  Great camera!
title: So far, so good!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lexy
content: Bought this for a baby monitor so I could see my daughter at night without disturbing her sleep and I love it! Wonderful image and sound. Couldn’t be happier. It saved me so much money rather than spending over $100 on a baby monitor I can use this even after she’s too old for a monitor. Also it connects without any issues to Xfinity/Comcast internet which I was worried about but I had no issues! Will recommended to other mothers to save them money.
title: Wonderful camera for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: K.Gardner
content: I enjoy fiddling with all sorts of wrls cameras.. The little wyze cam 2 isn't too bad for what it is.. But this one.. Is the worst camera I have ever purchased.. Lousy picture.. If it isn't installed in nearly direct line of sight, the images are so grossly distorted (with no adjustment other than a 1 click "distortion correction" tab.. Which does little. It constantly gets stuck out of center, self adjusting to a different stop point as center each time it attempts to track something.. When it make a 240 degree turn it catches the corner of my garage and focuses on it as if the corner of my garage was under suspect... As a "motion tracking smart cam".. It is not worth the plastic it's made out of.. If you hope to use this cam as any sort of security.. Don't count on its consistency to record/capture anything viable.
title: Ehhh - more of a toy.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: David Dougherty
content: Stunning! This is a great product for much less than one would expect to pay. I am stunned and VERY happy with this camera and will be buying more products from Wyze. Installation is a breeze requiring only a few simple steps to complete. One tip for buyers: One of the last installation steps requires you to scan an image that is displayed on your phone. You scan that image with the wyze cam. Do not make the mistake of trying to scan the Wyze cam with your phone.
title: Unbelievably good product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amir Mohebbi, MD
content: This is best bang for the price. I chose this one because it doesn’t require service upgrade to work right. I can also set it up with my Alexa and IFTTT. It automatically turns on when I leave and off when I’m home and I get text notifications to alert me of alarms. I bought both models and def for the extra money the pan camera is better
title: Great features for price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Infinity_Imagined
content: Overall I think the value of this product is decently solid. However it’s claims on what its capabilities are is a little exaggerated. The motion detection will work sometimes… As I’ve never seen the mailman come even though they’re right in front of the camera. Add on service required to use it properly. So expect a monthly cost as well
title: Decent but sketchy- best for live stream only

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: manor645
content: I like everything about the Wyze cameras. I have them everywhere and my daughter has them in her house. The best little camera I've ever had and I've tried several more expensive ones and these are better. I have several facing outside and the area they cover is great! Can't wait for the outside cameras they will have out this summer.
title: Works flawlessy, beautiful picture.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Carlos
content: I was exited to try out this camera.  When I power on the camera, it asked for a firmware upgrade.  It took about 10 minutes.  Setting up the camera took less than 10 minutes.  I was surprise it can only records for 12 seconds when it detect any motion.  after the 12 seconds, it  does not record.  I would have given this camera a better score but 12 seconds is useless.
title: only 12 seconds of recording!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bruce Start
content: I’ve had this for about 6 months now. I have it placed in my garage on the far edge of my WiFi range, in the Michigan cold. I have yet to have any connection issues whatsoever! The notifications are consistent and accurate and the picture quality is great. I am extremely impressed with all the features and reliability of this camera for the price. I will likely be buying more Wyze products!!!
title: This little guy is awesome for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lawrence D.
content: only complaint, and it's minor, is that there's seems occasionally to be a several second delay between when motion or sound triggers an alert and when my phone pings me. First world problems I know, but we were hoping to use it as a video baby monitor. The occasional latency, and the fact that it requires pulling out a phone to check the alert, as opposed to glancing at an always on screen, makes it less well suited to the application.
title: High quality and good feature set. Minor delay for alerts.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mike  R
content: I own 2 Wyze cubes and they are perfectly fine, however I have one Wyze pan cam and it is almost useless to me. I have tried three different types of micro USB cards with no luck, they will work for a while and then when you really need to capture some video there is no data there, I contacted support one time and they were not much help so I cannot recommend this at all.
title: Not reliable -  Loses data

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
