author: Thigh light
content: Could be a good product but was bricked by a firmware update. Wyze acknowledges but will not replace the unit. Only fix is to reflash the memory which is complicated and cumbersome. All the trouble to set these up, depend on them and know they could be rendered useless by a manufacturer who does not take responsibility for sloppy updates. I can’t recommend this product unless you don’t mind spending time and money for nothing.
title: Bricked by manufacturers update - beware

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rick Utley
content: I have not been able to set the camera up to record while there is motion. It just takes snippets. It turns out you have to look for a third party app to get things to work the way you want. Their app works only on a phone, there is no PC app. I thought I would buy more cameras once I got it set up, but I'll pass.
title: Camera works ok. Their software is a pain to use.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bryce
content: My first video camera purchase of any kind.  I didn't know what to expect.  Setup was easy, after you push the button to pair it, and tell it your wifi key, everything was easy.  I increased the sensitivity for 'events' to 75, from default of 50.  Now it records video to the cloud if anyone walks by my front porch.  I'm very happy with the purchase, I'm buying another one.  To make this work, you have to turn on 'notifications', its off by default.  Then set the sensitivity.  No big deal, but it wasn't in the quick start guide they give you.  I like the fact that it sends my phone a notification if there is movement detected.  Thats HUGE to me.  I'm often at work or on business, so its reassuring to know what is going on around my house and to know there is a video of it all on the cloud somewhere.
title: I'm new with cameras, this was really easy to setup.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kristin
content: Only a 3 star rating because my first 2 cameras kept spinning around in circles just randomly! After resetting and reinstalling them via the WYZE app! They just kept panning left and right for no reason! I called amazon, they sent out the new replacement cameras in 2 days. Excellent turnaround. I installed them and they seem ok! Zero random panning!!! Yay! The picture quality is fantastic! I can even talk through the little cube cameras! So far, I love them!
title: Great for the price if they aren’t possessed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Karen P.
content: My husband and I actually bought this to be a baby monitor. There are just a couple things about it that we don’t love. When you move the camera from the app, it is pretty loud and will wake up our baby sometimes. Also, the app lags. My baby will cry but it won’t show on the app for 5-10 seconds. However, the camera quality is nice and the camera does the job.
title: Nice camera but a couple glitches

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: m
content: This would always shut itself off, spin around and then reset the entire time I got it. About a year later it was plugged in and working and all of the sudden died. Couldn't get it to turn back on again. I guess for what I paid I can't really complain too much but it only worked for a year and when it did work was constantly resetting and powering itself on/off again. Had a lot of issues. Would definitely not recommend. The stationary Wyze cam that doesn't spin around is okay though. I ordered that one as well and it has worked fine from the get go.
title: Waste of Money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M. Zhao
content: had some other more big brand cams like amazon cloud cam/ring and many others... honestly 5 times more expensive and not nearly as 1/5th capable as this one. I loved that it sits beautifully and works perfectly as expected. how nice it can look around the house and find the person to talk to, I didn't even put in the sd card yet for more functions I havn't tried. it just works. videos/pictures very clear day and night. app has very easy to understand interface. nice job wyze team!
title: superb product!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dr. Anonymous
content: I just use this inside windw for 24 hour recording to back up other cameras. When put on event recording it does a terrible job. I usually look at my dlink to see what happened first, then I go to that time on wyze and see what happened before the event. Works out perfectly.  Worth the money.
title: Use for 24 hour recording.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Madi
content: WOW!! If I could give this 10 stars I would!! I can not believe how well this works for such a low price! I researched many different cameras and decided to take a chance on this one. I wasn’t expecting much since it was only $38. Similar cameras, that had the 2 way audio, were significantly higher in price. This camera does everything I need it to. The picture quality is wonderful, and the 2way audio works beautifully!! Perfect for when my very anxious dog is home alone and I can talk to her! Set up was super easy too!! Seriously, if you are looking for a high quality, low price camera then look no further!!!
title: PUT THIS IN YOUR CART, RIGHT NOW!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: mike in mass
content: The picture was sharp and it detects motion like the other wise cam but the pan didn't move.  It would give off a hum but never move.  Tried for a few hours, updated the firmware but still nothing but a nice humming sound..  Gave up and sent it back.  I will trade it for another wise cam V2..
title: Nice humming sound

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Richard A. Anstett
content: Nice device with regards to material, picture and sound quality, it works well when I can start it.  But it often fails to start from the phone app and I have to unplug and re-plug the power cord to get it to start. Also, it doesn't shut off on command either, I had to unplug it after multiple "off" attempts. so that's a bug with the device, or with the smartphone app. Annoying..
title: Often doesn't turn on/off from phone app

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Skeletonkey IFOR
content: This camera is garbage. Everytime you try to use the speech option (I use it for an outdoor catio), it freezes and restarts the camera. Every. Freaking. Time. Seriously. This camera is a paperweight now. I wouldn't recommend this for my worst enemy, let alone to monitor the safety of family members.
title: You get what you pay for...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shibz
content: This is the 1st time purchasing the Wyze Cam Pan and is works flawlessly. We also own 4 of the Wyze Cams  The picture quality, even when using SD instead of HD, is superb in comparison to other cameras we've used in the past. Setup is quick and simple; it is almost basically a plug and play device. There is a little bit of a lag when panning, but that is to be expected. We use or 5 different devices both inside and outside of our home and have not had any issues with any of them.
title: Inexpensive, simple to setup and great quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sarmigru
content: The image quality is great. I like that you can change the angle of what you’re viewing. Problem is can’t rarely connect when away from home. I can connect without issues while at home, but when away the camera can rarely be reached. Extremely frustrating as it defeats the purpose of the camera. I will also point out I had another set of cameras, very poor night image, but very rarely did I have issues connecting to it. That is disappointing.
title: Great image, poor live connection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Llama Girl
content: Arrived with No instructions, I searched for the manual then set it up. then scans the rooms a lot so the snapshots are hard to view since the camera is moving constantly I added notification for person - sensor - then nothing was being recorded Takes a while to load overall I will wait until the weekend to see if improves
title: It moves/scan the room nonstop - annoying

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jung B.
content: I bought 4 wyzes to monitor my puppy at home while I am out for working. It moves up & down and left & right. However it moves up & down  with some limitation and therefore I wasn’t able to see down enough. Also other major problem is that one of four swing around as if it has its own mind even after several factory resets! I suspect either malfunctioning or security issues with the one. I am not using the one anymore and wish to hear from Wyze co. if possible. It is major concern for all cam users to fear of hacking issues...
title: Cost effectiveness but reliability issues?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kyle E Brock
content: The cam has a design flaw with an internal cable from the rotating base of the unit to the cam's circuit board. This cable will warp itself over time and pull the connector out of the board and make you think the camera is broken (no power). Mine actually snapped the cord 18 months of this. This was 6 months past warranty.
title: Great cam at a great price but one big problem

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: T.Waller
content: This camera worked okay for a few weeks it has cut off and will not cut back on. I ordered another and it isn’t working properly hope to be allowed to return both items.
title: Stops working within a few months

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ohanachan
content: I previously wrote a review on this and commented about the power cord.  On further inspection there is a mini USB port in the dial at the bottom of the camera.  Once this was handled, setup was very easy.  I've had Dlink cameras for years and it's been a real hassle with playback and certificates.  Not problem with this.  My next step is to setup recording on my PC.  Very happy with the product and picture.
title: Once I figured out the mini-USB was in the disk, everything worked well

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Savannah H
content: Amazing for the price! It would be awesome for a much higher price point also. I can look in on my pets when I'm not home and even talk to them if I felt like it, which I have done before when the cats were doing something they shouldn't. It gives me piece of mind when we aren't home because we will get a notification if there's any movement near the door.
title: Perfect little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BeaPenn
content: It is OK but would expect it last longer than a year. Purchased a 2nd unit and it doesn't pick up the neighbors IR lighting (which is a boost to my property lighting). Ordered another unit before returning the 2nd purchase. 3rd device doesn't pick up the neighbors IR lighting either and the 3rd camera has stopped working in less than 24 hours. Done with these cameras.
title: Unit 1 Died after one year - have now purchased 3 pan cams - done with this brand

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PatrickF
content: after getting a error 90 code on 1 of 2 the 1 will not reconnect have tried the companies suggestions and tried to call but after 15 minutes of waiting it seems futile. some how need the company to contact me, i guess i missed the support for it. will look at other cams to see if there is a better one and also longer customer support will not recommned this product, my other one that is even father away seems not to have any  connection issues.
title: connection error 90

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C. Battman
content: For the price this camera can't be beat... But I wish it had PC or Mac compatibility it is soley on phone apps currently, I also wish I could search a date and time instead of having to scroll through the timeline otherwise the picture is great, audio  could be better and the mic more forward facing like under the lense instead of on the bottom
title: More bang for your buck in my opinion

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AhmudW
content: Design wise - this is a great product Install - piece of cake Setting up - easy as can be Using - simple and requires the Wyze app or online account Storage - Has a microSD slot and can record to the cloud Wishlist - make this battery operated because wires are ugly
title: Wyze is doing great things!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Philip K
content: Great product for the money.  Great support as well.  I have had the Wyze Pan sitting on the shelf recording and doing what it was purchased for (watching my dog while at work and security) and after 7 months of completely reliable streaming it failed last night and started boot-looping.  Today, after 30 minutes on hold, the phone queue hangs up on me...and then the phone rings (they called back after the call got disconnected!!) . The helpful lady from Wyze quite quickly deduced that the camera must be defective and they are shipping me a new one. You have to love Wyze labs, even when something breaks, they are on point.  I have spent longer in line at a store making a return than I did on the phone. I would absolutely recommend this product for anyone looking for an inexpensive camera with high quality video and superb support.
title: Great product at an unbelievable price point

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: D L.
content: I still can't believe a camera like this is sub $40. The picture quality is on par with my Ring cam that costs $400 (and needs a $3/mo subscription to playback video). The reason I dock a star is that there are some big bugs with the app. I can't connect to the camera without an app reboot every time. Also, the camera itself needed to be physically disconnected and reconnected a few times the first month I owned it, which stopped becoming a problem later on. Besides that, hopefully Wyze fixes those bugs and I can give it the 5 stars it deserves.
title: Incredible value with some flaws

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bubblefish
content: Picture quality is good and night time pictures is not bad. Price is right for the quality of camera. I am happy with the purchase until it stopped working after 6 months. Tried to reinstall few times and worked for few days but won't connect again. So have to say that this is too expensive to only last 6 months. Hope to reach out to the company and see if it still within warranty.....
title: Stopped working after 6 months

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: steve s
content: The Pan Cam features allowed me to monitor various meters at different locations on my solar control. Great value, picture, easy to use.  I would buy again.
title: Worked great to remotely monitor my solar controls.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tinacrafty
content: I would have given them a 5 stars but it states that you can view live stream which never works on any of the cameras. As far watching live its GREAT! I came speak to someone when I'm not home although it will buffer on occasion. They can talk back to me. I can also scan around the room. I have also allowed 2 other family to connect and have access to viewing live. I do have sd cards in the cameras also. Customer service needs to get better at responding
title: Good for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: EyesOnly
content: The first one I received had side walls opened, I didn't even try to snap them back on as there might be other problems associated with it. So I requested a replacement. The replacement seemed ok but its night vision is really bad like almost non existent, I didn't see the IR light in the dark, the clicking sound was there when the room got dark though. This is after I upgraded to the latest firmware and also did a factory reset as was suggested on support forums. I am returning the replacement as well, sigh... I have 3 wyze v2 cams which are working perfectly (the night vision on those are quite good). I'll replace this with another wyze v2 cam.
title: Quality control is bad on this one

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: George B
content: Just follow the instructions step by step and you will have your home security network up and running in the matter of minutes. The hardest part is putting in your password for your WiFi network! The instructions tell you how to connect the cameras, they actually talk to you and tell you when they are ready. Awesome quality video, if you put in a micro SD card, you can automatically record the video. I use this to keep an eye on my elderly mother and my house when I am at work or out. If needed, you can turn on the mic and talk to them! So many quality features at a very reasonable cost, and simple to set up and use! The only negative comment is that you have to have a power outlet nearby to plug in the adapter and run the power cord to the camera, otherwise great camera!
title: Very easy home security at a great price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JOAN R
content: This camera is a great product for the money. I have a few of them around my house and recording stuff on the  SD  card is the way to go. The quality of the video is very clear and I like that you can save the clips for future use. As easy to use tilting and rotating menus that captures a large area of your space or property. Really is a good product from what I can see. I have three of them!
title: Best camera for the price. I have 3 of them!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RC
content: Purchased 5 different camera systems to test. Wyze, Arlo, Simplesafe and two wired products. In the Wyze product line purchased multiple pan cameras, regular cameras. and sensors. Have a total of 15 Wyze products. None of the products worked correctly out of the box. Set up app on multiple devices. Notifications do not work on any of these items. Look through Wyze community forum. Common problem.  Solutions include factory reset camera, power cycle on and off, delete app and reinstall, etc. Products are inexpensive, but you can spend 50 plus hours trying to get products to work with no luck. While each of the products have some issues, the Wyze products software execution is very poor. Wyze has substantial software interface and options but Documentation is non existent. Go to the know software bugs listed on their website. Pretty much covers almost every critical feature.
title: Painful, buggy and will use a lot of your time

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kelly Bosch
content: We purchased the normal Wyze Cam about two months ago and absolutely loved it. Then we purchased the Wyza Cam Pan to cover our patio door and living room. We currently have it placed looking outside our doors. I had very high hopes for this camera but we can walk right in front of it without setting off the motion sensors! I turned the sensitivity up to see if that would help, and it picked up the slightest change in light and notified us every three seconds, even though I thought there was a cool down period. Overall, I wish I could return this one, and get just the normal camera again.
title: OK-- But not the best

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John French
content: This is the second camera I purchased. The first one is working great.  This one fails the detect movement and therefore fails to track and send alert notifications. I have reset it, updated the firmware with no success.  All other features work. Seems to be a common problem with the V2.  Ordered a replacement. Update - Works fine after I downgraded the firmware.  Problem was the latest firmware update.
title: Worked as advertised after firmware downgrade.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Qwkslver
content: The picture quality is pretty good, the sound is fine.  You have to fiddle with it a little bit to install it but it's not brain surgery.  It crapped out twice soon as I got it going but I suspect that may be my internet, so it took a while for it to come back online.  Honestly I bought it so I can check on my dogs when I'm gone so I think it's gonna be fine.  Decent little setup for what the cost is.  I would buy it again but they say the second one is harder to set up.  Good enough.
title: Pretty good camera for the $

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robert21
content: I am liking these cameras (I started with one but liked it so much I added another.  I love the pan, tilt and zoom plus full color during the day and infrared at night.  While I was setting up the second one, the first detected my movement and rotated as I moved throughout the room. Nice. So far, highly impressed.
title: Impressed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jonathan Rodriguez
content: We've been using it for over a month now and we love it! The motion detection goes off a lot because of our cats but it's really nice that it saves 12 second videos for us to playback and watch. Compared to other security cameras, it's definitely worth getting. I personally like the 2-way audio feature. If you buy the wall mount for it, it can serve as an outdoor security system too.
title: Can't beat it for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kat
content: Very disappointed, the two way audio isnt working at all, and the motion tracker isnt working at all, the only time it moves is if I put it on pan or I move it with my phone...not sure why these things arnt working, probably will send back if issues arnt resolved, very disappointed!!
title: Disappointed!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: N. Mccorkle
content: Won't work on firewalled LAN without being able to connect to the internet every few days. Randomly stops working every 2 days or so, requiring unfirewalling and then a power cycle, before re firewalling and getting another day or two of local monitoring usage. Luckily my router has SSH and I could script the firewall disable/enable to only take a few keystrokes, otherwise it would be unusable as a local real-time monitor in situations where uptime is critical.
title: Uptime over firewalled LAN is 1-2 days and needs internet to restart

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jonathan Torres
content: Wonderful product. For the value of this camera, there is no reason to search for higher end and over priced cameras. I personally believe the Wyze team really gave much detail and dedication to getting their product right. It is easy to use, has multiple customizable features. One thing I am still trying to adjust it’s sensibility to detecting motion, but it has ways to reduce it and detect a certain target area which is great. This camera has allowed me to get a piece of mind when I am not home. (I occasionally scare them with its ability to speak through the cameras speakers). Can’t wait to try out more of Wyze products. They do a great job on listening to the costumer and bettering their product each time.
title: Quality, price, motion detection and easy features

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Eric R. Spitler
content: Its surprising how cheap this camera is (price-wise, not quality). The video is excellent quality in light and IR mode, pinch-zoom and swipe-pan are intuitive and have a fraction of a second latency. Moving object tracking works, and will actually follow multiple targets, alternating back and forth. I wouldn't even say this requires setup, just plug it in and connect to the app. Sharing with other people is a snap too. The biggest downside (really only downside) is the lack of integration with Google Assistant / Chromecast. We also have a Nest so that we can call up the video (its in our daughter's room, so quick pull-up on other devices is quite helpful), but if Wyze starts integrating with these services I can see no reason to go elsewhere. We highly recommend this camera, especially if they integrate via software updates.
title: Excellent camera, would never know how low-cost it is

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J-No
content: The biggest problem, and it's a big problem, is that once you have two or more of these cameras on your network, one or the other will drop offline/lose connection with the app. This is obviously something of a deal breaker considering it renders one or more cameras useless. Otherwise the cameras have some nice features, save for the audio, which is so bad it's also essentially useless.
title: Constantly disconnecting - so frustrating

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rob Pierson
content: Camera was great when I first bought.  However, it got worse and worse with each software update.  Now, it’s basically useless.  Very difficult to connect to with phone app.  Once connected, the connection drops within a few seconds.  Also night vision and sound are very poor quality.  Time to trash it and try another brand.
title: Deteriorating performance.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Av8r
content: If you plan on using this camera offline, you can not unplug it once you have the settings set. NO where in their set up guides or information does it mention this fact. It was only after many exchanges with their customer support did they bother to mention this. Customer support was fair at best. It looked like they didn't even bother to read my question but only read the subject line. Their responses were like pulling teeth to get my questions answered. Maybe they would answer one of several questions. Or, they would just repeat back what steps I've told them I've completed during the setup process. VERY frustrating. The panning feature is VERY erratic. It may focus on movement in the camera field of view, but then in pans 180 degrees or extreme left or right so now the object is no longer in the field of view. I would not recommend this item.
title: Does NOT work offline

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: melissa m.
content: Great camera! Super ideal to have one camera that can move and view different angles around the house. I initially got this for my dog (he gets anxiety when I leave him home) and it’s super convenient that I could talk to him through the camera. You could set up motion detection, where the camera follows a moving object. There is also a memory card you could insert to have all footage stored there. Only reason I am not giving this 5 stars is because I don’t get notified when there is motion going on in the house, this would be a super convenient feature and I hope they work on that. Other than that, it’s great! The quality is great and the motion on the camera doesn’t lag. Amazing product for the price!
title: Accurate description & great customer service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lokela
content: The camera is great! Love what they are doing, but I had to open up a ticket as the one I purchased doesn’t have a clear night vision mode. I can hear it trying to change over and if there is a little light I see that go gray, but otherwise it’s a black screen. Great during the day, but horrible at night. I’ve opened up a ticket with them, but no response. I’m hoping that someone may see this and know what to do.
title: Where is the night vision?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shiu W.
content: Good for couple days and the cam kept on re-position itself. No matter how many times I drove the cam to the right position, it reset itself back to the position it likes!! Go youtube, looks like it is one of the major problem of this product. People teaching on youtube to lower the sensor, I turned to the lowest, still not working, returned it.
title: Re-position Problem

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: dakota boucher
content: This camera came with the motor already broken, then when the camera would pan, it would knock the whole camera off the surface it was on and it broke itself further to the point where it would reset itself every 30 seconds. I found a cheaper camera that doesn't kill itself AND has Alexa AND has more features and I've been using that one for months now with no issues, that one is a Heimvision camera and that cost me $30.
title: If you WANT to waste your money, go for it.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael D. Johnson
content: After reading the reviews, and talking to a friend who purchased the Wyze Cam, I opted to purchase the Wyze Pan Cam. Set-up was very easy, and I am very impressed with the picture quality. The free 14-day cloud storage is a real deal. The uploaded clips are only 12 seconds long, so I have a memory card on order so I can store full 24-hour video. Supposedly, a 32 GB card will store up to several days worth of video.
title: Great security camera for a very low price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chadela
content: This little camera is perfect, it rotates easily, the quality of the picture is outstanding especially for the price, the app and installation are exceptionally easy! Absolutely worth it ! Honestly i was skeptical because of the price and I would say thank you to the creators because this little camera makes me feel safe and i am glad that is so affordable! I am on a budget so my wallet was happy!
title: Must have product! Exceptional quality!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ada
content: I bought two of them. I love all the functionalities of the camera and at a great price. However, the background noise is so loud I can’t barely hear what is happening in my house. I use those camera to track rats around my house but the constant cracking noise is so annoying. I thought maybe my camera had a problem, but I received my second camera few days later and same cracking noise. I wanted to love these camera so much but I’m very disappointed...
title: Cracking noise so annoying!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael Calhoun
content: We have a dog that tore his ACL and we were concerned for his well being while we were at work!! This camera eases the mind and is super easy to use!! You do not have to be tech savvy to operate!! It sends notifications of a brief recording of movement detected!!  I think if the detection setting was turned all the way up it would pick up a fly moving around!!! Due to the location of the camera and being able to see two entrances of our home we also caught some uninvited family members stopping by throughout the day!! All in all a wonderful product!!! PS our pup is now all healed and running around like he always used too!!
title: Easy to operate from anywhere

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ann03K  James
content: Much better that other camera that shall not be named “nesting” camera. Plus NO monthly fee. Phenomenal picture quality. And talk through is legible! The ability to turn camera is great for large room! Do wish it had cloud capability (therein lies the monthly service fee...) but sd card adequate. One request: need a way to turn off ALL camera notifications instead of having to do each one.
title: Love these cameras! LOVE the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Melan2012
content: This camera only works on your phone if you want to put it on a chrome book or a laptop you have to get an SD card then you have to take and download the firmware to your computer then you have to take a firmware file and drag it over into another file and there are multiple steps and I tried everything it did not work the only way to do this is if you have an Apple phone otherwise it doesn’t work
title: It only works with an Apple phone No PC/laptop

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shopaholic33
content: This is perfect for basic every day use. During the day I leave it downstairs and watch my dog while I’m at work, evenings and weekends I plug it into my sons room & watch him while he naps. The quality is good, it roatates around for a full view, I’ve even used it while running an errand as a communication device between me & my teenage daughter- as you can speak into it & hear, simple and well worth the $40
title: Great for the price!! Way better than the baby monitors that cost 4x the amount

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kim
content: I set this up in my home to find out which cat was pissing on the floor. Every time I checked on the camera it was facing the wall or window or everywhere but where set it up at.  When watching it, it'll start panning the room and stop at random places.  It never stayed where I faced it.  Never.  I liked the idea of having a PTZ but it's worthless if it keeps facing the wall.
title: it has a mind of its own and will move around on its own

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mitch Brevard
content: I have been really impressed with both my Wyze Cam Pan and Cam 2. Setup was super easy and they work great. I added a 32GB SD card in them so I can have local storage with playback. I started having an issue with the night vision in the Pan and I did some troubleshooting but the issue continued. I reached out to Wyze's online support and after a couple emails we still were not able to get it working right. Wyze immediately offered to replace my Pan. I was really impressed with their support.
title: Great Product and Great Support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PhoKing
content: Bought this because of a very rude and abrasive crazy tenant. This works for what it has been intended for. Only bad issue is that the tracking isn't all that great and doesn't follow the target. The sound for audio recording is terrible. It's very easy to setup. I would definitely buy other Wyze products.
title: Great for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ashley Lynn
content: This is the second Wyze Pan Cam I've purchased after loving the first.  The quality of the picture is good, the night vision is impressive.  No difficulties with recording events or receiving alerts when motion is detected.  New firmware update enables person detection (vs pet) which is great for use in monitoring your home.  Great for use during home construction, checking in on the pet sitting, laying eyes on pet while you're away and could even be used as a baby monitor.
title: Don't let the price fool you, this camera is great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Le Family
content: I love the Wyze company and its product. This is our first pan-camera after 2 purchases of their Wyze Cam. The pan-camera can move side-to-side and up and down. We use this camera to track our dog as she roams free around our living room throughout the day. A stand-still camera would not give us the complete coverage as this pan-camera does. There is nothing in the market that beats its price, quality, and function.
title: Best in-home smart camera out there

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brittney B
content: This is an awesome camera especially for the price! I use it as a baby monitor. I love the ability to talk to them, so they know that I'm coming to get them out of bed. The night vision is fantastic. Its easy to move around from room to room. The picture quality is incredible. I love that I can move the camera around just from the app to get a better view and I can zoom in. I can record picture, I can take pictures of sweet sleeping babies..I really have zero complaints about this camera!
title: Best camera for a great price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shaundra Collier
content: I absolutely love this camera! I got it to use as a baby monitor but use it for many other things. Word to the wise- at first I was having connection issues and co tacted the company. I have Xfinity wifi and I had to split the connections to two, one 2.4 and one 5 because if it picks up the 5 signal it loses connections. No issues since doing that, they are amazing with helping troubleshoot.
title: Amazing camera for a great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jessie Powers
content: Ordered 2. One never worked from the start, the other has a bent micro USB but still works, although it catches on the bent part. Been trying to talk with WYZE customer support for the last 2 weeks on getting the other one to work, theybleace something to be desired. Lucky if I get a response every 5 days
title: Do not update the firmware. It causes camera to not work.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mack
content: This thing works like a charm.  The motion detection and panning feature can take a little getting used to - The motor isn't super noisy, but you can hear it.  I tested mine on the kitchen counter and the family got a little annoyed with the motion tracking.  The app is great for setting up scanning zones and scanning times.
title: Great little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Warner
content: I needed a extra cam to substitute as a baby monitor, and this works great. I was skeptical to buy such a cheap camera and was looking at more expensive options $150+, after watching multiple you tube videos I decided to roll the dice on this cam. So far it’s worked great, night vision is the same quality as my $200 baby monitor, and I’ve had no issues with connectivity. Took 5 minutes to set up and the app has been working great.
title: Amazing quality for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bardia Amirebrahimi
content: Worked great for about a week (and everything was good while it worked) and now can’t hold a connection for more than a minute or so. Have done everything I could find online including deleting the device and resetting it up from scratch. All this after spending the extra money on a mount, an SD card and a 20ft power cable. I have an Arlo system for our baby room and should have spent the extra money for a quality add on arlo camera. Lesson learned.
title: It was too good to be true

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Melissa
content: Worked for a week then we got back from a short trip which we got it for and it hasn’t worked since.  It keeps saying connection error and on the app it says the device is turned off.  Bummer bc I really liked it for the week we were able to use it.
title: Broke after one week :(

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Roman
content: An excellent camera on budget. I always wanted to buy a home security camera but most of them were cost prohibitive. I found Wyze and did some research on it and the price was no brainer for the features. Initial setup is very easy and you can share it with other family members where they can also access the cam using its app. Looking to buy another one which I’m planning on using as a baby monitor. I will review that as well and will leave a video link for YouTube video. One complaint so far. It has given me false CO2 alarm twice in a day.
title: Packed with features, yet with an amazing price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: N. Keith
content: I have driven my car into the back yard, gotten out and walked under this camera without triggering the motion detection.  The 5 minute cool-down after detecting motion conserves on cloud space, but is really bad for accurate motion tracking.
title: Robotic, remote viewable Wi-Fi,  HD camera for under $40.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: L. Howarth
content: JUST TO LET EVERYONE KN OW, THAT IF YOU DON'T HAVE A SMARTPHONE  WYZE WILL >>> NOT <<< ALLOW YOU TO DOWNLOAD TO ANYTHING ELSE.. ....  AS IN KINDLE  FIRE  10 - TABLET --- ETC ..... SO NOW, MY  Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera IS USELESS..... NEVER HAD THIS TROUBLE WITH  >>> MYDLINK <<< CAMERA ....
title: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wil
content: Every single time I have needed to go back and review footage, it says NO SD card.  There IS an SD card.  I have no indication of when it loses connectivity, so I cannot reboot it.  Rebooting appears to start it up correctly again, but for a security device, this is unacceptable.  Not bad if you want to check in on pets or birds.
title: Does not reboot itself.  Not good for a security device if you cannot check recordings.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: HLO1234
content: Doesn't actually work with Google Assistant. The camera is great, but we bought it primarily to run with our Google Hub Max. It doesn't work at all, it's glitchy to load, freezes after a max of 30 seconds and glitches again. On their website they say that it's a known bug and a fix is "in-progress." Super frustrating and I would've bought something else that's actually integrated into Google Home/Assistant if I'd known. If you're hoping to use this on a Google Hub, look elsewhere for now.
title: Doesn't stream on Google products

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: OzzByte
content: As a technology officer I have pretty high standards for my home tech.  I’m constantly trying to balance quality with cost to garner the best value.  The Wyzecam delivers.  I decided to buy one to try it out before deciding on what product to deploy in my home.  This wyzecam has great picture quality and easy features in this very inexpensive package.  This also appears to be a very ethical company, putting users ahead of the overall bottom line.  This is a very simple cam for any user and an exceptional value for your pocketbook.
title: Quality divided by Cost = Value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tempting Reviews
content: It never damaged any of my cards, but it won't recognize or format them. Tried three different brands including endurance, it didn't matter. Arlo happily reads and records without extra work. On the side, the scheduling is inflexible. You can't exclude certain days. Motion sensor gets tripped on light dimmers. That's not motion. Sensitivity doesn't matter. You get what you pay for.
title: SD card slot is ineffective. Known problem

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jamin
content: Recorded event clips do not work. You try to play them and it just say No fragment. This camera is only good for a live feed, it serves zero security uses. I did reach out to support, after several emails they keep insisting it my internet connection even though even though event clips are save to the cloud.
title: Recording does not work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dustin B.
content: Why make a camera that pans but makes a god awful grinding and buzzing noise when panning with the sound option turned on?  Try it for yourself I guarantee you hear it.  I called customer service and they told me that’s all they could do at this price point and the panning option is to be used with the sound off. Really?
title: BUZZING AND GRINDING OH MY!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wendi
content: The disappointment about this camera is no ability to have it record just when there is motion.  You can either record 24/7 or not at all.  Along those same lines, it does not send a notification when movement is detected.  So, unless I record all the time and then watch the entire feedback I have no idea what happened in the area the camera is set up. An update, this camera has settings to record per event but the one I have does not...complete waste of money.
title: Total waste!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jacobair
content: Great price. Very cool little camera. Awesome how you can control the pan/tilt feature from your phone. Picture quality is  good....connectivity to the app is mostly good (depending on how many bars I'm getting on my android). I have two Wyze cameras set up. The only thing that I feel can be improved is I find it difficult, when I'm reviewing something on the video, is stopping right on what you want...especially if the object or person is in motion. If the object is not moving, it works just fine.
title: Can't go wrong with this unit

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shaki Commissariat
content: Forget Nest.....unless you like to throw your $$$$$.  This was totally unexpected. Someone at work mentioned about an inexpensive camera called Wyze.  Since the camera is so cheap I decided to give it a shot.  To my amazement, I was able to set up the camera within 3 minutes and was totally blown away by the resolution.  This is an absolute must have in the house and outside as well.  The recordings are great too.
title: The Best camera I have bought

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J Johnson
content: It took me about 10 minutes from un boxing to complete setup, super easy. The picture quality is amazing. I love how it can pan. I'm not sure about the facial detection yet. Doesn't seem to pick up faces all the time. But for less than $40, this can't be beat! I bought another one the same day this one came in!
title: Amazing camera, for an amazing price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JOHN GAMBARDELLA
content: This is my second one. I’ve had the first one for about a year with no problems decided to get this for the living room to watch the dog when we’re not home. LOL. Works great at a great price. Very easy to set up and can switch from old camera to new camera very quickly on the same screen
title: Great price!Works great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Teresa Hernandez
content: Love this camera!  work just like, or better than the high priced ones!  Really good quality picture!  make sure you buy the chip to record, its really easy to set up and you can monitor from your phone anytime you want!  Oh!  you can speak to whomever is in the room and you can hear their response too, you can rotate it too, to get a view of the whole room!
title: easy and great quality view!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: David Jones
content: This is my first home camera. I got this because it was a grea price and it has the free cloud service. I like how I can pan around and see the entire room. The notifications for when it detects movement is my favorite feature. I am not home most of the day and it alerts me whenever someone comes in. My roomate sometimes pops up and it always lets me know when he is there. The only issue I have experienced is the SD card not being recognized sometimes, but after formatting it on my computer, it seems to work now. So, no fault on the product itself.
title: Perfect Security Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Katastrophy
content: The night quality wasn't what I thought it would be, but because I use this primarily for security during the day that aspect didnt bother me.  The quality of the picture during the day is great!  I did turn off the motion sensor because it was picking up a lot of little motions and I have dogs so I was getting notified all the time. For the price you cant find a better camera and the setup was super easy.
title: Easy setup great quality camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: S E Morris
content: The best thing is the price which is far better than others I researched. I was recommended by a friend. I also purchased the water resistant case From WE direct and they work great together. I don't used the motion detection but the picture is great and app works perfect on Android. Now I am recommending.
title: Best WiFi rotating camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robert Camden
content: I have 4 of the standard stationary Wyze cams and are very pleased. Decided to purchase the Pan Cam to monitor my pool area. first one came in would not rotate correctly. Amazon had my replacement to me in just a few days and setup was easy. Love the range of motion and picture quality at this price point.
title: Great little camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: L. Christensen
content: I was very skeptical of a camera for this low price. It's amazing! Easy to install and monitor on my iPhone, the picture quality is terrific. It's got a speaker function so I can talk to my dogs if necessary. I can move it around the room and you can actually see and recognize people in it. Highly recommend.  I feel like I should add that I am in no way affiliated with this company, it's just a great camera.
title: Amazing camera!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brian R. Moga
content: I am using this outdoors... Daylight is great! Night time nothing! I had one of these to kick it into night vision https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00DHBZRD4?pf_rd_p=ab873d20-a0ca-439b-ac45-cd78f07a84d8&pf_rd_r=C1HCAE9PDWV71VSSBFCT for the price I am happy if it last a year
title: It works but needs support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Paristian
content: I painted them black. works great. Way cheaper then other company who sell similar product,  easy to set up and quality is very good. Been working for 1 year
title: Happy with it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rebecca Ingraham
content: I would return these if I could! They constantly say buffering and never load the picture. When they do load its almost 10 mins delayed! And I can't hear anything! Even with my phone volume on loud! I was trying to upgrade me cheap cameras apparently I will be going back to using them. These are horrible!
title: Horrible!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bari M Berger
content: I bought this to keep tabs on my cats while I am out of the house. I have it perched on a shelf which they have knocked it off of several times and it fell about 5 ft without damage so I would say durability is not an issue. The camera itself is very mobile and moves easily. The sound is delayed and when I speak I hear echos which can be bothersome. Close up pictures like the one of my white cat are grainy otherwise the picture quality is good. Overall for the price this is a good unit.
title: Great spy camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: The1nOnlyMaria
content: I can not express how pleased I am with this little guy. I bought this as a nanny cam while I’m away to watch my new baby. I love that you can rotate the camera 360° the clarity is amazing and best of all the motion detector is excellent. I can hear and talk, and has so many options. Instead of paying over $100 for a baby monitor I feel like this is the one to go for. It’s easy to move around the house or even take on the go. I want more!
title: Can’t believe this amazing little guy is only $34

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DeDi
content: This camera is a good value. Has a great picture, and the ability to pan is great. Don't like how it has a 5 minute wake-up between captures. We have an SD card installed, which is supposed to stop the 5 minute wake-up, but it doesn't. This means that if the camera records something and that recording stops, there is a 5 minute wait before it will record again.
title: Good value and great picture

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Johnny
content: I bought 2 of these to keep an eye on my dog while I'm at work. I also have a couple of the stationary Wyze cams. The only issue I have with them is the zoom. It doesn't have an actual zoom lens on it. It just takes the existing image and blows it up in the area that you want to zoom in on. As a result, even in HD video, you end up with a grainy and pixilated image. That's a small price to pay for an otherwise great camera.
title: Great for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christy
content: We love this little camera! We've had this for a couple of months and it works wonderfully. If we're not home, we can check in anytime we like. We check in on our pets, hear them, and speak to them or anyone at home at the time. You can opt to turn on/off notifications which is very nice. I use it when the grandkids are staying over as a baby/child monitor. It's such a great value for your money. We will be getting another one soon.
title: Awesome value and quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Martha H
content: We added this camera to monitor our garage as a supplement to our existing indoor/outdoor security camera system. The setup was remarkably easy and its technology is very impressive. We welcomed the option to store video events locally on an SD card. Our only disappointment is the limited range of the infrared lights in the nighttime mode.
title: Impressive technology

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: sz
content: Reason - I gave 4 star - occasionally the camera freezes and panscan is not operational- at that time you have to close/ exit the app and restart it- the developers need to look into this drawback as its frustrating. Otherwise, it has a aesthetic design, is sleek and pretty much plug and play as long as one follows directions.
title: Not bad !!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: b0nn3r
content: TLDR: Buy this camera, you won’t regret it and you’ll buy more of them. Incredible quality video, app and size. Most importantly, this company is one of the few companies left in the tech industry with morals and ethics. They don’t charge you monthly for video storage because they offer local storage on a microSD card. The camera out performs anything out there for literally 1/4 the price. Two way audio works great, pan and tilt works great. Lol @ Ring and Nest and the like charging monthly fees for cloud storage plus $250 for the camera that doesn’t even pan or tilt. This company also listens to feedback - unheard of from other companies.
title: Destroys Nest, Ring, etc.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dissatisfied Customer
content: This camera is okay. And okay only. It was in color and I had it inside in a window. And it told me when people were in my yard or on my porch. When they asked me i had a choice to pay the xtra charge and I didn’t, 3 months after I had it and I didn’t, all of the sudden I no longer had color I had black and white!!  No night vision!  And absolutely NO person detection. This is extortion to an extent. When I emailed about the problem about 6 times I never got an email in return. Maybe it’s broke, maybe it’s just junk. Maybe they screw everyone. Maybe just a few of us. Someone told me not to get it as you get what you pay for. So just know it’s crap. And customer service is nonexistent!!
title: If you don’t pay for premium you don’t get person detection.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A. Garvin
content: These things are awesome and I could not recommend them enough. I've installed them in my home first, 2 indoor 2 outdoor with the outdoor covers. I live in Ohio and it's currently snowing and before freezing and they're holding up well. I've put 64gb SD cards in them so they record continously. These work just as good, if not better than the nest cams I have setup in my store. I will probably be selling my nest cams and replacing them with these.
title: Better than nest

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Thomas A
content: There were several functions not operating. Spoke with Amazon CS, transferred to Wyze, uploaded a Firmware update, and now it's working fairly well. So far, as long as I pay attention to my settings, it is better than my much more expensive "Home Monitoring System". This is a good setup at a VERY GOOD PRICE!
title: Need to get a firmware update!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mr. Luna
content: Overall, for the price, you get a decent camera with amazing features. The ability to speak through the camera system is fun although the audio is muffled and low quality. I have pets and have found that while it doesnt detect my pets constantly, it DOES detect my ceiling fan...nonstop. Night vision is limited but again, you get what you pay for. Otherwise, not a bad product if you just want to see how you like having a camera around, I suppose.
title: Decent camera that does exactly what it is meant to.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Warren
content: Rarely do i give 5 star reviews but this product may warrant it...for the price this camera does it all and quite easily.  Set up is not to bad but a person needs to click aroind the settings to make sure everyrhing is good to  go.  I have not had any experiences that are bad yet...great product for the amount they are charging!! Have fun with it..!
title: Great product for the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: mvwalkuski
content: This camera is amazing. I set it up in our barn to watch our animals and even going through a WiFi extender, the video quality is perfect. Love the ability to control the camera remotely and the motion detection is awesome. There are so many features, definitely worth the price and very comparable to the higher priced smart cameras. My only gripe is I wish there was an outdoor version because I would love to set these up outside my home as well.
title: Great camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Karen W.
content: This camera is all you need. I was blown away!!! We are using this easy to use/ install camera to watch our puppy, while away. Motion detector works great, picture is super sharp and the best feature is the microphone. The app is free and works great. I would recommend this camera to anyone with big expectations on a small budget!!!
title: Amazing product at an incredible price :)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sce Y. Pike
content: When it works it's great but we have both nest and wyze running, 3 cameras each, and unfortunately there are too many times when wyze cameras doesn't detect motion while the nest cams do. A person just walked up our driveway and nest caught it but wyze didn't. You get what you pay for and we're going to switch over the 3 cams to nest. We can't deal with the unreliable nature of these cameras for home security.  It's sad we invested so much in these with all the other accessories like sdcards, longer cables, covers, etc.
title: Wish it consistently worked

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kevin D Adams
content: I just opened and setup the unit to discover that basic viewing from a Windows 10 desktop is not built-in or supported.  Only works thru tablet/phone apps.  Had hoped to use for a door monitor in the corner of my screen, but that plan didn't work.  If you need Windows compatibility, this isn't the camera for you.  They are pretty up-front on their support community that this is NOT a feature they consider important enough to prioritize, and won't offer any kind of plan to support it.  My fault for not looking at supported OS in the specs.
title: Does not offer method to view from desktop.  Not on manufacturer priority list.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wildthing33
content: Excellent video quality, easy to set up and use. Only complaint is the night vision is really not that great. Seems like only a small area nearest the camera is illuminated and it has the issue of triggering an alarm ( user selectable ) if a small insect flys by in the adjustible sensing area. Apparently that would be a problem with any unit. Much more reliable and consistant than the optional contact sensors which are flaky.
title: Whos watching you

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bladerunner044
content: Overall this is a great camera for the price. Easy to set up rotate 360° great pictures great motion detection, BUT, I can't get it to work over cellular. This is a deal killer and I will be returning it. I have spent hours looking at forums and there are hundreds of people with the same issue. I don't understand how this camera is rated so highly with that major issue.
title: No Cellular!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Liz M.
content: For the price you cannot beat this product I turn it on when I leave the house it’s in as me notifications. Also it has a two way radio so I could talk to whoever is in the house as well as the night vision. It doesn’t work completely clear but for the price I’m not complaining. Tech-support is lacking but according to them they have a skeleton crew. I definitely recommend this product
title: Awesome start up home monitoring

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: EzyEric
content: This camera is so easy to set up. The picture quality is excellent. The panning works great. Pairs easily with my Echo Show 8. The price is also good.
title: Great camera, Great Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CMcCarty
content: Great value! I use this more like an intercom and as a backup to my Ring security cams on the outdoors, you can have it "peer around" the room and the sound is decent. The Wyze app to control it from my phone is a little prone to lags and crashing and is a little unreliable (on Samsung note 9 with high speed internet at home).
title: Device solid, app is sometimes glitchy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Matsuda
content: My wife and I bought two of these to replace our baby monitor which died recently. This is such a deal for the price. Most baby monitor systems are fairly expensive. I would recommend this alternative to anyone looking for a baby monitor. The only hesitation that I have is the connectivity with the Amazon Show. The camera will ALWAYS display on my phone, but only about 50% of the time on the Show. Alexa will attempt to connect but respond with "hmmm, the camera is not responding". I'll try again a few minutes later and it works just fine. Odd. Hopefully, this is ironed out in an update soon.
title: Solid Baby Camera Replacement

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Laura DeChristoforo
content: Great hardware and feature set for the price, but could never connect to them! I can’t tell you how much time I spent trying to make these cameras work because I really wanted them to! In the end I had to send them back since one of the basic functions (being able to connect to them when getting a motion alert) just failed every other time. I literally would connect, wait a minute, and try to reconnect and all the camera would say is reboot the camera. Even with smart plugs this isn’t a good option as sometimes rebooting did nothing either. I am shocked that these have such high reviews!
title: Should have known this was too good to be true!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Natalie
content: Absolutely love this cam! It was so easy to set up. I use it occasionally to make sure a nosey family members stays out of my room lol. I love that I can be anywhere and still log into the app and see my room. Also it has a motion alert and records 12 secs so you see what it found. Great night cam too. Caught a few interesting orbs.
title: Love

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Katie Evans
content: This camera is awesome for the price! I use it just about everyday to check on my wood stove and dogs from work. the app is well designed and easy to use, and the cameras pair with Alexa easily. The only issue I've had is that sometimes it will tell me that is has reached the end of it's swivel rotation when it hasn't, the best way to fix it seems to be to go the other way, all the way to the end, and then back again, a minor glitch, but considering the price point, I'm overall very impressed!
title: well worth the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Plynpool
content: At first I was not sure I was happy with this little camera. But after trying a few others. This little camera is a great camera. Everything works as written in the description. I guess that is why there is so many sold. Night vision is awesome. Motion detection works great as well. Good little camera.
title: Awesome little camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: GGar
content: Not the worst for the price. Camera rotates fully, the noise it makes draws attention to the device. Setup wasn't flawless, camera couldn't connect to internet despite having a good connection. After a few more tries it finally went through. Audio  cracks up and people on the receiving end of the camera have a hard time hearing the speaker. Also, app will not connect to airpods/bluetooth headphones when watching/talking through iPhone. Audio automatically switches to speaker, which is a bummer. Overall not horrible, but not great either.
title: Not bad for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: stonegatefarm
content: Love this little security cam. Works so well that I bought a second one. Pans the room if you want to see what’s going on. Notifies you quickly if there is motion detected. I have one in the entryway facing out the side light so no need for a Ring doorbell.  And one in the basement monitoring the patio door. Detects motion well through the glass.  And stores videos for up to two weeks, at no extra charge. Highly recommended.
title: Detects motion through glass.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ryan Sevigny
content: My one star only stays until they fix their product to do what it advertises.
