The camera quality and app works well but it doesn't actually connect to your phone over cellular networks which completely eliminates the point of having this camera. I can't see what my dog is doing when I'm away from home. However, when I'm home and can connect to the Wi-Fi I can see her from my phone and my couch... pretty useless. PLEASE update software to allow cellular network usage or post clear instructions on how to fix it because as it is, there is nothing that is easily accessible that helps.
title: Only worked over Wi-Fi

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Samuel
content: I can attach emails and show you pictures all day long. But don’t waist your time. Product is faulty and the company won’t help you. Just keep telling you to do diagnostics and give you the run around. I had even bout some for my grand parents. Now they don’t work. They don’t cater about your satisfaction or you. Just your money. Don’t waist your precious time or hard earned money. Order a traditional expensive camera set and dvr and do it that way. You won’t have trouble like I did with these.
title: Thought was the best then it turned out to be the worst

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: danny
content: Only worked for one year. Blue indicator light no longer comes on. Loses Wi-Fi connection constantly. When it does connect, video no longer real time and pan controls are out of control. Was powered on ups surge protector so I know it wasn’t zapped. Was good for a year at least but won’t buy again.
title: Lasted one year

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JPA
content: I have set the camera to  send motion and/or sound alerts, however if you are lucky to get the notification on your phone it takes more than an hour to receive it. Once you get the notification you are unable to see the video until some other 45 minutes.... I contacted wyze support and they took more than a week to tell me to reset the camera to factory settings, which by the way did not fix the issue. The next alternative they give is to conect my phone to a different network because they feel everything is OK with them.  Waste of time only. If you want the camera just to watch what your dog is doing it is OK, it does the work fine, but if you are looking to get some more functionality and reliable motion alerts, then look somewhere else.
title: Notifications not working, terrible service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amazoncustomersd
content: Great camera! I seriously cannot believe they price of it. It was recommended by a friend and when she told me the price I didn’t think much of this. When I got it and installed the app I was pleasantly surprised! The motion sensor is amazing, the video quality is great, and is incredibly easy to access. Would highly recommend for any dog owner!
title: Great camera even better price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: sharont
content: I had been given one of these to monitor my elderly mom. It was so effective I decided to get 2 more to expand the monitoring. She’s feeble and needs to be watched. I was able to locate these in new areas, name the area, and now have all rooms covered. It was all so simple. I love this product.
title: Great to connect more than one camera!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Fred Johnson
content: Like the easy setup and share options. Works great. Cons are that this camera has to be plugged in to a power source at all times. They should design a camera that is truly wireless.
title: When power goes out your camera also does not work!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Charrua
content: Dont recommend every time theres a firmware update, the camera reset and goes from one side to another and stop everywhere but not in the spot you have the cam at the beginning. The same thing happens when it loose power it pans from one side to the other loosimg the point of interest you have pointed. Buy a mi home security camera by xiaomi, much better software and cam than this.
title: Dont buy this cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: carolina scotti
content: The camera works great, however, I bought it to use as a nanny cam, therefore I am not completely satisfied. Since the APP doesnt work on the background, my phone or ipad has to be on all night (which demands a lot of battery, plus, the devices light never goes off), so you can't use it simultaniously as phone and camera. Also, I m not sure the sound system is very good. My toddler is 2 and quite a few times he has come to my room before I could even hear him through the app. Finally, the camera (or maybe the signal that goes to the app)  turns off for no reason whatsoever and won't search for signal again. Once my toddler came to my room and when I checked the camera app it had stop filming two hours before. If I had a smaller baby I would definitely need maybe a sound only baby monitor just to be safe.
title: Great vision, however not very steady camera-app signal

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Hesh
content: Very impressed with the results and simple to install. The controls on the app are intuitive. This camera is packed with many features like pan, tilt, two way communication, Night vision, HD recording, and MicroSD card storage.  I would recommend to anyone that is looking for a camera with many features yet comfortably priced.
title: Impressed!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: george j piazza
content: I bought two of these recently and on one hand i think what you get is a fair price for the product, but I wish i'd been aware of a few things.  First of all unless you use a micro SD card, it only records 12 seconds of each event.  That wouldn't really help at all in most burglaries or what not.  They may not even face the camera in that time.  Also they only guarantee data integrity if you use a 32gb or lower card, which is ridiculous.  Secondly, the night vision is terrible it cant see anything unless there is some light source in the room.  Live monitoring works great with a really good picture and the camera has a lot of options, but I may not have bought had i know about the issues I've stated above.
title: Fair Price for what you get

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anthony Gerads
content: We bought this to use in our house to keep an eye on the dogs while we are gone.  The pan feature is amazing, as well as the quality.  It has no problem connecting remotely to my phone, and has been great for its purpose. There is sometimes a second or two delay when I’m moving the camera, but it still gets the job done much better than I was expecting! I am extremely happy.
title: Amazing value for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Patty
content: Do not buy! I bought a few of these and I’m absolutely disappointed in them! I have one dying right now and what it does it constantly resets itself. You can open the camera on the app or view it. You can reset the camera because it won’t connect. It’s done. The others I have that have died, I’ve tried everything, they won’t eork. Complete waste of money! Extremely disappointed because I now how to spend more money on new cameras. Cheap is not always great!
title: Dies!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RLR
content: It was easy to set up and I'm not a tecky kind of person.  The person detection is great.  I had it on the pad setting for a while but was concerned that it might wear out the motor.  I added a 32 G micro card but not sure what it really gets me.  The pictures and tracking of a person were better than I expected.  Only had one false alarm, but could verify via my alarm system otherwise it appears to be doing all I would expect.
title: For the money it's great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Annabelle
content: I have several WYZE products and all of them consistently “misses” people. I can walk right up & wave not a motion or person notification/recording at all.
title: GARBAGE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: speeder
content: if RTSP is a big thing for you, don't choose this cam. it's NOT officially supported. they only provide you a very old firmware to support rtsp feature.  This firmware full of bugs and Wyze has no interest to update it since  they want to push you to subscribe their paid cloud service.
title: don't count on the RTSP function. meaningless

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nᴀʀᴅᴜsᴋɪ
content: Great camera, while it worked. Failed after 10 months. (Error 90). Tried all the recommended fixes, to no avail. Also unable to hard re-set. Seems shot.
title: Died!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jb Acosta
content: Love this cam, I had ordered one from a different brand thinking it had everything I wanted but man I was so wrong so I called my friend which he had showed me the one he has and guess what it was Wyze!!! so I ordered it and jackpot it was the quality I had seen on his and what I was expecting from the one I first ordered even with the good reviews so on that note be ware of fake reviews or compensated viewers!!!
title: Best camera you’ll ever want!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Melissa Guillory
content: This camera actually exceeded my expectations. It is very easy to set up but the instructions are hard to understand. You are supposed to scan the code on your phone screen with the wyze camera and as soon as you figure that part up, set up will take you about 5 minutes. I love being able to check on my little ones without having to walk in their room and making them feel as though they've done wrong. The picture quality is great and I'm just so happy with this purchase.
title: Easy to set up but instructions are hard to understand

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ili
content: This is a great product for a great price! The setup is very easy. You download the app and can control everything through your phone. Very clear pictures/videos and sound. Good for pets to talk to while at work. Motion is great but a little annoying with the sound. At times I shut the motion off Because it can get a little annoying but I turn it on while I’m not home. Definitely buy it you won’t be disappointed!
title: Highly Recommended for Apartment

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Monique K.
content: I use this camera to watch my dog when I'm not in front him (crate training 🙃). It's great! Real simple set up, notifications are nice and you can put them on a schedule. The only thing I wish the software would do is update the still camera frame daily/automatically. But it's a decent quality camera.
title: Doggy Cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Julie Z.
content: The Wyze cam is not great. Video is clear, but event recording is only 12 seconds with or without an sd card.  There are no settings to change it. There are no options for longer recording unless one uses continuous recording. Then have fun sitting through that. Worse than the 12 seconds is the 5 minutes in between event detection. Way too long!  Also, the pan feature is very loud. Needs improvement for sure.
title: 12 second view then 5 minute wait

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R. M. Smith
content: Still not working. I have 3 other cameras going week no issues. This one there's an error 90 every time. Hoping to figure it out and change review to 4 stars. So far the online help/support isn't working
title: Not working yet

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tanya B.
content: These are great little cameras and I would recommend them to anyone. However, I ordered two of them and one of them no longer works at all. I plug it in and there is nothing. Also, when I speak into my phone to talk to those in my house, they cannot understand what I am saying because it is all choppy.
title: Eh... not the greatest

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lori S.
content: This camera is amazing! The clarity is truly shocking! I didn’t expect it to be so clear for the price I paid. The quality and clarity would make you think you paid hundreds. It’s not pixilated at all. Crystal clear!!! The app is super easy also. Everything about this setup is as easy as it gets! No complicated install or anything. I highly recommend this to anyone! We bought this because we’re leaving our teen home alone for a few days and want to make sure no party goes on while we’re gone. I can now leave worry free because I can look in on her any time and pan around the entire room of every room. I love how it’s got sound as well and allows you to talk through the camera. Pretty neat feature.
title: This thing is worth much, much, much more than what I paid!!!!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: missbay
content: So easy to set up and the picture is really good. You can also adjust the noise and motion sensitivity for alerts. Works great at sending me a notification when my dog is home and starts barking.
title: Easy to set up & great noise alerts

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Priceville
content: I have I V2 and bought a pan as an upgrade so I can see more of an area. I do like that you can move the camera. My two biggest problems are that this camera does not send you notifications when there is sound or movement and the microphone quality doesn’t seem to be as good as the V2. My main reason for the camera is to have to notifications set to send me notifications after a certain time when any sound is heard or movement is seen, I have the sensitivity at 0 and still nothing. My V2 sends notifications no problem, but not the pan. Also when trying to speak through the pan no one can hear you and the few times they can it’s not very clear. So for my needs this camera just isn’t up to par.
title: Does not send you Notifications like the V2

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Momma M.
content: I am very happy with this product! I am from NY, my 90 yr. old mom spends the winter at our condo in Florida.  I am able to keep an eye on her and even speak to her through this camera. This is the 3rd camera I have purchased and although this camera cost much less than the others, the picture quality and customer service is by far the best! Can't wait until they come out with an outdoor pan and tilt camera!
title: Very Happy!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brendan Smith
content: My camera started acting strange, being able to freely move 360 degrees with no lock, as in, you could endlessly rotate it one direction. Eventually it has rotated so much, that the power cable inside has disconnected. Unfortunately I'm out of warranty. Something that stopped the gears failed outside of warranty. Figures.
title: Fail

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ACLANE
content: It captured my pets moving around just fine for about a week. Now, nothing.  I haven't' changed a thing (the camera, its location, the lighting, settings, nothing).  it is completely useless.
title: absolutely useless

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Derd Horvat
content: The decision making with these products was spot on! Used them for a week now and haven't ran into any issues. The software works well, no features that I miss, the image quality is more than sufficient, the build quality and design is good for the price. The fact they are wired is welcome since they can be much cheaper. It's hard to justify spending more once you've tried these. Not sure though how they would hold up as outdoor cams in cold climate. All in all a good buy!
title: Well designed product for a comfortable price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jo Ann ~ Customer
content: Amazing camera. Very simple to set up. Picture quality is beautiful. Very sensitive for motion and sound. App is great. I actually have 2 cameras... Both at different houses and can control both with the same app. My two complaints: the sound pics up the camera panning and the sound uses the phone setting instead of media.
title: Would definitely purchase more!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael Creager
content: I purchased this WYZE and a Yi at the same time. This is a nice little camera for the money and does exactly what it says it will do in the description. I am pleased with the quality and it was really easy to set up. Of the two cameras, I have to say I'm more pleased with the WYZE because the interface is a lot more intuitive. But both of them are nice cameras and I would recommend either one (or both).
title: Very impressive camera. Highly recommended!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cathy J Cross
content: Love this PanCam!  Just received it today, easy setup and of course I bought the 32GB sd card needed along with it.  Love being able to record directly to the card without monitoring fees, and I can keep the videos by removing the card and DL'ing to the computer! The HD quality is crisp!  Highly recommend.
title: NO MONTHLY MONITORING FEES!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: relm
content: This product was very easy to set up and use, especially for me!  I now feel comfortable knowing that there is a system that is watching over my place when I'm not around.  I can keep an eye out for my dog when I'm away and any sound or movement that is picked up.  I plan to purchase another one for outdoor usage.
title: Easy to use and great value for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Leah H
content: Buyer beware! I received the wrong power cord/adapter with my camera. I am unable to turn it on until I make an additional purchase for the correct one. According to the comments, this mishap happens VERY frequently! Make sure you have a back up USB to USB adapter at home before you purchase this to make sure you don't run into the same issue I did.
title: Beware! Wrong power cord

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sam
content: This camera is actually incredible! I have had no problems after unplugging and replugging it back in or after losing Wi-Fi. I bought this because I didn’t wanna use my iPhone as a security camera when my horses were acting funny. This thing blows away my iPhone! How can it be so inexpensive?? I’m picking up a hotspot from my iPad to run the camera. No complaints here.
title: Umm...Awesome!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JT
content: Replaced a $300-plus dollar Panasonic netcam that died after more than a decade. This item is every bit as good, better picture  - which isn't surprising given the improvements in technology, but given the price it's unexpected. Lacks the ability to rotate vertically, which the expensive camera could do.  But when you can buy a half dozen of these for the price of the Panasonic, what's there to complain about?
title: Amazing for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jon J Ceresa
content: Great camera, works great at night, we use them a chid monitors for the cribs. Love the recording and the picture is excellent, over the ease of install, mount outside with the additional covers. Only problem is you can only open one camera at a time on one device, so when monitoring twins you need two devices open all night. I wish the program Wally’s allow more devices open at the same time.
title: Great picture even at night

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Soccerref31
content: This is a great little camera that sets up in minutes and requires only a power source and an app download. Great for spying on kids home alone during online school, pets during extended errands, or security in general. We love how the camera can move and sound and two way speaker is great too!
title: Great little camera at a great price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kopernacus
content: The performance of the camera for the price is amazing to me. I’ve already ordered three more for my home. The visual aesthetic of the camera is lacking and somewhat resembles one to those wall mounted air fresheners from the 90’s. Another complaint is the mounting hardware that is provided with the camera is a little flimsy for my taste. The power cord seems to get in the way of mounting the camera as well but it worked out in the end. I love this camera and you can’t beat the price. To help with the appearance I purchased skins in several different finishes and colors to apply on the exterior. I also picked up better mounting hardware.
title: This camera rocks! But the finish is a little blahhhh

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: xiongeek
content: Worked fine for about 3 months. Then began saying “Off” in the app and would randomly disconnect from WiFi. I have 4 other Wyze Cam (non-Pan) and they work fine so it’s not my network or internet. Using Wyze support is pointless. Went through troubleshooting step after step to confirm it’s not my network. Reset the camera to defaults. All things I had tried. If one thing doesn’t work they just make you troubleshoot until you get annoyed and forget about it. Won’t buy another Wyze product ever again if support is this bad.
title: Good basic cameras, terrible support.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: mjzHouston, Texas
content: So far these are the BEST cameras I have purchased. I bought them to check on my dog while I'm away after my last camera fell and broke. To start with the setup was SUPER EASY and fast. The picture quality is great. Crystal clear. They pan very fast and give a broad view so I can pretty much see the entire room without even having to pan around. Great buy and I will probably purchase more in the future.
title: Excellent cameras!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ryan & nikki
content: I bought two of these cameras on the recommendation from a family member. One for a family member in Washington and one for myself. While I’m away my family in Washington can watch over my home. I in return can watch over their home while they are away. The night vision is very good as well.
title: Very good investment.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: K W
content: My husband is disabled and spends all his time in his sleep/recliner. This camera allows me to run errands and not be worried that he has gotten in trouble when he gets up and uses his walker. I am amazed at the clarity of the picture. It is an amazing camera for the price.
title: Is just what I was looking for

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Josh G.
content: I like this camera for the price. It doesn’t tell you but if you want more than just 12 seconds of play back time you have to pay for a subscription. Yea a dang subscription. The motion detection can be hit and miss some times but overall it’s a pretty good camera for the price. I was looking for a DIY camera/ security system and was pretty bummed they try to get a subscription out of you. I do like the picture quality and the fact that you can pop in on it at any time.
title: Pretty decent little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Broco Lee
content: Not a reliable camera solution,  after 3 days of use this is what I got and I was not able to reconnect back to it. It does sound like a dream at the first glimpse BUT You CAN'T count on it. Waste of time.
title: You CAN'T count on it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Willett
content: I have 2 of the regular wyze and this one.  Honestly the panning feature is nice but the cameras have some bugs in the firmware to be worked out.  Motion/area tagging resets randomly, some other features have reset randomly etc.  I have zero issues with my regular fixed wyze cameras so I am somewhat wishing I would not have purchased this one.
title: Decent camera but i like their fixed cameras better

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Duza
content: I have been using Wyze products for a while now, great price for all you get. The product is durable, I use my cameras outside and all 4 work great. I like the options, like for carbon detection for inside the house camera I have on. The people detection option for my outside cameras. Set up is easy, app is easy, and use of cameras is easy.
title: Great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Crissy
content: I like being able to make sure my pets are fine while I’m at work that was the purpose of buying this. I wish the night vision was clearer quality and I also noticed the live video is delayed. It does a good job at notifying me though and I like the ability to adjust your settings however you’d like depending on your schedule and what things you’d like to be notified on. It’s also a plus being able to move the camera around your home from your phone!
title: It works

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Agent Smashing
content: Exactly the same as their other smaller camera so I won't go over the functionality again (see my other review for that), but the addition of patroling and panning to follow motion is nice. It doesn't always follow the motion perfectly but this is a 30 dollar camera. It works great, my only issue is it doesnt seem as sensitive to motion as my other Wyze camera despite being on the same sensitivity level. Overall it's a great product, and I can't believe how low the price is.
title: Security for cheap

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: myml97
content: These little cameras are great! They rotate and pan and take decent photos at night. Be advised that when placed on the inside of a window looking out, the image it captures is limited sue to the lights glaring on the glass. No big deal since they are meant more for the interior of the space monitoring. All in all, worth the price!
title: Great cameras!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Edward B. Mcgowan
content: For the most part it is a good product. It does what you need it to do, detects motion good, detects sound good. The only problem I have with it is the sound. I can hear what is said in the room just fine on my phone, it is trying to talk from my phone so I can be heard in the room I have a camera in. My wife can't hear me and I have to yell into my phone to be heard at all. My daughter got one on my recommendation but she got the one without panning. Her sound is fine.  Maybe I should have got that one but all in all I am happy with it.
title: Good for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Surav
content: Love everything about this camera so far. Set was very easy, and so was using the app. Quality of the video and pictures are sharp, along with the product materials itself. EDIT: Camera worked great for a year, then suddenly I have a solid yellow light that will not go away and I can't reset it. They asked me to flash in a new firmware, which I tried and the camera still wouldn't work. Absolutely disappointed.
title: Disappointed.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: helen man
content: Great cam. I use it as a nanny cam. Excellent sound and picture quality. I can now see my daughter anywhere and anytime through my cell phone. I love the fact that I can tilt the camera in different direction through my phone. I love it so much that I bought 3. I have a different baby cam that is very expensive but nowhere as good as this camera. Wish I have bought this from the start.
title: Great camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: annazon
content: This cam is the BEST! We use it to check in on our dogs (one of which has separation anxiety). It gave us so much peace of mind! The camera is so easy to setup and the picture quality is awesome. Love that you can have a 360 view. I keep telling people it's the best $40 we've ever spent. THE PRICE IS AMAZING. I definitely recommend!!!
title: THE BEST

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DeeAnn Harrington
content: Great camera that I use in my whelping room to watch puppies.  Great picture.  I like the app.  The sound isn't the best.  It breaks up and is delayed.  The price is awesome!  Nice range of panning.  I've been running it for nearly 2 months with no problems at all with the camera or the app.
title: Love this

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Khef
content: My dog had 10 puppies. I was able to share the app with my daughter so they could be watched even when not home. Perfect sound, picture, and love that it pans!! I'm sure it would be a great baby cam too! It records, takes pictures, has sound, and you can talk to the dog!
title: Outstanding Camera to view Puppies

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gloria Wilson
content: WXYE just will not connect. And I have tried everything! I was told any 3rd grader could do it. Not so. My 20 year old little friend couldn't, so I called Specter!  and he couldn't do it. The technician I called downtown cancelled because of the coronavirus. So I guess I have to send it back!
title: Doesn't work for me!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cindy&Kay
content: This is a wise investment..for the price I thought this was a joke..the first time I ordered this camera it took a month. I bought another one for a gift and got it in 2 days..the quality will blow your mind..and you can check on your phone anytime..
title: It is to good

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Steve-o
content: this works better than I had imagined it would - all features work well/as advertised and the night vision is very clear.  We use it as a baby monitor and it picks up motion and sends us a notification when our little one rolls out of bed and comes to find us in the middle of the night... which is actually really handy.
title: pleasant surprise!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R&I
content: I love this security camera. It was so easy to setup it was just plug it in and download the app. It really has a clear video. A plus is that you can also hear sound and talk through the app to the security cam. I use it in my kiddos rooms upstairs, I think we use it more to communicate with them so that we don't have to go upstairs lol. Great buy for the price I am purchasing more wyze cameras additional rooms in our home
title: Quick Easy Setup -- Great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dan G
content: I purchased 3 of these to place in different areas of my home. One of them works beautifully. The other 2 worked well for 2 weeks but then started freezing/constant rebooting and generally not working. I tried every fix suggested and even tried moving them to rooms closer to the router. I am returning two of them. I like the product a lot but to have two bad units out of the three ordered is a lot. I will try to purchase again in the future when hopefully these bugs get worked out. I may purchase their cheaper Wyze cam and test that.
title: 2 of 3 cams failed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Burke
content: A lot of the wireless cameras at this price point don't pan or tilt and the picture quality is very good. The zoom on the camera is digital, meaning the camera doesn't zoom in the device your viewing the video on zooms in on the video. The night vision and two-way audio work well, and having the option to add data storage to record is nice.
title: Excellent Wireless Camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Emily in Boulder
content: I can definitely understand not wanting to pay $200 for a Nest Cam, but, you get what you pay for. I was not impressed with the Wyze cam. I found the side to side motion loud and distracting, and the accompanying app wasn't intuitive. I have 4 Nest cams and the Wyze cam sits unused.
title: Side to side rotation is loud and irritating

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Darcy
content: I cannot say enough good things about this camera.  I did not want to pay a ton of money. This camera works amazing considering the price. We have had this camera for a year and I have reccomended it to multiple people. I placed it in my windowsill facing out and it picks up people in my yard, cars driving by and anyone who comes to the door. Going to purchase more for other parts of the house. Great camera.
title: Just what I needed!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Benjamin D.
content: Idunno what the issue is but the quality on all my cameras are awful.  Ok i know what the issue is, its these cameras.  They really arent useful for much except motion detection and alerts.  If you're trying to make out a face or a license plate... or a make and model of a car, good luck.
title: 1080P? More like 300p....

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Phil S.
content: I have only had my wyzecam for a day, but I am blown away by the features and price - we will see how it holds up. I am using it to monitor a stored RV, and the feature of listening for the sound of a smoke or CO detector is fantastic. That plus motion alerts, and I can't really ask for more! I will follow up after I have had it for a few months. Oh, and I just ordered one of the cube cams - I have no idea what I need it for, but I couldn't pass it up!
title: Exceptionally pleased! (so far)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Valerie
content: The Wyze cam didn't recognize the SD card (Cam didn't ding when card was inserted & wouldn't play back videos).  Michael F. @ Customer support sent me a new card and it works great now!  I love this camera.  Pic/vid quality is outstanding and I tell my google mini to turn it off and on. :)
title: Love this camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jennifer
content: This camera is easy to set up and easy to control on the app. I recommend not using this outdoors at all. Even with the cases that are made for them to go outside, mine was damaged by a heavy rain storm although the case was on it and it was in a carport. I have multiple wyze cameras inside my home and am very happy with them.
title: Loved it so much that I bought more.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tumbao
content: I have five other wyze cams and they really are amazing. This is my first pan tilt version. For some reason it was the hardest to connect but now that it is, it works great.  I put it in a bigger space where it would be helpful to be able to look around.  Even if it cost much more I would still review it excellent in every way. No downside whatsoever!!
title: As advertised and better!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Turtle
content: I have three other Wyze cameras, I decided to get this version because I wanted to be able to pan around the room to check on my dogs. With normal lighting this is a good camera but the night vision on this compared to the cheaper wyze cam is horrendous. Seriously I went through all my cameras to make sure something else wasn’t going on, no it just that this camera is not good for checking on things at night. I will be sending it back to buy the other one. Also very noisy when panning, I really wish the motor was silent.
title: Night Vision is HORRIBLE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: E. Yanez
content: Motion detection stopped working properly after six months. At first it used to follow sound and turn toward people moving but not anymore. Also it keeps recording non existent movement every five minutes. Adjusting the sensitivity did not work and updating firmware neither.
title: Disappointing Product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R!ch
content: This camera surprised me.. its jam packed with features you would never expect in a nanny cam.  I bought the Wyze pan cam to keep an eye on my grandma(and her home aid)  which lives across town.  Along with me being able to easily see 20 feet in the dark, motion tracking and alerts when she moves off of the bed and two-way audio.. the app allows you to share the camera feed with family members from anywhere is the world. All this packed with a price that will my you smile.  I did not mention half the features this camera has so please do your research. I would have given this device 5 stars, but I did not get it free..
title: Features you didn't know you needed..

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dan Wheeler
content: Super easy to set up. Install app, hold QR code up to camera and pretty much done. Picture quality is pretty good, not amazing. The app works well, the PTZ is pretty quick. Unless I'm missing something, there's no actual zoom, just pinch with two fingers and enlarge the image like an iPhone which is fine. There's not a lot of range with the up/down. You won't get floor to ceiling up close. Looks like there's a left/right flip but not an up/down. Not sure you can hang this thing upside-down.
title: Up and Running 2 minutes out of the box

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: dk4808
content: After set up and tested, I decided to put it at a location about under the patio cover about 8 ft off the ground.  It dropped to the concrete floor and bounced into a puddle of rain water.  After cleaned up and examined, I found a couple nicks at the corners, and the casing was opened at the back but I was able to snapped it back in place.  Powered it up and it worked.  All the picture quality, functions are as good.  Amazing。
title: It passed the drop test (unintended) !!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Thomas C. Warren
content: I bought this product because I could check it online for free.  Now they want to charge me $2 per month. I'm not sure this is legal. I have followed their instructions to get it turned on but the web site does not off any such choice. I wouldn't recommend this product.
title: WARNING

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Maddy Rozick
content: The quality of picture and video is good but the audio is terrible. I got this to watch my puppy while I'm at work. One thing that calms him down a lot is just my voice. My friend had let me borrow her "ring" camera until my WYZE got here and my dog would stop whining when he heard my voice through the "ring". When I used my WYZE it was hit or miss if my voice would go through the camera and he would be whining his head off. I had even tested it out and there is a ton of static and delay when I spoke, it was inaudible. I tried carrying a convo with a friend through it and it was impossible. Really disappointed and will have to get a different camera.
title: Terrible Audio

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Viking
content: This camera is awesome for the money!  Compared to more expensive cameras, this one holds it's own.  The wide angle lense is great and controlling the camera couldn't be simpler.  Too many features to list.  Other than requiring power (no battery option), this is the camera to have.
title: great camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dan Bell
content: My younger brother introduced me to this camera, having bought one himself.  I can't believe just how excellent this camera is.  Especially when a person is on a very tight budget!  I would recommend this product to anyone that has wanted a security camera but couldn't afford one.  Setup with the app takes some patience but well worth the effort!  I am considering the purchase of another one soon.
title: Security Camera BEST money can buy on a budget!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: William H. Stoneman
content: EASY setup....great color and the motion sensor is a really important feature.  I would highly recommend this cam....such a breeze to set up...less than five minutes.  Now I need to buy another one.  My only issue is that it only comes in white.  I would like a black unit for better concealability.
title: What a great cam!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Karen smith
content: Don’t waste your money! I thought this pan version would be nice to have. Nope it’s in the hallway by my side door that everyone uses and it doesn’t pick up a thing. I get alerts for a pair of shoes sitting still. Wyze sent me a new camera and it’s just the same. It’s in our kitchen and doesn’t get anything. Alerts me for the tablecloth, it’s facing our door that you come in, doesn’t squeal on my kids for sure lol. Never recognizes when they come in at night.
title: Waste of money! Try a different brand

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Faith
content: Absolutely marvelous! Instead of buying a crazy expensive Furbo try this first. I use it to check in on and talk to my doggie throughout the day and it is perfect! The app is great, you can turn it on and off. For those who are a little wary of ‘spying’, this has a full rotate so you can turn it completely away from traffic areas when you don’t need it!
title: Can’t throw a treat but way better than a Furbo!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Logan
content: Purchased this camera to keep an eye on our 3 month old King Charles puppy and ended up loving the product and wanting more. The quality and functionality you get with Wyze products is truly impressive, especially for the cost! The addition of rules has been awesome. Camera automatically turns off when were home, turns back on when we leave, notifications are sent to our phones only when we want them. I could go on and on. The picture quality, zoom and night vision are great.
title: Better quality than Ring at a much better price!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sean C
content: I switched from belkin to this one, and comparing with previous belin netcam, this one has a moving lens which can be remote controlled at wide angle. But the night vision I can barely see much in a dark room although it has got IR light built in. I gain something and lose something.
title: Great cam, but not the best in night vision function

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kyashi
content: It's fine for a temporary baby cam but the sound doesn't always work. It's very frustrating not hearing your baby cry because the sound wasn't working. Quality of video and photos are just okay. I like the app feature and that it can save photos and videos directly to your phone. But a huge con is that in order to event record the screen must be on the whole time.
title: Just ok. Pros and cons

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KamKant
content: The camera is really really good. Mind blowing for the price tag. Really good quality video. I haven’t tried the recording function yet but it’s connectiv from any place is great and Pan and move feature is nice. It does make some sound while Pan movements but nothing that bothers me. I have Amazon camera and QArlo cameras as well which now i felt are way too expensive.... however they have cloud storage options.
title: Quality camera at such low price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Southern Brother in a big city
content: The motion detection is very sensitive. Wyze I gotta say they have really improved on the software. The camera quality is ok.. "It is good enough."I have a geeni camera as well. I feel the geeni camera quality is a tad sharper then wyze... The camera rotation/track and now with the additional add on "remote door sensor/motion-sensor"  are great. So i cant really knock it.. Technically it should be a 4 star..
title: not bad the door sensor add on is a plus

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Madison Louthan
content: I originally purchased a Motorola cam, and hated it. So I sent it back and got this camera for my sons room. Photo quality is great, zoom feature is great, sound/Motion detection feature is great. The only downfall is there is a radio frequency feedback on my phone. It scared me at first, but after researching, I am certain that it’s just catching radio frequencies around us. We have the camera fully secured with a good password. That is why I only rated it 4 stars, otherwise, this is a 5 star product. Another feature I love is that it is Alexa enabled!
title: Great baby monitor/ Security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dawn Marie
content: Love the updated model with the pan and Alexa Connectivity.  Clear view, with night vision and nice sound. It was easy hook up. Liked the first one so much I ordered another one. This little camera has some sweet features such as motion and tagging with event recording and detection zone.  There’s a lot with this little guy. I’d like to see them expand their product line. They produce quality and I am very pleased with this product.
title: Nice camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: amy k
content: Love this little guy, i have meant to buy a home camera for YEARS to keep an eye on my beloved parrot during the day while i am at work, but most commercial options seemed to pricy for years, or consistently mixed reviews. This popped up on my homepage the other day, and two clicks of my prime button away and i jumped! This item is great. its not by any means professional or fancy, but it really works and does the trick. I've got it angled towards the cage and can rotate, zoom in, and even talk to my little buddy and we both love it after less than a week! Particularly if you're thinking of this for keeping up with your pets - highly recommended.
title: amazing pet cam!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Anderson
content: We've now purchased several products from Wyze.  They all appear to be of high quality, they work as advertised with very high quality pictures/video and are great value for the money.  The products work, the technology is of very high quality and the price is right!
title: Incredible picture quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: davidwelty
content: I purchased 3 units of the Cam Pan product. The setup was easy and went great. The issue was a re-occuring and random high pitch static noise which started happening on ALL 3 units.  The units were connected and fine.  I changed a few settings, changed my Wifi config, and other things to try and fix it.  Nothing worked.  The noise woke us up at 1am whichH is not good. I chatted with a very nice person at Wyze support. He suggested things I already tried. Nothing worked.  I asked to get an RMA and printing label to return the unit.  They said yes, but after inquiring multiple times to get the return information, they have not sent it.
title: Terrible product - GIVES OF HIGH PITCH NOISE at Random times and in the middle of the night

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dad69
content: I give it a 3 because I wish these cameras would be designed to work without a internet connection. I would like to still have the ability for the camera to record and save video if the internet service is down. If I leave home and my internet goes out the camera is worthless. A good burglar just needs to cut the internet line to disable them. Redesign the app please!
title: Needs to cut the internet cord

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chris Horry
content: I was skeptical of a $40 camera, but I've been blown away by the quality of both the picture and the software.  Set up was easy and intuitive and easy to link to my Echo as well.  The only complaint I have is the two way sounds which just doesn't work very well, but this is a minor quibble.  Hopefully a future hardware refresh will give me 5Ghz support too. Will definitely be buying a few more of these.
title: Great quality at a cheap price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Enzo
content: HD Picture quality is good with in about 15 feet, beyond that, quality falls off. Excellent unit for the price. Easy to set up, works well, integrates with Alexa. Much easier to set up than Amcrest IP camera that I purchased three years ago, however picture quality on Amcrest was much better. I would recommend this product.
title: Easy setup

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Judy Shimel
content: We would not be with out our wyze cameras. Our house alarm went off. Because we where able to use all of our camera to view the property and house. Even watched the police show up an clear our place.  We did not have to drive 2 hours  to check our place  We own 3 total different cameras.
title: Great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Greg B.
content: Have 3 of them around the house. We're gone 6 months of the year and these cams let me know if anything is wrong. What more could you ask for? Pic is "picture perfect"! One quit working on us; I called support and immediately they sent out a new one. Gotta love that!
title: Love this beast!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jill Fisher
content: It was so easy to set up and use.  The picture is very clear and we can take amazing pictures using this camera.  I was very impressed and i use the camera everday.  When i'm not home i feel comfortable knowing that i can see what is happening in my apartment.  I can see and hear everything and see clear pictures.  I would recommend this product, i can move the camera and turn it around to see different angles.
title: Recommend Wyze Cam Pan

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jennifer Ross
content: This camera is great!  It was easy to set up, easy to connect to my phone and everything I need in a many cam.  I’m able to pan and see the entire room, hear the audio and talk to my baby if I want to.  Amazing buy, would buy again.
title: Great buy, works well.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J
content: Got ours yesterday and it works great. Setup was easy. Only hard part was trying to figure out how to mount it on our window so it stays inside. Other than that, we love it. Planning to get more for the rest of the house. We live in a ghetto neighborhood near a homeless shelter and stupid loud teenagers around who steal mail so we figured to try this brand out. Now I get why other people rave about it. I am definitely sold. Only other problem I have is the notifications. The first day, we constantly got a notification every time someone walked by or was near the door/porch. Today, it wasn’t working. Hopefully, that gets fixed soon but other than that, we love it.
title: Great security cam for how inexpensive it is

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Elizabeth
content: Ok so it worked great at first but now it has been less then 2 months and all’s it does is turn in circles flashing yellow and blue. I have many of them and this is the only one that does it.
title: Unsure

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Justin Myers
content: I have purchased Arlo cameras in the past for $800+ for a 4-pack, this $30 camera is 100,000,000,000x better than that. I’m a firm believer in you get what you pay for, but these are SO MUCH for so little money. Great motion and sound detection, great picture. I love being able to pan around the room, and you can speak through them!
title: Incredible value! Will buy more.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SANTOSH T.
content: I had the Camera setup very quickly and App is really Good with some cool features like Zone for Motion detection and controlling the pan. very easy to setup and very friendly Prompts. I see that it detects Movements of trees and  items that are far away than people moving near. Set up the camera  for certain Zone for Motion detection and Sound. It has good sensitivity for Vehicles and Trees Moving far in the Zone but People movement there are lot of Missed triggers even when this happen in the zone and near to camera. i have configured for Motion Tracking and Motion.
title: person Detection and Sensitivity

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Roland M Samples
content: Let me say for the money this device is very, very good quality & so, so easy to set-up. Use it to monitor my 90 year old father remotely both parties completely satisfied.
title: Eyes on Quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: holli2400
content: Still under warranty and died 6 months after purchase. Tech support was fantastic. They guided me in reloading software to see if that would help. They ended up sending me a replacement. They were very attentive and resolved the issue quickly.
title: product died but great tech support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Melanie
content: I bought two of these when I moved into my new house to keep an eye on my dog. I discovered he was not settling in well. The camera showed him howling all day long. The picture and  sound were very clear. I get alerts on my phone when I have it set to track motion and/or sound. So after some training and getting used to thr new place, we are now happily settled into our new home! I check in every day to see how he does. It has a nice panoramic view of the room. You can zoom and pan from the app as well. These are great cameras and I love that I am able to keep an eye on my pup while I'm at work!
title: Highly recommend! Great camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: angeljesso
content: Got this to keep an eye on my older dog. He actually doesn't seem to like when I talk to him, but the feature works pretty well. There's a bit of a delay when checking the previous footage but I have it recorded constantly so it's been Bert handy if I need to review. Has a great range with the viewing angle and has features I haven't even used yet. I think I want to get another and set up a house set.
title: Perfect pet cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: thomas ackerley
content: So I hope my friend install one in every room of the house to keep an eye on the babysitter when she is watching her son they all installed pretty easy so I decided to get one for my own living room good product for the price the app is easy to set up definitely would recommend
title: Definitely worth the purchase

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ferdi
content: Highly recommended and Great product. Quick shipping (6 hrs arrived after order is placed), easy to install  and great customer service (replacement was ordered/shipped the same day and arrived after 2 hrs...WOW).  Will definitely purchase more for home use and great gifts ideaa.
title: Highly recommended and great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jerry Gao
content: Got the cam one and a half month ago and it doesn't working properly today. I can't move the cam up and down through the app. It kept saying "You have reached the end".  Although it is good in all these functionalities, but it is not acceptable that the product quality is so poor. Updated: Received the replaced one and works fine. Glad they have fantastic customer service
title: Nice customer service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marcus Richardson
content: I have purchased four of the wyze cameras and am completely satisfied. I have recommended these cameras to several people. You simply can't beat these cameras for the price and quality. I will say this  though, the talking feature on the PTZ camera is better than on the regular wyze camera. I have two and two.
title: Perfect for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mongo
content: I had no trouble getting the Wyze Pant & Tilt to work  the cameras performance is amazing, and I was thrilled by the terrific ability to set the pan & tile during scan.  Unfortunately the device became very unreliable and wouldn't stay powered up.  I determined that the MicroUSB power socket in the base was loose and dropping the connection.  I'm returning it.
title: Great deal and amazing features but mine was unreliable.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Salena Lettera
content: It's a cool camera, but I wouldn't rely on it.  I bought 2 and one of them died about 4 days after I started using it.  And since I bought them before going on an extended leave from my home, by the time I got back, the return window with Amazon had closed.  But the bright side is that they were so inexpensive that it wasn't that big of a deal.  The cameras do exactly what they say.  The microphone doesn't work very well. The picture is clear.
title: It's a $30 camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ever V.
content: dont spend your money on those overpriced door bell cams with all the gimmicks. Buy wyze cam, this thing can pan and be mounted anywhere indoors or out doors with a mount/ cover and a few screws! the app is also very nice and easy to use. Ive gotten 3 firmware updates since ive had this just over 6 months
title: love it!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: N. Rauch
content: We have had this for over a year now, and the camera is doing great.  The picture quality is amazing and the motion detection is spot on.  The Wyze software works with IFTTT so I can have triggers do other things like turn on lights.  The App for the phone is very intuitive. If I was going to say anything negative is that the camera reboots once in a while, which is no real issue, but the camera doesn't go back to the position I had it.  So I have to reposition the angle.  I also wished that I could adjust the record time for motion, as well as the pause between recordings. Otherwise it's great!  I have even purchased an addon for door and motion sensors that tie into the system.
title: Going strong

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: K F
content: Great camera and easy to setup. Wyze is a great company to deal with. I would definitely recommend this to my friends. Only odd thing is when it resets randomly and pans back and forth. Makes you feel like they are taking inventory of what’s going on lol. Oh and buy a SD card with it, it’s worth getting them together to get the most out of your camera.
title: Great camera, great price, free iCloud storage. What’s not to like

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Elle
content: Had bought a couple inexpensive cameras that were super glitchy,so this one is amazing. Sound isn't super clear in a large room, so can't really decipher some of the speech when people are talking. Only about a second delay is working for us as a baby monitor so we can go outside with our dogs after bedtime.
title: Seamless

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: bobj90
content: Never got these to connect. There is a know issue with these cameras and Windows 10. Return them the next day after trying to get them to connect. Do not waste your time or money.
title: They never connected to Windows 10. NOT recommended.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: c Mac
content: Great price and product. Does exactly what the product is meant to do. Captures images and if you download the app you will get notifications when there is movement in front of the camera. Down side ... it reacts to light changes. For example in the morning in my living room where my camera is ... when the sun comes up.. I get motion detection notifications on my phone.
title: Great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AMG
content: This camera is awesome!!!  If ur having trouble connecting to WiFi do not use 5g!!! That’s why it’s having trouble! Other than that the camera quality is great as well as the speak into option is great I was able to control my amazon echo and wasn’t even home!!!
title: Uses 2g network! GREAT BUY

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Raymond G. Winkowski
content: What a great camera for the price. Scan large area, zooms in, listening picks up hearable sound from 35' and you can speak.  I replaced Ring cameras with Wyze cameras around the exterior of our house and now inside our house and at a LOT less I think Wyze is the better choice.
title: Wyze cameras indoors and outdoors for total security

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Allison
content: I purchased two OTHER security cameras previously from a different manufacturer, and had to return them because the app was SO horrible.  THIS ONE . . . so easy.  I set it up while I was in my house, and I did not have to repeat ANY steps (unlike the other manufacturer's camera).  Set up.  Done.  THEN, I walked through my backyard and into a garage/office area where my dog sleeps during the day, and plugged it in there.  It reconnected, and now I'm back in my house watching my dog nap in her office.  That is a BIG "ask" to walk into a separate structure in my backyard and expect the camera to stay connected.  Very excited about this camera.
title: Connects to my house WIFI from my DETACHED garage/office.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dark Raven
content: Only giving it 4 stars, still trying to figure it out.  Sometimes it will say I don't have a card in it, when I do.  Sometimes it doesn't connect.  Picture is good, very good at motion detection.  Sound is also good.  I do wish there was a way to discard multiple events instead of having to click through each one and delete.
title: A little quirky

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: cjabass123
content: I have not even used it yet because the usb/micro usb cord supplied is incorrect. The camera AND the supplied charger both use a full size usb connection, but the supplied cord has usb on one end and a micro usb on the other. I purchased three of these and all are inoperable due to the incorrect charger/usb cords as supplied. Very poor quality control. If others got the correct power cord, consider yourselves lucky.
title: Incorrect/useless power cord included

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Matt Uebel
content: I've recently gotten started with the smart home devices. I do own a Nest Thermostat, as well as the smart doorbell, and was considering additional cameras... but slowed my roll considering the massive cost of getting a few around the home. At potentially $300 a piece, that was an expensive prospect. Thankfully, my research led to the Wyze cameras. It was cheap enough to start off with one and see how it worked, and I was very pleasantly surprised. I ended up getting a few more, as well as SD cards for each, and I was still paying less than for one high end Nest cam. The associated Wyze software has worked out well, and I haven't had any signifiant hardware issues so far. These cameras lack facial recognition, and maybe that is worth the cost to you, but all-in-all I've been very happy with this product.
title: A Welcome Challenger to Nest

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: dshouse4
content: I really did want to love this camera; however, between the semi-functioning night vision and in-and-out sound I'm about to throw it out the window! I mean I don't want a lot of bells and whistles, just a basic functioning camera. If the night vision and sound would consistently work I would give this camera five stars hands down. The picture is wonderful along with many other things, but I would really love to hear what is happening on the screen and see my baby in the dark! Sorry Wyze, but please wise up on the basics!!!
title: I really want to love this camera....

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Parictis
content: Everything went great until I tried to find the Wyze app for my PC. There is none. I have to run the phone software through an android emulator on my browser on my pc and I have to use Google Chrome to do so. Lol, no thanks. Shame to have linked good hardware to such bad software. I’ll just give this thing to my mother and buy another brand that’s a better fit.
title: No PC Software.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ann
content: Great pan cam. Great picture & quality...except now they're making you pay for person detection.....when all others before Oct 2019 don't have to! Forget that. I'll find another security camera! NOT HAPPY AT ALL W THAT ASPECT OF THIS CAMERA.
title: Great Camera..Sad you now have to pay for person detection!😡

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BigDaddy
content: Had this camera for only 5 days. So far so good. Love the pan and 2 way talk. Decent quality. Ita a bit sensitive on the motion sensors and tracking.
