I wish you had the ability to adjust the recording longer longer than 12 seconds. And the option for a battery operated camera. Will purchase more. It's a great product.
title: Best bang for the buck.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rarewein
content: Controls are easy enough to understand but very difficult to get the camera to do what you want to do. Mine is having an issue right now where it will not read SD cards. I have tried reaching out and was told to simply try a different SD card. 3 SD cards later same issue.
title: Stay with their standard cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Paul Martinez-Bey
content: Good camera but I'm only giving 3 stars because the sound isn't loud enough. Also, the sound don't always work. There were several nights that my baby was crying and the sound wasn't working. Would not recommend if you're needing a camera with good sound quality.
title: Poor sound. Good pic quality.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: B. Shaw
content: Very happy with this purchase, It moves smoothly it takes good pics, and it is very easy to set up. I would confidently recommend this camera for in the house. The one thing that I would like others to be aware of is that it randomly will make movements and you will hear the camera tilting and zooming in and out randomly. It isn't loud but, if the room is kind of quiet you will hear it.
title: It is all good

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mackenzie Ockler
content: I have this camera in my bedroom to check in on my puppy when I’m not home. So far this has been a great product with lots of common sense features. The one piece of advise I would give to someone purchasing this particular camera, is that the “motion sensing” feature allows the camera to pan and track any motion it detects. When I turned this setting on I didn’t know that the camera would move to follow movements, so when I walked into my room for the first time after turning it on and my camera turned to look me directly in the eye, I had a mild freak out especially after watching a documentary about home cameras being hacked (this camera has a duel authorization factor which helps to protect against this). Otherwise this camera has been great!
title: Great product. Read setting descriptions

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: br2012
content: When I got the first camera the auto sensor didn’t work.  Tried to contact size but they were way behind and it took over a month for them to get back to me but amazon replaced it within days and the new one works perfectly.  I 3d printed a shelf for it to sit in the corner of the playroom, it tracks all their movements and records everything.  I love that I can connect with my Alexa video products and always see what’s going on.
title: Works with Alexa!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ken Sage
content: I purchased this because my neighbors were complaining that my puppy was barking non-stop and I wanted to see what was causing this behavior. Setup was a breeze and the quality is fantastic. My favorite feature though has to be the sound alerts. This has been super helpful because when there is a noise in my apartment I can pull up the app and see what's going on. It's also nice that it records events in the cloud and give saves them for you to review in case you can't do so in the moment. I will be buying more of these to setup around my apartment to get a complete picture of what is going on.
title: Great Bang for your buck

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ali W.
content: This is easily the best thing I’ve ever spent money on! Setup took 5 mins, maybe less. Notifications are brilliant. The 2 way communication works, although being closer to the camera definitely aids hearing. Night vision is a cool feature I didn’t even know it had. The motion detection is very sensitive, which I love. In very bright rooms like the living room, the excess light can decrease picture quality. But that’s not a major deterrent because it’s not super noticeable. Best camera, especially for the price.
title: Best camera, especially for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: koekirie
content: Initially could not connect to network and after seeing some reviews about having to turn off 5Hz and on 2.5Hz and all I was a little frustrated... sent an email inquiry for customer support and they got back to me right away!  Actually sent me a follow up email to see if their advice worked even.  I followed the instruction and just turned my phone off and back on before connecting and worked excellent!  Can't believe the footage for this cheap price, I am getting 2 more!
title: Works awesome, great customer support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PAL
content: Love Wyze cams.  The pan cam is easy to control.  The only thing I have an issue with is that the recorded video clips are limited to 12 seconds each.  I think you can set it to continuously record, though, so you'd need to install a large SD card.  I'm not really sure how it works with the cloud.  Wyze has great customer service.
title: Very easy to setup and use, unbeatable price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MrRipkin
content: Fairly easy setup. I followed a tutorial on YouTube. It didn't connect at first but did on the next try. Video and picture quality are good. Easy to operate using the Wyze app on your cellphone. A few different modes that work well. This is well made and very affordable. I would def recommend it.
title: You cannot beat the price and quality of this camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cap Steve Cody II
content: Bought it as a baby camera and it works great  for video However the audio is worthless.  You can’t hear the baby who is only feet away and no one in the room can hear if you talk thru the camera.  However the night vision on the camera makes up for lack of audio.
title: Great baby cam if you don’t need audio monitoring

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ali
content: I bought this to watch my dog while I’m out of the house and I really like it. I’m not sure how well it would work as a security measure but I like that I can pan/zoom to see what’s going on in my house. It has a fairly wide range too. I’ll be ordering a few more in the near future.
title: Good budget camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christopher Moses
content: I like that the cameras I’ve purchased has a nice user interface and the ability for playback.  The alert option can get a bit overwhelming for any motion in the house with pets such as dogs or cats, but overall I like the wyze camera system.  The only dislike I would have is that there isn’t a cloud to view from.  If the camera is stolen then the video playback ability would be stolen as well.  I also have blink cameras and the one instance there was a break in the camera was stolen, luckily there was a cloud it uploaded to and the thieves (who were caught Later that evening) we’re prosecuted with the video feed provided to the authorities.
title: Easy to setup, great user interface

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Spencer Owens
content: I've owned two of these cameras for about a year now. We have constant trouble getting these to stay connected. They have a strong network connection and are maybe 10 feet from the router, but they will not stay connected for more than a few hours. Once they disconnect, the only way to get them to reconnect is to power cycle the router. We have several other devices connected to the same network and have no problems with any of them.  There is no point to having these as this point.
title: Nothing but trouble

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: VK
content: Was initially considering nest cameras, but was turned off by their camera requiring expensive monthly subscription for almost anything useful. Was recommended Wyze cam by a friend and I couldnt be happier. It it very simple to setup, the panning feature is amazing and it provides motion/sound detection without any subscription. Pop in an sd card and get 2-3 days of recording. My only gripe with the cam is that it takes ~8-10 seconds to connect to the cam from the app.
title: Amazing indoor camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mario Serra
content: One would think that at the price point, this would not be a functional device...but that would be the wrong assumption.  This camera was easy to set-up and has performed well from day one.  A bit disappointed that the person detection is going away, but hopeful that Wyze will come up with a workable solution.
title: Perfect little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Someone
content: Great little camera for the price. I cannot for the life of me get the SD card local storage to work though. I keep buying 16GB/32GB micro SD cards and Wyze Cam Pan doesn’t recognize any of them. Also I wish you could set waypoints in the software that are integrated with Alexa/IFTTT so you can tell the camera to look at the front door when it opens/unlocks or tell it to look at the kitchen when a Hue light turns on etc.
title: Good for the price. Local SD card storage doesn’t work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BookLover
content: I love this little guy.  I have this camera strategically placed and because of the way it can turn around, I only need to have the one. It shows the whole range from my sliding glass door all the way across to the other side of the house. The camera moves up and down and I see this all on my phone no matter where I am.  It can be turned on and off and several members in the house can have  the app on their phone so the last person out of the house can turn on the camera.
title: Great little home security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: corona
content: The camera doesn't work.  I had activity at 2:30am and I was notified at 6:30am.  I had people looking at my house today and got no notifications, no video,  nada.  Save your money.
title: Keep Looking for a better camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Golden Rose
content: The night vision works but it doesn’t go more than about 12 feet, and it does have motion detection with an option for the app to alert you when it detects movement, it didn’t actually alert me when we did a test run. Other than that, I was able to check on my home from 600 miles away, which was nice.
title: Great, but a little room for improvement

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Roger Rhoads
content: when it connects its pretty cool and does what is advertised but some of the features are not clear how to use. It drops connection every few minutes so that's very frustrating and makes it unreliable. I have fast fiber internet and the camera is only 15 to 20 feet away from the wireless router. makes no sense why it drops so much. none of my other devices, further away have problems. With that said, give the option of hard wiring this thing
title: not very reliable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jennifer Trevino
content: I loved it the first couple days but then it became really slow and glitchy. It moves extremely slowly when I’m trying to look around the room, I can’t understand what’s being said on the other side of the camera, & I’m not understood when I speak through the camera. I had high hopes from the reviews but for $40 I’d rather get my money back and buy something better.
title: Not worth it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jodie L
content: We bought 2 of these after a recommendation from my sister in law. We have one in our cabin & one in our shop. Night vision is black & white but picture is clear. We were able to talk to our son when he stopped at the cabin with the sound. In the shop, it was picking up the ceiling fans if we placed it about 4 feet from ceiling. After lowering it to about 8 feet off the floor it works fine.
title: As advertised

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ZOIDBURG
content: Overall great for the price. Setup easy. App easy. Looks amazing. Does exactly what its supposed too. My only complaint is the sound is garbage when trying to talk, it lags and is not very loud over the phone. But it's $35 bucks what do you expect plus I didn't necessarily buy for sound. I bought for the 360 camera and picture is amazing so I'm happy with my purchase. I actually bought one then ended up buying 2 more because I was so impressed.
title: Amazing picture but sound is trash!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kaitlyn Cronk
content: Bought this as a gift for my mom to keep in the house to watch the dogs while we’re all at work. This works amazing, super clear picture and sound. When speaking through the camera the volume is pretty loud. Smooth movement and movement tracking. Totally comparable to the super expensive competitors
title: AMAZING. BUY THIS.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Channon
content: It works great. I have it mounted outside my garage underneath the roof overhang and there have been no quality issues. I purchased a case to make it semi weatherproof and it does a great job. We've had 40mph winds with temperatures as low as -12°F (-25 next week) and haven't had any issues. I'll update more if I find a breaking point due to weather but I don't see that happening. Great durability at an awesome price point.
title: Freaking sweet

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Craig L Palmer
content: This camera has some limitations and specific requirements that are not disclosed in the description and info.  I spent several hours trying to get it to connect to my network, without success.  It's going back.  Only good thing is the price, but the savings are eaten up by time consumed in set-up!
title: I Give Up...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: justinu
content: I have a handful of Wyze cams, and one pan cam. The others work fine, this one does not. The sd card in this one constantly stops working. I then remove it and put it back in and it works again for a little while... kind of pointless when it doesn’t continuously record for me. Same sd card I have in my other wyze cams that don’t have any issues.
title: SD card continuously disconnects.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: James D. Reynolds
content: This is a great little camera.  We got it to remotely check on our dog who had major leg surgery.  We needed to make sure she was remaining calm when we were not home.  With this camera we could basically search around the living room to see where she was.
title: Good quality pan/tilt/zoom

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: HD
content: It works nicely, motion tracking work really nice. The picture quality is good. However,  the voice and speaker can be better. The microphone is terrible, which makes it useless for 2 ways talk. Also, when use with Alexa to view on fire tv, it just stop work after 10 mins, and I have to reopen it on FireTV.
title: There are places for improvement

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joy to the room
content: I have a baby monitor that was over $100 and comes no where close to the quality of this camera!  This camera rotates and zooms too!  It is such an amazing quality with the video. I bought two and the view gets my back door, front door, living room entry and hallway. It truly is the best in home security.
title: Best Camera EVER

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Don F
content: . I put this camera in an upstairs window so that it could overlook the front of my house. As long as there is no glare on the window the picture is really good. I don't believe you could read a license plate on a car in the street out in front but it's easy to see people walking back and forth. The setup is ridiculously easy and the app on my phone works very well.
title: Great little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: arial
content: Price is good for the quality camera you get. App kept freezing and I had to delete and reinstall a lot. Then, I found out someone hacked it! Very easily hacked! Had to disconnect it, that was very scary! Needs better protection and better safety precautions!!!
title: Regret buying! Beware of hackers!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Charles Bryant Mayfield
content: This is it guys this is the camera you want. I have these in the house the barn outside with waterproof covers. In the old days the security cameras I bought for my business cost 25 times more than this. And I can't say those old cameras we're better quality just more money.
title: Built-in security, camera resolution, great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brandon Slaven
content: I've had this for almost 2 weeks.  I really enjoy it.  We use it more for fun to watch the cat and dogs run around when we're not there.  Only negative is the audio playback isn't that great.  You can talk through it, but it's not super loud.  But for a general camera it's fantastic!  Would 100% recommend it.
title: Worth the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C PZ 61
content: It actually does it's job a little too well.  The tracking is a bit unnerving but does it well.  I tried dialing down the settings to the lowest and it keeps following.  If its facing a window and it's windy, the thing gets possessed.  It's still a great camera and you can't beat the price.
title: Great little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jeffrey
content: Okay, so I'm new to the whole home camera thing,... freaks me out a little, but a coworker of mine has this to watch his puppy litter that was just born. We have a 5 month old golden retriever puppy at home and she is full throttle, so I wanted to watch her. Ordered it on Friday, got it on Sunday and installed right away. Set-up was easy, app was intuitive, and like I said, the picture quality was great. For the price I couldn't be any happier! $42.00 out the door on Amazon Prime and you're in business.
title: Great picture quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tiff
content: I love this new device. Everything about it is worth it because of what its priced at. Most of the other brands are around 150-200 vs this one is about 30 something. and you basically get all the fancy features that the other brands have. I would totally recommend this product to anyone and everyone. worth having it if you have a pet or need a security camera inside the house.
title: Excellent value for the price you pay

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brenda M.
content: I purchased a mini and a pan camera. The mini cam was easily set up and online however the pan cam was unrecognizable in the app. The cord came damaged (see pic)
title: Camera didn’t work/damaged cord

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael H
content: I loved the first Wyze cam I got, so I decided to add a second one.  Both  are very easy to use and can be set up to track motion, monitor sound, or record video too.  I use this one in our third floor office.  This way, I can keep an eye one on of our older cats.
title: My second purchase

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sublimefly
content: I've yet to find anything about this camera I don't like. I've run into the occasional big on the app, but I'm just asking for confirmation it existed, I got a response in the form of an updated beta of the app that resolved it. Every issue other wise had been simple user error quickly remedied by their support. These cameras are an exceptional value and are improving with every update.
title: High-end features with a low end price tag. Outstanding value!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bryan McIntyre
content: Love all of my Wyze devices and this cam is at the top of my list. Great picture, programmable pan and scan, and easy to setup too
title: Love my Wyze cams!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jennette Brown
content: I've purchased the regular Wyze cameras, but I absolutely love this one! It's got a great range of view and I can easily control it with my phone. It's quiet when it turns, so I can spy on my kids, and the speaker is nice and loud and clear if I need to communicate with anyone near it. Makes me feel like I'm all-seeing in my home haha! Totally worth the money to buy a wall mount with it. <3
title: Best home camera ever!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jduval
content: So they are cheap, they work, and they have a free app. The picture clarity is good but not great. ,2 way audio is lacking as well as night vision. The night vision works but when set to auto, it will sometimes turn on and off repeatedly. The biggest problem is you cannot integrate them with Alexa routines.
title: Not fully Alexa capable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Eurxr
content: I was skeptical about this camera, mostly got this for my dog to be monitored in the living room/house. It is actually really good. There are three options for quality when monitoring outside of the home-network. 360p, SD and HD. Really don't notice a different across all three. The Mobile app is really solid, would recommend getting a SD card to save recordings, I don't need it at the moment but there inexpensive. If there is a FLAW I can say comfortably the voice control is really really bad. I definitely see myself buying one more or two for the exterior of the house :)
title: Fantastic Camera for <$40

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John G.
content: Great camera for the price. Using it to monitor my 3D printer. You need a fairly fast wifi network 60Mbs or so. Hard to set up if your using something like the Netgear Orbi. Because you can not separate 5GHZ and 2.4 Ghz bands. No manual controls for focus. You can manually control the zoom and pan functions. I am trying to get my 128GB memory card to work. I am going to reformat the card and see if that works.
title: Great cam for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cheryl Ross
content: This was easy to set up, biggest problem was scanning the bar code, I had to hold it under the desk then it took it. Otherwise very simple connection with my I-phone. I have been using it to check on my dogs when I'm out of the house. I really like this camera, reception is great. The quality of this piece of equipment is amazing when one considers the low price I paid for it.
title: awesome nanny cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: boris
content: The camera itself works more or less ok: you can see live picture.  But the software is awful! There is a complete disconnect between a real time and the time that camera records.  As a result recorded parts are being posted in wrong order and become useless.  The funny feature 'Sync Time'  syncs seconds, but not days!  Example: right now is 3:07 PM 08/14/2019, but I have events recorded 2019-08-15 on 02:36. Which means tomorrow night in bright daylight.  Shame
title: Do not purchase!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: chan
content: Motion tracking seems to work great.  I was easy to get working.  The app for it is a good thing.  I like the multiple alert settings so your not getting harassed all day by false alerts.  its easy to turn off when your home so your own camera isn't tracking you when you walk past.  My only beef is picture quality and length of recording with the first being the bigger beef.  I have mine 15-20 ft from my entry way.  you cant get a clear picture of a persons face at that range.  But for the price it works great and i'd definitely recommend it for those on a budget.
title: good for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: James Nelson
content: I purchased 9 original Wyze cams and am very happy with them so far. As for the cam pan, they do not work very well. I thought only two of the three didn’t work with the as card, but after checking again, all three do not work with the SD card. I have powered them down and re-cycled through the start up process with no luck. The product is just not very good at this point from what I can see. I’m hopeful I can return these and just get more of the original cams.
title: Cam Pan SD Card Fail

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Allright
content: What I like about the pancam is it does everything perfect when I'm home.  I don't like that it never once connected once I leave my house, also it fails all the time to turn on and off- what's up with that? My email for help was answered in about two days. My answer was that its a known bug and wait for a fix.  If I can't connect away from home it is totally worthless.  Maybe someday,  but not ready for prime time yet.
title: Allright

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: janet lynd
content: I have been using the camera for sometime now. It has worked great. Recently something went wrong with a firmware update. I called the company and they replaced the camera. And want me to send back the old camera to help them determine what went wrong. Great job. Would recommend
title: Great Customer Support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RavenG
content: I ordered the Wyze Cam Pan and the motion tracking and motion tagging would not work, so I returned it and got another one.  The 2nd one was the same way, motion tracking and motion tagging wouldn't work, so I'm returning it as well.  I have the Wyze Cam camera and it works great, but the Wyze Cam Pan is evidently buggy.  I'm so disappointed because I really wanted the Wyze Cam Pan to work
title: Ordered 2 and neither worked

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Theo M.
content: I was surprised about the features packed into this for the price.  I'll admit I haven't done a lot of comparisons with other cameras in the price range, but I find I don't need to as this does what I want: night vision, panning and zooming (although I wish it did pan up and down a bit more), and a decent app for monitoring.  I appreciate the security in the app as well, with the authenticator support for 2FA and the ability to limit and share access.  Nicely thought through.
title: Great camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Misshoke
content: This camera is great for my covered entryway.  I love that I can change the quality level from 360/SD/HD and change the view angle as needed. Theses are not for outdoor use but for the price and my mild climate it does not bother me. I recommend a protective cover/mount and longe cord to make this work wherever you want a good view.
title: Great basic camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Breezy B
content: First off, this arrived the day after I ordered it! I am currently using the D-link 360° pan tilt that cost $250 so when I saw this and watched the product video I couldn’t not buy it for $40. It came one day after I ordered it and I got it set up. The user interface and the app is already better than D-Link. The image quality is 100x better than the d link. The pan speed is much faster as well.
title: First impression: Amazing image/product quality, extremely affordable.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Echo S.
content: I have several Wyze cams and for the price they can't be beat.  They do not yet work with a computer, but require a phone or tablet.  I think that there are several features in development and the computer access is one of them.  They are also working on an outdoor version.  I have been happy with all of them and even gave some as gifts.  I have not yet played with face recognition, but expect it will be fine too.
title: Newest Wyze cam and it pans and follows remotely

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sammy
content: Absolutely, entirely useless. Tried for almost an hour to get it to connect to my wifi. Would claim that (1) network was a public one (it wasn’t) and (2) upon typing in password to said “public network,” would say it couldn’t connect (“try retyping password!”) I must have tried resetting it at least 10 times, and I was using a 2.4 network as required. 2 other cameras I purchased to test alongside connected almost instantly (the ring indoor and the Wansview, and they were also connected the whole time the Wyze claimed I didn’t have an internet connection.) Don’t waste your time with this absolute hunk of junk...not worth the aggravation. Returning immediately.
title: Hunk of Junk

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: B.Brad
content: For the money this security camera does a good job. The picture quality is really good. It does tend to send false alerts to my cellphone but you can adjust the sensitivity. My only real grip with this camera is the pan feature which is the main difference between this one and there cheaper one is it’s loud. Anyone who enters the room is going to know right away where you hid the camera.
title: Nice for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ashley Gibbs
content: Love this camera. Amazing video and sound quality with zoom feature. Interfaces well with the app. Able to monitor a full 360°. The video playback doesn’t show the video as you choose which portion of saved video to watch so finding specific incidents on camera can be difficult if you don’t know approximately what time something occurred.  The motion detection is extremely sensitive but the camera will move constantly if it’s on in high traffic area. I recommend turning off that feature when using monitored area.
title: Great camera at a great value!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jeffrey K.
content: Could not get the camera into use because I couldn't setup a user account with the app. Upon web research I found this is a common problem - can only be resolved by contacting technical support. No time for that foolishness. If can't setup an account/app w/o problems - I am not interested in even trying the camera. Search continues.
title: No easy setup.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M. Perry
content: I must say, this is by far the easiest setup I have experienced (I have had several different brand security cameras). I have only had it one day, so I can't say anything much about performance, but should I have any problems I will update. I did not update the suggested films are that popped up. I read other reviews that said they had problems after they updated, so I chose not to.
title: A very easy setup!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Designer X
content: Bought Wyze Cam Pan to keep an eye on our backyard after a couple of vandalism incidents. It was an absolute breeze to set-up and the iPhone App is super easy to use. I love that I can pan this camera remotely to cover the whole yard. The picture quality is great and the night vision decent. For the price, I love this little camera and will consider getting another.
title: Love this Little Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shane McIntire
content: I had to put 4 stars, as the camera is good but not great. Definitely a good starter camera for the price point. The biggest issue I have is that it lags. When I'm at work and want to see my dog or cats, I will typically pan to the side. Sadly, there is a 5-6 second delay depending on the connection. This isn't a huge issue though. The picture quality and video quality are good though. Especially for the price point.
title: Good Camera for the Price, Beware of the latency

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SoLo757
content: This thing seems to always have problems connecting to our phones. The night vision is just so grainy I'm not sure what the problem is. Now the daytime picture is pretty Sharp. I don't believe at this time that the price is justifiable because of the issues I just stated which are big deal.
title: You won't miss out on much.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Woodlandsman
content: Only "sort of" worked. Easy enough to install, but very choppy motion tracking and not much of a picture. Their website "support" kept returning "404" codes (out of date?)... So, I called tech support and was told I'd have a two minute wait... Ten minutes later - and still on hold - I hung up and put the thing back in the box to return it. Life it too short for "sort of" tech - even at these prices.
title: Try something else...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: seth afrank
content: I put a few around the house.  Ez to use and very high quality.  If there’s a better value out I’d be amazed honestly. They provide me with a enhanced peace of mind for my family, pets, and home. Just hook em to your iPhone/router. It the one.
title: High quality and value no brainer.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Aidan F.
content: By far one of the worst pieces of tech I have ever purchased. Setup is extremely long and would not recognize the QR code. Once I got it set up, motion detection doesn’t work, notifications don’t work, as card doesn’t work well, the camera loses connection on my fast internet after 10 seconds of opening the stream. This camera is riddled with bugs that Wyze just can’t seem to fix.
title: WARNING DO NOT BUY THIS

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: nope
content: This camera is just OK.  It cuts out every so many minutes so it misses a lot of events.  I purchased it to keep an eye on my 2 dogs and 4 cats while I am at work as one of them is choosing to poop on my new rugs.  So far the camera is resting while the pooping is going on and I still know nothing!  I would not purchase this item again.
title: Sleeping Camera Misses the Action

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MeowMy
content: Getting worse with each passing month. Unfortunately I’ve purchased multiples of this brand and model.
title: Better than nothing but not good

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JULIE
content: These are pretty nifty cameras for the money. I don’t really care for this pan option one as much as the regular one. They make noise when they rotate and you need to keep them in a spot where they won’t pick up a lot of motion behind them and on the sides if you are using it in a window. But good camera for the cost.
title: Great camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gerard Joseph Fortier
content: This is a very good product ... for the price. Don't get me wrong, I was very pleased with it up until it died after 10 months. I purchased a total of 9 WYZE Cams, this being the only Pan Cam, the rest are stationary. All have functioned well and the stationary Cams continue to do so as long as you have sufficient internet strength. I will probably purchase two more of the stationary Cams to replace the Pan Cam. I originally bought it because of the gimmick factor. The difference in cost of two stationary Cams verses the Pan Cam is negligible considering the stationary ones seem to outlast the Pan Cams.
title: Camera stopped functioning after 10 months.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ffbreau
content: Great product. Lags a lot of the time trying to connect. Moving the camera to view all around is painful. The camera needs improvement in rotating more efficiently. Overall I am very happy to have this camera. I bought the outside birdhouse cover and mounted it under an eve, which works great. See how this works in Maine winter.
title: Recommending

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Betski
content: Used it as a toddler monitor (an upgrade from baby video monitor). Worked well for naps and during the day, didnt have any issues with wifi/connectivity.  The picture was good. And the motion was awesome.  But had some blind spots (understandable) Only thing was at night, the notifications were not alerting me. I tried to do many things but didnt get it figured out. Worked for what we needed and a great price. Stopped using it because we needed a monitor with temperature sensor because how cold
title: Decent cheap and monitor for toddler room

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Adrian
content: Look, most of us don’t need like 4K video or the latest when it comes to security cameras. We just need something which monitors activity with respectable quality  for us at a low cost. The Wyze camera does that at a fraction of the price of most other higher grade security cameras. Would recommend for anyone interested in getting a security camera for home.
title: Excellent for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Will Sr.
content: If you wan't a good wireless home camera, which I use as part of my home security system you will not find a better one for this price. Motion detection local storage on a micro SD card is all possible. With the app, I use the App from Apple (iPhone) it is very easy to install. I bought 2 cameras, one with pan and tild the other one is just with base stand and I can only recommand these cameras
title: perfect camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cinchicago
content: For the price - you can't beat this camera. I use it to watch my pets when I'm away. I can see them..zoom on them..talk to them...and now they know when they hear the camera moving - they will soon hear my voice and they sit right in front of the camera...calms me when traveling big time
title: Great for pet peeping

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: EagleClaw
content: Fantastic camera, clear daytime, lighted picture, pretty sharp, am impress. Only issue is not very clear when it’s dark, not have bright IR night vision in it. Fairly happy with it and will buy more for living room.only issue, not great night vision. One star less..
title: Pretty sharp but lousy night pictures

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: cathy McDaniels
content: This was a really cool camera at first (purchased in March 2019,) but then after a few months it kept disconnecting from network, it started happening more often which sucked for viewI gotta when away from home. I had to wait to power cycle the camera when I got home for it to reconnect, so I got a smart plug, should have been the fix I needed but then the camera stopped powering on.. I really like this product fully functional and want another one, because of the great price, but it was only in use for 4 months. FYI my cam is mounted upside down and indoors
title: Perfect cam for 30 days!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: #uNiCoRnS
content: Great camera, great quality, great price. The only thing I’m working through is the motion detection. It spins around to find the motion or the noise unfortunately it has a habit of spending too much and confusing itself. Once turning that off it is perfectly fine.
title: Round and round we go

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jaja Bers
content: if there is zero star I will pick the zero star. I was excited to set up this wyze cam but unfortunately I got the defective one. I tried all the power outlet in the house but the camera doesnt have power. I’m ok for a replacement. I’m dissapointed
title: Defective cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SEAMAZON10
content: Alexa compatible=NO!  Don’t be fooled... the camera has NO Alexa compatibility unless you have an Amazon device with a screen.  No routines, nothing! FYI. The fact this listing says the camera is Alexa compatible is not true.  Even if you do have a screen Alexa, you cannot set up any routines.
title: Not Alexa Compatible

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: allie
content: For the price of camera has a pretty clear view of everything. The only downfall is the two-way audio is complete garbage. There is way too much Echo and delay. Other than that I like the camera. I plan on getting one for my front door and one for my back door. The current one I have is for my living room so I can keep an eye on my pets, and I know when my kids get home from school.
title: Good picture quality, terrible audio

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: pgp
content: The image quality, alerts to motion/noise, no cloud service fee, price, looks - are all great.  When you are around, it constantly make gyrations with that irritating noise. Well, by design, the gyration and the noise  maybe to scare the intruder, but if it does so constantly in front of you, you feel like throwing it away.  If they provide setting to turn off 1) gyration 2) noise 3) alerts when you are at home, it would be a great product.
title: Works great, but can be irritating

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: David G.
content: I bought 3 of the Tilt/Pan/Scan cameras and have had problems with them. Two have gone down. One has been replaced by the manufacturer. (Thank you Wyze) I have bought 4 of the regular cams and have had no issues. I don't know if this an ongoing issue with these cameras, but I might change to a different camera in the future.
title: It Can't Be!!! What's Goin On?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Darren Nelson
content: I tried everything I could to make this camera work for me.  It is cheap.  That’s the only way to explain it.  Can’t even run at 5hz.  It never connects.  It takes forever to react when asked to pan or tilt.  It’s a super pain.  I guess I got what I paid for.  A cheap piece of waste. If you’re looking for cheap, unusable garbage....buy this camera.
title: Garbage

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ela Dahan
content: I love the idea and concept of this camera. I use it for my main office and love how it has a speaker so I can speak to any of my coworkers through it. Quality isn’t perfect but OK and the motion sensor is not that quick. For the price of 40$ you can’t go wrong though
title: Purchased at 40$ good item

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mark Letterman
content: I purchased this camera to watch over my dogs while I was away from the house. I didn't have high expectation for this camera since it was so cheap compared to my other camera system I have for out doors. Once I received the camera it was really simple to get it connected and start using. I was very surprised with the quality of the video and how well the microphone pics up. Unfortunately I have not used the motion sensor or the micro usb for recording. I simply purchased this camera for monitoring only. If your looking for a well priced camera for indoor use I would highly recommend this camera.
title: Great affordable camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: the_ameture_fotografer
content: This is my first smart camera so I don’t have anything to compare to. That said this Camera has  very impressive features for price. I use it to monitor my little office and love the fact I can remotely pan it around. And while I currently have it on top of a file cabinet you can buy specific mounts for it that allows it to be installed practically anywhere and you still can pan it around. The only thing I can recommend is buy it directly from Wyze as it seems they are always cheaper than Amazon.
title: Great camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Scurvydog Designs
content: These cameras are awesome.... I love them they work extremely well and so easy to set up...I have had other low priced cameras but they dont even come close to the awesome cameras...they even give you 14 day free cloud storage....everyone wants to charge you a monthly fee...seems stupid if you are using their products some company's are so greedy, but these guys are awesome keep up the good work....
title: The best camera for the rest of us.....

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Toni
content: Maybe ours was defective from the start. We had to reset it so many times to connect to WiFi. I read good reviews about using this as a baby monitor but we had terrible sound from the start. Picture is great so if you’re looking to use it just for that it’s worth the price.
title: Not good use as a baby monitor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Linden
content: The camera came with a glitch in the camera eye filter.  The filter wouldn't activate/deactivate due to a faulty magnet. and this caused a purple hue on the daytime setting.  This is a known issue with these and other similar cameras.  Wyze tech support is awesome however and they provided a brand new camera at no cost to me and they didn't even want this camera back.  So, even though there's nothing else wrong with the camera's functionality they said just keep it!  Motion and sound tracking, automated alerts this camera does it all and does it well.
title: Good camera...excellent customer service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dominic Wasserzug
content: I'm changing my review from 1 star to 4 stars because Wyze support was remarkably quick to provide assistance. When I first got the device it prompted to upgrade the firmware and failed. I thought I was left with a brick. Support contacted me on the same day (on a Saturday) and provided me a link to flash the firmware to the device via a micro-SD card. Once the device was flashed to the newest firmware everything was working. All of the features of this camera are well worth the value of the purchase price. I would have actually given this device 5 stars if it was not for the firmware fiasco. Overall, this product may not be for everyone, but the amount of features for the price makes it a good purchase for me.
title: Total garbage

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jason C Niwa
content: Camera worked great for a month, then all of a sudden took a nosedive into useless. Cannot review any recorded footage from previous days. Camera records onto the memory card, but footage can only be seen if you put it in a computer. Really not convenient at all. Tried to get tech support, but their solutions were not helpful.
title: Great for a month, useless after.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lar Ray
content: this is really a cool camera for the money.  responds well.  it sounds is a little delayed but for the price it's really a great unit.  I use it to view my dogs in the house.  it will follow them around but the response is slower than their movements.  But overall I love.  It will rotate 360 degrees and the eye will move up and down so your view is practically endless.  I recommend it for just about any use
title: great priced camera.  I use for dogs

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cathy’s Foster Kitties
content: I can’t believe how clear the picture was. Great value. I did return it because I was looking for a camera for kitten nursery. This camera is more for surveillance so was constantly panning the room. This would be great if I needed it fo such.
title: Great camera Great value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Yo Adriane
content: This little camera is perfect. I have an Arlo system that has a major time lag, but this picks up right away and records, as well as pans and tracks. From now on I go Wyze! I also purchased a light bulb and a couple plugs that are fantastic as well.
title: Better than my expensive system!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: 3D designs
content: Wow I love its perfect t for watching my puppy while is created he did bust out of a crate take out the door while we were able to get to him before I did any damage he's a 8 month old German Shepherd puppy we have ordered a new crate we still like to watch him just in case
title: Perfect  in e every way

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A. Drew Walker
content: The "engineers" who programmed how to set this thing up are obviously sadists... But you will (hopefully) be rewarded with a security cam that doesn't need internet to function, has excellent clarity in day & night mode, and is reliable... So far so good @ 3 months in...
title: Setting this "simple" device up is a lesson in patience & frustration.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Julie
content: I bought this camera to use to check on my dogs during they day while I am at work and i am in love with this!!! The quality of the picture is amazing! The camera moves all around and the picture never messes up. The speaker is good. I haven't noticed a lag on the video when they move its very much real time activity. I have been recommending this camera to everyone I know!
title: What a great buy!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jeff Pfohl
content: The product worked great for about 4 hours.  Now I can not connect to the camera.  I have power cycled, factory reset, re-installed app and more with no luck.  Late last night it started working again only to stop connecting again today.  I have other brands of cameras with no problems.  This camera was a complete bust.  Now I need to spend the time to return it.  Save your money.
title: Only worked for 4 hours

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ctrini54
content: Easy set up...spectacular picture and bio feed back...and picks up other alarms..( Fire &Smoke)....Hopefully, Wyze team will make comparable all weather outside cam...If your looking for an indoor cam...this is the one...Suggestion, is to apply long term battery...to make it completely wireless...
title: Great Orice ...GreatCam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Daniel Song
content: I've had nest, samsung, and phillips cameras. This matches or exceeds them all. They take the best features in put it into one device. No subscription (nest), much better interface than Samsung, and you can have constant recording unlike phillips. The quality is even better than the Phillips. And it's less than $45 whereas the other cameras are $120+ I'm sure sooner or later higher res cameras will come out that won't cost a crazy amount so until then, this is the best. I will probably buy more.
title: Way exceeds its price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Evan Rhodd
content: I got this camera in hope of finding a cheap alternative to paying for a monthly subscription and high cost. Perfect fit for our house. I have it sitting on a window seal and it detects everything! I only have it alert me if a person shows up, and it does just that. It records everything passing by also if I need to review a time. Awesome cloud storage, and I put at standard 32 gb San disk SD  card in there for local storage. We are very happy. I’m tempted to buy another one for a baby monitor!  I would recommend this to anyone. Night vision works as it should, but take note that the lights will reflect off glass if turned on. Stop debating and buy this product instead of something else. You can’t be the 360° HD quality this camera and app can give you.
title: Cheap. Simple. 5 star quality.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amit Patel
content: This is Great camera and the price is very competitive. Great value product. Very smooth and easy live view, Two way Audio function is great, Motion detection is awesome, I love this 360 degree rotation can see what is going on every corner, I already recommended to a friend and he bought this camera and he liked it as well. PLEASE make battery operated for outdoor, I can’t seem to find it and would love to have all cameras from same manufacturer so it can be accessible from one App only. Thank you
title: Awesome Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Simone
content: Inexpensive and relatively easy to use WiFi camera. Better than another model that I had purchased at a warehouse club for about three times the price. Not happy with cloud storage pricing so I did not bother with that. Have multiple cameras working well for about 2 months so far.
title: It is inexpensive and it works.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joe Defazio
content: I will be using this in my new apartment next month. Easy to set up and configure; practically did it all by itself. Image quality is good, panning, tracking and zoom work as indicated. Night vision is OK. I don't have a micro-SD card for it yet to store scans, otherwise I'm impressed.
title: very easy to set up

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tinna L.
content: A friend told me about this camera and I figured for the price I would try it. I am VERY impressed with this thing. It work pretty good in total darkness, the pan/tilt/zoom is responsive as well. I had a power outage for over 6 hours and it came back up on it's own without issue. I set up two of them and unplugged one for over 3 weeks. When I plugged it back it in connected without any issues. You cannot beat the price. So far, I'm very happy with this purchase.
title: Very impresssed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Linda D
content: I’m frankly amazed by this camera. We have it mounted outside on a covered porch; this morning it’s 8 degrees F and the camera works perfectly. We were prepared for a malfunction in low temperatures but I’m glad to say that hasn’t happened. There’s a learning curve with the settings, but once mastered we’ve been quite happy with our choice instead of a more expensive manufacturer.
title: Excellent at Any Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TAW
content: The camera is no longer working. No power between camera and power source. Did all what WYZE support told me to do and it is still not working. No power light to indicate camera is on. Had it for 6 months.
title: Power Problem with camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DnD
content: Love this camera!!! $37 can’t beat it for the price.  And the PICTURE is GREAT.  Buying two more, One to replace the one that was just stolen. GOT 10 SECONDS OF HIS FACE I. PERFECT HD QUALITY!!  They don’t realize taking the camera doesn’t delete the event footage from online. One to add more coverage around our house. That will make it 4 cameras we will have.  And going to get more!!!
title: CAUGHT YOU!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jazzy-snazzy
content: Did not have the feature that I wanted. I won’t know if someone enter my home. There were no recording feature as well. There are no signal or alert if anyone enter the room or motion. My friend is using the old version and it works great. I returned after it failed to perform. They took out the one important feature because the contract were terminated by their partner. I love the cute design though. The picture and voice clarity is absolutely stunning. Hopefully they will improve the features otherwise it is a complete waste of money.
title: Disappointed with the features

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sai Kiran
content: I wanted to get a single camera that pans over the entire location. Didn't wanted to get multiple cameras. Captures Great quality Motion and Sound. With a weatherproof cover and mount can be installed outside but never tried it. From my observations, Notifications are not instant as it captures 12 seconds and sends it over the network(add 2-6 seconds)  it doesn't bother me. Overall very satisfied with Wyze product.
title: Good Affordable Indoor Camera -- Just what I wanted

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Homer
content: These cameras are better quality than my ring cameras. You cannot get a better quality camera for the price. The night vision isn't great when there is any amount of light but for my use I can do without. The software has its pros and cons but does really well for the price tag.
title: Worth the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BCN
content: The camera was easy to install, but the motion detection did not work right out the box. I was going send it back, but a second update came through the second day and suddenly the motion detection started working. I was literally going through the Amazon return prompts when the update popped up. Only two days, so far so good. Very frustrated at first.
title: Technical difficulties

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Curious
content: I like this product because it was easy to set up, and one can see what is going on in the room in real time.  I tried a few of these from another manufacturer, and it was a nightmare to set up and use as I wanted to use it.  Gave four stars because the unit does make noise when it pans the room.
title: Nice

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: GingerT
content: I have the two Nest cameras, Nest doorbell and thermostat and wanted to add another camera.  With Amazon's return policy, I decided to try Wyze. Fantastic quality, easy to set up, pan right-left and up-down.  Picture magnificent, ability to pan fantastic (slightly loud but tolerable).  NO SUBSCRIPTION FEES! PRICELESS.  My only is that I am Having trouble getting it to recognize the SD card but that is it!  I have sent a note to customer care re: the SD card so working on it!
title: BEST $ EVER SPENT ON A SECURITY CAMERA

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kang
content: Bought this camera because my sister recommended it. It has good picture quality, and sound. It also swivel about its base. Was relatively happy with it until recently, when I noticed the casing of the camera bulged out. It’s never been dropped. It’s setup on a tripod, and never moved from where I put it. Strange that it just opened up spontaneously. Hasn’t affected it’s picture or any other functions,  BUT this has me spooked. Is it expanding from heat? Will it catch on fire? Don’t know whether it’s worth risking. I am deeply disappointed. Not sure I’d recommend this camera to anyone, it hasn’t even been a year. Wish the company would contact me.
title: Bulging out of its case in less than a year.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Monica
content: This may be my greatest buy ever. I bought it when I got a puppy to watch him when I was away. I started crate training him on day 2 after bringing him home, for the 1st hour he was barking and crying but with the audio feature, I was able to talk and comfort him and soon he fell asleep and now he does great!
title: THE BEST BUY FOR PUPPY MONITORING

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brumby
content: The camera is excellent value for money. Bought this time as a second one. Like the quality of the vision although night vision is really just ok. Motion detection works but the movement can’t be too far away and sunlight and car headlights give a false positive. As long as you set it up well and define the motion areas - it’s a wonderful device.
title: Bargain camera with great features.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Danni
content: Bought this to keep an eye on my cat while I’m at work, and also to keep an eye on my apartment. Set-up was extremely easy and the app delivers a live feed to your phone from the camera. This was recommended to me and it’s been nice to have. One of the best features has to be the tilt and the 120 degree rotation ability. Would definitely purchase again
title: Super easy, good quality for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: melissa_in_ny
content: Got this to monitor my dog in the apartment when I wasnt home, and also check on the dog walker or super coming in and out.  The app allows great setup for automatic on/off, and motion detection, recording etc. It also has great sound. I have zero regrets and would recommend.
title: Really great for the value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: B Hankinson
content: This product meets our needs to monitor the front porch area, and check in on the dogs inside our house. Connectivity is usually good, and the camera responds well to the app. Only issue I have is that it's difficult to get the right sensitivity with the motion sensor. It doesn't always pick up on motion that we would want it to (like ups leaving a package - maybe they're too quick for the camera to start recording), but will focus on a bush when a breeze rustles the leaves. For the price however, I'm satisfied with it.
title: Works well for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Carlos Cysneiros
content: This Wyze product (as with others) requires your to change the secure encryption of your WiFi router to WPA. Although I feel like this is a good practice the user should decide what type of encryption to use independent of what the camera manufacturer suggests...First I would have to know how to do that (which I do, but rather not)  and second I would have to change every device in my house to use a different password. I don’t have much of a security issue at my house so the choice of which security encryption to use is AGAIN up to the user not the camera manufacturer. Cameras from other manufacturers work fine for me.
title: Required WiFi Encryption Setup

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Schmoo
content: It was nice while it worked. Just as good as the other wyze devices as far as the functionality they share. It was neat to be able to pan around. It quit working after 7 months. I can power cycle it and get it to work for a short time, then it dies again.
title: Lasted 7 months

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ratboy
content: Great low-cost way to add video surveliance to your home.  For the cost, I cannot complain. Shortcoming is the tracking.  The tracking can sometimes lead to the camera facing away from the room but it eventuallly will revert back to its original direction.  I recommend you turn off the tracking function or limit the camera’s range.  The camera is highly customizable to suit your preferences so please don’t let this flaw dissuade your from buying.  Don’t look elsewhere unless you need wireless.
title: Awesome Camera for a Great Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ellen
content: This camera is easy to set up. I do not recommend this if you plan on putting it in the window to look outside. The glare from the IR lights around the camera will reflect on the window and you will be unable to see outside. The motion detection also lacks. I have it set to notify me when it senses motions but it hasn’t worked. Great cheap option for inside though
title: Cheap option

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tony Coppola
content: Absolute junk, The live stream fails constantly. Every time you update firmware theres a problem. Report to customer service you get a ticket that never gets resolved. I replaced with an EWeLink camera which live streams continuess with no problems.
title: Absolute Junk

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BadDad
content: Very nice product and rated four stars since the pan base seems a little loud.  I haven't gotten in place to monitor inside house as of yet.  I have tested it and downloaded the Android app.  The app works well but really like to see if they have something for Windows.  My son has the fixed base model that he's used to monitor his landlord's chicken house for raccoons.  Great night shots of the trash panda being stalked by the landlord's cat.
title: WORKS

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Colorado Mike
content: When I received this camera I followed along the instructions to install the android app and setup went very well. Using the app the camera seems to work well, with tilt and pan and a nice quality picture. Unfortunately, it's important that I be able to use a PC web browser to look at the camera, so this camera doesn't work for my needs.
title: Nice, but NO WEB BROWERSER SUPPORT

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PC
