content: App is just useless. It has totally stopped displaying events. Not matter what I check or uncheck, events no longer propagate. I has to hunt through the timeline for anything. Waste of my time, spend elsewhere.
title: App is useless

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stormin'
content: Only had them a short time.  Great picture quality.  Super price.  Easy to use software.  Some features untested.  Audio still a question.  Motion detection too jerky and it overshoots---needs work here.  Recording and playback good.  Could use a fast forward on replay.  Hard to criticize, really.  Try them out.
title: Can't beat them for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: shellyeby
content: This little camera is perfect. I use it to keep an eye on my dog when I'm at work. It pans back an forth nicely and the picture quality is great. It alerts me to sounds so I can yell, oops I mean talk to my dog when she barking. I can also hear what it going on in the room and they just added a person alert so I get alerted if someone is in my house.  It has a feature so that I can record events that are happening and I can set the time for this to happen. Sometimes I do forget that it's on and well, just don't forget about it.
title: Perfect

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jena T
content: I loved this camera for the first couple of months. Then it started getting glitchy and needed reconnected often. It’s been 10 months now and the camera will not stay connected. It sometimes connects and then says offline within a few hours.
title: Quit working

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jennifer Works
content: I used to have a canary and it was MUCH better. First starters, the Canary would automatically turn off when I was home and on again when I would leave. The headache of remembering to turn on the app as I'm leaving and back off when I get home was a major part of my thumbs down review. The other being I just recieved an email from Wyze saying they will no longer have the software to 'detect people'. How? Why keep a camera when it's essential function will be nicked. I'm in the process of returning/reselling mine as I write this
title: Get the Canary

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JK Lanier’s General Store
content: This little guy does a real good job keeping an eye on the surroundings so I know what my son’s up to at all times. The only problem is if you go out of its vision, it resets back to center. My son has figured out if he stays behind it long enough where it can’t see him, he could sneak past it or do something out of its view.  I’m glad that it’s not completely silent when it’s rotating because that makes my son remember that it’s present and he’s more apt to not be sneaky if he knows it’s watching him.  I had no idea my cats got up on my kitchen counter until the video showed me otherwise.  Now I wish I hadn’t known.
title: Great little camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joanne E
content: This is by far the easiest technological thing that I have ever set up. The camera is fantastic. The app works great. Two weeks after set up I changed wifi carriers. This camera was set up again in less than a minute... My smart bulbs and smart plugs we're not as easy. I couldn't ask for anything more. I love the images, the quality, the app, the notifications, the ease of set up and the cost!  Wyze nailed this.
title: Could not be happier

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Helen P
content: It’s a shame that these cameras have decent picture quality and other nice features, but they are worthless because they lose Wi-Fi connectivity every single day, several times a day. I spend A LOT of time restarting them and doing the set up process only for them to drop an hour later. It’s maddening. I am frustrated beyond belief and upset that they don’t reboot themselves after losing connectivity. Honestly, they are worthless as security cameras.
title: Wi-Fi connectivity drops every day

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SEA
content: I absolutely love my Wyze cameras. I am able to keep an eye on my dog when I'm not home and talk to her. I shopped around a lot before purchasing. This is the best indoor camera for the price. I have two in my home and am about to purchase additional ones.
title: Great cameras!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: T. A. Gilman
content: This little camera offers a lot for the price. It only took a couple of minutes to set up and now when I'm away from home I can check in on my dogs and see what they do when we're away. (One jumps up and sleeps in a chair, and the other sits patiently waiting by the door, sweet girl). That alone is worth the money.
title: Great little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R D Wagnitz
content: Camera seems to be working fine 4 days after setup.  Setup was tedious however, mostly trying to get the Wyze app downloaded.  It was downloading for over 2 hours - then I decided to reboot the phone and the app had already been configured?  Now once it is all working I was able to access from 10 miles away via my smartphone.  Very clear picture and video!  There is some excess glare you can see in the pic - not sure why since sun is not at that angle of the pic?  But again overall satisfied with  product as of this date.
title: Working well so far

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anonymous Reviewer Dude
content: Wow!  Get some Wyze cameras before the price goes up!  These do everything I want in a security camera, they record to SD card, you can set motion detection zones, they have night vision, the app has great options and is easy to use, and this one even lets you use pan features by remote control!  There are cameras out there at 4 times the price that don't do all those things!  This is what you call a "market disrupter"!
title: Phenomenal value!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kat
content: I had to change this review because the scariest thing happened to me. I  aught my camera watching me on its own. It turned towards me when I wasn't looking and turned away when I caught it. I did NOT have it on auto. This camera is HACKABLE. Be VERY careful if you decide to buy this.
title: BE VERY CAREFUL,  HACKABLE!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Steff B
content: I use this camera when I am travelling to keep an eye on the house (and the cats).  I like the pan option.  I have it in a place where I can see most of the house and only turn it on when I am gone.  It is easy to set up and the app works well when trying to view the cameras while you are away.  Night vision is decent, even better if there is a nightlight in the room.  It has motion detection so playback is easy to review.
title: Works great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: b.alec
content: For the price this is amazing. Video and audio are not HD but the quality is more than good enough for regular home security. The app is occasionally a bit slow but works fine and does the job. The first day I had some issues but it has worked glitch free ever since it was restarted and fully updated. I get motion alerts immediately and the 12 second play backs are perfect.
title: Great quality for low price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jannettee
content: My sister wanted one so she could feel better leaving mom at home alone as her health is declining and dementia has set in. She says it’s been a life saver. It works fabulous
title: Love it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jw
content: This product was pretty easy to install. Had to call customer support and they walked me through the issue I was having and it was up and running. I use it to watch our dog when we're gone and the quality of the video is excellent. For the price I think it's a great product.
title: Great product for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mateo Castro
content: Great camera for the price. The motion detection can be wonky at times. But if you set up zones it solves the problem. The camera would follow random sounds or slight motion on the opposite side of where I needed it to be and it would stay there. With the zone set up it always bounces back.
title: Great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Leon
content: Great product for the price! I have Netgear Arlopro setup throughout and they don’t process as quick as this one. The app opens very quickly compared to Arlo. The motion detects fast and adjusts to the active person/sound. Can also detect movement through a window during the day but not at night due to the lights reflection that blocks the video but, the sound is clear, record is instant.  A bit bulky and could be quieter.
title: Nice product for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: egrona53
content: Great camera with great features. Can check on the baby from almost anywhere. Not a reliable baby monitor. It drops connection at night which makes the sound not work and you can’t rely on being able to hear your baby cry. Good for a small house within earshot of baby. Motion and sound sensitivity can be set so that you can pick up even the tiniest movements which is also a nice feature.
title: Great camera, not a great baby monitor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shane Johnson
content: I like the privacy terms for Wyze, they are a private company and seem to really care about their customers. You can sense their passion in the emails they occasionally send. The camera is an amazing value that has it all, really. You get all the best features for a very reasonable price. We've had the camera for months now and it operates wonderfully. Going to buy a second one for another room.
title: Best Privacy and Best Company (At least For Now)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Harold Peterson
content: Great picture, even in low light. Alarm functions work very well, even for invited viewers. Frequent updates to the firmware, make me feel like this is a company that cares about its product. The only things I'd like to see is a wall mount that provides the power, so that I could actually do a 360 rotation, but that is a minor thing when you consider that it is mounted high on the wall and for it to ship with an SD card. Not a huge one, but the cards aren't expensive and if it did come with one it would be so much better. I bought a 64G card for mine and haven't run out of room once.
title: Terrific

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ronny Rice
content: Night vision is better than I expected however, I purchased the weatherproof cover for this product and it is terrible for night time viewing or recording. Had to remove it just to have night vision. One more thing, the microphone in the cam is terrible. The speak function is good but when a person speaks, the volume is too low. There is no way to increase it.
title: Great pan tilt can for the money but needs some improvements

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Archdave
content: Great picture quality even in night vision mode. The only downside is the motion detection (person detection notifications) are a bit wonky, not reliable to even show up or to show up in timely manner. Everyone says it's your internet, but my internet works fine with every other device in my home.
title: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Indoor Smart Home Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Str8kuntry
content: This is awesome. The price is great and it works great. I use it to check on my mom throughout the day at her house. I can talk to her if she doesn't answer her phone. I was worried about them since the price was so low but they are great.
title: Works great and great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Conrad
content: This indoor camera pan is great.. easy to install and upload through cellphone.. that i have to order a 2nd camera to be placed on our living room.. and have it installed as well.. so i can both watch cam pan on my cellphone activating them via group option..
title: my new cam pan

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: knighttrain
content: Works well, did not have any issues connecting to app, great quality picture.  Works as explained, great buy.
title: Great buy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael Smith
content: I was presently surprised with my camera as we installed this in our baby daughters room and I can rest a little easier not having to run into her room every 5 minutes to check on her. :) We are definitely getting ready to purchase more cameras from Wyze!
title: So happy we bought this brand!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kaydon N.
content: I spent two months trying to find a camera that had all the feature I wanted and didn’t cost an arm and a leg. The Wyze Pan camera is awesome. Live feed, night vision you can toggle on, off, or auto. Motion AND sound alerts that you can turn on or off/adjust there sensitivity. Horizontal and vertical motion. Decent zoom. Decent picture. Two-way audio. Simple setup, the app is a breeze. Optional cloud service or 32gb memory card. I’m sure there’s more that I’ve missed, but those are all of my favorite features. I use mine to watch my dogs while I’m at work. Apartment life’s no fun when there are barking pups. The only semi-negative thing I have to say about this camera is that there is a bit of a delay with the two-way audio. For under $40, though? That’s a-okay with me.
title: Two Months of Research, and This is the Best Affordable Camera I Found

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amybriana
content: This camera is amazing for the price. It’s small, unobtrusive and has an unbelievable picture quality. It also moves 360, which you can do with the app, and you can talk through it.  We use it to check on the dogs when we are out and about for long periods of time. It’s great!
title: You need this!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jeremiah
content: Paid good money for this product. I want to view my baby. Wyze software asking me to shop for products when I open app to view my baby. This is not acceptable - this not freeware. I paid good money for this and am angry about popup adds in the application that I need to click through before I can use the camera.
title: Hardware is good, Wyze software is showing pop-up adds when I click on it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: P. Ip
content: I like the price and having used both Wyze Cam v1 and v2, I had high hope for it to replace some of the other cameras.  However, I found very challenging connectivity issues, which I do not have with other brands of cameras.  I am not sure whether it is the app or the hardware.  Streaming over WiFi kept failing as it needed to reconnect every other minute.  I wish it had streamed better.
title: Intermittent connectivity over WiFi impacting streaming

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Erasmo
content: Awesome product! I installed 2 of these in my apartment and they have served me good. App on other hand needs some tweaking. Connecting to cameras is a hit or miss. Sometimes it connects on first try but most of the times you have to close the app and try reconnecting multiple times. One more feature i would like to see added to the app is Fast forwarding during playback. It is such a hassle to scrub and find what you need with the current way it is set up. Hope to see an app update soon.
title: Great Product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JBinDB
content: This gives a great picture but if you get an alert, the camera swivels back and forth so it's impossible to see what is going on. And I haven't figured out a way to stop it. It makes me dizzy to watch it twirling around. Returning for a replacement but if the new one does the same thing then I don't want it.
title: It doesn't stop moving!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ERICA
content: Disappointed with the camera after all the reviews I read before buying. It will not send me notifications, cannot take a snapshot. Whenever I tried it is saying denied. When I tried to record a video same thing denied. I put in a sd card same thing. The software is updated. I will have to send it back.
title: Wyze is disappointing

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Matt Custer
content: My wife and I wanted a wifi cam to make sure the dogs stay off the furniture while we're at work. For Christmas, I received the Amazon Cloud Cam ($120) and I purchased the Wyze Cam Pan ($38) for her. Both have good picture quality and all the bells and whistles on the apps, but since I installed the cloud cam, I wet to move it and I have yet been able to get it to work. So, I really can't compare them. The Wyze cam will pan 360°, you can manually move the cam by swiping the image on the app, tap to zoom in and out, you can listen and talk through the cam, night vision, image capture and more features I have yet to try. All in all, good buy and in my opinion, a better buy than the Cloud Cam.
title: A better buy.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Martina
content: Love this little thing. You can even talk to your kids or tell the dog to get off the couch while you are away. :) The night vision is great. Sound is good and quality of videos as well. Just need to insert a 32GB SD card if you want it to record more time. I would recommend this camera. 360° plus you can set certain preferences accustomed to your needs.
title: Great quality in night vision, sound and easy to handle via the App

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MERodriguez
content: Excellent value for the money!! Mine lag occasionally but I think it’s just my internet. I love the 360 panning, set up was super simple-5 min from the box to fully operational, love the 2 way speaker. I have recommended these cameras to several people! (I bought 2!)
title: You can’t go wrong with this camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ericka Larger
content: Very slow and unreliable.  Picture quality and night vision are okay, but usually too slow to pick up on full action.  I had bought two of these and they both stopped working after 2 months.  Not worth the price for only 2 months of use!
title: Not worth it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jack A.
content: This camera is incredible! We are using it as a monitor for our toddler's room. The motion detection is very appealing for this reason, as soon he will have freedom to roam when we put him in a toddler bed rather than his crib. The picture quality is impeccable! My ONLY complaint (and reason I gave 4 stars) is that the sound is very quiet. It is difficult to hear what is happening in the room unless the camera is RIGHT next to the crib, which defeats the purpose of having a view of the entire room. You cannot beat this price for this quality! Aside from that issue, which I do hope can be resolved with an update, I am very happy with this purchase.
title: Wonderful!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RMOC
content: Everything works well so far except the speakers and the microphone for two way conversation. The set up is extremely easy and I set up everything in a matter of minutes . If I am rating 3 star just because the two way conversation feature is not practical due to low sound and there is no volume to increase the sound, a very major downside for us.
title: Speaker volume is very low and there is no way to increase it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: D. Akin
content: Terrible sound quality so can't talk through it. The company is offering an exchange so hoping that helps. No way to control input volume at camera end. Night vision goes back and forth from color to black and white. Even with the negatives, gives me comfort I can check in on my elderly mom. Would help more if we could talk! IF the exchange fixes this, then I could recommend. I have to wait til after the virus because not allowed to visit mom again now to change it out
title: Many reviews have issue with sound

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Yan Guo
content: More than 3 friends recommend this camera to me. This is a nice product for indoor camera. It spins 360 degrees. It has two ways conversation. It is very convenient to use in the house when no one is home. It sends me the alerts when something unusual happened. I can also playback the record. Don’t remember to buy a SD card together. Highly recommend.
title: Motion detected and 360 degrees span.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R. Amano
content: Camera seems ok except for the SD card.  Sometimes it does not recognize my Sandisk sd card.  In fact, I had 2 that was working fine.  I tried to format them in the cam but they would always fail.  Now if I try to format the cards elsewhere they fail.  I tried in a PC, a mac, and my Sony cam.  That is a deal breaker, kind of upset I lost 2 SD cards in this piece of junk.
title: sd card eater

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: rww- Michigan
content: I liked everything about this camera until I took it with me while traveling to monitor my hotel rooms while I was out. The establishment where you set it up MUST have a password enabled wifi, AND must be at least 8 characters long. The last 3 popular hotels that I have stayed at, either required no password, or the password was less than 8 characters. So far, this item has been a bust for me.
title: WiFi restrictions

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Neetz37
content: I bought this camera in a rush after looking at lots of other comparible models and finally picked this one based on reviews. It was extremely easy to set up, and to my knowledge hasn’t  disconnected from our wireless even once after 3 days (in same room as router). I bought this to spy on a new foster dog while I was away at work for a few hours to make sure he was ok in his crate. It has been a life changer and I don’t have to stress! I have the motion alert set, although normally I just plug my phone into the charger (does run battery down if you are viewing all day) and watch the live stream at work. The app is really easy to use, and I like that if you rotate phone sideways it goes to a full screen view. It has a running date/time stamp so you know it is current and working. The WiFi at work is crappy, so I ca easily tell when it’s disconnected because the clock stops and then it lets you know  and I can reconnect. The lighting has also been really good, it adjusts to a bright window on one side of the room during day, and I can see really well at night. Be aware the app for me automatically was set to use cell data, so I had to go turn that off in settings. For the price and the ease of use, you can’t top this camera! Once the foster dog is gone I’ll likely point it out the window so it can see front door.
title: Great quality and reliable at a really good price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: George Torres III
content: Super easy install. The app for your mobile device is super easy to manage. Getting the Wyze app on my PC though was a bit of a struggle. Lots of hoops and 3rd parties i had to go through in order to get the app on my monitor. Talk back is a bit sketchy. But works ok.
title: These little guys are GREAT!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Crystal
content: So absolutely disappointed in these camera's. I will be removing them all from my home and finding something else. I cannot access them 90% of the time and when I do nothing has been recorded. The app does not work at all now and they have progressively gotten worse since I've had them to the point the do not work at all.
title: Waste or money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Miyabi
content: This is perfect for a cheap in home camera and super easy to set up. I mainly use this so I can keep watch of my dog, I have it set in motion tracking so even when I’m home it will move like crazy just following me around. The feature that I like is that this camera even has a speaker, so I can listen in the house and speak through it. I’ll totally be buying more to get some of the blind spots I couldn’t see in 360.
title: Worth the money!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chris Lumauig
content: Great camera! Picture quality is very good, and is features are very customizable through the APP. I wish they had a web application (you can only access it through your phone APP currently). Still a great product! Recommend 5/5!
title: Greatest bang for your buck!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bánh Bèo Family
content: Pros: outstanding video quality and pan function for the price. Perfect night vision. Software update and improve day by day. Good customer service. Cons: Only see by smartphones or smart home devices. No integrated with PC. Motion detection DELAY (always miss the fast motion such as people walks by or quick jumps to the car).
title: Best value camera and the best customer service ever.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jhoffman
content: This camera is amazing and so is Wyze. Not only do they update their firmware and app frequently, they continually add valuable features and add-on products. I'd buy another if it ever failed. Recently they added a security kit with door sensors and a remote motion detector that work perfectly out of the box. Noise and motion detection work flawlessly and the night vision is awesome. Do not buy any other security camera - this one has it all, for far less money than the competition!
title: Unbelievable value and perfformance.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rob in the PNW
content: Super fast (5 minutes) setup out of box, including account creation. It's that fast. I'm enjoying my purchase. It replaced a cheapo pan cam that I found moving on it's own too many times to feel comfortable with it. Still working on the rest of the features.
title: Up and moving in 5 minutes

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: lamhrt73
content: Really surprised. I paid almost $500 for a home security system and couldn't talk through it so a friend suggested this. I would have gotten these if I knew about them before this expensive system.  Love it, works great and picture quality is awesome
title: Small but Awesome

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kurt R.
content: I tried this product out to keep an eye on my dogs while I was at work.  My biggest issue was connectivity issues with my wifi.  I had one camera that never worked because it struggled to connect even though it was within 10 feet of a signal booster, and the other always seemed to be in black and white.  It seems to get the pic in color you need to have almost all the lights on in the room.  At night, it appears very dark.  Also, playback was spotty, even with a 64GB SD card being used.  I wouldn't say the cameras were good, but they weren't horrible either.  I ended up purchasing EZVIZ cameras like I have on the outside of the house and the quality is night and day better (pardon the pun).
title: Lower Quality Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CzarinaJenny
content: This is a great camera for the price I bought another one by a different brand in a similar price range and that one did not have good picture quality. This one has pretty good picture quality decent night vision and it rotates well. Overall I'm happy with it. It makes a great pet cam.
title: Great camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: lma4312
content: For what this camera can you, and the picture quality - you really cannot beat it! I bought one right after Christmas and I've already ordered another! I want to get more for the outside of my house in another month or so. Very happy with the product and cost. I've read some bad reviews about the App, but i honestly haven't had any issues, yet. Would recommend to friends!
title: Great camera, can't beat the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Steve Lentz
content: Amazing quality for such a reasonable price.  Turning on and off was a little tricky until I finally figured it out.  Got a 32G mini SD card for storage.  Works great as a baby monitor.  Will test fully on an upcoming trip.  One issue is that reading some of the other reviews, it seem the you may be able to get the camera for around $10 less if you go right to the manufactures web site instead of Amazon.
title: Amazing quality for such a reasonable price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Simply Mindful Hypnotherapy
content: Not what I expected in a security camera. Does not record when motion activates. Only records while it is kept open on your phone/laptop. I expected that I could set up to record on motion and dictate how long to keep recording after being activated.  I won't purchase another one of these.
title: Not a great security system.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brian Baxter
content: Overall I love this camera.  I use it indoors to keep an eye on a pet.  EVERYTHING.  Every feature works as advertised.  I honestly don’t make daily use of the motion tracking feature but in my trials it worked well.  My only nag is that I wish the night vision were better/stronger.  The thing is plugged in so I would imagine additional infrared LEDs wouldn’t be a big issue and would really help illuminating the scene.  Overall,  value is incredible.  I will buy more soon.
title: Incredible Value and Quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C. L. Hart
content: We use this camera primarily for home monitoring while we are away but it is left on and recording 24/7.  We received the order promptly and it was a breeze to set up and get running. We like the ease of accessibility on the app and the picture quality is great. What we don't like is the quality of the night vision. The camera that we had previously had the I.r. lights around the entire lense and we got great night vision. With only 6 lights on this camera, we can barely see anything past 3-4 feet away.
title: A great camera for the price, only lacking in the area of night vision.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nana in SoCal
content: I bought this camera for the pan feature. First, the log in process is longer than my other cameras and second, it does not always connect. You can rotate the camera however it continues to rotate and doesn’t stop unless you turn the camera off. The sound is spotty and not the best clarity. The picture quality is good and so is the night vision.
title: Not what I expected

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TAN One
content: This little camera, equiped with a memory card, is just great.  Motion activated, records video and audio, sends notifications, just great.  Cant miss for the money.  I own 5 at this point and use them whenever it would be nice to monitor something, at home or at work.
title: Quick, easy set-up

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Victor Von Doom
content: The camera itself is great and the features are as good or better than more expensive units that require subscriptions.  However, you wont get 2 way audio.  You have to, literally (and I'm using it correctly here), yell into your phone to get any audible sound from the camera (even then, you get about a whisper).  The microphone works fine though.
title: Great camera.  Don't expect 2 way audio.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Reese
content: Amazing!!!!!! Love how simple it is to hook up, my night vision looks amazing, my alerts go bananas because of how high my sensitivity is but you can change it if you’d like. I love how I can control the view and move the cameras around from my phone. I also ordered two outdoor cameras and they work amazing. I had a little trouble connecting the cameras with my phone due to the internet..after I called the company and had the speed changed I was able to connect. I was also using my back camera on my phone to try and connect the camera and you’re  suppose to use the front camera (on the phone)..after I figured that out it was easy!
title: Best so far

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: April
content: I had so wished to use this camera  when I was away from the pet shelter I've started. It seemed to get great reviews. The problem I had was, trying to get past the setup process when the camera says "ready" and you hold your phone with a given QR  code, facing  the camera and the camera is supposed to read it and connect to your phone. Well after countless times and trying every possible way to get it to work...well back it goes! Amazon is great on returns if something doesn't  work they will let you return it.  In the future I will buy another one because I may have gotten a lemon, which does happen from time to time. It's still a well rated camera. Good luck with yours!
title: I wish it would have worked!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MQ
content: The camera is great for its price! HOWEVER, the camera had stopped recording events to the micro-SD card when it was working fine previously (manual recording works).  Events, however, are still recorded to the cloud as it’s designed to do. It’s disappointing when anything is not doing something it’s designed (and marketed) to “do”! Are you going to resolve this issue anytime soon?
title: Micro-SD card is not recording events!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cresinda
content: This camera works amazing! The camera quality  is ok but it’s good enough to see who it is, it has night vision also a plus! You can also talk from it!!  Totally mobile where you can move it anywhere in your home! Good for keeping an eye on mischievous kids!! The sound quality is a delay, if you unplug it for a long period of time you’ll have to reboot it but that’s no biggie very fast to do this is good for anyone who wants security camera but don’t want to drill any holes and also keep an eye in your home =)
title: Awesome camera IT WORKS!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: justine bengermino
content: I am so glad I bought this product.. It was very easy to install this camera and for a person like me who is not media savvy it was a Godsend.. Using this camera to help me watch my mom who is aged and not able to get around herself.  sound is great, visual is great.. can't say enough about it.. Definitely worth the price.
title: VIDEO

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: nila webber
content: So happy with this camera!  Amazing value for the price.  Packaged beautifully, tracks movement and sound, sends alerts and short video of what's happening.  I purchased for night purposes, and while I did find the critter that is destroying everything I plant, it was a little difficult to see but this was a function of the similar color of the rat against the dirt in the planter.  But ultimately, it did the job.  Would definite buy again!
title: Great Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: zorro55
content: Easy to install and set. Just a minute. The image is incredible I like my camera. I did not give him the fifth star because sometimes the camera stops working and starts to flash a blue light. I have to contact customer service to see what this is.
title: Indoor Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Luis
content: Installation pretty straight forward. I ordered separate mounts and already had an existing system so hardwiring was easier. The ability to remotely maneuver camera to different areas is a BIG +! Be sure to order some SD cards to increase your storage capacity.
title: Straightforward setup with minimal install.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Travel 2021
content: I purchased four Wyze Pam camera none of them works. Constantly disconnecting and showing error code 27 and 90. Know help from support only response, you are pass the warranty period. I would stay away from this product unless you want to be frustrated by spending your money on a product that just will not deliver.
title: Not ready for distribution

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Roger Peister
content: Product does not work after an hour of operation. I loaded app and completed setup. The camera worked good. I turned it off and when I turned it back on it would not connect, kept saying trying to connect and wouldnt stop moving back and forth. I did all that was listed on the web site to resolve but nothing helped. I emailed mfg and havent heard anything. All i have is a confirmation of the email. I feel I just threw $51.00 out the window.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Flames
content: This is an awesome security camera for the money! None better...I threw my other camera, other brand in the trash! Only thing that frustrates me is how long it takes to arm or disarm camera...if they could have button on home screen on/off I would be soooooo happy with this security camera! I'm leaving, turn on, I'm home, turn off!
