product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alan
content: Works great. Had it on my kitchen window facing the front door. I can rotate remotely to turn and look out window. Night vision doesn't work through window but day time is good to go. Now I have it on a camera stand watching over my puppy pen. Need to buy another one. Easy to setup and navigate app. Haven't had the need for their tech support yet.
title: Works great. Love the no fees.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C. LALIBERTE
content: Bought this after a friend recommended it and showed me his. Not disappointed! Works VERY well, is super easy to get up and running and I still can't believe the image quality at this price point. Make sure you buy a 32 GB SD card for it. Makes it so much better to be able to continuously record and store locally for remote playback, as opposed to just having clips from motion or noise detection available on the cloud.
title: Buy it with confidence!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mandie bollinger
content: These things are the coolest things ever we got this one and 4 of the small ones just waiting for those to come in the mail to hook those up also my sis told me about these they're great you can only hook them up to 2g though so that took me a min to figure out but got it all to work and uo and running will def buy more if needed
title: Great little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rakesh
content: They were great when I got them but after few months they stopped connecting . Alright , these could have been some technical problem behind . May be a firm ware update or moving them closer to router but emailed the tech support to find out . Realised , they provide the worst customer experience e er. They respond back after a week, ask irrelevant details and do not reply for a while . Nothing solved my problem. I don't think these plugs are great and now that there are other companies selling them around the same  price range.
title: The plugs stops working after a while and none from customer support will help you

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alice
content: I was very surprised that I could not find anything I did not like. Set up was super easy, learning to use it was also easy and all the features work nicely. The quality of the video is excellent and we really like the app.  I had purchased two other brands recently and this one is far superior. The others were more expensive and very well known. I highly recommend this product.
title: Feature rich and easy to setup and use!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nordax 98
content: What you get for the price is amazing. The ease of install beats any other camera I have used. The pan tilt is great. The zoom not so much but that's ok. Image quality is up there and the cloud storage works well. Only thing I would say is that it seems to miss quite a few movements or the video start a bit late in the event. Not a big issue.
title: Awesome Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: FleshWhistle
content: This product was great for looking at my window to my driveway. Picked up everything and notified me right away. But after a couple weeks the notifying takes almost a minute to tell me..which is ridicules. Maybe its bc my free cloud trial is over?
title: Ummm

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Vindi
content: I needed a camera for my baby’s room and have tried other before now. Usually I would have problems with setup or the quality of the camera itself with other types, but this camera has proven to be very excellent quality and simple to operate. I will definitely be purchasing more in the future to use as security cams in my home.
title: Very good quality video!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ScrapRock
content: This camera is awesome. It was super easy to setup and the picture quality is excellent. The night vision is decent but the only negative I would say( not the camera fault) you can’t set it near a window if your wanting to see outside at night. The infrared light whites out the window. Second thing is it can be difficult to connect when your away. For the money it’s a excellent buy and I’m getting another one or two.
title: Best for price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: dnkdide
content: Person detection does not work reliably. Motion detection is also hit or miss even after adjusting sensitivity. Edit: 1. Person detection is removed. 2. Motion detection is not reliable - can detect moving cars in the street with 80% sensitivity, but cannot detect an incoming person to front door 3. Occasionally they change terms of use and privacy statement. If you don't agree to new terms of use, you cannot continue using the camera. Very one-sided and annoying. 4. Storing video to SD card stopped working after 8 months.
title: Not a smart camera - not worth spending any money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael  Ruskey
content: Great for price. Good quality video. Highly recommend installing a memory card and set it to record always. Then your not limited to 12 second videos. The directions are not great but you'll figure it out. The app is clunky, but again you figure it out and get used to it.
title: Very good for price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AMAXAMA
content: make it: -water proof -night reflective color -solar and battery powered
title: Recommendations to manufacturer

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: G. Sumner Buck
content: I am happy that this was so easy to setup and mate with the existing camera. The setup procedure is so easy, just read and follow the directions and bang it works. Mostly the operation is intuitive which is very nice because I have a poor memory and I can just jump in an operate the cameras from the phone app.
title: Easy to set up and it works!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: WILLIAM R JOHNSTON
content: Neat little camera fairly easy to connect to and operate I was a little disappointed though I thought that it had a rechargeable battery or separate power supply I wanted to put it in my attic where are the power outlet was quite a reach but other than that not bad
title: Meet little camera but does not have a battery supply has to be plugged in limits you a little bit

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ralph
content: Having used other camera systems I was skeptical when a friend recommended WYZE.  The set up of other cameras was tedious & often failed.  In frustration with my other system I bought a few WYZE cameras and I was hooked!  Now i have 4 in my home and over a dozen in my business.  Set up in less than 5 minutes.  I can not praise the simplicity or the versatility of the system enough.
title: The easiest security camera system ever!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: GeekFreak, Prime Member
content: Love love love ALL of these cameras. There is nothing I don’t like about them. The value is outstanding. They are constantly growing the company and making updates to the software and even new products are still being developed with the help from their customers input. I couldn’t be happier with these cameras and the company.
title: Great Cameras and super great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Phil E
content: I got the camera as a cheap alternative to a baby monitor. The nursery isn't far from my bedroom, so I didn't need to be able to hear every little sound my baby made, but I thought it would be helpful to be able to look in on him remotely. This camera really works well. The image in daylight is surprisingly good, and the night vision does the trick. The app is also user friendly. I did have an issue with the night vision on my camera at first. The camera showed barely anything in the dark, but the Wyze customer support helped me out and shipped me a new camera. Things work great now, and I have no complaints.
title: Great little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Pamela Welsh
content: Like the somewhat easy setup, good picture and night vision.  Would often go offline.  It is now offline and not working.  I have tried emailing and calling tech support.  They are unavailable. The reset videos and instructions have not fixed my problem.  Not sure what to do next
title: cool little camera.... when it works

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Megan Pasia
content: I’ve been looking for a small camera for a long time. When I saw this, as well as multiple reviews, I bought it. The price is create, the quality is amazing, and the functionality with my iPhone is so simple to use. It has everything I’ve wanted in a camera and the monthly updates always introduce something interesting to the camera. Highly recommend.
title: Best Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Markia
content: Everything is great i got it for mom and she loves she says she see everything when she lives it notified her when there is movement and people coming up her stairs its great so then i purchase one for my brother so he can see his kids and also got one for myself and love it picture quality great motion great night vision awesome
title: Awesome

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: root
content: This is the best Driveway Alarm Sensor. We live in a wooded area with a long driveway. We have tried other driveway alarms with no success . Problems were to far from main unit to many trees but the Hosmart 1/4 Mile Rechargeable Driveway Alarm Sensor has worked accurately every time in these conditions. This is a great product.
title: Hosmart 1/4 Mile Rechargable Driveway Alarm Sensor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PAMELA J.
content: AMAZED AT THE PICTURE QUALITY THE PAN FEATURE IS A LITTLE ANNOYING SO I CUT IT OFF I LIKE TO JUST BE ABLE TO SEE THE LIVING ROOM AREA AND WHAT MY DOGS ARE GETTING UP TOO.... LOVE THE CAMERA GREAT PRICE I HAVE RING OUTSIDE AND THIS CAMERA'S PICTURE IS JUST AS GOOD IF NOT BETTER FOR A MUCH BETTER PRICE AND NO FEES ......
title: I LOVE IT

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: optic blast
content: It worked great for about 6 months.  Then it stopped connecting to the live stream over mobile data.  At this point it only connects to the live stream when I am connected to wifi.  If you are someone who is not connected to wifi 24/7, but want to see what is going on at your home via Wyze cam, think twice about this purchase.  By the way, I called Wyze for support and they did not give me a solution for this.  I tried all of their troubleshooting options.  I also googled troubleshooting tips for this.  Nothing worked.  You have been warned.
title: Only connects to the live stream over wifi not mobile data

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DeeTee
content: This can be a 5 star camera easily, but for some reason (under a bright high pressure sodium light) ,it has black lines on the screen. My other camera does the same. Not sure if its the reflection or some kind of interference.
title: Good.....

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shannon Stepp
content: Good camera. Difficult to get settings correct and get connected. Makes a slight noise when  moving but tolerable. Best use for me was looking out the window watching the driveway for movement. My flag kept the camera busy. Had to readjust. Would recommend a more disguised camera.
title: Quite happy?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chris M.
content: Got this to test it in many locations around the inside of my home.  Can watch real time even while in voice mode on my S10+.  Not used outdoors yet.  Recommend this for anyone looking for a good priced camera.  The companies web site has this camera for $6 less than Amazon.  Less for their cameras on their own web page.
title: Amazing camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: simplyme
content: I purchased three of these and love them. They were easy to set up, the video quality is excellent, and they work as promised. The only problem that I have had is with the sound quality when I try to speak directly to someone through the camera. That’s not a big issue for me though. Everything else has worked perfectly. For the money they can’t be beat.
title: Great camera for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Abigail Collins
content: I really did like this camera at first. It’s such a great alternative to the big brand named ones. I just needed a nursery camera for my infant. It detects motion; it even has sound! But after having it for just 5 months it completely stopped working. It says “offline” no matter how many times I unplug it or try to reset it. It’s a great camera, but doesn’t last.
title: Great camera but broke so fast. Not worth the $$$

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: marshi
content: Great buy. Only problem is that the  voice is not that great and is just ok somewhat. You can not constantly look at the phone or your monitor but hearing a clear  voice can help to pay attention when you need to pay attention. Zooming and night vision are perfect.
title: Good price, perfect picture, easy to use.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SIDNEY
content: I brought this in March 2019. The features are great if all works. I tried it & stop using it. For example, I walked from one side of the room to the other side & the camera went to the back & did not know how to come back to the front. It got stuck there.  Also I tried to see when the wi-fi failed, will it still record which it did not. I would not recommend this unless they fix this problem.
title: Some features does not really work for me

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PeterVannika
content: It consistently can't detect the SD card or turns off by itself. So I have stretches of hours or days where nothing gets recorded.
title: Consistently says there's no SD card, when there is.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C&A
content: I've used all different kinds of cameras of different brands and quality and this pan tilt camera is incredible for the price.  Picture quality is great and on par with others such as Arlo or Nest.  I have both Arlo and this Wyze Pan tilt camera and this camera loads the picture about 3-4 seconds sooner.  Again, the cost is incredible.  They should make outdoor cameras.
title: Same quality as name brand. Incredible.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kelby Linn
content: I currently have three working in my house.  All work well and are trouble free. I do wish you could copy recorded events or specific files directly from the smart phone app while viewing to independent files without having to remove the micro SD. I would definitely recommend this product to others.
title: Works well under most lighting, day or night

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: anon
content: So...great for quick 12 second motion capture recordings (with unchangeable 5-minute cool downs in between) that go to a free cloud service for viewing, but eats micro SD cards left and right to the point that continuous recording is functionally impossible for me. I have found threads on the Wyze site where many people have this problem. Also, the bundled micro SD card that Amazon offers is really only 2 gigabytes. I still don't understand how 32 gigabits translates to 2 gigabytes (should be 16 gigabits). Either way, it's a bait and switch based on the common understanding of what "GB" means. I wanted continuous recording AND motion trigger capture. I guess you get what you pay for.
title: Eats MicroSD cards and bundled micro card is only 2 Gigabytes even though the card says "32GB"

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sebastian Koehn
content: Es buena pero el parlante y microfono no funcionan optimamente. No he podido saber como utlizar la deteccion de movimiento. Adicional, el lente de la camara se va para abajo. Tiene un problema de software me parece. Update: The camera lens keeps going down. LOOKING DOWN.
title: Buena pero...Good but...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ricardo S
content: When I think of home security or monitoring, Wyze is the only brand and product that comes to mind. I have purchased 2 360 pan, 4 of the standard square ones. I love these and they work magnificently-but if only the two way audio was 100 percent clear though. But I highly recommend this product as even their support on Facebook is amazing.
title: Did U See That?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Susie
content: The term “works with Alexa”, while technically correct, is misleading. You can NOT turn the cameras on and off using Alexa. You can have her show you the video feed on a device with a screen, but that is about the extent of the its  Alexa capabilities. Not what I expected. Initial set up was easy enough, but getting the settings set to detect people and motion took a considerable amount of trial and error to get consistent results.
title: Alexa does NOT turn camera on/off

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cooper
content: If you can't read a license plate in the yard, what value is it?  None.  I returned it.  Get a minimum of 1080p resolution and preferably color night vision.  The technology is changing daily and by now surely there is something of good quality at a low price.
title: If you can't read a license plate in the yard, what value is it?

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Angie S
content: We bought 2 for our home last fall and the quality is very good. We bought another one for our kids college house and they love it. All the boys have the app on their phones and after being broke into this fall they feel much better coming home for the weekend knowing they can check up on their house.
title: Great Quality for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Travis
content: Wow! These cameras are awesome! I created a new account so my family can keep and eye on my father in law after a stroke. You hear so many nightmare stories about abuse. The account allows for multple users to be logged in at the same time. Everyone has pan and tilt control. Adjustable resolution helps with data use. Cant beat this for the price!!!
title: So easy to connect

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amanda Lopez
content: UPDATE: 8.7.19 I am now an owner of two pan cams and for some reason the wire you plug into the camera from the outlet just stopped working. Need a new replacement sent. I really like this product and need to buy a few more soon. For the price you're paying and the quality I get is both a winning deal. The only thing that is a little funny about this product is the motion sensor it doesn't always pick up when you're moving around unless you're right in front of it. Other than that its a great product, I will for sure buy again & I have recommend this to others.
title: Wire just stopped working

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mark McBadgernath
content: I’ve been extremely disappointed. Not so much with the cameras themselves but the app itself. Just weeks into purchasing two cameras Borge of the man stopped recording notifications, and then one of the cameras disconnected from WiFi and will not reconnect. Every other device in the house works... except for the one camera. So I’m left with one camera that doesn’t work at all and one that is mostly useless. I should mention that I’m paying for the cam plus service, which is completely useless because none of my events are being recorded. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED
title: Not worth it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: sean thomas
content: I have to manually turn the camera does no detect motion does not pan and scan  I'll be looking for a replacement
title: Good camera not all features as advertised

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: rlw306
content: Awesome product. I’m buying more of them.  The setup with my phone as ridiculously easy, picture quality is great, camera is really responsive (movement), and you can talk over it.  .  ....I find myself checking to see what my dog is doing all throughout the day.... ...and you can’t beat the price!
title: Buy it...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: marc a.
content: Order two outdoor cameras the new ones, 1 works 1 does not, never charges stays Amber been trying for many many many weeks to get a replacement so many questions hasn't happened yet keep you updated.
title: Returns are very difficult

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Keith A. Riegel
content: Not really thrilled with these cameras. I guess I got what I paid for.  Will be returning both units.  First unit, none of the motion tracking worked,wouldn't send alerts or anything.  Got second unit to make sure it was the camera, and not something I did. Second unit works fine,except anytime I try to connect via the app, I get a constant "must power cycle " error.  What's the point of having the camera, if I'm unable to view it.  Both are getting returned, and I'll find a better system.
title: Decent camera, poor software

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ram Radhakrishnan
content: Worked right from the start - setup was straightforward due to clear instructions. A small improvement I would suggest: Sharper, Clearer labeled photographs of the controls located at the bottom. I monitored my home from halfway across the world: I could ensure that my home heating system was functioning (LED display in field of view), and that the sump pump area in the basement was dry. This was made very easy due to the pan/tilt feature. Another are of improvement would be the sensitivity of the Microphone.
title: Excellent set up instructions, works really well

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wes B.
content: I really liked the quality of the picture  , great motion and sound sensor,  easy to set up and control with nice user friendly app . The pan cam can be little noisy at time but I didn’t mind it except now suddenly it won’t even turn on, I unplugged it waited and plugged it back, tried different outlet, tried to reset it .. nothin. I will still try another Wyze products, hopefully the next one will last longer and support the wyze team, look promising .
title: A great product for the price , worth to check it out .

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jessica A Posto
content: I use this as a baby monitor and the video and amount of the room I can view are great.  I have it high up on the wall in the corner (a longer cord would be nice).  However, the sound consistently drops every night and during her naps on my app (iphone).  It indicates sound is on but nothing comes through; turn sound off and on again and it works.  Both app and camera are updated and all settings are correct.  Because of this, I'm going to have to either buy a different camera to try or buy an alexa with video to use this one.  So great camera, especially for the price, but if using an iphone and sound is imperative, might want to try something else.
title: Good video, sound on iphone app drops

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JMC
content: I think the Wyze cameras and associated security items are the best on the market today for home and small business use. The product is inexpensive and just flat works. I have several clients that use high dollar security cameras in their business. I now have several who have installed the Wyse cameras in special locations. The product is east to setup and operate. If you are looking for a baby monitor this is better, not only can you see and hear but talk back, soothe a cranky child without getting up.
title: Quality at the right price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ariel Peguero
content: This device is perfect for checking on your pets. Just yesterday we caught our dog opening the door which caused us to go back upstairs to lock the door. If it wasn’t for this my dog would have been in the building hallway wondering around.
title: Great for pets

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: moabsteve
content: This camera does it all! You can set up a pattern for the camera to follow, you can track movement, you can look nearly 360 degrees all around and up/down, the camera is pretty small, the night vision is amazing compared to others I've used! Buy this camera after trying others out and you will be surprised for the value you get! The cost is lower and the quality is higher. The app functionality is far superior as well!
title: Best Baby Camera on the Market!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jaclyn
content: This actually functions a lot better than the Ring Doorbell I have out front. I wish it was wireless for power, but other than that I love it. It's very clear and when Wifi it working well it turns very smoothly. Love the zoom-in and speaker feature. It's just what I needed to keep an eye on my household when I'm not there. Also helps me feel safer at night.
title: Works great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brian D
content: This camera is better than the Amazon Cam, because it allows sharing (more than one person/account can access the camera). But the big missing feature is that it does not have a Home Away function. It expects you to use a third-party application that is not very reliable. The camera does not always shut off when you arrive home.
title: Decent Camera, but Lacking Features

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robert S. Frada
content: We bought this camera at the recommendation of a techie friend whose elderly father had passed away and they wanted to keep tabs on their Mother.  She was saying how easy it was to set up and the picture was amazing.  Well, this product did not disappoint.  I bought my first one a year ago and this is my second one.  We use it to keep tabs on the dog to be sure he is not getting into any trouble.  We can pan around the whole room, zoom in and even screen shot via the app.  You can set up multiple rooms on the app making it super easy to navigate your home.  While away, you can set up alerts if there is any movement, which is a great feature.  It is very sensitive which is good, but even the curtain moving have set it off.  We have gone through a few app upgrades, and they have a few glitches when they roll them out, but they seem to resolve them rather quickly.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
title: Amazing product - let alone for the low price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DanRockies
content: The reviews on YouTube are right, this is the best indoor camera I have seen, and also one of the least expensive. Picture quality is amazing, motion sensing is very good, and the Pan & Tilt provides for a huge range on what you can see. As with many other products, I would like to see a Samsung SmartThings integration so we can do more with the camera and home automation.
title: Great Camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bob
content: Purchased these cameras for the inside of the house. One for each room. They continually fall off line and you got to reset them. They can be used as a novelty / toy but you can't rely on them for any kind of security reliability. If they fix them I'll change my review but at this time just too many glitches in the camera to say it's actually a surveillance security camera
title: Not a reliable camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C. Brandt
content: The initial setup was very easy. Great video, great sound BUT once it disconnected there was no intuitive way to reconnect, forget & reinstall. No manual for basic purposes BUT if you’d like to try and navigate a complicated support page where it is difficult to find any clear answers, then this is your device. It also would connect to the app when I was away from home.
title: Not what I was hoping for..

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stan W.
content: Wyze can works, but Victure gives you more features at a better price. The key thing is that Victure offers 5 GHz connection. Victure Dualband 2.4Ghz and 5Ghz... https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07WNLQCB9?ref=ppx_pop_mob_ap_share
title: Could be better ...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shri
content: Bought a year ago and had a system update last week. Camera won’t reconnect and just sits with yellow light on. I’ve rebooted it several times with no success. Pretty disappointed. Was working fine until the system update.
title: Beware of system updates

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jennifer Price
content: For the price the quality of this camera is unbeatable. The night vision and ability to move the view is fantastic. On top of that, we were able to pair the app with both Wyze cameras we have (the first we purchased two years ago and is still going strong) so we can see a split screen of both kiddos. Given the price point we have also bought extras for traveling too. Look no further.
title: Picture perfect deal

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gregory A. Bouchard
content: If you are looking for sharp image quality, good audio in and out, or good night vision then do NOT buy this camera.  Otherwise if you want a record of what is going on and are on a tight budget this will do.  I would recommend you look at Ring though.
title: Good value for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Reuel O’Russio
content: Good for the price while it works. But it suddenly failed (ERROR CODE 90) without warning and cannot be revive even with all suggested “repair” procedures, by wyze customer service representative, were performed. Can’t recommend.
title: DOES NOT LAST LONG...SUDDENLY FAILED

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: G
content: I have bought a few of these, and the v2's and I cannot say enough good about the product or the company. The Price point is incredible, the Quality is top of the line, and the company is innovating and and not trying to price gouge their customers. If you are even contemplating buying another camera, stop and just buy the Wyze already!
title: Wyze is AMAZING

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Woj
content: I can’t believe the low price for the value!!  I looked into the Ring which was 4 times more money and this does basically the same thing. The picture quality is amazing with many other quality features!  Just can’t say enough about it.
title: What a value!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A. Wood
content: The Wyze Cam Pan camera is a great value for the price. We started with just one but now own four of them so that we can monitor our fur babies. The app is simple to operate with quite a few features. The only reason I am giving it four stars instead of five is because of an issue with the SD card reader slot. The company made it right though. Using a SD card is optional anyway. Out of the four cameras we are only using that option in two of them. Over all, great camera that I would highly recommend.
title: Great camera at an affordable price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Real_Amazon_Customer
content: I have Nest cam and Wyze. I think from quality and cost perspective Wyze is 1000% better. Don't waste your money on other cam.  Wyze update software frequently. I am using the cam for a while and it's really awesome. [I am not getting paid for the review by the way].
title: Best Cam for the price...Excellent Picture, Night Vision is great.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: william taylor
content: I like the clarity of the camera pictures. I have other security cameras around my home and this one is the best. Like my other cameras, you need to purchase a SD card for backing up the data. The card is about $7.00 at Walmart.
title: I Recommend it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dorothea Thomas
content: Update This is a good product compared to baby cameras. But everytime you want to look st the cam you have to wait for it to load EVERYTIME! You can’t watch the cams all at once just one at a time with this I give it a 1 star but the clarity of it is awesome and seeing what’s doing on being distances away is nice also but the important features are NOT THERE.
title: Okay product depending on its use

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brit
content: Night vision works well, picture quality is amazing considering the price, and the zoom is great too. I do have some connectivity problems from time to time, or if I don't use the camera for a couple of days. Otherwise, it's great. It did turn on by itself every once in a while, but rarely do I have that issue and it's not something I'm worried about.
title: Great bang for your buck

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KCCW
content: This is not a bad camera.  At least it stays up all the time.  It may not detect all the motion as it happened, but is enough for what I need.  Just signed up for continuous motion.  Will see if this works better.  It's an good camera for the price.
title: Not bad for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: sarah cordero
content: I was nervous to buy a camera because I'm not tech savvy. I was afraid it would be difficult to use or set up. But needed protection for my home. I bought this, got it in 2 days. Set up took me 10 min and I LOVE IT. It's a great, easy to use camera I love that I can use my app and do a 360 spin view of the entire living area while I'm at work. Highly recommend it.
title: Love love love it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jamie
content: Headline should be “works with Alexa - BUT the alexa skill required to make it work with echo show or similar is only available if you Amazon account is based in the USA.  If you live in other countries you can’t enable the skill.  I live in the USA and it works there (although the integration with echo show is not great, takes time to connect, doesn’t stay connected, delayed transmission, lacks a multi-camera view ..etc).  I bought a basic wyze cam and ech show to test. Thought the “bang for buck” was good and so bought 2 more wyze cams and 3 wyze cam pans, which I took to Australia to install in my other properties.  They work via the Wyze cam app, but not on an echo show using an Australian Amazon account. Why, this does not make sense. Why geo-block?
title: WARNING: Does not work with Alexa or Echo show!  (Unless in USA)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jacques Amar
content: Works well with its intended use. 3 down points: 1. Keeps losing its direction. I didn't ask it to follow movement, but every day it's pointing somewhere else! 2. Like all Wyze devices, only uses 2.4Ghz band. 3. Their new Android App stopped live sound.
title: Works great. Looses its bearing often!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KRC
content: Great little camera, fully rotatable and pans up and down. Great night vision and zoom is pretty good too! You can hear and talk through it too. But a few to try them out and now I’m back buying more. Plus the cost is cheap and no monthly fee for viewing them.
title: Great inexpensive camera with no monthly fees

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robert Z. Olsinski
content: As all Wyze products, it just works, easy to setup, good wide angle coverage, I use MicroSD card with all of my cameras (8), motion clips are about 5 minutes apart and with MicroSD is constant recording. Pan camera is easy manipulated with a phone, I have various other video cameras in use but none are as easy to setup and use, support is excellent and I don't know how they keep the price at a bargain.
title: Plug and Play

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Justin Bennett
content: The camera is good when it works.  It worked for the first week or so, but the first day I was going to need it while I was out, it just stopped connecting to the WIFI.  A hard reset didn't fix the problem. It works sometimes, but will randomly stop too.  I've tried resetting the device, but it continues to have problems.  No other devices on the WIFI network have issues, and it gets a strong signal.
title: Randomly stops working

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jodi Macy
content: One of the best cameras I’ve ever bought. I love the way it turns all the way around and the eyeball turns upside down backwards and sideways. I like how the motion tracking tracks motion. It is absolutely fabulous I’m going to get another one if not three more
title: I’m getting three more…

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Scrooge McDuck
content: It worked fine for 30 minutes and the software asked for an update. After the update the camera kept pointing down. The default position got messed up. I will send it back. I don't want to deal with troubleshooting etc.
title: malfunctioning after software update

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: LMF
content: Bought this to keep an eye on our cats while we were going to be away for an extended period. Extremely easy to set up and really good quality picture/zoom. I didn’t bother with an SD card - using this more like a spy cam than security so don’t need recording.
title: Great little camera so far!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CHARLOTTE/ANTHONY G.
content: Product worked fine for a couple of months. I was very impressed with camera. I have a couple different security systems. This camera  started having connection issues, then wouldn't connect all together. So now looks like it will end up in trash. Tryed dealing with WYZE customer support via email, seemed like they were going to get camera working again but after a few emails and testing through them have not heard back since. So just  consider customer support, if needed may not be there.
title: Camera issues, No real customer support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ashin001
content: Camera just pans up and does not move from that location. Have disconnected power and reconnected several times but it just repeats the same process and gives off an error code. Cannot communicate with the camera through the app. Bought several of these and cannot comment yet on their customer service as i haven't heard back
title: Completely died

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: H.Whitlock
content: After 15 years of being a stay at home mom, I just started a part time job. Was super nervous leaving my kids, excuse me “teenagers” at home. Luckily due to our open floor plan design I can see the entire downstairs and pop in and peek on them anytime I want. Two way talking is an added bonus!
title: Mind at ease.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Boston Gene
content: I only had the Cams a few hours. I spent 2 hours trying to get the cams to connect. Once it finally did connect I only got a still image and I get getting error messages. I had to restore the cam several times and try again. The one time I saw the still picture quality it looked very good but it was in a Well lit room. I had bought different model Wyze Cams and I didn’t even bother trying the other style. The updates on the software were many and I knew the price was to good to be true. Thank God for Amazon to back these things up.
title: Not Ready for Prime Time.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: William
content: I cannot get the camera to pair. I completed form on Wyze site and they sent an email with FAQ info. I had already tried all of it and I replied to email saying as much. I got two more emails saying they were waiting on my response. I have answered all three emails and they continue to say they are waiting on my response. I have tried every other way I could find to contact Wyze and no luck. I'm returning the camera because Wyze has zero support. Most frustrating experience I've possibly ever had. Don't buy this camera unless you want to roll the dice on whether it will work. Wyze does not provide support; just frustration trying to contact them.
title: Non Existent Support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Luv Amazon
content: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS TERRIBLE ITEM. I BOUGHT IT AND IT WILL NOT WORK AT ALL. PIECE OF CRAP.
title: HORRIBLE ITEM

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Trent Walker
content: In the beginning, had to wait 2 weeks for an update so that the motion detection would work and send recordings to my phone. Update came along and this camera works very well. My only gripe is that if a motion event occurs, it will record the first 12 seconds or so, but if another event occurs within 20-30 seconds it will not record the second event.
title: Good unless you get robbed every 30 seconds

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: fusion
content: Pain in the rump to set up and if you have to unplug it, the trauma begins again.
title: It’s a no from me

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Louis Krauel
content: Love the camera and the way it works. It’s the compatibility with ELEXA that will stop me from buying any more. It stated it worked with elexa but it doesn’t. This was one reason I bought 5 of these cameras. I won’t buy any more.
title: Not elexa compatible

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robert Montoya
content: These Wyzecams are easy to setup and use.  You can pan, tilt, and zoom in.  They are great as a Baby Monitor or Pet Monitor.  Everything is in Color, and has an IR Cut.  Which means it can see at night in the dark. These are indoor cameras. You can record to a Micro SD card or Alarms will be sent to the Wyzecam servers for 14 days free of charge. The only thing is the price, you can go to Wyzecams website and buy them for $29.99 instead of $37.99 or whatever they are going for here.
title: Best Easy Indoor Security Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brandon Sensney
content: I loved my wyze cameras great quality for the price but one of them just stopped working after a year or so unfortunately for no apparent reason.
title: Died after a year

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kate
content: The picture quality of this camera is fantastic, and setting it up is super easy and quick. The sound quality is terrible. Speaking to someone using the camera and listening to them respond is absolutely impossible. It either does not project sound at all or makes weird loud noises. If this feature is important to you, I would definitely not recommend this product. This is a very important feature for us, so we were extremely disappointed.  We we will be looking for something else.
title: Excellent Picture, Poor Sound

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: rramarr
content: Love it so far. Had a hiccup with the firmware update and the customer service was fast and efficient in replacing my order after troubleshooting the issue. I bought other brands in the past and they were a pain to sync. Wyze is easy and quick to install. Lots of accessories for mounting available.
title: I feel secure with this product's easy operation.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RHR
content: We have 6 of these spread across various family members houses. They work great!  App works great, as do the notifications. Highly recommend.  They are coming out with a doorbell next year and I’ve already preordered two! Love Wyze.
title: Highly recommend

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gr8fool
content: FINALLY. Found my problem or better Wyze problem. One of my regular cams was NOT identifying itself, this is an issue,  it shows up as a p2p can in Tinycam Pro. You have to go into the app, look under settings / Device info,  remember the ip address, look in  TcPro for it and fill it in manually.  Make sure you have consecutive channel...1,2,3 etc
title: These will do the job but

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Emily Wright
content: For this price I did not expect such a great little camera. I can scan the whole room, zoom in, record, take photos, and I can watch my pets (and listen in on them!) from afar. The two way speaker is awesome. The night vision works great. Very happy with this purchase.
title: Worth it!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Linda
content: This was a great little camera for the first few weeks, but now freezes up immediately and will not connect. Was told it was a connection problem but every other device in the house works just fine.  Followed all of the instructions to fix the issue but it didn’t help.  Tried Wyze support and they were very nice but unable to help.  Downloaded the newest update and reloaded the app on my phone. Still no good. I was really disappointed because when it worked it was wonderful.
title: Was great for the first few weeks while it still worked

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A.G
content: I have some problems since installed version 4.10.6.193 couple of days ago. Wyze cam not detecting motion, tracking and not able to rotate anymore. Camera eyes not moving anymore and  had stopped rotating left or right.
title: Wyze Cam Pan

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Scott6255
content: I like the pan/tilt/zoom features of this small camera. Many don't give you these options... just point it to where you think you want it set initially, then later you can move the home position to wherever you want. During live views, you can pan/tilt/zoom, then it will go back to the home position in 15 seconds. Software app is nice. Intuitive and easy to use.
title: Nice features for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Matthew Gary
content: Wet good camera for the price! Ordered 3 and they work perfectly! The speed at which they pan and tilt can be adjusted as well as flipping the image 180 if you need to hang the camera upside down. They say you can only use 32GB SD cards but I ordered 64 GB and they work just fine. With the 64 GB it saves a weeks worth of continuous filming in HD then records over the oldest footage to record new footage.  Night vision could reach further but for the price it’s amazing!Recommend!
title: Bang for your buck!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M.Xiong
content: First day using a set of 3. Pros: Works great for the money. Can tilt, pan, has sound (in and out). Free App is easy to use - no monthly fee. Has an event notification option to alert user. Cons: Does not come with mounts, sound is hard to hear, feels like ideal fixture height is a bit low (lose visibility under neath camera after certain point, 7-8 ft)
title: Good for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: T from Long Island
content: Would not track. Would not upload video data. Would not sync with software. Came without instructions, not smart. The review was good nothing else was. All hype. Save your money. Loser of a product. Great idea; lousy embodiment.  Probably designed in England or U.S.A. and then a bean-counter got involved and messed up the result. I'm pissed and I don't need this.
title: DEFECTIVE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stacciii
content: Instead of getting a expensive baby monitor we went this this wyze camera and we love it! We are able to talk thru the camera and can also hear the baby on the camera. It’s perfect and the price point was perfect. I wish it came with the mounting bracket but other than that this is perfect!
title: Great product for the PRICE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anthony V. Martinez
content: Great indoor security camera. I like that control is fast. I've had other cameras were inputs had a delay for a second or two before the camera would move. This one is instantaneous almost. Also, the sound is great.
title: Wow! Wonderfaul camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: B. C. Gaddis
content: I have a host of NEST cameras and other nest products, which becomes expensive, this is a decent stand in for my toddler monitor purposes. I also use this as my travel toddle monitor and comes in handy. I'll never say it's on the level of Nest,  but for the price and or in a pinch it is a great alternative.
title: Stand in.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Andy
content: As the headline states this camera has a great picture (even with the "night vision") and some great features as well, but I bought it for the motion detection and have yet to get it working despite several attempts running through various troubleshooting steps on the company's web site. The app itself is easy to use and pretty straightforward though it does have several minor issues/glitches, but motion detection simply does not work for the item I received.  I reached out to support but have yet to hear back nearly two weeks later, so I'd definitely recommend something else (I like the Blink cameras I already have are great although the features are lacking in comparison, but those actually work).
title: Solid picture quality and features but motion detection doesn't work and no support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brianna Duncan
content: Amazing camera and I can’t believe it’s so cheap!  Love the Pan action and the setup was a breeze. Works great and so far I haven’t had any security concerns but I always update the firmware every time for that reason. Love it and highly recommend
title: Amazing!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gina H
content: Great camera to keep an eye on my dogs love the quality and ease of set up . Can't beat it for the price. 5 star product ! Love that it goes 360 and has 2 way sound love it!
title: 5 star product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Angie Farley
content: picture quality is just OK. The microphone has never worked right. It is just a muffled sound.
title: expected more from other reviews

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Maur Az
content: Facil conexion. Pero de repente hay que hacerle un power cycle a la cam (resetear) pero si uno esta en otro pais, como lo hace??? Esta camara no es confiable porque no es estable!
title: Wyze cam.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lloyd Hendricks
content: This camera works great.  I can find my dog no matter where he is napping. The wyze app is simple to use and free.  Notifications are easy to manage and it is easy to expand with more cameras if you want.  Very happy with my purchase.
title: Good camera and a good company

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brad M.
content: This is a fantastic camera for the price. The image quality is great and the app is jam packed with features. This camera will not work on 5ghz wifi so keep that in mind. Really the only drawback in my opinion. Also these are not wireless so you must have a power source nearby.
title: Great camera for the price, packed with features!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jaysus
content: Got this cam to keep an eye on my pups while we’re out of the house. I wish it recorded events longer than 12 seconds, but that’s a price upgrade. I got an SD card to go with it, but not sure how necessary it is. It doesn’t throw treats to my dogs, but I don’t need it to. I can listen in and can talk with the dogs if I have to. Works for what I wanted it for.
title: Great pet cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Moyn
content: its excellent for indoor use. I am changing my rating because one cam everyday resets its viewing  position automatically away from where I have it set to view and it doesn't recode anything because of this problem, other one does it some times, its very inconvenience
title: quality for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BG_NorCal
content: Security cameras sure have come a long way in the past 20 years! The picture quality is outstanding! Great in situations where the old cameras could not handle lighting contrast and night vision is incredible. Easy to set-up and the auto rotating base is smooth and extreemely quiet. Will be buying more!
title: Easy setup and Great Picture Quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Leonora Morris
content: I bought these to use in my daycare on recommendation from one of my tech parents. It's connected to my phone and tablet. See easy to see and use. The parent said this company is high quality.  I have turned them on from 50 miles away to show someone how good they were.
title: Highly Recommend.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Emarv
content: Only the first day. Super ez to set up.. i honestly do know how people had trouble.. i set it up out the box in under 4min. The tech is bad at all.. the pic quality is pretty good.. could be a tad bit better.. so far so good.. great degree of rotation!
title: so far so good!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R. Moore
content: I gave up my nest cam for this after I saw all the amazing options that had for a fraction of the price. Furthermore The nest nterface was so difficult to use. And with a new firmware update there is facial recognition which is awesome. This is the best value in surveillance cams.
title: Unreal performance for its price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Repking16
content: This product is hard to set up. It took me about 45 min and a call to the company to set it up the first time. Worked until we took it with us out of town and tried to set up and never again has my phone been able to connect to the scan part of the setup. Have it for almost a year now but have only been able to use it maybe mths before it wouldn't connect anymore. Tried setting it up here recently and it just doesn't connect. Looking into another brand for new cameras.
title: Hard setup

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: awesomeO
content: Got this and was really surprised by how well this worked. Pros: - Great features for the price point - Overall works great. Cons: - SD and HD quality almost look same (SD quality is pretty good). Overall, highly recommended.
title: Amazing value for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ianm
content: Worked for the frost couple days okay and then the motion tracking must have died. Camera spends most of the time with its back to me or staring at the wall.
title: I guess you get what you pay for

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: D. A.
content: I have been using this for a few months now and I absolutely love it.  I use it to keep track of my dog while I'm at work.  It gives you free cloud storage for short 12-second clips based on certain alerts you set (sound, motion, person).  I love that the camera can pan, tilt and zoom!  This camera was a great deal and I can't believe you get all these features for the price.  Stop researching and buy this one now!
