product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: NeroMaverick
content: It tracks my movement and moves along with me fairly well... However it can be a bit jerky when doing this, also it appears to be a step behind me. I worry sometimes that if someone were to break it, it'll track where they've been, as opposed to where they currently are. That being said, it's not as bad as i may make it sound, and for the price, does everything I expect it to do and more.
title: Works Great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Janneth
content: it started working fine until after 1 month all of the sudden it stopped working
title: I don't recommended it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: wanda
content: Unfortunate for me. It did not work. It would not follow movement as it should. It worked fine on pan, but that’s not what I wanted. The 2nd one was the same. I returned them both.
title: Will not follow through.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chip
content: Happy with this cam out side a few a few random disconnects. Has a very clear view. Very reliable in recording motion. Just wish it had a bit more control over motion detection  zone. I have a flag near my front porch and it is difficult to exclude it from the detection zone.
title: Happy with this cam out side a few a few ...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sean
content: Edit update: Lowering my rating due to the fact the camera constantly resets its settings, basically making this thing useless.  SD card still doesn't work and help from the company is a week late response of "try to recent it" The SD card did not work and the settings constantly have to be redone.  After contacting them they provided no help.
title: Cheap camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Daniel G
content: I have been using this camera for quite sometime and decided to give it a review. I could not be any happier with the price I pay and the features I get. I set it up inside my house in order to make sure no one comes in uninvited and also to keep an eye on my dogs. The camera has a 360 degrees horizontal coverage and 180 vertical, simple to use and easy to install. From time to time Wyze updates the firmware and there has been one time that it probably had a bug but I dealt with it and I am happy.
title: Best Wi-Fi camera for your buck

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Vargas
content: I’m extremely satisfied with my purchase. I’ve had the camera for at least 7 months. And I got no issues with it at all. Good quality, on point with motion detection, just great! If I need to get more, this is my option number one. No doubt
title: Great night vision

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: NAS Tampa
content: We have a full security system in our store that has some gaps in coverage and is also very difficult to connect to remotely.  Found these Wyze cans and figured for the price it was worth trying out as a camera to monitor my office.  It was simple to setup and provides video that is better quality than my security system.  I've purchased addition units to fill other security needs. Also going to put one in at home so I can demo one of our products that is remotely controllable so customers can see it work in realtime. If I upgraded my security system to the quality of these cams it would cost me $100s to 1,100s.
title: Great inexpensive camera as good as $200 Nest cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ruth O.
content: The 2 way audio doesn't work.  I have ordered a replacement,  let's see how it goes.  :(  .  The audio stopped working on the second one I received.  NEVER WILL ORDER A WYZE CAMERA AGAIN!!!! Piece  of crap.
title: Such a bad product!!!!!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kari Seeley
content: Best purchase ever.  I had a furbo and they started to charge a monthly fee for notifications after charging a huge fee for the initial purchase! I was devastated and hurt to say the least, I wanted to be able to keep an eye on my pup and ensure she was safe at all times.  This allows me to do just that, at a fraction of the cost, with no monthly fees.  Best. Purchase. Ever
title: Wyze. All. The. Way!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: giggles
content: Let me say that I bought 2 of these cameras and one inside the house works great. Not any issues. I put one outside and bought the cover that goes over it for protection and several months later it just stopped working. It connects and then just turns off. I’m very disappointed bc I really need a camera outside that can hook up to my phone so I can watch my property.
title: Not working less then a year

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wayne H.
content: I’ve. Ow had this for two months and up until now it has been doing very well. Unfortunately the night vision has completely failed. Doubly unfortunate that I am outside of the return window so, I can’t even send it back. Will attempt to contact the seller for some form of compensation. Will update post as I receive additional info. At this point I would be very suspect to purchase this product again.
title: Night vision failed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A.S. Family
content: Had a little trouble with hooking it up but tech support diagnosed the problem and we had it fixed in short order. Camera works great. Much better than my old foscam. Wyze app is straight forward and easy to use. I will buy other Wyze cams in the future.
title: Great Cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RedFox
content: I LOVE this camera! Fantastic features. I love that I can zoom in and tilt / pan. Great picture quality. The mic could be better but is works well enough. I love the app for my phone. I can use it even while I am on a call. I definitely want to buy more for my house.
title: Perfect for my needs.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shepmom2
content: Really want to love it because it has a great picture & records motion but my problem is that all of a sudden I will go to view my recordings & it will tell me there is no micro sd card in it when actually there is. No one has touched the camera & it just decides it doesn’t want to record on my card anymore. Hoping I did something wrong & it isn’t the camera itself because I really don’t want to have to send it back.
title: Says NO SD card when in fact there is one in it!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: marc
content: Had Arlo system a few years ago and never liked it. This is easier and better for 1/4 the price. Easy setup, easy operations, etc. order the 32gig ssd card so you can have an extended ability to record and review video.
title: Best value on amazon

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: UnchargedCandy
content: Still getting to know this, but it arrived safe and instantly worked with the app. Vision is definitely 9/10 in daylight through the spot in my apartment (window sill), at night I'd say 6/10, but still does the job! You can link it to one main account but it has the option to share with anyone who signs up at Wyze (my wife can connect to it through her phone.)
title: Great under $50 USD!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stephen P.
content: This is a decent product for the price, I also own blink cameras which are awesome. The downside to this product is its not true wireless. That means it needs a power source which is huge problem for most unless your using it inside and theres one close by. It connects to Wifi simply.
title: Decent product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. A. C.
content: This camera is great. Low price and no subscription fees. You can monitor on your phone from anywhere over your home WiFi. I use it to monitor my dogs. If I have to I can even talk to them. You can pan 360 degrees to look at anything, zoom in plus up and down. It also records any movement or sound when activated and sends you a notification.
title: Best money ever spent.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gaia
content: Very easy to use and it works. However I don't really want it to pan all around the room, so I bought a second one by the same company that doesn't pan and use the panning one for a different location. After using it the first day, I also bought the SD card because I am not satisfied with having only a few seconds video taped every 15 minutes.
title: Great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: fotojo44
content: Reasonably easy to set up, app works great but sometimes not easy to find what you need for some features. I have it powered through a smart recepticle and can power it up from anywhere with the app. I never have it on when at home, privacy fears. Gives me peace of mind though with the sound/movement notifications. A great product!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Al
content: MISSED A WHOLE ROBBERY. DIDNT RECORD ANYTHING. NOW A MOTORCYCLE IS STOLEN. LITERALLY RECORDED ZERO FOOTAGE. GARBAGE PRODUCT Gets stuck when looking at recorded events. Won't let me go back without either closing the app or spamming the back button.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jon Culver
content: This is the 'night vision' you can expect 😏 Please note that the IR night vision lights are ON in this pic, confirmed ON. Yes yes I questioned this also but make no mistake, IR is ON. I must leave the carport light on at night to see anything.
title: Night vision

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: K
content: I love how responsive the app is and was impressed by how clear the night vision was. A great purchase, especially considering the price. Only minor downside is my cat seems to be too small to properly set off the motion detection so far (I purchased the cam to watch her when we go out of town overnight.)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mary Ann
content: I took away one star because as of now, you cannot view live streaming online. Hopefully some day they will add that feature, because right now the camera is a close to perfect as you can get for the price. Clear pictures, great at night, and rolling cloud storage make it a winner in my house.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AcesInThePocket
content: Man, 4 stars. Good cameras. Good connectivity. Delay in starting the recording could be improved. I’ve captured some amazing videos of wildlife, as well as some folks have relations in the woods behind my house. I kept that video
title: Capture those private moments

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Patrick Barker
content: Bought this as a security camera, the motion detection on it is absolutely dismal. Adjusted all the settings but it simply fails to capture major events in the area. Save your money and buy something a little more expensive.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anthony M. Santana
content: I would love to give this 5 stars as the picture quality, motion tracking and the usability are all amazing! However, if for whatever reason you lose power, or have to unplug it, nothing saves. You have to reset the device and heaven forbid you are out of town and the power goes out, once it comes back on, you have no way of reconnecting unless you are manually there and have to scan your phone. If you can get past that, or live somewhere where that is not an issue, this is an incredible camera for the price!!!
title: Almost perfect

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: patrick j stewart
content: after a  labor intensive few minutes,  it got set up.  fortunately, or unfortunately, a friend set it up after about 20 minutes.  well, afterward, I  can see my pet dog Dudley, where ever he is and can make sure he is safe. and that's the reason I bought this camera  WORTH IT FOR WHAT EVER RRASON YOU NEED IT11
title: know what youre doing

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Aly
content: The only negative is when I am speaking to the camera, the sound quality is not the best. I sometimes got cut off, but overall I am happy with my purchase. It was very easy to set up and it was done in under 10 minutes I would say.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jim and Pam Scott

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SleepyOSU
content: The other cams don't bother my wife but she can't stand this one and this constantly unplugging it. It's also impractical to put this one outside. The covers for it make it to the night vision doesn't work. It's cool but You may be better going with the cameras that don't move
title: The fact that follows you is kind of creepy.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: George
content: I bought this to see both my backdoor and front door and loved that this camera has a tilt, zoom, and pan feature. I can scan across my whole house easily, whether from the same wifi network or away from home. The night vision is also great! For the price of the camera, I definitely recommend. It was easy to set up, always stays connected and does everything I need of it.
title: Great indoor camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Katherine
content: I've had this camera for a while now and held off on reviewing because I'm aware of the common issues that occur after months of use. This camera continues to work and has all of the features you need for home security. Wyze actually has an entire line of products you can purchase through the app and I will definitely be purchasing more of their products. I use the camera to primarily watch my dog throughout the day and it's motion detection has steadily gone down the past few weeks, but I really appreciate the Event Recording feature when it detects motion or sounds because my dog is so goofy.
title: Works Really Well

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: rufusrt
content: These small cameras do a better job than any others I've bought . User friendly, easy to set up. For the price there great cameras. The have a talk button, panning left to right, up and down, zoom, motion tracking, all on your phone. They are not 300.00 either. I bought five of them. Alerts you by phone when motion is detected. They have memory chips also. So you don't need cloud. I highly recommend these. I keep an eye on my home while i'm at work. Wyze Cameras.
title: Great camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Blake Knudson
content: Ordered the wyze starter kit last week and loved all the other products so I got this too. Honestly all of their products are amazing products and especially for their prices. Camera quality isn’t the best but it’s a lot better than you’d expect for a $30 camera.  It works brilliantly and the cat still can’t figure out what exactly it is.
title: Amazing product for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ariana
content: So disappointed, not only does my camera not turn but you can’t even see my kids at night even with night mode on. I really was looking forward to getting this camera because I have 3 friends who have it and it’s exceptional but in my case I do not know what happened, how do I reach out and get a new one and get my money back??
title: Faulty camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dawn
content: This camera is great when it works, but more often than not, when I check the app, it won't connect. I've tried closing and restarting the app, closing and restarting the camera. Nothing helps. This morning I've tried checking it 15 time in the last two hours, only 1 time did I get an actual view from the camera for a millisecond before it disconnected again. This makes it pretty useless for what I bought it for, which was to monitor my dog with a broken leg, while I'm at work.
title: Great when it connects!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: James F.
content: The only downside is it likes to lock onto my TV and not move from there when it should be scanning and panning. The software is simple but could use a fast forward feature. Other than that it's a great camera for the price.
title: Don't point it at the television

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: B. Leroux
content: Package did not come with a power adapter as it stated it should. I ended up using an old 2A tablet charger as I didn't feel like returning. The setup is a breeze and the camera quality is great. No issues connecting to the live view from on wifi network and away from home. Rotating the from a remote location camera works great. The motion detection is not working for me quite yet. Still need to play around a little and might have to read the manual.
title: Great for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kylie Hall
content: My 8 month old kitten is rambunctious, so being able to monitor him while I’m away gives me peace of mind. Fantastic 360 rotation so I can see across my living room. Easily take still shots, record videos, and move the camera around. Ended up purchasing one for a friend who had a baby!
title: Perfect kitten cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anthony
content: LOVE this little thing. The angle plus the pan and tilt features are amazing. The night vision is spectacular. I was doubting it at first but no, it’s amazing. Love that it’s integrated with IFTTT and Alexa. I’ve currently got my camera to switch on once my Nest sees no one is home and it works great.
title: Amazing.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kandace K
content: This little camera has definitely exceeded our expectations.. You can't beat the price for what you get! We got it to watch our pup while we are at work.. and really it doubles as a security camera. Love that you can set it up to get notifications any time there is movement or even sound and that it records the events without having to get a memory card. Definitely recommend!!
title: Exceeded Expectations

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Elissa Walls
content: So I order this camera for inside my house, because a friend of mine has this brand. I've got to say I'm not real impressed. It won't stay connected, the app doesn't always work and so far I have not gotten to use it fully because of this. I have two other static cameras that I am installing hopefully they work better but so far I'm not very impressed.
title: Not so impressed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Terry Kaplan
content: This product was not reliable I purchased another and will be returning
title: Not Wyze

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: L Chang
content: Setup was simple following the quick instruction that came with the package.  Just had to make sure the mobile phone is connected to 2.4 GHz band.  The app asked to do the camera firmware update immediately after setup.  The picture quality is very good for camera at this price range.  However the zoom is digital zoom, not mechanical zoom.
title: Easy Setup and clean look

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kristi eiswerth
content: Very good value for the price and I ordered eight of these cameras. At first they gave push notifications to my phone but then they updated the software and it no longer gives me notifications to my phone. Which I think is a downgrade rather than an upgrade
title: No notifications

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Otavol
content: I own 2 of the Wyze Cam Pan's and can not say enough good things.  Definitley an upgrade over my last camera.  Lot's of features for about $50 with the SD card.  I have them recording constantly.  I work at night so I also have them send me alerts during the night when everything should be quite.  This is very helpful because I know exactly what time something happens  so I can go to the recorded video at that exact time without having to painstakenly search the recording.  The multi part tutorial on their youtube channel is very good in decribing how the features work and how to get the most out of this camera.
title: Very Impressed.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Matt Basterson
content: Amazing quality for the price!  I put two of them in my pontoon boat because the rats were coming in at night and having a party every night.  These cams do a great job of tracking the furry fiends but even better, the movement of the cams scares the bejesus out of them.  Image quality even at night is surprisingly good.
title: Rats hate them, I love them

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Patrick Green
content: Don’t waste your time or money. These cameras will consistently disconnect or not work. No matter how many replacements the company sends you, you will spend more time trying to get the camera to connect than actually viewing the footage. Invest a little more money to get a different brand. Absolutely frustrating and extremely UNRELIABLE.
title: UNRELIABLE. Don’t waste your money.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Norman R. Olsen
content: You can't view playback after updates even when recording to a micro sd  card. Camera is useless without this function.
title: Was good before firmware updates

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Zach
content: I haven't been able to connect to my wyze pan cam since they had a security breach a few months ago and I turned it off. I've tried all of the trouble shooting options. It's not exactly useful when you can't use it at all.
title: Can't connect after data breach

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: richard vail
content: i bought 3 of these cameras about 3 weeks ago. they all were working great until yesterday.. for some reason the audio only came across like a whisper on all 3. been trying to contact tech assistance on the phone number but each time says they are helping other customers and does not allow for me to leave a message. have checked my phone thinking that may be the problem.. but all my setting are same as when it worked good sound. overall i love the camera.. great video and features.. just wish i could hear something on it..
title: great camera.. audio not that great.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Soha
content: I bought 5 or 6 Wyze cameras and got really amazing feelings about those cameras. Want to purchase some more and the most funniest thing is I can only purchase 3 cameras per times and I have to wait until when I dont' know :)) -2 stars for this silly selling marketing.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Hung Ta
content: When it works it's great and that's about 10% of the time. I'm getting constant error codes on these cameras and failures to connect. Rebooting basically does nothing. I'm constantly needing to un install and reinstall the cameras.
title: Widespread connectivity problems

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Max Hauxwell Jr.
content: Very easy to use and set up. I have several Wyze cameras in different areas around my home, and they have all been perfect for us so far. Set up is a piece of cake, and I can check on my home from anywhere at any time.
title: Amazing Little Cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mathiesha Dabarera
content: I would say the picture quality is not what I expected from Wyze. Nearby objects are very clear (within 1m) anything above that is not super clear, manageable though. I am having the LaView can about the same price, it has much clearer pictures. But no body can beat Wyze app or user interface, it is incredible and user friendly. So if you are new to this, start with Wyze
title: Okay Product, not the clearest

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Julie G
content: Very frustrating. I have low ceilings and I just can 't get this camera to ignore the ceiling fan. Even if the fan isn't in the picture, it seems to track on it and then of course, isn't faced in the direction I need.
title: Just can't get past the ceiling fan issue

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Scott C.
content: For the money, this is the best pan/tilt cam on the market as far as I'm concerned. Get an SD card so you can record continuously and avoid the 5 minute cool down gap between motion events. With that added, it's a perfect little security cam.
title: Great value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael S.
content: So far so good! Just got it yesterday, so I can't really comment on its durability, but it looks and feels like a quality product. Setup was quick and easy. Picture quality is great, audio is good. The user interface is easy to navigate. The price is amazing! I'm still shocked how inexpensive it was considering the quality and features.
title: Fantastic quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ashton
content: This camera DOES NOT work with Alexa. When you go to the Alexa app its says that an update is coming soon. Why lie and say that its compatible now then. Deceptive. The BIGGEST KNOCK on this camera is that you can only view it while you're at home on your own home wifi network. I could not view this camera when I was away from home which is the main reason for me buying this camera in the first place. I was trying to be frugal and thought this camera was a great deal but with this camera you are truly getting what you pay for. I'm returning this camera and will be getting another from a more reputable brand.
title: BUYER BEWARE!!!! CANT VIEW AWAY FROM HOME & NO ALEXA!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Craig Seabrooks
content: Got to give it to this little box! Perfect size, price and features. I bought the 4-pack when it was on sale on AMZN! Love it!!! Gave the other 3 to family. It just freaking works. Audio is cool. Used that feature while I was on a business trip to check on the house. Worked flawlessly. I will say that the instructions tell you to download the Smart Life app. Don't! Get the Wyze app and move on. It works very well.
title: Cheap, no subscription!!!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robert Borchers
content: The camera is great for the money with a few exceptions. First, the Wyze app allows configuration for times you want the camera off (called "rules in the app), not sending alerts for motion detection, etc...  they do not work.  For example, turn off the camera on weekdays at 5 pm so when my kids get home I don't record or get alerts -- does not work.  DIsable on weekends -- does not work. Second, the motion detection is set to people, but always picks up my 20 lb dog... not a deal-breaker since you can set the camera on a higher surface or focused on just a door, etc..
title: Rules do not work.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kgb
content: For the money you just can't beat this. It works perfect with the app. Quality is great. Night vision is great. Sound is even great. Auto motion tracking of movement across a room and programmable waypoints so it constantly scans around a given area. Perfect for keeping an eye on things.
title: Can't beat the quality for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Absolutely Nobody
content: I love these things. They simply work! I have never an issue with any of them (I own seven), even though I use four of them outdoors with silicon sleeves to protect them somewhat. (I do not use them in places where they could ice-up or truly get soaked with rain.)
title: It's hard to find anything wrong with this camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C J M
content: Great little inexpensive can. I love the auto tracking pan and tilt. Adjustable sensor areas keep unwanted notifications down. Good easy to use phone app. I added a IR illustrator outside fir better night vision. Happy with the cam and will add more.
title: Great auto tracking, cool cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Guy from Tucson
content: So far this camera works great.  I use it as more of a backyard wildlife cam.  I looked at trail cameras and was not pleased with their reviews.  The whole battery thing looked like a pain in the ..... I would buy this cam or the Wyze v.2 cam again in a heartbeat.  I've worked with other brands of cameras that don't measure up to this.  I will see how the long term durability goes.
title: Buy It!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: HeatherG
content: I got the camera because my neighbors were complaining about my dogs barking when I left. I am now easily able to check in on them. Overall everything works well, the quality is nice (good image, night vision image is nice as well). The app is pretty user friendly. The only feature that doesn't work is the sound detection (which kinda sucks, because that was the main reason I bought it). I was really hopping i'd get alerts when they bark and I have never gotten a notification from the camera. Even when I talk around it I don't get alerts. It also lags a little. Every time I open the app it has to connect. Otherwise it is decent for the cost.
title: Good camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gk
content: Love this camera, just got it and took literally less than 10 min to set up and would been easier if I had looked at directions. UPDATE THIS CAMERA IS TERRIBLE ABOUT RETURNING TO ITS SET POSITION, ITS USELESS MOST OF THE TIME UNLESS ITS ON PAN , DONT PUT IN ROOM WITH CEILING FAN EITHER, WILL GO CRAZY .
title: Love it will be buying more,UPDATE READ REVIEW

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BethAlicia
content: This camera is great. I purchased two of them and love them so far. Recommended them to one of my friends and my boyfriend who both purchased them and are very happy with their purchases as well. The cameras were great for when you leave your children home alone. You can randomly drop in on them and watch them and also remind them to do things that may have forgot or you need them to do.
title: Great Cameras!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: E. Debris
content: I have three of these now. They all work great, the app is solid, the picture is good. If you want a high end security system these are not for you, but it you want to keep an eye on your house / pets they are perfect and you can't beat the price. As soon as they come up with an outdoor camera I'll be getting those too.
title: Inexpensive but not cheap

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Thomas r. Richardson
content: I ordered 4 of these in July 2018.  I didn't actually using them till this year. One didn't work out of the box, but i since I had 3 more i didn't worry about it!  Ia second one stopped working A week ago!  Of course Customer Services was of no help. And I couldn’t return it.  Don't buy these!
title: Don’t buy!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jorge
content: First wyze cam ever.  I am the owner of 4 ring cameras that have always worked well.  I saw the price on the wyze cam and thought i would give it a try.  The installation of the app a and camera was very easy and i had it workin within 15 minutes.  The app is easy to navigate and storage is free on the cloud or with an sd card on the back of the device.
title: Best low priced cam.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sapphire1823
content: You can’t beat this for the price. While you won’t get the same features as with some much pricier cameras for reviewing recorded footage, these are really amazing value, especially if you just need to look at a live stream. I like how you can also rotate your he camera to view an entire room. The app can be a bit clunky in some ways, but really isn’t bad.
title: Amazing value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: hi_mynameissonny.IG
content: Failed after roughly a month of indoor use mounted above my front door. Just makes clicking noises when restarted or rebooted. Cheap camera is cheap. It happens, I just wish there was a way to send it back and receive another but they’re so low-cost that it might not be worth it to pay to send it back.
title: Failed after about a month

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ty Copper
content: Great little security camera at a very decent price. installation was pretty straightforward and easy. I've been using this a little over a year now and it works great. Just make sure you format your memory card when you put it in it's all in the instructions. I had some issues but once I formatted it seems to work great.
title: Great security camera at a great value... Definite recommend!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Colorado trout
content: I bought this camera in hopes it could be used for video calls using my smart tv as the monitor.  After hours of trial and error, I concluded this can't do what I wanted.  We were going to use this for video calls with family but I never could get it to work.
title: Didn't work for my intentions

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: animal0311
content: Definitely recommend purchasing this product! Keeps my house safe, let’s me check in on the kiddos, great sound, great picture quality. I love the ability to look around or be notified if something is moving or making noise when I’m not home. Definitely will purchase more
title: Great for home protection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A.B
content: So just got it today..I ordered it last night and received today which I thought was awesome.. picture quality not bad decent product for the price helps me keep an eye on my kids while am upstairs..... My only complain is that the video lags by few seconds... It that's fixed it would almost perfect... Overall I love it
title: Can't beat the price... Love it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Eric Knight
content: I am using this camera to help keep an eye on my mom as she is older and I want to make sure she is ok. So far the setup was easy and I like how you are notified with motion and the camera follows the object around when it records an event. So far this was a great purchase. I am going to give it a bit more time and I may consider ordering another camera if I continue to like the performance and feature set of the camera over time.
title: Works Great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kprrav
content: If this worked 100% of the time, I'd like it. But constantly i wake up in the middle of the night and i don't have any sound. If i get a notification on my phone my sound automatically shuts off until i wake back up and turn it on. Very frustrating.
title: Just no

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Colorado
content: We've had one of these mounted in our garage for a month now. It's worked flawlessly. Today I bought a second (arrived and is also working perfectly). The app works well with it too. Set up time for the second camera (including opening the box) was maybe a few minutes tops. For the price and functionality, this can't be beat.
title: Great value!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rea Solomon
content: Bought this to see if my son is sleeping. I work graveyard and if im working my son is getting away playing fortnite. He will stay playing late. Quality is good. Nite vision is good. I like ot coz it moves so i can see if the tv is on or off. So far so good.
title: Indoor camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: cdev
content: Update: Important if you have an ASUS router, you must disable Airtime Fairness in the WLAN settings ("Professional" tab) for 2.4 GHz. This fixed all my connectivity issues I mentioned below. This tip is buried somewhere in the Wyze Support page. Technical support is still spotty and not that responsive. This obscure setting really shouldn't have to be something that we have to deal with to make the Wyze camera work. --- Cool camera, waste of money. Works great for a few minutes, then connection issues render it useless. Power cycling it will restore the connection for a few minutes, it works fine, then stops working completely.
title: Minor issues to be aware of

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Donald James
content: I couldn't be happier. I was not expecting the quality of video to be as good as it is. Tracking works great. With an sd card in you can set it to continuously record and then rewind right from the app similar to best but with out subscription. For the money you can not make a better choice, not even for a lot more money
title: Great quality, great value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Terry W
content: We bought this so we could "peek in" on our grandchild when we babysit.  It is an amazing camera and when I think of all the money people spend on expensive baby monitors when they could use this, it's just silly.  My kids can also log in and view their child for peace of mind.  I can view on my iPhone or iPad.  Highly recommend.
title: Grandchild Monitor!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kelly McDaniel
content: You can not beat the price. We set this up to see what the animals are doing all day while at work and we are so happy with it I am going to get a few more I like how it can send alerts and you can see a short video of what it was with out a monthly fee
title: Great for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dan Moisiu
content: Great if you like to play around with cheap technologies....product does what it says, without fine tuning options. Again, you get what you pay for! I, for myself, like it! Still, I wouldn't put any of the cams in my bedrooms. Very strange IP protocols taking place....in the meaning your footage might be abused, mostly by China, where it is manufactured. Other than that, buy it, be careful and enjoy it!
title: Be aware

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rodolfo Alarcon
content: No enfoca bien, las imágenes no salen claras, cuando se hace acercamiento sale muy malo y no tiene buenos pixeles, ademas el lente parece no funciona bien y no responde correctamente a los movimientos que hacemos desde el telefono.
title: MAL ENFOQUE Y CALIDAD DE LA CAMARA

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael L.
content: I had lots of trouble connecting to my Wi-Fi even though I followed the directions precisely. After many attempts, it finally worked. The directions for motion detection, recording, and playback are not as clear as they could be. Overall, the camera works well and puts out a good quality picture.
title: Good for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Janel M. Flynn
content: The camera works good. Its been known to move on its own every now and then. When i move it back through the app, it moves back to where it wants on its own. But it serves its purpose. The app works well. Edit... still moves on its own. Not sure why. Kinda frustrating.kinda pointless.
title: It works kinda.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John W.
content: I rarely write reviews but I’m writing this one as a caution regarding privacy issues related to the camera’s detection settings. In short, even with the camera having detecting motion and sound off and having the schedule set to a minute in the morning (08:00-08:01), the camera still records clips throughout the day and night as soon as I pass the camera. There is no way to disable this, nor can you delete the individual clips through the (iOS) app. This is to me a huge privacy concern, since it would seem from the settings that no events should be recorded. I’m sending this camera back and hope they address these issues in a future update.
title: Records video clips even with detection turned off

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ernesto
content: Great, easy setup! Impressed even! Incredible video and pictures! I bought both the still and pan and tilt models! And I already have DLink cameras! Powered via a standard cell phone USB cord, I have one in my old Chevy truck and use an old phone charger.
title: Awesome little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dordor Yu
content: I bought one Wyze cam pan and two Wyze Cam V2, both of the cam v2 are working fine only the cam pan two way audio is not working. Email Wyze support site, they send me a new one, it is on the way. Hopefully this will be working. This is cam are not working with Alexa, also submit a request to the support. I don't know do it going to fix it?
title: Price is Right, but quality is fair, Not working with Alexa

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: David L Shuman
content: This is a really nice camera and the company is great.  Very sensitive to making great products without breaking your bank.  App is great, camera is great, features are cool and they are always working to put out more stuff.  Really really impressed with the tech and the company.
title: Great camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jenna smith
content: I love wyze products,the night visions is great, love the person detection, the only thing it needs is a mount. Great range of motion, easy to install, If wyze included a mount it would be even easier.
title: Love wyze

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Morgan Shaffer
content: This was not my first choice for a camera system. I chose momentum to start. Comparing the two... This is the best system. It is user friendly (very easy to figure out). I love how easy it is to pull up on my phone and tell at my kids (trying to sneak food in the living room). It is compatible with the Echo show which I keep on while I'm working from home. I have one in almost every room of my house. The price is great for what all is offered. LOVE IT!!
title: Love it!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Livia S.
content: This camera works great. The app is very easy to use and rarely freezes (the previous camera I had, from a different brand, would freeze all the time!) The only reason I’m not giving it 5 stars is the sound quality is not the beat. There’s a bit of a delay, about 1-2 secs, and a low static sound coming from it, but that doesn’t compromise much the overall quality of the camera, especially if your main focus is the image and ease of use. Great value for money!
title: Great value for money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Heather S.
content: I'm pretty bummed about this. The microphone does not work 2-way. I can hear what's happening in the room but every attempt to talk from my phone to the camera does not work. Little snips of sound come through but they're very random and only a fraction of a second. I've checked everything and according to the Wyze forums it's an issue with their Samsung compatibility. Second issue is it keeps telling me there's no SD card, when there is absolutely an SD card. What is the point if I can't view anything because nothing recorded? I have to pop the SD Card out and back in again, which I did last night and it started working again but this afternoon it isn't working. Overall unhappy.
title: Nope.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lenny
content: This camera is a great value for the price. The software is really easy to use and the picture quality is amazing. Honestly, I would buy the regular one next time though. The pan feature is cool, but depending on your camera placement it might not really be necessary. The Wyze staff are very active on Reddit and are always responding to complaints and comments and are very receptive to new ideas.
title: Love it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mingo
content: Setup was easy, although it seemed to have a challenge scanning the code.  But overall simply and great picture quality.  The motion sensor works great. Honestly surprised by the quality considering the cost.  Thought I'd take a chance and it was a good one. The only thing is that is drains my phone battery very quickly. Oh and I didn't find this information with the packaging but Googled it and found you can't connect to wi-fi using 5GHz, must use 2.4GHz. But overall great product for the price.
title: Pretty Darn Good for the Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: NaWest
content: It’s one of the best purchase that you could make. The app is easy and intuitive to use. It does take a while to connect to the camera each time you open the app but the picture and video is very clear. The auto detect motion and tracking works great. It’s a big advantage that you get about 7 days cloud backup without additional charges. Best deal for an indoor camera.
title: Excellent camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Susan C. Miulli
content: This camera is terrific, easy to install and operate!  We put it in my Mom's room at her assisted living facility so we could keep an eye on her.  It has really made a difference in my anxiety over her care.  The mic and speaker work very well.  Perfect product for our needs!
title: Fabulous camera for remote viewing!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Hans Lopez
content: We bought this as a cheaper alternative to some of the dedicated baby monitors that are much pricier and offer features like breathing alerts etc and we love it. The motion detection works great to let us know when he wakes up in the night and we use the Wyze app on our phones or tablet to keep a live feed on him if needed. Night vision is good and there is the ability to turn off the camera power light as well so that it doesn't bother him.
title: Great as a baby monitor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: researchonly
content: Ok, this product is supremely amazing for the price. I was skeptical from the reviews until I received my own. The apps, camera quality and functionality is honestly 10/10. What’s the catch? Audio is garbage 1/5 easily, even on a professional wireless setup. I wish I had more reasons to buy more, I enjoy spying on my dogs.
title: Don’t hesitate, this is the one. I too, was reading all these reviews

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: biggysmalz
content: This is the best  Pan & Tilt  cam ever created!  All thumbs up! So easy to control & operate. Very Highly recommended! Will buy more.  LOve the ease  of Setup!
title: Great Wyze Pan Cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: elizabeth
content: I can't for the life of me get this camera to record events. It can only record continuously and I want to know how I can get it to just record events. I am going to keep it because it does work but it doesn't actually capture anything. I got it as a pet cam and I can't scroll through hours of footage to see 5 seconds of a cat. It needs to be better.
title: This camera works BUT it doesn't seem to record!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: S. Borland
content: I don’t know if I just got a faulty unit or what, but I’ve had a terrible time with my wyze pan. I have 2 basic wyze cameras that work fine, but the pan constantly disconnects from the network and is very difficult to reconnect.
title: Nothing but trouble

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Crazy Earl
content: it's one of those get what you pay for.. is a nice camera for the money but the picture quality sounds a lot better on paper.. it does not look 1080p HD to me ever. 720p and slightly fuzzy maybe. overall it is a good camera as the zoom and tilt work great and you can see everything in the room... I just disagree with the picture quality statement.
title: The price is right

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John P. Soriano
content: Even through other phones and trouble shooting the notifications and event logs does not work. You have to scroll through hours of video just to see if something happened. A lot of people have the same issues on Wyze forums . Everything else works good but it's useless if it doesn't notify me or log any events. I guess I can just use it for time lapse.
title: Event logs and notifications doesn't work, useless!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Georgia
content: I originally liked the cameras. Easy to install and worked well. However, I’m giving it a 2 because one of the cameras stopped working after 8 months. I have been trying to get the problem solved with Wyze. After 9 days and multiple emails, and unsuccessful phone calls, a replacement was approved. I was very informed I would get an email confirmation. A week later, have yet to receive it. That is not acceptable customer service. Update. The same day I wrote this original review, I received the camera. I haven’t installed yet
title: Poor customer service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Juan C.
content: My dad has the non moving version and a customer had one at her home and both praised their cameras and now I'm one of them.  Only downside is they must be plugged in and indoor only..  for battery-outdoor cameras I have and love my Blink cameras.
title: Greatest value,  a must have!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Meg B.
content: So impressed with the value for your money! Works great. The app is super easy to use. You can turn it on and off with your phone. I use it to watch my dog when I’m out of the house and the microphone picks up her bark from rooms away
title: 10/10 would recommend

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anonymous User
content: Do not buy. Bad sound quality despite updates. Had the SD card installed. Playback suddenly gone. We had an issue with our nanny that freaked out. The video is gone!!!! I regret this purchase on so many levels. Don’t make the mistake we did. Will be returning all Wyze products.
title: Awful do not purchase.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cynthia Y
content: my camera for some reason does not retain an image, it keeps spinning when ever any movement or sound is detected, which is normal but it lands and faces the back of the camera where the wall is and I am unable to see what is being detected, trying to get a replacement or something worked out. but unable to contact anyone. disappointed since I paid for the yearly subscription.
title: not happy.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: VA Packrat
content: This is hands down the best webcam I've used.  Camera is phenomenal...app is ok, but as others have said there are other apps that are better suited if you have mulitple cameras.  I like the fact that it's Alexa enabled...can easily check in on any of the cams in the house simply by asking Alexa.  Glad I got it..I'll be getting more for outdoors monitoring as well.
title: Stop reading these reviews and just add it to your cart...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Adam G.
content: This is my first security camera and for the price, what more can you ask for? Save money by not buying from the other guys — this camera offers most of the features others charge hundreds for. I’ll absolutely be investing in several more.
title: Fantastic Value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sean F.
content: So far I am quite frustrated with the cameras I bought. They look like a great deal and worked fine for about 30 minutes. Then they lost the signal to my router which is all of three feet away. I I have tried to reconnect, but this is frustrating. If this continues, what good are they?
title: Works for all of 30 minutes

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: LeMaLi77
content: Bought this to check in on my dogs during the day. Works so much better than expected for the price. We will be getting additional cameras for other areas of the house & property to  monitor. Picture quality is amazingly clear. Very satisfied with this purchase.
title: Love it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: don't get this app
content: Quality is great Unfortunately it doesn’t reboot itself So this can is useless since I’m out of state The cable falls of It doesn’t stay in
title: Doesn’t reboot itself

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Walter S. Freeman
content: Prompt shipping, on-time arrival and as described goods. Incredible price/value.  Easy installation and better than expected WiFi range and video quality. Night viewing range is limited due to small number of IR emitters, common with pan/tilt lens gimbal integration.  Easy to add external emitters.
title: Extreme value.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CCC
content: This is my first security camera for my residence. One camera setup only at this point. We travel a bit and I like to see who might be coming and going at our house (adult children, cleaning crew, etc) when we are out of town. So far this camera has worked flawlessly for me. Great and simple features. Tremendous value for $37.
title: Great Value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CJB
content: Use it as upgrade to baby monitor.  Can now see entire room, control noise pickup, and see more clearly.  Will buy additional units for outdoor use.  Love it.  Be aware however, that unlike most baby monitors, uses wifi.
title: Perfect and improvement over existing!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: HPD
content: Every single one of my cameras (4 total) bought pans to one direction every few days by itself.  When I go in and check we find the camera pointing towards a wall and we need to reset  them all.  Very frustrating!!  Submitted a help ticket to Wyze and they were of no help!
title: Camera pans by itself!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: P. Mancini
content: I've owned a bunch of cameras over the years and this one is by far the best.  Excellent picture and sound and you can't beat the price.  Was going to subtract a star because it doesn't work consistently on my Echo Show, but decided it wasn't warranted.  If you just want to view it from your phone (I have an Android), it works great.
title: Great camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: David P. Light
content: Exceptional wireless camera for the price. My only cautionary statement is with respect to the WiFi connection. Virtually all of these cameras require using a 2G signal ONLY. My provider used to have 2G &5G. Now they only  have routers that supposedly meet the needs of products requiring 2or 5G automically. It DOES NOT always work. Intermittent signals causes a problem. Check your provider before buying any of these cameras. (Not brand specific.
title: Excellent camera WiFi connection must be 2G

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: B
content: Wyze seems to have a night vision defect for many, myself included.  On their website I see many complaining IR night vision is not working properly. In the dark, mine can not see to the end of the countertop it is placed on.  Their technical support has not been helpful though I do get emails when other users add to the page about having the same issue. Unfortunately the IR capability is very important to me so this camera was a wasted purchase.
title: IR night vision problem for many

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lori Reinhardt
content: I have purchased two of these cameras in the last 15 months. Both of them started getting error 90 message before going dead. When the first one first one died, I thought it was a fluke and just bought another. I have had the 2nd one for 3 months and its already dead. Very dissppointed.
title: Not reliable.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amelia
content: This camera is amazing! I was very unsure on what camera I wanted, I did a lot of research for best camera so I could watch my puppy while I am away but I did not want to pay a lot for it. I cannot believe how great this camera is for the price it is! This camera is a steal and soooo worth it! Great picture quality and I just love how I can watch my puppy and make sure everything is okay with him while I am away. It really gives me a peace of mind. I love how the camera will give you a notification when there is any sound or movement. I disabled the movement as it is not necessary for me. I have had this camera for almost a month and have had no issues. Highly recommend!
title: AMAZING! Purchase this camera! You will NOT regret!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Angelica Maddox
content: I kid you not, this little cam HUGE abilities.  I wish they made one for outdoors!  The app is simple to use.  You can pan, you can talk, you can listen, you can choose your type of notifications, you can play back (monthly fee), you can record.  It’s everything!
title: This is amazing!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nicke
content: I liked these cameras at first. They work well and were updated regularly.  I disliked that one of my cameras has begun have a "white screen". I can hear but can't see anything.  Limited warranty of 1 year.... starting acting up 1 month later., of course.
title: limited warranty

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Noname Norelation
content: The story behind the Wyze team is inspiring and they are achieving their goals. Amazing that such a small startup has products at this price. It’s a little bulky, wish it were smaller. Looks more like a pencil sharpener so it doesn’t really matter.
title: Good

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JRS
content: I've had blink cameras, dlink, and the Amazon cam. These wyze cams are the best bang for the buck. The motion tracker works pretty well. I mostly use these to watch my pup while at work. They will track him as he moves across the room. The SD card option, not having to pay to watch video over 24hrs old makes these cameras a great choice.
title: Best camera for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: William w.
content: So disappointed. Have a regular wyze camera and works so great, decided to get a wyze pan. Speak doesnt work, motion detection doesnt work, push notifications dont work. googled issue and same issue for tons of people.
title: Motion detection doesnt work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Geri B.
content: Don’t let the size or price of the camera fool you!  Great little camera that takes quality photos and videos.  It also picks up even the slightest sounds.  Please read up on the instructions for the camera.  A few moments invested in learning the do’s and dont’s of the camera will help you get the results you’re looking for!
title: Great little camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: matt nelson
content: Amazing camera, amazing price, amazing tech support!!!! Had an issue with firmware upgrade and the devs actually made a new update within 24 hours and personally pushed it to my device (with my consent)! I can't believe the value here. I have 3 of these cameras they are amazing. I highly recommend!!
title: Excellent camera, amazing support!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nandith N.
content: Best value for money. Great pan and tilt capabilities. Intuitive app and easy to connect it to WiFi and stream anywhere. Audio intercom capabilities are also great. We use it for when nanny is home and have been transparent with her about this existence.
title: Best Value for Money Camera that just works! Don’t look any further.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. P. Price
content: You will not find a better camera for three times the price of this one.  Big big plus, the firmware is updated regularly, this is a very big deal in the Internet of Things world. I own two. If I needed twelve I would buy them...  When they introduce a weather resistant model I will buy a couple of those too. I highly recommend this camera.
title: Teriffic product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: 50poof
content: I am really happy with my purchase. I bought it to keep an eye on my dogs while I’m at work and it works great.  Three people in my office have bought one once I showed it to them.  Easy setup and control with app.  You can speak and it works well with Alexa show.
title: See and hear when you’re not there

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Baheels
content: SD card slot/SD card stopped working first day.  May have been a formatting issue with the camera. Camera no longer recognizes the SanDisc 16GB SD Ultra card. Tried several fixes to get it to recognize the card. Apparently there are lots of complaints about this SD card problem. Installed the latest software. Some users complain that this software is the problem. Menu is not heuristic and somewhat hard to learn, as well as, confusing/complex. Was easy to connect to wifi. After messing with it a couple of hours to fix the SD card issue, I finally reformatted my SD card on my telephone and reinserted in the Wyze camera. Seemed to work. Great price.  Good for watching pets. Not sure if I would rely on it for security. Unit appears decently built. Keeping for now.
title: Inexpensive, but has problems with SD formatting/recording

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robin Ney
content: I bought this just to use with Alexa.  I can use it with the Wyse ap on my phone just fine but that is not why I bought it.  Alexa finds the device, they are both on the same network wi-fi.  Alexa is logged on to the same Wyse ap.  I have never been able to connect....just repeatedly says "camera not responding".
title: Alexa says Camera not responding.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jessica garza
content: Bought it to check on our Bunnies while away for the day. Love it, it works amazing, have had it for a few months and have not had any issues. We purchased two, when you download the app you can nickname each cam to what room they are in. It is fast and moves around great. We can use the sound/voice which also works great. Want to get some outdoor cameras now too.
title: Great product!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: krystal yankowski
content: very happy with this purchase. no yearly fee, just get an SD card which records/stores footage for a week which is all i need. App works very well, no lag time. All motion and sound events are kept on the app which is super convenient. I use this for my animals and see when people come in/leave. Will be purchasing more of these for the outside/bedrooms.
title: Great purchase

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: papthebuyer
