content: I have been using these for about a month and they work great!  The motion detection software kind of works but needs refinement to stop over correcting!  I am using them outside under overhanging roof area and they work well.
title: Great Price for a Great Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nicholas Cade Livsey
content: We use this camera as a “monitor” for our children’s playroom. I really like this camera. Especially at the price point. It was very affordable & super user friendly. Setup was quick & easy. The app is easy to navigate & use. I’m interested to see how this company evolves its current & future products. I’m impressed so far.
title: Great gadget. Great price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: The Flash
content: These are the best bang for your buck. I have ordered several of these I use them at home our business and my elderly parents house. They work really well I love that's it's a PTZ. Trust me just buy it.
title: Amazing Cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nolaninc
content: This little camera works just as good as several of the more expensive cameras that I have tryed and has zoom, tilt, Pan where’s most of the other’s don’t. Lookout Nest, Ring, this little Cam will start eating into your market share is your not careful. For the price you can’t go wrong purchasing these cam’s
title: Great little Camera for the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anonymous101
content: Camera is a little spastic. I enjoy it’s fucntionality, but it moves at the SLIGHTEST provocation and it moves too fast. The night vision is very good. When away from home and trying to turn camera on, it does not always respond and it is quite annoying. These are really my only issues, otherwise, I do love this camera.
title: Good, with some issues

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Eric G
content: I own Blink, Wyze, Arlo, and Ring (altho Ring was so bad I returned those) cams and this Wyze Cam Pan is for certain the best bang for buck out of all of them, and by a long shot. Cannot believe what I was getting for just $30. Absolutely in love with this startup, I would recommend their products to anyone and everyone.
title: Wyze is AMAZING

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: stoopingcranes
content: These replace our expensive and prone to breaking Samsung baby monitor. I could not be more pleased. Be aware it works at 2.4ghz so not sure of compatibly with new 5g routers.  I bought another I liked it so much.  The interface is smooth, the picture is good and the camera rotating  moving is excellent if not a touch laggy. This is far superior to Samsung baby monitors in every way possible.
title: Excellent device

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bboyneko
content: Very easy to use, great app, is VERY responsive for motion detection. Great cam! I am going to get another one to point indoors. I currently use one to look out of my window in Brooklyn since we have had package thieves.
title: Amazing value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Donielle Carson
content: The only inprovement I would suggest is the ability to fast forward the video so if your looking for a particular event you do not have to sit through every second of video for hours.  Other then that I love it and it's features great quality for the money.
title: Great quality for the money.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ClubOfRome
content: I ordered two and put them in separate houses. I can pull them up on my phone and check things out. I have movement alerts set so I get notifications. They are not particularly discreet, so they're not for snooping. I haven't even tried all of the functions.
title: Great value. Nice app.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Raymc
content: Works really well.  Only downside is the motion following is not real stable. It overshoots then tries to correct then overshoots make it jerk back and forth. On the good side it picks up motion and records with great picture quality. I give it a buy and especially at this price.
title: Great little camera at great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: E. Pratt
content: Bought this camera to replace Foscam cameras. This camera is just as good if not better. You can view the cameras away from the house. Night vision is good. You can move the camera around without making to much noise. Overall very pleased and will be purchasing more for our house.
title: Great Camera for Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ryan Dillman
content: bought for my aunt...helped her do initial setup which wasn't without some hiccups, but eventually it connected up. just got a text from her that she was able to check on her dog from work and talk to her and she was excited. read lots of reviews about these as great alternatives to ring and nest (both of which i have tried, the latter of which i use at my house). So far so good with this brand! Packaging was neat and tidy like apple.
title: Working great so far

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Douglas
content: once I figured out that automatic pan tilt didn't work, I disabled that feature and only use it manually. For me it does what I need it to. Just use to check on my Dog while I'm away.
title: OK product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: You have no right.
content: Works for the most part. Softwear has some bugs in it. Reached out to there help desk to see if they could be resolved. Doesnt seem to be a fix. Very laggy with medium to fast moving objects and gets very pixelated regardless of connection quality. It's ok that's about it. I have multiples they are all the same.
title: Works ok

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Heyoka78
content: Bought 2 cameras, they worked great for the first week, now they are so laggy and unresponsive that they are basically useless. Tried restarting them, and restarted modem/router. Updated them.  They are both within 10 feet of the router.  Disappointing.
title: Disappointed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rock of Ages
content: I have both stationary and panning versions of the Wyze cams. Although I think this model is an excellent value, a panning camera just draws a lot of attention to itself. Other than it's 'look at me' issues, this camera is a marvel. I also admire the software work that allows easy setup and ongoing operation.
title: Clever & Cheap. NOT Stealthy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cathleen Colbert
content: My mother is 81 years old. She lives with me and has memory and mobility problems. If I have to go to the store, I am in a panic to get home, worried that she is in trouble. Now I have three cameras around the house which allow me to check in on her and even speak to her! So much peace of mind for so little cost. Thank you!
title: Easy to set-up for a LOT of peace of mind!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Richard
content: Every time I check it, it has turned to the side, or adjusted slightly. Have the regular Wyze cameras, and they work great. I was going to return it, but I was a day outside my return window. Would not recommend
title: Not stable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lougee Fam
content: We have tried a few cameras and so far this one has been the best. The picture quality is fantastic, you can see everything going on in the neighborhood if it’s placed right. Feel much safer knowing it’s there.
title: Great picture quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: michelle89064
content: Very easy set up except for scanning the QR code . That takes some patience! I was able to set it up and then share it with my husband on his phone. Very nice picture quality and I love the tilt and rotation features. Very happy with this product!
title: Very nice camera !

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cheryl L. Barger
content: It has a great picture both day and night. I love that it pans/ scans and that you can set it up to automatically scan constantly or just when there is motion. Also it works with Alexa so if you want to see your camera on the tv just ask Alexa to show you.
title: Great picture

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Frank C.
content: I really wanted to like this security camera but it wouldn't stay connected to my wifi.  I spent 2 hours trying to make it work but all I got we're 30 seconds and then it froze.  I removed and added the camera several times to the app.  Used it on different wifi network but same issue.  So, I'm returning it.
title: Didn't work for me

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Deezy
content: Picture quality could be better but for the price it’s fine. Just a bit noisy when I’m trying to turn the camera from work the kids always catch me.  Also the camera is a bit delayed maybe my internet and when speaking through the camera a bit muffled
title: Nice cam for beginners

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Richard Rougeaux
content: Just got it today, very easy and straight forward instructions. No hassles or problems connecting things, and no special tools needed. I did buy the Wyze SD cards to lessen more issues. If you purchase the cameras, the app has other accessories for purchase at slightly cheaper prices, but I don’t know if shipping is free or not.  I’ve tested most of the features and options. All seem to work properly for the price and what I need. I can not afford a (single) $300 Security, but I can afford 3 WYZE cameras for less than $100!
title: Keeping It Tight!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chantel keith
content: This is my 2nd pan camera in 3 months one is a replacement and it stoped working 1 week after the return window closed again! This is the replacement they sent me for the original not working. And now the replacement is broken as well and I can no longer return!
title: Terrible do not buy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ambyr Kae
content: This camera is amazing and exactly what I needed! There video quality is superb, motion tracking works great, and the night vision is on point!! I have spent a lot more on security cameras that didn't work best as well as this one! American made is a huge plus too.
title: This is the best camera I have ever gotten for such a low price!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DMB93
content: For the price you can’t beat it! They are larger than my other cameras, but I  love that I can toggle it left, right, up and down! It’s not noisy & you can control the speed of the movement. GREAT CAMERA! Night vision is good too! I’ll try to update this post with pictures. I haven’t had to use tech support. So I can’t rate them.
title: I love these cameras!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TaiChi Girl
content: Easy to set up.  Worked on the first try.  Panning is smooth.  I shared access with my sister so we can check our house.  Can sense movement in the dark.  Has just a minor lag in time.  We have them all over the house now.
title: Great inexpensive camera option

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AmazonCheryl
content: It was a good idea, haven't been able to get it back online and the picture angle back to it's original state.  It sits in my foyer doing nothing.  Purchased to monitor front door to monitor my aging parent activity. Tried the youtube tutorials it doesn't help.  Compact and easy set up until you attempt to use the more advanced settings.
title: Could Be A Good Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amy
content: Worked for a few months and after, it stopped working. Mo matter what I tried (including resetting), it wouldn't turn on to work again.  Waste of money.  The other regular wyze cams still work just fine.
title: Worked for a while!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: isabella vida
content: just got it today and went to set it up. the power chord has a large end and a small end. however, both the device and the plug are set up for a large connector. and of course, support is closed for memorial day.....
title: incompatible equipment

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: lawrence garner
content: Hard to configure. Had it for three weeks almost and I still can’t get it to work with Alexa. Took me a few days to even get it hooked up to my internet. Had good picture and sound. And is really cool when it is set up.
title: Hard to set up

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Holly
content: I purchased this camera to watch my 13 year old while he was in home school.  Yes, it works well but it is not easy to hide and makes noise when you rotate it but the quality of image is awesome.  He knew it was there- so that was probably a deterrent 😃
title: Effective with great quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lori O
content: We love this camera, I bought it for my daughter, but tonight it randomly started panning in her living room. We have contacted the company because we are worried it’s been hacked. Will update when we get a response.
title: Please read review and be careful

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Heather Delgado
content: I got this product in August 2018 and it was working fine up to now. It stopped connecting to the Internet, cuts the video off after 30 seconds so you miss the real footage, the volume on the camera is very low, you have to keep resetting the camera only for it to act up again after a few days. I reached out to customer support only for them to respond only by email and it took them a few days to respond.
title: Very disappointed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JCee
content: I love the camera but it keeps losing connection to the SD card which is kind of important when you're trying to record things.
title: Great but one flaw....

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: WWLee
content: This camera and company is dependable!! Read up on them.  Super awesome! This little camera does the job! Easy to use. And I’m easily confused when it comes to electronics but this is No stress. Hope you like to hear and see everything. Becuz you will! So small you can hide it. Lol!
title: Best camera and company!! Wyze is the no joke.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Grace Grau
content: I bought this to monitor my brother following open heart surgery as he lives alone. We live in two separate states and it works great. Not only can I see him but I can speak to him remotely. We also paired it with Alexa and use it to monitor his house when he is away. Excellent for the price!! I have since bought one for my house too.
title: Great device. Highly recommend buying.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Frankie
content: I can't tell u how perfect this Lil guy is! I have the standard one but needed one that moves and of course ordered from same company bc I love that one. This one is MUST have! Pic quality it wonderful. The movement is great. Does make noises but who cares it's minimal and the price really cannot go wrong. Will be ordering a few more 🙏🤭
title: Works!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wendell
content: My brother mentioned the Wyse cam before I left for vacation. I ordered this and the basic one. They are really very good: Great video, easy to use and easy to log into. Very good software. Probably only negative is that the power cord makes them somewhat obvious but still work well.
title: Great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: User007
content: Setup was fairly straight forward (one you figure that the camera needs to see the QR code from the phone rather than the other way around =)). Camera works well and the app as well. Price is good. The movement tracking could be improved some (the camera tends to overshoot). Doesn't integrate with Wink.
title: Great value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robyn
content: This product worked well for a few months but now it won’t even stay connected for a full 24 hours without losing connection. Most of the time if it moves even an inch it will shut off automatically. If the cord moves a certain way the camera shuts down.
title: Doesn’t work anymore

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Noel S. Ruiz
content: Got one as a Christmas gift and liked it so much that I bought 3 more. Super easy to install and customer tech support is awesome. One camera wouldn’t connect after install/setup and Wyze reps helped me troubleshoot it then sent a replacement right away. The app is easy to use and switching from camera to camera is smooth. Great item!
title: Awesome security cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dale I.
content: this is a great camera and I love the motion tracking. It gets a little goofy sometimes trying to record the wall but I'd suggest getting one... you'll buy a second.
title: buy it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: techyoda
content: This replaced a samsung smart cam.  The app is easy to use and being able to rotate the camera is a great feature.  If I had a bigger place I would have ordered an additional one.  I have this covering my front door and kitchen rear sliding door and it does a good job at detecting motion and alerting me
title: Great features and value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nex Eldessil
content: Extremely good value for the price. I find myself collecting more for various rooms and locations just because of how cheep they are. Easy to use app is simple enough. I tried the nest cameras before even though they had a subscription there was a 'free' version.  They work, but it makes them basically useless for anything other than live video. I'll stick with the Wyze that costs 60% less and has even more features.
title: Great value. Could cost more and I'd still get it

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jon L
content: Works well so far and easy to use, setup but I will say the auto tracking is loud and somewhat distracting. I purchased this to monitor my dog when I'm not home. Would recommend a zoom feature and smoother tracking as it trys to compensate for movement making video capture useless
title: Works well and affordable w/ NO Subscription

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chicago Guy
content: Ours worked perfectly until a firmware upgrade basically broke it. It continues to look for Interconnect connection while it is 12 feet from the router. No reboot if your network burps or drops while you’re not home. Disappointing.
title: Worked great ... and then not.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brooks Jewett
content: Best bang for your buck! One price for the camera and the ability to receive motion alerts, unlike others who charge a subscription fee. The follow mode can be a little annoying if you are in the vicinity as it makes a fair amount of noise as it pans.
title: Great camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shelly Sparrow
content: I could not get this product to work well.  Although the picture quality is very good, it has major delays so you do not see it in real-time.  I bought this to keep an eye on my dog, but it does not work for this use.  It also periodically will alarm and I did everything I know to cut it off with no luck.  It actually said it was offline more than online and while offline, it made a horrible continuous alarm during the middle of the night and I had to disconnect it completely.  Not happy with this item.  Unfortunately waited too late to return it.
title: Dissatisfied

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jjbowersock
content: I love this cam. For this price it does it’s job well. Update: tested this outside with protection case and it has withstood extreme colds, heat, rain , and snow too. Highly recommend. Will purchase 1 more to cover back of my house.
title: Great cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: bluemanta
content: Maybe the one I got is a lemon.  Keeps on rebooting by itself at random times.  Have tried different power adapters but still no good.  The return window with Amazon is closed, so need to ask Wyze.  Pan/tilt is a nice feature if it's reliable.  The non-moving type might be better.
title: Not reliable.  Keeps rebooting randomly.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: skynet
content: Great price. Decent image quality. Pretty good software. Motion sensor is not (PIR) which results in many false motion detections based on pixle contrast changes from car headlights at night.
title: Good price. Poor motion detection (not PIR)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Angel Garcia
content: These cameras are amazing for the price! The only thing I dislike is when I speak thru the camera and I’m away from home they can’t understand me. Other than that these are great. Great quality pics and sound. I bought two for when I have my sitter over.
title: Must buy!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Hoa Thai Ly
content: Love this cam. Serves a simple purpose with perfection. The cam quality is crystal clear and vivid. Used it as an indoor cam for my house. The rotation feature enhances the wider view of the entire home. Instant notification gives me a peace of mind when away. Love it
title: High quality cam on budget !!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wriel Santos
content: Love everything. Easy to install, easy to manage. The motion detector or continuous recording feature is available so people use it however they would like it. Always accessible from anywhere. Even if the WiFi goes down, the camera reconnects to the WiFi whenever it comes back up. I have zero complains, If you're connecting the camera far from an outlet, then you will need to buy a longer cable which the company sells as well.
title: Amazing

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Philip Culver
content: These cameras are great, except for the fact that the Google home integration is completely broken right now. I'm returning these and buying cameras that work with Google home. If you are highly invested in the Google ecosystem DO NOT buy these until they fix Google assistant integration.
title: Great Cams if you DO NOT use Google Assistant

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TLVE0402
content: I love this camera! I had no idea that A camera in this price range could work so well. I have looked at much higher priced ones, but decided to give WYZE a try after a friend recommended it. (I bought it to use as a puppy cam to check in on my dog when I am not at home.) It does everything I wanted it to do and more! I had it set up and working in 5 minutes!
title: What a great camera for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Juan Rivera
content: I have two of these webcams and they have been working fine. I can view video from most somewhere as long as I have good cell coverage. I work basically at the airport and cell coverage in that area canbe a hit and miss for video. This webcam is smooth and the quality is very good. Reconnects just fine if wifi goes down. For the price how can anyone complain.
title: Very good webcam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jake J. Ballard
content: Damn, Wyze sure does pack features into this little cam for such a low price. I love it. It does everything I want it to, at a really good quality for the price. Can't recommend this camera enough for the price. Is it 4k ultra HD? No, but it gets the job done, I've had zero issues. What a great camera.
title: So good for the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John V
content: Probably one of the best indoor camera systems for the price point.  Works with both amazon and google smart hubs.  Great interface that allows you to pan and zoom the camera.  It gives the option to store locally on an micro sd  card or though the cloud.  It also has features like 2 way microphone, night vision and is compact.
title: Best bang for the buck indoor WiFi camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alijsha Boda
content: BEST CAMERA I HAVE EVER BOUGHT! So genius for the price! I love how you can pan a room 360⁰ from the app instead of me having to buy multiple cameras to mount in different corners to view the whole room. 1 camera does it all now. I love it!
title: Genius!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ryan Bentz
content: We bought this product to use with our new baby sitter for ease of mind. We initially only bought 2 and then decided we wanted to replace other older cameras with these ones so they are all the same in our house. This is where our problem comes in, Amazon will only let us purchase a total of 3 cameras and I need a total of 4. I have no issues with the cameras so far on their own as the image is great and they were very easy to install! I just need that 4th camera and cannot seem to order one. That being the reason why I only gave 4 stars.
title: Will only allow me to order 3 cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bbb
content: It's really good compared to other cameras for a similar price. Similarly priced Chinese cameras have awful apps. While the Wyze app isn't perfect, it's far better than those. The pan is great too so hahaha yaaaaaaa it's pretty dope
title: Much better than the alternatives

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: D. Plante
content: Had a little trouble getting the motion detection video recording feature to work at first - now it works great (thanks SanDisk micro SDHC card!).  Seems to be a good system.  Will provide an update if motion detection video recording doesn't work as expected, but so far so good.
title: Seems to work great so far.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Leah
content: This camera is an unbeatable value and works well for $30. The major issue for me is the inability for the camera to tilt all the way down when it is installed upside down on the ceiling so that I can see directly underneath the camera. Moving from a dome camera that can do this and then to this camera, I am suddenly finding myself not wanting this device anymore because of this. Wyze, you need to make a dome version of this camera! PLEASE!!!
title: Dome camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bruce M
content: I set up the camera and it worked great. For a little while. Then It went offline. I reset it many times and it only works a day or two. I reset everything and nothing helps. They are cheap, but still not worth it.
title: Impossible to keep working

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BaRBaRa S.
content: I like that you can store videos for free.  Fairly intuitive, although some of the movement is pretty jumpy.  I would like to be able to have it just sit still and trigger on movement without tracking.  Maybe I can but haven't figured it out yet.  I like it a lot though.
title: Very nice camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Maggie
content: Great But not really any better then the small v2, the only difference is the option to swivel around but its really not that great unless you have the perfect spot to get a view at each angle
title: Great But not really any better then the small v2

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rosa Linda
content: Best $30 bucks spent. Bought 1 for the bedroom so I can watch my son as he’s in bed. Works amazing and SOOOOO easy to set up. Bought another for the living room. Was going to mount but decided not to go through the hassle. Don’t need to. The camera reaches so many angles so mounting is not necessary. Recommend for sure.
title: Easy Set-Up

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dave G.
content: Worked ok at first. Their firmware and app have been causing me nothing but troubles would return my cameras if I could, past 30 days. Unless your a computer engineer I would not deal with this company.
title: WORKED OK AT FIRST

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Thompson
content: Welp, for the first few months it was good. Then it had these red/green lines in the image, like it was sorta out of focus. And last night it went 'offline' and I cant get it to reconnect. Dont buy this, every review saying they've heard voices(when there wasn't anyone present)in a playback is true also.
title: Lasted 6 months

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lipsett
content: I hook this up and had to leave my home to travel to help in laws. While in another state I got to monitor power outage, look for anything that might cause concern. It even detected when my motion lights went on. I was so glad I had this in place before we left. A great piece of mind
title: Great extra set of eyes

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Li-Ann Colomba-Torres
content: I love this camera!!! I bought this camera to keep an eye on our pup when we’re out at work. It is very easy to set up and easy to use from your phone (wyze app). The speaker and sound are very good. The picture is also a great quality and you can see very clearly. I am very pleased with this device and would definitely recommend it! Especially when it’s less than $40!
title: Love it!!! Must buy!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SM
content: Follow up review. Firmware update screwed up my camera. Got with customer service and they tried to troubleshoot the issue. It didn’t work so they sent a replacement one to me, which was awesome. So cool of them.
title: Great Customer Service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rachid
content: This is my second Wyze Pan. The first one is fine, the second one is defective. The recording, motion detection and motion tracking do not work which makes this device useless. I just hope the problem is with this specific camera. The customer service takes 1-3 days to respond, no live assistance.
title: Does not work!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jerry Steele
content: Awesome camera. I brought it for the use of my office and man let me tell you. I love it. Great for seeing at night. You can use the app to change angles and zoom in and out. It has two way talk functions. It is very clear and beautiful video whe. Watching it. I highly recommend it to anyone.
title: Awesome camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jordan R Mascoe
content: Absolute piece of junk. It works great all the way up until it’s 2am and your baby is crying but you don’t know why because the camera decided it is “offline error whatever” and nothing you do can fix it. So if you will actually be dependent on a camera for anything, do yourself a favor and get a different one. We will be in the morning you can bet.
title: Goes “Offline” Randomly and Nothing can Fix It

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joung R. Cook
content: I expect to pay a several hundred dollars for such features. Everything worked as advertised. Simple to set up. Excellent video quality. But audio recording was good (if it was not panning) but projection through device sucked. Pan motion is noisy and even worse on recording. Recording while panning is terrible. Even with terrible audio, this is an excellent buy. I bought two.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Power T
content: I'm not using my cam for internal monitoring, but want to monitor the front entrance of my house.  I'm using a small 4GB micro SD card.  You'll need this if you want to record about 9 hrs of continuous video. I have it on the front widow sill (inside my house).  When sun is not shining on the camera, photo and videos are clear.  When you try to zoom in on an object, there is pixelation.  Someone standing 10 ft from the camera (through the window) can be recognized, 15 - 20 ft, no way. When sun shines on the camera, you get a ring reflection (sun shines on the window and reflects light and camera picks up the reflection).  Night time, turning night vision on will also reflect on the window making viewing not visible.  Notification when motion detection didn't work for me until Wyze support informed me that I needed to use an app from the apple store called IFTT.  It basically has you connect to an API interface to your cam. It's like when use use a 3rd party app to connect to Amazon's Alexa enabled devices; e.g. plug to control a light.  IFTT (if that, then this) has prebuilt macros and you tell it to do something (e.g. text you) when the cam is triggered (motion detection).  Why can't Wyze do this without a 3rd party app. NetVue came can do this.  Odd. In any case, I'm limited to 100 notifications a month (unless, I'm presuming I pay for additional notifications using IFTT).  Notifications were being triggered and I was getting text whenever motion was detected.  I noticed notifications were not consistent. I've walked in front of the cam several different days and it didn't notify me.  Keep this in mind.  Overall, Wzye cam is easy to set up and use. For internal monitoring, I'm sure you won't have sun reflection problems, and motion detection problems or night vision issues. Using for my specific needs, it's a little flawed.  I wish the text notification was built into Wyze app.  Perhaps a s/w upgrade will fix this.  Not perfect, but decent for $ 35.  I do like the 360 rotation and up and down mobility of the lens.  I hope they improved the notification software as it is good, but not great. Lastly, if a notification occurs, it does record a segment of the video onto the micro SD card.  You use the mention to look at Notifications and can replay the snippet.
title: Good Cam with a few flaw, worth $ 35

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brock A. Barnes
content: Just installed two new Wyze pan/tilt cameras and the audio on all of my iOS devices are practically non existent. Apparently it is quite a common problem with this camera. I’m going to wait a few more days and see if audio is any better on my incoming Echo Show 5. If not... I’ll return those units (as defective) not for replacements but for refunds.
title: Can ya hear me now? Nope! Still can’t.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Fentonius
content: Hi have both arlo and nest, this product is far superior! The motorized tracking is amazing, and is really intimidating to any unwelcome parties! Sound recordings don't seem to be that good. The app is good, but no email notifications and no PC review. Once they have that solved, honestly arlo and those guys are out with this one
title: Much better than Arlo and Nest

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ed C
content: This camera is an inexpensive way to monitor my home while traveling. It has a good quality picture and great motion detection that follows the subject once detected. I would recommend subscribing to their special features that send notifications to your phone and records video to a cloud in case the camera is taken.
title: Great Camera With Great Features

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mickey Wondrland
content: Love this camera. It was The Dog foster parents from the Rescue we just adopted told us they had one. It was easy to use, great price and it works so good! We can keep an eye on our baby Pitbull when we leave for dinner or grocery shopping. We can talk to her so she feels we're around. Love this product!
title: Amazing Product and Great Price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Movie Buff
content: I had previously owned CCTV Camera & DVR system but the wires for the cameras and all the cords became an issue after moving to a new place. This product works the same with less wiring and accessible from your phone or computer. Gives some peace of mind.
title: Great to have around to keep an eye on your vehicles and property

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: K. Hiller
content: We bought this for a vacation home of which we are not permanent residents.  It gives us peace of mind knowing we can view the home to make sure all is ok with it.  The hook up was easy, but we have it sitting right next to the internet router,so I can't predict how it would do if it was placed further away.
title: The viewable area is greater than most cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: FR
content: I have three of the small ones and for the most part they work OK but this not an upgrade as far as reliability is concerned.  This buffers more and I have had to re-boot it at least 4 times in the last week.
title: Not as good as the cubes

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TwinMom
content: Great quality camera.  You can set certain hours for the motion detecting feature.  It is sensitive...we have ours set in a window, to view outside, and it has gone off a few times from a fly landing on the window screen.  Picture quality is great!  Very happy!
title: Good picture quality, and great camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: b-radc
content: Works pretty well, faster response than other cameras. Good picture, easy to use.
title: Great inexpensive camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Z476182
content: Easy to setup. Motion tracking is a great feature. Returns to specified view after following motion. Motion bracket is a nice feature. Time lapse is fun to use. Great video quality. Be advised does not include mounting hardware. I was able to use my nest mount. Really like how the pan tilt zoom can be manipulated from the full screen view. Very highly recommend. 6 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
title: Great camera! Highly recommend!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: gina m angeli
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. This camera is just overall one of the best cameras we've ever had. It's way better than the Amazon Cam and is half the price!! We had a little trouble with the motion detection but it works great after a day!! Especially for the price, it's very worth it. It's competitor nest just has a better app and build quality but the picture quality is unbelievable for 30 dollars!
title: AMAZING CAMERA

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bas875
content: Unboxed the camera and downloaded the app.  Very easy setup, follow easy instructions, with audible confirmations.  Finds the camera and adds it to the wifi network. Panning the camera was actually faster than expected.  The tilt function works great also.  Configured it with Alexa and was able to see it on my echo show.
title: Great camera.  Great price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A. M. Breen
content: I love everything Wyze makes and I’m an early user. This camera worked fine for about 3 months and I’d have given it 5 stars at the start. It was easy to set up. Has great picture quality. Moves/pans easily, but now it’s just not working. Very surprising for a Wyze product. I’ll have to call the company to see what’s going on.
title: Wyze pan cam is great, until it isn’t

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shawn A.
content: Great price around $30-40, takes less than 5minutes to set up to plug into your wall, download app, and pair them together. Tip: when pointing camera at your phone to pair and it says it was successful don't click any buttons it is still processing. Very satisfied.  Mine is in a window and it points toward the road that is 200feet away and I can see the cars well. You can zoom in and rotate left and right while away from the house using your app!
title: Impressed!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Patricia Gastineau
content: They work very well, you can view recorded activity through the app. They work with Alexa for live interaction. They have SD card slots. They are capable of tagging and following motion. I have several types of camera but these are by far the best. Once they tweak things a little more they will be awesome. They are also developing a bridge and light bulbs to turn on lights when motion is detected.
title: These are awesome!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ladywestcott
content: I love this product! I’m able to see my entire great room, which shows both my front and rear door using the cameras ability to scan 360 span. I elected to install an SD card and it has been perfect! I definitely recommend this product!
title: I very much recommend this Wyze Cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BOND
content: Pros + Excellent Quality Images for the Price + Great App Setup + Great Customer Support Cons + Many False Positives Each Day which is difficult to control with any motion alarm system + Update July 15, 2019:  Camera Needs Reset and Setup Every 6-12 Months, Took 1 Star Off from 5 Stars
title: Great Design and Super Quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Wren McMains
content: Indoors it's perfect ... more useful than the Wyze Cube Camera.  But what I really liked was that the add-on silicone cover and mounting bracket allowed me to mount it outdoors (assuming I could get power to it via a USB cable).
title: I really like this camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amanda O.
content: I really love this camera for the price! Picture quality is really good day and night. I have 4 dogs so it does go off frequently for barking but, hey that's why I bought it. I'd be concerned if it didnt. While in the house it is slightly noisy considering because it does follow motion so you can hear it moving around. I added double sided tape to the bottom because of how often is pans the room it would move itself around and get stuck facing my entertainment center. Easy fix. I'd buy again.
title: Good for price, slightly noisy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Felix Felicis
content: I have used 2 different device screens. I EVEN printed the QR code out on a sheet of paper. But no, just stays stuck saying "Ready to Connect". Clearly not. This is my first Wyze cam. Thank goodness I didn't buy 6 at once. I am not impressed with their set-up. I'm convinced my camera is broken or the software is faulty. Also, why do we have to manually write our networks SSID? I've seen other apps bridge my phone's network information easily. I was soooooo excited about this. I'm really bumped.
title: Wyze Cam Pan won't scan QR code, just stays stuck saying "Ready to connect"

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Philip Vang
content: It alerts to everything and alert late. It also doesnt record at the right times. Sometimes it record and sometimes it just sits there doing nothing. I thought it would be better.
title: ok

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Pirumyan
content: This is a great IP camera for the money. It was one of the easiest Camars I ever installed. The picture quality is good and the voice quality is OK. Long delay win talking via the two weigh intercom. They’re pan and tilt works good and the  camera captures  usable video in the dark. The app is easy to use and works good.
title: Best for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: LzardGutz
content: I love this cam. I use it to make sure my cats aren’t partying while I’m at work. They’re always wired when I come home and come to find out, they’ve been sleeping for 8 hrs! Hopefully they’ll get a job soon.
title: Great to spy on my cats from work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Seubanks
content: Really like this camera. The only problem I have is it won’t let me look at the recording of events in the playback. It does play something I record and it plays things under events, but not on the timeline playback
title: Good but wish it worked better on playback

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CE
content: I bought this so I could check on our fur kids during the day. It works perfectly and I have peace of mind being able to see how they are. I realize a lot more now how restless they get and have started going home from work a few more times to put them out.
title: Puppy cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Adiel
content: Better integration with Google Assistant would have been great. Bit of a lag sometimes due to cloud (normal in ALL cloud home automation kit) and cannot view in google fit as one has to cast it to a screen via Google Assistant.
title: Value for money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amber
content: I loved this at first, but then something happened and it doesn't seem to work anymore after about 2-3 weeks of working just fine. I'm not sure what to do because I've reset it and unplugged it, tried a new network... If anyone has advice, or if it's defective, let me know! Thanks!
title: Worked for a few weeks ...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CleanGuy
content: Turning left/right is fine, the zoom is not really a zoom. I was thinking optical zoom, but this is more like digital zoom. other than that, I use it outside and it holds up well
title: works good, great price,zoom needs work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: NFC
content: I’m very surprised at how easy this unit was to setup. It only took about 10 to 15 minutes (I’m not good with technology yet) The features are excellent. I was surprised because of the price $38. I would definitely recommend this unit to anyone.
title: Great quality, features for the price !! A should buy !

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Regina D.
content: Very disappointed in this camera. I purchased to keep an eye on my elderly mom.  I purchased over 2 months ago, easily installed in kitchen and I have only successfully viewed from my iPhone maybe 5 times when checking every day. It constantly gives me wants me to power cycle the camera. No other issues with the internet so this is all camera. Picture and night vision is good, but it is not a reliable camera. Guess I got whatI paid for.
title: Disappointing

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Meph2u
content: Easy to install, good picture quality, integrations for home automation, the whole package at a great price.  Was stunned to find out I can't view the picture on a PC (without Android emulation).  Hope they will fix this soon.
title: Would be ***** but no way to view camera on a PC

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alex M
content: It was pretty easy to set up and picture is clear. I didn’t realize it was not wireless but it’s ok for indoor camera. I’ll look into something for outdoors but I’m happy with this so far.
title: Great,so far, for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Casey B
content: This is one of the best wifi cameras I have used.  They are super simple to use, have several useful functions and crystal clear video. I now have replaced all 12 cameras at home and looking to do the same at work.
title: You need this...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gunpowder & Lead
content: The camera works well.  The app is a bit clumsy/buggy during setup.  The on-screen  keyboard disappeared after I checked the email for the 5-digit setup code.  There is no Windows 10 app.
title: The camera works well.  The app needs work.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MN_Bronte
content: I love this camera - it's easy to use and the night vision is top notch. However, I have noticed that sometimes at night, the camera seems to do some kind of update or something. It turns on and moves a little on its own. When I hear that, I usually pull up the app on my phone to see if I can see what's happening, but everything looks normal. Just...eerie.
title: This camera works well! But...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: *SH
content: I've tried several different brand names and this is by far the best one. I bought this camera because of the two way audio function and I was not disappointed. Crystal clear picture and audio. Definitely a bargain for the price. No complaints. I will be purchasing Wyze cameras from now on.
title: Best Wifi Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jbroham
content: Good system but it only records in 12 second clips. You have to pay to get more. But much better than Kuna; you have to pay or the image is lost within one minuet and you can't get it back.
title: You'r out door life in 12 second clips.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: yoni leal
content: I love this camera! Great quality. My husband and I are always outside in the evenings and I have always worried about the kids and this has been the perfect solution to check in on them! Now we use it to keep and eye on the dogs when we aren’t home!
title: Would recommend 100%

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Larry J.
content: I’ve had it for a day and already I’m having issues connecting the camera from work. So it’s a nice toy, so I wouldn’t count on it for serious security.
title: Easy to set up, but has issues connecting  reliably

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brianna Hogan
content: I have used this product for a couple of months and at first, I loved it because it offered everything I needed.  I put this in my daughter's room and have it on top of her dresser. I notice a couple of days ago that the metal part of the USB was bent so pushed it back up and I plugged it back in. Today I go into her room and where the USB plug is, is no longer there gone. I don't know where the rest of it is.  I have no clue why this happened.
title: broken cord

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Janet M Neville
content: Love this!  Great quality all around.  I use it for security, as well as bird-watching and watching my pets.  I intend to get more cams when my budget allows.  Have also been VERY impressed by their Customer Service - even got a pic of the person who helped me!  (NOT some call center located outside the U.S.)
title: Great product, and U.S. located Customer Service!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jesse Robert Deeter
content: Absolutely amazing!! I cannot day enough about the quality of this camera for such a great price! My only complaint is that when the WiFi disconnects, the camera does not automatically reconnect. You have to go through the setup process again. I love being able to watch my puppy while I’m at work. We actually ended up purchasing another camera for the house to see multiple locations. Definitely recommend this!
title: Excellent pet camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jeanie
content: Stopped working in 45 days very disappointed!
title: Very disappointed stopped working in 45 days

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: L.F.
content: Overall I do like this camera however it does not come with a memory card so there is additional expense, very easy to set up and user friendly. The motion detection works very good however it is extremely noisy as it moves around
title: Overall I like this camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Toby
content: I have 2 pan cameras and one stationary for several months.  Pros; clarity , pan function, motion detection, alerts. Cons - none yet. Two words; True Value.  Get yourself one of these incredible devices
title: True Value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rex Tesoro
content: This is my third Wyze cam and the quality of this third one has gone drastically down. The motion sensor is very sporadic and the latest software upgrade made the motion sensor virtually unusable. It’s two months old and called amazon technical support but the issue is still not resolved.
title: Motion sensor unusable. My third Wyze cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: eyeonthescreen
content: Wyze Cam Pan panning is marginal.  When power is lost, the camera pans to some position that is not selectable.  So rather than pointing to where it is supposed to it's pointing to nothing useful until I reposition the camera.  And until I reposition the camera, it's useless for security purposes.
title: Panning Feature is Marginal

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Linda T.
content: The camera seems to need needs resetting frequently. It will work fine for a few days and then just turn itself off and says that it needs to be resstartrd. . Good idea but product needs a lot of attention
title: Good idea but product needs a lot of attention

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chris Kost
content: I was super excited to get this after reading the reviews, but really disappointed.  Hard to connect to my wifi, keeps disconnecting, down angle is not what I expected.  Sound quality poor.  Really disappointed
title: Excitement went to major disappointment

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Hector
content: UPDATE I have had the pan cam since Dec 19 . working find had on after market power cord cam start going offline switch the power cord.update it not working any more WYZE TECH SUPPORT  NOT HELPFUL how can I return it?
title: Didn't  last a year not working

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Blake
content: Not getting any notifications despite having than enabled 😒
title: No Notifications

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: mn
content: I am not sure how many stars to give while it eas working it was ok but now after 4 monts i cany turn it on. It is not working anymore. Customer service is awesome they are sending me new cam.
title: Some problems but great company

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kristin D.
content: This is great! I use it instead of a baby monitor. Super easy to set up. Can watch on my phone or TV, no matter where I am. I can pan and zoom, and I can even talk to my kids through it, whether I’m home or not.
title: So worth the money! I would’ve paid more.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: L.
content: Love wyze cams!! I feel this one still has a couple glitches that need to be worked out, but overall, love it.  We use as a baby monitor.  It does randomly shut the camera you're looking at sometimes and will go back to the main menu.  Other then that, it works great!
title: Good camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kennet Hall
content: Tried multiple times to get this cam to connect to my netgear wifi. Never worked. I watched their youtube trouble shooting video but nothing resolved the problem. Very little info on their website to resolve the issue, I am very disappointed it looked like a great device for the price but little support for the product.
title: Not able to connect to wifi

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Teresa M. Richardson
content: I bought one of these for my interior and I love the fact it does a 360 so I can see everything with one camera. I can not believe how cheap this is too! The setup was easy, the app is user friendly!! I have no complaints other than the fact it is not desktop viewing friendly but not enough to rate it less!
title: Loooooove!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Woody
content: Turns too loud... goes into freespin twirl mode - winds up looking at the wall after spinning around...not what I wanted to look in on an elderly relative's home health aide.  I returned... With that said, the Wyze Cam (NOT THE PAN) has worked wonderfully for this purpose.  Just don't buy it on Amazon like I did - buy it from the company's website - it's $10 cheaper.
title: Not very inconspicuous

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nick deBos-Haigler
content: Great camera! Panning is great! Image is great! I love that it is so cheap but works as good as it's more expensive counter parts. Outdoor covers are available separate too!
title: Just as good as more expensive ones!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: bigbillybbs
content: I purchased this camera as an experiment to see if it’s good enough quality to monitor my fish tank when I am away . I must say the quality is really good for the price of this camera . I have the BLINK home security monitoring system and it’s 4 times more expensive then this camera and the quality is equal !
title: Awesome Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Frlnce
content: Image good in daylight, okay in dark. Does track movement, however motor to move noisy and sure if heard would be disconnected by someone there illegally, and though I set to track people often activates when light shines in area from car outside.
title: In home security cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Germaine Andino

Oh only have one issue, whenever i move the arrow, it seems to lag a little bit. So i have to click the arrow slowly.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ashton
content: This product was awesome for a few months, then all of the sudden it would not connect to our wifi. We tried everything. We even got a new router and everything and it still won’t connect. Customer service was absolutely no help at all. We can’t even get in contact with anyone. There is no number or anything. We sent a message and didn’t get a response. It has been months. Might be a good product, but for some reason ours will not work and no one is willing to help.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: este

As well, the volume is too low, no matter how high it is on my phone, yet when I'm talking into live audio to another person, I can hear a little bit but not as much as I thought it would've be comparing to other cameras I have. I really love how this camera works with all its features I hope that this company will fix this problem because in all honesty its a decent camera. I purchased this camera just to try it and hoping it would work great, so I could buy a couple more.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ted jones
content: So far a good solid product for a fair price. Only thing I wish I could use 5Ghz. it will only work on 2 ghz network.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Casey Cabler
content: Camera itself and most of the features are great.  But the audio on the camera connects to my phone like its a phone call. Meaning, my phone constantly thinks Im on a phone call, and I cant get or control any other sounds. To the point where when I get in my car, as soon as my phone connects to the car via bluetooth, it starts up a call with myself (thinking its on a call with the camera still). I have to manually kill the app to reset my volume.  Or not use any of the audio features. Seen many posts on the forum on their website, going back to June of last year, so it doesnt appear a fix is coming soon. Would hate to return this, because its a great camera otherwise.
title: Good camera, terrible audio connection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nicole P
content: I love the new person detect feature, the ability to adjust pan area, ability to adjust the sensitivity and speed. The can also has decent night vision and the speak mode works great. I also love that I can drop in to view and listen to my home without the camera showing that I’m dropping in. It has a very clear date/time mark and smooth panning and zoom in/out controls from my phone and/or computer. You can create a whole inside/outside security system that will tie together and you can switch between cameras with ease. The price is amazing for the quality this cam delivers and exceeded my expectations, so 5 stars all the way.
title: Pleasantly surprised at the quality for the price!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: samantha
content: Wayzee is the new game changer! This camera does a 360 rotation! It follows the moving object! And you have 12 sec FREE recording! Easy install and it’s very user friendly. Absolutely love this. I will Be buying more

author: Barbara F.
content: I use this camera to keep an eye on my dog and make sure everything is good. The night vision is excellent. 2/7/2020 update.  I added a SD card and now the Wyze 360 will not stop panning.  It follows me leaving the area and stays focus on the blank wall.  I've googled looking for some tips but have not been able to resolve the problem. I know I didn't need the 360 for a camera to stay focused on one area, the dog kennel, but the price was right and picture quality is great.

author: Matthew W Howard
content: I have a set of wireless cameras made by another company that are substantially more expensive.  When visiting some family and noticed that they had one of these cameras and I was very impressed by the quality of the picture quality and functions.  Soon after I purchased 2 cameras myself for inside my home, both for security and to help keep an eye on my 17 month old.  I have been very pleased with the purchase and for substantially less than my current system.
