product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Linda Rahm
content: If you want an IP camera that you can set up with a variety of IP camera viewers, this is not the camera for you.  There is no way to view on a PC without using an emulator, or flashing the camera with firmware which allows RTSP streaming and figuring out how to stream this way.  It is a neat camera, with a good picture, and wonderful if you only want to view it on your mobile device.
title: This is NOT an IP camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: infiniteMPG
content: We love the Wyze cameras so much we now have five around our home.  Love the adjustable ones like this, easy to use, app is great, and image quality is stellar.  Like the sound, too.
title: GREAT GREAT Camera!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RAMON BEJAR TORRES
content: This product is excelent. It can work for many days without any problem in the connection. However, when used with the service "IFttt", sometimes the delay between a motion event and the response in the ifttt final device can be quite higher.  But still, we are talking about a free service, so it is difficult to imagine something better. However, I think that the android app for controlling the cam should add some function to use the cam as an alarm (playing some sound and not only pushing a notification) without having to use the IFTTT service. Then, probably we would expirience less delay.
title: Very good performing monitoring cam with free service for sending videos to the Amazon cloud !

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brittney Roberts
content: I bought this to use in my daughters room. I love that I can connect it to our Amazon Echo devices and it connected easily and the video is pretty good for a small, low priced camera. The Wyze app though will not pull up the camera when I open it and constantly says it has trouble connecting. This is super frustrating seeing as I have to use my app to pan the camera and use the voice feature. So I have to re connect it every time I open the app on my phone. The sound/video is also about 5-8 seconds delayed. All in all for the price it does what we need it to do, but it would be nice if the connection problems weren’t an issue and the delay wasn’t so bad.
title: Does the job, App has conncectivity problems

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jill Varner
content: These are awesome cameras! I bought 3 for my kids rooms and it's great to be able to see them on my phone as opposed to a baby monitor. The picture quality is great and the zoom and movement of the camera is easy to use. Highly recommend.
title: Highly recommend!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: maddi
content: For a camera so inexpensive, it has a lot of perks. I just needed a small camera to view my front door and it works perfect. Clear picture, records automatically when there’s motion, and I can turn the camera from my phone if I need to see other parts of my house. I can also talk to my pets through it when I’m away!
title: Great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: EEcustomer
content: Awesome product! It is a great product to keep getting notifications about any motion or sound at your home while away. Night vision, picture quality are beyond expectations giving the camera best price/performance rating in my opinion. Alerts are a great way of becoming aware of distant event wlthin seconds.
title: Simply Awesome!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PR Whitehead
content: While Waiting for the Outside Version, a trip to the $ Store for a clear Kleenex box, Seal the top, and put in a baffled weather box and it works well, Working for over two months in Michigan Summer Storms.  Do not forget to turn off the IR LeDs for a clearer nighttime view, otherwise, the reflection of the plastic box gets in the way at night.  Have Fun!
title: Can be Converted to Outside

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Greenize
content: While I never received this order they promptly credited my account with no issues and I appreciate a company that has amazing customer service! I called my daughter and had her order me two using prime. They arrived quickly and were easy to set up and have been invaluable to me while I was away and checking in my father and roommate.  Then he became very Ill and I kept it in his room and monitored him 24/7 if I was on the other side of the house.  I am planning on buying a couple more!
title: Fantastic!!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joann li
content: Good quality and you don't need membership for storage. It can save 14 days storage in the cloud and you can restart the machine remotely. You can adjust the event triggering sensitivity depends on your need. I will definitely recommend anyone if they are looking for a good and reliable camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brennen Martin
content: This is hands down the best camera I have purchased and used, they did and amazing job making this user friendly and making sure it works flawlessly. The only motion tracking there is is that it follows where the motion is (it’s cool but the camera moves a million miles a minute) all in all it’s amazing, it takes amazing video and is easy to set up.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: C. Ramsey
content: Love these! I popped two in my dog area and they've been perfect. I inserted micro SD cards so I can watch what shenanigans my dogs were up to during the day.... Priceless!  Easy set up... I had them up and running in minutes.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sleazy E

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Angelica B.
content: We got this camera as a pet cam to keep an eye on our dogs while we're at work. The night vision only works if you have some sort of light on. Otherwise, it's just dark. It's pretty neat that it swivels around. The motion detection doesn't work for us and the audio isn't too good either, but like I said it does the job of what we need it to do.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Vicky Lewis
content: Ordered Wyze Cam Pan 1080p, Wyzw Cam 1080p HD indoor wireless Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2 wayaudio, person detection, works with Alexa and Google Assistant, plus 25ft power extension Cable for Wyze Cam, Wyze Camera Wall Mount Bracket, weatherproof360 degree indoor outdoor Mount Cover Case for WyzwCam 1080p SmartCamera and Spot Camera Anti-Sun Glare Protection.  These products came quickly and are they amazing!  They do what they are suppose to do and at a very affordable price. They are sensitive to motion that is adjustable.  Night Vision is good up close but distance a little less so.  Overall a great product.
title: Wyze Camera...a great buy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M. Renfus
content: Live in a one bedroom condo where wifi is 100 feet away, internet speed was upgraded prior to receiving the camera. Camera rarely works unless I uninstall the app and reinstall. Great picture once it finally works though.
title: Have to uninstall app multiple times a day for the camera to work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mimi S
content: Great camera & picture. SUPER easy set up. Less than 10 minutes! The audio in and out is a great feature. the pan, tilt and zoom are perfect!  I gave 4 starts since I have only used 2 days
title: Great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mr. Warner
content: This is a perfect baby cam. Only thing I wish It it would alert you when action is detected. But for the price what do you expect. This is a great baby cam and I'm very happy with it.
title: Perfect baby cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: My review 4 u
content: Great camera for the price. Will be getting more. Keep in mind it runs on WIFI. If you do not have a hotspot close by get a fully wired camera. All you need to run is the power cord. Night vision is meh but great for outside use. Very clear image even far away. Free service. Get a memory card for storage. Highly recommended
title: No issues here. Very pleased after months of use.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lyudmila Aptekarev
content: Set up the camera and was very happy with its performance. After a few months, I had a technical issue which may have been caused by my three-year-old. Exchanged a few emails with the Wyze support team and they sent me a new camera. Consumer electronics in this price range are typically sold with a buyer beware attitude. It's nice to find a company that cares about its customers. I'm impressed with the level of service I got from Wyze.
title: I recommend this product and company

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DFrazier
content: I have purchased a few different models of the Wyze cams, but I haven’t been too pleased with this model.  I have had two of this one and it’s looses connection a lot.  I have a lot of problems getting movement notifications also.  Besides that it’s just fine.
title: I haven’t been completely impressed, but not bad

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PDS
content: I wanted a good quality 1080p security camera at a reasonable price, and the Wyze Cam Pan more than fits the bill. It cost a fraction of the price of similar cameras, and the 14 day free cloud storage for motion triggered events is unbeatable - the others charge a subscription for this. Wyze are busy developing an outdoor camera, which I suspect will be just as good as this indoor version. I hope Wyze soon start selling the cameras in the UK, but for now, it is still worth the extra cost of importing one from the US. There is no official support for UK users, but the cameras work fine (this is my third!) You just need to buy a US to UK plug adapter for power adapter (or just use a UK one instead)
title: The best all-round security camera you can buy.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: shengteng, li
content: I use this camera in my family room, since i have a open floor plan, so i was able to see just about whole first floor. the picture quality are great and reasonable price too.
title: Good quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marlena D. Chairez
content: I have had the Wyze cam for about 2 years and it was the greatest buy. When we moved, I purchased the wyze Pan cam. I purchased two in October and only now got to setting them up. First one is in a forever restart mode with no hope of recovering. It worked for about an hour before it skreetched to high heaven and then pretty much died. The setup button is non responsive and it now just sits on the counter top as a paper weight. It was inexpensive but still not worth the money. I’ll stick with the basic wyze cams.
title: If you need a working camera, this isn’t it.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rachel Ward
content: This small camera is perfect! We had no problem connecting the camera although I did have a little trouble figuring out how to get set it up to receive notifications.  But it was easy once I got it set. It detects every movement and sound and sends me alerts on my phone. The only shortfall of this camera is if someone comes in, you can talk to them but the sound cuts in and out.  It may be because our internet connection is slow. All in all, it's a great camera for the price.
title: I love this camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A. Givhan
content: Picture is good. Sound is okay, but choppy. We’ve got two for different areas of the house. We use it as a “nanny cam” for our pup. Have recommended to several friends. Don’t expect to have full conversations on the two-way, but it’s enough to hear a bit and get attention.
title: Strongly recommend

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dinny
content: Wasn’t sure if investing in this little camera would be worth it, but i am glad i did. Its a great little thing, place it anywhere since you have a pan function. Image quality is really good. Still exploring the functionality but so far so good
title: Great little device

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shep Edwards
content: An incredible buy for the money and a very reliable product.  We have two of these in our home they are very useful for many different things we also like that they can be relocated anytime
title: Incredible quality for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ronn W Jorgensen
content: I like the camera to where it works good in the daytime.  It sometimes has problems getting on the phone to look at the pictures but that could be because of the internet I am using not working fast at times.  It's good in detecting motion and sound, sometimes too good but it does have a sensitively bar to adjust those settings.  Bad thing about this camera is the night vision, it is not very good unless there is other lighting in the area where your looking at. Would I buy this camera again, the answer is yes. The reason is why is because it is inexpensive and works great in the daytime.
title: Night Vision is bad

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: James E.
content: For the price it is an excellent camera.  The app is intuitive and responsive and the cameras offer a great picture.  Only knock on it is the speaker doesn't pick up audio great and the 2 way is choppy.  But for the price you can't really complain.
title: Excellent Value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Olivia
content: I use this camera to watch my dog when I'm away from the house, and it's never failed me. The picture quality is great and even at night with the lights off it works so well which I didn't expect. I like that I can pan it from the app and the sound quality is pretty good. People ask me where they can get one so they can watch their dog too!
title: Perfect Doggo Cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jesus R Casales
content: The audio is out of sync with the video. They record video separate from audio and at a variable bit rate so no fixing it in post either. Motion tracking is the worst I have ever seen. Finds motion and jumps to the motion at an extreme edge of the screen. By then it looses the target. There is no smooth tracking of motion what so ever. The worst money I have spent on a camera.
title: Do not buy this camera. Issues plaguing product for years.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: shane
content: I've replaced all my cameras with wyze, there great! The app is easy to use and the picture quality and motion detection and ability to use their sensor kits with the cameras along with the extremely cheap price makes these products a no brainier . I have a ring spot light can that I'd gladly return and replace with wyze
title: Best bang for the buck

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tom
content: I would have given it 5 stars, however the microphone pick up is too low to hear very well. This is an issue that should have the utmost attention you need to be able to hear loudly and clearly
title: Good camera, however low sound is an issue

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Olksmash
content: Amazing camera! We love this so much as a baby monitor,  superior quality over what is rated as the best baby video monitor for significantly less. the only complaint is that the sound will cut out after a few hours and have to be reloaded.
title: Awesome as a baby monitor

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jeweled33
content: So far this has been a great camera. The motion tracking is so good, but my ceiling fan  sets it off. I have not messed with it to see if there is a range you can say the motion to. Night vision is good. Sound quality is great. Awesome.range of motion!
title: This is great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DP
content: when i tried to connect to a different wifi network, where I actually planned on using the camera i could not get it to connect to the wifi. I kept getting error messages and was able to get the camera to connect and work as expected.
title: Worked fine when originally set up, but

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mike P
content: Pretty awesome camera all the way around. Pan and zoom works great. However, my microphone barely picks up sounds when trying to listen through the app. Camera must be faulty.
title: Pretty awesome

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DFL
content: Works great in day light or at night. i have one in a work shop and even with the lights out at night I can see as if the lights were on. Great notification if it detects movement.  I'm going to buy a couple of more for some other rooms.
title: great camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shelley
content: This is an awesome home video camera.  I bought it to check in on my dog while at work.  This camera has so many great features for the money.  Great night vision as well! One thing I will mention is I had a little bit of an issue connecting to my Wi-Fi as I didn't realize the connection was switching between 5GHz and 2.4GHz.  Once I logged into my router and defined them as two separate networks I logged the WYZE cam into the 2.4GHz network and have had no issues.  Thinking of buying outside cameras for my entryways.  Great buy!!!
title: Big Features Small Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jennifer
content: For this price it’s a no brainer it works awesome my bf has one and loves his too .. picture quality is great and u can talk to people through it ! It stores without a Sd card too a must have! It can tilt and rotate remotely
title: Awwww

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Yazzy
content: These cameras work fairly well - I purchased 2 cameras - they are easy to install !  I would have liked the sound quality to be a little better but overall they do the job I need and at a fairly reasonable price.
title: Easy to install !

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Harleyjan99
content: I bought this camera for Motorhome travel - specifically so I can observe my dogs as well as a thermometer.  Super easy to set up.  Images are crystal clear and I can even talk to the dogs (“Lola, no barking”). From my phone I can move the camera to get different views.  Highly recommend.
title: Great for remote monitoring

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Adam Furnier
content: No problems whatsoever with set up or pic quality. These things are a great value and have been very useful in monitoring our house. We have a few teenagers who like to sneak around and this puts the kill on all that nonsense. I would have been a dead man if my parents had this tech growing up!!
title: Great for a house full of sneaky teenagers

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Guy randomson
content: Good software. Works with echo show. Easy setup. Due to the bandwidth it does cut out every so often. So your results will vary. You will not find a better cam for double the price.
title: Works well. Good value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Fco
content: Don’t waste your money on this camera. It doesn’t work properly. It has so many glitches and it doesn’t connect properly.
title: Garbage

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Arnold
content: I dont know if I have the settings right or not, I had a problem with it always pointing to the left until I just turned the pan scan off. A few days later I found more advanced settings and was able to control the pan scanning much better, so make sure you explore all of the different settings & rule settings
title: Nice little security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ejr
content: 2-way audio did not work on either of the wyze cams I purchased. I contacted customer support after the 2nd defective wyze cam, but never received a response. sound & motion detection seemed to work fine. night vision also seemed fine.
title: bummer

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Elisa
content: Es genial,  el sensor funciona muy bien,  gira 360° como dice la descripción,  la verdad es que estoy encantada con esta marca y le he venido comprando para mi y mis familiares desde hace un año.
title: Altamente recomendable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Raymond Somo
content: I have 6 cameras  Can’t play back videos. I reset & replaced card. Still won’t record or play back. I get error ( NO VIDEOS AT THE SELECTED TIMES) Very bad quality cameras, I wasted money on six cameras. Customer support won’t reply. I’m Not happy at all
title: Can’t play back videos. Won’t record

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amy West
content: So far I really like it. The app has a lot of features. A couple of things I do not like:  no browser based option and the maximum SD card size is 32gb. Now, for the "free shipping". What BS. The camera is $29.99, so all they have done on Amazon is include shipping in the price.
title: really like it ("free shipping is BS)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: dan
content: I  have no complaints with this camera.  It works.  I have had it for a few months and it stays working, does not randomly drop from the wifi, like a number of other cameras tend to do.  Quality is very good and the app works as it should.
title: Works as advertised

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JRunner
content: I don’t receive any notifications despite enabled notification. This will render this cam useless when I’m away. I think after upgrading software. I will return camera after one week if there’s no change. Ohh, it’s working now, I’m receiving notifications.
title: No notifications. Now OK

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: dbrown
content: Being the owner of three of the non pan Wyze cams I’m quite disappointed in the pan cam. It’s always slower to connect to the app and has been buggy since day 1. Wyze did replace my pan cam but took nearly three weeks to resolve my support case and deliver the replacement. That being said the non pan versions are 5 star products all the way. If you don’t need the pan and tilt functionality so yourself a favor and stick with the regular cam.
title: Unreliable product. Buggier than non-pan version.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kristen
content: Total piece of crap. I bought 2 of these and they don’t connect to my wifi I went in their support site and found an entire forum of people who cannot connect the product at all just like me. Don’t waste your money.
title: Won’t connect for many

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Eivind Hagen
content: Not as refined as a Nest Cam, but a lot more affordable. Also, continuous recording stays local (SD card) so it won't use up all you internet bandwidth.
title: Great value!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: wsaw
content: Update 4/30/20 - After Wyze updated firmware some weeks ago, motion detection now works. Motion detection has never worked. Have update firmware whenever new ones come. Useless as a security cam, only for live view.
title: UPDATE 04/30/20  Motion detection doesn't work, avoid for this purpose.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brynwall
content: I have this mounted on my garage ceiling and I can hear it through the floor in my bathroom upstairs... It sounds like it is grinding every time it turns, and it sounds worse when I'm IN the garage... I'm not sure if I got a bad unit, but the sound comes through when recording as well..
title: So Noisy...!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nderim Bajraktari
content: It is a very good camera. I love the tracking option so you alway have an eye on your beloved ones. And the price of it is affordable. Picture quality could be improved and i cannot wait until they come out with a 4K camera
title: Very good 5⭐

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MTrain83
content: Wanted to use as a baby monitor, then security camera. The sound and motion notifications were awful. I could talk full voice and move my hand directly in front of the camera and it would pick up maybe 30% of the time. I had the sensitivity on full blast, still no detection. I would keep it for a general camera, but I needed it for a baby monitor.
title: Not good as a baby monitor. Motion and Sound Not Sensitive

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gregory W. Schultz
content: Originally was very happy, but now sd card is no longer detected. I have reinstalled it, restored recording, but then over time it happens again. Disappointed.
title: SD card stops being detected

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: lisarhr
content: Sound detection works perfectly and I can turn on and watch remotely from my phone anytime. Also films 12 second clips when detects sound. I use to spy on my dogs, so I don't need it recording movement. I would like the person detector to work, but so far I cannot get that feature.  So happy with these I now have 3 in different rooms/places.
title: Can get people detection to work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bridger
content: This is a very good camera, but it will not work with Alexa. I purchased this expecting for it to work with my fire tv stick. It doesn't. The Wyse app is not available for kindle fire either. That being written, it is a good little camera that works well on my phone. I'm just disappointed it doesn't work as advertised.
title: False advertising

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John J Knott
content: I have purchased four other various brand wifi cams over the last two years and this one is, by far, the best, no contest. It is Beautifully designed, with a flawless user interface.  You simply could not ask for a better pan/tilt wifi cam unless you wanted to spend hundreds.  The reason I bought this BTW, is because I was so impressed with their regular, stationary cam, which is also a super bargain and uses the same great user interface.
title: Amazing, especially for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lucia Castaneda
content: I bought this to keep a eye on my boys while I worked. I have had this for two months now. It is just taking space in my house. I was never able to set it up. I requested assistance and never received a call back. A million emails giving me tips on how to fix the problem but that was it. A waste of money in my opinion. Customer service is non existent and not reachable. Buy other brands that have good customer service reviews. Don’t waste your money on this!
title: Customer service never contacted me about solving my issue.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: VP2010
content: No doubt this camera has over 20k plus positive reviews. Great quality, pair with the app flawlessly at affordable price. I already bought 2 and plan to add 2 more to complete my home security cameras.
title: Excellent security camera !

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mike Sierra
content: The picture quality is amazing, but it has required a reset twice in about 6 weeks, which requires you to unplug it & plug it back in to get it connected to WiFi again.  It wasn’t our WiFi going out... if that’s what your thinking.  Even with that minor issue, really like it & am buying more of them.  The speaker isn’t great so the sound is sketchy, but what do you expect ftom a compact camera
title: Great picture & Easy to set up

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rachele
content: I have 2 Wyze cams in my home and let me tell you they are the best home security system you will ever have. AMAZING quality, GREAT price, AND it works better than I had ever expected. Better than ones you pay $100+ for. If you are looking for a home security camera and don't want to spend a butt load, this is it!
title: MUST BUY!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: iPhone in Dallas
content: I absolutely love this product. I have several now in multiple homes. You can not beat the quality and price anywhere. Very easy to set up and use. I strongly recommend for anyone looking for a cam at home.
title: A really great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Al Villamar
content: The camera has a great picture and lots of features.  It's one of the best pan video cameras for its price.  I have the stationary Wyze and Netvue pan video cameras and decided to replace the Netvue with the new Wyze Cam Pan because of all its features and price.
title: A great pan video camera that is very inexpensive

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Honest Reviewer Blonde Shopper
content: creates priceless peace of mind. picture quality and night vision are very good but not absolute best. for the money, this is a phenomenal home security system and does the job, bottomline.
title: peace of mind: priceless.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: me
content: The first pancam the sound didnt work at all Amazon sent a replacement which didnt work could not get it to recognize the sd cards tried a couple different sizes and brands no luck sad because it looked really cool and was hoping it would have  worked but no luck for me
title: Recieved 2 different broken pancams

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marco
content: My nephew knocked over one camera I had set on top my TV rack, the equipment did not fell to the floor it just went from standing vertical to laying horizontal, I set it straight again but since then the image quality went berserk, not pixelated but with odd color shifts, I own 3 cameras and just this one suffered an accident all other are wall mounted and ok so far - support suggesting flashing firmware again but hasn't worked out so far. I'll keep investigating.
title: GREAT IMAGE BUT WEAK BUILDING MATERIALS

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Howard Lee
content: It works as expected! The price and features are so great, and the community as well! Stuffs not written: * The 12 sec cloud video storage has a 5 minutes delay for before attempting another shot. So this is just a backup, you really need to buy the 32GB card for offline storage. * There is a 15 seconds delay in casting the video to Google Home/Nest ( I haven't tried Amazon Echo / Alexa yet) * The motion follow panning is not very useful yet, in an area with random moving items like plants, indoor waterfall, shadows, curtains moving from electric fan etc. The A.I. is yet to be perfect
title: A must buy!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nick Ryan
content: these cameras are very good for the price there is only one problem that I have found and that is the only record 12 seconds at a time and its really annoying getting notifications every 12 seconds.unlike my other ones I ordered from blink they will record all the way up to 1 minute.
title: Great for the price I just wish it recorded more than 12 seconds at a time

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Melinda
content: This camera is very nice and easy to use. It has a very clear picture on phone app and conversations through camera are easy with a slight lag. The night vision does not work through my closed window looking outside but works great inside.
title: Great camera for a good price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ginger
content: Easiest camera to install that I’ve ever bought. I bought this and the wyze cube. I’m thinking of buying another wyze pan to replace one of my older, bigger cameras
title: I will buy again

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: eric
content: Ive bought 4 of these already they are great. For the price and all the functions cant beat it anywhere.  The only thing I would like improvements on in the future in the audio. I cant pick up clear sound they seem to be going in and out. Other than that this product is ready I will be purchasing more in the future.
title: Great camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: S. Young
content: At its absolute best on cloudy days. Picture is pretty distorted if the sun shines directly on it. The app allows you to review, take stills, and take videos. Use a micro sd card for longer recording capabilities.
title: Great, functional security camera at a great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Delotta Brown
content: I installed this to keep an eye on my parent out of state and can easily stream the feed and pan it. Mic works too. Not for full conversations.  Can watch the feed on my chromecast using google assistant.  So awesome....be sure your change password often and keep updated
title: Pan cam. Whoa

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: D
content: This is an amazing little camera! Love how compact it is. It rotates 360* which is incredible! There are several advanced settings if you choose. Motion detection, motion tagging, sound alerts and fire/ co2 alarms. Very helpful.
title: Great camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Googalabosh
content: This is our second camera from Wyze.  We loved our first one so much, especially the price, that we decided to get the pan camera for our larger living area. I hope this company continues to grow an offer more fantastic cameras at such an affordable price.
title: Just simply awesome

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JWP
content: I had the original fixed Wyze cam, which works great, but the motion sensor feature would react to leaves blowing in the breeze. The new Pan camera advertised a new Person motion feature, which would ignore anything not recognized as a person. Well, that feature, and notifications doesn’t work. Promised firmware upgrades did not resolve the problem. I really wanted this to work well, but it doesn’t and I’m going to return it.
title: Advertised feature doesn’t work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Daren Peck
content: This is a great camera! It’s super easy to set up. It has amazing features and the price is perfect. I love the fact that if you band width is filled up you can change the definition. You have three choices. The images are clear and it has a good sound. I love the device!
title: The best camera I’ve ever used and it’s a steal!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: GBu
content: picture quality so low that I cannot identify my kids friends.  Sometimes find it difficult to tell my 11 year old daughter from my wife.  My advice, keep looking.  I'm sure there is worse but on the flip side, there has to be better.
title: Don't waste your time on this.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jomann
content: These cameras are AMAZING! SO much better in terms of functionality and performance than one I bought a couple years back for $90. The app works flawlessly, and the features are just what I need for my often naughty dog-- pan, zoom, 2 way audio. I may even buy a third or fourth to totally get rid of any blind spots in th house. Thank you Wyze!!
title: Amazing!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: I Love Gadgets!
content: I've purchased so many of these I've lost track! I have them all over my house, inside & out. They're not rated for outdoors, but if kept dry, I've never had a problem in all kinds of weather. I use them at home and on my rental properties. Excellent product with no fees/memberships!
title: Best web cam on the market, bar none!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Leanne Mitchell
content: These are so great. I got three and have them outside my home to keep things safe. They are easy to set up. Easy to use app and love the notifications.
title: Awesome way to feel safe at a great price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Button DaButterfly
content: Just arrived today love it so much I ordered another today... two way audio is great. Love the zoom and motion detector.... bought a mini so that will make 4 cams that I bought
title: I LOVE THIS

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Melissa Mullins
content: After a couple of months, the camera starting acting up. It wouldn’t turn off, it wasn’t notifying me of any sound or movement. I contacted wyze and they’re sending a replacement. EXCELLENT customer service btw.
title: Great customer support and service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ana
content: Control of the camera is easy, the two way talking is cool. I can talk to my cat. For the price the quality is actually not bad at all. It’s a little slow on detecting something/someone, but once it notices something it does follow. I don’t have experience or money to put behind a whole security system that requires wiring. Just plug it in (needs WiFi connection) and bam u got surveillance
title: Bang 4 ur buck

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ed L
content: Great camera and a very reasonable price. I picked up an enclosure and have mine mounted outside. Use an SD card for continuous recording. I love wyze cameras and this makes the 5th one I've purchased.
title: Highly recommended. Great functionality and price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Scott Autry
content: Absolutely love these camera’s. We set them up around the house so my wife and I could leave our teenage children at home to have a date night here and there and they work fantastic!  I love how you can talk thru them.  Would recommend these to anyone just like they were recommended to us.  I would suggest paying the extra money for the rotating one.  We got 2 that didn’t and 1 that did and for the price difference it is worth it but, all are great.
title: One of the best purchases I have made!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ISellYou
content: Currently not using it due to multiple connectivity issues. It always kept disconnecting and the sound quality was very poor. Speaking through the cam was pretty pointless because it comes through very choppy. No use talking through it. Phone app always trying to connect. Ultimately ended up as a paperweight.
title: Pretty good for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R. Bobrowski
content: You can't beat this camera for the price. Detects motion, records to an SD card, facial tracking, person recognition, and more. Even works with the Echo show to view camera. Best camera for under $30. Panand zoom.
title: Great home security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kirsten Morley
content: Everything is superb. Night vision works great. Motion detection works. It even notifies you when the smoke detector goes off. The one thing I find odd is that the two way talk is a little off with timing. Other than that the camera is perfect and at a great price!!
title: Better than I expected!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Andre Cáceres
content: I really like this camera, is small, fast, has decent video quality and above all it's very precise when it comes to detecting sounds/movements. I particularly love receiving notifications, specially of movement, because after each mild heart attack (could this be an intruder alert?) i can actually see my pets playing in video. Also allows to connect several phones to the system and the app is simple yet efficient.
title: Works better than described

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CJ DoWerk
content: Purchased for my daughter who's in her 1st year of college in another state. She loves it! Perfect to keep an eye on her room while away at class. So far no complaints from her about it.
title: She LOVE'S it!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shanly H.
content: These cameras are not secure at all. I have two of these and use one of the cameras as a baby monitor. I keep the camera pointed at my baby’s crib at all times. Twice now I have found the cameras pointed in different directions than the place I always have them pointed. My boyfriend told me that he has seen them move and thought it was me playing with them, but it was not. I see other reviews on here about security issues. I would avoid these cameras at all cost. It’s not worth the low price.
title: Not secure! Do not buy!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Scott H
content: Bought one then a second. I really am amazed at the quality and features this has for the price point. It also was a snap to set up. I would give them 10 stars for value if I could!!!!
title: I can’t believe the features and quality for the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nun Ya
content: Bought this camera solely to watch my 3-yr olds bedroom door at night now that big kids can get out of bed on his own. The motion detection and notifications work well-especially considering the low cost. I haven’t tested many of the features yet, but it’s already worth what I pad for it.
title: Well worth the cost.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DCguy
content: Wyze should state this limitation in pre-purchase and setup documents, or better yet support WEP.  Yes, I know WPA/2 is better, but I just don't have time to reconfigure all my other devices to accommodate theirs.  Even lowly smartplugs support WEP as do Echo devices.  Regardless, beautiful design and exceptional telephone tech support.  I really wanted to use rather than return this product.  Dang.
title: DOES NOT SUPPORT WEP ENCRYPTION = RETURN

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tb5
content: The camera does almost all that the maker said that it will do very well. However, there are somethings that it does better than others, for instance motion sensor works well but could be much better but I guess in time they will improve it.I like the camera very much and another nice thing about it is has a slot for a micro SD card slot for local image storing that is a big plus.
title: Wise Cam Pan a Very good security camera at an outstanding price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: FAMAL
content: I couldn’t be happier with this purchase! The video quality is great - I work in video production and I’m very pleased with everything from HD to pan and tilt.  Couldn’t find a better product for the price.  I love keeping an eye on my dog during the day.
title: Outstanding quality & value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Timothy
content: Bought another camera system at Best Buy and it was trash. Bought this off of reviews and love it. Able to check home while away. Night vision works great. Motion detection is good also! Wish they had a manual on how to use app but some trial & error works good.
title: Great for home!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Klodnito
content: What's not to like.  It's a cloud cam!  It's not expensive!  Picture quality is top notch! It has a micro SD card for internal storage!  It get's regular updates from Wyze!  You can talk and listen from your phone!  Nuff said.  I will buy several more in the near future.
title: Wyze Cam Pan and Zoom

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: D. Campbell
content: Very impressed with what you get for the money.  Set up was easy.  Camera function is very capable. Image quality is really good.  Yes there are more advanced options out there but the price will be drastically higher.  Honestly this the camera I will recommend to friends and family.
title: Best camera buy available.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: travelin_gurl_07
content: Love these cameras. I love that i can turn it feom my phone. It allowed me to catch my dads care giver doing things that let me fire her with proof. Sound and speaking quality aint the greatest but still love it.
title: Perfect for care giver spying

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Micah Arnold
content: These are easily the best budget cameras available. Comparing them to Arlo Pro cameras, these are faster responding and equally as good quality. The night vision actually seems to work better. The pan/tilt motor is a bit loud, but that is just nitpicking. The app is responsive and lightweight, although it is the only way to view the cameras. The video playback, even in standard definition, is very nice. I highly recommend these!
title: Great budget camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Heather G uillen
content: The set up was not easy at all but once we got in working (many log in tries) it works great. I mainly use it to see if my kids are home and just not answering my text and what my dogs are doing.
title: Set up was struggle

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tim O.
content: Quirky and a huge pain to set up.  I got it working once...then couldn’t connect, reset it, and now it won’t complete setup.  Luckily it’s super cheap so I’m not hugely upset.  I’ll try again some other time.
title: If it worked ...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alysia
content: 10/10 recommend!! We spent over $100 on a baby monitor that had a low quality picture and didn’t get her whole room. This camera captures the entire room has a great picture and sends me notification if there is movement! The sounds is a little delayed but that’s no big deal.
title: Better than an expensive baby monitor or NEST!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ciaus
content: Th equality of the hosing is excellent, and the imagery is fantastic for the price of the unit.  The night vision can pick up a black dog on a black chair in a dark room.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Scott B.
content: Camera is good. App is terrible since the last update. Video lags about 30 seconds and then the app freezes and closes. Also can't control movement of the camera anymore. Not much point in having a camera like this if you can't use remote viewing.
title: Decent camera, but bad app makes it useless

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SHOPPER
content: Easy to configure, but requires changing the detection "window" in the picture to get web recordings.  DOES NOT RECORD CONTINOUSLY to the web.  Disconnects frequently from Wifi (all my other cams and wifi devices are fine.) A worthy return.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Karen Steiner
content: This camera is junk. I cannot get one of them to work put of the box. I am just setting up the second one and it wont work. The yellow light stays on steady and wont do anything. After all the complaints I see I'm just waiting for the first one I set up to quit too. JUNK Now the second one night vision won't work with the update it did. JUNK
title: JUNK

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michele
content: Must have. Can’t beat the dual of great quality and great price. Have several throughout the house and also h e the door locks with keypad. Best investment
title: Must have

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: R. Dickson
content: Very easy install.  Works on my phone and my wife's. Picture is very clear. The only issue is the speaker.  The sound is poor but in my case a minor issue.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: UTAH Shopper
content: This does not work at all compared to the Ring. I hook it up and it and get no notification or anything. I forget I even own it and just check the Ring now
title: Doesn't work !

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: EricInDayton
content: I now have six Wyze cameras around my house - two pan/tilt and four stationary.  Some are on window sills looking out at our entry way, our garage, our driveway, our back porch.  They work very well and are easy to use.
title: Awesome

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Just Erica
content: Excellent! I’m using this to keep an eye on my elderly grandma and I feel a little more relieved! Took about 10 minutes to set up and it runs perfectly on the WiFi! No complaints at all.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rebecca Haralu
content: I was very impressed with these cameras. Very easy directions to follow to setup and install. Love having the ability to speak through the camera as well as being able to move it remotely from my phone. I use it at my business an my home.
title: Great product!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nguyen Anh Dung
content: I don't know why it got so many stars. I bought it with a hope to connect my home hub to monitor my baby. However, the streaming got lag badly on my home hub. I did a quick search and there was no solution to solve this issue. It's a junk and totally waste of money. It can't be used as security camera nor baby monitoring device.
title: Don't waste your money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jdm
content: When looking for a baby cam, we looked at all the traditional baby cams.  But most of those came with 1 monitor.  We use this as our baby cam and we each can watch the baby on our own phone.  Plus we can see the baby from work if we want.
title: We love this as our Baby Cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Eric DeRise
content: This is the fourth time that I've purchased this thing. I love this little guy! I really did a lot of research on these. Many of them are more than I can afford. But this security camera totally changed everything for me. It's the best one for my needs, and with the best price!
title: I love this little guy! It's the best one for my needs, and with the best price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Raskow
content: The product didn't work properly from the start.  It makes a loud clicking noise when it turns and sometimes. It turns and won't go back then I have to go and physically move it to where I want it.
title: Defective from the start

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DL J.
content: This was a gift for a friend that has to Huskies he wanted to keep an eye on during the day and it works well. It pans 360, it turns, it goes up, it goes down. And you can talk to your animals and whoever else you're keeping an eye on 😁.
title: Talk to your animals!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sandy
content: The image quality is great - the way you can scope around the room is more handy than I realized. I've been recommending this camera to anyone that asks me. I'm just waiting for them to come out with a doorbell camera (please!!).
title: This one is hard to beat for the price you pay

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: michael mark sayegh
content: Defective and trash, the camera isn’t worth the plastics it’s made of!! Worst clarity, zoom and PTZ function.  Maybe I got a defective one but it doesn’t even com with a mount.
title: Defective, trash  AND doesn’t come with a mount

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BadNraD
content: I received a defective product as far as I can tell so for now it’s a 1 Star for me. The other wyze cam I bought works great and I love it! Hopefully I’ll feel the same about the Pan when I get one that works?
title: Tried everything, doesn’t work even with tech support helping me

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brian H
content: The only complaint that I have is that sometimes I have issues with the device not detecting motion or notifying me, even though all the settings are correct. I've gone back and forth many times with customer service and they have been very helpful!
title: Good quality and detects motion well

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jACQUELINE  LANDERS
content: The motion detection is not the greatest if it’s not facing the direction someone is coming most of the time it doesn’t turn. I can’t see when someone is leaving packages or picking up things. But if the wind blows I can see the leaves on the plants move
title: The motion detection not great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Thomas L Brown
content: Love this Camera.  I have not found the pan feature to be needed, but I guess that depends on camera placement.  The camera works well though, and I love the fact that the App is free!  Really helps me keep an eye on my home!
title: Love the camera and the App

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Smc
content: For the money, this is a wonderful product. I have 6 cameras. Great picture quality. Great night vision. One drawback is you can not fast forward playback on micro SD card, which I think Wyze is working on.  Can monitor home from phone or iPad. Easy set up. Like that you can pan camera around the room 360 degrees. Has audio to listen in. Has microphone to talk to people (or your pets). Has features to take pictures or video tape to phone or pad. Again, for the money it has an amazing amount of feature. I’ve seen similar products that were 10 times more expensive. Plus there is no monthly service fee.
title: Great product, great price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TzuBetterBelieveIt
content: Love all the features. Get the SD card so you can see the playback when it captures events because sometimes it's a little late on capturing the event. Super happy with this little camera!
title: Great Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Headhunter
content: This camera with the app only works if you are within feet of it. Kind of defeats the purpose of checking in when you’re not there! Trying to load on my phone, the camera retries 8-10 times before telling me to troubleshoot. Called the support services and they told me to do everything I already did! Do not buy, you’ll be disappointed and just have to buy another one!
title: Don’t buy - doesn’t work outside of a phone range of 30ft!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mike K
content: This works exactly as described.  I have checked it several times from remote locations and continue to be amazed at the resolution as well as the ability to pan.  Haven't tried to save to the cloud as yet, but hoping I never do.
title: Why did I wait so long

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Adam X
content: It moves by its self. I'll set it to a fixed position, and I come back a few hours later and it's in a different direction. Creepy. I unplugged it and stopped using it.
title: Creepy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: swagat tripathy
content: I never knew before that home surveillance cameras prices have dropped so much. Seeing the price for this mini camera I did not have much expectations but guess what it’s a damn smart camera. I have placed the camera in the top corner of the living room  so it pretty much covers the entire room. So I don’t use the motion sensor much to comment about it.
title: Your budget home security

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robin L. Egdish
content: You must use 2.4 GHZ to use this item and if you are using comcast which has both 2.4 and 5.0, it is a major task to hook this item up to your wifi. I spent 30 minutes on the phone with comcast and they kept telling me that the item should automatically pick which GHZ to use but it does not. I am returning the item today.
title: Don't waste your time

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: HAMMCD18
content: This is a great camera. The company is USA based in Washington state and their customer service is really helpful and friendly. The cost is significantly less than its competitors and it produces close to the same quality as well
title: Best budget camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cherisse
content: I'm loving this camera. It was a great relief while I was away on vacation to keep an eye on my pets.  It takes a few minutes to capture a 'person'. Night vision works great. I have it indoors only. App is easy to use.
title: Wyze is the way to go for standard surveillance

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Monica Musgrave
content: I bought this camera after seeing one used on Instagram. Overall I'm very pleased with the quality and features of the app.  The only down side is the audio latency is a bit longer and audio choppier than I'd like....but again for the price, it's a great camera! I would buy another one when needed.
title: Great Camera for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anthony S.
content: I've purchased this camera four timees for different rooms and have been greatly satisfied with its performance. The Wyze Pan Cam has exceeded my expectations  and with updates in firmware by the manufacturer it continues to do so presently. If there was an aspect that has ever been a concern it would be the motion detection feature. Initially it was slightly inadequate but has improved and has become more reliable.
title: Exceeds Expectations

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael A. Tobin
content: Can't download the app to my moto z android cellphone to make the cameras work. Very disappointed. I bought a couple Blink cameras and they worked great.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: asgilmore
content: We love this thing!  It’s been great to be able to check on our dog while gone during the day and also to see the kids when they get off the bus in the afternoons!  Highly recommend!!
title: Great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ashley Porter
content: I really liked this camera a lot! Had it since June 12 and is already having problems staying connected to the internet. I have check all my other devices, smart tv’s, etc. This it the only device having problems. I will be returning the product.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: skinnybrokefabulous
content: Man, this little guy is great! Wifi range is at least 30ft away and through walls to the garage. Keeps a steady signal, rotates fantastical well. Highly impressed and getting more.
title: What a little beast of a cam!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brooke
content: I was skeptical because of the low price. This camera is amazing. The picture quality is so good. I love that it pans so you can look at different areas of the room.
title: One of the best indoor cameras available!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Poppadoo
content: Excellent camera for the price. Works well, no issues with it. Detects picture and motion. Got it for my elderly mothers and I get to keep an eye on her. Like that it moves around.
title: Moves around convenient and works well.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joseph D.
content: We purchased a bunch of the $25 cameras for ourselves and our adult Children . This one we purchased to monitor the fuel level of out basement oil tank or other activity in the basement.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Packet1770

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bbq man
content: I bought this camera because I was very pleased with my other wyze camera. I decided to try this one because it pans and tilts however The night vision is a poor quality. This microphone on this one is also poor quality. I should have just purchased the same wyze camera a did last time which was cheaper as well.
title: Poor quality sound and night vision

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Maria Victoria Gomez
content: Do you want to keep an eye on whats going on in your house? This is the best choice.  I need to keep an eye to my 4leggedfurrybabies, when I'm not home they missbehave.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kyfishinman
content: Easy to install and works perfectly, added the silicone outdoor sleeve and it watches my backyard 24/7 Love wyze cams low cost with highest quality, better than ring or vivint or adt cameras
title: Clear HD security cam iphone alerts free

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: David B. Neely
content: For the prices, this is an outstanding camera. The app has a lot of advanced features and the picture quality and ease of setup were top notch. Very wide range of motion to capture with, I plan on getting more.
title: Great camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: David M
content: Bought this as a “cheap” indoor camera to watch our pets while gone and it’s just as good of quality as our $200+ Nest camera plus this one rotates & spins from the phone app!
