product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Megan
content: Camera is great for its value and no annual fee. Also, the app is very easy to use. For anyone concerned about privacy, it is very easy to turn the camera off, or turn it around and turn off the movement detection feature. Not sure what all the reviews are freaking out about. If you want privacy, don't get a 360 degree-rotating-full-room camera. I'm very happy with it and at night I use the app to rotate the view to point directly at the wall.
title: Great quality camera, easy to use app

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: getabout
content: This Wyze security system was so easy to set up and its functionality are so exactly what you want. Just swipe your phone screen and it turns, tilts and magnifies. I am impressed!
title: Wyze is hands downnperfect

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tangent SA
content: All three installed in minutes each, zero issues, crashes, etc.  Very intuitive.  For $40 a throw, just try and beat these.  Indoor use, dog monitor, etc.,  good in low light, audio surprisingly good.  Love the replaceable/switchable USB power cables and when moved, boot right up and works as originally installed.
title: Ours Work Fine.  No issues.  Software and Set-up Easy to use/Do

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rafe J.
content: I tried a couple other cameras on special on Amazon and was always  disappointed, visually they worked well but the software always glitched, couldn't sign on at all, or couldn't save to an SD card. This works well, works easily, and is an incredibly good buy.
title: Just an incredible value in a camera....

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Miss Vicki
content: This was so easy to set up. Bought it to see what my dog does during the day. Seems she doesn't do much. Still a good security camera.
title: Nice camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Hammocklife88
content: This is a great camera for the price. The two way audio is what sets it apart from the other on the market. Being able to record locally with a micro sd card is great convenience. I will buy another one in the future to add more to my house.
title: Great camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ross J. Linehan
content: The instructions don't tell you this, but this device, which runs on an android application, can also be used with a PC using the BlueStacks Multi-Instance Manager, which is discussed in the forums under "Community" at Wyze.com.  Or Google "using wyze on PC."  "Night vision" DOES work (well), but I can't speak to "motion detection," which I haven't tried yet.
title: Works Great!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JackR
content: I am obsessed with security cameras and have tried 4 different styles. This is the cheapest, best picture, easiest setup and the best of the security cameras.
title: Best camera and lowest priced

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PJ
content: Sometimes a little slow responding to people or other movement . Other than that, love the product and tell everyone about your products. Thank You and may this year be a prosperous one.
title: Camera's

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: bernie
content: Works pretty good for $30 camera motion is a little jerky but I was impressed how good picture is. Don’t use motion just have scan turned on. At night it picks up tv and has a lot of false records but has to be facing tv to monitor what we want to watch.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RLW
content: This is a very good camera. It has an iOS app which has multiple settings. I liked it that I purchased another. I can check on my place anywhere I have an internet connection. I love this camera. It is made of solid materials and not cheaply made. Great product. Best for low cost and high return.
title: Very good camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Leah Howerton
content: Had this a couple months and the picture quality and ease of this camera is great. Love the option of turning on motion alerts when I’m not home. My kids hate it cause I can check in on them at anytime too!
title: Good camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Vivian
content: I am SO shocked by the quality of this camera for the price.... Sure, it's a little glitchy at times and the panning when I'm checking in on the house lags, but overall it's great! I feel a lot safer with it in my home. I can also talk to my cat while I'm gone and it confuses him so much, but it's fun.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Paola Mogle
content: At first I loved the camera and quality. I liked it so much that I bought a second one. After a little over a month I am having trouble with both. They don’t connect properly and they don’t show a good picture. I tried return them but it was over the 30-day timeline. I wish they worked as well As they did at the beginning.
title: After 30 day they don’t work anymore

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Steven Ray
content: This works fantastic.  I have slow satellite internet and this still works.  I have to set it on 360p, but I still get a good picture over the internet.  I love this camera.  A great picture, a great price.  What more do you want?
title: Great camera, small price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jennifer G.
content: This does not work. I spent hours trying to get it to work. First, the yellow light never came up as directed. Also, there was no sticker to remove so I am questioning if this was refurbished. I then spent forever trying to get the QR code, but it just kept saying “no information found” while listening to the thing repeatedly say it was ready for set up. Not user friendly. Spend a little more for something better.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jenise
content: I really wished I would have tried to connect it right away. Could not set up. It kept saying it could not connect to my network. I tried numerous times and gave up.  This was a waste of my money.
title: So disappointed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: gary
content: I love my camera and have recommended them to many of my friend and family. I believe it's one of the most cost effective products for home security or even for business.
title: Outstanding Product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Leigha
content: We use this purely to check in on our pets while we are out of town for work. We’ve had it for over a year and absolutely love it. We can move it easily from our phones, talk to them, and change the sensitivity for notices of motion. It has provided us peace of mind while gone, and that is far beyond the low price we paid for it.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Cruz
content: great video and picture quality but the problem is the motion detection,it will pick up motion only o ccasional even you set it up on the highest sensitivity or lowest..tried it both but wont detect motion where it should..i have the blink which detects motions without problem
title: not good

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cam Y.
content: I can't believe the camera you get for this price. I was contemplating the more expensive established brands but decided to try this based on the reviews. Can't be happier. It's super easy to set up and has not failed since installation. You are able to pan and tilt which was great.
