product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stock52
content: I bought this camera to monitor my home during extended vacations.  On average, I could only connect about 30% of the time using my cell phone or a wifi connection.  Support was patient and tried to help, but the problem couldn't be resolved.  I switched to the Amazon camera--worked with no problem.  Unfortunately it's to late to return the Wyse.
title: Inconsistent operation

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KAZ75
content: OMG.  So incredibly easy to set up and use!!!  I tried a different one that was rated well first.  I couldn’t get it to work with my phone.  I am not tech savvy.  This is awesome!  The picture is awesome.  I can see everything.  I wanted to watch my cat while I was gone for several days.  This is soooo good!
title: EASY to use!!!  Love it!!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KR
content: I’m able to pan the camera remotely using my phone and see my apt the on the other side of globe. This camera is awesome very clear picture I love this cam. It’s does what it says and is very affordable looks good and discreet. We ran out of prepaid internet plan and was out of network for a few days. But it got reconnected after we reinstated the internet service.
title: Keeping an eye on the other side of the globe.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CM
content: It's quite sad this Wyze cam is better than my Amazon Cloud Cam, though the Wyze wasn't around when I bought it a year ago.  Never spending stupid money on a cam again, this is my second Wyze Cam and they are simply the best. Don't waste your money on expensive Cams ... get Wyze!
title: Seriously??!!!  Amazing!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Renee H.
content: Nice product for the price, I find the motion tagging works better than motion tracking.  With tagging the camera moves less which makes for a cleaner picture.  I find the voice communication function works ok, due to the delay and ok quality.  The new firmware update changed the way you can speak into the app, now you have to hold the button to talk vs selecting once to turn on/off- I like the previous function.  You don't have to pay to record/ payback with an SD card.  The scrolling function when paying back video is simple, but a bit challenging to say go back and view the previous 5 minutes.
title: Decent product for the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Oldtimer37
content: When used with the smart phone  app, you can control direction of view or just watch what it finds.  I bought camera mounts  for them and I can view my whole front and back yards through my windows.  Amazing value... don't see how they can make them for this price.
title: One of the least expensive home cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Beto Nun
content: Ojo cuando compren este producto, cuando le quieran agregar sensores de contacto NO FIUNCIONAN, hay culquier cantidad de foros hablando de esto. Desde hace mas de 1 año que pasa. La empresa no responde al problema.
title: No funcionan los sensores de contacto WYZE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marcie Miller
content: I bought this camera and it does not record.  This is the third one I have purchased.  The first one worked great for about 3 months and it no longer works.  The second one the cord at the base went bad.  Third time is the charm and I am returning it.
title: They don’t last long!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tyree
content: Hi, I needed a camera that would allow to watch over my grandmother who currently suffers from dementia, while I was completing the needed tasks throughout the day. It works perfectly. I was able to make sure she was okay, while still being able to take a short amount of time for myself.
title: I need a camera to watch after my grandmother with dementia.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marco Perez
content: For the price you cannot ask for more. Great value. Only downside is that there is basically no zoom and past a few hundred feet the camera looses sharpness in a saturated view. Will include pic of what I mean.
title: Can NOT be beaten for the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kal Far
content: Ordered this in April 2020 and it's already dead! This makes the 3rd Wyze camera within a year to become useless. No more... I'm jumping to Nest Cam.
title: Cheap price, cheap quality!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brian McGrath
content: I own a wide variety of home automation and "smart" devices, and this just sky-rocketed to the top of my recommendation list. I just happily placed my $200+ Arlo camera and it's bulky base station in my electronics graveyard (box in the closet). The thought that went into every aspect of this device is as blatant as it is delightful. The setup was the fastest of any device I've installed. The app is user-friendly. The picture quality is great. The pan and motion features are fun and intuitive. Viewing the live feed has no perceptible delay. This is a perfect example of a product-focused team taking the time to make something so complex seem so simple.
title: I am all-around stunned.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lapa Moser
content: I bought one to watch my dogs while I’m at work since I work long hours. It worked so well, I now have 4. These are perfect. Night vision works well. It’s easy to set up. Love this product. Highly recommend!!
title: Best home camera!!! Buy it!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jason C.
content: This is a great camera to use indoors an monitor your animals when away. Otherwise the picture is not very clear on it to use for anything else. You cannot depict facial features or anything far away with this camera.
title: Video quality is just OK on this.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: G. Russell
content: Everything about this little camera is 5 star, except that the two-way audible does not work. Waiting on Tech Support to get back to me, so for right now, they get a two star rating for not warning consumers about a known issue with Samsung Phones. More to come....
title: Don't work with Samsung Phones

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Will Vongboupha
content: Love this product as I bought this for my ex who I know will want to see her puppy when she's at work.  You can pan, tilt, & zoom with this wonderful product.  Not to mention it has night vision.  Perfect clarity with the image.  Best addition is also the ability to talk back & forth to the pup.  Best buy for the money.
title: Amazing product that doesn't break the bank!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: GlobeTrotter
content: Very easy to set up and use right out of the box. It's nice that it offers a week cloud service for free. The only issue is that it shuts off (turns away) when there is no prolonged activity - and it 'sleeps' not sure why.
title: Easy to set up - Easy to Use (but a few faults)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DW
content: Great product. Easy to set up and use.  Bought it to keep an eye on my dogs.
title: Highly Recommended

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Youki G
content: I don’t actually know how good this camera is because the plug requires USB-C and they sent a USB-A adapter. That seems like a basic requirement to match the adapter to the cord. Don’t buy if you actually want to use the camera unless you buy your own USB-C adapter. I’ll be returning this and getting a camera that has proper parts and support.
title: Wrong adapter packaged with product so not usable out of the box.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: pfoilga
content: This is a great little gadget. We use it in our baby grandson's room. It's picture is clear to see every movement. Easy to set up and a great price!
title: home cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: LN1
content: Very reasonable camera with a good app. The company really seems to be trying to make a good product.  I just wish you could have more local access and controls without using their app.
title: Always easy to setup and use

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A McGinnis
content: I love this little camera.  The only issue I have is that I cannot get the text alerts for motion detection.  It works well for me to keep an eye on my home from anywhere.  My son is 15 and stays home doing virtual learning and it gives me a little comfort knowing I can check in whenever I want while I'm at work.
title: Great camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Frank Pitts
content: I’m amazed by what these little camera can do and Wyze keeps upgrading firmware and app to add even more!! I installed two cameras late last year. No problems from either camera. They connect to WiFi easily and work great with the app.
title: Wow - Awesome Camera for the Price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: HeatherM79
content: I’ve been searching for a good camera for a long time and this one was it! It was so awesome and so amazing until I turned it off and it started operating by itself!! So I unplugged it deleted the app and now it won’t let me reconnect my camera to my network. So I’m a little freaked out. No telling how long someone was watching me in my home!
title: Not cool!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Fidel
content: Picture quality was very good with Waze cameras in general. But the motion on this camera lagged so we returned it and purchased the regular camera and we are happy with that decision.
title: Picture quality great but motion detection is ehh

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lena
content: The camera has clear imaging which is great for the price. The playback feature is useless, there are no markers on the playback screen to show you where an event took place. You have to scroll and scroll and scroll to try to find something. What's the point of having playback like that?
title: Pros and cons

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Victoria Y
content: These cameras were very easy to set up and work really well.  The camera pan function is great.  The overall quality is very good and affordable.  I would recommend these to others searching for affordable security cameras and monitoring.
title: Easy to set up and affordable

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SF/Amazon Customer
content: I bought one Cam Pan (large) and one Cam (small) plus a new Echo Dot (controlled by a Fire 7 HD) for my parents in their house before the holiday. The Cam (small) works very well, but the Cam Pan (large) had a huge delay and not in a live stream (by every 5 to 8 seconds). Apparently it (Cam Pan) requires much larger wifi bandwidth to plan in a live stream. In general, these are pretty good products, but I'd need to return the Cam Pan.
title: Good products but require large wifi bandwidth

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AREC
content: Single band at 2.4 ghz camera. Unfortunately it would not set up  unable to use the camera at 5.0 ghz.
title: Nice camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MMcKinley
content: NOT A BABY MONITOR! While the Wyze camera is sleek, easy to use, and has many great qualities. I would 110% not recommend using it as a baby monitor. I heard wonderful things about it, so decided to try it. Absolutely hate it!  You have to leave your phone or another device open all night for the app to function. My sound turns off multiple times in the night making it so I cannot hear my baby cry. The notification is the smallest little “ding” and doesn’t wake me up, despite being a very light sleeper.  Wish I would have returned it when I had the change,  but now I’m stuck with it. Would look elsewhere for a baby monitor.
title: NOT A BABY MONITOR.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chrissy
content: I bought two and love them so much I bought two more. My only problem so far is when it’s in tracking mode,it tends to move,so I taped it down. Great images and color,etc are amazing. Better than my expensive arlos and petcube.
title: Better than my arlos and petcube

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Daniel F.
content: I bought it a month and a half ago and since then every single day there's a problem with the app. When trying to change the pan scan settings the app freezes or the camera disconnects and its takes a few tries before it actually saves the setting, I spend at least 15 minutes a day struggling with it. Also I'm no longer able to format the SD card from the app and the camera is no longer recording continuously. I'm really disappointed because I bought based on other good reviews, but its been a nightmare.
title: Awful App, Ok camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Msmeggie1954
content: Every feature works as described. There have been no disruptions in service. The picture is very clear. The pan feature works great. Motion and sound detectors capture everything.  Great value.
title: Great camera for a low price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jordan E. Ekern
content: Only had this product for a day but it was the easiest setup, worked perfect from the time it was powered on. Couldn’t be happier. I am not tech savvy at all and managed to get it up and running in less than 5 minutes. Can’t beat the price.
title: Quite impressed.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: melimama
content: Lived everything about this little camera until it completely stopped working after 4 months.
title: Stopped working after 4 months

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: mally
content: Love this camera. The picture quality is good even at night. Most cameras capture images at night in black and white, but this one has the option of color, ans it’s great. It’s also very durable, I dropped it on the floor, it came apart, I put it togethere and it's still working..
title: Very Nice camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Luis Morales
content: This product is very good
title: This product is very good

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Pamela Hahn
content: Bought this easy to use and setup camera and love it.  I am able to check in on my dogs throughout the day and have a conversation with them.  Also enables me to checkout the whole living space and make sure all is well.
title: Great product!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: christine
content: These cameras have been great however 2 of the 4 I bought stopped working. Of course stopped working after return window closed. 2 that still work are great, just disappointed that 2 stopped and stuck with them. Doesn’t pick up people detection very well.
title: Great when they work!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Justin H.
content: Excellent camera at an excellent price point! I bought this to replace a stationary wifi camera, and this one blows it out of the water for quality and features! I'll be buying more of these!
title: Excellent camera at an excellent price point!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Morgan Moore
content: Love this camera! I have 2. I placed them in my window inside, facing my front & back door! The only DOWN SIDE to doing that is night vision can’t be used because it causes a glare. So we have to leave our porch lights on at night. And the camera would be a lot clearer if we didn’t have screens on your windows. But other than that 10/10 would recommend! They work well enough that I can tell if someone is outside of my house, and that’s what I wanted it for!
title: Wonderful for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Craig W.
content: The Wyze cam I received was obviously refurbished. The shell of the camera was opened and when it was put back together was quite snapped back entirely.
title: Sold as new, Wyze can I recurved was refurbished or a return

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: WK
content: This device replaces an older TrendNet camera and is of course much clearer - but best of all - very easy to setup - the motion detection feature is very good
title: Easy to Setup

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Greg Engle
content: I purchased two of these Cameras.  They works ok in Daylight or well lighted areas but very poorly at night or in dim lighted areas.  I can stand 3 foot from camera in Dark room and never be detected by it's motion sensor plus it's near impossible to make out people or objects at night.
title: Decent Camera for the Money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cristina
content: This camera sucks and I will be returning it. I was giving it a week but it is terrible. It won't even read me walking by the cameras outside but it will get a tree shadow moving in the wind out of sight. I'm not kidding. Some security this is. Do not buy!!!
title: First it was cool, then it sucked

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tom Guelker
content: These cameras are fantastic!  I have a total of 12 2 WYZE v2 and 10 pan cams. Be sure to use high endurance SD cards.  Regular SD cards are not capable of handling continuous recording.
title: Great camera from a great company!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kendall King
content: Especially considering how affordable this camera was, I was not expecting much from it. We bought it to use as a baby monitor and have been testing it on the dog. We liked it so much that we're planning to buy another one for when baby comes. Highly recommend (although we haven't tried putting a SIM in it, so I can't attest to that feature).
title: Great camera! We're buying another one!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kindle Kustomer
content: Moved so much in a windstorm tracking tree swaying, it fell off windowsill bent the micro plug before disconnecting and hitting floor. 8' swing on power cord (extention) hit wall then drop to floor. Lucky it still worked after that. Good picture from camera.
title: Pan & Tilt, lots of movement tracking trees moving in wind, should be solidly mounted.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Noah Mindeman
content: This product came recommended by a coworker, so I bought it for my brother so he could check in on his dog while he's at work. We were amazed by the high quality of video that came through and LOVED the fact that you could watch through your smartphone. The app lets you speak through the camera and listen in on what's going on. I would 10/10 recommend and purchase this product again.
title: Great Product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kathy Cook
content: I liked this camera in the beginning, it worked for a couple of months for my initial use of tracking a peeing cat. I had to unplug it and tried to use it again for another use- won’t connect, over and over and over. On the right Wi-Fi, following exact instructions. Deleted and tried to re-add, nope won’t scan code. So frustrating, waste of money.
title: Will not connect, died after short use

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AChionsini
content: Have two of them for inside the house. Definitely allows me to keep track of what goes on inside the house when I'm away day or night. Like the fact that we can also keep up with our old dog.
title: Good price and good product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Anita Rojas
content: I did a lot of research before buy our first cameras. I was looking for a camera with good resolution, with recording tools and also easy to install (I don’t have handyman’s skills) . This camera was perfect! It’s really easy to set up, has a good wide angle and the app works PERFECT!  I have being using it by a month by now and I highly recomend it.
title: Best value equation!! Great camera for a good price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Superman55t
content: Man, this was a really good buy. I love it. the picture is clear, the rotation is nice a bit loud but does the job. Functions are easy to use and the quality is excellent. Thanks! I would recommend this!
title: Best Buy for the Buck

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Denise
content: For the money, this product is terrific. I haven't been getting any motion detection notifications, but viewing what is happening in my home while I am away at work is great. I am able to see my pets and my home very well. It was easy to set up and connect to Alexa.
title: Terrific product, great price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Connelly
content: This is a great product for the price. Get yourself a wall mount and a micro SD Card and you are set. The app is nice to watch in live time and the ability to record when motion is sensed is incredible. I use this for the outside and inside of my business.
title: Great camera and recording. Highly recommend

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Roberta Rittel
content: I returned this item six weeks ago because it did not work. I am still waiting for a credit back to my card. I do not recommend this camera. I ended up buying the ieGeek camera and am very happy with it.
title: It did not work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: thiago
content: price is on point and as long as you have good connection you can point this thing in almost any direction... and picture quality for what you pay is really good... was surprised
title: Not too shabby

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Trasi
content: It just stopped working for no reason. Otherwise, I loved it!!!! I returned it for replacement and never received a  confirmation that it was received! I sent it over 10 days ago. Very unprofessional!!
title: Great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Janice G.
content: Easy setup.  But ran into problems with brand new Samsung 32 GB SD card (class 10).  After researching the problem with using the camera to format the card, I formatted the SD card using my laptop (Windows 10).  I don't know if it made any difference, but I did NOT use the Quick Format option.  SD cards are now working in cameras.  A new firmware update came out a few days ago.  The camera DOES reconnect if the WiFi is dropped.  Also reconnects if power is lost.  If I didn't have a problem with the SD cards, it would have received 5 stars.  Would definitely purchase again (already purchased 3).
title: Working now - seems to be a great camera for the money (12/28/18)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jlb
content: Use it to keep an eye on the dogs while I am out. Works great! Definitely add the memory card for extended viewing.
title: Great camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: beArNo7
content: I've owned this camera for ~ 1 month and like it so far. The build/image quality is good, it never gets offline, and the app is full of nice features. Only thing missing IMO is a web portal to access the video but with the price there really isn't anything to complain!
title: Like this camera so far

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mark W Kidd
content: Within two weeks of buying and mounting this camera it began experiencing extended periods where it would be unreachable with an error code 90. By the time I got home from an extended trip to complete the Wyze troubleshooting procedure for this error, five weeks had passed and it was past the Amazon return window. I can only see a place to request a return on the Wyze site if it was purchased on the Wyze site.
title: Camera unreliable after a couple of weeks

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: World Traveler
content: These cameras are value for money. The video quality is great, the motion detection works more often than not, and the build quality is pretty good. I'm not sure abt the quality control though as 1 out of the 3 that I bought couldn't pan properly.
title: Great for its price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AnonymousSs
content: This is an awesome camera! And for the price... wow. I have it placed in a huge double living room but can easily pan and zoom. I wasn’t expecting full 360 movement or how quickly it moves! Setup was simple. I highly recommend.
title: 10/10 awesome. Highly Recommend!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bailey Smith
content: Great video quality and easy to set up. You can hear it pivoting which can be annoying so you have to have it placed away from where you normally sit or hang out.
title: Worth the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ceshaw
content: Love this camera! We have 2 and I want more! I wish it was weatherproof and I wish there was a way to change the alert sound to something more alarming in the iPhone app. Other than that amazing!!! Totally get one if you haven’t.
title: Love love love this camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jevan
content: I was never able to get the camera to connect to Wifi. The product requires a 2G Wifi Network. It identifies the network but will not connect to it. Unfortunately, Wyze does not have actual customer service to help troubleshoot their products... just FAQ pages that proved unhelpful. All I could do is reset the product and network and keep trying but It never connected. Sending the item back for a refund... frustrating.
title: No Customer Service

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rebecca Harrison
content: I love these little cameras. They are nothing special, just a nice quality camera that I use to check on my dog. I have three! Picture quality is good, motion sensor is good. Night vision is not good but that doesn’t bother me.
title: Nice little camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BobbiJo
content: We are absolutely impressed with the picture quality! We have it set to detect person movement and it works great. At one time we had it set to detect movement and it would capture our ceiling fan (in which you can adjust it to detect a certain area) and or the sun coming thru the window or a car that is passing by. We have our settings set and it is a great buy!!
title: Great picture quality and detecting movement

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CT
content: I can’t believe what a steal these are! I have two of the Wyze cams that don’t pan/zoom - those are great, but this is a definite improvement. Great picture, sound, and microphone function. No problems with delay in video. Will be buying another.
title: I love these cameras!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JERALD ABERNATHY
content: Motion sensor is the best. I can tell when the cleaning people come or kids get home from school. Will def buy a couple of more. Very easy to set up. under 5 minutes.
title: Watch from my phone.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: mat b
content: I do not know what happened I bought 2 cameras at the end of 2018 and I had them sealed until a month ago. Use them well at the test site wifi. But when I took them to my house it didnt work. Restart them several times, use other networks, use different wifi from other sites. They just did not reconnect never again. Disappointed I have 2 practically new cameras that do not connect after having tried everything.
title: DONT WORK AFTER YOU RESET

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joseph Shuffler
content: Camera is a decent camera. But I gave it to someone who only really needed one camera. I need several cameras as I have several children. One camera for each child's bedroom. I will not ever order from this company again I will not have I camera from a company it only says I can have a limited number. I will do all I can to influence people not to buy from this company.
title: Good camera bad company

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Darleen A. Dalessio
content: We bought this to monitor our new puppy while we are out.  This works great! It has a good picture and is able to move. You can even speak over it ,  which we would use to tell the puppy no!
title: Great camera for the money

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Hoeplebo
content: PLEASE DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY ITS TRASH
title: LOOK ELSE WHERE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bluefalcon8560
content: works well although the night vision is only good for about 5 feet. Other wise the picture quality is good, setup easy and device stabile. One thing to keep in mind is that this is a larger device than many on the market.
title: Good value camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RDucky
content: The camera claims to be 2 way audio... it's not. Claims to be 1080p, doesn't appear to be. Perhaps at very close up, however at any distance the picture is crap. Can't view from a PC only your phone.. useless for home security.
title: You get what you pay for, and you didn't pay for much.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DNA
content: I like this camera for the price.  It has not been working consistently with playback and the sd card.  It keeps saying sd card not installed until i reboot.  I have tried multiple sd cards.
title: Issues with sd card playback.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cameron Wooley
content: An excellent piece of peace of mind for under $40. The best deal in lower end home security for the budget minded. Has the features of much more expensive cameras at a fraction of the price, and even offers local storage to boot.
title: An excellent value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: K. B.
content: Performs pretty much the same as the standard Wyze Cam so be sure to check those reviews as well.  Build quality and video quality are good.  I ended up turning off the pan/tilt due to how loud it was.  With auto tracking is was moving non-stop and everyone kept complaining about the noise.
title: fun but noisy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TheGhost
content: I purchased one of these along with 3 normal Wyze cameras. The smaller units are very good as they come with a sticky mounting plate. However there is no mounting plate provided with the Pan camera and the unit is quite heavy. The mounting plate has to be bought separately. As I couldn't put it where I intended, I put the camera back in the box and used one of the smaller cameras instead. I may use the Pan camera later by just resting it on a shelf but I think it would topple if I tried to pan it. If you buy one, get some way of mounting it securely.
title: No mounting plate provided

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Eli
content: I really recommend it! It does what I was looking for . I can see my husband in hospital bed when I am not inside the room with him, the most important the connection when I go out of the house is very good.
title: Fantastic!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: AQS
content: I'm halfway around the world and I could turn the camera so I could see almost 360° view. It could also look up or down very easily using swipe onthe screen. Very clear view.
title: Good Purchase

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mark E. Weber
content: These work great. Great functionality. Absolutely inexpensive compared to others in market. Quality of build is normal. Worked from day one, no problem.
title: What a steal!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tina B
content: This is a really great quality camera for the price. I liked everything about it. The night vision is incredible and the picture quality is impeccable.
title: Great Value!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: A.K.
content: I received this and the day I installed it, it was asking for a software update which I did and then everything crashed and didn't work again. Before even doing the software update it was very difficult to connect to the wifi. The item was returned and refunded.
title: software update

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chase M.
content: ARRIVED  BROKEN. CHEAPLY MADE. THE EYE WITH THE CAMERA WAS DISLOGED FROM THE  BODY OF THE UNIT. A WASTE OF TIME SINCE IT DIDN'T WORK. ALSO HAD A PROBLEM WITH THE FIXED WISECAM THAT WAS ORDERED AT THE SAME TIME. I REALLY LIKE THE CONCEPT AND MY FIRST WISECAM WORKED LIKE A CHARM. PITY THAT THEY DIDN'T MAINTAIN THE QUALITY ON THESE.
title: SUCKS. OLD ONES WERE MADE BETTER.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RM350
content: Bought 3 wyze cams and notification doesn’t work on anyone of it. Wasted 75 dollars
title: Notification failure

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: D. Hibler
content: Hard to beat a camera with all these features for the price. Nice picture, good motion detection and playback. Sound is ok but not great if that a very important feature might look elsewhere. Great addition to my other Wyze cams. Very easy to setup and it just works.
title: Great Pan and tilt Wifi Cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Skylar
content: Wow! This camera is really great. I just set it up and I’m already impressed. It was really quick and simple to set up, you can customize it to the security needs you want (audio, motion, time of day, and night vision) and it does a great job with motion detection. I highly recommend.
title: Wow! I recommend!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Robbie
content: It’s been a while since I bought a Webcam and I was skeptical due the low price point of this item.  It is a great little webcam.  Provides a wide field of view and the ability to move it is great although it rarely needs to be moved.  It also works great with Alexa Show to view my kid’s room from downstairs.
title: Great Cam

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: P. Fritz
content: AMAZING product,  great customer service!  Bought t the o at first then purchased 2 more.  Cant beat the price.  Only downfall is if you lose power you lose the cameras.  Maybe they will come out with a battery backup.
title: Love this product!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Turtle Doc
content: Overall GREAT product. You cannot beat it’s performance in this price range. I was able to watch my pet turtles from literally on the other side of the world a few weeks ago. I think it’s infrared/night vision could be improved upon, but that’s a really minor complaint (besides, my turtles sleep when it’s dark).
title: Buy it, you won’t regret it! (But also buy the separate camera mount)

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Vegas Steve
content: Nice quality camera for the price, and no monthly fee is great.  It's a little noisy when night vision is on (lots of clicks).  To me, that's worse than the sound of it panning, so I just use it in normal vision mode.  It would be nice to have a web app, but the phone app works ok.  I currently have Arlo Pros for most of my cameras, but those suckers die often enough that I won't be replacing them as they are way too pricey.  I hope by then these guys will have an outdoor camera.
title: Nice camera for the price.  No fees.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jean
content: One of my first reviews for Amazon products but I needed to state how disappointed I am with these cameras. I have 4 and the more I buy the slower the app becomes, also in one of my cameras night vision doesn't work. The biggest issue is how bad the app is setup, no desktop option and scrolling through recorded video is almost impossible.
title: Awful experience - slow app, lacks features and night vision failed on one camera already

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: DwayneA
content: Camera functions very well for the price. The picture quality is great and to be able to record events and receive notifications without a subscription is wonderful! The only negative I have is the electric motor that rotates the camera creates noise on the video recording that sometimes interferes with the sound on the recorded event.
title: Great Device!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jean B. Carson
content: Won't record events. Doesn't detect motion. Forget Wyze tech support.  They leave you on hold for 20 minutes then a recording tells you "no tech is available call back later." No tech is EVER available. Chat is useless.
title: Don't buy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ryan Hardy
content: Decent camera but the required app locks up my phone, and alot of other peoples phones quite frequently (according to all the negative PlayStore reviews).
title: Good camera, BUT required app locks up phone.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kevin Mason
content: Good quality for the price.  Two of the 3 cameras purchased pan smooth and quiet.  One started making noise every time it moved straight out of the box.  Reviews warned that this was a possibility.  If you need whisper-quiet cameras look somewhere else.  If you're looking for an economical camera that will get the job done with a few slight annoyances purchase a WYZE camera today.
title: Good camera for the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: VA Farmboy
content: This is our third cam. We use one that is ~500' from our house to the barn. I have been very happy with that performance and it's tolerance to dusty and varying temps.  For the price it offers a lot!!
title: Great value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Manny Jiménez
content: Muy buen producto los de wyze, soy su fan. Tienes seguridad a excelente precio. No he tenido problemas ni al configurar, ni al usarlo. Se recomienda ampliamente.
title: Excelente producto versus precio

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: JohnP292
content: Great camera with pan and tilt for a great price.  The only criticism I have is the motor that turns it is a little noisy but its not terrible.
title: Nice Little Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: iva
content: We got this to monitor our dog. My coworker recommended it bc she uses it for her pets. Unfortunately, it would not work. We kept it for a week to try to work through all the glitches that we thought were operator errors but it still did not work. The App is flawed and the camera does not easily connect. I was so disappointed.
title: Disappointed

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: j302303
content: I bought this wyze cam pan in Nov 2018. When it was working it worked as advertised, but stopped working few months after that. It stopped rotating and stopped connecting to the wyze app. So it's been sitting in my drawer for the last year or so until now. I'll contact the product support to see what they can do and will update here in few days.
title: Product support

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Drew K
content: Easy to set up. Good quality. Detection zone is not accurate at all. Movement way outside the set zone triggers alerts. Also wish I could set the zone to be something other than horizontal and vertical square. App isn't terrible, but could use some UI work.
title: Great quality for the money. Easy to set up.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tanstaafl
content: I can't say enough positive things about these wise cameras. I have purchased four of them and I love them.  The picture quality is actually very good.  It sends me push notifications when sound or motion trips it. Just an excellent all-around product.
title: Great camera for a really good price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kathryn Egner
content: The camera works well. I like that it can move around so that I can see what my dogs are getting into while I am away. My issue is with the two-way speaker. Mine just doesn't work at all. It hasn't since I bought it 3wks ago. I will be returning the product and looking for another camera with ALL working features. You get what you pay for I guess.
title: Two-way speaker doesn't work

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ronmonk
content: This guy costs barely nothing and works amazing. I wish I found these before I had bought plenty other more expensive kinds that don't work near as good as these.
title: Great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: P. Doyle
content: I bought this to test out for a family member. Setup took less than 15 minutes. The picture is goods.  The pan and tilt and zoom work well. Even the night vision works clearly.  There is some audio lag when using the microphone and speaker, but it is really a nice unit a the price point.
title: Super easy set up

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Katie O
content: The picture quality is good only if you're close to it. The audio cuts out frequently which is not useful when someone is trying to call attention thru the monitor. Will be returning!!
title: Audio cuts out frequently

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Verma
content: Horrible experience with software and hardware!!! Nothing but problems. Volume too low...no fix. There are no trigger markers on the timeline on playback mode....no fix. Can't have multiple detection zones. Takes a long time to receive notifications. Will not receive notifications at all if two devices are consecutively triggered. Alexa implementation is very slow, buffers constantly. This is a weak product. Stay away from Wyze. Didn't have this problem with my Yi app and dome cam. Going back!!!
title: Stay away from Wyze!!! There are better options!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Maggie Doodles
content: Are you kidding me?  You can't beat this camera for the price/quality.  I bet they are selling thousands.  I have one that just constantly sweeps the interior of my garage.
title: Works Nonstop

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rilwan Tijani
content: The fact that the camera comes at a very affordable price with all of the same features with the high named expensive brands is just amazing!! You have free cloud storage for events and a very easy app suitable for beginners. Recommended!
title: Best Camera at the cheapest rate

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sidney
content: This is a very good pan camera. It rotates 360 degrees around itself and 90 degrees in the vertical direction. High quality image during live streaming and also in playback function. Easy to instal in the phone. Sound is good. Night vision perfect. Do not hesitate to buy it. Hi quality.
title: Spetacular pan camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Prato
content: Wyze Cam is your last home camera stop! You cannot, let me repeat, CANNOT beat these products! Pan Cam or the V2 will serve you well and the price is SUPER!!! This company has lots more to offer too! Check them out!!!
title: Super value...Great Camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Nicole Wallace
content: Excellent quality for the price .... I can talk to the dog from work which is important 😂
title: Terrific!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jake L
content: The video quality is pretty good. You need a good connection on both ends to view 1080p in real time, but playback is always great. The audio, however, is trash. It is usually desynchronized by several seconds and very hard to understand. Still, best camera for the price.
title: Great for the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mason C.
content: Exactly what we wanted and a great price. Takes less than 5 minutes to setup and link with the app. It did take about an hour before we started receiving alerts. We have it sitting in the window. It pans 360 degrees, so we can see our driveway and also the living area inside the house. The only drawback with using it in this manner is that you can’t use the night vision feature, because the lights reflect on the window.
title: Great camera at a great price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ron W
content: Amazed at the speed and ease of setup.  Two minutes and they’re up and running.  Daylight image is excellent.  Night vision not as good but is as expected using IR illumination.  Alerts work perfectly.  Pans quickly but would be great if the motor was quieter.  The iOS app is excellent and easy to use.  Bought two, ordering another.
title: Quick and easy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Christina drummond
content: Obsessed! Originally ordered there first camera before they came out.. loved it than and love it even more now! The price for the quality is amazing! Almost all my family has bought these cameras after I did a presentation on all the features how easy to install and it was sold.
title: Best quality camera for the right price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sean P.
content: I was distrusting on the lower price at first but after buying it, it is such a good option for home security.  In my opinion not worth shelling out hundreds of dollars for other brands.  I now have multiple cameras and they all work well. Night vision, 2 way audio, no subscription, motion tracking, google home integration, and more.  Cannot believe how cheap it is for what you get.
title: Inexpensive home security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tom F
content: This was super easy to install and does exactly what you need it to. Video quality is good enough to see all I need, but it's not like 4K HD. Do know that you need a memory card if you want to rewind the feed, which for us is important so we can see if our dog took his meds.
title: Super simple set up and works really well

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Top Prime Member
content: The features are good, I bought two cameras. They stopped working. One, less than a year, second, a about a year later... Time to try a different brand.
title: Not reliable.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ming W Chen
content: For the price, I really can’t complaint. The picture quality is decent and clear enough from a distance about 20 feet. App and set up was very easy, I have never gotten a tilting indoor cam before, I can only say that this product exceeded my expectations but doesn’t overwhelm me in terms of the specs.
title: Great for the price, but...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: WISSEMAN VILLASANA
content: Pense mucho al momento de escoger las camaras y no me arrepiento, excelente calidad de video y conectividad, sonido, de verdad 100 recomendado este producto
title: 100 % recomendado

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Martha
content: You are gonna get hacked. The next day after using this camera I got Hacked! Amazon should not sell this!!! This for hacking computers and networks
title: Do not buy this camera-Security

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Pelonchas
content: Bought this just to make sure we were safe I had a ring device  b4 and this right here for the price I realley see no difference  other then the ring u have to pay a subscription  and wyze u dont and I think that's worth it right there
title: Great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MikeyFTL
content: Excellent picture quality and super fast response time (if your wifi can keep up). My wifi has been known to go down a-lot and this camera reconnects quickly. I will definitely buy again.
title: Great picture and super fast

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: mdhmpa
content: Nice camera for the price.  Worked well from the start; it was easy to set up.  My only complaint is it is too sensitive, even when establishing the area, it somehow always manages to pick up the ceiling fan!  I had to turn the pan off.  But it still serves the purpose nicely.
title: Great value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Vee
content: I really like the Wyze Pan Cam the picture is clear and it rotates as you move. The night vision feature works well too. I would recommend you get the memory card so you can take advantage of the saving footage. Great value for the price.
title: Works Great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brittany Pohler
content: Super awesome buy. Great quality overall for the price is unbeatable. Use it as my baby monitor and it’s way cheaper than any baby monitor and sends alerts to our phone with the app.
title: Great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: leah michelle
content: For $40.00 my expectations we're not super high but WOW. This little camera is awesome. Setup was simple, and it works with alexa. Picture quality is good, and this actually has features that much more expensive cameras do not. I am purchasing more for my home and office.
title: Impressed.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KathyInAZ
content: Worked great while at home. Setup was easy, picture was good, motion detection worked well. BUT, i could not connect camera again when away from house, making it pretty much useless. Customer support is nonexistent - phone number in app is just a bunch of ads, then tells you to call another number, which is never answered by a real person. Email support says it will reply in two to five days - that doesn't help much. A big disappointment.
title: Won't connect away from home.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Henry L.
content: Good product for home monitor. The pictures quality is decent  but the sound is not clear and distorted. Really like the ability to pan and tilt. I think this is the cheapest camera that can do that. Also you can get free cloud back up for motion. Also have continuous recording when insert sd card
title: Good camera that has pan and tilt. Has cloud backup and sd card

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: VanidieS
content: So I wanted something to check on the dog once in awhile. I didn't expect the quality to be very good since it is way less expensive compared to some of the other versions. This exceeded all of my expectations - the picture is clear, you can move it around from the app, the zoom is great. Great product.
title: MORE THAN I THOUGHT

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Diane
content: I had to add a night light at night to get it to pick up any picture. I thought it would work without and it didn’t. Seems to work though picking up motion.  I had to open a tech support case because events didn’t show up unless I exited the app. Using refresh didn’t work.  Not sure that has been fixed. Best part of this product is the price.  No subscription fee either!
title: Glad to have such a reasonably priced option

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: amazoholic
content: I have bought five of their cameras. Easy to install and use. Plus they're not ridiculously expensive like every other security camera. One of the five had a bad imagine. The company replaced it no problem. Highly recommend!
title: finally a reasonable $$ security camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: eric k
content: Bought them because they said wireless, however they have a cable for wall power...
title: Not wireless...

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marité
content: Doesn’t send ALL DAY ALERTS. Eventhough the all day option is activated. Every night the camera STOPS sending alerts and recording videos around 1:00Am. Won’t restart unless prompt again. Tried to resetting. Erasing and re installed. NOTHING WORKS. Every day stops working.
title: Stops sending alerts after 1 week

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bradley R. Milton
content: Very easy. Easiest! Connection is great. Image is great. The app is great. Look no further if you want a base-standing ~360 degree horizontal, maybe 90 degree vertical cam. The images are wide angle so most everything is coverd.
title: Really easy to set up and use.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shane
content: I wanted an indoor camera to keep an eye on my dog while I'm gone. I read all of the negative reviews and was skeptical this thing would work given the low price. Figured since it was so cheap I'd give it a shot anyways. So glad I purchased this. Setup was a breeze and the picture quality is fantastic. Sure there are a few quirks with the app. Sometimes an alert doesn't come through. Regardless, this is a fantastic camera at a bargain price.
title: Excellent Camera at a Bargain Price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dustin Donner
content: I was using these cameras for both monitoring 3D print jobs and to monitor a room in our house.  I bought both this one and the smaller cube version and they both have a problem with staying connected to the wireless network.  It's not my network as I have other devices and cameras that are all functioning properly.  There are plenty more reviews like this out there.  You should search Google before you believe the ones here on Amazon.
title: Lose network connectivity!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Michael Godfrey
content: This product is flawless except for one thing - it needs an inbuilt battery power source just like blink. If they can incorporate that feature into their products, they will be among the top contenders.
title: Excellent but for the power source

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chris Turner
content: I first tried the original Wyze cam and when the Wyze Pan cam was released I knew I had to try it. I have 2 dogs that I like to keep an eye on during the day since they are loose and have access to the house/backyard. I have this cam in my backyard so I can watch the whole backyard with one camera. It works perfectly but I expect nothing less from Wyze. Everything they put out I try and I am never disappointed with them!
title: LOVE LOVE LOVE WYZE

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Joni
content: This is a great webcam.  It is my second Wyze cam.  I use them to monitor two seperate homes located 100 miles from each other.  The cam works great.  Easy setup.  Love the free 14 day cloud storage.  The pan and tile function works great.
title: Buy this camera and be happy  better than my Nest Cam at a fraction of the price

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kayla Purser
content: This camera works great. I would give a star if it wouldn't pick up false motion sometimes and sent push when it was detected. Other than that it works really well and I'm quite with it.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jacinda Beckel
content: Talk about a bang for your buck! The Wyze app for the camera is well set up, the only thing is that it can be a little laggy at times, but I think it’s just my WI-FI that causes that. The camera itself is pretty good too, from the quality of the lens in the daytime and nighttime, to the two way audio. I have it mounted inside my home, to monitor my dogs for when I’m at work, school, or just out and about, and it’s really convenient.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Italynette

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: GT

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sterling
content: Great product for the money. Easy to set-up and configure. Love the capability to view from any where in the world. the features are great.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dee

However, this one is slightly longer then others I've tried. All & all I really like this little security camera, its easy to use & setup.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Octagetti

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TruthTeller
content: Great camera for the price. Since motion/sound is alerting via push notifications on your phone, they can be delayed and sometimes non existent. Other times it seems very receptive and alerts immediately. Good picture quality. Night vision switches automatically. No complaints over all!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tony B.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Contented nature lover
content: Love it! I use it primarily to watch little critters out on my porch at night. Sharing the experience with grandkids in another state has been especially fun. The unit was eady to set up, and I am very pleased with picture quality. Thanks so much Wyze for developing a great product.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Astralis

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: kevin

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MNJennifer

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SoutheasternPA

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: B. Ward

I don't have problems with reconnecting it to the home network (when the internet is out).  It's been a reliable little camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

author: shopper
content: I have not even used it yet because the usb/micro usb cord supplied is incorrect. The camera AND the supplied charger both use a full size usb connection, but the supplied cord has usb on one end and a micro usb on the other. Very poor quality control. If others got the correct power cord, consider yourselves lucky. This has happened before, as I found this same review from January - and copied the wording to save time. Guess I’ll order a USB to USB cord and see what happens.

author: Greg Hansen

Very easy to install and setup. 5 minutes at the most. Have not had any signal issues and the image quality is great for the price. The app is better than most I have seen as well and easy to use. I am going to order more and replace all of the DLinks.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Chris K.
content: These cameras worked for the first few months but after a software patch the recording feature stopped working. All of a sudden my two cameras couldn’t use micro as cards. After a few weeks of tech support and 2 additional cameras I gave up. It’s great they are cheap but they failed quick and no matter what they recommended it didn’t work. Save yourself the headache and pass in these
title: Great while it worked, can’t fix their own problems

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: K Hu

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Idaho resident

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Grace

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

author: Jaymee

author: Denny
