product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Laleina
content: Initially bought for my baby’s nursery but it wasn’t loud enough. I decided to keep it for the house since it’s good pic/motion quality. Got annoying and creeped me out.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: dawell escotto
content: I wanted to upgrade my home's security with a 2nd cam after owning a Wyze cam v2. After a very quick and easy set up... i love it. The tilt feature works well and the cam turn all the way around. Great clear picture even when zoomed in. Thus far Wyze hasn't let us down. I

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: GRDALLAS
content: I had reviewed other reviews warning about wifi connectivity problems for this device.  But decided given the modest price to try the camera out for myself.  It took three attempts to finally successfully connect, and within two minutes the camera dropped the connection.  I tried five more times to reconnect the camera to my wifi network, all unsuccessfully.  I have had no problems connecting all my other numerous wifi connected devices to my network, so the problem is not with my network but rather with the Wyze Cam device.
title: Modest price too good to be true...product would not connect to my Wifi

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gufran
content: Overall it does the job for me. I have to say that sound quality can be improved. Not very clear from a 2-3 feet distance. It's not very audible. I like this company, I like the design. I hope the feedback is constructive.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: PETER VANDER AA

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: maiteandres
content: my husband and went out on a whim to get this and heck, we had super satisfied and love every detail about it. Our daughter is now 10 months old and don't really need the other monitor much. We plan on buying a few more to put around the house so that we can watch her if someone is baby sitting her.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

author: Thomas Weston

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Walter Calderón
content: Junk, absolute garbage and waste of money. STAY AWAY from WYZE products. I couldn’t even get it pair with my WiFi. Tried like (literally) 50 times and I just finally gave up. I really wanted to like this camera, but it’s a HUGE let down both on the software and hardware side.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Steve Glick
content: This replaces a Motorola camera that came with a small monitor for keeping an eye on our twin grandsons while they nap at our house. Great picture, even in total darkness. Works well but I have trouble getting the sound sensitivity adjusted. It seems that, no matter what setting, I can hear them through the walls before it even comes through to my Android phone. Perhaps it's my WiFi signal strength. Otherwise it's a great little camera for cheap.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Marisa

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: k k

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Stacey Holt

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rick S.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Brown Family
content: We have 2. Good camera, great night vision.  It works really well. The sound is horrible. It's either choppy, whooshing, or just not there despite the volume being so the way up.

author: Marc McAfee

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cadie
content: SO SO Happy with the camera! I purchased two of these for my childrens rooms and they are wonderful would definitely recommend to everyone!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mikey Wilson
content: It was awesome until I temporarily moved in with a friend and stored my Wyze camera with other belongings while waiting to move into my new apartment. Somehow, from a few months of sitting in a box, the camera has become completely inoperable. I went to set it up again, and it just pans and twists all over the place when I try to use the instructions to reset it in order to connect it to my new WiFi network. I bought it not even six months ago. Long story short, if you’re going to spend your money on this, you should buy the warranty.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Lynn D.
content: Great inexpensive camera
title: Great inexpensive camera

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kellie & Ryan
content: This camera is awesome. I have it next to the front door so it can look at the door or my stairs. Motion detection can be off. It can also be a little jumpy when scanning the room. I have an sd card to continously record. The app works great. You can't beat the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Jeff L
content: ‘cannot connect to local network’ I tried and tried many times I have 2.4 wifi, NOTHING would work, I Goggled the problem and many people are having the same problem with this product, something to do with the latest update, I sent it back!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Ashwini
content: We received this product after hearing many great things about the other model that does not pan. We thought this would be a good step up. We were wrong. NOTHING worked. The volume was incredibly low that I had to hold the phone up to my ear to hear it, the night vision didn't work, and we were unable to receive any sound or motion notifications, deeming this product essentially useless. Don't waste your time or money. Buy the other model instead.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

title: increible

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: raksman
content: This works better than expected. I have this camera indoor looking out of my porch door entrance. I have two of these camera and it is well worth it.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: L. K.
content: Great buy for the money. Easy to set up and use even my 70+ dad can operate it
title: Great buy

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ramos,corinne
content: Camera is solid, great clarity and very responsive. Would be nice to see the pan/tilt model in a weather proof version. The big “deal maker” is the fact you do not need a “pay service” to keep recordings much like you have to with the RIng doorbell system.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tracey

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Gottfried
content: had the Cam since Nov 2018 and it now started rebooting every 10min sometimes every 3min.  I pulled the SD card out, turned on and off settings, pulled the power on it. Unfortunately unable to return now.  Might find a better camera.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Billy
content: Easy to set up and great video quality. Motion tracking is hit or miss, but the software is still currently in beta. Wyze is a great company and I'm sure they'll get the bugs worked out. Would still recommend.
title: Great video quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Sparky the reviewer
content: I have 2 of these and like them. Wish there was  some kind of drive for both or several to go though for memory instead of the sd card. Also sometimes motion doesn’t pick up people. And other times it pick up everything. Haha. Still good cameras

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: ProfessionalMo
content: This camera is awesome! I love that you can control it and there are no monthly fees. Streaming live. I also love that I can leave it plugged in so I don't need to worry about charging it. This camera is awesome! I love my notifications. It does not pick up cars, but picks up all the people who come on my property.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: rosio luvian
content: Love the night vision and day. Had problems with placing in windows for night time to look over our cars, due to its lights giving off glare. Biggest down side is that you get NO notifications even when you have notifications on.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jbrenner123
content: I've spent over 2 hours trying to set this camera up, but it won't connect to my network. I've read tons of forum comments and watched videos to try and troubleshoot the connection problems (which seem to be common). Going to have to return.
title: Won't connect

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: jeannie712
content: Even though I gave this a four star, I love this camera. It has a very wide viewing area and the picture quality is decent enough to absolutely tell what's going on. I will be buying more for other rooms.
title: Great value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Grace and Rock
content: It's a great product for the price. Although sometimes when you want to playback...it doesn't work or nothing is recorded...then after a few days...it will play. That's why I only gave it 4 stars.
title: Almost perfect.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Don Tait
content: Connects right away, the 360° rotation is great. No issues so far. I’ve plenty of WiFi devices that don’t connect or disconnect easily, not this one.
title: No connectivity issues for once!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alex Lopez-negrete
content: Very good product. Easy to install, well designed. Unfortunately, it interprets the slightest light movement or reflection as movement - and the smallest sound - so even on the lowest sensitive settings, it sends alarms. At some point, you are either desensitized and no longer pay attention or have to turn it off, which defeats the purpose - otherwise, very good product.
title: Good product. A little over-sensitive

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: SarahJo Griggs
content: We didn't like this camera at all, the RTSP firmware was pretty bad as well but it is beta.  I'll stick to my Reolink indoor cameras for a few bucks more that just work and have 5ghz too.
title: Buggy device and slow to respond

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alan Skinner
content: The camera and corresponding app are both great. We're using one in a nursery as baby monitor. Way more functional and with better image quality than our dedicated monitor that we bought for our first child 5 years ago. And for about 1/5 of the price!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Adamandia Karakantas

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: aviationFan
content: This is the best wifi security camera I have ever owned. It does everything right and addressed pretty much all the gripes I had with cameras from other brands. I will mention the most important ones: 1. video clips covers the time before the event , so if someone runs quickly across the field in front of the camera, the recorded video clip captures the whole event; When my neighbors turns on his backyard light, the video clip's first 0.5 seconds shows the dark backyard. This is done right! 2. Prompt notification How fast is it? Usually within 1-2 seconds after I walked into the detection zone of the camera, I got the notification on my phone! 3. Able to download the cloud stored video clips to my phone. 4. Has time stamps on the video clip. 5. Generous cloud storage, once put in a SD card, the local storage was very robust and doesn't take too much space thus can do a continuous recording for a very long time. What can be improved? 1. the schedule function can be more flexible, now it is all or none, 2. If it can detect the presence of my phone and stop sending notification, that would be even better. (more IFTTT support is always great) 3. When are you going to have an outdoor version?
title: Does everything right

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

And that's really what I needed it for! The camera is good and I bought the sd card but haven't really recorded anything yet. I think the camera is good starting point for people who are interested in home surveillance (indoor). The microphone works well, but again, I'm  not trying to confuse my pet with voices he cannot see! Overall, I think it's a good camera.

author: ze345

On a wall or celjng.  Great buy! I had someone I know steal stuff from my house so I invested in a bit of home security. Any time it senses motion it uploads to the cloud so you will at least be able to see whoever unplugged it. Auto pan works well, if you have a small apartment it goes great on the edge of a coffee table and can view the entire area

author: J. Mcandrew
content: I've had this camera for about a week.  Here are my thoughts: Positives: - inexpensive - rotates well on a motorized base - interesting & useful software features (ex. motion tracking, smoke & fire alarm alerts, etc.) Negatives: - the picture is best at 10 ft or closer - zoom capabilities lead to an increased blurring of the picture (see my pic that was taken with the night vision on) - picture quality is similar to a 720p camera I have I'm returning my camera, but I will be watching to see what this company will do in the future.  Hopefully, they will be able to improve their picture quality (especially when zooming).

author: selinachart

One of the cameras (we bought two) CONSTANTLY is having connection issues despite the other working just fine. I have to restart to several times a day, and it’s a pain in the a** when it’s the camera that’s supposed to help me watch my dogs.  Too late to return it. Not buying it again.

content: Cheap but you get what you pay for. The night vision is terrible, can’t see anything. Also, the voice has a slight delay which is fine but it is very quiet. It is hard to hear people in the same room. Compared to higher end cameras like Ring and Arlo, these are pretty bad. With deals and things, definitely recommend getting a higher end camera.
title: Get what you pay for. Poor night vision/audio

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Abhi
content: For some reason the camera cannot capture properly the Monti on detection. If a person moves from one place to another, it cannot detect it. But it is a good product for the price it came for.
title: Issue with motion detection

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: LR Originals
content: This camera is a remarkable value.  Well worth the $37.  I was skeptical so I only bought one however I plan on adding another.  We had an issue getting it to see the sd card but once we formatted it correctly, it works like a champ.
title: Great Camera!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: steve
content: worth much more than it costs.  Even though it does spend most of the day watching tv, if the tv is on. Funny, if I walk down the hallway, it will pan around to watch me, then it goes back to watching tv.
title: Well worth the price.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Rome
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Great camera for it's price and all the features it comes with. Make sure you buy a top notch SDcard (Samsung) as some SanDisk cards have issues.
title: Helps keep a look out for unwanted guess!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: steven hyun
content: These little cameras are great! Awesome value for the money. Clean video with cool options like smoke alarm detector alerts. The tilt and pan work very well. Honestly this product was better than I expected for the price. I took away one star because I have had some occasional connectivity issues with it and the motion detection seems to miss things now and again as well.
title: Great little camera, great value!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Clifton M. Busby
content: excellent performance and quality...cant believe the price! I would buy this one for sure. I use it to monitor my 3D printer from another room. Perfect for the job. When I am away, I log in and spin it around to watch my outside door for security. all this for $32!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Russ
content: Simple to setup and works well.  No basis for comparison to other cams but for the price works as advertised.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: El Guapo Arturo
content: Great camera!  For $30 freaking bucks how can you go wrong.  I love that it sends me an alert on my phone when it detects motion.  And it has 14 days of free Amazon storage included!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Alejandro Gambetta
content: ncredible camera at a very cheap price, never forget how much you pay and what you get, never get disconnected, the software always works and saving in the cloud for 15 days is great.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Penny
content: Did not work with my internet.
title: One Star

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Shane C Kenney

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: J. Brimm
content: Works great, especially for the price which was below $40, can’t beat it. Easy to install with a separate mount which was only $8-$12 or so. Highly recommend Wyze cameras to anyone.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Dad of two
content: Camera was easy to use and set up with my existing WiFi--really pretty amazing.  Could check in on my fish from Japan.  After about 2 months of streaks started appearing in the image, some kind of weird sensor failure.  Wyse sent me a new replacement.  No hassle.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: E ke

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Produce Queen
content: Awesome camera for the price. I’m super impressed with the zoom, pan, and tilt. It’s exactly what I needed. The night vision is great

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: omid tahami
content: Easy to set up, nice quality, simple to work with. I have spent over $2400 for all of my Nest Cameras and Sensor and etc and I feel being ripped off!!!! There is no brained this product is by far more practical specially for outdoor use base on the cost. Definitely recommend it and I am going to buy afew more from them Direct.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: abrenick

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Cram Galis
content: Fantastic Device. Set up extremely easy and fast. Rare sense of satisfaction w an electronic purchase.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Paul Seay

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Picky Customer
content: I’m blown away at how well this works.  Sharp picture, quick motion detection, and very easy to set up.
title: Great value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: John S.
content: After a few months the speaker doesn't work, the mic was always too soft now barely detects anything. Playback via app is laggy and barely usable. Because I am outside US Wyze refuse to replace it even though they said they would if I had a US address. Please don't buy this product.
title: PLS don't buy esp if outside US no warranty and many problems

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

content: Can’t use the mic/speaker feature because it picks up its own playback and echos. Otherwise works well

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: CCMChristine
content: The picture quality is excellent for about 30 minutes and then the camera disconnects. I've tried everything possible to troubleshoot. It's defective. It also don't recognize an SD card. The router is fine and sitting about 8 feet from it.
title: Works best with iOS

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Richard Tellier
content: This is a great camera for the price! Great video, super easy to set up and the app allows you to rotate the camera, tilt up and down, hear activity and even talk through the camera. It has all the functions of a much higher priced camera but at a great price!! I highly recommend this camera, don’t believe the haters, this little baby is amazing!!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bonnie
content: This is so neat! I can pan around the room from across town. Now to catch the person who keeps coming into my apartment! I love that I can talk to my dog, or my kids . I hope I never have to, but if I see someone in my place, I look forward to yelling at them.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Mega Shopper
content: Always been happy with Wyze brand products.  They really do make good quality for Low cost..
title: Wyze Cam are good value and quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Melissa Lockwood
content: This is an excellent security camera. It helped us catch thieves that came a second time around (first time we didn’t have cameras). Thieves were caught red handed and a K9 even attacked on that ran! Excellent value and product!
title: BUY THESE CAMERAS YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Louis

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

author: MarcW

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: MoonKin

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: W.Lopez
content: Great product, I highly recommend it, easy to install, I only have one in my apartment, by the entrance. I still have to play around with it, but I dont have anything negative to say. If you purchase it you won't regret it.

author: horsinaround

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: BellaBean

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1

author: NILDA

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Pablo Castanon
content: I thought this was going to be one of the better smart home cameras but it has turned out to be a total dud. The connection is always dropping unless your using it when your at home which makes it useless cause we really need it to check up on our dog when we are away. Needless to say it looks like a waste of $40 bucks. Probably going to try to return and get a more reliable cam. Bummer though I did like the panning feature on this.
title: Connection Failed Always

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: fawkr
content: Out of the box - connected once then incessant "failure to connect".  Also, prompted to do firmware update which failed a few times before finally succeeding.  Tried switching to a different wifi network.  After 10 minutes of "waiting to connect" prompts and failure of the camera to read the QR code I decided it was time for this to be returned.  I really wanted this to work.  I'll return for a new one and give it another chance.  Stay tuned
title: Supremely disappointed - overhyped

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tahir
content: This is a great camera. Picture quality is great and the ability to talk to my daughter while she is in her nursery and giving her comfort from work made this purchase worth it
title: Great purchase for household surveillance

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Josh W
content: Disappointed that these cameras can’t stay fixed on motion detection. When they move around they end up viewing the walls behind them. I spent the extra money and upgraded to Ring. Far superior.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: M. Lyons
content: Really like the functionality of this little camera, it not only swivels around and up and down, but has a speaker.  The only criticism i have with it is that i wish it would swivel a little quieter.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Amy Arnold
content: I absolutely love this product. Motion detecting is a little too good. I say this because it picks up on shifts in light in the room too. That's the only thing I would change.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Todfather
content: Must have for the house. Works well inside and out of the house. Easy to use on the app, setting alerts when away from the house and clear when talking from app to those in house!!  For this price how can you not have this!!
title: Amazing product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Kersten
content: I purchased this camera based on a recommendation from a friend, and I'm very happy with the purchase. The night vision is excellent. The sound and motion detention is phenomenal. Will be purchasing more.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Renee Steelman
content: This camera is really loud/noisy when it moves. Would not buy again.  I read the reviews before purchasing this one and should have done more research. I mean this thing is loud could not possibly leave it on motion detection and stay home it’s worse than a leaky faucet.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: F. Kimper
content: I was hoping for a camera that I could use as a security camera.  The picture would be useless to identify anyone breaking in, and the camera is almost impossible to control with the app.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: RP
content: latest firmware bricked camera. Do not allow the app to update firmware.
title: Bad firmware

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Erica
content: This camera is awesome for checking in on your pet during the day. While my Pet does not understand where my voice is coming from, It’s still fun to talk to her.
title: Great product

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: KMR
content: I bought it as a toy and quickly realized it’s a pretty powerful tool for keeping track of what’s happening in my back yard. I saw when the deer walked by, when the tree fell, and (most importantly) I get notifications when my kids and their friends come and go.
title: Very useful. If you get one, you’ll end up buying more.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Doug D
content: I wanted to set this up before heading out on vacation. I am very pleased with the picture quality and how reliable this camera is. I tried many and this one by far has been the front runner. I perform the firmware updates for smooth operation. I even shared the app with someone who has right of entry so they can help me manage the on and off sessions as needed. Thank you Wyze for a superior product!
title: Super Reliable and No Crashes

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Melissa Kaye
content: I bought this camera in September, and am very careful with  it. It stopped working out of nowhere over the weekend. My father is very tech savvy, and tried everything from a camera reboot to resetting my router, with no avail. The light will not even turn on for more than 3 seconds before the entire thing shutting down again. I really do love the product, but am very disappointed that within three months it’s now broken.
title: Broke within three months

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Bruce Peppard
content: Easy to set up and does everything that it was suppose to do.  Can expand the picture for greater details.
title: Clear picture and follows the objects.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: TXguy
content: I first put in our family room. It fixated on the ceiling fan and a clock face that had the reflection of the TV. Moved it to a window but it constantly tried to follow tree movement even after setting the sensitivity to low. Finally moved it to the dining room. Great camera quality and great idea but placement is the key.
title: Must be in an room or area with no constant movement.

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Donna Tischler
content: I love this camera. It works incredibly well. I had to turn off sound detection though because it was picking up my dogs barking all the time. The night vision is fantastic as well
title: GREAT picture

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: WalterT
content: I got 2 of them, and then I added the sensors. Everything works as expected with the same quality, speed and features than the others. The even better part is that I/you/we pay less than half the price of the other cameras.
title: Unbelievable price and quality

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: EP
content: I am so impressed with this little camera! I use it to check in with my husband who has dementia. It is perfect for us! I will be buying more as well as the security package next year!
title: Great product!

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Tom B.
content: Liked everything but the volume.  On my other cameras (not wyze) I can hear a clock tick.  The wyze cameras don't pick up volume at all.  Very disappointing.  Tried to talk to customer service and got one response every other day asking the same question about the device model and serial number.  Lame.  I have two cameras and they both don't pick up volume.
title: Great picture but the volume is too low

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: Craig F
content: Good value for the money, works exactly as stated. It has a very good picture and controls well from my cell phone. I would purchase again.
title: Good value

product: Wyze Cam Pan 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa & the Google Assistant, White - WYZECP1
author: David Cole
